[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/rgyud 'bum nya pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D479}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta tat+t+wa saM gra ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen 
[\[1b.2\]]po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par 
[\[1b.3\]]snang mdzad thugs rje chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs dang /_dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[1b.4\]]pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po dbang bskur ba mnga' brnyes pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnal 
[\[1b.5\]]'byor chen po'i dbang phyug_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud cing /_thams cad kyi dgos pa mdzad pa nyid kyis/_sems can 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba yongs su skong ba'i 'phrin las mdzad pa/_thugs rje che ba rnam par snang mdzad dus gsum du rtag par bzhugs shing /_sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs thams cad rdo rje lta bur gyur 
[\[2a.2\]]pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs shing bsngags bstod pa/_nor bu dang rin po che chen pos spras pa/_kha dog sna tshogs shing dril bu btags pa/_dar dang /_'phan dang /_me tog gi phreng ba dang /_rnga ma dang /_dra ba 
[\[2a.3\]]dang /_dra ba phyed pa dang /_zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na bzhugs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[2a.4\]]phyag na rdo rje dang /_kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang /_nam mkha'i snying po dang /_rdo rje khu tshur dang /_'jam dpal dang /_sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_nam mkha'i mdzod dang /_bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab 
[\[2a.5\]]tu 'joms pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de yang 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[2a.6\]]pa tshad med grangs med pa de dag gi skus kyang til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar snang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med tshad med pa rnams snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na yang chos kyi tshul 'di dag 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]'chad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po/_nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad bzhin du rtag par bzhugs shing /_sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lta bur gyur pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pas/_rdo rje dbyings 
[\[2b.2\]]thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po/_de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa nyid kyi rdo rje chen po'i ye shes rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i rin po che 
[\[2b.3\]]chen po/_nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du spros pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas byang chub par gyur cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dag par thugs su chud pa/_nam mkha'i 
[\[2b.4\]]khams thams cad du khyab pa'i gzugs thams cad du yang dag par ston pa/_mkhyen pas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i khams rnams gdul bar spyod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' nod cing don yod par mdzad pa 
[\[2b.5\]]nyid kyis thams cad dang mnyam pa med cing bla na med pa'i 'phrin las thams cad mdzad pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen por sems brtan pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[2b.6\]]mnyes par bya ba'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dbang chen po bskur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_de 
[\[2b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i rin po che'i dpal dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag pa'i chos chen po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]cad kyi shes rab chen po'i ye shes dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'chad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za bar thams cad kyi dgongs pa mdzad pa 
[\[3a.2\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha shin tu brtan po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis srung zhing skyob pa'i gnod sbyin dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i ye shes 
[\[3a.3\]]rnams so/_/kun bzang rab tu gdon mi za/_/bdud dang rab dgyes gtso bo dang /_/mkha' skyes shin tu gzi chen dang /_/rin chen dpal dang 'dzum pa che/_/kun tu gzigs pa'i dbang chen dang /_/'jam dpal dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /_/mi gsung ba dang 
[\[3a.4\]]thams cad las/_/brtson 'grus ma rungs dam du gzung /_/rdo rje lcags kyu mda' gzhu dang /_/rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan 'dzum/_/pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo gsung /_/las dang go cha 'jigs byed bcings/_/thog ma tha ma med cing zhi/_/ma rungs khro bo bzod pa che/_/
[\[3a.5\]]gnod sbyin srin po dam pa brtan/_/gzi chen dpa' bo dbang po che/_/u ma'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon/_/gtogs 'dod rgyal 'dod thub pa che/_/'jig rten skyong dang mkha' dang sa/_/'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum pa/_/'byung chen sems can don rab mdzad/_/
[\[3a.6\]]thams cad gu lang tshangs pa dang /_/'khor dang mya ngan 'da' dang rtag_/yang dag 'tsho dang mchod pa che/_/sangs rgyas dag pa theg pa che/_/srid gsum rtag pa'ang de yin no/_/'jig rten gsum rgyal bde spyod dang /_/bde spyod gtso bo rab 'dul mdzad/_/rdo rje gtso dang 
[\[3a.7\]]sa rab mchog_/ye shes pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi spyod/_/sangs rgyas don dang sangs rgyas thugs/_/byang chub kun dang bla na med/_/rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba'i gtso/_/rang byung gzungs dang dran pa 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]dang /_/sems dpa' che dang phyag rgya che/_/ting 'dzin sangs rgyas 'phrin las mdzad/_/yang dag sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid/_/yod pa rtag don rtogs mdzad pa/_/sdong po chen po nag po che/_/'dod chags chen po bde ba che/_/thabs chen dang ni mchog chen mchog_/kun 
[\[3b.2\]]gyi mchog dang gnas dbang po/_/bcom ldan byang chub chen po'i thugs/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dper na til gyi 
[\[3b.3\]]gang bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te byang chub sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba byang chub kyi snying por bzhugs pa gang na ba der gshegs te/_byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du rdzogs par longs spyod 
[\[3b.4\]]pa'i sku bstan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon par ma rtogs par dka' ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing /_ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[3b.5\]]par rdzogs par bya snyam/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul bas mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces 
[\[3b.6\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid ni ji lta bu lags/_ji ltar na bsgrub par bgyi bka' stsal par gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[3b.7\]]rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la rtog cing mnyam par zhog la rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar zlos shing bsgrub par gyis shig_/oM tsit+ta prati be d+haM ka ro mi/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gi snying ga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba bdag gis rtogs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sems de ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na de ni ji 
[\[4a.2\]]ltar sbyangs pa de ltar gyur te/_dper na ras dkar po tshon gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems shes pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/_oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mi/_zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i 
[\[4a.3\]]sngags 'dis/_yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po de'i sems bskyed par gyur to/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' des/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bkas byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba 
[\[4a.4\]]gang lags pa de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po khyod kyis mngon sum du gyur gyis/_de legs par sgrubs shig_/de 
[\[4a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po de brtan par bya ba'i phyir/_sngags 'dis rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i dbyibs su soms shig_/oM tiSh+Tha badzra/_byang chub sems dpas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[4a.6\]]gshegs pa rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje 'dug par bdag gis mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun tu bzang po'i sems rdo rje des sngags 'dis brtan par gyis shig_/oM badzra 
[\[4a.7\]]at+ma ko\u0f85 haM/_de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje dbyings ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin brlabs kyis sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugs so/_/de nas 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa de la/_rdo rje'i dbyings/_rdo rje'i dbyings zhes bya ba'i ming gis dbang bskur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dbyings kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag 
[\[4b.2\]]thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ni bdag legs par mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems dpa' chen po de lta bas na/_sems 
[\[4b.3\]]dpa'i rdo rje de rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags ci dga' bar zlos la sgoms shig_/oM ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sta thA a haM/_de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo 
[\[4b.4\]]rje'i dbyings kyis bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag byin gyis rlobs la mngon par 
[\[4b.5\]]rdzogs par byang chub pa 'di brtan par mdzod cig_/de nas de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i dbyings kyis skad 
[\[4b.6\]]cig ma de nyid kyi tshe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[4b.7\]]cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pa rang bzhin gyis dag go/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mnyam pa 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur to/_/de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje de las de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[5a.2\]]thams cad byung nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed/_nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/_/kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes bskyed/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[5a.3\]]pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad la bzhag nas/_ri rab kyi rtse mo gang na ba dang /_khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du byin gyis brlabs 
[\[5a.4\]]nas dbyer med par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i gdan la zhal kun tu bstan te bzhugs par gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[5a.5\]]kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa rnams/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du so so nas bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs te/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rab tu rtogs pa'i 
[\[5a.6\]]phyir/_phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kun tu 
[\[5a.7\]]bzang po zhes bya ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i dbang gis dbang bskur ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/_de 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad gdon mi za bar ston pa/_thogs pa med pa/_dgongs pa rdzogs pa/_yid kyi bsam pa'o cog yongs su rdzogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[5b.2\]]thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba/_sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes 
[\[5b.3\]]bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra satwa/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ma thag pa 'di ni/_bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur nas byung ste/_sems 
[\[5b.4\]]can thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po yang dag par sbyangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyogs phyogs su 'khod do/_/de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang 
[\[5b.5\]]mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs su zhugs par gyur to/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu brtan pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas nam mkha'i khams thams cad du 'od zer rtse lnga pa'i phreng bas khyab 
[\[5b.6\]]par zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lta bu'i dbyings su gyur nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ste phyag gnyis su gnas so/_/de nas rdo rje de las rdo rje de lta bu'i 'od zer gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa/_
[\[5b.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bas khyab par byed pa rnams byung ngo /_/rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer de dag gi rtse mo las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa thams cad dang /_nam 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par byang chub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems 
[\[6a.2\]]chen po bskyed pa dang /_kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa sna tshogs pa bsgrub pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes par mdzad pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying po chen por gshegs pa dang /_bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[6a.3\]]kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub ba dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas/_ji srid sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su skyob cing thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba mdzad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[6a.4\]]thams cad kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa dam pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams kyi bar du bstan nas/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni kun tu bzang po yin pa dang /_shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig 
[\[6a.5\]]tu 'dres par gyur nas/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/_'di skad du ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o bdag ni rang byung ba'i/_/kun tu bzang po sems dpa' 
[\[6a.6\]]brtan/_/de ni brtan phyir lus min yang /_/sems dpa'i lus su gyur pa yin/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/_
[\[6a.7\]]bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_sems can gyi don bya ba dang /_thabs chen po dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_ye shes chen po'i dam tshig dang /_sems can gyi khams ma 
[\[6b.2\]]lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang /_thams cad kyi dbang por bya ba dang /_thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/_ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa bla na med pa dang /_theg pa chen 
[\[6b.3\]]po mngon par rtogs pa grub pa'i mchog thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po de/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang /_cod pan gyi 
[\[6b.4\]]dbang gis dbang bskur nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje de de'i lag par byin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/_lag na rdo rje lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[6b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje phyag g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings par bzhugs te/_phyag g.yas pas rdo rje thugs kar gsor zhing 'phen pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi grub pa yi/_/rdo rje bla na med pa 'di/_/bdag ste bdag gi lag 
[\[6b.6\]]tu byin/_/rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin 
[\[6b.7\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan drang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra rAdza/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]de/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lcags kyu chen por gyur te byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/_rdo rje lcags kyu chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su 
[\[7a.2\]]gnas so/_/de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i dbyibs chen po de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul 
[\[7a.3\]]dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po yin pa dang /_shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i lus su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang 
[\[7a.4\]]mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te/_ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o rdo rje las byung ba'i/_/lcags kyu nges pa'i rgyal po bdag_/gang phyir kun tu sangs rgyas khyab/_/grub phyir kun nas spyan 'dren to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[7a.5\]]shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[7a.6\]]cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang /_sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad dgug pa dang /_thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba 
[\[7a.7\]]myong bar bya ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du ba'i byin gyis brlabs dam pa'i bar du bsgrub pa'i phyir rdo rje'i lcags kyu de byang chub sems dpa' gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po de'i lag par de bzhin du byin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dgug 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]pa rdo rje dgug pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dgug pa rdo rje lcags kyu des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yi/_/
[\[7b.2\]]ye shes bla na med pa 'di/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi don grub phyir/_/kun nas spyan drang dam pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpas byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[7b.3\]]zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo /_/badzra rA ga_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom 
[\[7b.4\]]ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me tog gi mdar gyur nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje'i mda' chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/_/de nas 
[\[7b.5\]]rdo rje mda'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/_
[\[7b.6\]]rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bdud byed pa dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir/_gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud bya bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o 
[\[7b.7\]]bdag ni rang bzhin dag_/rang byung ba dag dgyes byed pa/_/'dod chags bral rnams dag bya'i phyir/_/'dod chags kyis ni 'dul bar byed/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud de'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de 
[\[8a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud rdo rje dam tshig dang sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams mgu bar bya ba dang /_thams cad kyis bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud kyi mchog grub pa thob pa'i bar du 'bras 
[\[8a.3\]]bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje'i mda' de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba de'i phyag tu de bzhin du byin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i gzhu rdo rje'i gzhu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[8a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i gzhu zhes bya bas rdo rje'i mda' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdud byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi/_/ye shes 'di ni dri ma med/_/'dod chags kyis ni chags bral bcom/_/bde ba 
[\[8a.5\]]thams cad sbyin par byed/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[8a.6\]]pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo /_/badzra sA d+hu/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de legs so 
[\[8a.7\]]zhes bya bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/_gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs su gyur te byag gnyis su gnas so/_/de nas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu dga' bar byed pa 
[\[8b.2\]]nyid dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i lus su gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di 
[\[8b.3\]]ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o thams cad mkhyen kun gyi/_/legs byin nang na bdag mchog pas/_/rnam rtog bral ba de dag gi/_/nges par dgyes pa bskyed pa yin/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 
[\[8b.4\]]byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/_yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 
[\[8b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dgyes pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi dam tshig dang sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can thams cad mgu bar bya ba dang /_thams cad bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[8b.6\]]dgyes pa'i ro bla na med pa dam pa grub pa 'thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje dgyes pa de byang chub sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dgyes pa rdo rje dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i rdo 
[\[8b.7\]]rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dgyes pas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la legs so zhes bya bas rab tu dgyes par byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]kun gyi legs sbyin pa/_/'di ni rab tu 'jug byed pas/_/rdo rje thams cad dgyes par byed/_/lha rdzas dgyes pa spel ba'o/_/byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[9a.2\]]mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes dang /_dgyes pa chen po dang 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig las byung ba/_rin po 
[\[9a.3\]]che'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra rat+na/_de nas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[9a.4\]]pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de nam mkha' thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur nas byung ngo /_/nam mkha' 
[\[9a.5\]]thams cad kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas pas thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings lta bur gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis nam mkha'i dbyings de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 
[\[9a.6\]]thugs su zhugs nas/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir yang nam mkha'i khams thams cad las byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur nas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[9a.7\]]pa'i phyag gnyis su gnas so/_/de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi snying po las shin tu byung ba dang /_rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[9b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i skur gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o chags med rgyal ba yang /_/khams gsum dbang por dgongs pas na/_/rdo rje rin chen dam pa yi/_/
[\[9b.3\]]dbang gi mchog ni bdag yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i lus de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs 
[\[9b.4\]]par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu rin po che'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i dam tshig dang /_sems can gyi khams ma 
[\[9b.5\]]lus shing lus pa med pa'i don thams cad yongs su grub par bya ba dang /_thams cad kyi bde ba dang /_yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don dam pa phun sum tshogs pa grub pa thob pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[9b.6\]]po nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor bar rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas lag tu rdo rje'i nor bu de byin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[9b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos rdo rje'i nor bu de rang gis dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'jog cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sems dpa'i dbyibs/_/dbang bskur de ni bdag yin te/_/bdag gi lag tu byin pas na/_/rin 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]chen la ni rin chen bzhag_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de 
[\[10a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra te dza/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid 
[\[10a.3\]]de/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen por gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/_gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/_rdo rje nyi ma'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so/_/de nas rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de 
[\[10a.4\]]las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer 'gyed pa la sogs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams 
[\[10a.5\]]byas nas/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu gzi brjid che ba nyid dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po'i skur gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la 
[\[10a.6\]]gnas te/_ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o sems can khams kun du/_/snang byed gzi brjid dpe med bdag_/gang phyir sangs rgyas dag pa yi/_/'dren pa rnams kyang sbyor bar byed/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med 
[\[10a.7\]]pa'i gzi brjid de'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te/_bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]kyi dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig dang /_sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa dang thams cad kyi 
[\[10b.2\]]bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od 'thob cing dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/_rdo rje nyi ma de byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[10b.3\]]cad kyis rdo rje'i 'od/_rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje nyi ma des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang bar byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi snang 
[\[10b.4\]]ba 'di/_/mi shes mun nag 'joms byed pa/_/shin tu phra rdul ji snyed pa'i/_/nyi ma'i 'od pas shin tu lhag_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba/_rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs 
[\[10b.5\]]pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra ke tu/_de nas de 
[\[10b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de rgyal mtshan kha dog dang gzugs dang rgyan dang dbyibs sna tshogs par gyur te byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/_
[\[10b.7\]]gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/_rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs su gyur nas phyag gnyis su gnas so/_/de nas rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs de las/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/_de 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rin po che'i dpal dang shin tu brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/_
[\[11a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i dpal gyi skur gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/_ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o don kun grub pa dang /_/dgongs pa thams cad rdzogs pa yi/_/don rnams thams 
[\[11a.3\]]cad rdzogs byed pa'i/_/'dra med dpal ni bdag yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas 
[\[11a.4\]]yang bka' nod cing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu yid bzhin gyi 
[\[11a.5\]]rgyal po'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i dam tshig dang /_sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs su bkang bar bya ba dang /_thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don chen 
[\[11a.6\]]po'i dngos grub dam pa 'thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje rgyal mtshan de byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan/_rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes rdo rje'i ming 
[\[11a.7\]]gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan des/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor du bcug nas/_ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]kun gyi dgongs pa kun/_/yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yi/_/yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ni/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i dam tshig 
[\[11b.2\]]las byung ba rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra hAs/_de 
[\[11b.3\]]nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dzum par gyur te byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres 
[\[11b.4\]]par gyur nas rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs su gyur te/_phyag gnyis su gnas so/_/de nas rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[11b.5\]]kyi rmad du byung ba la sogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/_byang chub sems 
[\[11b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te/_ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/rtag tu mnyam par bzhag rnams kyis/_/sangs rgyas don la rab 
[\[11b.7\]]sbyor phyir/_/e ma'o bdag ni kun mchog gi/_/bzhad chen rmad du byung ba yin/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[12a.2\]]nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba bskyed pa'i dam tshig dang /_sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi dbang po bla na med pa bya ba dang /_thams cad bde ba dang ling bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[12a.3\]]thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes mngon par thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag bar dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po de'i lag tu rdo rje 'dzum pa de de bzhin du byin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 
[\[12a.4\]]rdo rje dga' ba/_rdo rje dga' bzhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i dga' ba rdo rje 'dzum pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas 
[\[12a.5\]]thams cad kyi/_/rmad byung skyed pa ston pa po/_/dgyes chen byed pa'i ye shes te/_/gtsug lag gzhan gyis shes mi nus/_/dbang bskur ba chen po dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang ba dang sems dpa' chen po'i don dang dgyes pa chen po dang 'di bzhi ni de bzhin 
[\[12a.6\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang chen po'i sems dpa'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[12a.7\]]zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra d+har+m+ma/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]'dzin pa de nyid de/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer du gyur te byung ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun du snang bar byas pas 
[\[12b.2\]]chos kyi dbyings lta bur gyur to/_/chos kyi dbyings de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/_nam mkha' thams cad dang mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje pad+ma chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag 
[\[12b.3\]]gnyis su gnas so/_/de nas rdo rje pad+ma'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang mngon par shes pa la sogs pa 
[\[12b.4\]]dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byas nas/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yin pa dang /_shin tu brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/_
[\[12b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i skur gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/_ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o rang byung gdod nas dag_/dam pa'i don ni bdag yin te/_/gang phyir 
[\[12b.6\]]gzings 'dra'i chos rnams las/_/rnam par dag pa dmigs par gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi lus de bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[12b.7\]]spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i dam tshig dang /_sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi bdag dang gzhan rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[13a.2\]]thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes dang /_mngon par shes pa drug thob par byed pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku'i 
[\[13a.3\]]dbang gis dbang bskur nas de'i lag tu rdo rje pad+ma de byin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i spyan rdo rje'i spyan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rdo rje pad+ma de'i 'dab ma kha 
[\[13a.4\]]phye bas/_'dod chags rnam par dag cing ma chags pa'i ngo bo nyid du gzigs pas gzigs shing /_ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi/_/de yi kho na rtogs pa 'di/_/bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin/_/chos la chos ni gnas par 
[\[13a.5\]]'gyur/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye 
[\[13a.6\]]shes chen po'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra tI k+Sh+Na/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/_shes rab dang ye shes 
[\[13a.7\]]kyi ral grir gyur te/_de byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/_rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so/_/de nas rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes la sogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas te/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu 
[\[13b.2\]]'jam pa'i dpal yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i skur gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/
[\[13b.3\]]e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/'jam dbyangs bdag ni yin par dgongs/_/gang phyir shes rab gzugs med kyang /_/dbyangs nyid du ni dmigs pa yin/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs 
[\[13b.4\]]las byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i 
[\[13b.5\]]rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad gcad pa'i dam tshig dang /_sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad gcad pa dang /_thams cad kyi bde ba dang 
[\[13b.6\]]yid bde ba rnams myong bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba'i shes rab dam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bar du/_'bras bu de dag gi phyir/_rdo rje ral gri de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/_/
[\[13b.7\]]de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje blo rdo rje blo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje ral gri des 'debs shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/_/dgra rnams thams cad tshar gcod cing /_/sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed 
[\[14a.2\]]ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di 
[\[14a.3\]]rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra hetu/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/_rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur 
[\[14a.4\]]te byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/_rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas par gyur to/_/de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[14a.5\]]thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rnams byung nas/_sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas te/_
[\[14a.6\]]rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin pa dang /_shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur 
[\[14a.7\]]te bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/rdo rje dam pa chos can gyi/_/e ma'o rdo rje 'khor lo bdag_/gang phyir sems bskyed tsam gyis kyang /_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/_/de nas bcom 
[\[14b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang /_sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par 'jug pa phyir mi 
[\[14b.3\]]ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang /_thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dam pa grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/_rdo rje 'khor lo de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed 
[\[14b.4\]]ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje snying po rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'khor lo des de 
[\[14b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'jog cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/chos rnams thams cad rnam par sbyong /_/phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo yang /_/byang chub snying po yin par dgongs/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 
[\[14b.6\]]'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po mi gsung ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyis byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brjod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[14b.7\]]snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzrab+hASha/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/_bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi yi ger gyur te byung nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dras bar gyur nas/_rdo rje brjod pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/_/de nas rdo rje brjod pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin 
[\[15a.2\]]gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid la sogs pa dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul la sogs pa byas nas/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu tshig ma yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par 
[\[15a.3\]]gyur nas/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o rang byung rnams kyi gsang /_/ldem po ngag tu bdag dgongs te/_/gang phyir dam pa'i chos 
[\[15a.4\]]'chad pa/_/tshig tu spros las rnam par bral/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/_/
[\[15a.5\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi gsung ba'i gsung gi rdo rje'i dam tshig las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang sems can gyi khams ma lus shing 
[\[15a.6\]]lus pa med pa rnams kyi tshig grub pa dang /_thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi gsang ba thob pa'i dngos grub dam pa'i bar gyi phyir rdo rje brjod pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa de'i 
[\[15a.7\]]lag tu de bzhin du byin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje tshig rdo rje tshig ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje brjod pas yang dag par smra 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/rdo rje bzlas par brjod pa yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/sngags ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/rdo rje chos nyid kyi ye shes dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye 
[\[15b.2\]]shes dang chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba'i ye shes dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi spros pa rnam par ldog pa'i ye shes dang 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sems dpa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[15b.3\]]pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba/_las kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dam tshig ces 
[\[15b.4\]]bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra karma/_de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin las thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 
[\[15b.5\]]'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi 'od zer du gyur te byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[15b.6\]]thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dbyibs lta bur gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dbyibs de yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/_nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam du gyur to/_/de 
[\[15b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dbyibs de las/_las thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur nas phyag gnyis su gnas so/_/de nas yang rdo rje'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]thams cad kyi sku rnams byung nas/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las la sogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[16a.2\]]pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las mtha' yas pa yin pa dang /_shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs 
[\[16a.3\]]la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyi nges/_/'phrin las mang po kun bdag yin/_/sangs rgyas don ni lhun grub phyir/_/rdo rje las ni 'jug par 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[16a.4\]]kyi 'phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/_yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[16a.5\]]cad kyi gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par bya ba la sogs pa gdon mi za ba'i tshad med pa dang las kyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang sems 
[\[16a.6\]]can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyis las thams cad grub pa dang /_thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 'phrin las nyid dang ye shes dang mngon par shes pa dam pa rnams 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras 
[\[16a.7\]]bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas de'i lag tu las kyi rdo rje de de bzhin du byin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]thams cad kyis rdo rje thams cad rdo rje thams cad ces bya ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje thams cad ces bya bas rdo rje de rang gi snying gar bzhag ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las la sbyor zhing ched du brjod pa 
[\[16b.2\]]'di ched du brjod do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog_/bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin/_/sna tshogs la ni sna tshogs gzhag_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka'i dam tshig 
[\[16b.3\]]las byung ba las thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsrung ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra rak+Sha/_
[\[16b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/_go cha brtan par gyur te byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/_rdo rje go cha chen po'i dbyibs su gyur 
[\[16b.5\]]te phyag gnyis su gnas so/_/de nas rdo rje go cha'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsrung ba'i go cha rgyas pa'i las la sogs pa dang /_sangs 
[\[16b.6\]]rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni brtson 'grus dam pa thub dka' ba dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i lus su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[16b.7\]]'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o brtson 'grus go cha ni/_/brtan pa'i bdag nyid rab brtan bdag_/de ni brtan phyir lus med kyang /_/rdo rje'i lus su byed pa mchog_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]'grus chen po thub dka' ba de'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par gyur nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[17a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig dang sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyang ba dang thams 
[\[17a.3\]]cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sku 'thob pa'i mchog 'grub par bya ba'i bar du/_de dag gi phyir rdo rje go cha de byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[17a.4\]]thams cad kyis rdo rje grogs po rdo rje grogs po zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje grogs pos rdo rje go cha des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la go cha bskon zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/'di ni sangs 
[\[17a.5\]]rgyas thams cad kyi/_/byams pa'i go cha dam pa ste/_/brtson 'grus brtan pas bsrung ba che/_/grogs po chen por brjod pa yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i dam tshig las byung ba/_las kyi byin gyis 
[\[17a.6\]]brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra yak+Sha/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[17a.7\]]kyi thugs las phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/_rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha chen por gyur te byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/_rdo rje mche ba'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]gnas so/_/de nas rdo rje mche ba'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bos gdul ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul 
[\[17b.2\]]rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa yin pa dang /_shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i lus su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang 
[\[17b.3\]]mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams/_/thugs rje can gyi thabs chen te/_/zhi yang sems can don du ni/_/ma rungs par ni ston par 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad 
[\[17b.4\]]rab tu 'joms pa'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu khro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[17b.5\]]snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma rungs pa gdul ba'i dam tshig dang /_sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang /_thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[17b.6\]]thams cad kyi thabs chen po dang ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rnams 'thob cing dam pa 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha de byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/_/de nas de bzhin 
[\[17b.7\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khro bo rdo rje khro bo zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khro bos rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha de rang gi thugs kar bzhag ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsngags shing ched du brjod pa 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]'di ched du brjod do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/ma rungs thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog_/rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon rno ste/_/thabs dang snying rje'i bdag nyid do/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub 
[\[18a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes bcings pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs 
[\[18a.3\]]pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo /_/badzra san+d+hi/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcings bar gyur te byung 
[\[18a.4\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje bcings pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/_/de nas rdo rje bcing ba'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de 
[\[18a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang ye shes la sogs pa dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu 
[\[18a.6\]]tshur shin tu bcings pa dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres te byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/_ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o 
[\[18a.7\]]rab tu brtan bcings pa'i/_/dam tshig bdag ste brtan pa'i bdag_/bsam pa thams cad rab grub phyir/_/grol ba rnams kyang 'ching bar byed/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin 
[\[18b.2\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba'i dam tshig dang /_sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang lha rnams kyis dgongs pa brtag pa dang grub pa thams cad dang /_thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba 
[\[18b.3\]]nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang phyag rgya'i dbang dam pa 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje bcing ba de byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/_/de nas 
[\[18b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje khu tshur zhes rdo rje bya ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba des rdo rje bcings pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'ching zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/
[\[18b.5\]]'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/phyag rgya bcing ba che zhing brtan/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis myur grub phyir/_/dam tshig shin tu 'da' bar dka'/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i las dang brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha brtan pa dang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[18b.6\]]pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po dang phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa'i ye shes dang 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las chen po'i sems dpa'o//_//bam po gnyis pa/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[18b.7\]]pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bsgrubs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/satwa badzrI/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung 
[\[19a.2\]]ma thag tu/_rdo rje'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/_/'od zer de las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i pha rol 
[\[19a.3\]]tu phyin pa'i ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje'i dbyibs chen por gyur te bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod 
[\[19a.4\]]pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/sems dpa'i rdo rje brtan pa'i bdag_/gang phyir brtan pas lus med kyang /_/rdo rje'i lus su gyur pa yin/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[19a.5\]]rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig ces 
[\[19a.6\]]bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/rat+na badzrI/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu rin po che'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/_/rin po che'i 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten 
[\[19a.7\]]gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas yang gcig tu 'dres/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]gyi rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/rdo rje rin chen bdag yin grags/_/gang phyir phyag rgya thams 
[\[19b.2\]]cad kyi/_/dbang gi tshul ni dam pa yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir chos kyi 
[\[19b.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba/_rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/d+har+m+ma badzrI/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu 
[\[19b.4\]]pad+ma'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/_/pad+ma'i 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la 
[\[19b.5\]]phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje pad+ma chen po'i dbyibs su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/
[\[19b.6\]]e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/chos kyi rdo rje gtsang ma bdag_/gang phyir rang bzhin rnam dag pas/_/'dod chags yin yang dri ma med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdon mi za bar grub pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin 
[\[19b.7\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/kar+m+ma badzrI/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag tu las thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/_/las kyi 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi 
[\[20a.2\]]khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te yang gcig tu 'dres nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi 
[\[20a.3\]]thams cad du rtse mo ltas pa'i las kyi rdo rje chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/las kyi rdo rje mang po bdag_/gang 
[\[20a.4\]]phyir gcig kyang sems can khams/_/ma lus par ni las bzang byed/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba chen po dang rdo rje'i chos nyid dang /_mchod pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po 
[\[20a.5\]]rnams so/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang 
[\[20a.6\]]gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra lA s+ye/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu rdo rje'i phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i rtse mo de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul 
[\[20a.7\]]shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/_lha mo chen mo rdo rje 'dzin ma'i lus thams cad rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dra zhing kha dog dang gzugs dang mtshan ma dang spyod lam sna tshogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs pa/_de bzhin 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad sdud par gyur pa rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mor gyur nas bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o rang byung rnams kyi ni/_/mchod pa bdag 'dra 
[\[20b.2\]]gzhan med de/_/gang phyir 'dod pa dga' mchod pas/_/mchod pa thams cad byas par 'gyur/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i phreng ba'i dbang gis dam tshig las byung ba/_rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[20b.3\]]nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra mA le/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rin po che chen po'i phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de 
[\[20b.4\]]nyid do/_/rin po che chen po'i phyag rgya de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/_lha mo chen mo rdo rje phreng bar de bzhin du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das rin po che 'byung 
[\[20b.5\]]ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o rin chen mchod pa zhes/_/bdag dang 'dra bar grags pa med/_/gang phyir khams gsum rgyal mchog kyang /_/rab tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur/_/de nas 
[\[20b.6\]]yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu'i mchog gi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra gI ti/_de nas de bzhin 
[\[20b.7\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/_lha mo chen mo rdo rje glur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 
[\[21a.2\]]gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o bdag ni kun gzigs pa'i/_/glu mchog tshul gyis mchod pa yin/_/gang phyir sgra brnyan 'dra ba yin/_/mchod pa rnams kyis mnyes par byed/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[21a.3\]]kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra nr-i ti/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag 
[\[21a.4\]]tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas par gyur nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa de dag thams cad las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra 
[\[21a.5\]]mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te lha mo chen mo rdo rje gar du gyur nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/
[\[21a.6\]]e ma'o mchod kun don mdzad pa'i/_/mchod pa rgya chen bdag yin te/_gang phyir rdo rje gar cho gas/_/sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu byed/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba bla na med pa'i dam tshig dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba dang de bzhin 
[\[21a.7\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i las bla na med pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]mdzad kyis mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu tshim pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yog mo'i gtso mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung 
[\[21b.2\]]ngo /_/badzra d+hU pe/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag pa 'di bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de bdug pa'i mchod pa'i sprin mang po rnam pa du mas rdo rje dbyibs thams cad du khyab par gyur nas phyung ngo /_/bdug pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho de dag 
[\[21b.3\]]las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas byung ste yang gcig tu 'dres nas rdo rje bdug pa'i lha mo'i lus su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa'i rtse mo rdo rje dang /_nor 
[\[21b.4\]]bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i grwan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o bdag ni mchod pa che/_/rab tu tshim ldan dge ba yin/_/gang phyir sems can dbab ldan pas/_/myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[21b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir rin po che'i rgyan gyi mchod pa dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol 
[\[21b.6\]]ka ma 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra puSh+pe/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid me tog thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ngo /_/me 
[\[21b.7\]]tog thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te rdo rje me tog gi lha mo'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i grwa na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o me tog mchod pa bdag_/thams cad kyi ni rgyan byed de/_/gang phyir mchod nas de bzhin gshegs/_/rin chen nyid du myur du 'grub/_/de 
[\[22a.2\]]nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang ba'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 
[\[22a.3\]]par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho nya mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra A lo ke_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu thams cad du snang ba'i mchod pa'i bkod pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par byed par 
[\[22a.4\]]gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/_/thams cad du snang ba'i mchod pa'i bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/_yang gcig tu 'dres te lha mo rdo rje snang ba zhes bya ba'i 
[\[22a.5\]]skur gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i grwa na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o mchod pa'i mar me ni/_/rgya chen dge ba bdag yin te/_/gang phyir snang
