[\[22a.6\]]bcas myur du yang /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan yang 'thob/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[22a.7\]]dris mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bran mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra gan+d+he/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu dri thams cad 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]kyi mchod pa bkod pas/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/_/dri thams cad kyi mchod pa'i bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[22b.2\]]sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te lha mo rdo rje dri zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i grwa na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o lha rdzas 
[\[22b.3\]]mchod pa yi/_/yid 'ong dri ni bdag yin te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dri/_/lus rnams kun la sbyin par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dbab pa dang /_byang chub chen po'i yan lag bsags pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[22b.4\]]kyi chos kun du snang ba dang /_tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ston pa'i dri rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 
[\[22b.5\]]kyis/_yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya mang po thams cad kyi bdag po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra 
[\[22b.6\]]aM ku sha_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las de byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya mang po thams cad du gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya mang po de dag las 
[\[22b.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje nor bu rin po che 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]las byas pa'i rdo rje sgo khang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis spyan 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/yang dag spyan 'dren brtan pa bdag_/
[\[23a.2\]]gang phyir bdag gis spyan drangs pas/_/dkyil 'khor kun la bsten par 'gyur/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig tu 'jug pa/_sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[23a.3\]]zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'dren pa gsol ka pa 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra pA sha/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las de byung ma thag tu/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'dren pa'i phyag rgya mang 
[\[23a.4\]]por gyur nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'dren pa'i phyag rgya mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang 
[\[23a.5\]]gcig tu 'dres te byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i sgo khang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dren cing ched 
[\[23a.6\]]du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/rdo rje zhags pa dam po bdag_/rdul phran bzhugs pa thams cad kyang /_/bdag gis slar yang drang bar bya/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags 
[\[23a.7\]]sgrog_/sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba/_sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho nya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra s+pho Ta/_
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las de byung ma thag tu/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa'i phyag rgya mang por gyur nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 
[\[23b.2\]]bsdams pa'i phyag rgya mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/_yang gcig tu 'dres te/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bya ba'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 
[\[23b.3\]]'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje chos kyi sgo khang gi nang gi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'ching zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/rdo rje lcags 
[\[23b.4\]]sgrog dam po bdag_/bcing ba kun las grol ba rnams/_/sems can don du 'ching bar 'dod/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbab pa zhes bya ba sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba/_sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[23b.5\]]'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi bran 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_/badzra A be sha/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag 
[\[23b.6\]]rgya mang po thams cad du gyur nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya mang po thams cad las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste 
[\[23b.7\]]gcig tu 'dres nas/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dbab pa'i skur gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje las kyi sgo gang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'bebs 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]shing /_ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/rdo rje dbab pa brtan pa bdag_/kun gyi bdag tu gyur nas kyang /_/bran du yang ni gyur pa yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba dang /_gzhug pa 
[\[24a.2\]]dang bcing ba dang /_dbang du bya ba rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu bar byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/_rdo rje se gol gyis mtshan ma mdzad nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[24a.3\]]thams cad bsdu ba'i byin brlabs 'di gsungs so/_/badzra sa mA dzaH/_de nas skad cig yud tsam thang cig de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi se gol gyi mtshan mas bskul ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad nas/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[24a.4\]]khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang bcas te 'dug nas khang bu brtsegs pa'i rtse mo nor bu rin po che las byas pa gang na ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[24a.5\]]rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba bder gshegs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pA da ban+da naM ka ro mi zhes brjod do/_/rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags de ci dga' bar zlos shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas/_ched du brjod pa 'di 
[\[24a.6\]]ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/kun du bzang po'i spyod pa mchog_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo mdzes/_/dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin 
[\[24a.7\]]gshegs pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]thugs las rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor du gyur nas snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs nas/_ched du brjod pa 
[\[24b.2\]]'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/rgya chen gdod nas skyes pa min/_/rdul phran ji snyed thams cad kyi/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas sems can gyi khams ma lus 
[\[24b.3\]]shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang /_thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bstabs pa nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam pa 'grub pa'i phyir/_rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 
[\[24b.4\]]'khor chen po 'di byin gyis brlab par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' thog ma dang tha ma med pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab bo/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/rdo rje 
[\[24b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa kun/_/rdo rje dang po kun du bzang /_/phyag 'tshal phyag na rdo rje la'o/_/rdo rje rgyal po sangs rgyas mchog_/rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin gshegs/_/don yod rgyal po rdo rje mchog_/phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'gugs khyod la/_/rdo rje chags pa bde chen 
[\[24b.6\]]po/_/rdo rje mda' ni dbang byed pa/_/bdud kyi 'dod pa rdo rje che/_/phyag 'tshal rdo rje gzhu khyod la/_/rdo rje legs pa sems dpa' mchog_/rdo rje mgu ba dga' ba che/_/rab dgyes rgyal po rdo rje mchog_/phyag 'tshal rdo rje dgyes khyod la/_/rdo rje rin chen rdo rje don/_/
[\[24b.7\]]rdo rje nam mkha' nor bu che/_/nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje phyug_/phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying po khyod/_/rdo rje gzi brjid cher 'bar ba/_/rdo rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i 'od/_/rdo rje 'od zer gzi brjid che/_/phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'od khyod la/_/rdo rje dpal rab sems can don/_/rdo rje rgyal mtshan 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]rab dga' byed/_/rdo rje chen po rin chen dpal/_/phyag 'tshal rdo rje dpal khyod la/_/rdo rje bzhad mo bzhad pa che/_/rdo rje 'dzum pa ngo mtshar che/_/dga' zhing rab dga' rdo rje ston/_/phyag 'tshal rdo rje dga' ba la/_/rdo rje chos rab de nyid don/_/rdo rje pad+ma 
[\[25a.2\]]rab dga' byed/_/'jig rten dbang rab rdo rje'i spyan/_/phyag 'tshal rdo rje spyan khyod la/_/rdo rje rno ba theg pa che/_/rdo rje ral gri mtshon chen po/_/'jam dpal rdo rje rab tu zab/_/phyag 'tshal rdo rje blo khyod la/_/rdo rje rgyu dang snying po che/_/rdo rje 'khor lo tshul chen po/_/rab 
[\[25a.3\]]skor rdo rje las byung ba/_/phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying po la/_/rdo rje gsung ba rang rig mchog_/rdo rje zlos pa rab grub sbyin/_/mi gsung rdo rje mchog grub pa/_/phyag 'tshal rdo rje gsung khyod la/_/rdo rje las rab rdo rje bka'/_/las kyi rdo rje kun rab 'gro/_/rdo rje nges pa rgya 
[\[25a.4\]]che ba/_/phyag 'tshal rdo rje kun khyod la/_/rdo rje srung ba brtan pa che/_/rdo rje go cha sra ba che/_/brtson 'grus mchog ni thub pa dka'/_/phyag 'tshal rdo rje brtson 'grus la/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs chen po/_/rdo rje mche ba 'jigs pa che/_/bdud 'joms rdo rje mi bzad pa/_/phyag 'tshal 
[\[25a.5\]]rdo rje drag po la/_/rdo rje mtshams sbyor rab tu 'dud/_/rdo rje 'ching ba rab grol byed/_/rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig mchog_/phyag 'tshal rdo rje khu tshur la/_/su zhig ming rnams 'chang ba ni/_/zhi ba brgya po rtsa brgyad 'di/_/rdo rje ming dbang bskur la sogs/_/mchog rnams kun gyis 
[\[25a.6\]]de dbang bskur/_/gang zhig yon tan ming rnams kyis/_/rdo rje 'chang ba chen po la/_/rtag tu glur blangs bstod pa ni/_/de yang rdo rje 'chang 'drar 'gyur/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis/_/bdag cag gis ni bstod pa yin/_/theg pa chen po rtogs pa yi/_/tshul chen yang 
[\[25a.7\]]ni rgyas par mdzod/_/mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che/_/dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yi/_/cho ga mchog ni bshad par gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]thos nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do/_/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/
[\[25b.2\]]rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/_/rdo rje dbyings zhes bgyi bar grags/_/sems dpa' che yi phyag rgya cher/_/bsgom zhing byin gyis rlob bgyid cing /_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du/_/ci rigs par ni mchis nas kyang /_/phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs/_/kun du rnam par bltas 
[\[25b.3\]]nas ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod nas/_/bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor/_/sar pa lags par bkal nas kyang /_/tshad dang mthun la mdzes pa yi/_/thig gis mkhas pas ci nus kyis/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab cing /_/gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang /_/
[\[25b.4\]]rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la/_/thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa/_/dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/_/grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad dang /_/sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su/_/rdo rje rin chen spras par ni/_/dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo/_/de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la/_/
[\[25b.5\]]'khor lo 'dra bar rdo rje yi/_/thig gis yongs su bskor bar bgyi/_/ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis la/_/rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan la/_/dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs gzhag cing /_/sangs 
[\[25b.6\]]rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun gyi/_/dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus rnams su/_/rim bzhin du ni dam tshig mchog_/bzhi po legs par gzhag par bgyi/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag tu/_/rdo rje'i gom pas song nas ni/_/mi g.yo ba la sogs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas bzhi po 
[\[25b.7\]]thams cad gzhag_/mi g.yo ba yi dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje 'dzin sogs bcas par gzhag_/rin chen 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje snying sogs rdzogs par gzhag_/tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje spyan sogs dag par gzhag_/gdon mi za grub dkyil 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]'khor du/_/rdo rje rgya gram la sogs gzhag_/'khor lo yi ni grwa rnams su/_/rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang gzhag_/dkyil 'khor phyi rim grwa rnams su/_/sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams kyang gzhag_/sgo rnams kyi ni nang du ni/_/sgo srung bzhi yang gzhag par 
[\[26a.2\]]bya/_/dkyil 'khor phyi rim phyogs su ni/_/sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag_/de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/_/dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni/_/cho ga bzhin bcings zhugs nas kyang /_/g+haN+Da'i phyag rgyas dbab par bgyi/_/de la thams cad dbab pa'i snying po ni 'di 
[\[26a.3\]]lags so/_/aH/_bdag la byin gyis brlab la sogs/_/ji lta bar ni bka' nod do/_/de ltar bgyis nas bdag ming brjod/_/de nas rdo rjes bsgrub bgyi ba/_/rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi/_/rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni/_/se gol mang po brdab gyis la/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[26a.4\]]thams cad bsdu bar bgyi/_/de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad ni/_/rdo rje sems la sogs par bcas/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams/_/dkyil 'khor rnams su 'dus par 'gyur/_/de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi/_/phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing /_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad 
[\[26a.5\]]dam pa ni/_/cung zad rab tu brjod par bgyi/_/da nas 'dus pa dgyes pas na/_/de bzhin gshegs rnams brtan par 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rang grub pa/_/grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas/_/de nas sgo rnams thams cad du/_/lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis nas/_/
[\[26a.6\]]las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis/_/dam tshig rnams ni gzhag par bgyi/_/dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang /_/sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs pas/_/de ltar sems dpa' chen po bsgrub/_/dzaHhU~M baM hoHzhes brjod cing /_/de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa/_/sems dpa' 
[\[26a.7\]]chen po kun bsdu bar/_/spyan drangs nas ni rab tu bcug_/bcings nas de yi dbang du gyur/_/de nas bdag nyid chen po rnams/_/gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la/_/thams cad grub phyir sems can don/_/thams cad mdzod ces gsol bar bgyi/_/dkyil 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]'khor thams cad du rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bzhin du las bgyi'o/_/de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir ni rdo rje slob ma dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa la sogs pa cho ga rgyas par mchis so/_/de la dang po gzhug pa lags te sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med 
[\[26b.2\]]pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang bde ba'i mchog grub par bgyi ba'i slad du'o/_/dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir gzhug pa la snod du gyur pa dang snod du ma gyur pa brtag mi 'tshal lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das sems can kha 
[\[26b.3\]]cig ni sdig pa chen po bgyid pa yang mchis te/_de dag gis rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po der zhugs te mthong na/_ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das nor dang nor bu dang /_bza' ba dang btung ba dang 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la 
[\[26b.4\]]chags pa dang /_dam tshig la mi dga' ba dang sngar spyad pa la sogs pa mi nus pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/_de dag kyang der ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bgyid cing zhugs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das sems 
[\[26b.5\]]can kha cig ni gar dang glu dang gad mo dang rtsed mo dang /_kha zas dang spyod pa la dga' ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid khong du ma chud pas lha gzhan gyi rigs dang dkyil 'khor du 'jug gi_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[26b.6\]]pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par yang dag par gyur pas/_bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs pa rnams 'byung ba der ni bslab pa'i tshig gis 'jigs shing skrag nas/_mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/_de dag ngan 
[\[26b.7\]]song gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam du 'jug par kha bltas shing gnas pa rnams kyang dga' ba dang /_mgu ba'i dam pa thams cad 'grub cing bde ba dang /_yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba dang /_ngan song gi rgyud thams cad du 'jug par kha bltas pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]slad du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'jug tu rung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das chos can gyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dam pa 'grub pa'i thabs kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub 
[\[27a.2\]]tshol ba na bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar ba dang /_sa rnams kyis 'bad cing nyon mongs par gyur pa dag kyang mchis te/_de dag kyang rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po der zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'grub par yang dka' ba lags na/_dngos grub 
[\[27a.3\]]gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bzhi bya'o/_/de ni 'di ltar lus thams cad kyis rdo rje thal mo brkyang ste phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/_oM sar+b+ba tathA ga ta pU dzopa s+thA nA ya At+nA naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/_sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra 
[\[27a.4\]]satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM zhes brjod do/_/de bzhin du 'dug ste rdo rje thal mo snying gar bzhag ste dpral bas phyag 'tshal zhing /_sngags 'di skad du/_oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta bU dzA a b+hi She kA ya At+pA naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/_sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM zhes brjod do/_/de nas de bzhin du 
[\[27a.5\]]'dug ste rdo rje thal mo spyi bor sbyar te khas phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad du/_oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dzA pra brta nA ya A t+mA naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/_sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra d+har+m+ma pra brta ya maM zhes brjod do/_/de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste rdo rje'i thal mo spyi bo nas phab ste/_snying gar bzhag ste spyi bos phyag 
[\[27a.6\]]'tshal zhing 'di skad du/_oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dzA kar+m+ma Ne At+mA naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/_sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra kar+m+ma ku ru mAM zhes brjod do/_/de nas stod g.yogs gos dmar po gyon la/_gdong ras dmar pos dkris nas sems dpa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do/_/sam 
[\[27a.7\]]yas+t+waM/_de nas gung mo gnyis kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin bcug la drang zhing snying po 'di brjod do/_/sa ma ya hU~M/_de nas bcug ma thag tu 'di skad du bsgos shig_/deng khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/_ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]gshegs pa thams cad du 'grub pa'ang thob na/_dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis/_khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra shig dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas rdo rje slob dpon nyid kyis sems dpa'i 
[\[27b.2\]]rdo rje'i phyag rgya kha nang na bstan pa dang /_phyir bstan pa bcings la rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad du brjod par bya'o/_/'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyis gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na/_klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang mna'i 
[\[27b.3\]]chu'i snying pos bsngags la slob ma de 'thung du gzhug go/_/de la mna'i snying po 'di yin te/_rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/_/snying la yang dag gzhug par mdzad/_/gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/_/de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/_/oM badzrod ka tha/_de nas slob ma la 'di 
[\[27b.4\]]skad bsgos shig_/deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis/_ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so/_/khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig_/mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la 'di skad du de bzhin 
[\[27b.5\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la/_rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces brjod du gzhug go/_/de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du sems dpa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la/_'di skad du smrar gzhug go/_/'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste/_/rdo rje sems 
[\[27b.6\]]dpa' yin par grags/_/rdo rje'i ye shes bla med ni/_/de ring nyid du 'bab par shog_/oM badzra A be sha aH/_de nas khro bos phyag rgya bcings la/_sems dpa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya la mdud cing drangs la theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i tshig ci nus par smrar gzhug go/_/
[\[27b.7\]]de nas phab ste babs ma thag tu lha'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur te/_ye shes des pha rol gyi sems shes par 'gyur ro/_/'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi dgongs pa thams cad shes par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thams cad la de yis sems 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]brtan par 'gyur ro/_/de yis sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa thams cad dang bral nas gnod pa med par 'gyur ro/_/sems dpa' thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/dngos 
[\[28a.2\]]grub thams cad 'di'i mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/rgyu med par sngon ma byung ba'i dga' ba dang mgu ba dang /_rangs par byed pa'i bde ba thams cad de la skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bde ba de dag kha cig gis ni ting nge 'dzin 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/kha cig gis ni gzungs/_kha cig gis ni re ba 
[\[28a.3\]]thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa nas/_kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyag rgya de bcings la rang gi snying gar bkrol zhing snying po 'di yang smrar gzhug go/_/tiSh+Tha badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba shA shwa t+yo me b+ha ba/_dri da ya me/_a d+hi tiSh+Tha sarba 
[\[28a.4\]]sid+d+hi m+me bra yats+tsa hUM/_ha ha ha ha ho/_de nas me tog gi phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor zhing snying po 'di yang ched du brjod du gzhug go/_/pratI ts+tsha badzra hoH/_de nas gang la bab pa de des 'grub bo/_/de nas phreng ba de blangs te/_mgo bor bcings la snying po 'di smrar gzhug go/_/
[\[28a.5\]]oM pra ti grih+Na swa mi mAM satwa ma hwa ba la/_de bcings pas sems dpa' chen po des bdag gir byas par gyur pas 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de ltar babs bzhin du gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te/_snying po 'di yang smrar gzhug go/_/oM badzra satwa sa yaM te t+ya tsak+Shurga ta na 
[\[28a.6\]]tat+pa ra u t+g+ha Ta/_ya ti sar+b+bA k+Sho badzra tsak+Shu a nut+ta raM he badzra pA sh+ya/_de nas dkyil 'khor chen po rim pa bzhin du bstan to/_/dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ma thag tu yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje sems dpa' yang de'i snying ga 
[\[28a.7\]]na gnas so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir/_'od zer sna tshogs la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba la sogs pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]dam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku cig ston par 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyin chad don thams cad dang yid kyi dgos pa'i 'dod pa thams cad dang /_dngos grub thams cad nas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid dam/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dkyil 'khor 
[\[28b.2\]]chen po mthong ba'i 'og tu rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i nang gi dri'i chu dang snying po 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/oM badzra ab+hi Shiny+tsa mI/_de nas phyag rgya dang phreng ba gang yang rung ba gcig bcings la rang gi mtshan ma lag par bzhag la 'di skad du brjod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[28b.3\]]kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang /_/de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/_/sangs rgyas kun du rab 'grub phyir/_/rdo rje de ni khyod kyis long /_/oM badzra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shi ny+tsA mi/_tith+tha badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/_de nas snying po 'dis rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dbang bskur bya'o/_/oM badzra satwa s+t+waM a b+hiShi ny+tsA mi/_
[\[28b.4\]]badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/_kye rdo rje zhes gang gi ming gis gang brjod pa der/_kye zhes brjod par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/_/de nas ci khyod don 'byung ba'i dngos grub kyi ye shes dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i ye shes dang /_
[\[28b.5\]]rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i ye shes nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog 'grub pa'i ye shes kyi bar du/_gang 'dod ces smras la de nas gang gis gang 'dod pa de de la brjod par bya'o/_/de nas don thams cad kyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag 
[\[28b.6\]]rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/_rdo rje'i dbyings ni gter gnas pa/_/snying gar yongs su bsgom par bya/_/bsgoms nas sa la gnas pa yi/_/gter ni de yis mthong bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i dbyibs cig bris nas kyang /_/nam mkha'i ngos la bsgom par bya/_/gang du lhung 
[\[28b.7\]]bar mthong ba der/_/gter yod par ni shes par bya/_/blo ldan mi yis rdo rje'i dbyibs/_/lce yi steng du bsgoms na ni/_/'di na yod ces bdag nyid kyis/_/bden pa nyid du smra bar 'gyur/_/bdag gi lus ni thams cad la/_/rdo rje dbyibs su bsgoms nas ni/_/babs par 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]gyur nas gar gnas par/_/gter ni de na yod par bshad/_/de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/_/oM badzra ni d+hI/_oM rat+na ni d+hI/_oM d+har+m+ma ni d+dI/_oM kar+m+ma ni d+hI/_de nas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/_rdo rje'i dbab pa byas 
[\[29a.2\]]nas ni/_/chu la rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra bar/_/bsgoms nas chu yi steng na phar/_/'gro ba'i dngos grub myur bar 'grub/_/de ltar dbab pa byas nas kyang /_/gang gi gzugs su bdag gi lus/_/bsgoms par gyur na bdag nyid ni/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni skur yang 'gyur/_/de ltar bdag 
[\[29a.3\]]la phab nas kyang /_/bdag gis bdag nyid nam mkhar ni/_/bsgoms par gyur na ji srid du/_/'dod pa de srid mi snang 'gyur/_/rdo rje babs par bdag gyur nas/_/rdo rje yin par bdag bsgoms na/_/gnas nas ji srid lding 'dod pa/_/de srid mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/_/de dag 
[\[29a.4\]]gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/_/badzra dz+wa la/_badzra rU pa/_badzra A kA sha/_badzra ma hU~M/_de nas rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/_zla ba'i dbyibs cig bris nas ni/_/steng gi mkha' la 'phag bya ste/_/lag par rdo rje bsgoms na ni/_/
[\[29a.5\]]rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/zla ba'i dbyibs steng 'dug gnas nas/_/rdo rje rin chen rab bsgoms na/_/bdag nyid bdag pa ji srid 'dod/_/de srid skad cig lding bar 'gyur/_/zla ba'i dbyibs kyi steng 'dug nas/_/rdo rje pad ma la gnas par/_/bsgoms na rdo rje spyan 
[\[29a.6\]]gyis ni/_/rig 'dzin go 'phang sbyin par byed/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas nas/_/las kyi rdo rje bsgoms na ni/_/rdo rje sna tshogs 'dzin pa las/_/rig 'dzin kun tu myur bar 'gyur/_/de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/_/badzra d+ha ra/_rat+na d+ha ra/_d+har+m+ma d+ha ra/_
[\[29a.7\]]kar+m+ma d+ha ra/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/_rdo rje kun gyi ting nge 'dzin/_/nam mkha'i dbyings su bsams na ni/_/rdo rje'i bdag nyid ji srid 'dod/_/de srid rab tu lding bar 'gyur/_/kun las 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin/_/bsgoms na bla med de bzhin du/_/ye shes bsgrub pas myur du ni/_/mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar ni/_/nam mkha' thams cad dran byas na/_/bdag nyid dran pa brtan ldan zhing /_/rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 
[\[29b.2\]]'gyur/_/nam mkha'i dbyings ni thams cad du/_/sangs rgyas gzugs su dmigs nas ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin las/_/sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/_/de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/_/badzra badzra/_shud+d+ha shud+d+ha/_satwa satwa/_bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/_
[\[29b.3\]]thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes 'grub pa rnams so/_/de nas gsang thub pa yin pas/_de la dang por mna'i snying po brjod par bya ste/_oM badzra satwa swa ya n+d+ye/_hr-id yes ma bsta ta ni bI r+yA ta ta k+Sha NAMyA yA d+Ya ti bru yad i dam na yaM/_de nas 'di skad du khyod kyis mna'i snying po 
[\[29b.4\]]de las 'da' bar ma byed cig_/khyod kyis gnod pa ma spangs pas/_dus ma yin par shi bar gyur ta re/_lus 'di nyid kyis dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo bar bya'o/_/de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/_/rdo rje dbab pa byas na ni/_/mnyam 
[\[29b.5\]]par bzhag pas rdo rje yi/_/thal mo ngos kyis dal brdabs na/_/ri bo yang ni dbang du 'gyur/_/rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga yis/_/rdo rje bsdams pa'i ngos kyis ni/_/dal gyis brdab par sbyor ba yis/_/ri bo yang ni kun nas 'gugs/_/de bzhin 
[\[29b.6\]]dbab pa'i cho ga yis/_/rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang nas ni/_/sor mo'i rtse mo mnyam brdabs na/_/rigs brgya yud kyis brlag par 'gyur/_/phra mo dbab pa'i cho ga yis/_/sor mo thams cad mnyam bzhag cing /_/rdo rje bsdams mas bkrol ba ni/_/sdug bsngal thams cad 
[\[29b.7\]]sel ba'i mchog_/de nas de dag gi gsang ba bsgrub pa yin te/_bud med dam ni skyes pa yi/_/bu ga'i nang du gzhug par bya/_/yid kyis de ltar zhugs nas kyang /_/de yi lus kun khyab par bsam/_/de la thal mo'i snying po ni 'di dag yin no/_/badzrapA sha/_badzra A be sha/
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]badzra ha na/_badzra ha ra/_de nas rang gi rigs kyi lha'i phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/_/cho ga 'di skad du bsgo bar bya ste/_khyod kyis phyag rgya mi shes pa gzhan su yang rung ba la/_phyag rgya gang yang rung ba bstan par ma byed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[30a.2\]]de ni 'di ltar dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis phyag rgya bcing ba byas na/_de'i tshe de dag de ltar 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas de dag the tshom du gyur te/_gnod pa ma spangs pas myur ba nyid du dus byas nas/_dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa 
[\[30a.3\]]zhes bya bar lhung bar 'gyur ro/_/khyod nyid kyang ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' sgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes gang yin pa ste/_sems rtogs pa nas brtsams nas ni/_/rdo rje dbyings shes rjod byed cing /_/sangs 
[\[30a.4\]]rgyas skur ni bdag bsgyur la/_/rdo rje nyi ma bsgom par bya/_/grub ma thag tu de yis ni/_/ye shes tshe stobs na tshod dang /_/kun tu 'gro ba nyid rnams 'thob/_/sangs rgyas 'grub pa'ang dka' ba min/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyag 
[\[30a.5\]]rgya'o/_/de nas rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba yin te/_sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis/_/rdo rje bsgyings par sems bskyed de/_/bsgyings bcas rdo rje gsor byed na/_/rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid 'gyur/_/des na kun du 'gro ba dang /_/'dod pa kun 
[\[30a.6\]]bdag bde can dang /_/rdzu 'phrul che stobs gzugs mchog rnams/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur/_/sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis/_/ji ltar ri mo'i rjes mthun zhing /_/mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams ldan pa/_/sems dpa' chen por bsgrub par bya/_/'dir ni dum bu 
[\[30a.7\]]thams cad kyi/_/sgrub pa dang ni dngos grub dang /_/grub pa rnams kyi las chen rnams/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du bshad par bya/_/dang por nyin re'i dus bzhin du/_/rang la byin gyis brlab la sogs/_/byas nas thams cad bsgrub bya ste/_/de yi 'og tu ci dgar bya/_/de la phyag rgya 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]chen por bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/_rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni/_/phyag rgya chen po cho ga bzhin/_/bcings nas de yi mdun phyogs su/_/sems dpa' chen po de bsgom mo/_/ye shes sems dpa' de mthong nas/_/rang gi lus su bsgom par bya/_/bkug cing 
[\[30b.2\]]bcug la bcing ba dang /_/dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya/_/de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/_/badzra satwa aHrdo rje dbab pa'i snying po'o/_/badzra satwa dr-i sh+ya ho/_/sems dpa' chen po rjes su dran par bya ba'i snying po'o/_/dzaHhU~M baM hoH/_sems dpa' chen po spyan drang ba dang /_
[\[30b.3\]]gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba rnams kyi snying po'o/_/sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod pas/_/rgyab tu zla ba grub nas ni/_/der bdag sems dpa' lus su bsgom/_/sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM brjod/_/sems dpa' gang gi phyag rgya gang /_/de ni bdag tu bsgoms nas ni/_/rdo rje 
[\[30b.4\]]bzlas pas bsgrub par bya/_/phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa'o/_/gzhan yang bsgrub pa chen po ni/_/dzaHhU~M baM hoHzhes brjod la/_/legs pa'i cho gas yid kyis ni/_/lus su sangs rgyas kun gzhug go_/de nas bla med rdo rje'i las/_/de dag gi ni las bshad de/_/sangs 
[\[30b.5\]]rgyas rjes su dran grub na/_/sangs rgyas nyid du myur du 'gyur/_/sems dpa'i rdo rje ma grub na/_/phyag rgya kun gyi bdag por 'gyur/_/rin chen rdo rje'i phyag rgya yis/_/de ni rin chen kun dbang 'gyur/_/chos kyi rdo rje grub na ni/_/sangs rgyas chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur/_/las kyi rdo 
[\[30b.6\]]rje'i phyag rgya yis/_/rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur/_/sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings pa yis/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur/_/rdo rje 'dren pa'i cho ga yis/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa spyan 'dren 'gyur/_/rdo rje 'dod pa'i phyag rgya ches/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes 
[\[30b.7\]]par byed/_/rdo rje legs pa'i cho ga yis/_/sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed/_/rin chen phyag rgya'i cho ga yis/_/sangs rgyas dbang bskur de bzhin du/_/rdo rje gzi brjid cho ga yis/_/rdo rje gzi brjid myur du 'grub/_/rdo rje dpal 'dzin bsten pas na/_/re ba rnams 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]ni yongs su skong /_/rdo rje bzhad pa'i cho ga yis/_/sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam du bzhad/_/rdo rje chos kyi cho ga yis/_/rdo rje chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur/_/rdo rje rnon po'i cho ga yis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi shes rab mchog_/rdo rje 'khor lo 
[\[31a.2\]]'dzin bsten pas/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje gsung gi cho ga yis/_/sangs rgyas gsung gi grub pa 'thob/_/rdo rje'i las mchog bsgrubs pas na/_/rdo rje'i las su myur du 'grub/_/rdo rje'i go cha bskon nas ni/_/rdo rje'i sku ni 'thob par 
[\[31a.3\]]'gyur/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin bsgrubs pas na/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam par 'gyur/_/rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas na/_/phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa bsgrubs pas na/_/rdo rje rol pa chen po 'thob/_/rdo rje phreng ba bcings pas na/_/sangs 
[\[31a.4\]]rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 'gyur/_/rdo rje glu yi cho ga yis/_/rdo rje glu ni len par 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i gar gyi sbyor ba yis/_/sangs rgyas kun la des mchod do/_/rdo rje bdug pa'i cho ga yis/_/'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed/_/rdo rje me tog sbyor byed pas/_/des 
[\[31a.5\]]ni 'gro ba dbang du byed/_/rdo rje snang ba'i phyag rgya ches/_/rab mchog mig ni sbyin par byed/_/rdo rje dri yi cho gas ni/_/sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed/_/rdo rje lcags kyus drangs pas na/_/'dren pa kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/rdo rje zhags pa'i cho gas ni/_/thams cad 
[\[31a.6\]]rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/_/rdo rje lcags sgrog sbyor ba yis/_/thams cad bcing bar nus par 'gyur/_/rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga yis/_/thams cad dbab par rab tu 'grub/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bshad de/_thal mo 
[\[31a.7\]]dam du sbyar ba las/_/sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni/_/rdo rje thal mor bka' stsal te/_/rab tu bsdams phyir rdo rje bsdams/_/dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni/_/rdo rje bsdams las byung bas na/_/de dag bsdams pa rdo rje yi/_/bsdams pa bla med bshad par bya/_/rdo 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]rje bsdams pa dam bcas la/_/gung mo myu gu ltar mnyam bsgreng /_/gung mo nang du gshibs pa ni/_/sangs rgyas gnyis pa'i yin par bshad/_/gung mo rin chen 'dra ba dang /_/gung mo pad+ma 'dra bar dgug_/sangs rgyas lnga ba'i phyag rgya ni/_/de bzhin mdzub mo 
[\[31b.2\]]bkug pa'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yi/_/rigs kyi dam tshig 'dzin pa yi/_/phyag rgya bsdams dang dngos grub dang /_/las rnams yang dag bshad par bya/_/zla ba lta bu'i lag gnyis kyi/_/gung mo btang bar gyur ba yi/_/mthe'o mthe chung so sor bsgreng /_/sems 
[\[31b.3\]]dpa'i rdo rje bsgreng rdo rje/_/mdzub mo lcags kyu mdzub mo sbyar/_/legs so sbyin pa 'dra ba ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi bo yi/_/phyag rgya mang po'i dngos grub de'o/_/mthe bo gzhibs la mdzub gnyis bcag_/rtse sprad rin chen rdo rje yin/_/de nyid gung mo srin lag dang /_/mthe'u 
[\[31b.4\]]chung rnams ni bsnol brkyang ba'o/_/de las srin lag mthe'u chung gnyis/_/mnyam par gshibs pa rgyal mtshan no/_/de 'di las ni bskor nas kyang /_/kha yi phyogs su bzhag pa'o/_/mthe bo gnyis ka mnyam par gshibs/_/mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug pa dang /_/gung 
[\[31b.5\]]mo bsgreng ba'i rtse mo bkug_/de nyid rdo rje ral gri'o/_/de las srin lag mthe'u chung gshibs/_/'khor lo yin par bshad pa yin/_/bsdams la mthe bo gnyis bkrol la/_/bkan te kha phyogs bzhag pa'o/_/mthe bo mthe'u chung rtse sprad bskyed/_/las kyi rdo rje yin par 
[\[31b.6\]]bshad/_/de las mdzub mo gnyis gshibs la/_/snying gar brkyang ste bzhag pa'o/_/mdzub mo rtse mo gnyis bkug la/_/mthe'u chung gshibs pa mche ba'o/_/mthe'u chung gnyis par mthe bo gnyis/_/mdzub mo gnyis kyis btsir ba'o/_/snying gar mthe bo mnyam 
[\[31b.7\]]nas bzhag_/rab tu brkyang ba phreng ba'o/_/thal sbyar rtse mo kha nas dbyung /_/gar las thal sbyar spyi bor gzhag_/rdo rje bcings pa thur du klugs/_/thal mo sbyar ba gyen du gtor/_/mthe bo mnyam ste rab tu bsdam/_/rab tu brkyang nas byug pa'o/_/mdzub mo gcig 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]pu dgug pa dang /_/mthe bo gnyis ni mdud pa dor/_/mthe bo mdzub mo gdu bur bcing /_/rdo rje bcing ba mdzub mo bsdam/_/de nas 'di rnams bsgrub bshad de/_/rdo rje'i bsgrub pa dam pa'o/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/rang gi 
[\[32a.2\]]phyag rgya snying gar gzhag_/de nas 'di rnams las bshad pa/_/rdo rje las ni bla na med/_/rdo rje dbyings lnga'i phyag rgya ni/_/de bzhin gshegs rnams 'dus pa yis/_/dkyil 'khor slob dpon slob mar bcas/_/de ma thag tu byin gyis rlob/_/sems dpa'i rdo rje 
[\[32a.3\]]bcings pas na/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje lcags kyu bcings pa yis/_/sangs rgyas kun kyang dgug par byed/_/'dod pa'i rdo rje sbyar bas ni/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed/_/rdo rje dga' bas rgyal ba kun/_/legs so bas ni bstod par 
[\[32a.4\]]byed/_/rin chen rdo rje bcings pas na/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis de dbang bskur/_/rdo rje nyi ma bcings pas na/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'drar 'gyur/_/rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'chad 'gyur bas/_/re ba kun kyang rdzogs par byed/_/rdo rje bzhad pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[32a.5\]]kun dang lhan cig bzhad/_/chos kyi rdo rje bcings pas na/_/rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje ral gri thogs pas na/_/nyon mongs thams cad des gcod do/_/rdo rje 'khor lo brtan pas na/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbang por 'gyur/_/rdo rje smra ba'i sbyor ba yis/_/
[\[32a.6\]]rdo rje ngag mchog 'grub par 'gyur/_/las kyi rdo rje bcings pas na/_/rdo rje las dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje go cha brtan byas pas/_/lus ni rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya mchog_/ma rungs bdud ni des 'joms so/_/rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings pas/_/phyag 
[\[32a.7\]]rgya kun yang dbang du 'gyur/_/'dzum pas lha yi dga' ba rnams/_/phreng ba yis ni rgyan gyi rnams/_/glu yis rtag tu skad gsal ba/_/gar gyis mchod pa rnyed par 'gyur/_/bdug pas 'jig rten dga' bar byed/_/me tog gis ni mdzes pa'i gzugs/_/mar me yis ni snang ba 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]dag_/dri yis lha rdzas dri can du'o/_/rdo rje lcags kyu dgug pa ste/_/rdo rje zhags pa 'jug par byed/_/rdo rje lcags sgrog bcings pa ste/_/rdo rje dril bu 'bebs pa'o/_/de nas chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do/_/badzra dz+nyA na sangs rgyas rnams/_/rdo rje dbyings ni brtan par byed/_/
[\[32b.2\]]de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/chos kyi phyag rgya cho ga bzhin/_/sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod na/_/phyag rgya kun gyi dbang por 'gyur/_/A na ya swa zhes brjod na/_/gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas 'gugs/_/a ho su kha zhes brjod na/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyang mnyes par 'gyur/_
[\[32b.3\]]sA d+hu sA d+hu zhes smras na/_/legs pa'i tshig gis de dgar byed/_/su ma ha t+t+waM zhes smras na/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur 'thob/_/rU pa d+yota zhes smras na/_/chos kyi gzi brjid nyid du 'gyur/_/ar+tha prA p+ta zhes smras na/_/re ba kun ni rdzogs par byed/_/ha ha hU~M he zhes 
[\[32b.4\]]bgad na/_/sangs rgyas bzhad pa rnyed par 'gyur/_/sar+b+ba ka ri zhes smras na/_/mi bya ba yi rnams kyang spyod/_/duHkha ts+tshe da zhes smras na/_/de ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod/_/bud+d+ha bo d+hi zhes smras na/_/dkyil 'khor rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur/_/pra ti shab+da zhes smras na/_/
[\[32b.5\]]sangs rgyas rnams dang lhan cig smra/_/su b+hA Shi twaM zhes smras na/_/kun gyi dbang dang la ldan par 'gyur/_/ni r+b+ha ya s+t+waM zhes smras na/_/de ma thag tu 'jigs med 'gyur/_/sha truM b+hak+Sha zhes smras na/_/dgra rnams thams cad za bar 'gyur/_/sarbA sid+d+hi zhes smras na/_/thams cad grub pa 
[\[32b.6\]]nyid du 'gyur/_/ma hA ra ti lha yi dga'/_/rlu pa sho b+hes gzugs bzang ba/_/sho tra sau khya bde ba sbyin/_/sar+b+ba pU dza mchod par byed/_/pra h+lA da ni yid bder 'gyur/_/pha lA gA mi 'bras bu 'thob/_/su te dzA gri gzi brjid che/_/su g+ha n+d+hAM gi dri mchog can/_/A ya ha jiH'gugs 
[\[32b.7\]]bar byed/_/A yA hi hUM 'jug par byed/_/he s+pho Ta baM 'chir ba che/_/g+ha n+DA a aHrab bskyod pa'o/_/de nas de dag gi chos kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa dge ba bshad do/_/lce la rdo rje bsgoms nas kyang /_/las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur/_/de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]de/_/rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te/_/mnyam par bzhag pas gnyis su bya/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/_/de nas bcing ba rab tu bshad/_/g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni/_/g.yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya/_/byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya 
[\[33a.2\]]ste/_/sangs rgyas byang chub mchog sbyin pa'o/_/mi g.yo ba yi sa reg pa/_/rin chen gyi ni mchog sbyin pa'o/_/tshe dpag med pa'i ting 'dzin mchog_/gdon mi za ba'i mi 'jigs sbyin/_/de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams/_/mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya/_/rdo rje 
[\[33a.3\]]sems sogs sems dpa' rnams/_/rdo rje las rnams byed pa ste/_/bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yis/_/lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang /_/mda' 'phangs pa yi tshul dang ni/_/legs so zhes pa snying gar bzhag_/dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis/_/
[\[33a.4\]]snying gar nyi ma brtan par bya/_/g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs/_/de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya/_/g.yas pa yis ni g.yon pa dbye/_/snying gar g.yon pa ral gri mdung /_/mgal me 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_/rdo rje gnyi ga kha nas dbyung /_/rdo rje gar bskor bkrol 
[\[33a.5\]]ba yi/_/thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor gzhag_/go cha mthe'u chung mche ba dang /_/khu tshur gnyis ni gnon pa'o/_/rdo rje 'gying ba'i tshul gyis su/_/bsam pa g.yos pas gdud par bya/_/phreng ba 'ching dang kha nas dbyung /_/rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yin/_/rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis 
[\[33a.6\]]ni/_/bdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyin/_/sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yi/_/phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa'o/_/mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba ni/_/mthe'u chung las te lcags kyu che/_/mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis gdub/_/rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan/_/
[\[33a.7\]]de nas 'di rnams bsgrub pa bshad/_/rdo rje'i las ni byed dang mnyam/_/rdo rje kun dngos rdo rje ni/_/rang gi snying la bsgom par bya/_/de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams/_/rdo rje las ni rnam pa mang /_/ye shes khu tshur bcings pas ni/_/sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur/_/
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]mi g.yo ba yi bcings bas ni/_/yid ni g.yo ba med par 'gyur/_/rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/gzhan la phan par byed par 'gyur/_/dam chos 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ni/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/_/mi 'jigs mchog gis myur bar ni/_/sems 
[\[33b.2\]]can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/_/rdo rje 'gying ba brtan byas pas/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba rnyed/_/rdo rje lcags kyus skad cig tu/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun kyang dgug_/bdag gis mda' yi phyag rgya yis/_/rdo rje lha mo mnyes par byed/_/rdo rje dga' bas 
[\[33b.3\]]rgyal ba kun/_/legs so zhes pa'i tshig kyang sbyin/_/rdo rje chen po'i nor bu bcings/_/ston pa rnams kyis de dbang bskur/_/rdo rje nyi ma bcings bas ni/_/rdo rje nyi ma 'dra bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas ni/_/de ni rin chen char yang 'bebs/_/rdo rje 
[\[33b.4\]]'dzum pa bcings pas ni/_/sangs rgyas 'dra bar myur bzhad 'gyur/_/rdo rje me tog bcings pas na/_/de yis rdo rje chos rnams mthong /_/rdo rje ral gri brtan bcings na/_/de ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod/_/rdo rje 'khor lo bcings pas ni/_/chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[33b.5\]]bskor bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi tshig rnams ni/_/rdo rje bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur/_/rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis/_/sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang du 'gyur/_/rdo rje go chas lus bcings pas/_/rdo rje snying po thob par 'gyur/_/rdo rje mche ba bcings pas 
[\[33b.6\]]ni/_/rdo rje nyid kyang bdag gis choms/_/rdo rje khu tshur kun 'phrog cing /_/phyag rgya grub pa kun kyang rnyed/_/rdo rje 'dzin pas dga' ba sbyin/_/rdo rje phreng bas gzugs bzang ba/_/rdo rje glu yis glu snyan pa/_/rdo rje gar gyis dbang du byed/_/bdug pa yis ni yid dga' 
[\[33b.7\]]ba/_/me tog gis ni rgyan rnams te/_/mar me yis ni gzi chen po/_/rdo rje dri ni dri rab ldan/_/rdo rje lcags kyu 'gugs pa ste/_/rdo rje zhags pa 'jug pa'o/_/rdo rje lcags sgrog 'ching bar byed/_/rdo rje dril bu bskyod pa'o/_/de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]bcing ba'i cho ga rgyas ba bshad de/_/de la thog ma nyid du rdo rje bcing ba'i sor mo snying gar brdab par bya ste snying po 'di brjod do/_/badzra ban+d+ha tra Ta/_de nas phyag rgya bcings pa kun/_rang gis lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rdo rje'i dbang du 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[34a.2\]]rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do/_/a/_de nas babs nas grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas par gyur to/_/de nas phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi sems dpa' chen po rjes su dran par bya ste snying po 'di brjod do/_/ma hA sa ma ya satwa haM/_des 
[\[34a.3\]]ni phyag rgya thams cad 'grub ste/_phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/_/de nas spyi'i bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad do/_/de la thog mar rang gi phyag rgya bcings nas/_rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpar bdag gi snying po 'dis bsgom mo/_/sa ma yo haM/_
[\[34a.4\]]de nas rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpar bdag bsgoms nas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab bo/_/sa ma ya satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/_de nas bsgrub par bya'o/_/bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/_/de nas dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad de/_de la thog mar re zhig nor bsgrub par 
[\[34a.5\]]'dod na snying po 'di yin no/_/ar+tha sid+d+hi/_des phyag rgya grub na nor chen po skye bar 'dod do/_/de nas rdo rje 'grub par 'dod na snying po 'di yin no/_/badzra sid+d+hi/_des ci 'dod pa bzhin du rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig 'dzin gyi grub pa 'dod na snying po 'di yin no/_/
[\[34a.6\]]badzra bi d+yA d+ha ra sid+d+hi/_des ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rig 'dzin 'grub bo/_/de bzhin du dam pa 'grub par 'dod na rang gi phyag rgya'i snying pos bsgrub bo/_/dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o/_/de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi spyi'i rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rjer bya ba'i spyi'i cho ga rgyas 
[\[34a.7\]]pa bshad de/_nam phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs lhod par gyur tam/_bdag gtong bar 'dod na/_de nas snying po 'dis brtan par bya'o/_/oM badzra sa twa sa ma ya/_ma nu pA la ya/_badzra satwa twe no pa/_tiSh+Tha dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/_su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/_a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/_su po 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]Sh+yo me b+ha ba/_sar+b+ba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/_sar+b+ba kar+m+ma su tsa me tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hU~M/_ha ha ha hoHb+ha ga bAn/_sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/_badzra mA me muny+tsa badzrI b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya satwa aH/_des ni mtshams med pa byas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus pa dang dam 
[\[34b.2\]]pa'i chos la smod pa dang /_nyes pa thams cad byas pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa pos rdo rje sems dpa' brtan par gyur pas/_tshe 'di nyid la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad dam/_dngos grub mchog gam/_rdo rje'i dngos 
[\[34b.3\]]grub 'am/_rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos gruba'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub kyi bar du myur du 'grub po zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/de nas phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba'i spyi'i cho ga rgyas pa 
[\[34b.4\]]bshad do/_/de la thog mar phyag rgya thams cad gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid nas snying po 'dis dgrol lo/_/oM badzra muH/_de nas snying ga nas byung rin chen rdo rje'i phyag rgya rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na gnas pas dbang bskur te/_mdzub mo gnyis kyis 
[\[34b.5\]]phreng bar bskor zhing bcings nas/_de bzhin du go cha yang snying po 'dis bcing ngo /_/oM badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa sar+b+ba mu drA me tri d+hI ku ru ba ra ka btse na baM/_de nas yang go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcings pa btad la thal mo mnyam par brdabs te snying po 'dis mnyes par bya'o/_/badzra tu Sh+ya 
[\[34b.6\]]hoH/_cho ga des phyag rgya rnams dgrol ba dang /_bcing ba dang mnyes par byas na rdo rje lta bur 'gyur ro/_/yang na rdo rje sems dpas kyang bya'o/_/rdo rje sems dpa' lan cig bzlas/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bdag bde bar/_/bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/phyag na 
[\[34b.7\]]rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos gsungs so/_/rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams/_/bsgrub pa dang ni las kun la/_/'dir ni ci dgar bzlas na ni/_/rtog pa kun las dngos grub thob/_/snying po phyag rgya sngags 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]rig rnams/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/rtog pa las bshad rang byas pa'am/_/bsgrub pa 'dir ni thams cad do/_/de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod cing rdo rje bstod pa'i glu blangs te gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi bya'o/_/oM rdo rje sems dpa' 
[\[35a.2\]]bsdus pas na/_/rdo rje rin chen bla na med/_/rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas/_/rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur/_/de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje bstod pa'i glu nyid kyis/_/rdo rje'i gar lag pa gshibs pas bsad ba bya'o/_/bdug pa la sogs pa'i 
[\[35a.3\]]mchod pa bya ste/_de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa byas la mchod pa de dag rang rang gi gnas su gzhag go/_/de nas thams cad ci nus pas mchod cig ces bsgo nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol te ji ltar 
[\[35a.4\]]'dod pa bzhin bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa byed du bcug la/_ji ltar zhugs pa rnams ci 'byor pa'i ro dang kha zas la sogs pa thams cad dang dkyil 'khor chen por phul ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis mgu bar byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos 
[\[35a.5\]]grub rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin no/_/'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug_/khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang /_/phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/_/oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya/_tiSh+Tha e Sha twAM d+dA ra yA mi badzra sa twa hi hi hi hi hU~M/_deng 
[\[35a.6\]]nas thams cad su la yang ma smra shig ces bsgo zhing /_mna'i snying po yang bstan to/_/de nas ji ltar zhugs pa'i rnams slar bkye ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba ni sems dpa' rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la/_kha gyen du bstan te/_snying po 'di bzlas shing 
[\[35a.7\]]bkrol nas/_oM khyed kyis sems can don kun byas/_/rjes su mthun par dngos grub stsal/_/sangs rgyas yul du bzhud par mdzad/_/de nas slar yang gshegs par gsol/_/badzra satwa muH/_de ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad la yang bya'o/_/dam tshig mchog gi 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]phyag rgya rnams kyang dgrol bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyal po las/_rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs sto//_//bam po gsum pa/_de nas 
[\[35b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid 
[\[35b.3\]]rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa kun du 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams su gyur nas byung ste/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo 
[\[35b.4\]]rje'i gzungs kyi ye shes bsgrubs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i gzungs su gyur nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la bkod de ched du brjod 
[\[35b.5\]]pa ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o gang phyir byang chub sems/_/sems can kun la phan bzhed pa/_/'dul ba'i dbang gis dpa' bo gang /_/bud med gzugs su mdzad par gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam 
[\[35b.6\]]tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/_oM badzra d+hA twI shwa ri hU~M badzri Ni/_de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi 
[\[35b.7\]]phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/_oM badzra badzri Ni hUM/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/_oM rat+na badzri Ni hUM/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[36a.2\]]pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i chos kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/_oM d+har+m+ma badzri Ni hUM/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas/_
[\[36a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras ba/_oM kar+m+ma badzri Ni hUM/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag 
[\[36a.4\]]na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do/_/oM badzra sa twa gu h+ya sam ye ha/_oM gu h+ya rat+na aM ku shi hUM/_oM gu h+ya rA gi rA gA ya hUM/_oM badzra gu h+ya badzra sA d+h+wI shwa ri hUM/_kun du bzang mo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[36a.5\]]lcags kyu mo dang /_dga' ba chags ma dang legs ldan ma ste rdo rje gzungs chen mo rnams so/_/oM badzra gu h+ya rat+na sa ma ya hUM/_oM badzra gu h+ya pra b+he hUM/_oM badzra d+h+wa dza a gra gu h+ya hUM/_oM badzra hA sa badzri hUM/_rin po che'i gtso mo dang /_rin po che'i sgron ma dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi 
[\[36a.6\]]rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ma dang /_bzhad pa dang ldan ma ste rdo rje rin po che'i gzungs rnams so/_/oM badzra d+har+m+ma gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/_oM badzra ko Sha gu h+ya sa ma ya hUM/_oM badzra gu h+ya maN+Da le hUM/_oM badzra gu h+ya wa tsa sa ma ye hUM/_rdo rje pad+ma dang /_kun 'dzin ma dang /_kun du 'khor 
[\[36a.7\]]lo dang steng du zlos ma ste chos kyi gzungs rnams so/_/oM badzra gu h+ya kar+m+ma sa ma ye hUM/_oM badzra gu h+ya ka pa tse hUM/_oM badzra gu h+ya daMSh+TA d+hA ra NI hUM/_oM badzra gu h+ya muSh+Ti hUM/_dngos grub kyi gtso mo dang /_thams cad srung ma dang /_mdangs slar 'phrog ma dang gzungs kyi phyag rgya 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]ste thams cad kyi gzungs rnams so/_/de nas yang phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do/_/oM badzra gu h+ya sa twa badzri Ni hU~M/_oM badzra gu h+ya rat+na badzri Ni hUM/_oM badzra gu 
[\[36b.2\]]h+ya d+ha r+m+ma badzri Ni hUM/_oM badzra gu h+ya ka r+m+ma badzri Ni hUM/_rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa de dag nyid la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi gzungs sdud pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams te/_rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i dkyil 'khor chen 
[\[36b.3\]]por 'bar ba dang bcas par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug par gzhag go/_/de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do/_/oM badzra gu h+ya ra ti bU dzA sa ma ye sa r+b+ba pU dzA pra bar+t+ta nA ya hUM/_oM badzra gu 
[\[36b.4\]]h+ya a b+hiShe ka pU dzA sa ma ye sar+b+ba pU dzA pra bar+t+ta nA ya hUM/_oM badzra gu h+ya gI ti pU dzA sa ma ye sar+b+ba pU dzA pra bar+t+ta nA ya hUM/_oM badzra gu h+ya nr-i t+ya pU dzA sa ma ye sar+b+ba pU dzA pra bar+t+ta nA ya hUM/_rdo rje 'dzin ma la sogs pa de nyid de 'bar ba dang bcas par rang gi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams 'khor 
[\[36b.5\]]lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa rnams su dgod do/_/de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/_/rdo rje gsang ba zhes 
[\[36b.6\]]bshad do/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya/_/dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni/_/sangs rgyas phyag rgya bri bar bya/_/mchod rten khri la legs 'dug pa/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad/_/khri yi steng du rdo rje brtsegs/_/rdo 
[\[36b.7\]]rje sems dpa' zhes bshad pa'o/_/rdo rje rin chen khri yi steng /_/rang gi dbang ni bskur bar bshad/_/rdo rje pad+ma khri yi steng /_/mtshon cha zhes ni bya bar bshad/_/las kyi rdo rje khri yi steng /_/rdo rje kun zhes bya bar bshad/_/pad+ma'i steng du bri ba ni/_/'od kyi dkyil 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]'khor rten pa'o/_/khri yi steng du rdo rje bri/_/lcags kyu bsgreng ba gnyis de bzhin/_/rdo rje rdo rje la snyes par/_/legs par sbyin pa gnyis de bzhin/_/rin chen 'od zer 'bar bar bya/_/nyi ma'i phyag rgya'ang de bzhin no/_/rgyal mtshan rtsa mo'ang 'bar 
[\[37a.2\]]bar bcas/_/rdo rje gnyis par so yi phreng /_/rdo rje'i dbus su pad+ma bri/_/ral gri 'bar bcas de bzhin no/_/rdo rje 'khor lo rdo rje rtsibs/_/'bar ba 'od zer can gyi rtse/_/rdo rje kun du rtse mo dang /_/go cha rdo rje yang dag ldan/_/rdo rje mche ba de bzhin bri/_/lag gnyis khu 
[\[37a.3\]]tshur phyag rgyar bya/_/sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs bri/_/dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin du/_/mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri ba ni/_/rdo rje 'dzin sogs dkyil 'khor du/_/phyi rol du yang ci rigs par/_/rang gi mtshan ma rnams kyang bri/_/byams pa la sogs rang gi 
[\[37a.4\]]mtshan/_/ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bri/_/de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ste de la thog mar rdo rje slob dpon gyis/_sems dpa'i rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya rang gis bcings te 'jug par bya'o/_/zhugs nas lan cig bskor te 
[\[37a.5\]]phyag rgya de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phul nas rang gi snying gar tshul bzhin du bkrol te sgo bzhir rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas/_ji lta ba bzhin du las rnams byas nas phyir 'byung ngo /_/phyir byung nas kyang rdo rje slob ma rnams rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen 
[\[37a.6\]]por gzud pa'i tshul gyis gzud do/_/de nas btsud nas dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mtshan ma chang pas g.yogs la byin te/_rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/_/de la dang por rdo rje gsang ba'i lus kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/_/zla ba'i dkyil 
[\[37a.7\]]'khor dbus su ni/_/rkang lag thal mo sbyar nas kha/_/glal zhing rdo rje bsgom byas na/_/rdo rje ma yang chags par byed/_/dpung pa bskum pa'i lcags kyu dang /_/mgo la rdo rje bsgom par bya/_/lag pa yis ni 'byed byed cing /_/lcags kyu ma yang 'gugs par byed/_/
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]mda' 'phen pa yi tshul gyis ni/_/glal zhing snying gar 'phangs na ni/_/nyid kyis rdo rje dga' ma yang /_/bdud kyi tshul gyis mnyes par byed/_/bdag gi lus kyi snying gar ni/_/rdo rje go cha'i tshul gyis ni/_/dpung pa bsnol bar bcings na ni/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyang srung 
[\[37b.2\]]bar byed/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/badzra rA ga ma ho/_badzra aM ku sha dzaH/_badzra mA ra ya mA ra ya phaT/_badzra ban+d+ha rak+Sha haM/_de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i blta ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/_/rdo rje blta ba'i chags pas ni/_/dga' bas mig 
[\[37b.3\]]ni rab tu bgrad/_/de yis bud med bltas pas na/_/rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ba yin/_/rab tu myur bar mig bsgul zhing /_/mig gi rdzi mas 'gugs byed pa/_/lta ba gzi can yin par bshad/_/'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed pa'o/_/khro gnyer gnyer ma rab 
[\[37b.4\]]bsdus pa/_/khro bo'i mig ni btsum pa ste/_/khro bo'i blta ba byas na ni/_/khams gsum yang ni 'jigs par byed/_/ri rab ri yi brag 'dra bar/_/brtan par 'dzums pa med pa'i mig_/byams pa'i blta ba yin par bshad/_/nad dang gdon dang dug sel to/_/de nas 
[\[37b.5\]]de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/_/badzra dr-iSh+Ti maT dIp+ta dr-iSh+Ti aM ku sha dzaH/_kro d+ha dr-iSh+Ti hrIH/_dr-i D+ha tiSh+Tha phaT/_de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i ngag gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po/_/ho ho ho ho zhes smras na/_/sgra dang bral bas de ma thag_/sems can kun ni mgu bar byed/_/de ni rdo 
[\[37b.6\]]rje'i tshig stsal pa'o/_/dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza zhes brjod na/_/khro bo'i tshig ni gsal ba ste/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra ba yi/_/skye bo kun kyang 'gugs par byed/_/hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes brjod na/_/tshig tu brjod pa gsal ba yi/_/ri rab dang ni 'dra ba yi/_/sems can kun gyi bdud byed do/_/
[\[37b.7\]]haM haM haM haM zhes smras na/_/phra ba'i tshig ni gsal ba ste/_/'jig rten pa ni srung byed pa/_/rdo rje'i bdag nyid rgyal ba'ang srung /_/de la snying po 'di rnams yin no/_/badzra hoH_badzra dzaH_badzra hU~M/_badzra haM/_de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab po/_/rnam pa 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]thams cad mchog ldan pa'i/_/phyag na rdo rje khyod nyid du/_/bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms byas na/_/sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du byed/_/rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i/_/rdo rje snying po bdag nyid du/_/bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms byas na/_/
[\[38a.2\]]phyag na rdo rje 'gugs par byed/_/rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i/_/chos kyi spyan gyi bdag nyid du/_/bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms byas na/_/chos rnams thams cad des sdud byed/_/rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i/_/rdo rje thams cad bdag nyid du/_/bdag nyid 
[\[38a.3\]]kyis ni bsgoms byas na/_/rdo rje thams cad des bsrung ngo /_/de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/badzra bA Ni sar+b+ba sha mA na ya sar+b+ba bud+d+ha ho/_badzra gar+b+ha badzra pA Ni shI g+h+raM A kar+Sha ya hUM dzaH/_badzra ne tra sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma mA ra ya hUM phaDa/_badzra bi shwa rak+Sha sar+b+hAn hUM/_de nas rdo rje gsang 
[\[38a.4\]]ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/_/bdag gi lus kyi snying gar ni/_/sems dpa'i rdo rje bcings byas la/_/rdo rje mig gis bltas na ni/_/'gro ba thams cad dbab par byed/_/rang gi lus kyi snying gar ni/_/rin chen rdo rje bcings byas la/_/'bar ba'i mig gis 
[\[38a.5\]]bltas na ni/_/thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur/_/bdag gi lus kyi snying gar ni/_/chos kyi rdo rje bcings byas na/_/khro bo'i mig gis bltas na ni/_/'gro ba thams cad des sdud byed/_/bdag gi lus kyi snying gar ni/_/las kyi rdo rje bcings byas la/_/byams 
[\[38a.6\]]pa'i mig gis bltas na ni/_/'gro ba thams cad srung bar byed/_/de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya de dag gi snying po 'di dag go/_/badzra gu h+yas ma ya hoH/_badzra gu h+yas ma ya dzaH/_badzra gu h+ya sa ma ya hUM/_badzra gu h+ya sam ya haM/_de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i 
[\[38a.7\]]phyag rgya chen po bcing ba la bslab po/_/rdo rje thal mo las byung ba/_/gsang ba chen po yin par bshad/_/phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus pa/_/de dag gi ni bcing ba bshad/_/mthe bo gnyis ni bsnol byas la/_/mdzub mo gnyis ni bkug pas ni/_/gung mo bsnyams te 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]tshigs su sbyar/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad/_/de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya/_/gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya/_/pad+ma srin lag mthe'u chung gung /_/lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang /_/mdzub mo rdo rje mdzub gnyis rtse/_/de nyid mthe bo gnyis kyis spras/_/legs 
[\[38b.2\]]pa sbyin dang mdzub rin chen/_/mdzub mo rin chen de 'bar bya/_/srin lag gshibs la mthe'u rin chen/_/de nyid kyang ni bskor ba'o/_/kun gyi rtse mor rab tu dbye/_/mthe bo mthe'u chung rab tu gzhug_/sor mo rab tu 'khor lo brkyang /_/de nyid kyang ni kha nas dbyung //_
[\[38b.3\]]mtho bo brkyang ste rdo rje dgab/_/mdzub mo mnyam nas nang du gzhug_/mthe'u gnyis dbye ba de nyid las/_/de nas nang du rdo rjer bya/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i las rnams ni/_/rdo rje bcings las byung ba yin/_/chos kyi gsang ba mtshan rnams kyis/_/thal mo nang du bkug nas so/_/
[\[38b.4\]]las kyi gsang ba nang gnas pa'i/_/mtshan mas las su bstan pa'o/_/de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/_/chos kyi phyag rgya mdor bshad pa/_/a dza ho sa/_oM oM trAM ha/_hrIHd+ha~M ma~M ra~M/_ka~M ha~M hU~M ba~M/_gsang ba'i phyag rgya gnyis byas nas/_/las kyi phyag rgya rnams su bya/_/
[\[38b.5\]]dam tshig mchog ni ji snyed pa/_/gnyis su phral nas de bzhin no/_/de nas de rnams kyi bsgrub pa bshad de/_sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes smra zhing /_/bdag gis bcings pas 'grub pa ni/_/'dod la chags pa bde ba'i bdag_/'di rnams lhag par gcig kyang ni/_/dus kun tu 
[\[38b.6\]]ni bcing mi bya/_/gsang ba'am ni don chen la/_/mkhas pa yis ni sbyar bar bya/_/de rnams kun gyi bdag nyid gnas/_/rang byung rnams kyi lha mo brtan/_/bsgrub pa rnams la rang chags pas/_/rtag pa'i bdag po btang nga re/_/de nas phyag rgya de rnams thams cad bcing 
[\[38b.7\]]ba la sogs pa'i las rnams yin no/_/bdag gam 'on te gzhan la'ang rung /_/rdo rje dbab pa byas na ni/_/snying po bya ba 'di yin no/_/bcing ngam 'ching du bcug kyang rung /_/badzra hUM ban+d+ha/_de nas dgrol ba yin no/_/mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni/_/snying po bya ba 'di nyid kyis/_/
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]gang dang gang nas byung ba yi/_/de dang de nas dgrol bar bya/_/oM badzra muH/_/de nas brtan par bya ba yin te/_rin chen rdo rje brtan byas te/_/snying ga nas ni spyi bor dgrol/_/mdzub mo yis ni go cha bcing /_/snying por bya ba 'di nyid do/_/oM dr-i D+ta badzra ka ba 
[\[39a.2\]]co/_dr-i D+ha/_de nas bcing ba'i dam tshig yin no/_/ji ltar gnas pa rnams su dgrol/_/go cha yis ni brtan par byas/_/thal mo brdabs pas kun sbyar ba/_/snying por bya ba 'di nyid do/_/oM gu h+ya sa ma ya tra/_rdo rje sems dpa' ci dgar bzlas/_/dkyil 'khor dang ni las 
[\[39a.3\]]kun la/_/dus de nyid du sbyar bar bya/_/thams cad grub par byed pa'i mchog_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs sto//_//
[\[39a.4\]]de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/_oM sU k+Sh+ma badzra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/_de nas 
[\[39a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/_oM badzra satwa sU k+Sh+ma badzra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/_
[\[39a.6\]]de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/_oM rat+na sU k+Sh+ma badzra dz+nyA na sa ma ya 
[\[39a.7\]]hUM/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/_oMd+ha r+m+ma sU k+Sh+ma badzra dz+nyA 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]nas ma ye hU~M/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/_oM kar+m+ma 
[\[39b.2\]]stu k+Sh+ma badzra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/_de nyid kyi tshe 
[\[39b.3\]]na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i 'od zer de rnams byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te/_sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i ye shes phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin du mnyam par zhugs pa brtan 
[\[39b.4\]]par bya ste/_yang gcig tu gyur nas ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i skur dmigs te/_gcig tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes su gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin 
[\[39b.5\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi thugs su zhugs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje 'di smras pa/_sU k+ma badzra/_de nas de smras ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo 
[\[39b.6\]]rje de nyid byung nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogs su gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/
[\[39b.7\]]rdo rje phra mo bdag ste che/_/gang phyir phra yang che ba'i phyir/_/khams gsum yang ni rgyas par mdzad/_/de nas de skad ces smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogs nas rab tu phra ba'i ye 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]shes kyi mtshan ma rgyas par bya ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la khyab par byas nas/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par bya ba'i tshul gyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi mtshan ma rnams kyis khyab par byas 
[\[40a.2\]]so/_/nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad khyab par byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te 'dug go/_/de nas de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo 
[\[40a.3\]]rje'i dbus su rdo rje chos nyid du dmigs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes phra mo'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje de las/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[40a.4\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po 'di byung ngo /_/badzra nA bI ta thA ga tA hUM/_de nas de byung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje yi shes phra mo 'jug pa'i tshul gyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur zhugs nas snying po rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur te gnas so/_/de nas de 
[\[40a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje de las ye shes chen po'i snying po 'di bzhi byung ngo /_/badzra A t+ma ka dr-i D+D+ha badzra aM ku sha tiSh+TharA ga badzra pra be sha hr-i da yaM/_a ho badzra duSh+Ti/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba'i byin gyis 
[\[40a.6\]]brlabs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /_dga' ba chen po ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po rnams so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 
[\[40a.7\]]phyag na rdo rjes ye shes phra mo 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rang gi thugs su zhugs te/_snying po rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs so/_/de nas rdo rje dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi byung ngo /_/badzra rat+na A t+ma ka_/hr-i da ya badzra sUr+ya/_tiSh+Tha badzra d+hA dzA gra baM/_hr-i da ya badzra 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]hA sa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /_'od chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi re ba rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[40b.2\]]kyi dga' ba'i shugs 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes ye shes phra mo 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rang gi snying gar rdo rje snying por zhugs nas/_rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs nas 
[\[40b.3\]]bzhugs so/_/de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi byung ngo /_/badzra pad+ma A t+ma ka/_hr-id ya badzra ko Sha/_tiSh+Tha badzra tsadakra hr-id yaM pra be sha/_badzra dzi twA gra hr-i da ya/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes 
[\[40b.4\]]kyi phyag rgya dang /_'khor lo chen por 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshig spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ting nge 'dzin to/_/de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po rdo rje 
[\[40b.5\]]thugs ka'i rdo rje las byung nas/_ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje thugs der zhugs nas rdo rje shin tu phra mo'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs so/_/de nas rdo rje phra mo'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi byung ngo /_/sar+b+ba badzra A t+ma ka hr-i da ya badzra ka ba tsa/_
[\[40b.6\]]tiSh+Sha badzra rak+Sha hr-i da ya/_badzra muSh+Ti hr-i da ya/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /_thub dka'i brtson 'grus kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /_bdud thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[40b.7\]]'ching ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi ting nge 'dzin to/_/de yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes ye shes phra mo'i mtshan mas khyab pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]rje'i skur gyur nas/_de nas yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skur gyur te/_rang rang gi phyag mtshan nyid kyi thugs kar bzhag nas/_rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po dgod pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 
[\[41a.2\]]gnas nas rang rang gi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste bzhugs so/_/de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_ye shes dang mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/_rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/_/de nas 
[\[41a.3\]]rab tu bshad bya ba/_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/_/rdo rje phra mo zhes bshad do/_/de nas dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/_/sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag_/rdo rje'i dbus su sangs rgyas bri/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rnams su yang /_/sems 
[\[41a.4\]]dpa' chen po rnams bri zhing /_/de bzhin thugs kar nyid phyag rgya/_/ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pa dang /_/phyag gnyis rdo rje bcing ba bcings/_/de nas rdo rje phra mo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te/_dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zhugs pa la 
[\[41a.5\]]sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/_ye shes kyi phyag rgya lag tu byin nas rang gi sems las su rung bar bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab bo/_/lce ni rkan la gzhar byas te/_/sna yi rtse mor bsam bya ba/_/rdo rje phra mo'i bde reg pas/_/sems ni mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur/_/
[\[41a.6\]]rdo rje phra mo'i bde reg pa'i/_/mtshan ma gal te byung ba dang /_/mtshan ma de ni khyab bya ba/_/sems ni kun tu khyab par bya/_/ji tsam 'dod par sems khyab nas/_/khams gsum du yang khyab par 'gyur/_/de nas de yang bsdu ba ni/_/sna yi rtse mo'i bar du yang /_/de dag shin tu 
[\[41a.7\]]mnyam par bzhag_/gang yang rung ste bsgom bya ba/_/de dag thams cad brtan par 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin shes rab brtags pa'o/_/de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no/_/sU k+Sh+ma badzra s+phar Na/_saM ha ra Na badzra/_badzra hr-i da tiSh+Tha/_/sems dpa' gang gis byams pa ni/_/mnyam 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]'gyur brtan pa chen po yis/_/sems kyis khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/sems can kun la des khyab bo/_/byams pas khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/snying rje can ni gang yin pa/_/sems can kun don ldan pa yis/_/bsgrub pa yis ni khyab par bya/_/kun kyang rang bzhin 
[\[41b.2\]]'od gsal ba/_/gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin/_/chos sam yang na chos ma yin/_/bsam pas khyab cing dga' bar 'gyur/_/gdul dka' ba dang mtshungs 'dra ba/_/sangs rgyas byang chub snod ma yin/_/de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/btang snyoms chen po 
[\[41b.3\]]bsgom par bya/_/de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/ma hA mai tri s+phar Na ma hA ka ru NA s+pha ra Na/_sar+b+ba bud d+ho pra mo da s+pha ra Na/_sar+b+ba sat+paM saM bo d+ha ya/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa'i ye shes la bslab bo/_/nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/_/rdo rje 
[\[41b.4\]]phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/_/'greng ngam yang na 'dug kyang rung /_/rdo rje'i dbyibs ni goms par bya/_/de bzhin du yang gnas kun tu/_/rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis/_/mnyam par bzhag pas snying gar ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje bsgom/_/de lta ba yi rim bzhin du/_/rdo rje phra mo'i 
[\[41b.5\]]tshul gyis ni/_/phyag na rdo rje dbyibs chen po/_/gnas rnams kun du bsgom par bya/_/rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i/_/sangs rgyas sku ni dus kun du/_/ci lta ba yi [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin/_/mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya/_/de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/badzra mu 
[\[41b.6\]]khi g+ha ga_/ma hA bo d+hi sa twa A be sha/_badzra pa Ni d+hAr+sha ya swa rU paM bud+d+ha a nu smr-i ti A be sha/_rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/_/goms par bya ba bdag nyid kyis/_/zla ba'i dpas su bdag nyid ni/_/byang chub sems kyi bsgom pa'o/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/bdag nyid rdo rje 
[\[41b.7\]]dbyibs gyur par/_/bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba/_/sems dpa' rdo rje bsgom pa'o/_/rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la/_/bdag nyid snying gar rdo rje sems/_/bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i bsgom pa'o/_/rnam pa kun du mchog ldan pa'i/_/sangs rgyas gzugs su 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]bdag nyid ni/_/bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba/_/sangs rgyas byang chub bsgom pa'o/_/de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/sa man+ta b+ta dra A be sha/_/badzra sa twa badzra A be sha/_badzra satwa sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na A be sha ta thA ga to hU~M/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[42a.2\]]cad kyi chos kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/_/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs dang mnyam/_/rdo rje'i tshig tu lan cig brjod/_/dbang po gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar/_/sems can thams cad chags par byed/_/bdag ni rdo rje chen por mnyam/_/rdo rje tshig tu lan cig 
[\[42a.3\]]brjod/_/dbang po gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar/_/gdon mi za bar 'jig rten 'gugs/_/bdag nyid rdo rje chos dang mnyam/_/rdo rje tshig tu lan cig brjod/_/dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas/_/de yis 'jig rten thams cad 'jig_/bdag ni ma lus rdo rjer mnyam/_/
[\[42a.4\]]rdo rje tshig tu lan cig brjod/_/dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas/_/las rnams thams cad des bsgrub po/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/_/rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/_/rdo 
[\[42a.5\]]rje'i dbus su bsgom bya ba/_/bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku nyid du/_/des ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub/_/de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/_/rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la/_/snying gar rdo rje la sogs 'khod/_/bsgoms nas rdo rje la 
[\[42a.6\]]sogs pas/_/rang gi dngos grub sbyin par byed/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/_/rdo rje bcings pa las byung bar/_/bcu drug rnams su bshad pa ste/_/ting nge 'dzin ni dam tshig mchog_/de rnams
