[\[42a.7\]]kyi ni bcings pa bshad/_/skyil mo krung 'dug gan rkyal du/_/g.yas bcu de bzhin slar bcug pa/_/snying gar gnas pa bzhi pa ste/_/rdo rje sems sogs dkyil 'khor ro/_/dpral bar bzhag dang ltag pa dang /_/phrag pa dang ni dgod par sbyar/_/khar gzhag snying gar ral gri 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]dang /_/snying gar rgyas dang kha nas dbyung /_/spyi bo mthong kha khar gzhag pa/_/mdzub mo gnyis bkug mdun de bzhin/_/de nas gzhan yang chos kyi phyag rgya la bslab par bya'o/_/Tak+ki gra gra/_ma Ta/_a gra/_trAM trAM/_aM aM/_baM baM/_ti Ta/_/hIHTa/_b+h+r-i Ta/_kra sha/_ha ha/_
[\[42b.2\]]ba ba/_baM baM/_phaT/_gra sa/_de nas chos kyi las kyi ye shes phra mo rnams kyi mchog bshad do/_/ye shes khu tshur dam tshig las/_/gnyis su byas nas sbyar bar bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa chen po'i rgyal po'i rdo rje ye shes kyi chos 
[\[42b.3\]]kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[42b.4\]]snyoms par zhugs nas/_rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/_oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra d+hA tu a nut+ta ra pU dza kar+m+ma s+pha ra Na sam ye hUM/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i 
[\[42b.5\]]las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/_oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa a nu t+ta ra bU dzA kar+m+ma s+phar Na sam ye hUM/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[42b.6\]]pa thams cad rdo rje rin po che'i mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas par khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/_oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na a nut+ta ra pU dzA kar+m+ma s+pha ra Na 
[\[42b.7\]]sa ma ye hUM/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje chos kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]smras pa/_oM sar+b+ba ta tha ga ta badzra d+har+m+ma a nut+ta ra pU dzA kar+m+ma s+pha ra Na sam ye hUM/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin 
[\[43a.2\]]gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/_oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra kar+m+ma a nut+ta ra pU dzA kar+m+ma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[43a.3\]]kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/_de 
[\[43a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kun du rgyas pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyi cho ga rgyas pa'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho'i lha mo rnams su gyur te byung nas/_'jig rten gyi khams rab 
[\[43a.5\]]'byam gyi sprin gyi rgya mtsho rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes par bya ba dang /_kun du bzang 
[\[43a.6\]]po'i spyod pa bsgrub pa dang /_byang chub chen po'i snying por nye bar 'gro ba dang /_bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por 
[\[43a.7\]]bskyed pa dang /_khams gsum thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don du bya ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /_cho 'phrul thams cad bstan 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]nas bzhugs so/_/mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho'i lha mo de dag kyang rang gi phyag rgya lag pa gnyis kyis 'dzin cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la cho ga bzhin du mchod de rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/
[\[43b.2\]]e ma'o sangs rgyas mchod pa bdag_/mchod pa kun ni byed pa yin/_/gang phyir sangs rgyas byin can du/_/sangs rgyas kun ni grub par mdzad/_/de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di 
[\[43b.3\]]bshad do/_/oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sar+b+ba A t+mA na na r+yitra na pU dzA s+pha ra Na kar+m+ma badzri Ni hUM A/_oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sar+b+ba AtAn ni r+yAta na pU dzA s+pha ra Na kar+m+ma gri dzaH/_oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sar+b+ba At+mA na na r+yI ta na a nu rA gapU dzA s+pha ra Na kar+m+ma pA Ne hUM ho/_oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sar+b+ba A t+mAn ni r+yA ta na sA d+hu kAr 
[\[43b.4\]]pU dzA s+pha ra Na kar+m+ma tuSh+TiaH/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' ba'i bde ma dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren me dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed ma dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par byed pa mo rnams ni/_de 
[\[43b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'o/_/oM na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kA yA b+hi She ka rat+ne b+h+yo badzra ma Ni oM/_oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta sUr+ye b+h+yo badzra te dze ni dz+wA la hrIH/_oM na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga tA shA pa ri pU ra Ni tsin+dA ma Ni d+h+wa dza a gre b+h+yo badzra d+h+wa dza a gri trAM/_oM na maHsar+b+ba ta 
[\[43b.6\]]thA ga ta ma hA prI ti pra mo d+ya ka re b+h+yo badzra hA s+ye ha/_dbang ma chen mo dang /_snang ba chen mo dang rin po che chen po'i char 'bebs ma dang /_rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i mchod pa'o/_/oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma tA sa mA d+hi b+histu no mi 
[\[43b.7\]]ma hA d+ha rmA gri hrIH/_oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA nir hAraiHstu no mi ma hA g+ho ShA nu ge d+haM/_oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta tsakra ak+Sha raM pa ri bar t+hA di sarba sU trA n+tan yaiHstu no mi sarba maN+Da le hUM/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta san d+hi b+hA Sha bud+d+ha sad+gI ti b+hirga yaM/_stu no mi badzra bA tse baM/_ye shes chen po'i glu 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]ma dang /_dbyangs chen mo'i rjes su 'brang ma dang /_dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa dang /_sngags kyi spyod pa ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mchod pa'o/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hu pa me g+ha s+pha ra Na pU dzA karme ka raka ra/_oM sarba ta 
[\[44a.2\]]thA ga ta pU Sh+ba pra sa ra s+pha ra Na pU dzA karme ki ri ki ra/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ka dz+wa la s+pha ra Na pU dzA karme b+ha ra b+ha ra/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na pU dzA karma ku ru ku ru/_sim pa can dang /_byang chub chen mo'i yan lag ldan ma dang /_mig ldan ma dang /_dri ldan ma rnams ni de 
[\[44a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi mchod pa'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams la mchod pa byed pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i bya ba bshad do/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/rdo rje dbyings dang 
[\[44a.4\]]'dra bas na/_/rdo rje bya ba zhes kyang grags/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/_/sangs rgyas sku rnams gzhag par bya/_/rdo rje sems sogs tshul du ni/_/lha mo phyag rgya bcas pa bri/_/de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje bya ba 'dir gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di 
[\[44a.5\]]bshad do/_/de la dang por rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis gzhug par bya ste/_bcug nas kyang 'di skad du/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i dam tshig yin gyis/_mchod pa bcu drug po 'di rnams khyod kyis nyi ma re re zhing ci nus pa gyis shig ces 
[\[44a.6\]]bsgo bar bya'o/_/de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol te las kyi dkyil 'khor bstan la thams cad kyi mtshan ma lag pa gnyis su sbyin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod na/_gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas byang chub chen po'i sems bsgrub 
[\[44a.7\]]pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsams shing /_/dga' ba bdag ni mchod byed cing /_/sangs rgyas kyi ni bde ba'ang 'thob/_/byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]yin bsams shing /_/phreng ba la sogs mchod pa yis/_/mchod na de ni dbang yang bskur/_/byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsams shing /_/snyan pa'i glu yis mchod pas bdag_/mchod pa de ni mgu bar 'gyur/_/byang chub sems 
[\[44b.2\]]ni brtan bskyed par/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsams shing /_/gar gyi mchod pas bdag mchod pa/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang bdag mchod 'gyur/_/de la snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/bud+d+ha At+ma ko\u0f85taM/_bud+d+ha a b+hiShi ny+tsa mi/_bud+d+ha stu ti ka ro mi/_bud+d+ha pU dzA ka ro mi/_de 
[\[44b.3\]]nas sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/_/lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/_/mchog gi tshul gyis phyag 'tshal zhing /_/de bzhin sangs rgyas kun mchod na/_/rtag tu phyag byar 'os par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas thams cad bsod nams che/_/sku 
[\[44b.4\]]gsung thugs ni rdo rje skyes/_/rjes su yi rang bas mchod na/_/myur du sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur/_/lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/_/lha rdzas bdag dbul la sogs pa'i/_/mchod pa kun gyis sangs rgyas rnams/_/mchod na de yang mchod par 'gyur/_/lus dang ngag 
[\[44b.5\]]sems rdo rje yi/_/dge ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad ni/_/yongs su bsngo ba'i mchod pa yis/_/sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/_/de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/praNA mA mi a nu mo de/_bud+d+ha pU dzA pany+tsa ma/_de nas chos kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab 
[\[44b.6\]]par bya'o/_/chos rnams rang bzhin gyis kyang gsal/_/ngo bo nyid kyis gdod nas dag_/chos de dag gis mchod pas ni/_/dga' ba'i bde ba thob par 'gyur/_/chos rnams kun ni 'dus pa yi/_/a zhes bya ba sgo zhes brjod/_/chos kyi phyag rgya de yis ni/_/de yi sdug bsngal 
[\[44b.7\]]thams cad gcod/_/'dir ni chos rnams thams cad kyi/_/rgyu ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/_/dam chos 'khor lo mchod pa yis/_/mchod pas chos ni 'chad par 'gyur/_/chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis/_/sgra snyan dag dang 'drar bshad de/_/chos kyi mchod pa de dag 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]gis/_/mchod na sangs rgyas gsung yang 'thob/_/de la de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/sarba shud+d+ha sa man+ta b+ha dra/_d+harma tsakra ni Sh+p+ra pany+tsa/_de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya ye shes bslab po/_/lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/_/rang gi 
[\[45a.2\]]rdul ni phra mo rnams/_/rdo rje dbyings su bsgoms na ni/_/rdo rje bdag nyid myur du 'thob/_/lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/_/rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams/_/sangs rgyas kun du bsgoms na ni/_/chos kyi skur ni myur du 'grub/_/lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/_/rang gi rdul ni phra 
[\[45a.3\]]mo rnams/_/rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms na ni/_/rdo rje sems dpar mnyam par 'gyur/_/lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/_/rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni skur bsgoms na/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin 
[\[45a.4\]]no/_/badzra kA ya/_d+ha rma kA ya/_satwa kA ya/_bud+d+ha kA ya/_de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/_/rang byung la ni lus kun gyis/_/'khyud pa'i bde ba'i mchod pa ni/_/phul na rdo rje sems dpa' dang /_/'dra ba de ni myur bar 'gyur/_/
[\[45a.5\]]shin du chags pa'i sbyor ba yi/_/dam pa'i gzung ba'i bde ba ni/_/sangs rgyas rnams la phul gyur na/_/rdo rje rin chen 'dra bar 'gyur/_/shin du dga' zhing bde chags pas/_/sprad par gyur pa'i mchog bde ba/_/sangs rgyas rnams la phul na ni/_/rdo rje chos dang 'dra 
[\[45a.6\]]bar 'gyur/_/dbang po gnyis ni sbyar ba yi/_/kun du sbyor ba'i bde ba ni/_/mchod pa'i phyir ni phul bas na/_/rdo rje las dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/de dag gi gsang ba'i snying po ni 'di dag yin no/_/ra ti badzra/_rA ga badzra/_pra ti badzra/_karma badzra/_de nas de bzhin 
[\[45a.7\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phrin las kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya bslab par bya ste/_snying gar rtsib logs rgyab sbyor ba/_/dpral ba la sogs de bzhin du/_/kha dang rna ba mgo ltag pa/_/spyi bo phrag pa rked par bzhag_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]thams cad kyi dam tshig mchod pa'i phyag rgya ye shes bslab par bya'o/_/phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis ni/_/rdo rje bcing ba dam byas la/_/snying ga la sogs gnas tshul du/_/bzhag nas rgyal ba rnams mchod do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i 
[\[45b.2\]]chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/_/oM kra sa y+Ya sA dr-i raM kraM khaM shaM ha hUM hUM sha no shIsAM/_las kyi phyag rgya'i mdor bsdus na/_/las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa las/_rtog pa chen po'i 
[\[45b.3\]]rgyal po rdo rje las zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/_de bzhin 
[\[45b.4\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i don du/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta muSh+Ti baM/_de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas 
[\[45b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[45b.6\]]thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/_oM badzra satwa muSh+Ti a/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs 
[\[45b.7\]]kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/_oM badzra rat+na muSh+Ti trAM/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/_oM 
[\[46a.2\]]badzra d+ha rma muSh+Ti khaM/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 
[\[46a.3\]]'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/_oM badzra karma muSh+Ti haM/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rang gi byin gyis brlabs kyis/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[46a.4\]]thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir/_rdo rje dngos grub ces bya ba phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/phyag 
[\[46a.5\]]rgya dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/_/rdo rje dngos grub zhes kyang grags/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/_/mkhas pas rab tu sbyin par bya/_/thog mar sangs rgyas gzugs gzhag ste/_/de nas phyag rgya bzhi yang bri/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[46a.6\]]dbus su ni/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya la sogs bri/_/de nas rdo rje dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'gugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/_de bzhin du btsud de 'di skad du smra bar bya'o/_/khyod kyis gsang ba'i le'u 'di su la yang ma bstan cig_/de ci'i 
[\[46a.7\]]phyir zhe na/_log par lta ba dang /_sdig pa'i las byed pa'i mi sems can rnams kyang yod do/_/brtson 'grus chung ba dang /_sbyor ba med pa dang /_ri mo mi shes pa'i sems can rnams kyang yod de/_de dag rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams su/_brtson 'grus chung bas mi 'dug ste/_de dag gi don du rdo rje dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig tu gyur pa 'di ma lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams 
[\[46b.2\]]rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_yid bde ba thams cad myong bar byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam pa'i dngos grub kyi bar du byin gyis brlabs so/_/khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 
[\[46b.3\]]gsang ba 'di rnams la yid mi ches shing ma dad par ma byed cig_/sems can dmyal ba dang byol song dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi khams su lhung bar 'gyur ba'am/_mi bde ba ma spangs par dus ma yin par shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la/_gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te dkyil 'khor 
[\[46b.4\]]bstan to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig 'di brjod do/_/bdag nyid chen po gang gang gi/_/phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings pa/_/bzlas pa'i snying po'i don du ni/_/der ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya/_/ye shes 'di yi tshul gyis ni/_/phyag 
[\[46b.5\]]na rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin/_/bdag nyid chen po phyag rgya kun/_/de dag kun gyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba brjod par bya'o/_/rang gi dbang po gshigs nas ni/_/rdo rje bcing bas gzung bar bya/_/de yis phyag rgya gang reg pa/_/de ma thag tu 
[\[46b.6\]]de dbang 'gyur/_/de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi chos nyid brjod par bya'o/_/rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la/_/ye shes phyag rgya bcing bar bya/_/cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni/_/ye shes phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur/_/de nas phyag rgya kun gyi las brjod par bya'o/_/glu dang gar dang zas dang 
[\[46b.7\]]bro/_/spyod pa la sogs bde ba rnams/_/sangs rgyas rnams la phul na ni/_/las kyi phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur/_/de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad du bsgrub pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/_/mtshan ma brtan par rang gyur nas/_/dkar por gyur pa'i 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]ras la gnas/_/mtshan ma mchod rten byin brlabs te/_/bdag nyid rdo rje dbyings su bsgom/_/rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/_/gung mo myu gu bzhin du gshibs/_/mthe'u chung dang ni mdzub rtse bsgreng /_/dam tshig mchog gi dam tshig go/_/rdo rje phra mo'i tshul 
[\[47a.2\]]gyis ni/_/rab tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/_/rdo rje phra mo'i dkyil 'khor te/_/ting 'dzin dbang du gyur ba'i tshul/_/rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings la/_/de gnyis rdo rje dam du gzung /_/mdzub mo mthe'u chung bsnol ba ni/_/rdo rje dgos mchog dkyil 'khor ro/_/de nas 
[\[47a.3\]]sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i bcing ba bzhi bslabs nas/_rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o/_/rdo rje dngos grub kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du mi g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dkyil 'khor 
[\[47a.4\]]thams cad phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du rang rang gi phyag rgya rnams su bris na dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub bo/_/de ltar ras dang rtsig pa dang /_nam mkha' dang /_gnas thams cad du bris na dngos grub thams cad 'grub po/_/dkyil 'khor brtag pa nas brtsams te/_
[\[47a.5\]]la la ni dkyil 'khor du de nyid kyi tshe/_ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub/_la la ni de nas brtsams nas nyin zhag gcig gis/_la la ni nyi ma bzhis/_la la ni zhag bcu drug gis/_la la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang ji ltar 'dod pa bde blag tu don thams cad byed cing thams 
[\[47a.6\]]cad dga' ba dang /_bro dang /_zas dang /_spyod pa thams cad kyi bde ba myong bar byed kyang /_lo gcig gis mchog 'grub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i dam tshig rdo 
[\[47a.7\]]rje zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying bo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo /_/badzra satwa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]chen po phyag na rdo rjes sems can thams cad kyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_yid bde ba thams cad myong bar bya ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa 'grub par bya ba'i bar du/_theg pa chen po 
[\[47b.2\]]mngon par rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/_/rdo rje sems dpa' zhes kyang bshad/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/_/dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab po/_/zla ba'i 
[\[47b.3\]]dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag par bya/_/de nas dgug pa dang gzhug pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thob pa'i ye shes bskyed par bya'o/_/de la 'di skad du khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba dang /_khong du 
[\[47b.4\]]ma chud pa su la yang gsang ba 'di ma smra shig_/khyod ngan song thams cad du ltung ba'am/_mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus ma yin par shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo bar bya'o/_/de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub dam pa bsgrub pa'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/_/zla ba rgyas la 'dug nas kyang /_/
[\[47b.5\]]phyag rgya chen po gzung byas nas/_/bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar ni/_/bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi ye shes bslab par bya'o/_/'dod chags bral ba'i sdig lta bu/_/khams gsum na ni gzhan med de/_/de bas 'dod pa'i 
[\[47b.6\]]chags bral bar/_/khyod kyis kyang ni ma byed cig_/ma hA sa ma ya ha na phaT/_de nas mna'i snying po 'di sbyin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rnams su dam tshig gi sdom pa sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po 
[\[47b.7\]]la sogs pa bzhi bcing ba bslab par bya'o/_/dngos grub kyang de bzhin no/_/ri mo la sogs pa dang /_lugs ma'i sku gzugs thams cad la yang ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho ga bzhin du byas nas/_dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas par byas pa ci lta ba bzhin du yang bya'o/_/de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo/_byang chub kyi sems chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na rdo rje 
[\[48a.2\]]chen po la rdo rje dgyes pa'i snying po 'dis legs pa gsol to/_/oM rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so/_/legs so rin chen rdo rje khyod/_/rdo rje chos ni khyod lags so/_/rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/_/rdo rje theg pa bla na med/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang /_/theg pa chen 
[\[48a.3\]]po mngon bsdus pa'i/_/mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan nyid kyang /_/dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/dag par byas pas bsgrubs na ni/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyang bde bar 'thob/_/rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba ni/_/'dod pa kun gyi bde bas bde/_/tshe 
[\[48a.4\]]'di nyid kyis 'grub pas na/_/bde ba mi zad med mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po dum bu dang po rdzogs sto//_//
[\[48a.5\]]bam po bzhi pa/_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor lo chen po bskor ba la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab bo/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che/_/rdo rje 
[\[48a.6\]]mgon po rab sgrub mdzad/_/rdo rje dbang bskur rdo rje 'od/_/rdo rje dpal khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje bzhad pa chos chen po/_/rdo rje ral gri mchog chen po/_/dkyil 'khor kun gyi rgyal po mchog_/spros med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje las dang srung ba che/_/gnod sbyin gtum 
[\[48a.7\]]pa gdon chen po/_/rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che/_/phyag rgya kun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dang byang chub che/_/sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs/_/rdo rje ye shes ye shes che/_/theg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/don kun gyi ni de nyid don/_/sems can don 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]chen kun rig pa/_/kun mkhyen kun byas thams cad de/_/kun gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje bdag rab rdo rje mchog_/rdo rje brtson rab rdo rje 'chang /_/dam tshig chen po de nyid don/_/sems chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje lcags kyu 'dod pa che/_/rab tu dga' 
[\[48b.2\]]ba 'od chen po/_/rdo rje 'od dang 'od gsal ba/_/sangs rgyas 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje rgyal mchog rdo rje drag_/rigs mchog mchog dang mi yi mchog_/rdo rje dam pa mchog chen mchog_/rigs mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje dbyings dang gsang ba che/_/
[\[48b.3\]]rdo rje gsang ba rab gsang 'chang /_/rdo rje phra ba bsam gtan che/_/rdo rje dgos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas mchog sangs rdo rje mchog_/sangs rgyas byang chub mkhas pa che/_/sangs rgyas ye shes sangs rgyas che/_/sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[48b.4\]]mchod pa mchod pa che/_/sems dpa' mchod pa rab mchod pa/_/thabs chen dang ni dngos grub che/_/rdo rje grub khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems chen po/_/rdo rje rdo rje khyod 
[\[48b.5\]]phyag 'tshal/_/sangs rgyas gtso bo rgyal bka' nyan/_/sangs rgyas gtso bo bshes gnyen skyes/_/rnam par snang mdzad che dang khyab/_/ston zhing khro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid che/_/yang dag mtha' ste che ba'i tshul/_/pha rol phyin pa kun mkhyen pa/_/
[\[48b.6\]]don dam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/kun du bzang dang spyod pa mchog_/bdud dang bdud ni rab 'dul ba/_/kun ni mchog dang mnyam nyid mkhyen/_/kun du 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas hU~M zhes hU~M zhes pa/_/rdo rje hU~M zhes 'dul ba po/_/rdo rje thams cad rdo rje mchog_/phyag 
[\[48b.7\]]na rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/_/phyag byas mchod cing brjod pa dang /_/rim gror de bzhin gshegs pas byas/_/gang phyir rdo rje sems brtan pas/_/rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya khyod/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag lus/_/kun gzigs yab ni khyod yin te/_/byung ba dang ni 'byung 'gyur 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]ba'i/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis bsgrubs/_/bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/_/rab tu mos pas stod byed cing /_/glu blangs gang zhig stod byed pa/_/de ni rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kun la mnga' mdzad pa'i/_/mgon po khyod la gsol 
[\[49a.2\]]ba ni/_/sems can kun don mdzad pa'i phyir/_/rang gi rigs ni skyed par mdzad/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo phyag na rdo rjes/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i tshig thos nas/_rdo rje bdag nyid kyi thugs kar bzhag ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[49a.3\]]de dag thams cad bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/_ci'i phyir/_rdo rje 'dzin pas smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ma rungs 
[\[49a.4\]]pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhi bas 'dul bar mi spyod pa de dag la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis/_de bzhin 
[\[49a.5\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam par 'phros nas/_ri rab ri'i rtse mo ni rtse 
[\[49a.6\]]mo rdo rje dang /_nor bu dang /_rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs par yang gcig tu 'dus te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnyam nyid du dmigs nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kyi dpal be'ur zhugs so/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 
[\[49a.7\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su bskyab pa dang /_phan pa dang /_bde 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]ba'i dam pa thams cad 'grub pa dang /_ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes la dmigs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i thabs khro bo chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes 
[\[49b.2\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di byung ngo /_hU~M/_de nas de byung ma thag 
[\[49b.3\]]tu phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka'i rdo rje las/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/_kun du 'bar ba'i snying po khro gnyer can smin ma bcum zhing dpral bar gnyer ba/_mche ba lhag ger byung zhing so gtsigs pa/_rdo rje dang /_lcags kyu dang /_ral gri dang /_zhags pa la sogs pa rdo rje 
[\[49b.4\]]me lce 'bar ba'i mtshon cha lag na thogs pa/_rnam pa du ma'i kha dog dang rgyan rnams kyi cha lugs can phyag na rdo rje'i sku byung nas/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du shin du ma rungs pa thams cad gdul bar byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs kun du rdo 
[\[49b.5\]]rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o thabs kyis 'dul ba yi/_/thabs chen ldan pa bdag yin te/_/gang phyir sems can 'dul thabs phyir/_/dri ma med pa'i khro bor gyur/_de nas de bzhin 
[\[49b.6\]]gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la dmigs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[49b.7\]]thams cad kyi rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/_oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M/_gr-i h+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M/_gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M/_A na ya hoHb+ha ga bAM badzra hU~M phaT/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka las byung ma thag pa bcom 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjer gyur te byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad na/_de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs te/_spyan drangs nas rdo rje'i dam tshig gi 
[\[50a.2\]]dkyil 'khor chen por bcug ste/_dam tshig gis bcings nas yang gcig tu 'dus te rdo rje khro bo'i lus su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar 'dug ste/_ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o byang chub sems 'di ni/_/kun du bzang zhing sdig 
[\[50a.3\]]med de/_/gang phyir sems can 'dul don du/_/khro bo yang ni yid 'ong 'gyur/_/de nas rdo rje khro bo'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas babs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te yang bka' nod cing bzhugs so/_/de nas 
[\[50a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis 'gugs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas byung 
[\[50a.5\]]ngo /_/hU~M Dak+kidzaH/_de nas de byung ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam sprin rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad na/_'jig rten gsum gyi dbang po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'jig rten thams cad na gnas pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba ma lus shing lus 
[\[50a.6\]]pa med pa rnams/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i lcags kyus bkug nas/_ri rab ri'i rtse mo rdo rje dang /_nor bu dang /_rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa gang na ba der lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang /_
[\[50a.7\]]nor bu dang /_rin po che las byas pa thams cad du bskor nas 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs ka nas rdo rje de blangs te/_gsor zhing khams gsum pa ji snyed pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo la bltas te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/grogs 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la zhugs la nga'i bka' la yang nyon cig_/de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/_/
[\[50b.2\]]skyabs su 'gro bar bsgrub par byos/_/kun mkhyen ye shes thob bya'i phyir/_/grogs po rnams kyis bsgrub par gyis/_de nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po lha chen po 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa dregs te 
[\[50b.3\]]cher khros par ston cing 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye gnod sbyin nga ni 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi gtso bo dbang phyug chen po byed pa po 'jig pa po 'byung po thams cad kyi dbang po lha'i yang lha chen po yin na/_gnod sbyin khyod kyi ngag nga ci phyir nyan/_de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 
[\[50b.4\]]gsor zhing bka' stsal pa/_kye sems can ma rungs pa dkyil 'khor du myur du zhugs la da'i dam tshig la yang dag par gnas par gyis shig_/de nas lha'i yang lha chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i sems can dbang phyug 
[\[50b.5\]]la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa 'di su zhig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi tshogs thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/grogs po rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_dam tshig dang sdom 
[\[50b.6\]]pa la bsgrub par gyis shig_/phyag na rdo rje 'di skad gnod sbyin khro bo ma rungs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po ste/_rdo rje 'bar bas khams gsum po 'di dag thams cad brlag par byas ta re/_de nas dbang phyug chen po 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang por gyur pa dang /_
[\[50b.7\]]rang gi shes pa'i dbang gis 'khor mang po dang bcas pas/_bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'jigs par bstan pa'i phyir/_khro bo gtum pa chen por rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs 'bar ba chen po gtong zhing /_ma rungs pa chen pos rta skad du dgod pa rnams bstan nas 'di 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]skad ces smras so/_/kye nga ni 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po yin na/_khyod kyis nga la ci'i phyir bka' stsal pa/_de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje de bsnyems pa dang bcas par rdo rje gsor zhing 'dzum ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye lus srul po'i 
[\[51a.2\]]mi'i sha za ba zas su ro bsregs pa'i thal ba za zhing kha zas dang mal dang /_gos kyang de las byed pa nga'i bka' bzhin byos shig_/de nas lha chen po dbang phyug chen pos 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag dang nam mkha'i khams rnams khro ba khro ba chen pos non par byin gyis brlabs te 'di 
[\[51a.3\]]skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyang de'i bka' nyon la dam tshig kyang long shig_/de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha chen po zhes bgyi ba'i lha 'di ni/_rang gi 'tshal ba'i stobs kyis dregs pa dang 
[\[51a.4\]]dbang phyug chen po'i dbang gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la 'dud du mi btub na 'di la ji ltar bgyi ba'i rigs/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig dran par byas so/_/oM ni 
[\[51a.5\]]sum+b+ha badzra hU~M phaT/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i snying po 'di brjod do/_/hU~M/_de nas de brjod ma thag tu khams gsum pa thams cad nas 'dus pa'i lha chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po'i dbang po thams cad kha bub tu 'gyel te/_nyam thag 
[\[51a.6\]]pa'i tshig 'byin cing /_bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la skyabs su dong ngo /_/lha chen po zhes bya ba'i lha de ni sa la 'gyel te dran pa med par gyur nas shi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[51a.7\]]phyag na rdo rje 'jig rten gsum po'i 'khor lo 'di thams cad la skyabs sbyin pa byos te ma bsad cig_/de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thos nas/_lha thams cad bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/gal te khyod rang gi 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]srog 'dod na/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su deng la nga'i bka' yang nyon cig_/de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas pa la skyabs su mchi'o/_/khyod kyis bstan pa'i bka' ni bdag 
[\[51b.2\]]cag gis ma 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la bos nas 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/kye lha rnams 'di ni nged dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[51b.3\]]pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ste/_sems can thams cad gdul ba'i don byas pa'i phyir/_khro bo'i rgyal po chen por dbang bskur to/_/
[\[51b.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyed kyi nang na yang lha chen po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can yod de/_de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhi bar mdzad pas/_sdig pa las bzlog par mi spyod pa'i sdig pa'i sems can de dag rnams tshar gcad pa'i phyir byin gyis brlabs so/_/
[\[51b.5\]]de bas na khyed rnams 'di'i dam tshig la gnas par byos shig par bka' stsal to/_/de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi srog yal ba las bskyab tu gsol/_bdag cag kyang bka' stsal pa bgyid cing mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[51b.6\]]kye grogs po rnams 'di nyid la skyabs su dong dang 'di nyid kyis kun du skyob ste gzhan gyis ni ma yin no/_/de nas khams gsum kun nas 'dus pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag po de rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa ga la ba de logs su bltas nas/_nyam thag pa chen po'i sgra mgrin gcig 
[\[51b.7\]]tu phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'di las kun du bskyab par gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa kun du bskyab par gsol/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha la sogs pa de rnams la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]kye ma rungs pa rnams nga'i bstan pa la zhugs shig_/rdo rje 'bar ba 'dis gcig tu 'bar bar byas nas thams cad kyang thal bar byas ta re/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs bskyed pa 
[\[52a.2\]]zhi ba dul pa sems can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa/_sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa stsol ba lags na/_ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag bsregs par 'gyur/_de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[52a.3\]]to/_/kye grogs po dag gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa de'i phyir nga ni kun du bzang po ste/_khyed lta bu'i sems can ma rungs pa'i ngang tshul can sdig pa'i sems rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir/_gal te nga'i dam tshig la mi gnas na chud gsan par bya'o/_
[\[52a.4\]]gsol pa/_de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs pa'i lha de dag gzhan dbugs dbyung zhing bslang ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje'i bslang ba zhes bya ba 'di smras so/_/oM badzro t+ti Sh+Tha/_de nas de 
[\[52a.5\]]skad smras ma thag tu dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs par khams gsum pa 'dus pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kun brgyal ba las sems dbugs phyung ste/_lha'i bde ba myong zhing 'jigs shing bag tsha ba dang spu langs pa med par gyur nas bcom 
[\[52a.6\]]ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la lta zhing langs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_sems dpa' chen po lha'i bdag po lha chen po 'di ma bslang na 'di srog de chud gsan par byas te ci rung /_gsos na 'di yang skyes bu dam par 'gyur 
[\[52a.7\]]ro/_/de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin du bya'o snyam nas shi ba gso ba'i snying po 'di smras so/_/badzra A yuH/_de nas de smras ma thag tu lha chen po lha'i bdag po shi ba las gsos te ldang 'dod na yang ldang ma nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom_
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]ldan 'das ci bdag cag 'di lta bus 'dul lam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod skyes bu chen po 'di bka' nyan par mi 'jug na/_khyod la 'dul ba 'di nyid yin gyi ngam yin no/_/dbang phyug chen pos gsol pa/_ci bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis ma rungs 
[\[52b.2\]]pa'i sems can de las skyabs mdzad par mi spyod dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas 'di las skyabs mi nus so/_/gsol pa/_ci'i slad du/_bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[52b.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis ma 'tshal to/_/ci'i slad du zhe na/_khams gsum gyi bdag po/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las gzhan pa'i bdag po mchis par ma 'tshal na/_'di su lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 
[\[52b.4\]]yang lha chen po la bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/kye ma rungs pa'i sems can nga'i bka' mi nyan tam/_de nas lha chen pos rdo rje sems dpa'i tshig thos nas 'khrugs shing khros par gyur te/_de ltar bsgyel bzhin du yang 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs bstan te/_'di skad 
[\[52b.5\]]ces smras so/_/nga shi bar bzod kyi/_khyod kyi ngag nga mi nyan no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje rab tu khros par ston cing rang gi rkang pa'i mthil nas rjes su spyod pa 'di byung ngo /_/oM pa ta kari Sha Na badzra hU~M/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mthil nas kun du 'bar ba'i rdo 
[\[52b.6\]]rje'i snying po khro gnyer byas nas/_mche ba lhag ger byung ba gdong chen po rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pa byung nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan snga na bka' nod cing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas phyag na rdo rjes dbang phyug chen po sbyang ba'i phyir 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/oM pa ta ka ri Sha Na badzra hU~M/_
[\[52b.7\]]oM pa ta ka ri sha/_sarba badzra d+har a nu tsa ra ka ta badzra hU~M dzaH/_de nas de skad smras pa dang /_lha chen po dang lha mo u mar bcas te rkang ba gyen kar bstan nas gcer bur phyung ste skye bo thams cad kyis gad mos btab cing rkang pas 'gugs pa'i rjes su spyod pas de bkug ste/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar zhabs kyi drung du bzhag go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can ma rungs pa rjes 'brang dang bcas pa 'di ji ltar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[53a.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_oM badzra kra ma ho/_de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha chen po zhabs g.yon pas mnan zhabs g.yas pas lha mo u ma'i steng du mnan nas/_rang gi snying po 'di smras pa/_oM badzra A be sha ha na pa taM 
[\[53a.3\]]traT/_de nas de smras ma thag tu lha chen babs nas rang gi lag stong gis rang gi gdong stong la 'tshog go/_/de nas rdo rje'i nor bu rin po che'i rtse mo'i rdo rje dang /_nor bu dang /_rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i phyi rol na srid pa gsum pa thams cad kyis nged kyi dbang po 'di bdag 
[\[53a.4\]]nyid chen po des btul lo zhes sgra chen po byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po la thugs rje chen po bskyed pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byams pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/_/oM bud+d+ha mai tri badzra rak+Sha haM/_de nas de skad ces smras ma thag tu/_lha chen po la babs pa'i sdug 
[\[53a.5\]]bsngal de kun zhi bar gyur to/_/de nas yang phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis reg pas/_bla na med pa'i grub pa'i dbang dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_gzungs dang ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rnams thob pa nas/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'grub pa'i bar 
[\[53a.6\]]du gyur to/_/de nas lha chen po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs mthil gyis reg pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang rnam par thar pa'i bde ba myong ste lha chen po'i lus phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phul nas/_'og gi 'jig rten gyi khams gang 
[\[53a.7\]]gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_thal bas khebs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par skyes so/_/de nas lha chen po'i lus de las 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]ched du brjod pa 'di byung ngo /_/e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/_/yi ge'i tshogs kyis mnan nas su/_/mya ngan las ni 'das par gzhag_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/_de las gzhan pa mthu bo che la sogs 
[\[53b.2\]]pa 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/grogs po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs shig_/zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig srungs shig_/de dag 
[\[53b.3\]]gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bka' ji skad stsal ba bzhin du bgyi'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes srid pa gsum 'dus pa de rnams bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/grogs po rnams yang gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa dang dam tshig dang 
[\[53b.4\]]sdom pa zung la nga'i dam tshig la yang gnas par gyis shig_/de dag gis gsol pa/_de bzhin du 'tshal na bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang dam tshig glo bar ma chud do/_/de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi dam tshig 'di byin no/_/byang chub sems ni rim bzhin du/_/bskyed 
[\[53b.5\]]nas de yi 'og tu ni/_/byang chub chen por ci nus par/_/shin tu mnyam bzhag 'bad par bya/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/_lha la sogs pa de rnams 'jug pa'i dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya bcing ba la sogs pa byas nas/_dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya snying po 'dis 
[\[53b.6\]]'ching du gzhug go/_/oM badzra sa ma ya gr-i h+Na s+t+waM ban+d+ha sam ya/_badzra sa twa sa ma ya/_ma nu sma ra/_sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya s+t+waM/_dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/_s+thi ro me b+ha ba/_A hAr+yo me b+ha ba/_a pra ti hA r+yo me b+ha ba/_sarba karma su tsa me tsit+taM shre yaH/_ku ru hU~M ha ha ha ha hoH/_de nas de smras ma thag tu 
[\[53b.7\]]khams gsum gyi srid pa gsum gyi skye bo 'dus pa thams cad rdo rje khro bo ti rin+ti ri'i phyag rgya lag tu babs nas dam du bcings par gyur to/_/de nas phyag na rdo rjes tshul bzhin du btsud nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du bstan te rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]bskur nas/_rdo rje'i mtshan ma'ang lag tu byin te/_rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sems can gyi don la bkod do/_/de nas 'jig rten gsum po'i bdag po rnams yin te/_'di lta ste/_dbang phyug 
[\[54a.2\]]chen po ni khro bo'i rdo rje'o/_/mthu bo che ni sgyu ma'i rdo rje'o/_/kar+Ni ka sgra gzhon nu ni rdo rje dril bu'o/_/tshangs pa ni thub pa'i rdo rje'o/_/dbang po ni rdo rje'i mtshon cha ste/_de la sogs pa ni rig pa'i rgyal po rnams su zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/_/de nas bar snang la spyod pa'i lha'i dbang po 
[\[54a.3\]]thams cad la rjes su byin pa ni 'di lta ste/_nyi ma ni rdo rje 'khyil ba'o/_/zla ba ni rdo rje'i 'od do/_/dbyug pa chen po'i gtso bo ni rdo rje dbyig pa'o/_/ser smug ni rdo rje ser smug ste/_de la sogs pa ni rdo rje khro bo zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/_/de nas nam mkha' la spyod pa'i lha'i dbang po thams 
[\[54a.4\]]cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/_sbrang rtsis myos pa ni rdo rje'i glang po'i sna'o/_/sbrang rtsi byed pa ni rdo rje'i phreng ba'o/_/rgyal po ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo /_/rgyal bar byed pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje ste/_de la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi gtso bo zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/_/de nas sa bla'i dbang po thams 
[\[54a.5\]]cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/_mdzod skyong ni rdo rje tho ba'o/_/me ni rdo rje'i me'o/_/rlung ni rdo rje'i rlung ngo /_/ku ber ni rdo rje 'jigs pa'o/_/de la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nya zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/_/de nas sa'i 'og gi dbang po lha thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/_phag ni rdo rje lcags kyu'o/_/gshin 
[\[54a.6\]]rje ni rdo rje dus so/_/gtsug phud sa ni rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso bo'o/_/ba ru Na ni klu rdo rje ste/_de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/_/de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po'i lha mo thams cad rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/_rang gi mtshan ma rdo rjer byin 
[\[54a.7\]]gyis brlabs nas/_rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi don la rab tu bkod pa la 'di lta ste/_um ni khro bo rdo rje ma'o/_/gser ldan ma ni rdo rje gser ro/_/drug ldan ma ni rdo rje gzhon nu ma'o/_/tshangs ma ni rdo rje zhi ma'o/_/
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]dbang mo ni rdo rje khu tshur ma ste/_de la sogs pa ni rdo rje'i rgyal mor dbang bskur to/_/de nas nam mkha' la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni 'di lta ste/_mi 'chi ba ni rdo rje mi 'chi ma'o/_/ro hi na ni rdo rje mdangs ma'o/_/dbyug 'dzin ma ni rdo rje dbyug mchog ma'o/_/skye ba 'phrog 
[\[54b.2\]]ma ni rdo rje'i rked chings ma ste/_de la sogs pa ni khro mo zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/_/de nas bar snang la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni 'di lta ste/_gsod ma ni rdo rje 'ju ma'o/_/za ba ni rdo rje zab ma'o/_/bgo ba ni rdo rje bgo ba ma'o/_/dga' ba ni rdo rje dga' ba ma'o/_/de la 
[\[54b.3\]]sogs pa ni tshogs kyi gtso mor dbang bskur to/_/de nas sa la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni 'di lta ste/_zhi ba ma ni rdo rje pho nya mo'o/_/rlung ni mgyogs ma rdo rje ma'o/_/me ni rdo rje 'bar ma'o/_/ku ber ma ni rdo rje'i 'khor ma ste/_de la sogs pa ni rdo rje'i pho nya mor dbang bskur 
[\[54b.4\]]to/_/de nas sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni 'di lta ste/_phag mo ni rdo rje kha'o/_/tsa muN+Di ni rdo rje dus ma'o/_/snang chen po ni rdo rje rul pa ma'o/_/ba ru Na ma ni rdo rje chu srin ma ste/_de la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran mor dbang bskur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen 
[\[54b.5\]]po phyag na rdo rjes zhugs pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnams bskyed nas phyag rgya bcing ba thams cad bslabs te/_rdo rje'i dam tshig mna'i snying po 'di byin no/_/rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/_/dam tshig 'di las 'das na ni/_/rigs rnams 
[\[54b.6\]]myur du thal bar byed/_/oM ha na sa ma ya hU~M phaDa/_de nas snying po gzung bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di byin to/_/rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/_/mdzub mo lcags kyur bcings nas ni/_/gcu zhing phyir yang gcu bar bya/_/dgos pa don sems gang yin pa/_/de yi mdun du khyed rnams ni/_/
[\[54b.7\]]dgos par grub phyir 'dug par byos/_/khyed kyi srog ni ma rungs par/_/dam tshig des ni gyur ta re/_/rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/_/mdzub mo bkug nas rab tu mnan/_/mthe bong gnyi ga mtshams sbyar bas/_/gung mo gnyi ga rab tu mnan/_/rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa yin/_/dam tshig phyag 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]rgya bcings ba las/_/gal te 'ga' yis 'das gyur na/_/dam tshig 'dis ni khyed gsod do/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyi ga yi/_/mthe'u chung sor mo bcings nas ni/_/mdzub mo sor mo'i rgyab nas mdud/_/bzlog ste mgo bor gzhag par bya/_/bdag nyid che ba'i dam 
[\[55a.2\]]tshig ste/_/rdo rje rig 'dzin bcings nas ni/_/khros te gang la bltas na ni/_/de yi mdun du de bzhin 'dug_/rdo rje bsdams pa'i rdo rje yis/_/bsrung ba dam bcings mnan pa ni/_/de ni srung ba'i dam tshig ste/_/sems can thams cad srung ba'o/_/gang zhig la la bskyab pa'i phyir/_/khro 
[\[55a.3\]]bor ldan pa bcings nas ni/_/sems can gang la bsrung ba yi/_/de yi rgyab tu 'dug par byas/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/_/g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la/_/mthe'u chung gis ni bsdam byas te/_/gcu zhing slar gcu dra bkrol nas/_/khro bor mnyam gzhug yin pa yi/_/dam 
[\[55a.4\]]tshig de yang sbyar byas nas/_/khyed kyis de yi mdun du ni/_/dngos grub kun gyi mchog phyir 'khod/_/rdo rje bcing ba sbrel ba ni/_/mdzub mo gnyi ga dam por sbyar/_/mthe bong gung mo rtse mo gnyis/_/rdo rje phyag rgyar bcings nas kyang /_/bzlog ste dpral bar gzhag par bya/_/gal te 
[\[55a.5\]]gson par 'dod na ni/_/'gugs par byed pa gang yin pa/_/de yi mdun du rtag par 'dug_/de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi snying po 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dam tshig 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di yin no/_/oM ba li tod ba li ta badzra A kar Sha ya hU~M dza dza/_/rdo rje 
[\[55a.6\]]gcu ba'i phyag rgyas lha dgug pa'i snying po'o/_/oM badzra a gra d+hi pa ya sa ma ye hU~M/_bar snang la spyod pa rnams kyi'o/_/oM badzra mA la a gra baM/_phreng ba can rnams kyi'o/_/oM badzra ban+d+ha haM/_sa la spyod pa rnams kyi'o/_/oM badzra pA tA la b+ha ny+dza b+ha ny+dza hU~M phaT/_sa'i 'og na gnas pa 
[\[55a.7\]]rnams kyi'o/_/oM he ru ka badzra sa ma ya sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA b+hany+ja ka hU~M phaDa/_bud med rnams kyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa 'dul ba 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]por dbang bskur na/_bcings pa'i dkyil 'khor ma rungs pa de dag thams cad ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba legs par bka' stsal par gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsan nas 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/oM badzra sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M phaT/_de nas byang chub sems 
[\[55b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes sems can thams cad la bskyab pa'i phyir/_dkyil 'khor thams cad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra sam ya A kar+Sha ya sarba maN+Da la/_badzra d+hA ra sat+ya mA ti kra ma hU~M phaT/_rdo rje lcags kyus gnyis bcings te/_/snying 
[\[55b.3\]]gar yongs su bskor bar bya/_/mdzub gnyis lcags kyus phyi rol gyi/_/dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i mchog yin no/_/de nas de bshad ma thag tu dkyil 'khor thams cad ri rab ri'i rtse mo phyi rol kun du bskor te 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor 'dus pa 
[\[55b.4\]]de dag thams cad la bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/kye grogs po dag srog gcod pa spangs shing dam tshig gzung ba la bsgrub par gyis/_de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi sems can de dag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[55b.5\]]'das bdag cag sha 'tshal ba ma rungs pa'i sems can lags pas mdangs 'phrog pa la srog ltos na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar 'tsho bar bgyi ba de bka' stsol cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes ma rungs pa'i rdo rje khro bo 'di gsungs so/_/oM duSh+Ta 
[\[55b.6\]]badzra kro d+ha ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+h+wa nas ya bi ka ri/_sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA maN+Dal/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_mar+d+ha mar+d+ha/_khA da khA da/_bar man+t+ra badzra sa ma ya hU~M phaT/_rdo rje khro mdzub legs par ni/_/sen mo sprad de dkris nas kyang /_/rtse mo gnyis ni dam sbyar ba/_/phyag rgya de ni ma rungs 'joms/_/de nas 
[\[55b.7\]]de smras ma thag tu ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa du mas gtse zhing dral ba dang /_dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa dral to/_/ma rungs pa'i dam tshig gi sems can de rnams yang sreg cing shin tu btsos pas 'o dod chen po 'bod cing phongs pa'i sgra byung ste/_
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen po ga la ba der thal mo sbyar te 'di skad gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag srog dang mi 'bral bar skyabs mdzad du gsol/_de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[56a.2\]]ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams ji ltar bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_oM ni sum+b+ha ha na da ha pa tsa gr-ih+Na ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje khro bo mi bzad pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM ma hA 
[\[56a.3\]]badzra khu ra kro d+ha ba ta ya/_sarba duSh+Ta maN+Da laM bi nA sha ya sarba duSh+Ta sam yaM b+hi ga ki ra bi d+h+wan sa ya s+pho Ta ya b+hany+dza ya sarba du Sh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA ban+d+ha gr-ih+Na ha na da ha pa tsa sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya sa twaM badzra sa ma ya hU~M phaT/_de nas de smras ma thag tu ma rungs pa'i dam tshig dang phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor thams cad yang 
[\[56a.4\]]gcig tu 'dus te rgya mtsho chen por dong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ma rungs pa thams cad thul cig ces bka' stsal na/_phra men ma dang gdon la sogs pa gdon de dag 
[\[56a.5\]]thams cad la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/oM ha na ha na badzra hU~M phaT/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes yang phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra 
[\[56a.6\]]A kar+Sha ya shI g+h+raM sarba duSh+Ta gra haM badzra d+ha ra satwa na hU~M dza/_de nas de smras ma thag tu phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad ri rab kyi rtse mo'i phyi rol bskor te 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad la 
[\[56a.7\]]bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/kye bzod ldan rnams srog gcod pa spang ba'i bslab pa dang /_dam tshig dang sdom pa gzung bar byos shig_/rdo rje 'od 'phro ba gcig tu 'bar bar gyur bas khyed kyi rigs rnams ma lus shing bsregs ta re/_de nas phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sha 'tshal ba ni/_ji ltar bgyi bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[56b.2\]]phyag na rdo rje sems can de rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed la/_thabs sbyin par byos shig_/de nas phyag na rdo rje chen pos sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i mtshan ma shes pa'i phyag rgya dang snying po 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra pra ti gr-ih+Na hr-i da ya mA kar+Sha ya yad+d+ya yaM ma to mA mad+dA ra d+hen mi ya te 
[\[56b.3\]]tad+ya s+ya hr-i da yaM ni skra mi tu sa ma ya hU~M dzaH/_de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/_/snying gar rdo rje lag ngar gnyis/_/shin tu dam par bcings nas ni/_/rdo rje mdzub mo rtse mo yis/_/rang gi mchan khung brud par bya/_/khyod rnams kyis phyag rgya des sems can thams cad kyi snying rus 
[\[56b.4\]]la zo shig_/de nas phra men ma la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad dga' ba'i sgra thos nas mchongs rgal byas te/_rang gi gnas su dong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/_bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[56b.5\]]pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa 'dul ba lags par bka' stsal na/_bcom ldan 'das rims la sogs pa nad de rnams la ci ltar bgyi bdag la bka' stsol cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_oM hU~M phaT/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo 
[\[56b.6\]]rjes rims la sogs pa'i nad dgug pa'i snying po smras pa/_oM badzra sa ma ya A na ya sarba duSh+Ta dz+wa ra d+ha ni nA sha ya hU~M phaT/_de nas de smras ma thag tu rims la sogs pa'i nad rnams thams cad ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol du bskor te 'khod do/_/de nas phyag na rdo rjes rims la sogs 
[\[56b.7\]]pa'i nad rnams la bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/kye bzod ldan dag sems can gsod pa las ldog pa'i bslab pa gzung ba'i sdom pa long shig_/de dag gis gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni sems can gyi mdangs 'phrog ste 'tsho bar bgyid nad bcom ldan 'das 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]bdag cag ji ltar bgyi legs par bka' stsol cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi las rnams dag par 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra karma bi shod+ha ya sarba A par NA ni bud+d+ha sat+t+ye na sa ma ya hU~M/_de nas phyag 
[\[57a.2\]]rgya bcing ba bshad do/_/rdo rje thal mo dam bcas te/_/mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug nas kyang /_/mthe bo mnyam ste sbyar nas ni/_/mnan pa de ni sdig 'phrog pa/_/phyag rgya de rims la sogs pa'i nad thams cad kyis gang la btab pa la las byas la bstan na/_de khyed rnams kyis 
[\[57a.3\]]thong shig_/khyed cag srog dang bral la re/_de nas de rnams de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol te slar dong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag sgrib pa 
[\[57a.4\]]thams cad bsal ba dang las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i slad du/_nyid kyi thugs ka nas byung na de nas bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song de rnams thams cad ji ltar bgyi bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[57a.5\]]stsal pa/_oM k+Sha pa ya badzra swA hA/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/_ngu 'bod la sogs pa ngan song gi 'gro ba'i 'khor lo thams cad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba a bA ya A kar+Sha Na bi shod+ha na badzra sam ya hU~M phaT/_de nas de smras 
[\[57a.6\]]ma thag tu ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po la sogs pa ngan song na gnas pa rnams ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol du bskor te 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes ngan song gi sar ltung ba'i sems can thams cad la bos nas 'di skad gsungs so/_/kye bzod ldan rnams dkon 
[\[57a.7\]]mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_dam tshig dang sdom pa dang ngan song thams cad las thar ba'i phyag rgya dang snying po zung shig_/de nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba 'di las bskyab par gsol/_
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]bdag cag rnams sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang khyod la skyabs su mchi'o/_/de nas phyag na rdo rjes ngan song thams cad 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra pA Ni bi s+pho Ta ya sarba a pA ya b+han+d+ha nA ni pra mok+Sha ya sa rbA pA ya ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba satwaM sarba 
[\[57b.2\]]ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ya trAT/_de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/_/rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/_/gung mo gnyi ga sbyar nas su/_/tha ma bzhi ni rtse mor sbyar/_/sdig pa 'joms par grags pa yin/_/de nas ngan song gsum gyi 'khor lo na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad 
[\[57b.3\]]phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya de mthong nas ngan song thams cad las shi 'phos nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skyes so/_/ngan song de rnams ni rgya mtsho chen por bor ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[57b.4\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i skyabs dang phan pa dang bde ba thams cad myong bar bgyi ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa dam pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar du tshol cig par bdag la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[57b.5\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje stsal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal na/_mi de rnams ji ltar bgyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsol cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[57b.6\]]oM badzra pA Ni ma hA man+Da laM pra be sha ya sarba duSh+Ta ro dran+ni bar ya pra be bya pra ma sha ya tru ra dr-iSh+Ta par+y+wa paM maM bi sho d+ha ya nA sha ya bi nA sha ya ha ha ha ha hU~M/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa'i tshig de thos nas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa bskyab pa dang phan 
[\[57b.7\]]pa dang bde ba thams cad dang dngos grub dam pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]chen po 'di bshad do/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/_/rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba yi/_/dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog_/'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya/_/rdo rje dam tshig las byung ba/_/sangs rgyas byang chub 'byin 
[\[58a.2\]]byed pa/_/ma rungs thams cad rnam par 'jig_/de la sngags 'dis srad bu bri bar bya'o/_/oM badzra sa ma ya sU traM mA ti kra ma ho/_/gru bzhir bya zhing sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhes kyang rab tu brgyan/_/srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste/_/dar dang phreng bas shin tu brgyan/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[58a.3\]]kun gyi grwa rnams dang /_/sgo yi mu khyud nang rnams su/_/rdo rje rin chen brgyan bya ba/_/dkyil 'khor phyi rim srad bu bre/_/shes rab can gyis de nang du/_/gru bzhi la ni sgo bzhi pa/_/ka ba brgyad dang rta babs bcas/_/rdo rje ka ba'i gnas mchog tu/_/dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa 
[\[58a.4\]]ste/_/de ltar dkyil 'khor srad bu bre/_/srad bu bres par tshon gyis dgang /_/de la tshon la bzlas pa ni 'di'o/_/oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hU~M/_de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni/_/rdo rje slob dpon mnyam bzhag pas/_/rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi po/_/yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya/_/de 
[\[58a.5\]]la sgo rnams dbye ba'i sngags ni 'di'o/_/oM badzro d+g+haT ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya hU~M/_gser ram dngul las byas pa'am/_/sa yang rung ste legs bris pa'i/_/pha gu gru bzhir byas pa'i steng /_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzhag par bya/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang 
[\[58a.6\]]ba'i snying po ni 'di yin no/_/oM badzra dz+wA la ag+ni pradrI p+ta Akar+Sha ya sarba ta thA ga tA nA ma hA badzra sa ma ye hU~M dzaH/_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni/_/'bar bar bskor bas gzhag par bya/_/de bzhin rin chen 'od skor ba/_/pad+ma rdo rje kun de bzhin/_/de nas rdo rje dam tshig phyag rgya rnams dgod 
[\[58a.7\]]pa'i snying po 'di yin no/_/oM satwa badzrA dz+wA la mA la hU~M phaDa/_oM rat+na badzrI dz+wA la mA la hu~M trAM/_oM d+harma badzrI dz+wA la mA la hU~M hrIH/_oM karma badzrA dz+wA la mA la hU~M aH/_rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar de bzhin du/_/shes pas cho ga bzhin bri ba/_/rdo rje hU~M zhes dkyil 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]'khor ro/_/de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di yin no/_/oM badzra be gA kra ma hU~M/_de bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la yang srad bu la brgal te thams cad du 'gro bar bya'o/_/de nas 'di'i snying po bshad do/_/yid kyis ri mo bteg 
[\[58b.2\]]nas ni/_/rdo rje srad bu'am gzhan yang rung /_/phyir byung nang du zhugs kyang ni/_/dam tshig 'gal bar de mi 'gyur/_/de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/_/phyag na rdo rje bri ba ni/_/ut+pal che sngo 'tsher ba'i mdog_/rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bar 'dus/_/mche ba cung zad phyung ba'i zhal/_/khro dang 
[\[58b.3\]]bcas par 'dzum pa'i zhal/_/brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs pa ste/_/'bar ba'i phreng bas dkrigs pa'i 'od/_/zhabs g.yon pa yi mthil gyis ni/_/dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya/_/zhabs g.yas pa yis u ma yi/_/nu ma'i steng du mnan par bri/_/de'i snying po ni 'di yin 
[\[58b.4\]]no/_/hU~M/_de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/_/rdo rje khro bo bzhag pa ni/_/khros pas mche ba phyung ba ni/_/'bar ba'i phreng bas dkrigs pa'i 'od/_/de nas de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di yin no/_/oM badzra satwa krod+ha hU~M phaDa/_oM badzra kro d+ha A be sha ya hU~M phaT/_oM badzra karma kro d+ha rA ga ya hU~M 
[\[58b.5\]]phaT/_oM badzra duSh+Ti kro d+ha sA d+hu sA d+hu hU~M phaT/_dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis par ni/_/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang /_/der ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba/_/rdo rje khro bos bskor bar bri/_/de nas de rnams kyi snying po 'di bshad do/_/traM oM badzra b+h+r-i ku DI kro d+ha ha ra ha ra hu~M phaT/_oM badzra sUr+ya ma hA dz+wa 
[\[58b.6\]]la mA la kro d+ha dz+wa la ya sarbaM hU~M phaT/_oM badzra kro d+ha ke tu de hi hU~M phaT/_oM badzra hA sa kro d+ha ha ha ha ha hU~M phaT/_dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum par ni/_/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang /_/rdo rje sde ni bri bar bya/_/khro bo bdag nyid chen por bskor/_de nas de rnams kyi snying po bshad do/_/hrIH
[\[58b.7\]]oM badzra d+harma krod+ha bi nA sha ya bI sho d+ha ya hU~M phaT/_oM badzra tI k+Sh+Na kro d+ha ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/_oM badzra he tu kro d+ha pra be sha ya maN+Da le sarbaM hU~M phaT/_oM badzra krod+ha b+hA Sha ba ta ba ta hU~M phaT/_dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhi par ni/_/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang /_/rdo rje dbab pa bri bya ba/_/rdo rje 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]khro bo'i tshogs kyis bskor/_/de la de rnams kyi snying po 'di bshad do/_/aHhU~M badzra karma hU~M phaT/_oM badzra ka ba tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha hU~M phaT/_oM badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha khA dA kha da hU~M phaT/_oM badzra kro d+ha muSh+Ti sA d+ha ya sa ma ya hU~M phaT/_dkyil 'khor gyi ni grwa rnams su/_/rdo rje dbyings 
[\[59a.2\]]kyi tshul bzhin du/_/ji ltar [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du ni/_/gsang ba'i mchod pa kun bri'o/_/de nas de dag gi snying po'i phyag rgya 'di yin no/_/oM badzra rA s+ye rA ga ya hU~M phaT/_oM badzra mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M phaT/_oM badzra gI te ga da ga da hU~M phaT/_oM badzri nr-i d+ye ba shi ku ru hU~M phaT/_dkyil 'khor 
[\[59a.3\]]dam pa'i phyi rol du/_/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang /_/de yi grwa rnams nyid du ni/_/mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi rnams bzhag_/de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM badzra d+hu pe pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/_oM badzra buSh+pa pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M phaT/_oM badzra A lo ke 
[\[59a.4\]]pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M phaT/_oM badzra gan+d+he pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M phaT/_sgo rnams bzhi yi dbus su ni/_/lcags kyu la sogs gzhag par bya/_/dkyil 'khor phyi rol gnas rnams su/_/phyi yi rdo rje'i rigs rnams so/_/de nas de dag gi snying po rnams bshad do/_/oM badzra 
[\[59a.5\]]aM ku sha ma hA kro d+ha A kar+Sha ya sarba sa ma yaM hU~M dzaH/_oM badzra pA sha ma hA kro d+ha pra pe sha ya sarba sa ma ya hU~M hU~M/_oM badzra s+pho Ta ma hA krod+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha sarba sa ma ya hU~M baM/_oM badzra A be sha ma hA kro d+ha A be sha ya sarba sa ma ye hU~M aH/_de nas 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 
[\[59a.6\]]'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas par bshad do/_/de la dang po nyid du rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo ti rin+ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te zhugs shig_/zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro 
[\[59a.7\]]bo'i dbang du mchis te/_tshar gcad pa'i rigs pa rnams ni tshar gcad do/_/bsdu ba'i rigs pa rnams ni bsdu ba ni ji ltar bgyi ba bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol zhes byas nas/_rdo rje khro bo ti rin+ti ri'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gar ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag ste/_rdo rje 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas nas yang dam tshig thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcings shig dang des na thams cad byon par 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi byas nas bdug pa la sogs pa yang de bzhin no/_/de nas cho ga 'dis rdo rje slob ma chug cig_/rdo rje slob dpon 
[\[59b.2\]]rang gis rdo rje khro bo ti rin+ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te/_slob ma yang snying po 'di dag 'ching du chug cig_/oM gr-ih+Na badzra sa ma ya hU~M baM/_de nas gos sngon po bgos la mgo la gtsug tor sngon pos bcings te/_dar sngon pos gdong dkris la sngags 'dis chug cig_/oM badzra sam yaM pra be shA me/_de nas 
[\[59b.3\]]bcug ste rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang snying po 'dis de la dbab par gyis shig_/oM badzra A be sha AH/_de nas babs nas de ltar babs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs so/_/'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar thams cad kyang skad cig gis shes 
[\[59b.4\]]so/_/gnod pa yang med par gyur to/_/de thams cad kyis mi tshugs par gyur to/_/hU~M zhes bya bas kyang sems can thams cad tshar gcad pa dang phan gdags par byed nus par gyur to/_/phyag na rdo rje yang rtag tu de'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub bo/_/de nas mna'i snying po byin cig_/de nas 
[\[59b.5\]]gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te/_dkyil 'khor chen po ji lta ba bzhin du ston cig_/dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar gyur to/_/'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag las rnam par rgyal bar nus par gyur to/_/hU~M zhes bya bas lha chen po la sogs pa 
[\[59b.6\]]lha thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang mnan pa nus par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis kyang /_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje rtag tu 'brang zhing rang gi dngos grub sbyin par mdzad/_de nas de 
[\[59b.7\]]la rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/_rang gi mtshan ma rdo rje rnon po ji lta ba bzhin du sngags 'dis lag pa gnyis su sbyin no/_/oM badzra pA Ni badzra karma ka rod b+ha ba/_de nas sngags 'dis rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur to/_/badzra kro d+ha twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/_badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta he badzra nA ma/_de nas 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]gang la ming gang btags pa de la kye zhes bya ba'i sgra dang sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas ye shes rnams bskyed de/_/rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas/_/'bar ba mang po'i 'od can gyi/_/rdo rje'i dbyibs ni sting gar bsam/_/skye bo kun la 'bebs par byed/_/rdo rje khro bor mnyam 
[\[60a.2\]]bzhag nas/_/dpral bar rdo rje rin chen yang /_/de bzhin du ni bsam byas nas/_/sems can thams cad dbang du byed/_/rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas/_/'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po'i 'od/_/rdo rje pad+ma mgul du bsam/_/sems can thams cad rlag par byed/_/rdo rje khro bor mnyam 
[\[60a.3\]]bzhag nas/_/'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po'i 'od/_/rdo rje thams cad spyi bor bzhag_/skye bo de dag thams cad srung /_/de nas ye shes kyi phyag rgya de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/_/hu~M sarba badzra kro d+ha A be sha aH/_ho rat+na badzra kro d+ha b+hA Sha mA na ya t+RaM hU~M/_badzra d+harma kro d+ha nA sha ya phaT/_hU~M 
[\[60a.4\]]karma badzra krod+ha rak+Sha/_de nas lha rnams dgug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya bslab po/_/hU~M zhes bya ba bcings nas ni/_/lag pa rdo rje lcags kyur bsam/_/khros nas mdzub mo bskul ba ni/_/lha rnams dgug pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/rang gi rkang mthil dbus su ni/_/rdo rje lcags kyu 
[\[60a.5\]]bris nas su/_/de nyid kyis ni rtag mnan na/_/lha rnams nges pa nyid du dgug/_/rdo rje lcags kyu nyid phyag rgya/_/legs par phye ste bzhag nas su/_/bskul nas u ma la sogs pa/_/bud med thams cad 'gugs par byed/_/rdo rje lcags kyu bzhag pa ni/_/mdzub mo nyid du de bzhin de/_/
[\[60a.6\]]des mnan lha yi gang yin pa/_/de ni 'gugs pa'i dam pa'o/_/de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no/_/oM badzra kro d+ha A kar+Sha ya hU~M phaT/_oM badzra karma aM ku sha krod+ha A kar+Sha yaM hu~M phaT/_o badzra krod+ha daN+Da A gra A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/_oM badzra kro d+ha si gats+tsha A kar+Sha ya mi te badzra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hU~M 
[\[60a.7\]]phaT/_de nas phyag rgya rnam bzhi'i ye shes bslab bo/_/brkyang zhing bskum par gnas pa ni/_/rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/hU~M tsam gyis kyang skad cig gis/_/skye bo thams cad 'bebs par byed/_/rdo rje dag ni legs par smras/_/hU~M zhes bya ba bzhi ldan pas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yis/_/
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]thams cad kyang ni nges par 'gugs/_/rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas/_/rdo rje khro bo'i lha mchog gis/_/skye bo thams cad gsod byed cing /_/rdo rje hU~M gi rnal 'byor to/_/yid kyis lus la go bgo ba/_/bdag gam pha rol rnams la ste/_/go cha chen po'i sbyor bas ni/_/skye bo de dag thams 
[\[60b.2\]]cad bsrung /_/de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/_/oM badzra kro d+ha kA ya A be sha ya hU~M phaT/_oM badzra bi d+yot+ta ma ma hA kro d+ha A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badzra hU~M phaT/_oM badzra kro d+ha tiSh+Tha ha na da ha pa tsa bi nA sha ya hU~M ka re Na pA ta ya badzra sa ma ya hU~M phaT/_oM ma no dr-i D+ha badzra ka ba tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha hU~M phaDa/_
[\[60b.3\]]de nas sems can thams cad rgyas btab pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes dang /_rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas/_/badzra hU~M zhes bzlas pa yis/_/gang dang gang la kun zhugs pa/_/phyag rgyas btab par de gyur to/_/sgra chen du ni brjod par bya/_Dak+ki hU~M phaDa/_khros nas lan cig gang la smras/_/
[\[60b.4\]]rdo rje 'bar bas de mngon bkug_/rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin cing /_/rdo rje'i lta bas bltas pa yis/_/sems can gang dang gang yin pa/_/de dang de ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/gsod snyom yid la bsams nas su/_/snying gar rdo rje sgom par byed/_/hU~M zhes bya ba yid kyis su/_/rang gi rgyas ni 
[\[60b.5\]]'debs par dgongs/_/sems can gang la gang gis su/_/yid kyi rgyas ni 'debs pa 'di/_/phyag rgya 'dis ni shin tu yang /_/las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/_/de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag go/_/Tak+kia/_Tak+ki dza/_Tak+ki hU~M/_Dak+ki ha~M/_phyag rgya re res kyang las bzhi rnams la phyag 
[\[60b.6\]]rgya'i snying po bzhis sbyar ro/_/de nas gsang ba khro bo'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/_/yan lag kun gyis 'khyud nas ni/_/hU~M zhes yul la sbyar bya ba/_/dbang po gnyis ni sprad byas nas/_/de yi srog ni ma rung 'gyur/_/hU~M zhes bya bar ldan pa yis/_/mchu sprad sos ni mchu bzung nas/_/
[\[60b.7\]]dbang po gnyis ni rab sprad pa/_/gang yin de ni mngon sum 'gyur/_/hU~M zhes sbyor ba gang yin pa/_/de ni bde ba myong bar 'gyur/_/dbang po gnyis ni sprad gyur na/_/gang yin de ni sdug bsngal 'thob/_/hU~M zhes bya ba rab sbyor zhing /_/dbang po gnyis ni sprad nas kyang /_/yan lag kun gyis 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]btsir gyur na/_/de yi lus ni bsrungs par 'gyur/_/de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag go/_/hU~M a/_hU~M dza/_hU~M ho/_hU~M haM/_hU~M he/_de nas 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig de nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/_/gang gis sems can phan 
[\[61a.2\]]pa'i phyir/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran byas na/_/de ni sangs rgyas 'thob par 'gyur/_/dbang phyug dang ni u ma yang /_/sa la bris te de ltar gnan/_/ji ltar bris pa'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin/_/sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/_/de ni bcings pa tsam gyis 
[\[61a.3\]]kyang /_/de ni 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba/_/rdo rje hU~M dang 'dra ba yi/_/dngos grub rdzu 'phrul myur du 'grub/_/ji ltar ri mor bris pa bzhin/_/'bar bas bskor ba'i dbus bzhugs pa/_/sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis/_/sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/_/de nas de rnams las bshad 
[\[61a.4\]]de/_/rdo rje las ni bla na med/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran grub pas/_/myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob bo/_/'jig rten gsum las rgyal bcings na/_/'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal 'gyur/_/rdo rje che dang kun du 'gro/_/rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba 'dra/_/rdo rje dbang gis rgyal por 'gyur/_/
[\[61a.5\]]chos bzang ldan pas 'jig rten dbang /_/las kyi rdo rje khro bo che/_/rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur/_/sems dpa' khro bor rab tu brtan/_/khro bo'i lcags kyus yang dag 'gugs/_/khro bo chags pas chags par byed/_/khro bo legs pas dga' ba ster/_/khro gnyer gyis kun ma rungs 
[\[61a.6\]]byed/_/khro bo nyi mas gzi brjid mchog_/dpal gyi khro bo don rnams sdud/_/ha ha dgod pas bdud byed do/_/chos kyi khro bos chos rnams bdud/_/rdo rje ral gris gcod pa ste/_/rgyu yi khro bo sdug bsngal 'phrog_/khro bo smra bas tshig 'phrog go_/las kyi khro bo las rab ste/_/srung ba yis 
[\[61a.7\]]ni srung bar byed/_/khro bo gnod sbyin dgra yang za/_/khro bo'i khu tshur dngos grub ster/_/de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/_/rdo rje gnyis su gyur ba ste/_/dam tshig mchog tu grags pa yin/_/de dag bcing ba bshad par bya/_/khro bo'i bcing ba bla na med/_/lag ngar rdo rjer byas nas 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]ni/_/mthe'u chung lcags kyur bcing bar bya/_/mdzub mo gnyis kyis bsdigs pa ni/_/'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya/_/de bzhin mdzub mo ngos sbyar te/_/nor bu 'dra bar rab tu dgug_/gung mo mnyam bsgreng pad+mar bya/_/gung mo mdzub mo gnyis kas bsdigs/_/mdzub mo gnyis 
[\[61b.2\]]ka rdo rjer bya/_/g.yas pa lcags kyur dgug par bya/_/de nyid hU~M zhes bya bar mdud/_/legs pa sbyin par de bzhin te/_/mdzub gnyis dpral ba'i gnyer mar bzhag_/snying gar mdzub mos nyi mar bskor/_/lag pa brkyang ste spyi bor bzhag_/mdzub mo kha nas dgod ltar bya/_/mdzub 
[\[61b.3\]]mo'i sen mo sbyar ba ste/_/g.yas pas ral gri bcings pa'o/_/gung mdzub mnyam bsgreng 'khor lo yi/_/kha yi nang nas dbyung ba dang /_/mdzub mo gung mo rdo rjer bya/_/mdzub mo gnyis ni mche ba che/_/mdzub mo bkug pa rdo rjer bcings/_/rdo rje lA s+ye la sogs pa/_/sems ma'i 
[\[61b.4\]]phyag rgyas de nyid hU~M/_/zhes dbye chos kyi phyag rgya de/_/hU~M zhes bya bar lhan cig go/_/de nas rdo rje'i dam tshig gi chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do/_/hU~M ni sangs rgyas rdo rje yi/_/tAM ni rdo rje snying po yi/_/hrI ni rdo rje sde yi'o/_/a ni rdo rje thams cad kyi/_/hU~M he/_traM/_ta~M/_hi hi de ha/_b+hika 
[\[61b.5\]]d+hi hU~M/_grA/_kripaM/_dr-i a/_rdo rje khro bo mang po yi/_/chos kyi phyag rgya rab 'grub pa'o/_/de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do/_/rdo rje'i rigs ni chen po yi/_/las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na/_/rdo rje 'gying la sogs tshul gyis/_/khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis su bshad/_/gang
