[\[61b.6\]]dang gang gi phyag rgya rnams/_/las kyi phyogs ni gang du bya/_/de dang der ni bsgyur nas kyang /_/phyag rgya de ni sbyar bar bya/_/phyag rgya thams cad kyi cho ga'o/_/de nas 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i spyi'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/_/'jig rten 
[\[61b.7\]]gsum rgyal phyag rgya ni/_/rdo rje mdzub mo dam tshig gi/_/rdo rje hU~M zhes sngags kyi ste/_/dngos grub thams cad yud kyis 'thob/_/mthe'u chung gnyi ga lcags kyur bcing /_/rdo rje gnyi ga'i bla 'og tu/_/dam tshig lcags kyu'i phyag rgya de/_/skad cig gis ni thams cad 'gugs/_
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]rig pa dam pa thams cad kyi/_/'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bshad/_/thams cad kyang ni gnod pa ste/_/de bzhin las rnams thams cad byed/_/rdo rje mdzub sor gnyis legs par/_/rab mnyam bzhag pas mnyam nas ni/_/shi ba thams cad slong ba 
[\[62a.2\]]ste/_/rdo rje slong ba zhes bya'o/_/rdo rje gnyis ka legs par ni/_/rdo rje bcing bas bcings nas su/_/bzlog ste gtsug tu bzhag pa ni/_/tshe dang nad med 'phel ba'o/_/rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/_/mthe bo bsnyams nas nang du gzhug_/mdzub mo dam por bkug nas su/_/bcug 
[\[62a.3\]]pa rkang par 'gugs pa'o/_/'jig rten gsum rgyal bcings nas su/_/gang gi gzugs la rkang g.yon pas/_/legs par mnan pa'i sems can de/_/zla ba phyed kyis grub par 'gyur/_/rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/_/gcig la gcig ni brdabs na ni/_/sems can 
[\[62a.4\]]gang gi lus la ni/_/babs na de yang rdob par byed/_/rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/_/bdag gam pha rol go char bya/_/mdzub mo gnyis kyis bcings byas na/_/nges pa nyid du srung bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje mthil du bcings nas kyang /_/yid kyis khros nas dgab bya ba/_/mthe bo rdo 
[\[62a.5\]]rje dam po ste/_/rdo rje rigs chen grub par 'gyur/_/sems dpa' rdo rje srar bya ste/_/mthe bo gnyis kas gung mo mnan/_/mthe'u chung rdo rje rtse mo ni/_/rnon por dam tshig 'dzin pa'o/_/rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/_/mdzub mo gnyis bkug bcings nas su/_/gcu zhing phyir gcu 
[\[62a.6\]]byas pa ni/_/lha dgug pa yi dam pa yin/_/rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/_/mdzub mo gnyis bkug rab tu mnan/_/mthe bo gnyis ka sbyar ba yis/_/dbus su bcing ba bar snang gi'o/_/rdo rje phyag rgya gnyi ga las/_/mthe'u chung gnyi ga bcings nas su/_/rgyab sbyor mdzub mo gnyis sbrel te/_/
[\[62a.7\]]bsgyur ba mkha' la spyod pa'i'o/_/rdo rje bcings pa bsdams nas su/_/rdo rje srung bas bcing bar bya/_/de ni sa pa'i dam tshig ste/_/thams cad byed pas 'da' bar dka'/_/rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/_/g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la/_/mthe'u chung 'khyud cing rtag tu gtogs/_/
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]de ni sa 'og 'gugs pa'o/_/rdo rje bcings pas sbrel ba ni/_/mdzub mo gnyis ka dam po ste'o/_/gung mo mthe bo rdo rjer ni/_/gdug pa'i phyag rgya 'joms pa'o/_/rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/_/mnyam bzhag ste ni snying gar bzhag_/khro bo khu tshur gyis btsir ba/_/
[\[62b.2\]]phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'jig pa'o/_/g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la/_/g.yas pa'i mdzub mo bkug pas bzung /_/rab tu khros nas drag gtogs na/_/ri rab kyang ni lhung bar byed/_/g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la/_/g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus bzung /_/rab 
[\[62b.3\]]tu khros shing bkug pa yis/_/gdon rnams kun la dbang du byed/_/rdo rje bcing ba byas nas su/_/lag ngar snying gar shin tu bsdams/_/rdo rje mdzub mos nyid mchan khung /_/brud pa yis ni snying sbyin no/_/mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yis/_/mthe bong gnyis kyi drung du ni/_/yid 
[\[62b.4\]]kyis khros nas btsir ba bya/_/rims la sogs dgug dam pa'o/_/rdo rje thal mo dam sbyar te/_/mdzub mo gnyi ga bkug nas su/_/mthe bo rab tu mnyam sbyar bas/_/mnan pa de ni sdig 'phrog pa'o/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis nang du/_/mdzub mo gnyis ni sbas nas kyang /_/
[\[62b.5\]]legs par gyen du 'phangs pa ni/_/lhung ba slong ba'i dam pa'o/_/rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/_/gung mo gnyis ka ngos sbyar te/_/tha ma bzhi yi ngos sprad pa/_/skad cig tu ni sdig 'dral lo/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya 
[\[62b.6\]]bcing ba bshad do/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bzung nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor dang por srad bu bre/_/srad bu bres la phyi nas ni/_/srad bu ji bzhin bre ba bshad/_/rdo rje phyag rgya gnyi ga yis/_/mdzub mo'i rtse mor rab sbyar ba/_/byas nas mtshon rnams thams cad la/_/'bar ba'i lta bas 
[\[62b.7\]]dgug par bya/_/rdo rje'i mdzub mos legs par ni/_/sbyar la bkan te bsdams nas su/_/rab tu khros nas dbye ba ni/_/sgo dbye ba yi mchog yin no/_/de nas rdo rje rigs rnams kyi phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa bshad do/_/g.yon brkyang ba yi tshul byas te/_/khro bo yi ni skad 'byin cing //_
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]khro ba'i blta bas bltas na ni/_/las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[63a.2\]]bam po lnga pa/_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba badzri Ni/_badzra mA te A na ya/_sarba badzra 
[\[63a.3\]]sat+ye na hU~M dza/_de nas de gsungs pa tsam gyis phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka nas/_bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid phyag na rdo rje dra ba bdag gis lus thams cad 'bar ba'i sgo nas/_rdo rje khro bo gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams su gyur nas byung ste/_'jig rten 
[\[63a.4\]]gyi khams thams cad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don bsgrubs nas/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo gsang ba sba ba'i phyir/_sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'jig rten gsum 
[\[63a.5\]]las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/gsang ba'i ye shes bla na med/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i phyir/_/btsun mo nyid du gyur pa yin/_hrIH/_
[\[63a.6\]]de nas yang phyag na rdo rje rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khorardo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba 'di gsungs so/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/_/khro bo'i gsang ba zhes bshad do/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[63a.7\]]chen po'i tshul du ni/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre/_/dkyil 'khor lnga yi gnas rnams su/_/gsang ba'i phyag rgya gzhag par bya/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/sangs rgyas sku rnams gzhag par bya/_/sangs rgyas khro bo dam tshig kyang /_/ji bzhin par ni mkhas 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]pas bri/_/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor der/_/dbus su mdung rtse mchur bris la/_/rdo rje rab tu gzhag bya zhing /_/'od 'bar dbus su bri bar bya/_/de yi [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin te/_/rdo rje rdo rje lcags kyu dang /_/mda' dang dga' ba de bzhin 
[\[63b.2\]]no/_/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis pa yang /_/'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa yi/_/rdo rje rin chen bri bar bya/_/khro gnyer dbus su rdo rje bri/_/de bzhin rdo rje nyi rgyal mtshan/_/de bzhin so yi phreng ba de'i/_/dngos su rdo rje bri bar bya/_/rdo rje 
[\[63b.3\]]shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum pa yang /_/pad+ma'i dbus su gnas pa yi/_/rdo rje pad+ma lha rdzas bri/_/'bar ba'i dbus su pad+ma bri/_/ral gri 'khor lo de bzhin no/_/rdo rje'i lce yang tshul bzhin du/_/rtag tu de yi phyogs su gzhag_/rdo rje shugs 
[\[63b.4\]]kyis brgal nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi pa dam par yang /_/rdo rje bsnyal la rdo rje bri/_/rdo rje'i 'od ni chen pos bskor/_/de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/_/'bar ba kun gyis dkrigs pa'i 'od/_/rdo rje thams cad go cha mchog_/rdo rje mche ba khu tshur mchog_/grwa dang phyi yi 
[\[63b.5\]]gnas rnams la/_/tshul bzhin du ni bri bar bya/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/phyag rgya rig pa mdor bsdu na/_dz+hiH/_oM badzra kro d+he sa ma yedz+hiH/_oM badzra kro d+he roSha aM ku shaa+wa na ya sarba na dz+hiH/_oM badzra ro She kA ma/_badzri Ni ba sham+me A na ya hi dz+hiH/_oM badzra duSh+Ta kro d+he to Sha ya sarba 
[\[63b.6\]]na dz+hiH/_rdo rje dz+hiHzhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/dziH/_oM badzra b+h+r-i ku shI kro d+he ha ra sarba ar+tha na dziH/_oM badzra dz+wA la mA lA pra be sha ma hA kro d+ha ag+ni dz+wA la ya sarba na ra bi ro She dziH/_oM badzra d+h+wa dza a gre ke yU ra ma hA krod+he de hi me sarba a r+tha na dziH/_oM badzra aT+TA hA sa ni hA sa hA sa a T+TA t+Te hA se na mA ra 
[\[63b.7\]]ya dziH/_rdo rje dziHzhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/_diH/_oM badzra shud+d+ha kro d+he ha na ha na mA ra ya duSh+Ta na diH/_oM badzra tI k+Sh+Na kro d+he ts+tshin+da/_badzra ko She na/_sarba ni deH/_oM badzra he tu ma hA kro d+he pra be sha tsa kra pra be sha ya sarban diH/_oM badzra dzi hA ma hA krod+he ba she ba tsa muny+tsa diH/_rdo rje diHzhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]ro/_hrIH/_oM badzra sarban mu khe karma badzra Ni ma hA kro d+he ku ru ku ru sarba na hrIH/_oM badzra ka btsa kro d+he ra k+Sha ma ma hiH/_oM badzra tsaD+Na kro d+he ma hA ya k+Shi ni badzra daMSh+Ta kA rA la b+hISha ne pa ya hiH/_oM badzra kro d+he muSh+Di ban+d+ha hiH/_rdo rje hiHzhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/de nas dkyil 
[\[64a.2\]]'khor gyi grwa rnams su/_rdo rje gar la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rig pa'i snying po rnams gsungs pa/_oM badzra hU~M khe/_badzra hU~M g+hAM/_badzra hU~M te/_badzra hU~M twaM/_phyi rol gyi grwa rnams su sil snyan gyi mchod pa'i snying po rnams brjod par bya'o/_/oM badzra tri te/_badzra DaM Da/_badzra 
[\[64a.3\]]d+hA tu/_badzra Dau m+mu d+ha/_de nas sgo ba'i mchod pa'i snying po rnams gsungs pa/_badzra dzaHdzaH/_badzra hU~M hU~M/_badzra baM baM/_badzra aHaH/_de nas rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di bshad do/_/de nas de la thog ma nyid du re zhig 'jig rten gsum 
[\[64a.4\]]las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i tshig bzhin du gzhug ste/_rdo rje gsang ba'i rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya dang nye ba'i phyag rgya dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang ba mchod pa'i phyir gar gyis mchod par bya'o/_/de la gar dang 
[\[64a.5\]]gar gyi lan dang nye ba'i gar dang ye shes kyi gar rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no/_/de la dang po nyid du rdo rje dbyings su bsdus pa'i snying pos rdo rje glu len cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pas mchod pa byas nas/_rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems 
[\[64a.6\]]ma rdo rje'i phyag rgya drag tu gtogs par bya'o/_/de nas ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams phyag rgya rnams kyis yang dag par dbab par bya'o/_/rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis ni/_/rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis/_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad phyag rgyar ni/_/snying gar shin tu bcing bar bya/_/de nas gar gyi cho ga 
[\[64a.7\]]yi/_/rdo rje khro bo lcags kyu yis/_/sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang ngo /_/rdo rje mda' ni 'phang ba bya/_/rdo rje mda' ni 'phangs nas kyang /_/rdo rje dga' bas bsgrub par bya/_/phyag rgya cho ga bzhin bkrol te/_/thal mo brdab cing bcing bar bya/_/mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni//
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]phyag na rdo rje mnyes par bya/_/mnyes nas dgos pa thams cad ni/_/'dod bzhin skad cig nyid kyis 'grub/_/de la gar gyi phyag rgya'i snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/sid+h+ya badzra/_/A na ya badzra/_rA ga ya badzra/_sAd+hu badzra/_de'i 'og tu lan gyi gar gyi mchod pa bya ste/_de bzhin gar 
[\[64b.2\]]gyi g.yon pa na pa ni/_/khu tshur g.yas pas bzung nas ni/_/bsgyur zhing mdzub mo'i ngos kyis ni/_/dpral ba nyid la gzhag par bya/_/de bzhin gar byed nyi ma yang /_/bskor nas yang dag dgug par bya/_/rdo rje rgyal mtshan bslang nas ni/_/rdo rje ha ha zhes dgod cing /_/mchod pa 
[\[64b.3\]]'di ni cho ga yis/_/rgyal po la sogs mi kun kyang /_/dbang dang rab kyi gzi brjid dang /_/sbyin dang dgos pas mnyes par byed/_/de la de rnams ni lan phyag rgya'i snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_a hi badzra dz+wA la ya badzra/_de hi badzra hA sa hA sa badzra/_de bzhin gar kyang bkrol 
[\[64b.4\]]nas ni/_/pad+ma kha 'bus sbyar ba yi/_/mdzub mo'i rtse mo snying gar gzhag_/bsam pa g.yos pas 'dud par bya/_/de bzhin gar byed rdo rje yis/_/ral gris bgegs ni gcod ltar bya/_/mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba yis/_/'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul du bskor/_/
[\[64b.5\]]rdo rje tshig tu glu len ltar/_/phyag na rdo rje mchod par bya/_/mchod pa 'di yi cho ga yis/_/thams cad nges pa nyid du 'gyur/_/de la 'di rnams ni nye ba'i/_/phyag rgya'i snying po rnams yin no/_/gA ma ya badzra/_ts+tshin+da ya badzra/_brA h+mi ya badzra/_bru hi badzra/_rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub yang 
[\[64b.6\]]dag_/bkan nas rtse mo sbyar nas kyang /_/bsgyur te de nas gtsug tor du/_/mdzub me'i rtse mo gzhag par bya/_/rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis ni/_/lus kun mchog gi dkyil 'khor du/_/gar gyi cho gas bstan par bya/_/snying gar rab tu gzhag par bya/_/de bzhin gar gyi 
[\[64b.7\]]cho ga bzhin/_/rdo rje bsrung ba bcing bar bya/_/rdo rje mche ba bcings nas ni/_/rdo rje'i bcing bas mnan par bya/_/mchod pa 'di yi cho ga yis/_/las rnams kun kyang nus par 'gyur/_/mchod pa rnam bzhi byas nas ni/_/cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya bkrol/_/de dag gi snying 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/nr-i t+ya badzra/_rak+Sha badzra/_khA da badzra/_ban+da badzra/_de nas khro bo'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i lag gnyis kyis/_/khros pa'i yid kyis drag gtogs bya/_/skye bo gang gi ming smos pa/_/de yi snying ni 'gas 
[\[65a.2\]]par 'gyur/_/ma mchu so yis bzung nas su/_/gang gi ming smos gzir ba ni/_/de yi mgo yang myur 'gas te/_/gang gi bka' las 'das pa'i 'o/_/khro bo khro chen lta ba yi/_/mig kyang 'dzums par byed pa ni/_/gang gi ming ni smos bltas pa/_/de yi mig ni 
[\[65a.3\]]rdol par 'gyur/_/rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag la/_/bdag rang gi yang snying gar yang /_/rdo rje bcings pa bcing na ni/_/de yi sems ni 'jig par byed/_/de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di yin no/_/hU~M badzra s+pho Ta thaH/_hU~M badzra mu ka badzra thaH/_hU~M badzra ne trA thaH/_hU~M badzra 
[\[65a.4\]]ma ne thaH/_de nas rdo rje chen po'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/_/de la dang por re zhig phyag rgya chen po bcings ba bshad do/_/mthe'u chung lcags kyu bcings nas ni/_/rdo rje khro bo gzhag par bya/_/g.yon par rtse gsum rgyab tu ni/_/'jig rten gsum 
[\[65a.5\]]las rgyal zhes bshad/_/g.yon pa mdzub mo thad kar brkyang /_/de bzhin bkan pa pad+ma ni/_/de bzhin du yang bsgyur nas ni/_/g.yon pa'i rdo rjer gzhag par bya/_/rdo rje mthil du bcings byas te/_/khros pa yis ni dga' bya zhing /_/mthe bo rdo rje dam pas so/_/khro bo 
[\[65a.6\]]ti rin+ti rir bshad/_/mdzub mo lcags kyu dgug pa nyid/_/mdzub mo ngos ni sbyar ba'o/_/de bzhin mdzub gnyis legs sbyin pa/_/mdzub mo sprad de dpral bar gzhag_/snying gar nyi ma rab tu brtan/_/mdzub mo bsnyams nas spyi bor gzhag_/bsgyur nas dgod par gzhag 
[\[65a.7\]]par bya/_/mdzub bsnyams pad+ma kha 'bus bzhin/_/gnyis ka ral gri chang par 'dzin/_/mdzub gnyis 'khor lor bcings pa'o/_/mdzub mo bsnyams te kha nas dbyung /_/mdzub mo legs par brkyang ba dang /_/mdzub mos mgul du bcing bar bya/_/de gnyis kha 'gram mche 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]bar bzhag_/khu tshur dam du bcings pa ni/_/phyag rgya chen po yin par bshad/_/de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/_/gsang ba'i khu tshur las byung ba/_/dam tshig mchog tu rab tu grags/_/de rnams bcing ba bshad bya ba/_/rdo rje bcing 
[\[65b.2\]]ba bla na med/_/snying gar bzhag nas rtsib logs gcu/_/mda' drang ba ni g.yon pa nas/_/snying ga nas ni dbyung bar bya/_/khro gnyer du ni bsgyur nas ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang /_/spyi bor lag pa brkyang ba dang /_/bsgyur nas dgod par gzhag par bya/_/kha yi 
[\[65b.3\]]dbus su rab bzhag pa/_/mdzub mor ral gri 'debs pa 'dra/_/'khor lo bskor ba ston pa dang /_/kha nas rab tu 'byin pa ste/_/spyi bor lus mchog dkyil 'khor ro/_/dpung pa snying ga rtsib logs rnams/_/rdo rje bsrung ba de bzhin bya/_/mche ba'i gnas su gzhag pa dang /_/
[\[65b.4\]]khu tshur dam du bsdams pa'o/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor phyag rgya ni/_/mtshan ma'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du bcing /_/dam tshig rdo rje bcings pa las/_/de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur gzhag_/de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do/_phaTaHshaTaHmaTaHsaTaHraTaHhaTaHd+hiTaHhaTaH
[\[65b.5\]]phad+TaHtad+TaHkad+TaHd+haD+TaHkuTiHriTaHkhaTaHpaTaH/_de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i las kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/_/mdor na las kyi phyag rgya ni/_/rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas te/_/gnas gang yin par gzhag par bya/_/khro bo'i lta ba khro dang ldan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 
[\[65b.6\]]dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las khro bo gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs sto//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i 
[\[65b.7\]]ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta sUk+Sh+ma badzra krod+ha hU~M phaT/_de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM sU Sh+ma badzra krod+he kra ma hU~M phaT/_de nas byang chub 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra rat+na kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaDa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa 
[\[66a.2\]]dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM sU k+Sh+ma badzra pad+ma kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaDa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra karma kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaDa/_de nas yang 
[\[66a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs bskyed pa'i phyir/_rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du 'khod de/_de rnams kyi snying po gsungs pa/_oM badzra satwa sUk+Sh+ma dz+nya na kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaDa/_oM sU k+Sh+ma badzra aM ku sha A kar+Sha ya ma hA kro d+hA hU~M phaDa/_oM badzra sUk+Sh+ma rA ga kro 
[\[66a.4\]]d+hA a nu rA ga ya ti bi kra ma hU~M phaT/_oM badzra sUk+Sh+ma badzra puSh+Ti kro d+hA hU~M phaT/_oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra b+h+r-i ku TI kro d+hA ha ra ha ra hU~M phaDa/_oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra dz+wA la maN+Da la kro d+hA sU r+yadz+wA la hU~M phaT/_oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra tsakra kro d+hA sarba ar+tha mA me pra ya ts+tsha shrI kra ma hU~M phaDa/_oM badzra sU k+Sh+ma hA sa kro d+hA ma hA T+TaT+Ta hA sa/_ha ha ha ha hU~M phaDa/_
[\[66a.5\]]oM sU k+Sh+ma badzra d+harma badzra kro d+hA ya hU~M phaDa/_oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra tsh+tse da kro d+ha ts+tshin+da b+hin+da hu~M phaT/_oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+ha ma hA tsakra ts+tshin+da pa tA ya shrI pra be sha ya hr-i da yaM b+hin+da hu~M phaT/_oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra hU~M kAr ha na tA ya lwA ka ma tren+na hu~M phaT/_oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra karma kro d+ha sarba karma kA rong b+ha ba sarba kA ra ya sA d+ha ya hu~M phaT/_oM badzra sUk+Sh+ma ka ba 
[\[66a.6\]]tsa kro d+hA rak+Sha rak+Sha hu~M phaT/_oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra yak+Sha kro d+hA ha na b+ha ya sarba duSh+Ti ny+tsit+ta mA tre badzra daMSh+T+rA hu~M phaT/_oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra muSh+Ti kro d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/_de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje rigs kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gsungs pa/_de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[66a.7\]]dam pa ste/_/rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/_/khro bo'i ye shes zhes kyang bshad/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/_/de yi dbus su sangs rgyas bri/_/ye shes rdo rje'i dbus chud pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du/_/sangs 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]rgyas de nyid kun bris shig_/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams su yang /_/'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal sogs/_/rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya/_/de rnams kyi ni phyogs kun du/_/rdo rje khro bo'i cho ga bzhin/_/de nas 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi 
[\[66b.2\]]ye shes phra mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa rgyas pa bshad do/_/de la dang po nyid du re zhig bcug nas bsgo ba ni/_de ring khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo nyid du bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur gyis de legs par nan tan gyis shig_/sems can gyi 
[\[66b.3\]]khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir bya ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phan pa dang bde ba dang dam pa grub pa thob pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir gyi bar du rdo rje khro bos sems can thams cad kyang yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir bdud byed na ma rungs pa thams cad 
[\[66b.4\]]lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos/_de skad bsgo nas gdong g.yogs bkrol te/_de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad bstan nas/_rdo rje ci lta ba bzhin du lag pa gnyis su byin no/_/de nas rdo rje khro bo'i ye shes phra mo rnams slobs shig_/rdo rje hU~M gi rnal 'byor gyis/_/rdo rje phra mo bstan 
[\[66b.5\]]byas la/_/hU~M zhes bya ba gang sbyar ba/_/de yi srog ni 'jig par 'gyur/_/rdo rje phra mo bstan byas te/_/cho ga bzhin du mched pa ni/_/ji srid bar du mched pa des/_/de srid kyi ni dgra 'di 'jig_/rdo rje hU~M gi rnal 'byor gyis/_/rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la/_/khro bor ldan pa ji srid 
[\[66b.6\]]mched/_/de snyed thams cad ma rungs byed/_/de bzhin de yi bsdu ba yang /_/rnal 'byor can gyis 'dod na yang /_/ma lus par ni thams cad la/_/slar yang 'tsho ba sbyin par bya/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/_/hU~M hU~M nA sha ya badzra hU~M bi nA sha ya sarba sU k+Sh+ma badzra pra t+ya nA sha ya shI g+h+rAM 
[\[66b.7\]]hU~M/_sems can gang gi dgra la ni/_/lhan cig gyur pa cher bstan pa/_/byams pa mched pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/rdo rje spro bas gzhig par bya/_/rdo rje spro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/gang yang rung ba'i snying rje can/_/snying rje rnal 'byor de yis ni/_/gdug pa thams cad nges 'jig go/_/
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]chos sam yang na chos min pa/_/rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba/_/de ltar bsgoms na sems can la/_/hU~M zhes bya bas 'jig par byed/_/gdul bar dka' ba'i sems can gang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub snod min pa/_/de nas yang dag sbyang ba'i phyir/_/
[\[67a.2\]]hu~M zhes bya bas gzhig par bya/_/de la de rnams kyi snying po rnams ni 'di dag yin no/_/b+hai ra badzre kro d+ha hu~M phaT/_hu~M bi shud d+ha badzra kro d+ha hu~M phaT/_oM bi sho d+ha na badzra kro d+ha hu~M phaT/_rdo rje'i dbyibs ni bris nas kyang /_/yid kyis kyang ni gang su yi/_/khyim gyi dbus su ltung bsams na/_/de yi 
[\[67a.3\]]rigs de 'jig par 'gyur/_/de bzhin phra ba'i cho ga yis/_/snying gar rdo rje bsgoms nas kyang /_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs/_/ltung na rigs ni 'jig par 'gyur/_/phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs chen po/_/bsgoms na gang du lhung ba de'i/_/snang srid nyes pa sna tshogs 
[\[67a.4\]]kyis/_/btsun mor bcas pa 'jig par 'gyur/_/rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgoms nas ni/_/snang ba gang la ltung ba ni/_/de yi snang srid nges par 'jig_/de la de dag gi snying bo ni 'di rnams yin no/_/hU~M badzra pra ba ta/_/hU~M bo d+hi satwa pra ba 
[\[67a.5\]]ta/_/hU~M badzra d+ha ra pra ba ta/_hu~M bud+d+ha pra ba ta/_rdo rje phra mo rab sbyar bas/_/zla ba'i gzugs la bdag rang nyid/_/bsgoms nas su ni bdag nyid yang /_/gang du ltung ba der ltung 'gyur/_/zla ba rdo rje bdag rang nyid/_/bsgoms nas su ni bdag rang yang /_/rab tu khros nas gar ltung 
[\[67a.6\]]ba/_/de yi rigs ni mod la ltung /_/bdag rang phyag na rdo rjer ni/_/bsgoms nas su ni bdag nyid yang /_/gang du ltung ba de yi yul/_/ring por mi thogs 'jig par 'gyur/_/bdag rang sangs rgyas gzugs nyid du/_/bsgoms nas su ni bdag nyid yang /_/gang du ltung ba de yi 
[\[67a.7\]]ni/_/snang srid ring por mi thogs 'jig_/de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di dag yin no/_/bod+hA gra pra tu ya hU~M/_swas+t+wa badzra pra ba ta ya hU~M/_badzra satwa pra ba ta hu~M/_bud+d+ha pra ba ta ya hU~M/_de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/_/rdo rje khro bor snyoms zhugs la/_/
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]rang gi lus kyis yongs bskor ba/_/rdo rje hU~M las 'khyud nas ni/_/gang gi ming smos de 'chi'o/_/rdo rje phra mo snyoms zhugs la/_/sna nas phra ba thang cig min/_/dbugs dang hU~M zhes pya tshul gyis/_/'jig rten gsum yang ltung bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la/_/khros 
[\[67b.2\]]nas rdo rje lta ba yis/_/bltas pas su ni ldongs par 'gyur/_/yang na 'chi ba ru ni 'gyur/_/bu gnas ni zhugs nas ni/_/yid kyis gang yang rung ba yi/_/snying drangs pas ni de yis ni/_/rang ngam 'di yi dbang du 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po rnams gsungs pa/_hU~M badzra ba li 
[\[67b.3\]]ta kro d+ha mA ra ya hU~M phaT/_oM sU k+Sh+ma badzra shwa sa bi shra pa tA ya hU~M phaT/_oM badzra dr-iSh+Ti bi sha bi sha bi nA sha ya hU~M phaT/_hU~M hr-i da ya kA na kro d+ha pra bi sha ka yi/_hr-i da ya ts+tshin+da b+hin+da ka ta ka ta hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/_/de la re zhig phyag rgya chen po bcing 
[\[67b.4\]]ba bshad de/_/rdo rje ye shes sbyor ba yis/_/'bar ba'i phreng ba la khrigs pa'i 'od/_/rdo rje khro bor bdag nyid ni/_/bsgoms na de ma thag tu 'grub/_/de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/_/ting 'dzin dam tshig ye shes las/_/hU~M zhes bya ba gnyis 
[\[67b.5\]]dang ldan/_/ci rigs gnas su bzhag nas ni/_/bsgrub pa thams cad ster ba'i mchog_/de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/_/phaT/_shaT/_maT/_saT/_raT/_taT/_hr-iT/_haT/_praT/_traT/_daT/_b+haT/_kr-iT/_riT/_khaT/_baT/_zhes 
[\[67b.6\]]bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus bshad pa'o/_/de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po/_/chos kyi khu tshur gnyis byas te/_/ji ltar rigs pa'i gnas su sbyar/_/las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdu na/_/cho ga bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur/_/de bzhin 
[\[67b.7\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/_rdo rje rigs kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad pa rdzogs sto//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta karme shwa ra hU~M/_de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs 
[\[68a.2\]]so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na ma hA bU dzA karma bi d+hi bi stA ra sa ma ye trai lo kya bi dza ya ki ra sarba duSh+TaM sa ma ya badzri Ni hU~M/_de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya sha du sa ma ya 
[\[68a.3\]]s+pha ra Na ma hA bU dzA karma bi d+hi stA ra ya sa ma ye hU~M/_de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na ma hA bU dzA karma bi d+hi bi stA ra sa ma ye hU~M/_de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs 
[\[68a.4\]]kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba a ba lo ka d+hA tu ma bi ma hA pu dzA karma bi d+hi bi stA ra sa ma ye hU~M phaDa/_de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i lha mo rang gi snying ga nas bskyed de/_'jig 
[\[68a.5\]]rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba dang /_dbang du bya ba dang /_mnyes par bya ba dang /_las thams cad bsgrub pa'i dgos pa byed pa nyid du yang dag pa'i sbyor ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang rnam 
[\[68a.6\]]par 'phrul pa byas te/_slar yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di 
[\[68a.7\]]gsungs so/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/_/las kyi rdo rje zhes bshad do/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre/_/dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gnas su ni/_/sangs rgyas sku gzugs 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]gzhag par bya/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du/_/dam tshig mchog rnams gzhag par bya'o/_/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams la yang /_/rdo rje gtso sogs bzhi po rnams/_/ji ltar rim bzhin gzhag par bya/_/de rnams kyi ni phyogs 
[\[68b.2\]]kun du/_/mchod pa chen po rnams bzhag go/_/de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir/_/rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya bshad/_/oM badzra satwa sid d+hi dz+nyA na karma sa ma ye hU~M dza/_oM badzra A kar+Sha Na karma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hU~M dza/_oM badzra ra ti rA ga karma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hU~M dza/_oM badzra sA d+hu karma dz+nyAn sa 
[\[68b.3\]]ma ye hU~M dza/_oM badzra b+h+r-i ku TI ba shiM ku ru hU~M/_oM badzra sUr+ya maN+Da le ba shiM ku ru hU~M/_oM badzra d+h+wa dza gra ke yU re ba shiM ku ru hU~M/_oM badzra da ta hA se ba shiM ku ru hU~M/_oM badzra pad+ma rA ge rA ga ya hU~M/_oM badzra tI k+Sh+Na rA ge rA ga ya hU~M/_oM badzra maN+Da la rA ge rA ga ya hU~M/_oM badzra bA ka rA ge rA ga ya hU~M/_oM 
[\[68b.4\]]badzra karma sa ma ya tsa ya hU~M/_oM badzra ka ba tsa baM d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M/_oM yak+Shi Ni mA ra ya badzra daMSh+Ta ya b+hin+da b+hin+da ya mu ga s+ya hU~M phaT/_oM badzra karma muSh+Ti sid d+hi hU~M phaT/_de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du ste/_rdo rje rigs kyi ye shes rnams bskyed do/_/de la dang 
[\[68b.5\]]po nyid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/_/yam shing mngar po rnams kyi me/_/rab sbar rdo rje khro bo yi/_/mnyam par gzhag pas snyoms 'jug pa/_/til bsregs pas ni sdig bsregs shing /_/yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/_/me ni rab tu sbar nas kyang /_/
[\[68b.6\]]rtag tu 'bras ni bsreg byas na/_/gdon mi za bar khyim rgyas 'gyur/_/yam shing mngar po rnams kyis kyang /_/mkhas pas rab tu me sbar te/_/dUr ba'i yal ga mar bcas pa/_/bsreg pa byas na tshe 'phel lo/_/yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/_/me ni rab tu sbar byas 
[\[68b.7\]]la/_/ku sha'i yal ga 'bru mar gyis/_/bsreg par byas na nges par bsrung /_/de la de dag gi snying po 'di rnams yin no/_/oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/_/oM badzra buSh+Ta ye swA hA/_oM badzra A yu She swA hA/_oM badzra a pra ti ha ta badzrA ya swA hA/_te ba ru ba miM d+hi d+hu l+ya ga ni sa ma 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]hri sa dzu he ta ri ga ta ya laM ku to ma ti pU ta pa ta ye ta/_yam shing tsha bas dang por ni/_/rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/me sbar nas kyang se ba yi/_/ne ra ma can gyis 'gugs par 'gyur/_/yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/_/khro dang ldan pas me sbar na/_/me tog 
[\[69a.2\]]dmar mang 'bras bu'ang rung /_/sbyin sreg byas na skye bo rengs/_/rnal 'byor can gyis khros nas kyang /_/yam shing des ni me sbar la/_/lcags kyi phye ma bsregs na ni/_/rdo rje bcings pa nyid du 'gyur/_/yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/_/mnyam par bzhag ste me bus la/_/
[\[69a.3\]]'bras bu kha ba khros bzhin bsreg_/skad cig tu ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/_/hU~M badzra A kaR+ShA kar+Sha ya swA hA/_hU~M badzra rA gA ya swA hA/_hU~M badzra ban d+hA ya swA hA/_hU~M badzra mA ra NA ya swA hA/_mkhas pas yam shing skyur po yis/_/khros nas byin 
[\[69a.4\]]za spar nas ni/_/'bras bu lo ma skyur bsregs na/_/dbang du bya ba dam pa'o/_/yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/_/mnyam par bzhag la me sbar la/_/'dod pa'i 'bras bu khros bsregs na/_/'dod pa bzhin du gzugs bskyed do/_/de 'dra ba yi yam shing gis/_/me ni 
[\[69a.5\]]rab tu sbar byas kyang /_/mi snang me tog sdong bu yis/_/sbyin sreg 'dod na mi snang 'gyur/_/yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/_/mnyam par bzhag ste me sbar la/_/nam mkha'i lcug ma'i me tog gis/_/sbyin sreg byas na mkha' la 'gro/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 
[\[69a.6\]]'di dag yin no/_/oM badzra ba shaM karA ya swA hA/_oM badzra karma rU pa badzrA ya swA hA/_oM a d+ya sh+ya badzrA ya swA hA/_oM badzra kha brtsa ri Ni swA hA/_khro bor mnyam bzhag yam shing ni/_/shin tu kha bas me sbar la/_/badzri me tog bsreg byas na/_/rdo rje bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[69a.7\]]yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/_/khro dang ldan zhing me sbar te/_/dpa' bo gang gis phreng ba bsreg_/de yang bka' ni nyan par 'gyur/_/khro bo nyid du mnyam bzhag pa/_/yam shing des ni me sbar te/_/phyag na rdo rje'i phreng ba bsreg_/de yang bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/_/yam 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]shing de dag nyid kyis ni/_/rab tu khros te me sbar la/_/chos gos bsregs pas sangs rgyas kyang /_/skad cig nyid du bka' bzhin mdzad/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/_/hU~M badzra ba shaM ka rA ya swA hA/_hU~M so ri ba shaM ka ra badzrA ya swA hA/_hU~M badzra pA ni ba shaM ka rA ya 
[\[69b.2\]]swa hA/_hu~M bud d+ha ba shaM ka rA ya badzrA ya swA hA/_de nas gsang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/_/yid 'ong bud med lhan cig tu/_/gnas shing bu gar any+dza na/_/bcug nas bskul bar byas nas kyang /_/de yis mig bskus dbang du 'gyur/_/ldong ros bu gar 
[\[69b.3\]]bcug nas ni/_/rdo rje bsdams pas de g.yogs te/_/mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi yis ni/_/dngos grub rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro/_/go ro tsa na bu gar bcug_/gsang ba'i khu tshur gyis btsir na/_/gzhag pa de ni 'bar gyur na/_/rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/gur kum bu gar 
[\[69b.4\]]bcug nas ni/_/bu gar sems dpa'i rdo rje yis/_/bka' nas 'bar bar gyur na ni/_/rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/_/oM gu h+ya ra ti badzra ba shaM kA raM sid d+h+ya hU~M/_oM badzra gu h+ya sid d+h+ya hU~M/_oM gu h+ya badzra sid d+ha hU~M/_oM badzra d+ha ra h+ya sid d+h+ya 
[\[69b.5\]]hU~M/_de nas rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab bo/_/rdo rje dgongs pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdu na/_/rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni/_/rdo rje khro bor mnyam par bzhag_/hU~M zhes mdzub mo'i tshul gyis ni/_/dam tshig mchog ni 'dir de bzhin/_/
[\[69b.6\]]chos kyi phyag rgya 'dir de bzhin/_/oM zhes dang po yi ge as/_/las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdu na/_/las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su byas/_/thams cad grub byed dag pa ste/_/rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 
[\[69b.7\]]las/_rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs sto//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]gsungs so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ye hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/_/hU~M badzra ma tha/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 
[\[70a.2\]]'di gsungs so/_/hU~M b+h+r-i ku TI badzra ra ta/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/_/hU~M ma hA pad+ma badzra dr-i D+ha/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs 
[\[70a.3\]]so/_/hU~M badzra karma a gra kr-i te/_de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad do/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/_/
[\[70a.4\]]rdo rje khro bo zhes bshad do/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du/_/'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs bri/_/de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas 
[\[70a.5\]]pa byas te bcug nas phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/_/rang gis phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor/_/bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la/_/bud med lhan cig gnas nas ni/_/grub pa yang ni thob par 'gyur/_/rang gis phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 
[\[70a.6\]]'khor/_/bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la/_/chags pas bud med la bltas nas/_/grub pa yang ni thob par 'gyur/_/rang gis phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor/_/bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la/_/bud med mdzes la spras pas 'grub/_/rang gis phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor/_/bris 
[\[70a.7\]]nas chos nyid dag brjod la/_/lhan cig 'khyud na grub kun thob/_/de la chos nyid dag pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di dag yin no/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta bi shud d+ha d+ha rma te ho/_/oM badzra bi shud d+ha dr-iSh+Ti dza/_oM sarba bi shud d+ha tri hU~M/_oM sarba bi shud d+ha kA ya baM ma na karma badzrI hU~M/_de nas phyag rgya bzhi pa'i 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]dkyil 'khor gsang zhing sba ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/_/dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs nas kyang /_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis ni/_/bud med mchog ni mgu byas la/_/shin tu grub pa thob par 'gyur/_/de nas 'di'i snying po brjod do/_/ho badzra kA ma/_de nas ji lta ba 
[\[70b.2\]]bzhin du rdo rjes mnan pa'i rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po rnams cho ga rgyas pa dang ldan par bslab ste/_phyag rgya bzhi'i tshul 'dis rdo rje sil snyan dang rnga dang brdung ba brdabs nas rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa'i snying po glu blangs te phul nas phyag rgya dang /_lan 
[\[70b.3\]]gyi phyag rgya dang /_nye ba'i phyag rgya dang /_ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /_gar gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o/_/de la gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa ni 'di yin no/_/rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis/_/rdo rje hU~M gi phyag rgya ni/_/snying ga nyid du bcing bar bya/_/de bzhin 
[\[70b.4\]]gar bya g.yon pa ni/_/g.yas pa'i chang pas gzung bar bya/_/bsgyur nas dpral ba nyid du ni/_/mdzub mo'i ngos ni gzhag par bya/_/de bzhin gar yang bkrol nas ni/_/mnyam par pad+ma kha 'bus sbyar/_/mdzub mo snying gar bzhag nas ni/_/bsam pa g.yos pas 'dud par 
[\[70b.5\]]bya'o/_/rdo rje khro ba'i mdzub bsnyams te/_/bkan nas rtse mo sprad bya zhing /_/de las bsgyur zhing gtsug tor du/_/mdzub mo'i rtse mo bzhag pa'o/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khro bo'i dam tshig 'di gsungs pa/_hU~M/_
[\[70b.6\]]de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/_/rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba ste/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya/_/de yi dbus su legs bri ba/_/
[\[70b.7\]]zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin/_/rdo rje hU~M gi phyag rgya che/_/lag na 'dzin pa rdo rjer bcas/_/brkyang bskum tshul du gnas pa dang /_/kha dog gzugs ni ji bzhin bya/_/de nas 'dir gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad byas te rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba gsang 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/_/dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs nas kyang /_/'jig rten gsum rgyal mdzub mo ni/_/bu gar bcug nas bsgrubs nas ni/_/las kun rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/_/de nas bsgrub pa'i snying po 'di bshad do/_/hU~M badzra sa 
[\[71a.2\]]ma ya kri ta/_de nas rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po/_/dkyil 'khor legs par zhugs nas ni/_/phyag rgya chen po mchog gnas pa/_/gnas na rdo rje hU~M zhes bya/_/las rnams kun ni byed par 'gyur/_de la 'di bsgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa/_hU~M 
[\[71a.3\]]badzra sam ya hU~M/_de nas phyag rgya bzhi bcing ba ji lta ba bzhin bslabs te de bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba bzhin du ras la sogs pa la bri ba dang lugs ma la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad la yang dngos grub ni thun mong ngo /_/phyag rgya gcig pa'i 
[\[71a.4\]]dkyil 'khor ro/_/de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gi rigs 'di la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_ci nas kyang sems can thams cad ji ltar dga' ba 
[\[71a.5\]]bzhin bgyis kyang dngos grub thams cad thob par bgyi ba'i slad du'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po la byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/rdo rje 
[\[71a.6\]]sems dpa' khyod legs so/_/rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/_/rdo rje chos ni khyod kyang legs/_/rdo rje las khyod rab tu legs/_/mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad/_/rdo rje theg pa bla na med/_/de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ste/_/theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'o/_/
[\[71a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po las rdo rje chen po'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te mkhyen bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' nyon la dbang phyug chen po'i lus 'di khyod kyang rkang pa'i 'og nas btang bar byos/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 
[\[71b.2\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i khro bor dbang bskur nas de bdag gis bskum lags na/_ji ltar de bdag gis btang bar bgyi/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag 
[\[71b.3\]]gi bdag po dbang phyug chen po'i lus kyi srog gso ba'i phyir shi ba'i rnam par shes pa dgug pa'i snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs las phyung ngo /_/oM badzra satwa hU~M dza/_de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/_/gsang ba'i lcags kyu bsdam bya ste/_/tha ma mnyam du brkyang nas kyang /_/shi 
[\[71b.4\]]ba'i mgo bor bzhag na ni/_/srog ni phyir yang thob par 'gyur/_/de nas de thob ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs de/_thal bas khebs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas slar phyin te dbang phyug gi lus der zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched 
[\[71b.5\]]du brjod do/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/_/gang phyir shi ba'i lus 'di yang /_/'tsho ba'i khams su gyur ba yin/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rkang pa 'degs pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs 
[\[71b.6\]]so/_/oM badzra muH/_de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/_/rdo rje khro bo mdzub legs par/_/zur sprad bsdams te bzhag pa ni/_/rdo rje de dag bsgyur byas shing /_/'og nas de dag 'byin par byed/_/de nas de dag gsungs ma thag tu rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po zhabs kyi 'og nas lha 
[\[71b.7\]]chen po thar bar rang gis shes par gyur to/_/de nas dbang phyug chen po'i lus de/_de bzhin gshegs pa des sos par byin gyis brlabs te/_'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir nyid kyi rgyal tshab tu bcug go/_/
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]de nas phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil de nas zla ba'i zhabs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya byung ngo /_/oM tsan+d+ro t+tA re sa man+ta b+ha dra ki ra Ni ma hA badzri Ni hU~M/_de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/_/rdo rje bcing ba dam byas 
[\[72a.2\]]te/_/mthe bo mthe'u chung mnyam par ni/_/mnyam nas legs par brkyang na ni/_/rdo rje ri mo zhes kyang grags/_/de nas de byung ma thag tu zhabs kyi mthil de las zla ba'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa de byung nas dbang phyug chen po de'i mgo bo la phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mnan pa'i 
[\[72a.3\]]rjes su zla ba phyed pa gnas par gyur te g.yon logs na 'dug go/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag na rdo rje'i grogs su lag tu rdo rje'i mdung rtse byin nas rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa zhes rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur nas dbang bskur ro/_/de nas rdo 
[\[72a.4\]]rje'i rig pa dam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje mdung rtse des mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar bskor zhing gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa byas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/byang chub sems ni bla na med/_/zhabs mchog 
[\[72a.5\]]gis ni gar reg pa/_/sangs rgyas nyid du grub pa thob/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gi sug par 
[\[72a.6\]]rdo rje stsal te/_phyag na rdo rje nyid du dbang bskur bas lha la sogs te phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs de rnams 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di la gnas pa'i rim pa bgyis nas gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las sems can de rnams 
[\[72a.7\]]phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra satwa uSh+NI Sha hU~M phaT/_de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu de bzhin 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnams las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de kha dog du ma'i 'od zer du gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i gtsug gi mtshams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug gtor gyi tshul 
[\[72b.2\]]du 'phungs nas 'khod do/_/de nas gzi brjid kyi phung po de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor 'di byung ngo /_/oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha an a wa lo ki te mUr d+ha ni te dzo rA shi/_oM hU~M dz+wa la dz+wa la/_d+ha ka d+ha ka_/da ra da ra/_bi da ra bi da ra/_ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/_b+hin da b+hin da/_hU~M 
[\[72b.3\]]hU~M phaDa phaDa swA hA/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM ni sum b+ha badzra hU~M phaDa/_de nas phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyi thugs las snying po 'di phyung ngo /_/oM Tak+ki dzaH/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo 
[\[72b.4\]]rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra rat+na ut+ta ma dz+nyA la ya hU~M phaT/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM swa b+hA ba shud d+hAH/_badzra pad+ma sho d+ha ya sarbaM bi d+yot+ta ma hU~M phaT/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 
[\[72b.5\]]sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra karma ut+ta ma badzra d+ha ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sum b+ha ni sum b+ha A kar+Sha ya/_pra be sha ya/_A be sha ya/_b+ha na d+ha ya/_sa ma yaM/_gra ha ya sarba karmA Ni mai ku ru ma hA sa twa hU~M phaT/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 
[\[72b.6\]]rig pa'i dam pas rang gi snying po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir phul ba/_oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha badzra bi d+yot+ta ma hU~M phaT/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khro bo'i rig pa'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas rang gi snying po 'di 
[\[72b.7\]]gsungs so/_/oM badzra shU la/_de nas rdo rje sgyu ma'i rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi rig pa'i snying po dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra sa ma ya d+ha ri Sha ya sarbaM hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje dril bu'i rig pa rgyal pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra g+haN+Ta ra Na ra Na hU~M phaT/_
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]de nas rdo rje thub pas rang gi snying po phul ba/_oM badzra mon ma hA pra dz+nyA hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje mtshon chas rang gi snying po phul ba/_oM badzrA s+phud+ha dA ma ka hU~M phaT/_rig pa'i rgyal po rnams so/_/de nas rdo rje 'khyil pa rdo rje khro bos bcom ldan 'das phyag na 
[\[73a.2\]]rdo rje la rang gi snying po 'di zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phul lo/_/oM badzra kuN+Da li ma hA badzra kro d+ha gr-ih+Na ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa bi d+h+wan sa ya badzre Na mu da naM ba la ya ti b+h+r-i ta sa hr-i da ya badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje 'od rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/_oM badzra 
[\[73a.3\]]pra b+ha mA ra ya s+yo ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje dbyug pa rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po 'di phul lo/_/oM badzra daN+Da ya sarbA du Sh+Ta ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaDa/_de nas rdo rje khro bo rdo rje ser pos rang gi snying po 'di phul lo/_/oM badzra ping+ga la bi sha ya sarba duSh+TaM Sh+DaM bi ma hA kro d+ha hu~M phaT/_rdo rje khro bo rnams 
[\[73a.4\]]so/_/de nas rdo rje glang sna tshogs kyi bdag pos bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la snying po 'di phul lo/_/oM badzra sho d+ha ma hA ga Na pa ti rak+Sha sarba duSh+Te b+h+yo/_badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA ba ya hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje phreng bas rang gi snying po 'di phul lo/_/oM mA la gaN pa ti mA la ya A kar+Sha ya/_
[\[73a.5\]]pra be sha ya ba shaM ku ru mA ra ya hU~M phaDa/_de nas rdo rje dbang gis rang gi snying po phul ba/_oM badzra ba shi mahA ga Na pa ti ba shaM ku ru hU~M phaDa/_de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag pos rang gi snying po phul ba/_oM badzra bi dza ya bi dza ya mahA ga Na pa ti hU~M phaDa/_tshogs kyi bdag po rnams 
[\[73a.6\]]so/_/de nas rdo rje tho ba rdo rje pho nyas rang gi snying po 'di phyag na rdo rje la phul lo/_/oM badzra mu sa la ku ru sarba duSh+TaM hu~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje rlung gi pho nyas rang gi snying po phul ba/_oM badzra nI la ma hA be ga ga Na pa ti sarba duSh+Ta hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje me'i pho nyas rang gi snying po phul ba/_oM badzra 
[\[73a.7\]]a na la ma hA duSh+Ta dz+wA la ya sarba b+hasmi ku ru sarba duSh+TaM hU~M phaDa/_rdo rje 'jigs pa'i pho nya chen pos rang gi snying po phul ba/_oM badzra b+hai ra ba badzra hU~M da ba sha la sarba duSh+Ta na ma hA yak+Sha hU~M phaT/_pho nya rnams so/_/de nas rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje bran gyis rang gi snying po 'di bcom ldan 'das phyag 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]na rdo rje la phul lo/_/oM badzra aM ku sha A kar+Sha ya/_sarbaM ma hA tsit+ta hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje dus kyis rang gi snying po phul ba/_oM badzra kA la ma hA mr-i t+yu mut+bA da hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje ngan khrid kyis rang gi snying po phul ba/_oM badzra bi nA ya ka s+ya big+h+nan ku ru hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje klu'i rdo rjes rang gi snying 
[\[73b.2\]]po 'di phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phul lo/_/oM badzra nA ga badzra A na ya sarba da na da ne hir+ya garna ne muk+ta a lad+kA ra bi ni sarbo pa kA ra Na ni badzra d+ha ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ka ta/_b+hin da b+hin da ha ra ha ra prA NAM ma hA ts+tshe da hU~M phaT/_bran rnams so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[73b.3\]]dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams cad 'gugs pa'i dam tshig 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra aM ku sha A kar+Sha ya hU~M phaT/_de nas de gzhug pa'i dam tshig 'di gsungs pa/_oM badzra bA shA kaD+D+h+ya hU~M/_de nas thams cad bcing ba gsungs pa/_hU~M badzra s+pho Ta baM/_de nas las 
[\[73b.4\]]kyi snying po gsungs pa/_oM badzra karma sa ma ya kri ta/_de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/_/chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad 
[\[73b.5\]]srad bus bre/_/de la 'di ni srad bu bre ba'i snying po yin no/_/oM sarba badzra sU traM A kar+Sha ya sarba maN+Da la hU~M/_dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus su yang /_/seng ldeng phur bu btab nas ni/_/de nas srad bu nyis rim du/_/byas nas de yis srad bu bre/_/de la 'di ni phur bu'i snying po yin no/_/
[\[73b.6\]]oM badzra kI la ya kI la ya sarba big+hAM ban d+ha hU~M phaT/_srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa dang /_/dkyil 'khor zlum po srad bu bre/_/de yi phyi rol byung nas ni/_/nyis 'gyur du ni de bzhin no/_/de yi rim pa gsum du ni/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor srad bu bre/_/phyogs mtshams 'khor lo'i 
[\[73b.7\]]rtsibs tshul du/_/grwa yi ri mo srad bu bre/_/srad bu bre ba'i cho ga'o/_/de nas srad bu bres pa der/_/dag pa'i tshon gyis dgang bar bya/_/g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis/_/cho ga bzhin du gzung bar bya/_/dang po bris nas phyis ci bde/_/de la 'di ni tshon gyi snying po'o/_/oM badzra 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]rang+ga sa ma ya hU~M/_de nas rdo rje slob dpon yang /_/mnyam par bzhag la dbus 'dug nas/_/rdo rje yi ni sgo bzhi rnams/_/yid kyis kyang ni dbye bar bya/_/de la sgo dbye ba'i snying po ni 'di'o/_/oM badzra ud g+ha Ta sa ma ya pra be sha ya shI g+haM sma ra badzra sa ma ya hU~M 
[\[74a.2\]]phaT/_gser ram yang na dngul yang rung /_/sa la bar du bris pa'am/_/pha gu gru bzhi'i steng du ni/_/sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzhag par bya/_/de la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po ni 'di'o/_/oM sarba bid/_sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du/_/sems dpa' chen po bzhi 
[\[74a.3\]]bzhag go/_/mdun du phyag na rdo rje ni/_/'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya/_/de la sems dpa' chen po'i snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M/_gr-i h+Na gr-i h+NahUM/_gr-i h+NA pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya hU~M/_A na ya ho b+ha ga bAM badzra hU~M phaT/_oM badzra b+h+r-I ku T-I krod+ha A na ya 
[\[74a.4\]]sarbaM rat+na hIHhU~M phaT/_oM badzra dr-iSh+Ti kro d+ha dr-iSh+Ta mA ra ya hU~M phaT/_oM badzra bi shwa kro d+ha ku ru sarba bi shwa rU pa ta ya sid d+ha ye hU~M phaT/_'jug gam phyir ni byung ba na/_/srad bu'i 'og 'dzul yid bsams nas/_/rdo rje shugs su brjod pa ste/_/de yis ri mo brgal bar bya/_/de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 
[\[74a.5\]]'di'o/_/oM badzra bai gA kra ma hU~M/_rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor dang por de bzhin du/_/ltag 'og [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin du/_/rdo rje sgyu ma la sogs bri/_/de la dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/oM badzra tsakra hUM/_oM badzra g+haN+Ta hU~M/_oM badzra daN+Da ka sha hU~M/_oM badzra A yu d+ha hU~M/_
[\[74a.6\]]rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de bzhin te/_/rdo rje 'khyil pa la sogs pa/_/rdo rje khro bo gzhag par bya/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/oM pra dz+wa li ta dIp+ta badzra hU~M/_oM badzra sau me hUM/_oM badzra daN+Da hUM/_oM badzra bi kr-i ha hU~M/_rdo rje shugs kyis 
[\[74a.7\]]brgal nas ni/_/sgo ni bzhi po rnams su yang /_/rdo rje glang sna la sogs pa/_/thams cad rim pa bzhin du bri/_/de dag gi dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/oM badzra d+ha ma hU~M/_oM badzra mA la hU~M/_oM badzra ar+tha hU~M/_oM badzra a si hU~M/_rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]dkyil 'khor gsum par bri ba ni/_/ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/_/rdo rje tho ba la sogs pa'o/_/de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/oM badzra mu sa la hU~M/_/oM badzra pA ta hU~M/_oM badzra dz+wA la hU~M/_oM badzra gra ha hU~M/_rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi 
[\[74b.2\]]par bri ba ni/_/rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs bran/_/ltag 'og rim pa bzhin du'o/_/de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/oM badzra daMSh+T+rA hu~M/_oM badzra mA ra Na hU~M/_oM badzra be ga hU~M/_oM badzra ha ra Na hU~M/_rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor gzhag pa ni/_/ltag 
[\[74b.3\]]'og rim pa ji bzhin du/_/ma mo thams cad bri bar bya/_/de nas rdo rje sgo bzhir yang /_/sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/de nas rab tu bshad pa ni/_/cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin pa'o/_/de nas 'jig rten gsum po'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i las 
[\[74b.4\]]kun byas te/_rdo rje slob dpon nyid rdo rje khro bo ti rin+ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te 'di skad bsgo zhing /_ngas khyod la rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes bskyed par bya ste/_de khyod kyis su la yang ma smra shig_/mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas te dmyal bar lhung nga re zhes bsgo ste mna'i snying po 
[\[74b.5\]]'di sbyin no/_/rdo rje khro bo ti rin+ti ri'i phyag rgya yang ston cig_/gal te dam tshig las 'das na/_/rdo rje khro bo chen po yi/_/dam tshig khyod kyi rigs sreg pas/_/klad pa nas ni rtsams nas kyang /_/lus rnams ma rungs par yang byed/_/dam tshig bcing ba'o/_/de nas rdo rje 'chang 
[\[74b.6\]]ba'i las kyi phyag rgya snying po 'dis bcing ngo /_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+hA ra/_gr-ih+Na ban d+ha sa ma ya hU~M/_de nas 'di phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/_/lag gnyis bla 'og gnyis su btang /_/mthe bo mthe'u chung sbrel ba dang /_/las kyi phyag rgya dam tshig 'di/_/rdo rje bcing ba zhes kyang 
[\[74b.7\]]bshad/_/de nas rdo rje'i chus dbang bskur te/_/snying po ni 'di yin no/_/oM badzra a b+hiShe ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa badzra d+hA ra ta sa ma gra graM/_de nas g.yogs pas gdong g.yogs te/_snying po 'di gzhug go/_/oM badzra bra be sha ya/_badzra A be sha ya a d+hi tiSh+Tha badzra hU~M/_de nas bcug nas 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]snying po 'dis me tog gtor ro/_/oM pra tIts+tsha a d+hi tiSh+Tha badzra hoH/_de nas de dag gar ltung ba de 'dis 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol nas dkyil 'khor [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du bstan te/_lha gang yin pa de ni de la mi bstan to/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[75a.2\]]zhe na/_sems can log par lta bdag yod de/_gang dag ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes gdon mi za ba ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rigs su phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam zhes dad par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa ni dam tshig go/_/
[\[75a.3\]]gzhan du na lha gang dag la dad pa de dag la mna'i snying po 'di byin nas bstan par bya'o/_/de nas rdo rje'i rin po che'i mtshan ma'i phreng bas dbang bskur nas las kyi rdo rje lag pa gnyis su byin la/_rdo rje ming btags te ji ltar rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du bya'o/_/de nas 
[\[75a.4\]]phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bslab po/_/rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/_/mthe bong nang du sbyar nas ni/_/mdzub mo bkug nas gnyi gas bkab/_/sems dpa'i gtsug tor zhes bya'o/_/rdo rje bcing ba byas nas ni/_/mthe bo gung mo mthe'u chung bsgreng /_/gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ste/_/
[\[75a.5\]]gzi brjid chen po'i btsun pa'o/_/rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/_/mthe bo mthe'u chung sbrel ba ni/_/dam du lcags kyu bcings ba ste/_/rig pa chen po dam pa'i 'o/_/rig pa chen po dam pa yi/_/phyag rgya bcings nas rab bcing ba/_/snying gar mthe bo'i ngos kyis so/_/sems 
[\[75a.6\]]dpa' yi ni snying por bshad/_/de nyid las gung mo srin lag_/sor mo rab tu bsdams nas ni/_/rdo rje rin chen tshul du ni/_/bsgyur nas gdong du gzhag par bya/_/de nyid bskyed de bzhag nas ni/_/snying gar yang ni bsgyur bar bya/_/me tog bzhi pa zhes bya ste/_/pad+ma'i rig pa dam 
[\[75a.7\]]pa'o/_/de nyid spyi bo nas brtsams te/_/lus kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya/_/sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'di/_/rdo rje las ni rab bsgrub pa'o/_/sems ma'i rdo rje dam byas te/_/mthe'u chung rdo rje bsgreng ba ni/_/thams cad rig pa'i snying po 'di/_/phyag rgya 'di ni thams cad sgrub/_/mthe 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]bo mthe chung bcings nas ni/_/g.yon pa'i sor mo dbus ma gsum/_/rtse gsum pa ni dbus ma'i rtse/_/rdo rje phyag rgya gzung ba ste/_/rdo rje rig pa dam pa 'di/_/rdo rje mdung zhes bya ba'o/_/de nas rab tu bshad pa ni/_/sgyu ma rdo rje la sogs brtags/_/rdo rje bcing ba dam byas 
[\[75b.2\]]te/_/g.yon pa'i rdo rje bcing bar bya/_/rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad de/_/rdo rje'i rigs ni kun gyi 'di'o/_/rdo rje de ni gnyis byas te/_/mtshan ma kun kyang des bzhag go/_/rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad kyi/_/phyag rgya rnams kyang 'byung ba ste/_/sor brkyang steng du gzhag pa dang /_/
[\[75b.3\]]mdzub mos mthe bstan sbyar ba dang /_/oM zhes bya ba spyir bzhag nas/_/rdo rje steng du bzhag pa'o/_/rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs rnams so/_/rab tu brkyang nas lag gnas pa/_/lag pa'i rgyab tu de bzhin te/_/khu tshur bcangs bzhag lag ngar bskum/_/
[\[75b.4\]]kha yi phyogs su bskor bar bya/_/rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so/_/g.yon pa'i mthe bo steng du bzhag_/phreng ba'i bcing ba'i thabs su sbyar/_/nor sbyin par ni g.yas pa ste/_/ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur mchog_/'dus pa'i dbang po'i phyag rgya chen po 'dus pa'o/_/g.yas 
[\[75b.5\]]pa mdun du gtun [{]rings [,]ring [}]'dzin/_/lag pa brkyang ba'ang de bzhin te/_/g.yas pas 'od ni 'bar bar bstan/_/rdo rje khu tshur bskyod par bya/_/pho nya'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs so/_/bsgyings bcas mdzub mo'i khar mche ba/_/dbyug pa bsnun cing gnas pa dang /_/dpung pa bskum 
[\[75b.6\]]zhing dbyung ba dang /_/g.yas pa g.yon gyis 'dren pa'o/_/bran gyi phyag rgya'i tshogs chen po'o/_/dkyil 'khor kun du bstan pa ni/_/g.yon pas rdo rje gzur nas so/_/de nas rab tu bshad pa ni/_/sgrub pa dang ni las nyid do/_/sems dpa' gang gi phyag rgya gang /_/de ni bdag nyid 
[\[75b.7\]]nyid kyis kyang /_/bdag nyid goms par gyur na ni/_/phyag rgya dam par 'grub par 'gyur/_/gtsug tor chen po bsrung ba che/_/gzi brjid phung po rab grub ster/_/rdo rje hU~M zhes bya kun byed/_/snying gar gzhag pa thams cad 'gugs/_/sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya rnams so/_/thams 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]cad rig pa thams cad 'grub/_/rdo rje rig pa dam pa'o/_/rdo rje mdung ni phyag rgya che/_/grub pa chen po sbyin par byed/_/sgyu ma'i rdo rje rab 'grub ster/_/dril bu yis ni yang dag 'bebs/_/dbyug pa'i shing gis mya ngan 'da'/_/rdo rje'i rdo rje gsod par byed/_/
[\[76a.2\]]rig pa'i rgyal po rnams so/_/'bar ba'i mchog ni ma rungs 'dul/_/zhi ba'i mchog ni thams cad gsod/_/dbyug pa'i mchog ni gsod pa ste/_/'jigs pa'i mig ni skrag par byed/_/rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya rnams so/_/myos pas rab tu myos par byed/_/phreng ba kun ni byed par 
[\[76a.3\]]bshad/_/'dod byed dga' bar byed pa ste/_/gsod pa thams cad gsod pa'o/_/tshogs kyi phyag rgya rnams so/_/tho ba gdug pa 'joms pa ste/_/ras kyi rgyu ras de bzhin te/_/'bar ba'i mchog ni gdug pa sreg_/gnod sbyin ma ni gdon 'bod do/_/pho nya'i phyag rgya rnams 
[\[76a.4\]]so/_/rdo rje'i mche ba za ba ste/_/gsod pa thams cad gsod pa'o/_/bgegs byed ma ni rab tu bgegs/_/'phrog ma yang ni thams cad 'phrog_/bran gyi phyag rgya rnams so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las 'jig rten gsum 
[\[76a.5\]]gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di 
[\[76a.6\]]gsungs so/_/oM badzra ba si tre swA hA/_de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra d+ha ri hU~M/_badzra bi kra me hU~M phaT/_yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra rat+na go 
[\[76a.7\]]tre swA hA/_de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra pad+ma nai tre srA hA/_de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra karma ka re swA hrA/_de nas yang byang chub 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra shU lA gre swA hA/_de nas rdo rje sgyu ma rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra tsa kre hU~M/_rdo rje dril bus smras pa/_oM badzra g+haN+Da ke hU~M/_thub pa'i rdo rjes smras pa/_oM 
[\[76b.2\]]badzra dan+ta kaSh+The hU~M/_rdo rje mtshon chas smras pa/_oM badzre hU~M/_rig pa'i rgyal po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so/_/de nas rdo rje 'khyil pa rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di smras so/_/oM badzra dz+wA le hU~M/_de nas rdo rje 'od kyis smras pa/_oM badzra sau me hU~M/_de nas rdo rje dbyig pas 
[\[76b.3\]]smras pa/_oM badzra daN+De hU~M/_rdo rje ser smug gis smras pa/_oM badzra biShA Ni hU~M/_rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so/_/de nas rdo rje glang snas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya smras pa/_oM badzra me de hU~M/_rdo rje phreng bas smras pa/_oM badzra mA le hUM/_rdo rje dbang gis smras pa/_oM badzra a b+hi She hUM/_
[\[76b.4\]]rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rjes smras pa/_oM badzra a pa rA dzi ta hU~M/_tshogs kyi bdag po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so/_/de nas rdo rje gtun [{]rings kyis [,]ring gis [}]rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams smras pa/_oM badzra mu sa la gra he hU~M/_de nas rdo rje rlung gis smras pa/_oM badzra bA te hU~M/_rdo rje mes smras 
[\[76b.5\]]pa/_oM badzra dz+wA le hU~M/_rdo rje 'jigs pas smras pa/_oM badzra gra he hU~M/_rdo rje pho nya'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so/_/de nas rdo rje lcags kyus smras pa/_oM badzra daMSh+T+re hU~M/_rdo rje dus kyis smras pa/_oM badzra ba she hU~M/_rdo rje ngan khrid kyis smras pa/_oM badzra bi g+h+nan hU~M/_rdo rje klus smras pa/_oM 
[\[76b.6\]]badzra ha ra Ni hU~M/_rdo rje bran gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so/_/de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/grub zhi pa la byang phyogs sgo/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor srad bus bre/_/
[\[76b.7\]]de yi nang du der yang ni/_/de bzhin sgo ni shar phyogs gdod/_/de yi dbus su ci rigs par/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzhag par bya/_/'jig rten gsum las rgyal sogs pa/_/bzhi po de yi phyogs kun bzhag_/dkyil 'khor de bzhin gtso bor yang /_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya bri bar bya/_/de yi 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/rigs kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya/_/rdo rje glang sna la sogs pa/_/bzhi po de yi phyogs kun bzhag_/dkyil 'khor de bzhin gtso bor yang /_/rdo rje phyag rgya bri bar bya/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/rigs kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya/_/rdo 
[\[77a.2\]]rje glang sna la sogs pa/_/bzhi bo rnams ni sgo srungs so/_/'jigs ma dpal dang sgra dbang dang /_/dur ga g.yon pa'i grwa rnams nas/_/phyi yi grwa rnams phyag rgya ni/_/de rnams nyid ni bri bar bya/_/phyi yi dkyil 'khor rnams su ni/_/lha mo rnams ni bri bar bya/_/de nas cho ga rgyas 
[\[77a.3\]]pa'i rnams/_/ji bzhin par ni bshad par bya/_/de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byas te rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dam tshig gi las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i cho ga bzhin du bcings la khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba su'i mdun du yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya 
[\[77a.4\]]de rnams ma smra shig_/gsang ba 'phel bar ma byed cig ces bsgo shig_/de nas las kyi rdo rje de rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i steng du bzhag ste cho ga bzhin du chug cig_/zhugs nas rdo rje de de bzhin du 'or cig_/gang la bab pa de de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dbang du 'gyur te/_des las thams 
[\[77a.5\]]cad byed do/_/de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol nas dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bstan te/_dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba smros shig_/dam tshig phyag rgya 'di khyod kyi/_/rtag tu las kun byed pa ste/_/ma dang sring mo rnams dang ni/_/chung ma bu mo 'dra ba'o/_/de la de'i snying po ni 'di dag yin no/_/
[\[77a.6\]]oM sarba ga ma ni sarba bA k+t+re swa d+ha ya gu h+ya badzri Ni hU~M phaT/_'di lan cig bzlas pas bud med thams cad dbang du byas te spyad na chos ma yin par mi 'gyur ro/_/ci dga' thams cad spyad nas bsgrub par bya ste/_de nas sems can thams cad dag par phyag rgya thams cad yid kyis shes nas las 
[\[77a.7\]]dam pa thams cad kyang byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas gsungs so/_/de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o/_/dam tshig khro bo mdzub gtsug dang /_/snying gar yang ni bsdam par bya/_/ngos kyi mdzod spu kha nas drang /_/spyi bor bzhag nas gnyis su bya/_/g.yon 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo yis/_/mdung rtse rtse gsum mnan par bya'o/_/'di bcings pas ni yang dag par/_/rig pa dam pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad kyi/_/g.yon pa'i rdo rje gtso bor 'dus/_/dam tshig cho ga ji bzhin par/_/phyag rgya bcing ba bshad 
[\[77b.2\]]par bya/_/thams cad 'khor lo mdzub rtse bcum/_/dril bu phyag rgya'ang de bzhin no/_/de bzhin oM gyi phyag rgya dang /_/seng ge'i rna bar bya ba ste/_/rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya rnams so/_/'bar ba kun du 'dzin pa dang /_/'od ni yang dag 'dus pa nyid/_/dbyug pa'i khu tshur 'dzin pa 
[\[77b.3\]]dang /_/kha 'gram phyag rgya bskor ba'o/_/khro bo'i dam tshig rnams so/_/btung ba'i phyag rgya phreng ba dang /_/rdo rje mnan nas mdud pa yin/_/spyi bor bzhag pa tshogs kyi ste/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni bsrung ba'o/_/tshogs rnams kyi ni dam tshig go/_/lag pa bskum pa khar gzhag ste/_/
[\[77b.4\]]rgyab tu yang ni bskor bar bya/_/'bar ba me stag gtong ba ste/_/phye nas khar yang gnas par bya/_/pho nya mo'i dam tshig rnams so/_/mtha' ma gnyis ni khar bcug dang /_/btsir cing rab tu gnon pa'o/_/dpung pas bsnol bas bsnol ba dang /_/myur du 'phrogs pa'ang de bzhin no/_/
[\[77b.5\]]bran mo rnams kyi dam tshig go/_/rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[77b.6\]]chos kyi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra bid/_de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/_/oM ha na ha na badzra hU~M phaT/_de nas yang rdo rje snying 
[\[77b.7\]]pos rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/_/oM ha ra ha ra hU~M phaT/_de nas yang rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/_/oM ma ra ma ra hU~M phaT/_de nas yang rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/_/oM ku ru ku ru hUM phaT/_de nas rdo rje rig pa dam 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]pas rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/_/oM hU~M hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje sgyu mas smras pa/_oM ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/_oM A bi sha A bi sha hU~M phaT/_oM b+hUr bu ba swaHhU~M phaT/_oM b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha hU~M phaT/_rig pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi'o/_/oM da ma da ma hU~M phaT/_oM mA ra ya mA ra ya hU~M 
[\[78a.2\]]phaT/_oM g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya hU~M phaT/_oM b+ha ya b+ha ya hUM phaT/_khro bo rnams kyi'o/_/oM da ma da ma hU~M phaT/_oM ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/_oM ba shAM b+ha ba hU~M phaT/_oM dza ya dza ya hU~M phaT/_tshogs rnams kyi'o/_/oM b+h+yo b+h+yo hU~M phaT/_oM g+hu g+hu hU~M phaT/_oM dz+wA la dz+wA la hU~M phaT/_oM khA da khA da hU~M phaT/_pho nya rnams kyi'o/_
[\[78a.3\]]oM kha na kha na hU~M phaT/_oM ma ra ma ra hU~M phaT/_oM gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hU~M phaT/_oM pi b+ha pi b+ha hU~M phaT/_bran mo rnams kyi'o/_/de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor te/_/'jig 
[\[78a.4\]]rten gsum gyi 'khor lo bzhin/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs/_/thams cad snyoms par zhugs pa'o/_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul lta bu/_/snying gar mtshan ma yang dag bzhag_/de nas 'di'i chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga 
[\[78a.5\]]bzhin du las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu bcings pa bcings te 'di skad smros shig_/khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba dang /_lha'i rigs ma mthong ba su la yang ma smra shig ces bsgo ba la dril bu dkrol du chug cig_/'di skad bsgos nas kyang mna'i snying po byin la/_ji ltar dril 
[\[78a.6\]]bu 'di dkrol ba'i/_/de yi sgra des ji lta ba/_/de bzhin las kyi rdo rje khyod/_/de bzhin nges par ma rungs byed/_/rdo rje slob dpon bsti stang med/_/rdo rje grogs dang mi mdza' dang /_/gdug la byams dang skyo bar ni/_/gal te khyod kyis byas na'o/_/de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan te/_chos 
[\[78a.7\]]kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes slobs shig_/sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs/_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin no/_/thams cad mnyam pa nyid bsam pa/_/rdo rje rig pa dam pa skye/_/'gro ba 'di dag sgyu ma bzhin/_/de bzhin sdug bsngal dril bu 'dra/_/sdug bsngal thams cad mya ngan 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]'da'/_/rdo rje 'joms pa bla na med/_/rig pa'i rgyal po ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/sems can gdul phyir khro bo'i mchog_/zhi ba yis ni nges par gsod/_/dbyug ba 'dra la 'tshog par byed/_/log par lta ba 'jigs par byed/_/khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/ra ro 'dra bar 
[\[78b.2\]]dpa' ba med/_/phreng ba 'dra bar 'ching ba med/_/bud med 'dod pas 'gro dbang byed/_/brten pa tsam gyis gzhan pham mo/_/tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/'tshog pa'i chad pa'i mchog yin te/_/reg pa rnams ni rlung gi'o/_/gzi brjid can ni byin za mchog_/zas rnams 
[\[78b.3\]]kyi nang khrag dam pa/_/pho nya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/mche bdag par zhugs pa ste/_/'chi bdag thams cad gnas na 'dug_/'jigs las lhag pa'i bgegs gzhan med/_/chu las lhag pa'i ro gzhan med/_/bran gyi ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[78b.4\]]thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig las 'byung ba rdo rje'i 
[\[78b.5\]]byin gyis brlab po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra karma pra brta ni sa ma ye hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra bi lA se pU dzA ya 
[\[78b.6\]]hU~M/_/de nas rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM ab+hi She ke a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/_de nas rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra gI te gA hi hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi rig pa 'di gsungs pa/_/oM 
[\[78b.7\]]badzra nr-i t+ya nr-i t+ya hU~M/_de nas rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra ba d+yot+ta mne tra bi ku rab bi kur ba hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje khro bo rdo rje me'i lha mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras pa/_oM badzra kro d+ha badzra a g+ne dz+wA la tri shU lan+bi na hr-i da ya badzri Ni hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje gser lha 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/_/oM badzra he ma ts+tshin+da tsakre Na badzri Ni hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje gzhon nu mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/_/oM badzra ku mA ri shI g+h+raM A be sha ya g+haN+TA shap+de na badzra bA Ni pri ye badzra sa ma ye ma nu smar Na hU~M phaT/_de nas lha mo chen mo rdo 
[\[79a.2\]]rje zhi bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/_/oM badzra shAn+ti dza pa dza pa a g+ha mA la ya sarbA na mar ya shAn+ta tri h+ya hU~M phaT/_de nas lha mo chen po rdo rje khu tshur gyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/_/oM badzra muSh+Ti ha na ha na badzra b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha bi Da ya bi Da ya sarba duSh+Ta hr-i da yA ni oM sam+b+ha ni sum+b+ha 
[\[79a.3\]]hU~M hU~M phaT/_rig pa'i rgyal mo rnams kyi'o/_/de nas rdo rje mi 'ching ba khro bos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/_/oM badzra a mr-i te sarba duSh+Ta gr-i h+Na ban+d+ha ha na sarba bi d+h+waM sa ye/_bi nA sha ya ts+tshin+da ba bi ku ru mut+ta ni/_ta ya badzre Na ye ke tsit+ma ma mu ka ra bin yA ka tan+ta ma dIp+ta kro d+ha badzri hU~M phaT/_de nas 
[\[79a.4\]]rdo rje mdangs can gyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/_/oM badzra kan+ti mA ra ya sau me ru pe pra ti ba ta rA ge na shI g+h+raM s+pho Ta ya badzra d+ha ra t+ye na ma hA dz+yo sna kA ra le shi ta ra smi badzri Ni hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje dbyug pa'i mchog mas rang gi las kyi snying po 'di smras pa/_oM badzra daN+DA gri g+hA ta ya hU~M phaT/_de nas 
[\[79a.5\]]rdo rje tsong tsong khro bo chen mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/_/oM badzra mA le me kha le kha na kha na sha pa ba de ni ba shiM ku ru traM daMSh+T+rA mA ra ya bi sha ne hU~M phaT/_khro bo'i rig pa rnams so/_/de nas rdo rje 'jums rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/_oM badzra ba la ye me ts+tshin+da si ni b+hin+da badzri Ni mA ra ya 
[\[79a.6\]]u ma da ya pi ba pi ba hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje zas kyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/_oM badzra a sha ne ba krA ya sarba duSh+Ta badzra da sha ne sha ga ti d+ha ra Ni ma nu sha ma na se A ha re Na ra ru ti sa shud tsi pri ya ma dza ba sA nu le ba na bi le pa ta gra tre/_a na ya sarba dan+t+ya n+ya ya hi ra N+ya su bar+Na A di ni gra ma ya de 
[\[79a.7\]]b.rak+Sha Ni hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje bgo bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/_oM badzra bA sa ne A na ya sarba sra an+na ba Na di n+yu ba ka ra Na ni shI g+h+raM ba shiM ku ru dI pa de me pra yats+tsha A bi sha sa d+yaM ka ta ya badzra ko Sha d+ha ra NI hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje dbang gis rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras so/_/oM badzra 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]ba shi A na ya ba shaM ku ru sarba bri ya sarba pu ru Sha na da si ku ru kru d+daM pra se da ya sarba b+h+yaHba ha re b+h+yo ha ra ya bi tsa ra ya ka ri badzra pa ta ka d+hA ra NI hU~M phaT/_rdo rje tshogs kyi'o/_/de nas rdo rje pho nya mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras so/_/oM badzra duSh+Te A na ya sarba maN+Da laM pra be sha ya A be sha ya ban+d+ha ya sarba 
[\[79b.2\]]karma Na me ku ru shI g+h+raM shI g+h+raM la gu la gu tra sa ya mA ra ya/_da bya ba re b+ho d+ha ra ya bi dza yaM ka ri badzra ba ta kad+h+ra ra NI hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje shugs kyis rang gi dam tshig smras pa/_oM be g+ha badzri Na g+hu g+hu g+hu g+hu sha ba de mA ra ya bi g+hi ra bi d+haM sa ya badzra bA sha d+hA ra NI hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje 'bar bas rang gi las kyi 
[\[79b.3\]]dam tshig smras pa/_oM badzra dz+wA la dz+wA la ya sarba badzra dz+wA la ya dz+wA la ya da ha da ha ba smiM ku ru hUM phaT/_de nas rdo rje 'jigs pas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/_oM badzra bi ga te pra be ka daMSh+TA karA li ka rA la bi sha na bA ka tre shI g+h+raM shI g+h+raM A be sha ya b+ha k+Sha ya ru d+hi raM pi pa ma hA yak+Shi Ni badzra pA sha d+hA ra NI hU~M 
[\[79b.4\]]phaT/_rdo rje pho nya mo rnams kyi'o/_/de nas rdo rje'i bzhin rdo rje bran mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras so/_/oM badzra muSh+Ti A na ya badzra diSh+Ti ba ya ni ke ba tA la ni bsi ni kha na kha na khA hi khA hi sarba mu khe pra be sha ya s+pho Ta ya mA ra mA ra Ni sarba duSh+Ta nAM badzri Ni shi ta si d+hA ri NI hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje du sems rang 
[\[79b.5\]]gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/_oM badzra kA li ma hA pre ta rU pi Ni ma nu Sha mAM sa ru d+hi ra pri ye i h+ye hi gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_b+ha k+Sha ya badzra dA ki nI badzra shr-iM kha le sarba de ba gaN mA tri b+hu te ha ra ha ra prA NAM/_a mu ka s+ya ka pA la mA lA laM kr-i ta sarba ka ye kiny+tsi rA ya si badzra kha T+wAM gaN+hA ri NI pre ta ma nuSha sha rI re shI g+h+raM A be 
[\[79b.6\]]sha ya pra be sha ya ban+d+ha ya ba shi ku ru mA ra ya badzra rak+Sha si hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje ral mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/_/oM badzra pU ta me ma nu Sha ya man sa sarba ru d+hi ra mu tra pu rI Sha sha le smrA shI g+h+raM na re ka to gar+b+ta hir N+yayA hI shrI g+h+raM i dam mu ka s+ya ku ru badzra sho d+ha ni kad+hA ra NI sarba karma Ni me ku 
[\[79b.7\]]ru swA hA/_hU~M/_de nas rdo rje ma ka ras rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/_oM badzra ma ka re gra sa gra sa shI g+h+raM pra be sha ya pA tA laM b+ha k+Sha ya badzra ma ka ra d+hA ra NI hU~M phaT/_rdo rje bran mo rnams kyi'o/_/de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/_/de nas rab 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]tu bshad bya ba/_/las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/_/dkyil 'khor mchog ni thams cad du/_/sangs rgyas dbus na bzhugs par bya/_/de dag phyogs su rim par yang /_/sems dpa' 
[\[80a.2\]]chen po rnams bzhag go/_/de yi dbus su chung mar bcas/_/rdo rje rig pa dam pa nyid/_/rdo rje lA s+ye la sogs gsang /_/gar gyi mchod kha sogs pas mchod/_/de la lha mo'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin/_/'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin du/_/rang gi phyag rgya phyag rgya 'dra/_/gang 
[\[80a.3\]]byed par yang bri bar bya/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje can mchod phyir/_/rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis so/_/grwa dang sgo yi phyogs rnams su/_/bdug pa la sogs rim pa bzhin/_/de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi dam tshig gi phyag 
[\[80a.4\]]rgya ji lta ba bzhin bcings te 'di skad smros shig_/khyod kyis lha'i rim pa ma mthong ba dang las mi shes pa su la yang gsang ba'i las 'di ma smra shig_/khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes smros shig_/rdo rje slob dpon rang gi las kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te khro 
[\[80a.5\]]bo'i lta bas blta zhing 'di skad brjod do/_/oM badzra twa r+ya A be sha ya pra be sha ya nr-i te ba ya sarba karma sid+d+hi mi pra yats+tsha hUM AHhUM a la la la la badzri/_de nas yang bdag la babs nas bdag nyid kyis 'jug ste phyag rgya dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyi gar gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o/_/phyin 
[\[80a.6\]]chad lus dang /_ngag dang /_lta ba dang /_yid dang /_rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyis las thams cad 'dod pa bzhin byed pa'o/_/de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te/_gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes slobs shig_/sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyi/_/dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas 
[\[80a.7\]]te/_/rdo rje rig pa dam pa la/_/rdo rje lA s+ye la sogs mchod/_/rig pa 'di rnams thams cad kyang /_/ltag 'og [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin du/_/gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/las kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya/_/rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis ni/_/phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus 
[\[80b\]]
