[\[80b.1\]]so/_/dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas nas/_/las kyi phyag rgya bkrol bar bya/_/gar gyi mchod pa 'di yis ni/_/gtso bo thams cad mchod na ni/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa che sogs kyi/_/las grub par yang nges par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs 
[\[80b.2\]]thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i rigs de dag thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don du bskos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu bzhag ste mkhyen bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[80b.3\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gsang ba thams cad 'dzin par dbang bskur na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba de gang lags/_bka' stsol cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 
[\[80b.4\]]par zhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'di gsungs so/_/sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/_/ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba/_/de lta de ltar sems can don/_/'dod chags la sogs gtsang bas bya/_/de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje gsang ba 'di gsungs 
[\[80b.5\]]so/_/sems can thams cad phan phyir dang /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa'i phyir/_/sems can thams cad bsad kyang ni/_/sdig gis gos bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi nor bu gsang ba 'di gsungs so/_/sems can thams cad 
[\[80b.6\]]phan phyir dang /_/sangs rgyas don du sbyor ba yis/_/pha rol nor rnams phrogs kyang ni/_/sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi pad+ma'i gsang ba 'di gsungs so/_/'dod chags 'dra ba'i bde ba med/_/rgyal ba la ni de phul la/_/gzhan gyi chung 
[\[80b.7\]]ma sems can phyir/_/bsten pas bsod nams thob par 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi gsang ba 'di gsungs so/_/sems can thams cad phan phyir dang /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa'i phyir/_/las rnams thams cad byas pa yis/_/
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]bsod nams shin tu mang po rnyed/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba la legs so zhes bstod pa/_legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/_/rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/_/rdo rje 
[\[81a.2\]]chos khyod legs pa ste/_/rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/_/mdo 'di legs par smras pa ste/_/rdo rje theg pa bla na med/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang /_/theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las de bzhin gshegs 
[\[81a.3\]]pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs sto//_//bam po drug pa/_de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi bdag po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang 
[\[81a.4\]]po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab pa/_pad+mo'i sems dpa' pad+mo che/_/'jig rten dbang phyug dbang phyug che/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang bstan pa'i mchog_/rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos kyi rgyal po dag pa che/_/sems kyi rgyal po blo gros che/_/pad+ma'i 
[\[81a.5\]]bdag nyid pad+ma che/_/pad+ma'i mgon khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/pad+ma las byung pad bzang 'od/_/pad+mo dag par rab dag byed/_/rdo rje pad+ma pad mchog lus/_/pad+ma pad+ma khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sna tshogs chen po snang ba che/_/dogs pa chen po che dang mtshungs/_/brtan pa chen po dpa' ba che/_/
[\[81a.6\]]dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can bsam pa theg pa che/_/rnal 'byor chen po mes po che/_/bde za bde byed dag pa'i don/_/sangs rgyas pad+ma khyod phyag 'tshal/_/chos de nyid don dam pa'i chos/_/dag pa'i chos ni chos rab 'dzin/_/chos chen po dang chos bzang mchog_/
[\[81a.7\]]chos kyi 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sangs rgyas sems dpa' sems bzang mchog_/chos kyi sems dpa' chos mchog 'dzin/_/sems dpa' dam pa sems mchog 'dzin/_/sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po mchog_/
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]mgon po chen po rnam gzigs pa/_/'jig rten snang ba 'jig rten don/_/'jig rten mgon po khyod phyag 'tshal/_/'jig rten yi ge yi ge che/_/yi ge mchog ni yi ge 'dra/_/yi ge yi ge thams cad gzigs/_/'khor lo'i yi ge khyod phyag 'tshal/_/phyag na pad+ma phyag 
[\[81b.2\]]chen po/_/dbugs 'byin pa ni sbyin pa po/_/sangs rgyas chos ni sangs rgyas che/_/sangs rgyas bdag nyid khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzugs chen po/_/rdo rje'i gzugs ni gzugs bzang 'chang /_/chos kyi snang ba gzi brjid mchog_/'jig rten snang khyod 
[\[81b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/pad+ma'i dpal ni mgon po mchog_/chos dpal mgon po mgon ldan pa/_/tshangs pa'i mgon po tshangs chen po/_/tshangs sras khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/snang ba'i snang mchog snang ba'i gtso/_/snang gsal shin tu snang ba bo/_/snang ba'i mgon po snang ba 
[\[81b.4\]]che/_/sangs rgyas snang khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dbang bskur sangs rgyas mchog_/sangs rgyas sras po mkhas chen po/_/sangs rgyas dbang bskur gtsug gi mchog_/sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sangs rgyas spyan ni spyan chen po/_/chos spyan gzigs 
[\[81b.5\]]pa chen po yi/_/ting 'dzin ye shes thams cad pa/_/rdo rje spyan khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag nyid kun gyi yon tan 'di/_/khyod ni mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad rnams/_/bstod nas goms par byed pa na/_/'jig rten dbang po thob par 'gyur/_/dpa' bo khyod la gsol btab pa/_/rang 
[\[81b.6\]]gi rigs rnams bskyed nas kyang /_/chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni/_/thub pa chen pos bshad par gsol/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[81b.7\]]'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der mngon du phyogs te 'dug nas rdo rje pad+ma de rang gi thugs kar bzhag ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o/_/rab tu dag pa bdag gi rdo rje pad+ma 'di/_/pha yin 'di ni bdag gi bu/_/rigs 'di byin gyis brlab par mdzod/_/
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i byin gyi brlabs pad+mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs 
[\[82a.2\]]pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /_hrIH/_de nas de byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas pad+ma lta bu'i 'od zer kha dog dang gzugs dang rtags dang /_spyod lam dang /_'od rnam pa du ma byung ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dod chags la 
[\[82a.3\]]sogs pa rnam par dag pa dang /_chos nyid kyi ye shes yang dag par sbyangs nas yang slar log ste 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i thugs kar zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya bas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs 
[\[82a.4\]]so/_/oM badzra pad+mo d+ta ma hrIH/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra bid+yA hUM phaT/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra rat+not+ta ma tI/_de nas 
[\[82a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra bi d+yot+ta ma hrIH/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra bid+yot+ta ma aH/_de nas byang chub sems 
[\[82a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gzugs thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra hUM hrIHho/_de nas smras ma thag tu 
[\[82a.7\]]'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i gzugs 'dzin pa pad+ma la zhugs te/_/phyag rgya'i mtshan ma pad+mo 'dzin pa'i kha dog dang /_/gzugs dang /_cha lugs dang /_/rgyan sna tshogs pa de bzhin 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]de gshegs pa la sogs pa sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs 'dzin pa/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i lus su gyur nas byung ste/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad ji ltar 'dul ba ra so so'i gzugs su bstan nas ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i sems 
[\[82b.2\]]can gyi khams gdul bar byas te/_yang slar log nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i phyogs thams cad kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la 'khod nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas 
[\[82b.3\]]thams cad kyi/_/thabs ni snying rje bdag nyid de/_/gang du thabs kyis 'dul mdzad na/_/lha rnams su yang 'gyur ba yin/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos rang gi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[82b.4\]]pa thams cad la sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /_don dang /_grub pa dam pa dang /_rdo rje chos nyid kyi ye shes dang /_mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir phul nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do/_/de nas rab 
[\[82b.5\]]tu bshad bya ba/_/dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/_/rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/_/'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ste/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhes ni brgyan pa dang /_/srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste/_/dar dang phreng bas brgyan pa dang /_/dkyil 'khor grwa ni thams cad 
[\[82b.6\]]dang /_/sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/_/rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan par/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor srad bu bre/_/de yi nang du srad bu ni/_/gru bzhi par ni bri bar bya/_/gnyis pa'i grwa ni sgo gdod cing /_/pad+ma 'dra bar bya ba yin/_/ka ba brgyad kyi tshul du ni/_/pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa 
[\[82b.7\]]bri/_/de yi ge sar dbus su ni/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gzugs bzhag_/de la sangs rgyas gzhag pa'i snying po ni 'di yin no/_/bud+d+ha hU~M/_sangs rgyas phyogs kun bri ba ni/_/pad+ma'i dbus su gnas pa yi/_/rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang /_/sna tshogs pad+ma 'ang de bzhin no/_/de la de rnams kyi 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]snying po ni 'di yin no/_/oM hUM hrIHkr-i/_'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/der ni spyan ras gzigs dbang bri/_/gzugs rnams thams cad 'byin pa ste/_/de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/_/rdo rje 'gying la sogs 
[\[83a.2\]]tshul du/_/sangs rgyas la sogs sems dpa' che/_/mtshan ma pad+ma 'chang ba bri/_/de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/_/AHoM ta thA ga ta d+harma hU~M/_oM badzra pad+ma aM ku sha ko Sha d+hA ra badzra satwa hU~M phaT/_oM mA ra ya mA ra ya pad+ma ku su ma A yu d+ha d+ha ra a mo g+ha sha ra ho/_oM pad+ma sam+b+ha pad+ma 
[\[83a.3\]]hasta sA d+hu hU~M/_rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de bzhin te/_/de yi dbus su bri ba ni/_/thor tshugs dbus na'ang de bzhin gshegs/_/de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/_/khro gnyer la sogs tshul du ni/_/mtshan mar pad+ma 'chang bri ba/_/ltag 'og go 
[\[83a.4\]]rims ji bzhin bya/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_hU~M/_oM pad+ma b+h+r-i ku TI Ti Ti tra/_oM pad+ma sUr+ya dzrA la hU~M/_oM pad+ma ma Ni ke tu d+ha ra/_tsan+d+ra pra ha da la a ba lo ki te shwa ra de hi me sarba arta na shrI g+h+raM sa ma ya hU~M/_oM pad+ma aT+Ta hA sa e ka dar+sha mu ka ha ha ha ha hU~M/_rdo rje shugs kyis 
[\[83a.5\]]brgal nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor gsum pa'ang de bzhin te/_/sems dpa' chen po snyoms zhugs par/_/pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs par bri/_/de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/_/ltag 'og [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin bya/_/pad+ma la sogs tshul du ni/_/sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang 
[\[83a.6\]]bzhag_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_hrIH/_oM tA rA pad+ma a ba lo ka ya mA ma sa ma yasatA hU~M/_oM pad+ma ku mA ra pad+ma shak+ti d+ha ra khaDa ge na ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/_oM pad+ma nI la kaN+tha sha raka tsa kra ga ta pad+ma pA Ni byA g+h+ra tsar+m+ma ni ba sa ni kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta ya dz+nyo ba bA ti a dzi na r+m+ma pa tsa tsa n+tota/_d+ha 
[\[83a.7\]]ri ya nA rA ya Na rU pa d+ha re tr-i ni mu kha aT+TA T+Ta hA sa na pra be sha ya sa ma ya na/_de hi me sid+d+hi a ba lo ki te shwa ra hU~M/_oM bra h+ma pad+ma saM b+ha ba dza pa dza ba pad+ma p+ta sha hU~M/_rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'ang de bzhin te/_/der ni pad+ma zhal bzhi pa/_/pad+ma mdung rtse 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]thogs par bri/_/de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/_/rdo rje gar la sogs tshul du/_/mtshan ma pad+ma 'dzin bri ba/_/sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga bzhin/_/de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/hrIH/_oM pad+ma na rte shwa ra nA tha pU dza ya sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma sa ma ya A kar+Sha ya 
[\[83b.2\]]pra be sha ya ban+d+ha ya A be sha ya sarba karma sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha a ba lo ki te shwa ra hUM/_oM ba ya na d+ha ta da a ba lo ki te shwa ra rak+Sha ban+d+ha ya ka btse sa ma ye hU~M/_oM ma hA pra tsaN+Te bi shwa rU pa tsi ka_/pad+ma daMSh+Ta A ka rA la bi shwan badzra hr-i da ya sarba pad+ma yak+Sha khA da khA da d+hi k+d+hi k+d+hi k+d+hi ke_/oM pad+ma muSh+Ti 
[\[83b.3\]]sa ma ya s+t+waM ban+d+ha hUM phaT/_rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/grwa rnams kun du bri ba ni/_/rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs tshul/_/pad+ma sge ga mo la sogs lha/_/de dag gi ni phyag rgya 'di rnams so/_/oM pad+ma lA s+ye rA ga ya ma hA de bi rA ga ma hA pU dza sam ya hU~M/_oM pad+ma m+sha le a b+hi 
[\[83b.4\]]Shiny+tsa/_a b+hi She ka pU dzA sa ma ya hU~M/_oM pad+ma gI te gI te pU dzA sa ma ya hUM/_oM pad+ma nre t+ye nre t+ye sarba pU dza pra brtan sa ma ye hU~M/_rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su/_/pad+ma'i mchod pa la sogs bzhi/_/mchod pa'i lha mo rnams bri'o/_/
[\[83b.5\]]de la de dag gi mchod pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no/_/oM pad+ma d+dU pe pU dza sa ma ye pra hA da ya pad+ma ku la de yi te mahA ga Ni pad+ma ra ti hU~M/_oM pad+ma puSh+pe pU dzA sa ma ya pad+ma bA si ni ma hA shri ye pad+ma ku la pra ti ha ra sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ya hU~M/_oM pad+ma dI pa pU dzA sa ma ye pad+ma ku la sun ri ma hA 
[\[83b.6\]]du t+ya A lo ka badzra ba tsi na ya pad+ma sa ra swa ti hU~M/_oM pad+ma gan+d+ha pU dzA sa ma ye ma hA pad+ma ku la tsi te ku ru sarba karmA Ni me pad+ma sid+d+hi hU~M/_de nas pad+ma'i sgo bzhi po/_/kun du tshogs sogs ji bzhin du/_/ji lta ba bzhin legs bri ba/_/de dag snying po don gyis bri/_/oM ha ya grI ba ma hA pad+ma 
[\[83b.7\]]aM ku sha ya A kar+Sha ya shI g+hA sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma yaM pad+ma aM ku sha d+hA ra hU~M dzaH/_oM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha A kar+Sha ya pra be sha ya ma hA pa shu pa ti ya ma ba ru Na ku be ra brah+ma be sha d+hA ra pad+ma ku la sa ma yAM hU~M hU~M/_oM pad+ma s+pho Ta s+pho Ta ban+d+ha sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma yAM shI g+h+raM hU~M baM/_oM ShaM mu kha sa nad+ku mA ra be 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]sha d+ha ra pad+ma g+haN+Te A be sha ya sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma yAM sarba mu drAM ban+d+ha ya sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra ya ts+tsha pad+ma A pe sha aHaHaHaH/_de nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad do/_/de la dang po kho nar pad+ma'i slob dpon nyid rdo rje pad+ma 
[\[84a.2\]]dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs te/_rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du snying po 'dis las rnams bya'o/_/oM ma hA pad+ma s+pho Ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha a/_de nas de bzhin du bka' mnos nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur te/_pad+ma'i dbyibs 
[\[84a.3\]]bslabs nas rang gi pad+ma'i ming brjod la pad+ma lcags kyu la sogs pas las rnams bya'o/_/de nas chos kyi phyag rgya de dag nyid kyis sems dpa' chen po rnams bsgrub par bya'o/_/de nas dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/de nas pad+ma'i slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ste/_de las 
[\[84a.4\]]dang por pad+ma'i slob ma rnams mna'i snying po byin la 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o/_/deng ni khyod kyi snying ga na/_/pad+ma sems dpa' nyid bzhugs te/_/ji ste tshul 'di smras na ni/_/de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/_/de nas yang 'di skad du bsgo bar byas te/_gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di su la 
[\[84a.5\]]yang ma smra shig_/khyod kyis mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/_de nas snying po 'dis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/_/oM badzra pad+ma sa ma ya s+t+waM/_de nas gos dkar po bgos la dar dkar pos gdong g.yogs nas gzhug par bya ste/_
[\[84a.6\]]snying po ni 'di yin/_oM pad+ma sa ma ya hU~M/_de nas las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas pad+ma'i dbyibs lag tu sbyin no/_/oM pad+ma hasta badzra d+harma ha na pa la ya he ni/_des kyang 'di skad du pad+ma'i chos nyid ji lta bu lags zhes dri bar bya'o/_/de la yang 'di skad du brjod par bya'o/_/ji ltar pad+mo 
[\[84a.7\]]dmar po 'di/_/'dod pa'i nyes pas mi chags bzhin/_/thams cad dag par bsgoms na ni/_/de bzhin sdig pas chags mi 'gyur/_/de la chos nyid ni 'di yin no/_/de nas pad+ma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/_snying la pad+ma bris nas kyang /_/pad+ma bsgoms na snying 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]ga yi/_/pad+ma dpal yang dbang 'gyur na/_/bud med phal la smos ci dgos/_/dpral bar sangs rgyas dbyibs bris te/_/rtag tu bsgom pa byas na ni/_/bsgom pa des ni myur du yang /_/dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur/_/kha yi nang du lce steng du/_/sangs rgyas dbyibs 
[\[84b.2\]]ni rab bsgoms na/_/sgra dang lha mo bdag nyid kyi/_/rtag tu kha na gnas par 'gyur/_/gtsug tor dbus su pad+ma ni/_/snyoms par zhugs te bzhag nas kyang /_/gtsug tor pad+ma bsgoms na ni/_/mkha' la 'gro ba'ang de dbang 'gyur/_/de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/
[\[84b.3\]]oM pad+ma shre yaM b+hA Sha ya ho/_/oM pad+ma a b+hi She ka pra yats+tsha baM/_pad+ma sa ra s+thi bi sho d+ha ya hU~M/_oM pad+ma u d+ha graM ba shiM ku ru dzaH/_rtsig pa'am yang nam mkha' la'ang rung /_/pad+ma dam pa bsgoms na ni/_/'di ni sems can thams cad kyang /_/dbang du byed pa dam pa'o/_/kha 'am yang 
[\[84b.4\]]na phyogs gzhan du/_/pad+ma dam pa bsgoms nas kyang /_/gang tshe mthong ba de tshe blangs/_/ci dga' bar ni mi snang 'gyur/_/rtsig pa'am yang na nam mkha' la/_/pad+ma rgya gram bris nas ni/_/gang tshe mthong nas blangs pa yi/_/de tshe sna tshogs gzugs de 'gyur/_/mkha' 'am yang 
[\[84b.5\]]na phyogs gzhan du/_/rdo rje pad+ma bsgoms nas kyang /_/de blangs skad cig nyid kyis ni/_/pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/oM badzra dza gad ba shi dz+nyA na pad+ma A be sha ya/_oM dz+nyA ma pad+ma tiSh+Tha a sha na ba ku ru baM/_oM sa mA d+hi bi shwa pad+ma tiSh+Tha rU paM 
[\[84b.6\]]ne d+ha ra sha ya b+ha ga bAM baM/_oM sa mA d+hi badzra pad+moSh+Tha a d+hi tiSh+Tha shI g+h+raM hri/_dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang bris nas ni/_/de yi mdun du rta mgrin gyi/_/phyag rgya mchog gis 'dren par bya/_/dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du/_/spyan ras gzigs 
[\[84b.7\]]dbang bri bar bya/_/nges pa'i zhags pa phyag rgya yis/_/'gro ba thams cad des dbang byed/_/dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang bri bar bya/_/de yi mdun du pad+ma yi/_/lcags sgrog mchog gi phyag rgya bcings/_/dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]du/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang bri de yi/_/mdun du pad+ma dril bu yis/_/thams cad 'bebs pa'i dam pa'o/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/oM pad+ma A kar+Sha ya sarba ma hA sa twaM hU~M dzaH/_oM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha hU~M ho hi/_oM pad+ma s+pho Ta baM/_
[\[85a.2\]]oM pad+ma g+ha n+Ta A be sha ya sarba aH/_bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid nyid/_/pad+ma zhal bzhi sems dpar yang /_/bsgoms te de nas grub nas ni/_/skad cig gis ni gzugs ma 'gyur/_/de ltar bdag nyid bdag nyid kyis/_/rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gnas/_/pad+ma pad+ma bsgoms na 
[\[85a.3\]]ni/_/zad mi shes pa'i go 'phang 'thob/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang gtsug tor dbus/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas gzugs su ni/_/bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms gyur na/_/tshe dpag med pa'ang mnyam par 'gyur/_/sna tshogs gzugs kyis ting 'dzin gnas/_/sna tshogs 
[\[85a.4\]]gzugs kyi ting 'dzin du/_/bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di yin no/_/pad+ma bi shwa/_d+harma ka ya pad+ma/_bud+d+ha a b+hi She ka a ba lo ki te shwa ra/_de nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad kyi phyag 
[\[85a.5\]]rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/_/de la re zhig dang por ni phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes yin te/_ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing /_/pad+ma la gnas sems dpar ni/_/bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid bsgom/_/de nas de dag gi las ni 'di dag yin no/_/
[\[85a.6\]]sangs rgyas phyag rgya che bcings na/_/tshe dpag med dang mnyam par 'gyur/_/rdo rje pad+ma bcings na ni/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas dbang gis bcings na ni/_/bde bar gshegs pas de dbang bskur/_/pad+ma pad+ma'i ting 'dzin 'thob/_/sna tshogs kyis 
[\[85a.7\]]ni sna tshogs mchog_/sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'dul ba dang /_/sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur 'gyur/_/pad+ma sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/pad+ma khro bo dbang phyug dpal/_/rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gis/_/pad+ma 'dod pa'i dngos grub mchog_/sangs rgyas dbang gis 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]sangs rgyas nyid/_/rdo rje pad+ma grub mchog sbyin/_/'dod pa'i pad+ma rab 'dod ldan/_/dga' ba yis ni legs pa sbyin/_/khro gnyer gyis ni khro zhir 'gyur/_/pad+ma'i nyi ma gzi brjid mchog_/pad+ma zla bas mdzes pa che/_/bzhad pas rab bzhad grub pa 'thob/_/grol bas dngos 
[\[85b.2\]]grub mchog 'thob bo/_/pad+ma ral gris longs spyod 'thob/_/mgrin sngon gyis ni 'gugs pa che/_/gos dkar gyis ni dngos grub 'thob/_/pad+ma gar dbang gis 'grub ste/_/mi 'jigs rtag tu 'jigs pa med/_/rab gtum gyis ni ma lus 'dul/_/pad+ma khu tshur rab tu 
[\[85b.3\]]sgrub/_/sgeg mo dga' zhing phreng ba nor/_/glur blangs gar bde bdug pas tshim/_/me tog mdzes shing me mar lta/_/dris ni mchog gi drir yang 'gyur/_/rta mgrin gyis ni yang dag 'gugs/_/gdon mi za bar dbang du byed/_/pad+ma lcags sgrog bcing ba che/_/dril bus kun 
[\[85b.4\]]nas 'bebs byed do/_/de nas pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes yin te/_rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni/_/mthe bo mthe'u chung mnyam par bsgreng /_/phyag rgya 'di ni chos dam tshig_/sangs rgyas chos ni rab thob byed/_/rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni/_/mdzub 
[\[85b.5\]]mo gung mo srin lag mnyam/_/sangs rgyas rigs mchog phyag rgya de/_/sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par byed/_/rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni/_/gung mo rdo rje rab mnyam pa/_/'di ni rdo rje rigs dam pa'i/_/phyag rgya yin te rdo rje 'grub/_/de las gung mo rin chen 'dra/_/rdo rje rin chen 
[\[85b.6\]]rab 'grub byed/_/gung mo pad+ma'i tshul du byas/_/pad+ma'i dngos grub thob par byed/_/rdo rje thal mo bsdams nas ni/_/rdo rje'i las ni byed par 'gyur/_/chos kyi rdo rje bcings na ni/_/skad cig gis ni dam tshig 'grub/_/rdo rje bsdams las mdzub mnyam pas/_/sangs rgyas dngos 
[\[85b.7\]]grub thob par byed/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/sems dpa'i phyag rgya khyad par du/_/rdo rje thal mo bsdams nas kyang /_/gung mo mnyam par bsdams nas ni/_/mthe bo mthe'u chung phye ba ni/_/sna tshogs pad+mar bshad pa yin/_/de las mthe bo gnyis bsnol te/_/mdzub 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]gnyis rtse mo sprad la dgug_/dbus kyi rdo rje spyi gtsug phud/_/gtsug phud sangs rgyas yin par bshad/_/rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/_/mthe bo mnyam ste btud nas ni/_/mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse sprad dgug_/bkan nas ting nge 'dzin du bcug_/thal mo pad+mo 
[\[86a.2\]]mnyam sbyar la/_/mdzub mo rdo rjer mnyam na ni/_/mthe bo ngos la sbyar ba 'di/_/nges pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya'o/_/rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams nas ni/_/legs par bkan te bcings nas kyang /_/mthe bo gnyis ni pad+mar bsgreng /_/sangs rgyas pad+ma yin par bshad/_/mthe bo gnyis 
[\[86a.3\]]ni rdo rjer mnyam/_/mdzub mo lcags kyu ral grir bya/_/mthe'u chung gnyis ni so sor dbye/_/gung mo srin lag pad+mor bya/_/pad+ma mnyam par rab sbyar la/_/mdzub mos mdzub mo gzung nas su/_/'dren par byed pa pad+ma'i mda'/_/thal mo mnyam par sbyar nas bkan/_/legs pa'i 
[\[86a.4\]]phyag rgya bcings na ni/_/legs so zhes bya sbyin par byed/_/pad+ma'i legs pa yin par grags/_/thal mo mnyam par rab sbyar la/_/mdzub mo rtse mo mnyam ste dgug_/mthe'u chung phye nas mdzod spur bzhag_/pad+ma khro gnyer zhes bya'o/_/rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/_/sor 
[\[86a.5\]]mo thams cad dkyil 'khor du/_/snying gar rab tu brkyang ba ni/_/pad+ma'i nyi ma yin par bshad/_/thal mo rab tu dam sbyar la/_/mdzub gnyis rin chen 'dra bar bya/_/dpung pa'i spyi bor rab brgyan pa/_/pad+ma rin chen rgyal mtshan rtse'o/_/rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor bzhag_/kha dang bcas 
[\[86a.6\]]par rab brkyang nas/_/nyid kyi kha nas rgod pa dang /_/kha ni bcu gcig nyid du 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin pad+mar bcings nas ni/_/mthe bo gnyis ni so sor 'byed/_/pad+ma sgrol ba'i phyag rgya las/_/mdzub gnyis pad+ma'i tshul du dgug_/pad+ma sgrol ba'i phyag rgya 'di/_/dngos grub thams 
[\[86a.7\]]cad grub par byed/_/ral gri'i tshul du byas pa 'di/_/pad+ma'i ral gri'i phyag rgya yin/_/mthe'u chung pad+ma chen por bya/_/mthe bo gnyis de bzhin dbyug ltar bsgreng /_/mdzub mo rtse mo dung chen bya/_/gung mo srin lag 'khor lor bya/_/rdo rje thal mo dam byas la/_/g.yas pa oM 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]du nang du gzhug_/g.yon pa'i mdzub mtheb bzlas par bya/_/ser kun chu skyes kha bye 'dra/_/rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la/_/g.yon dang g.yas nas de bzhin du/_/'gying bcas gar byed bskor nas ni/_/spyi bor bzhag pa pad+ma can/_/rdo rje thal mo dam byas la/_/rtse mo thams 
[\[86b.2\]]cad kha phye ba/_/bskor te pad+ma'i snying gar ni/_/bzhag nas bstan par byed pa po/_/rdo rje thal mo dam byas la/_/gsang ba'i gnod sbyin tshul du ni/_/thal mo brkyang ste bskums nas ni/_/khar bzhag pad+ma'i gnod sbyin ma/_/rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas kyang /_/gung mo gnyis ni 
[\[86b.3\]]phyir bkug ste/_/rang gi mthe bo rgyab mnan pa/_/pad+ma'i khu tshur zhes kyang bshad/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni/_/rdo rje thal mo las byung ba/_/mchod pa'i lha mo thams cad kyi/_/dam tshig mchog rnams bcing ba'o/_/rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/_/mdzub mo gnyis 
[\[86b.4\]]ni mnyam sbyar nas/_/bkug nas rtse mo sbyar ba ni/_/rta mgrin gyi ni yin par bshad/_/pad+ma'i thal mo mnyam sbyar la/_/mdzub gnyis mdud par mdud pa na/_/nges par zhags pa'i phyag rgya yin/_/mtheb mdzub lcags sgrog 'dra bar bya/_/rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/
[\[86b.5\]]pad+ma'i thal mo mnyam sbyar la/_/srin lag mthe'u chung gnyis bar du/_/mthe bo gnyis bcug dam du btsir/_/de nas pad+ma rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/_/hrIHgr-i kr-i hi/_shr-i shi d+hi hi/_gr-i ti kr-i bi khi miSh+Ti a/_pad+ma khu tshur gnyis byas la/_/las kyi phyag rgya 
[\[86b.6\]]bsgrub par bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[86b.7\]]thams cad kyi chos kyi gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma sa ma ya hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra sa ma ye hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM ma Ni rat+na sa ma ye hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/
[\[87a.2\]]oM pad+ma sam ye hUM/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM karma sa ma ye hU~M/_de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos rang gi rigs kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs 
[\[87a.3\]]so/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/_/pad+ma'i gsang ba zhes bshad do/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/_/de dbus pad+ma'i steng du ni/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo bri/_/
[\[87a.4\]]de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/dam tshig mchog rnams snga ma bzhin/_/rang gi rig pa rnam ldan par/_/chos kyi rdo rje la sogs bri/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+ha rme shwa ri hU~M/_oM d+harma sa ma ye badzra pad+ma ni hU~M/_oM bud d+ha a b+hi She ka rat+na 
[\[87a.5\]]sa ma ye hUM/_oM tA rA sa ma ye hU~M/_oM bi shwa mu khe hU~M/_sna tshogs gzugs mchog dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/de yi dbus su pad+ma yis/_/bskor ba'i pad+ma bri bar bya/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/pad+ma'i phyag rgya gnyis gnas pa/_/pad+ma'i 
[\[87a.6\]]mtshan ma bri bar bya/_/bde gshegs nyid kyi nyid phyag rgya/_/de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no/_/hrIH/_oM pad+ma ta thA ga to/_oM pad+ma sa mat+na b+ha dre/_pad+ma badzra aM ku sho ko Sha d+hA ri NI hU~M/_oM pad+ma ra ti/_oM pad+ma duSh+Ti/_de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis par yang /_/rdo rje 
[\[87a.7\]]shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/gtsug phud chu skyes che gnas pa'i/_/sangs rgyas dbang bskur bri bar bya/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/_/pad+ma'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi/_/dam tshig mchog rnams gzhag par bya/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]rnams yin no/_/shrIH/_oM b+h+r-i ku TI be tA Di pad+me hU~M/_oM pad+me dz+wA le/_oM sau me ni pad+me ni hU~M/_oM pad+ma hA si ni e ke da sha ba ka tre di ri di ri i aT+Te/_/baT+Te tsa le pra tsa le/_ku su ma d+ha re i le pra be sha sid+d+hi me pra ya ts+tsha hU~M/_de bzhin dkyil 'khor gsum par yang /_/rdo rje shugs kyis 
[\[87b.2\]]brgal nas kyang /_/de yi dbus su pad+ma mdzes/_/pad+ma'i phyag rgya gzhag par bya/_/de bzhin phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/ltag 'og [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin par/_/pad+ma'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi/_/pad+ma la ni gnas par bri/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin 
[\[87b.3\]]no/_/b+hi d+hIHdz+ti/_oM tA re tu t+tA re hU~M/_oM d+hi hU~M/_pad+ma tsakra shaM kha d+hA ra NI/_nI la kaN+Tha sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya hU~M/_/oM paN+Da ra pA se na pad+ma saM b+ha be ba d+ha ba d+ha hU~M/_de bzhin dkyil 'khor bzhi par ni/_/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang /_/pad+ma'i dbus su pad+ma ni/_/'bar ba'i phreng bas 
[\[87b.4\]]bskor 'od bri/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/ltag 'og [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin par/_/pad+ma'i dbus na gnas pa yi/_/pad+ma'i mtshan ma ldan par bri/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/s+t+ri/_oM pad+ma nr-i t+ye shwa ri pU dza ya sarba ta thA ga tA nAM na ta na ta hu~M/_oM a 
[\[87b.5\]]be sha ya pad+ma ka ba tsa ban d+ha ra kra ma na hUM/_ham/_oM ma hA pra tsaN+Di pad+ma yak+Shi Ni bi shwa rU pa ng+hA ra NI bi shwa pa ya sarba duSh+Ta khA da khA da hUM phaT/_oM pad+ma muSh+Ti a mu/_rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams bri ba/_/pad+ma lcags kyu la sogs rgya/_/mdor na pad+ma'i 
[\[87b.6\]]mtshan ma can/_/de nas de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so/_/oM pad+ma ra ti pU dze ho/_/oM pad+ma a b+hi She ke pU dze ra ti/_oM pad+ma gI te pU dze gi_/oM pad+ma nr-i t+ye pU dze ho/_oM pad+ma ni puSh+pa hU~M/_pad+ma ku la sun da ri/_/d+ha rma A lo ke pU dz+wa ya hU~M/_oM pad+ma gan d+he hU~M/_
[\[87b.7\]]mchod pa rnams so/_/oM pad+ma aM ku sha A kar+Sha ya ma hA pad+ma ku la na/_ha ya grI ba sa ma ye hU~M dzaH/_oM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha sa ma ye pra be sha ya sarba sa twa sa ma yaM hU~M/_oM pad+ma shwaM ka le baM/_oM pad+ma gan d+ha d+hA ri shrI g+h+raM A be sha ya/_sa ma yaM sha na mu ki a/_de nas phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas pad+ma'i slob ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin btsud de/_'di skad du khyod kyis gsang ba 'di su la yang ma smra shig_/khyod sems can dmyal bar lhung nga re/_tshe gcig tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ta re/_de nas 
[\[88a.2\]]phab nas 'di skad du khyod kyi mig lam du ci zhig snang zhes dris nas/_des ji skad du smras pa de bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/_/des gal te nam mkha' dkar bar mthong na ni de'i tshe de'i dngos grub dam pa'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/_/yang na ser po mthong na ni de nor 'grub pa'i 
[\[88a.3\]]ye shes bslab bo/_/ci ste dmar po mthong na ni rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ba'i ye shes bslab bo/_/ci ste nag po mthong na ni mngon spyod kyi ye shes bslab bo/_/ji ste sna tshogs mthong na ni dngos grub thams cad kyi ye shes bslab pa go bar shes nas ji lta ba bzhin du gdong 
[\[88a.4\]]g.yogs pa bkrol nas snod ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes bskyed de/_phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/_/de ltar rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang snod ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa ni 'di bzhin du brtag par bya'o/_/de nas dngos grub 
[\[88a.5\]]dam pa sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/_spyan ras gzigs dbang sems dpa' che/_/sna tshogs gzugs su bdag nyid kyis/_/bsgoms na phyag rgya chen po yi/_/mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas dbang gis dam tshig ni/_/mnyam par bzhag pas 
[\[88a.6\]]brtan byas te/_/bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/_/mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/pad+ma pad+ma sems dpa' che/_/bdag nyid mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms/_/bdag nyid kyis ni dam pa yi/_/dngos grub thob pa nyid du 'gyur/_/rang byung gdon mi za ba yi/_/dbang 
[\[88a.7\]]phyug las kyi phyag rgya ni/_/cho ga bzhin bsgrubs myur bar yang /_/mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/oM pad+ma satwa haM sid d+h+ya ho/_oM bud d+ha a b+hi She ka kro d+ho haM/_sid d+h+ya ho/_/oM d+ha rma sa mA d+hi ra haM sid d+ha ho/_oM a mo g+he shwa ro 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]haM/_sid d+h+ya mAM/_/de nas nor sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/_kha yi nang du dbyig bcug ste/_/sna tshogs dbang phyug phyag rgya che/_/bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni/_/gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur/_/gser srang brgyad cha blangs nas ni/_/dam tshig mchog ni rab 
[\[88b.2\]]brtan par/_/bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/_/gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur/_/mu tig 'brum bu khar bcug la/_/bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu/_/bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/_/gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur/_/las kyi phyag rgya lag gnyis 
[\[88b.3\]]kyis/_/rin chen thams cad blangs na ni/_/bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na yang /_/gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/oM pad+ma ma hA rat+na pra d+ha hU~M dza/_oM pad+ma su pra d+ha hU~M dza/_oM pad+ma mu ku Ta pra d+ha hU~M dza/_oM pad+ma sarba 
[\[88b.4\]]rat+na pra d+ha hU~M dza/_de nas rjes su dga' ba'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/_sna tshogs dbang phyug phyag rgya che/_/bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/_/pad+ma blangs te mdun gnas pa/_/gang yin des ni de mgur byed/_/dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yis/_/pad+mo dmar por dam bzung ste/_/
[\[88b.5\]]bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/_/bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/_/bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms nas kyang /_/pad+ma blangs te ji lta ba/_/rdo rje lta bas de ltar bltas/_/'jig rten thams cad des mgur 'gyur/_/las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni/_/cho ga bzhin du pad+ma 
[\[88b.6\]]gzung /_/lag pa gnyis kyis bskor na ni/_/bud med thams cad des mgur 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM bi shwe shwa ra ma hA pad+ma ho/_oM pad+ma sa ma ya pad+ma ho/_/oM yo ga pad+mo ho/_/oM pad+ma karma ho/_/sna tshogs ye shes dbang phyug che/_/bdag 
[\[88b.7\]]nyid mdun du pad+ma gtsang /_/phyag rgya pad+ma de nyid kyis/_/de yi 'chi ba skad cig go/_/pad+ma bzung nas brtan bya ba/_/cho ga legs pa ji bzhin du/_/dam tshig dam pa de nyid kyis/_/nan tan kho nar gzhig par bya/_/gang gis ming smos 'jig pa ni/_/ting 'dzin phyag rgya 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]sbyar nas su/_/ji ltar de ltar pad+ma thogs/_/las de nges par 'grub par 'gyur/_/gang gi gzhig par khros na ni/_/las kyi phyag rgya sbyar nas su/_/bskor zhing brdab par byas na ni/_/de yi 'tsho ba rdol bar 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin 
[\[89a.2\]]no/_/oM ma hA pad+ma ts+tshe da mA ra ya ho phaT/_oM sa ma ya pad+ma s+pho Ta nA sha ya ra ta phaT/_oM d+harma pad+ma ts+tshe da bi nA sha ya pra ti ya phaT/_oM karma pad+ma s+pho Ta ya dzI bi ta ma s+ya kr-i ta phaT/_de nas chos kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no/_/pad+ma la ni bud med bsam/_/
[\[89a.3\]]de steng bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgyur/_/pad+ma pad mchog rtse byed cing /_/mnyam par bzhag na dngos grub 'thob/_/pad+ma la ni bud med bsam/_/de steng bdag nyid sangs rgyas bsgyur/_/rtse zhing dbu rgyan sangs rgyas ni/_/bsgoms na des ni des 'grub bo/_/pad+ma la ni bud 
[\[89a.4\]]med bsam/_/de steng pad+mar bdag bsgyur te/_/rtse zhing pad+ma pad+ma mchog_/dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/pad+ma la ni bud med bsam/_/de steng sna tshogs bdag bsgyur te/_/rtse zhing sna tshogs pad+ma mchog_/sna tshogs dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/de dag gi snying 
[\[89a.5\]]po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM badzra pad+ma saM yo ga sA d+ha ya hrIH/_oM bud d+ha ma ku Ta saM yo ga sA d+ha ya shIH/_oM pad+ma pad+ma saM yo ga sA d+ha ya d+h+r-i/_oM bi shwa pad+ma saM yo ga sA d+ha ya s+t+ri/_de nas pad+ma rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes ji lta ba bzhin du bslab bo/_/sor mo rtse sprad 
[\[89a.6\]]pad+mar bya/_/rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub gnyis sa sprad/_/rtse gnyis nor bu'i pad+ma ltar/_/rdo rje bsdams pa'ang de bzhin te/_/rdo rje bcing ba bsdams nas kyang /_/gung mo gnyis ni myu gur bsgreng /_/mdzub mo srin lag gnyis bkug pa'i/_/phyag rgya shAkya thub pa'i brtan/_/chos 
[\[89a.7\]]kyi rdo rje snying gar gzhag_/bsgyur te dpral bar bzhag pa dang /_/ting nge 'dzin tshul pang du gzhag_/bsgyur nas spyi bor gzhag par bya/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang bcings la/_/mchod rten pad+ma'i tshul du ni/_/gung mo gnyis ni bcings gyur na/_/sangs rgyas pad+ma yin par 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]bshad/_/de las mthe bo rdo rje dang /_/mdzub gnyis ral gri lcags kyur bya/_/pad+ma rdo rje 'dzin pa de/_/gsang ba'i phyag rgya yin par bshad/_/de las mthe bo bsnol nas kyang /_/mdzub mos mdzub mo rab gzung la/_/drangs na rab dga' yin par bshad/_/legs 
[\[89b.2\]]so zhes pa'ang de bzhin te/_/rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas las/_/mthe bo gnyis bsnyams bcug nas kyang /_/mdzub gnyis rtse bkug rtse mo ni/_/dpral bzhag gung mo pad+mar bya/_/de nyid las ni snying gar yang /_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang /_/de nyid las ni rgyal 
[\[89b.3\]]mtshan bcing /_/ltag par rab tu brkyang bar bar bya/_/rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/_/mdzub gnyis rtse mo pad+mar dgug_/de bzhin pad+ma ral gri ste/_/mdzub mo pad+mar byas pas sbyar/_/rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/_/mthe bo g.yon pa nang du gzhug_/dung ste mthe bo tho 
[\[89b.4\]]bar bsgreng /_/sor mo bskum brkyang pad mthe'u chung /_/de las thams cad bcum nas kyang /_/mthe'u chung pad+ma lta bur bya/_/mthe bo g.yas la sbyar ba yi/_/mdzub mor nor bu bgrang bar bya/_/rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/_/mthe'u chung pad+ma lta bur bya/_/mdzub mo bsgreng 
[\[89b.5\]]ste gar byed pa/_/pad+ma spyan gyi yin par bshad/_/rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/_/mthe'u chung pad+ma lta bur bya/_/dam du mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste/_/mthe bo gnyis ni go char bya/_/de las mtheb gnyis mche bar bya/_/mtheb gnyis nang du gzhug par bya/_/de nas rab tu 
[\[89b.6\]]bshad bya ba/_/dam tshig mchog ni bla med de/_/rdo rje nang du bsdams nas kyang /_/mdzub gnyis pad+ma 'dra byas la/_/mthe bo phan tshun bsnol ba ni/_/gsang ba'i sna tshogs dbang du bshad/_/de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/_/mthe'u chung gung mo mnyam bsgreng la/_/mtheb mos 
[\[89b.7\]]rdo rje sbyar ba ni/_/gtsug phud dbus na de bzhin gshegs/_/de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/_/mthe bo pad+ma 'drar byas la/_/kha nas dbyung ltar byas nas kyang /_/pang du ting nge 'dzin ltar gzhag_/de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/_/sor mo kun gyi ngos rnams ni/_/mnyam par 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]dam du bsdams nas kyang /_/mdzub gnyis rdo rjer mnyam pa'o/_/de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/_/mdzub gnyis pad+ma 'drar byas la/_/mthe bo gnyis kyang bsnol nas ni/_/gung mo gnyis ni rtse sbyar bkug_/de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/_/mtheb gnyis 
[\[90a.2\]]rdo rjer rab sbyar la/_/mdzub mo ral gri lcags kyur bya/_/mthe'u chung pad+ma 'drar byas la/_/de bzhin du ni bsgyur nas kyang /_/mdzub mo g.yon pa bsgreng ba la/_/mdzub mo mthe bo rtse sbyar ba/_/dam du bzung ste dgug ltar bya/_/de la mdzub mo gnyis bkug la/_/mthe bo gnyis 
[\[90a.3\]]kyis mnan pa ni/_/pad+ma dgyes pa bdag nyid che/_/legs so zhes bya sbyin byed kyi/_/de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/_/sor mo kun gyi ngos sbyar la/_/mthe bo gnyis kyis mnan nas ni/_/mdzub mo mnyam par sbyar ba'o/_/de nyid snying gar nyi mar bya/_/spyi bor pad+ma rgyal mtshan bya/_/
[\[90a.4\]]phab ste kha yi 'gram bzhag pa/_/pad+ma cher dgod dgod pa yin/_/rdo rje nang du bsdams byas la/_/chos kyi rdo rje tshul gyis ni/_/mthe'u chung mthe bo rab bsnyams pa/_/'di ni sgrol ma'i dam tshig yin/_/de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/_/mdzub gung pad+ma ral grir bya/_/de bzhin 
[\[90a.5\]]nang du 'khor lor bya/_/zlos pa sbyin pa de bzhin no/_/de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/_/mtheb mdzub sprad de gnyis su bya/_/de nas snying gar sbyar ba ni/_/gsang ba'i bsrung ba yin par bshad/_/de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/_/mthe'u chung pad+ma 'drar byas la/_/mdzub gnyis 
[\[90a.6\]]shin du bkug nas kyang /_/mtheb gnyis phyir bskyed mche ba can/_/de las khu tshur tshul gyis ni/_/mtheb gnyis ngos kyis btsir ba yi/_/pad+ma gsang ba'i khu tshur che/_/dam tshig mchog tu rab brtag pa'o/_/pad+ma lA s+ye la sogs pa/_/de dag gzhan rnams kun gyi ni/_/rdo rje 
[\[90a.7\]]nang du bsdams byas la/_/de 'dra bar ni bcing bar bya/_/de nas pad+ma gsang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya 'di yin te/_/hrAHgrAHpAHhrAH/_shAHsAHd+hAHhrAH/_gAHd+hAHkrAHbAH/_dAHrAHSh+TAHsAH/_las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdu na khu tshur gnyis su bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las chos gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[90b.2\]]la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM d+harma sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na ta thA ga ta hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs kyi chos 'byung ba'i rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra d+harma hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[90b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM rat+na d+harma hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM d+ha rma d+ha rma hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs 
[\[90b.4\]]kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM karma d+ha rma hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos nyid kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/rdo rje 
[\[90b.5\]]dbyings dang 'dra bar ni/_/chos kyi ye shes zhes brjod do/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/_/de yi dbus su bri ba ni/_/ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/sems dpa' che rnams cho ga 
[\[90b.6\]]bzhin/_/sna tshogs dbang phyug la sogs pa/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs bri/_/de la de dag gi snying po 'di rnams so/_/oM dz+nyA na bud+d+ha hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na bi shwe shwa re hU~M/_oM dz+nyAn bud+d+ha mu ku Ta hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na d+ha rme shwa re hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na a mo g+he shwa re hU~M/_oM dz+nya na pad+ma bud+d+ha hU~M/_oM dz+wA na pad+ma badzra d+d+hA ra hUM/_oM dz+wA na 
[\[90b.7\]]pad+ma mA ra hU~M/_oM dz+wA na pad+ma duSh+Ti hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma b+h+r-i ku TI hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma sU r+ya hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma tsan+d+ra hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma hA sa hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma tA rA hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma ku mA ra hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma nA rA ya hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma hA sa hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma nr-i t+ye shwa ra hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma rak+Sha hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]yak+Sha hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma muSh+Ti hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma lA s+ye hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma mA le hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma gI d+ye hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma nr-i t+ye hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma d+hU pe hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma puSh+pe hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma dI pe hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma gan d+he hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma aM ku sha hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma a mo g+ha pA 
[\[91a.2\]]sha hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma s+pho Ta hU~M/_oM dz+nyA na pad+ma A be sha hU~M/_de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug nas 'di skad du khyod kyis gzhan su la yang ma brjod cig_/khyod sems can dmyal bar lhung nas sdug bsngal bar gyur 
[\[91a.3\]]ta re/_de nas de'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste/_'jig rten dbang phyug snyoms zhugs la/_/snying gar pad+ma bsgoms nas kyang /_/pad+ma'i ting 'dzin thob na ni/_/de ma thag tu myur bar lding /_/'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/_/dpral bar pad+ma bsgoms byas te/_/goms 
[\[91a.4\]]nas shin du brtan gyur na/_/de ma thag tu mkha' la lding /_/'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis/_/lce la pad+ma bsgoms nas kyang /_/grub par gyur na myur bar yang /_/nam mkha' la ni de 'gro'o/_/'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis/_/gtsug tu pad+ma bsgoms nas 
[\[91a.5\]]kyang /_/grub par gyur na myur du ni/_/skad cig gis ni steng du lding /_/de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM pad+ma dz+nyA na hr-i da ya A be sha_/oM pad+ma dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka A be sha_/oM pad+ma dz+nyA na bi d+yot+ta ma A be sha_/oM pad+ma dz+nyA na u Sh+NI Sha A be sha_/nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/_/
[\[91a.6\]]pad+ma'i dbyibs shig bsgoms nas kyang /_/cho ga 'di ni 'grub 'gyur na/_/skad cig gis ni mi snang 'gyur/_/nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/_/pad+ma'i dbyibs shig bsgoms nas kyang /_/de yi steng du bdag 'dug par/_/bsgoms par gyur na mi snang 'gyur/_/nam 
[\[91a.7\]]mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/_/pad+ma'i dbyibs shig bsgoms byas la/_/gang tshe mthong ba de tshe blangs/_/mi snang bar ni myur du 'gyur/_/nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/_/pad+ma'i dbyibs ni bsgoms byas la/_/mthong ba'i pad+ma de zos na/_/de ma thag tu mi 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]snang 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM pad+ma A kaR+Sha/_oM pad+ma tha/_oM pad+ma dz+nyA na gra hA na/_oM pad+ma ra sa ya na hU~M phaT/_phyag rgya che bcings pad+ma ni/_/kha dog dbyibs rnams sna tshogs pa'i/_/dbyibs de lag pas bzung na ni/_/gzugs rnams thams 
[\[91b.2\]]cad 'chang bar 'gyur/_/pad+ma'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni/_/sna tshogs pad+ma'i dbyibs bris la/_/de nyid bsgoms pa byas na ni/_/gzugs mang 'chang bar de 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/_/pad+ma'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni/_/sna tshogs dbyibs su bsgoms na 
[\[91b.3\]]yang /_/sgra yi gzugs su de 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni/_/sna tshogs dbyibs su byas nas kyang /_/de la zhon nas mkha' 'gro zhing /_/ci dga'i gzugs su nges par 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM pad+ma d+ha ri bi shwa rU pa pra brta ya A 
[\[91b.4\]]be sha_/oM bi shwa pad+ma pra brta ya mAM/_oM sa mA d+hi bi shwa pad+ma A be sha_/oM bi shwa pad+ma ma noT+Thi pa A ka sha bi shwa rU paM a d+hi tiSh+Tha mAM/_gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya che/_/ting nge 'dzin gyis legs bcings la/_/pad+ma blangs te rab byin na/_/gdon mi za bar dbang du 'gyur/_/gang yang rung ba'i dam 
[\[91b.5\]]tshig gi/_/phyag rgya zhes bya bcings na ni/_/des ni pad+ma blangs nas kyang /_/byin par gyur na dbang du 'gyur/_/ting nge 'dzin skyes dge ba yi/_/phyag rgya gang yang rung bcings la/_/ye shes pad+ma gang byin pa/_/de ni de yis myur bar 'gyur/_/gang yang rung ba'i dam tshig ldan/_/las kyi phyag rgya 
[\[91b.6\]]bcings nas ni/_/pad+ma byin pa gang yin pa/_/de ma thag tu de dbang 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM mahA dz+nyA na pad+ma ho/_/oM sa ma ya pad+ma ho/_/oM dz+nyA na pad+ma ho/_/oM karma pad+ma ho/_/de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab bo/_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul 
[\[91b.7\]]du ni/_/phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/dam tshig mchog ni bsgrub bya ste/_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/_/pad+ma'i pad+ma gzhag par bya/_/chos kyi khu tshur brtan byas la/_/las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]kyi dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi las kyi dam tshig 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[92a.2\]]'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma kr-i hU~M/_de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs kyi las 'byung ba rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM hU~M d+hi/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di 
[\[92a.3\]]gsungs so/_/oM rat+na karma sa ma ye hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM pad+ma karme hUM/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM bi shwa karme hUM/_de nas byang chub sems 
[\[92a.4\]]dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos nyid kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba ni/_/pad+ma'i las zhes bya ba ste/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/_/dkyil 'khor thams 
[\[92a.5\]]cad srad bus bre/_/sangs rgyas phyogs kun pad+ma yi/_/mtshan ma 'dzin par thams cad bri/_/de la de dag gi rig pa'i snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM pu ri Ni hUM/_bi shwa karme shwa ri hUM/_oM ta thA ga te shwa ra a b+hi She ka karma pid+yA hUM/_oM d+harma karme shwa ra dz+nyA na pU dzA sa ma ye hUM/_oM a 
[\[92a.6\]]mo g+ha karme shwa ri hUM/_oM pad+ma karma bud d+he hUM/_oM pad+ma karma badzri Ni hu~M/_oM pad+ma karmi Ni mA ra Na pU dzA karma sa ma ye hUM/_oM pad+ma karma duSh+Ti hUM/_oM pad+ma karma b+h+r-i ku Ti hUM tra/_oM pad+ma karma sUr+ye hUM/_oM pad+ma karma d+h+wa dze hUM/_oM pad+ma karma hA sa hu~M/_oM pad+ma karma tA re hUM/_oM pad+ma karma ku mA ri hUM/_
[\[92a.7\]]oM pad+ma karma nA rA ya ni hUM/_oM pad+ma karma brad+mi hUM/_oM pad+ma karma nr-i te shwa ri hUM/_oM pad+ma rak+Sha rak+Sha karma sam ye hUM/_oM ma hA pra tsaN+Da gI ti ni pad+ma daMSh+T+rA karma ka ri hUM/_oM pad+ma karma muSh+Ti ga tA ya hUM/_oM ra ti pU dze hUM dzaH/_oM a b+hi She ka pU dze hUM dza/_oM gI te pU dze hUM d+ha/_oM nr-i t+ye pU dze hUM baM/_
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]oM d+hu pe pU dze hU~M aH/_oM puSh+pe pU dze hU~M tra/_oM A lo ke pU dze hU~M d+hiH/_oM gan d+he pU dze hU~M baM/_oM ha ya grwi ba A na ya hU~M dza/_oM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha pI Da ya hU~M phaT/_oM pad+ma shAM ka la ban d+he hU~M phaT/_oM pad+ma g+han d+ha A be sha ye hU~M phaT/_de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug 
[\[92b.2\]]pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste/_'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis tshul 'di su la yang ma smra shig_/sems can dmyal bar lhung bar gyur ta re zhes bsgos shig_/de nas ye shes bskyed par bya'o/_/de nas sdig pa bshags pa'i 
[\[92b.3\]]ye shes bslab par bya ste/_'jig rten dbang phyug phyag rgya cher/_/shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms nas kyang /_/sdig rnams bshags pas myur bar ni/_/sdig pa kun las de 'dag 'gyur/_/'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis/_/dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings te/_/
[\[92b.4\]]sdig pa thams cad bshags na ni/_/mtshams med lnga las 'byang bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten dbang phyug ting 'dzin du/_/shin tu mnyam par gzhag bsgoms la/_/sdig pa thams cad bshags na ni/_/sdig pa kun yang rab tu 'joms/_/mdor na gang yang rung ba yi/_/las kyi 
[\[92b.5\]]phyag rgya legs bcings la/_/las rnams thams cad bshags na ni/_/las rnams kun las rnam par 'dag_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/oM sarba pA paM saM sho d+ha na ma hA pad+ma/_oM sarba A nan+ta t+ya sho d+han sa ma ya pad+ma/_oM sarba pA paM pra Na sha Na d+ha rma pad+ma/_
[\[92b.6\]]oM sarba pad+ma A bar Na bi sho d+ha ka karma pad+ma/_de nas sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ba'i ye shes bslab bo/_/'jig rten dbang gi phyag rgya cher/_/shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms byas la/_/shud d+h+ya shud d+h+ya zhes brjod na/_/las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur/_/
[\[92b.7\]]'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis/_/las kyi dam tshig bcings na ni/_/bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya zhes brjod na/_/las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur/_/'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/_/chos kyi phyag rgyar bsgoms nas ni/_/d+hi d+hi d+hi d+hi zhes brjod na/_/las rnams kun 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]las dag par 'gyur/_/'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang /_/hI hI hI hI zhes brjod na/_/las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM pA paM k+Sha ya pad+ma/_oM A bar Na k+Sha 
[\[93a.2\]]ya pad+ma/_oM karma k+Sha ya pad+ma/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i ye shes bslab bo/_/'jig rten dbang gi phyag rgya cher/_/rab tu mnyam par gzhag bcings la/_/oM oM oM oM zhes brjod na/_/mchod pa thams cad rab tu byed/_/'jig rten dbang 
[\[93a.3\]]po'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang /_/b+hu b+hu b+hu b+hu zhes brjod na/_/sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur/_/'jig rten dbang pos snyoms zhugs la/_/chos kyi pad+ma bsgoms nas kyang /_/he he he he zhes brjod na/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[93a.4\]]des mchod 'gyur/_/pad+ma'i las kyi phyag rgya ni/_/shin tu mnyam par gzhag bcings la/_/d+he d+he d+he d+he zhes brjod na/_/sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM kA ra pad+ma/_oM b+hU kA ra pad+ma/_oM he kA ra pad+ma/_oM d+he kA 
[\[93a.5\]]ra pad+ma/_oM ni bar Na k+Sha ya pad+ma/_de nas dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab bo/_/'jig rten dbang po phyag rgya cher/_/mnyam par bzhag pas bcings nas ni/_/hrI hrI hrI hrI zhes brjod na/_/'jig rten dbang por grub par 'gyur/_/'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/dam 
[\[93a.6\]]tshig ces bya bcings nas kyang /_/shrI shrI shrI shrI zhes brjod na/_/dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/_/'jig rten dbang po'i mnyam gzhag par/_/mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang /_/d+hig d+hig d+hig d+hig zhes brjod na/_/pad+ma khro bor 'grub par 'gyur/_/pad+ma chen 
[\[93a.7\]]po dge ba yi/_/las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang /_/s+si s+si s+si s+si zhes brjod na/_/dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM hrIHsid+h+ya/_oM shrI sid+h+ya/_oM d+h+r-i ka sid d+ha/_oM si sid d+h+ya/_de nas las gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]ni 'di yin te/_'jig rten dbang po snyoms zhugs la/_/bud med kun dang rtse byed cing /_/a ho su kha zhes brjod na/_/sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur/_/'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/_/bud med kun dang rtse byed cing /_/pri ya pri ya zhes brjod na/_/
[\[93b.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dgyes so/_/'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/_/bud med kun dang rtse byed cing /_/a ho ra ti zhes brjod na/_/de ni rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/_/bud med kun dang rtse byed cing /_/su kha su kha 
[\[93b.3\]]zhes brjod na/_/de yi bde ba nyams mi 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM sarba bud+d+ha pU dza pra brta na pad+ma/_oM prI ti kA ra pad+ma/_oM ra ti pra brta na pad+ma/_oM ma hA su kha pad+ma dr-i D+ha hUM/_de nas las kyi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bslab par bya ste/_de nas pad+ma thal 
[\[93b.4\]]sbyar te/_/dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje dgongs/_/las kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/_/gnas rnams kun du gzhag par bya/_de nas pad+ma rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya ni dra zhes bya ba brjod par bya/_las kyi phyag rgya gnyis byas la/_/las kyi phyag rgya des bsgrub bo/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[93b.5\]]pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs sto//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag 
[\[93b.6\]]rgya'i snying po 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzri d+harma pad+ma hU~M/_de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra dz+hi/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra rat+na mu ku Ti hUM/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi 
[\[93b.7\]]phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/_/oM d+harma pad+ma d+hi/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba mu khe hUM/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]gsungs so/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/phyag rgya bzhi mchog dkyil 'khor te/_/rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba dang /_/dkyil 'khor chen por 'dra bar bya/_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzhag par bya/_/de yi phyogs rnams 
[\[94a.2\]]thams cad du/_/rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bri/_/de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/_ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste/_'di skad du 'di khyod kyis su la yang ma brjod cig_/khyod rtag tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba dang /_mi bde ba ma spangs pas 
[\[94a.3\]]dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar lhung nga re zhes bsgo zhig_/de nas de'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste/_lag pas pad+ma bzung nas kyang /_/bsgrims te legs par bsdam par bya/_/dri de sangs rgyas rnams mchod na/_/myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/mnyam par bzhag 
[\[94a.4\]]pas gtsug phud dbus/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bzhag la/_/'gro zhing rdo rje 'gying bstan na/_/'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed/_/pad+ma pad+ma chen po'i gzugs/_/ting nge 'dzin 'dug ji lta bzhin/_/yid kyis su ni de bsad do/_/gang du phog pa de rgyas pa'i/_/sa 
[\[94a.5\]]sogs pa yi las byed do/_/pad+ma pad+ma chen po'i gzugs/_/pad+ma rgya gram nyid du ni/_/byas te lag pas bzung nas kyang /_/bskor nas dbab la sogs de byed/_/de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM badzra rat+na hUM/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta A sha pa ri pU ra Na ma hA rat+na hUM/_oM badzra 
[\[94a.6\]]hU~M tra/_oM gan d+ha pU dzA gri sA d+ha ya hrIH/_oM pad+ma mu ku Ta ta thA ga ta ba shaM ku ru sarbA na lo ke shwa ra a b+hi She ka sa ma ya ho/_oM pad+ma pad+ma mA ra ya sarba dra t+yar+thi kan sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na d+h+r-ika_/oM bi shwa pad+ma sarba karma kA ro b+hA ba la li lu la la li hUM phaT/_de nas phyag rgya gsang ba'i ye shes bslab bo/_/
[\[94a.7\]]chags nas dgos pa thams cad ni/_/bsgrub par bya ste dam tshig 'di/_/bsgrub par dka' ba'i phyag rgya yang /_/rnal 'byor gyis ni myur du 'grub/_/de la 'di'i dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di yin no/_/oM sA d+ha ya pad+ma rA ga sam ya a/_de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]chen po thams cad bslab par bya'o/_/phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs sto//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba 
[\[94b.2\]]dza gat+pi nA ya ma hA satwa a/_A gats+tsha shI g+h+raM bi shwa rU paM san d+hA rA ya ma me tsa sarba sid+hA ya pra yats+tsha hrIH/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/
[\[94b.3\]]'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor te/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/_/phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/de yi nang du pad+ma yang /_/de bzhin du ni bri bar bya/_/der ni 'dab ma kun khyab pa'i/_/sna tshogs gzugs ni bri bar bya/_/de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji lta 
[\[94b.4\]]ba bzhin du btsud nas/_de bzhin du bsgo ste 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes bslab bo/_/'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i/_/dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas kyang /_/phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni/_/sna tshogs 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i 
[\[94b.5\]]gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/_/sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin du/_/mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang /_/dbang po gnyis ni sbyar bar bya/_/dkyil 'khor de ni de grub bo/_/de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya bcing ba rnams bslab par bya'o/_/dngos grub rnams kyang 
[\[94b.6\]]de bzhin no/_/de bzhin du ras la sogs pa la yang bya'o phyag rgya gzhan rnams kyang phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du phyag rgya la sogs pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la 
[\[94b.7\]]legs so zhes bya ba byin pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang /_/theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa/_/rdo rje theg pa bla med kyi/_mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa/_/legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/_/rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/_/rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/_/de 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig las rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po dum bu gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//bam po bdun pa/_de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig 
[\[95a.2\]]tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i rin po che rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab bo/_/nam mkha'i snying po sems can don/_/sems dpa' chen po gzi chen po/_/
[\[95a.3\]]rin chen che ba'i rin chen mchog_/rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal/_/dbang bskur sbyin pa rin chen che/_/dag pa che zhing dge ba che/_/sangs rgyas rin chen rnam dag sku/_/rin chen rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal/_/nam mkha' nam mkha' las byung ba/_/nam mkha' kun gyi 'od che ba/_/
[\[95a.4\]]nam mkha'i dbyings kyi phyogs kun gyi/_/re kun mchog ni khyod phyag 'tshal/_/rin chen mdzod spu rin chen 'byung /_/sangs rgyas mdzod spu bde gshegs rab/_/rin chen thams cad rab kun mchog_/rin chen dgos pa khyod phyag 'tshal/_/rin chen rin mchog rin chen drag_/
[\[95a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa kun rin chen/_/rin chen dam pa nam mkha' che/_/mkha' mnyam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyan yin pas ni mdzes pa che/_/mdzes par snang zhing rab mdzes mdzad/_/don kun dag cing dag pa'i don/_/sbyin spyod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos rin chen 
[\[95a.6\]]ni rnam dge mchog_/dge 'dun rin chen de bzhin gshegs/_/dbang bskur chen po 'jig rten don/_/don sbyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sbyin par rab sbyin sbyin pa'i mchog_/gtong zhing gtong mchog sbyin mdzad pa/_/sems can kun don de nyid don/_/don chen don ni khyod 
[\[95a.7\]]phyag 'tshal/_/bsam pa'i rgyal po gzi brjid che/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems dpa' che/_/sangs rgyas kun te khyod phyag 'tshal/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen che/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od che ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]chen po/_/bzhad chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur mchog_/dbang chen khyab pa chen po ste/_/'jig rten mgon rab 'jig rten mchog_/'jig rten nyi ma khyod phyag 'tshal/_/rin chen phul te rab kyi mchog_/rin chen rgyan te rin chen 
[\[95b.2\]]mdzod/_/rin chen snang bas snang ba che/_/rin chen grags pa khyod phyag 'tshal/_/rin chen phung po rin chen 'byung /_/nor bu rdo rje nor yon tan/_/rin chen 'byung bskur ba 'bar/_/rin chen sku ste khyod phyag 'tshal/_/che nyid shing ste rin chen dbang /_/re ba thams cad skong mdzad 
[\[95b.3\]]pa/_/bsam pa thams cad legs par mnyes/_/rin chen phung po khyod phyag 'tshal/_/'od mchog khyab pa'i bdag nyid kun/_/mchog rab sbyin zhing mchog che ba/_/phun sum thams cad 'byor pa'o/_/rdo rje snying po bdag phyag 'tshal/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad zhi ba 'di/_/
[\[95b.4\]]su yang rung bas 'chang byed na/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba/_/skad cig tu ni sdig med 'thob/_/rin chen khyod la gsol ba ni/_/nor 'dus ba ni bshad par mdzod/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang gi mchog_/nges pa'i rigs ni bskyed par mdzod/_/de nas byang 
[\[95b.5\]]chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' 'di thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra rat+na hU~M/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[95b.6\]]thams cad kyi nor bu'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta A sha pa ri pU ra Na ma hA ra t+na hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra hU~M tra/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[95b.7\]]chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM ma Ni hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM pad+ma hrIH/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]gsungs so/_/oM bi shwa rat+na hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/_de bzhin 
[\[96a.2\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje nor bu rin po che lta bu 'od zer rnams byung nas de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te/_sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas yang gcig tu gyur te bcom ldan 'das 
[\[96a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs kar zhugs so/_/de nas nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kun nas 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje dang /_nor bu dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi dbang bskur la sogs pa'i bkod pa dang /_rgyan gyis 
[\[96a.4\]]brgyan pa'i sku rdo rje'i nor bu'i rin po che'i phyag rgya'i mtshan ma phyag na bsnams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i sku rnams su gyur te byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rin po che chen po'i char 'bab pa la sogs pa nor bskyang ba rnams kyis sems can rnams mgu bar byas nas 
[\[96a.5\]]yang slar byon nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs thams cad du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/rin chen thams cad bsdus pa ni/_/
[\[96a.6\]]rdo rje rin chen rigs nyid du/_/'gro ba'i don du 'di gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di phul te don thams cad grub pa zhes bya 
[\[96a.7\]]ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/_/rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/_/thams cad grub pa zhes bshad pa/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhis ni brgyan pa ste/_/srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa la/_/dar dang phreng ba 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]lda ldis brgyan/_/dkyil 'khor chen po grwa rnams dang /_/sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su/_/rdo rje rin chen spras par ni/_/phyi yi dkyil 'khor srad bus bre/_/de yi nang du rdo rje yi/_/rin chen las byung gnas bya zhing /_/ka ba brgyad kyi tshul du ni/_/rin chen sna tshogs 'od 'bar 
[\[96b.2\]]ba'i/_/dkyil 'khor lngar ni brgyan gyur par/_/der ni srad bu bre bar bya/_/rang gi phyag rgyas bskor ba yi/_/der ni sangs rgyas gzhag par bya/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM bud+d+ha rat+na hU~M/_oM badzra ma Ni hU~M/_oM badzra rat+na aM ku ru hU~M/_oM badzra rat+na pad+ma hU~M/_
[\[96b.3\]]oM badzra rat+na par+Sha hU~M/_re ba kun grub dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang /_/rdo rje snying po der gnas shing /_/rin chen mchog ni sbyin par bri/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/ltag 'og [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin du/_/rin chen phyag rgyar ldan pa yi/_/sems dpa' 
[\[96b.4\]]chen po rnams bri'o/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM sarba ar+tha sid+d+hi pra da hU~M/_oM badzra ma Ni tsin+d+h+ya ha na A kA sha gar+b+ha b+ha ga bA na sing d+h+ya sid d+h+ya hU~M/_oM rat+na aM ku sha A kar+Sha ya sarba ar+thA na sa ma ya shI g+h+raM/_sarba ta thA ga ta satwa ma nu sma ra hU~M/_oM ti rA ga ba shi ku ru sarba na k+Sha shagar+b+ha hU~M/_
[\[96b.5\]]oM rat+na duSh+Ti hU~M/_rin chen phreng ba'i dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/rin chen phreng ba 'dzin pa'i mchog_/nges pa'i dbus su legs par bri/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/ltag 'og [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin par/_/nor bu'i mtshan rnams lag thogs pa'i/_/sems 
[\[96b.6\]]dpa' chen po rnams bri'o/_/de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/_/oM rat+na tiSh+Tha tra/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka rat+na mA le hUM/_oM ra t+na ma Ni sUr+ye hU~M/_oM tsan+d+ra ma Ni d+h+wa dza sarbA shA pa ri pU ra A kA sha gar+b+ha hU~M/_oM rat+nAT+Ta hA sa hA sa hU~M/_rin chen pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/
[\[96b.7\]]rin chen pad+ma 'dzin khyab pa/_/de dbus gnas par bri bar bya/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/ltag 'og [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin par/_/nor bu mtshan ma 'chang ba yi/_/sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM rat+na pad+ma hU~M/_oM he gas 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]mA d+hi dz+nyA na gar+b+ha hU~M/_oM rat+na ko Sha gra hU~M/_oM ma Ni tsa kra pra r+t+tA ya hU~M/_oM rat+na ba shI hU~M/_rin chen char 'bebs dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/rin chen char ni rab 'bebs pa'i/_/sems dpa' chen po der yang bri/_/de yi phyogs 
[\[97a.2\]]rnams thams cad du/_/mdor na lag na phyag rgya yang /_/rin chen mtshan mar ldan pa yi/_/sems dpa' che rnams cho ga bzhin/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM rat+na br-iSh+Ti bar+Sha ya sarba brta sam+b+ha d+ha b+ha ga bAn ma Ni hasta hU~M/_oM ma Ni pU dza sa ma ya hU~M/_oM ma Ni ban d+ha ka ba 
[\[97a.3\]]tsa hU~M/_oM ma Ni daMSh+Ta ka rA la ma hA yak+Sha ha ra ha ra sarbA r+thAn ti sha ya hUM/_oM ma Ni rat+na ban d+ha sa ma ya hU~M/_rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du/_/ltag 'og [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin par/_/rin chen lA s+ye la sogs bri/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams 
[\[97a.4\]]so/_/oM rat+na ra ti hU~M/_oM rat+na mA le hU~M/_oM rat+na gI ti hU~M/_oM rat+na nr-i t+ye hU~M/_phyi yi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/_/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su/_/bdug pa'i mchod pa la sogs bri/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM rat+na d+hU pe rat+ne/_
[\[97a.5\]]oM puSh+pe ma Ni/_oM rat+na A lo ke/_oM ma Ni gan d+he/_sgo rnams bzhi yi dbus su ni/_/sgo ba rnams ni gzhag par bya/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM sarba rat+na A kar+Sha a ru Na ma hA sa hA b+ha ga bA na twaM A kA sha gar+b+haM tso dA ya A kar+Sha ya shI g+h+raM ho dza/_oM sarba rat+na pra be sha ya/_
[\[97a.6\]]sa ma ya pra be sha ya sa ma ya ma hA ma Ni rA dzA ku laM rat+na pA sha hU~M/_oM ma Ni ba na d+ha hU~M baM/_oM ma Ni rat+na A be sha a/_de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir nor bu rin po che'i slob dpon nyid ji lta ba bzhin zhugs te cho ga rgyas pa bdag nyid kyis byas la/_de nas rin po che sa byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum 
[\[97a.7\]]pa gang ba'i chus nor bu'i slob ma dbang bskur te/_rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do/_/oM badzra ma Ni rata sa ma ya baM/_de nas kha dog ji lta bu rnyed pa'i bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te de dang 'dra bas mig g.yogs la snying po 'di brjod du bcug ste gzhug 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]par bya'o/_/oM hU~M ma Ni rA dza ku laM/_de nas da ltar bcug nas 'di skad du khyod kyis 'di su la yang ma brjod cig_/khyod tshe rabs thams cad dbul por gyur ta re/_sdug bsngal las mi thar bar gyur ta re/_sems can dmyal bar yun ring por gnas par gyur ta re zhes bsgo la 
[\[97b.2\]]dam tshig gnyis su bya'o/_/theg pa chen po mngon par 'dus pa yang brjod par bya'o/_/de nas bsam pa dang gter chen po gang na yod/_ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhes rdo rje'i tshig gis dri bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i 
[\[97b.3\]]snying pos thams cad smrar stsol cig ces smras ma thag tu gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dam tshig kyang bstan te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la thug gi bar du dkyil 'khor chen po bstan par bya'o/_/de nas ci 'byor pas 
[\[97b.4\]]mchod pa byas nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/_/de nas ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/_rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya che/_/shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bcings/_/gter brkos nas ni gang dag na/_/gter yod pa ni de mthong 'gyur/_/dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings la/_/gang 
[\[97b.5\]]na gter rnams yod gyur pa/_/der ni phyag rgya btsir na ni/_/de tshe bdag nyid 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin du/_/shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni/_/gang na gter rnams yod pa yang /_/yid kyis shes pa nyid du 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/las 
[\[97b.6\]]kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/_/gang du phyag rgya babs gyur na/_/de na gter yod shes par bya/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM ma hA ma Ni rat+na A bi sha hU~M/_oM ma Ni piN+Da pa ri sha ya hU~M/_oM rat+na sa mA d+hi brU hi/_oM rat+na A bi sha dar+Sha ya hU~M/_phyag rgya chen por bsgoms na 
[\[97b.7\]]ni/_/gang du lus ni khor gyur pa/_/de na rin chen gter yod par/_/dam tshig nyid kyis shes par bya/_/dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang /_/gang du babs nas gnyis gyur pa/_/de ni rin chen chen po yi/_/gter yod par ni shes par bya/_/ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]ni/_/gang la babs pa bdag nyid kyis/_/rin chen chen po bdag nyid kyis/_/gter ni gang na yod par smra/_/las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang /_/gang tshe lag gnyis phan tshun du/_/babs nas dam tshig bcings gyur pa/_/de ni gter ni yod par bshad/_/
[\[98a.2\]]de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM ma hA rat+na kA ya dar+sha ya rat+na/_oM A kA sha gar+b+ha ma Ni rat+na/_oM s+pho Ta s+pho Ta ya tra ni d+hi/_oM ma Ni rat+na dz+nyA na swa yaM brU hi/_oM bu na sa ma ya ban d+ha dar+Sha ya swA hA/_phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni/_/de bzhin gang du dogs gyur pa/_/de ni rin 
[\[98a.3\]]chen 'byung ba yi/_/gter yod ye shes shes par bya/_/gang du dogs yod der yang ni/_/dam tshig mchog ni mchog bcings la/_/gang tshe nyid ni grol gyur pa/_/de na gter ni yod par bshad/_/ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni/_/gang du nges par dogs gyur pa/_/de na nges par gter 
[\[98a.4\]]yod par/_/ye shes bskyed de shes par bya/_/gang na yang dang yang dogs pa/_/las kyi phyag rgya cho ga bzhin/_/der bcings de ni gnyis gyur pa/_/gter yod par ni shes par bya/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM ni d+hi dz+nyA na A bi sha/_oM rat+na sa ma ya muny+tsa ni d+hi ban+d+haM/_
[\[98a.5\]]oM d+harma rat+na bru he ni d+hi naM/_oM sarba karma ni s+pho Ta ya dar+sha ya ni d+hiHban d+ho dA k+Shi pa/_phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas ni/_/gter rnams kun du btsal nas kyang /_/gang na gnas pa der babs na/_/de na gter ni yod par bshad/_/dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang /_/gter rnams 
[\[98a.6\]]kun du btsal nas ni/_/gang na gnas pa brtag gyur pa/_/de na gter ni yod par bshad/_/ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni/_/gter rnams kun du btsal nas kyang /_/gang na yod par rtag tu shes/_/de na gter ni yod par bshad/_/las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/_/gter 
[\[98a.7\]]rnams kun du btsal nas kyang /_/gang na yod par las phyag rgya/_/bskor ba de na yod par bshad/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM rat+na pa rak+Shi A be sha_/oM rat+na sa ma ya hr-i da dar+Sha ya/_/oM rat+na par k+Shi dz+nyA na A be sha_/oM ma Ni karma brah+mA ya/_de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]ye shes bslab par bya'o/_/dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/_/gter rnams kun du tshol byed cing /_/phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni/_/babs par gyur na gter rnyed do/_/dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang /_/bud med dang ni rtse byed cing /_/gang du phyag rgya dam gyur pa/_/de na gter 
[\[98b.2\]]ni yod par bshad/_/dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar na/_/gter rnams kun du tshol byed cing /_/ye shes phyag rgya bsgoms nas ni/_/gter gyi ye shes 'jug par 'gyur/_/dbang po gnyis kyi ting 'dzin gyis/_/las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/_/gang du phyag rgya gnyis gyur pa/_/
[\[98b.3\]]de na gter ni yod par bshad/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM ma hA ma Ni saM yo ga be sha/_oM sa ma ya saM yo ga_/dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/_oM di ni dz+nya na A be sha saM yo ga_/oM sarba karma saM s+pho Ta saM yo ga_/de nas nor bu'i rigs chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes thams cad bslab bo/_/
[\[98b.4\]]de nas phyag rgya chen po 'di yin te/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/ji lta ba yi ri mo bzhin/_/phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni/_/don gyi mchog kun 'grub par 'gyur/_/de nas phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi las ni 'di rnams yin no/_/sangs rgyas phyag rgya sangs rgyas nyid/_/
[\[98b.5\]]rdo rje snying pos gnyis rab 'grub/_/rin chen lcags kyus kun spyan 'dren/_/nor bu dga' bas rjes dgar byed/_/nor bu mgu bas dgyes par byed/_/nor bu lta bas nor thob bo/_/nor bu phreng bas dbang bskur zhing /_/nor bu nyi mas gzi brjid mchog_/yid bzhin nor bus ji dgar 
[\[98b.6\]]sbyin/_/rin chen bzhad pas nor thob 'gyur/_/rin chen chos kyis chos kyang thob/_/gtong ba'i dpal gyis dam pa rnyed/_/rin chen ral gris mtshon chen po/_/rin chen 'khor los dbang por 'gyur/_/smra bas btsal ba'i dngos grub 'thob/_/rin chen char gyis nor chen po/_/nor 
[\[98b.7\]]bu'i mchod pas rab mchod nyid/_/rin chen chos kyis brtan par byed/_/rin chen mche bas nor thob bo/_/khu tshur nor bus dngos grub 'thob/_/de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no/_/rdo rje rin chen phyag rgyas ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]bskur 'thob/_/rdo rje nor bu che bcings nas/_/rdo rje rin chen grub par 'gyur/_/rdo rje gnyis las nor bur byas/_/rdo rje 'dzin las nor 'thob bo/_/de nyid mthe bo rdo rje yis/_/nor bu sbyar te snying gar gzhag_/mdzub gnyis pad+ma'i nor bur bcings/_/'jig rten dbang 
[\[99a.2\]]gis nor byin 'gyur/_/rdo rje las nor sna tshogs kyi/_/nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan sbyin/_/rdo rje dbyings mdzub nor bu yis/_/sangs rgyas rin chen nyid 'thob bo/_/mdzub mo bsnyams te phyir bkug la/_/mthe bo rdo rjer bcings pa yi/_/rdo rje snying po'i phyag las byung /_/'di ni 
[\[99a.3\]]rdo rje'i nor bur gsungs/_/'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang /_/rdo rje'i nor bu chen po 'thob/_/mdzub gnyis rin chen 'drar bcings la/_/gung mo myu gur bsgreng ba ste/_/'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang /_/rang gi dbang bskur thob par 'gyur/_/de nas gung mo srin lag dang /_/
[\[99a.4\]]mthe'u chung rnams ni pad+mar bya/_/'dis ni kun du spyan ras gzigs/_/mtshan 'dzin pas ni nor sbyin 'gyur/_/mdzub mo mthe bo mthe'u chung rnams/_/rdo rje rin chen tshul du bya/_/gung mo gnyis kyi sen mo sbyar/_/srin lag myu gu 'dra bar bsgreng /_/rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas 
[\[99a.5\]]la/_/mdzub gnyis nor bur byas nas kyang /_/mtheb gnyis brkyang ba'i ngos snying gi/_/don kun grub pa sbyin par byed/_/rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams nas kyang /_/gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya/_/nor bu mtshan gyi phyag rgya 'di/_/nor bu chen po rab sbyin no/_/de nyid las ni mdzub 
[\[99a.6\]]mo gnyis/_/lcags kyu'i tshul du byas pa ni/_/don kun dgug pa'i phyag rgya ste/_/nor bu rin chen lcags kyur bshad/_/de nyid las ni bsgyur nas kyang /_/mdzub mos mdzub mo bzung nas ni/_/mda' 'phang ba yi tshul byas la/_/drangs nas 'gro ba dga' bar byed/_/de nyid las ni 
[\[99a.7\]]mdzub mthe ba gnyis/_/sbyar ba legs so zhes bya ba'o/_/de nas mtheb gnyis sbyar ba yis/_/mdzub gnyis rtse mo sbyar ba dang /_/mthe bo gnyis ni dbus sbyar la/_/mdzub gnyis ngos dang sbyar ba ni/_/nor bu lta bar bshad pa ste/_/lta ba'i don rnams 'phrog byed pa'o/_/don kun grub 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]ba'i phreng ba ni/_/rang gi dbang ni rab sbyin 'gyur/_/de nyid snying gar mthe bo gnyis/_/bsgreng ste ngos kyis sbyar ba ni/_/nor bu nyi ma'i snying gar gzhag_/gzi brjid chen po rab sbyin 'gyur/_/srin lag bsnyams te bsgreng nas ni/_/phye ste spyi bor gzhag par bya/_/rdo rje nor bu 
[\[99b.2\]]chen po gtso/_/re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o/_/de nyid las ni 'gying byed cing /_/kha 'gram rgod par bskor ba ste/_/rin chen char rgod zhes bya ba/_/bzhad pas don rnams thams cad 'grub/_/ting nge 'dzin du sor mo bsgom/_/nor bu pad+ma nor 'chang ba'i/_/de nas mtha' nas 
[\[99b.3\]]grol ba ni/_/sbyin pa chen po rab sbyin byed/_/mthe bo gnyis ni nang du dgug_/mdzub gnyis nor bur byas pa ni/_/nor bu ral gri yin te mthus/_/'gro ba rnams kyi nor 'phrog pa'o/_/rdo rje bsdams las 'khor lor bya/_/mtheb gnyis nang du bcug nas kyang /_/mdzub gnyis nor 
[\[99b.4\]]bu 'drar byas pa/_/'khor los sgyur ba thob par byed/_/de nyid thal mo'i tshul du byas/_/kha nas 'dren par byas pa ni/_/de bcings nas ni ngag gis kyang /_/rang gi bkas ni nor 'phrog 'gyur/_/rdo rje nor bu che bcings la/_/rin chen char ni rab 'bebs te/_/sor mo thams cad 
[\[99b.5\]]bsgreng ba ni/_/phyogs bzhi nas ni nor char 'bebs/_/rdo rje nor bu che bcings la/_/gar byas gtsug phud dbus bzhag nas/_/kun la cho ga bzhin mchod na/_/rin chen kun gyis de mchod 'gyur/_/don kun grub pa'i phyag rgyas ni/_/mgrin pa'i phyogs su 'khyud par bya/_/
