[\[99b.6\]]nor bu bcings pa zhes bya ste/_/bsrung ba yi ni cho gar grags/_/don kun grub pa de nyid las/_/gnod sbyin tshul du khar bzhag pa/_/nor bu mche ba zhes bya ste/_/'jig byed don kun 'phrog byed pa'i/_/rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas la/_/mdzub bkug mthe bo gnyis kyis ni/_/legs 
[\[99b.7\]]par mnan te btsir ba ni/_/nor bu'i khu tshur dngos grub 'thob/_/dam tshig rnams kyi mchod mchog rnams/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul du ni/_/ji bzhin nor bu ldan pa la/_/'di ni dam tshig mchog tu brtags/_/gung mo nor bu'i tshul du bya/_/de dag nyid la rnam par brtags/_/lcags 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]kyu gcig sogs tshul gyis ni/_/las rnams thams cad rab 'grub byed/_/de nas nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no/_/hraHgraHtriHhrIHshrIHiHriHd+h+riHdiHd+hIHgriHbiHriHDaHyaHaH/_rin chen phyag rgya gnyis byas la/_/las kyi phyag rgya 
[\[100a.2\]]bri bar bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po las don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i 
[\[100a.3\]]gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra rat+na d+hU pe hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/_/oM 
[\[100a.4\]]badzra ab+hi She ka mA le a b+hi Shi ny+tsa sa ma ye hU~M/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/_/oM rat+na a b+hi She ka hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra d+ha rma a 
[\[100a.5\]]d+hiShe ka hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka pU dza sa ma ye hU~M/_de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi 
[\[100a.6\]]dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/_/rin chen gsang ba zhes bshad de/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/_/de yi dbus 
[\[100a.7\]]su tshul bzhin du/_/sangs rgyas phyag rgya bri bya ste/_/khri la gnas pa'i nor bu'i gtso/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi mdun du ni/_/nor bu'i phreng ba pad+ma'i nor/_/nor bus bskor ba'i nor bu'i rnams/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM tra/_oM ma Ni sa ma ye hU~M/_oM ma Ni rat+na a b+hi She 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]kamA le hU~M/_oM ma Ni rat+na pad+ma hU~M/_oM ma Ni rat+na pr-i ti sa ma ye hU~M/_thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/rdo rje rin chen dbus su ni/_/rdo rje nor bu chen po bri/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/ltag 'og [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin par/_/rang 
[\[100b.2\]]gi phyag rgya nor bur ldan/_/rin chen slob dpon nyid kyis bri/_/de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so/_/oM sarba ar+tha sid+d+hi pra be sha ma hA badzri rat+na sa ma ye ma Ni sarba ar+thA na me sA d+ha ya d+hA ra NI hU~M/_oM ma Ni rat+na A kaR+Sha ye swA hA/_oM ma Ni rat+na sa ma ye aM ku sha ma Ni ku lany+dza/_oM ma Ni rA 
[\[100b.3\]]ga sa ma ye hU~M/_oM ma Ni sA d+hu hU~M/_de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis par yang /_/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/spyan gnyis dang ni ldan pa yin/_/nor bu de yi dbus su bri/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/ltag 'og [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin par/_/nor bu'i mtshan mar ldan 
[\[100b.4\]]pa yi/_/rang gi phyag rgya rnams bri'o/_/de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di dag go_/oM badzra ma Ni rat+na ne tra A na ya ba shi ku ru sarba ar+tha sam+b+ha ba dA na shI g+h+raM tiSh+Tha aM ku shi hU~M/_oM ma Ni rat+na rat+na mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/_oM ma Ni rat+na sUr+ye dz+wA la ya sarba ma hA rA dzi ni hU~M/_oM ma Ni tsan+d+ra d+h+wa dzA gri hU~M/_oM 
[\[100b.5\]]ma Ni hA se hA sa hU~M/_rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/_/nor bu pad+ma bri bar bya/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/ltag 'og [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin bya/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM ma Ni sa mA d+hi pad+me ni hU~M/_oM ma Ni rat+nA d+ya gra sa ma ya hU~M/_oM ma Ni sa ma ya ko She hU~M/_
[\[100b.6\]]oM ma Ni sa ma ya tsakra hU~M/_oM ma Ni b+hA ShA gri hU~M/_dkyil 'khor bzhi pa dam par ni/_/rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang /_/rdo rje rin chen ldan pa yi/_/rin chen char 'bebs der gnas shing /_/las kyi phyag rgya ji bzhin pas/_/yongs su bskor bar bri bar bya/_/nor bu'i mtshan 
[\[100b.7\]]mar ldan pa rnams/_/ltag 'og [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin bya/_/de nas de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so/_/oM rat+na br-iSh+Ti sA d+ha ya ma hA ma Ni hU~M/_oM ma hA pU dzA sa ma ye ne tra A/_oM ma hA pU dzA sa ma na sa ma ye rak+Sha/_oM badzra ma Ni rat+na daSh+T+ra kA rA le ha ra ha ra hU~M/_oM ma Ni sa ma ya muSh+Ti hU~M/_
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]de nas nor bu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas rang gi slob ma rnams btsud de 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o/_/khyod kyis tshul 'di su la yang ma smra shig_/khyod rab tu dbul ba dang dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar lhung ta re zhes bsgo 
[\[101a.2\]]la rang gi nor bu'i dam tshig gi ye shes bskyed par bya'o/_/rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/_/mkha' la rdo rje rin chen bri/_/bdag nyid kyi ni dpral bar yang /_/bzhag na rgyal por nges par 'gyur/_/rin chen rdo rje bcings nas ni/_/rdo rje rin chen mkha' la bri/_/dbang gi gnas su bzhag 
[\[101a.3\]]na ni/_/nges par rgyal po nyid du 'gyur/_/rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/_/rdo rje rin chen mkha' la bri/_/ye shes rdo rje de bzhag na/_/nyid kyis grub pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/_/las kyis phyag rgya bcings nas ni/_/mkha' la rdo rje rin chen bris/_/rang gi gnas su de bzhag na/_/nyid kyi grub 
[\[101a.4\]]ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/ma hA badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/_sa ma ya rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/_d+harma rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/_karma rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/_phyag rgya chen po'i snying gar ni/_/rdo rje rin chen bsgom par bya/_/bsgoms nas mngon par dbang du bskur/_/
[\[101a.5\]]mchog tu rmad du byung ba 'thob/_/mnyam par bzhag pas rdo rje yi/_/rin chen dpral bar bsgoms nas ni/_/rin chen rdo rje bcings gyur na/_/thams cad kyi ni rgyal por 'gyur/_/rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/_/lce la rdo rje rin chen bsgom/_/chos kyi rgyal po nyid du ni/_/dbang bskur 
[\[101a.6\]]ba ni thob par 'gyur/_/rab mnyam bzhag pas rdo rje yi/_/rin chen gtsug tor bsgoms nas kyang /_/las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/_/las legs byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM badzra rat+na hr-i da ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa ho/_oM badzra rat+na a b+hi She ka 
[\[101a.7\]]dra/_oM badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa baM/_oM badzra rat+na uSh+NI Sha a d+hiSh+Tha na swa mA na/_phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid kyis/_/bsgoms na rdo rje rin chen yang /_/ras la sogs la bris nas ni/_/rgyal po chen por de 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje rin chen bla na med/_/ras la sogs la bris nas kyang /_/sems 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]dpa' rdo rje bsgoms na ni/_/dam tshig rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur/_/rin chen rdo rje bdag nyid kyis/_/ras la sogs la bris nas kyang /_/bsam gtan phyag rgya bsgoms na ni/_/nges par chos kyi bdag por 'gyur/_/ras la sogs la rdo rje yi/_/rin chen bris nas las 
[\[101b.2\]]rnams kyi/_/phyag rgya bsgoms par gyur na ni/_/bdag nyid las kyi bdag por 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/badzra rat+na biM b+ha a d+hi tiSh+Thi/_oM badzra rat+na bi b+ha pra ti tiSh+Tha/_oM badzra rat+na biM b+ha a b+hi She ka_/badzra rat+na biM b+ha ku ru/_gser ram yang na dngul yang rung /_/rdo rje 
[\[101b.3\]]rin chen bcings gyur tam/_/yang na rin chen gzhan yang rung /_/snying gar bsgoms nas dbang bskur 'gyur/_/rdo rje rin chen bla na med/_/gser ram rin chen gzhan las byas/_/rtag tu dpral bar bzhag na ni/_/nor che ba yi rgyal por 'gyur/_/gser ram rin chen gzhan dag 
[\[101b.4\]]gi_/rdo rje rin chen bsgoms nas kyang /_/rang gi khar yang bcug na ni/_/tshig la dbang bar de 'gyur re/_/gser ram rin chen gzhan dag gi/_/rdo rje rin chen bsgoms na ni/_/gtsug tor du ni yang bsgoms na/_/las rnams kun gyi bdag por 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po 
[\[101b.5\]]ni 'di rnams so/_/oM badzra rat+na hr-i da ya A bar Na hU~M/_oM badzra rat+na a b+hi She ka ma hA ar+tha pA da/_oM badzra rat+na pA tsa pA de/_oM badzra rat+na ma hA karma pA de/_de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba'i ye shes bslab bo/_/phyag rgya chen por bsgoms na ni/_/rdo rje nor bu che bcings 
[\[101b.6\]]la/_/nor bu bud med bu gar bcug_/de ltar dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/dam tshig mchog gi nor bu ni/_/bud med bu gar bcug nas kyang /_/dam tshig mchog bcings thams cad kyi/_dbang bskur ba yi dngos grub 'gyur/_/rdo rje nor bu che bcings la/_/chos kyi phyag rgya bsgoms 
[\[101b.7\]]nor bu/_/de ni bud med bu gar bcug_/bla na med pa'i dngos grub 'gyur/_/las kyi phyag rgya nor bu bcings/_/bud med bu gar las phyag rgya/_/bcings par gyur na las kun gyi/_/dngos grub bla na med par 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM ma hA ma Ni sid+d+hi/_oM sa 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]ma ya a b+hi She ka sid+d+hi/_oM d+harma sid+d+hi/_oM karma sid+d+hi/_de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bshad de/_rin chen rdo rje myu gur bcing /_/gung mo srin lag mthe'u chung rnams/_/sor mo brkyang ba byas nas ni/_/spyi bor bzhag pa grub mchog 'thob/_/rdo rje bsdam pa 
[\[102a.2\]]byas nas kyang /_/mdzub mo gnyis mdud mtheb gnyis dang /_/srin lag rdo rje bsgyur nas ni/_/mdzod spur bzhag pa dbang thob bo/_/rdo rje rin chen tshul byas la/_/mdzub gnyis ngos dang ma theb ngos sprad/_/de nyid bsgyur nas de dbang 'thob/_/de nyid mtheb gnyis mdzub gnyis ni/_/chos kyi rdo 
[\[102a.3\]]rje tshul du ni/_/bcings nas dpral bar bzhag pa ni/_/chos chen gyi ni dbang bskur 'gyur/_/las kyi rdo rje bcings nas kyang /_/dbang rnams kun gyi phreng ba ste/_/bsgyur nas dpral ba nyid du yang /_/bzhag na dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur/_/rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ni/_/rdo rje dbyings skyes 
[\[102a.4\]]dam tshig kyang /_/bcings nas rin chen dpral bar ni/_/bzhag na dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur/_/mtheb gnyis phan tshun bsnol nas ni/_/mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang /_/nor bu 'dra bar bkug pa ni/_/rdo rje nor bu chen po 'thob/_/rdo rje bsdam pa byas nas kyang /_/rdo rje khu tshur 
[\[102a.5\]]gung mo gnyis/_/nor bu 'dra bar byas nas ni/_/nor bu phreng ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur/_/rdo rje bsdam pa byas nas ni/_/gung mo nor bu 'drar byas la/_/mdzub mo srin lag gnyis pad+ma/_/kha bye 'dra bar byas pas 'grub/_/gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bcings/_/sor mo thams cad bsgreng ba 
[\[102a.6\]]rnams/_/nor bu nyid du bsgoms na ni/_/'khor rnams mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/_/gung mo mthe bo rdo rje yi/_/rin chen tshul du byas nas kyang /_/srin lag mthe'u chung bsnyams pa yi/_/khar bzhag lce ste nor bu sbyin/_/de la mdzub gnyis rdo rjer bya/_/de ltar de gnyis lcags kyur bya/_/
[\[102a.7\]]mdzub mos mdzub mo drang ba dang /_/de nyid dga' bar rab sbyin pa'o/_/gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bcing /_/mdzub gnyis ngos la dgug pa ste/_/srin lag ngos gnyis mdud pa la/_/mthe bo gnyis kyis bkab pa ste/_/de nyid rdo rje nyi mar bskor/_/dpung pa'i spyi bor brkyang bar bya/_/nor bu'i 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]rgyal mtshan spyi bo'i rgyan/_/bzhad pa'i tshul du byas pa'o/_/rdo rje bsdam pa byas na ni/_/mdzub mo srin lag gyen du bsgreng /_/de dag pad+ma 'dra bar bya/_/gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya/_/de las mtha' mar rab sbyin bya/_/rdo rje ral gri sbyar ba dang /_/rdo rje 'khor lo tshul du bya/_/de nyid 
[\[102b.2\]]kha nas dbyung bar bya/_/mdzub gnyis rin chen myu gur bya/_/sor mo thams cad brkyang ba dang /_/de dag spyi bor bzhag pa ni/_/rin chen char gyis char 'bebs so/_/de nyid go cha'i tshul du ni/_/snying gar rin chen gnyis byas pa/_/mdzub gnyis nor bu 'dzin mche ba/_/dbus su bsnyams 
[\[102b.3\]]pa khu tshur ro/_/de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/_/phyag rgya chen po de dag nyid/_/snyim pa sbyar ba bcings na ni/_/mdor na gsang ba gsang ba yi/_/dngos grub bzhi 'gyur sbyin par byed/_/ji ltar rdo rje'i gsang ba'i sbyin/_/dus rnams kun du bcing mi bya/_/de nas chos 
[\[102b.4\]]kyi phyag rgya'i mdo bshad par bya'o/_/traiH/_graiH/_traiH/_kraH/_khaH/_d+haiH/_kraiH/_baiH/_kraH/_raiH/_yaH/_maiH/_gsang ba gsang ba'i khu tshur mchog_/gnyis su byas na las kun byed/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las 
[\[102b.5\]]rin po che'i phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba mkhyen pa'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang 
[\[102b.6\]]gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She kadz+nyA not+ta ma hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka sa ma ya hUM~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos 
[\[102b.7\]]rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM ma Ni rat+na a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM d+harma a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba a b+hi She ka dz+nyAn hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/rdo rje 
[\[103a.2\]]dbyings dang 'dra ba la/_/rin chen ye shes zhes bshad de/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/_/snying ga'i mtshan ma bri bar bya/_/de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i ye shes kyi snying po ni 'di rnams gsungs so/_/
[\[103a.3\]]oM dz+nyA na sarba sid+d+hi dz+nyA na hU~M/_oM ma Ni dz+nyA na hU~M/_oM ma Ni dz+nyA na aM ku sha dza/_oM ma Ni dz+nyA na rA ga_/oM ma Ni dz+nyA na duSh+Te/_oM ma Ni dz+nyA na duSh+Ti ma Ni hU~M/_oM ma Ni dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka_/oM ma Ni dz+nyA na sUr+ya/_oM ma Ni dz+nyA na d+h+wa dza/_oM ma Ni dz+nyA na aT+TAT+Ta hA sa/_oM ma Ni dz+nyA na pad+ma hU~M/_oM ma Ni dz+nyA na t+ye ga_/oM 
[\[103a.4\]]ma Ni dz+nyA na ko Sha/_oM dz+nyA nam Ni tsakra/_oM dz+nyA na ma Ni b+hA Sha/_oM dz+nyA na ma Ni rat+na baR+Sha hUM/_oM ma Ni dz+nyA na nre d+ye pU dza sa ma ye hU~M/_oM ma Ni dz+nyA na rak+Sha/_oM ma Ni dz+nyA na muSh+Ti/_/de nas yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas slob ma la 'di skad bsgo 
[\[103a.5\]]bar bya'o/_/khyod kyis chos ma mthong ba su la yang ma brjod cig_/khyod dngos grub ma thob par myur bar shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi ye shes bskyed par bya'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gyis ras sogs la/_/rdo rje snying po bris nas ni/_/bsgoms nas rin chen don byin ces/_/
[\[103a.6\]]smra zhing gsol ba gdab par bya/_/ting nge 'dzin gyis ras sogs la/_/rdo rje snying po bris nas ni/_/bsgoms nas rin chen byin cig ces/_/tshig tu smra zhing gsol ba gdab/_/rdo rje snying po ras sogs la/_/bris te mnyam par bzhag nas kyang /_/rnam par bsgoms te ye shes la/_/dam 
[\[103a.7\]]chos sbyin zhes gsol ba gdab/_/rdo rje snying po ras sogs la/_/mnyam par bzhag pas bris nas kyang /_/bsgoms nas dam pa'i las byin zhes/_/las la gsol ba gdab par bya/_/de nas de dag gi sgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM de hi sarba ar+tha b+ha ga bAn badzra gar+b+ha/_/oM de hi 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]sarba rat+na b+ha ga bA na badzra gar+b+ha/_oM de hi sA d+ha d+ha rmA mi b+ha ga bAn badzra gar+b+ha satwa/_oM de hi sAd+ha karma b+ha ga bA na badzra gar+b+ha/_nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du/_/nam mkha'i snying po legs sems pa/_/mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas su/_/phun sum tshogs don gsol bar 
[\[103b.2\]]bya/_/nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du/_/nam mkha'i snying po legs sems pa/_/mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang /_/nor bsags pa ni gsol bar bya/_/nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du/_/nam mkha'i snying po legs sems pa'i/_/mnyam par 
[\[103b.3\]]bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang /_/phun sum tshogs ni gsol ba gdab/_/nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du/_/nam mkha'i snying po legs sems pa/_/mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang /_/las sogs pa ni gsol ba gdab/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di 
[\[103b.4\]]rnams so/_/oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de hi sarba ar+tha na/_oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de hi sarba rat+na/_oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de hi sarba d+ha rmaM/_oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de hi sarba karma mAM/_rdo rje snying po bris nas kyang /_/snying gar yongs su bsgom byas la/_/gang gi tshe na snying 'phar ba/_/de tshe grub pas nor ster ro/_/rdo rje snying po dpral 
[\[103b.5\]]bar ni/_/bris te rnam par bsgoms nas kyang /_/gang tshe mgo bo 'dar gyur pa/_/des ni mngon par dbang thob bo/_/rdo rje snying po khar bcug la/_/de nyid du ni bsgoms nas kyang /_/gang tshe de ni byed gyur pa/_/de tshe des ni ngag 'grub bo/_/rdo rje snying po bdag spyi bor/_/rab tu bzhag 
[\[103b.6\]]ste bsgoms nas kyang /_/gang tshe de ni 'bar gyur pa/_/de tshe 'phang du lding bar 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM hr-i da ya gar+b+he de hi da naM/_oM rat+na a b+hi She ka gar+b+ha a b+hi Shi ny+tsA mi/_oM b+ha ga gar+b+ha sid d+hU/_oM rat+na gar+b+ho Sh+NI Sha A kA shA gats+tsha/_rdo rje snying po phyag rgya che/_/
[\[103b.7\]]rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas ni/_/bdag la dngos grub stsol zhes gsol/_/i li rat+na zhes brjod 'grub/_/nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig ni/_/rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang /_/dbang bskur ba ni gsol btab la/_/mi li rat+na zhes brjod 'thob/_/rdo rje snying po 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]ting 'dzin du/_/rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas ni/_/tshes bdag stsol zhes gsol btab la/_/tsi li rat+na zhes brjod 'thob/_/nam mkha'i snying po las kyi mchog_/rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas ni/_/rin chen thams cad gsol btab la/_/
[\[104a.2\]]ki li rat+na zhes brjod 'thob/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM i li/_oM mi li/_oM tsi li/_oM ki li/_de nas nor bu ye shes gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/_/nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du/_/rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni/_/dbang po gnyis 
[\[104a.3\]]ni mnyam sprad na/_/dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/gzhi la ri mo bris pa bzhin/_/rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni/_/dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/_/dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur/_/rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni/_/dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/_/sdug pa 
[\[104a.4\]]de dang gar rtses pa/_/'jig rten kun gyis de dgar byed/_/nam mkha' kun gyi rdul dbyibs kyis/_/rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni/_/dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/_/thams cad 'grub par nges par 'gyur/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/A kA sha gu h+ya 
[\[104a.5\]]dz+nyA na sa ma ya hU~M/_bi ci tra gu h+ya dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/_pri yA nu smr-i ti dz+nyA na gu h+ya sarba lo ke rA ga ya hU~M/_sarba gu h+ya dz+nyA na sarba sid d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha hU~M/_de nas phyag rgya chen po 'di ji lta ba bzhin bcing bar bya'o/_/dngos grub kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/da nas chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes 
[\[104a.6\]]bslab bo/_/rdo rje nor bu ni rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin no/_/sA bA rA sA ra te ka hA daM ti he bA kan ka ra ya ma/_de nas mdor na las kyi phyag rgya ni gnas ci bzhin par gzhag par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[104a.7\]]kyi las kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/sarba ta thA ga ta karma a b+hi She ka hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi las 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra hU~M kA ra a b+hi She ka_/de nas byang chub 
[\[104b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta a b+hi She ka hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM sarba d+ha rma a b+hiShe ka rat+na/_de nas 
[\[104b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM bi shwa a b+hi She ka hU~M/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/_/de nas rab tu bshad 
[\[104b.4\]]bya ba/_/las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/_/rin chen dgos pa zhes bshad do/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre/_/de yi dbus su tshul bzhin du/_/sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzhag par bya/_/sems dpa' chen po 
[\[104b.5\]]tshul gyis ni/_/rin chen mchod pa rnams bri'o/_/de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so/_/oM ma Ni rat+na pU dzA gra/_oM sarba ar+tha sid+d+ha badzra rat+na a b+hi She ka hU~M/_oM badzra ma Ni d+ha rma sa ma ye hU~M/_oM ma Ni rat+na A kar+Sha karma sa ma ye hU~M/_oM ma Ni rat+na rA ga ra ti karma pU dze pra brta/_oM ma 
[\[104b.6\]]Ni rat+ne sA d+hu kA ra pU dza sa ma ye hU~M/_oM ma hA ma Ni rat+na dr-iSh+Ta A kar+Sha/_oM ma Ni rat+na mA la pU dze/_/oM ma Ni rat+na sU r+yA lo ka pU dze/_oM ma Ni rat+na d+hA dza pA ta ka pU dze/_oM ma Ni rat+na aT+TAT+TA hA sa bU dze/_oM pad+ma ma Ni sa mA d+hi sa mA ye hU~M/_oM sarba d+yA gA nu smr-i ti sa mA d+hi kar+m+ma ka ri hU~M/_oM ma Ni t+na 
[\[104b.7\]]tIk+Sh+Na sa ma ye ts+tshin+da hU~M/_oM ma Ni rat+na tsa kra sa ma ye hU~M/_oM ma Ni rat+na b+hA She b+had b+had hU~M/_oM ma Ni rat+na bar+sha ni hU~M/_oM ma Ni rat+na karmi Ni hU~M/_oM ma Ni rat+na ka ba tse rak+Sha mAM/_oM ma Ni rat+na daMSh+Ta khA da khA da hU~M/_oM ma Ni rat+na karmA muSh+Ti hU~M/_oM ma Ni rat+na lA s+ye pU dza ya ho/_oM ma Ni rat+na mA le a b+hiSha 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]ka pU dzA ya/_oM ma Ni rat+na gI d+ye pU dzA ya/_oM ma Ni rat+na nr-i t+ye pU dzA ya/_oM ma Ni rat+na d+hU pe pU dzA ya/_oM ma Ni rat+na puSh+pe pU dzA ya/_oM ma Ni rat+na A lo ke pU dzA ya/_oM ma Ni rat+na gan+d+he pU dzA ya/_oM ma Ni rat+na aM ku sha A kar+Sha ya dzaH/_oM ma Ni rat+na pA she hU~M/_oM ma Ni rat+na s+pho Ta baM/_
[\[105a.2\]]oM ma Ni rat+na A be sha aH/_de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par byas nas bcug ste 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o/_/'di khyod kyis su la yang ma smra shig_/khyod las kyi sgrib pas non nas shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la/_las kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[105a.3\]]rdo rje snying po phyag rgya che/_/rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang /_/mchod pa kun gyis mchod na ni/_/sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'gyur/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig mchog_/phyag rgya gang yang rung bcings la/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mchod na ni/_/dbang bskur ba 
[\[105a.4\]]ni des 'thob bo/_/rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin du/_/rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas ni/_/sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod na/_/'gro ba'i dam pa 'dul bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mchod 
[\[105a.5\]]gyur na/_/skad cig tu ni don kun 'thob/_/de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/_/oM rat+na pU dza ba shi ku ru/_oM rat+na pU dza sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa/_oM rat+na pU dzA ya d+ha rma nA sha ya pA di/_oM rat+na pU dzI karma sarba ar+thA na me sA d+ha/_de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/_
[\[105a.6\]]rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mchod na ni/_/'jig rten thams cad des mgur 'gyur/_/de nas phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyis dngos grub dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/_de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab 
[\[105a.7\]]par bya'o/_/rdo rje rin chen bcings nas ni/_/gnas rnams kun du gzhag par bya/_/rdo rje dgos pa'i tshul du ni/_/ltag 'og [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin bya/_/de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/_twa dza ga d+ha/_t+na dza tu sa/_r+m+ma k+Sh+Na tu Sha/_r+m+ma k+Sha k+Sha d+hi/_rdo rje rin chen gnyis byas la/_/
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]las kyi phyag rgya de bsgrub bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i phyag rgya 
[\[105b.2\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra rat+na trAM/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra mA le/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[105b.3\]]po rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/_/oM ma Ni rat+ne/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra d+harma rat+na/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so//
[\[105b.4\]]oM bi shwa dr-iSh+Ti/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/_/de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/_/phyag rgya bzhi pa'i tshul du ni/_/dkyil 'khor yongs 
[\[105b.5\]]su brtag par bya/_/de nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug nas bslab par bya ste/_khyod kyis 'di su la yang ma smra shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/de nas ye shes bskyed bya ste/_/rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/_/rdo rje rin chen bcings nas ni/_/dpral bar rab tu gzhag na ni/_/dngos grub thams cad 
[\[105b.6\]]'thob par 'gyur/_/de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra rat+na sarba a b+hi She ka sarba sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha ra la ra la hU~M tra/_de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya bslab par bya ste/_/khyo'am yang na sdug pa'am/_/bud med dang ni skyes ba'ang rung /_/dpral ba gnyis ni sprad nas kyang /_/
[\[105b.7\]]gtugs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/de la de bsgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di yin te/_oM badzra rat+na sa khi bid+yA d+hA ra s+t+waM/_pra yats+tsha shI g+h+raM a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya hi ha ha ha twa/_de nas phyag rgya bzhi bslab bo/_/dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]mkha'i snying pos don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/_/oM badzra ma Ni d+hA ra sarba ar+tha sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha ho/_b+ha ga bA na badzra rat+na hU~M/_de nas dkyil 'khor 'di yin te/_de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/_/dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/_/dngos grub kyi ni 
[\[106a.2\]]dkyil 'khor ni/_/ji bzhin par ni bri bar bya/_/de nas 'dir ye shes gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/_/gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i rnams/_/chags par gyur pa'i bde ba ni/_/sangs rgyas la yang phul gyur na/_/las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[106a.3\]]de nas phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/_/ras la sogs pa la yang sems dpa' 'am phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris te bsgrub par bya'o/_/de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 
[\[106a.4\]]legs so zhes bya ba byin pa 'dis bstod do/_/legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/_/rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/_/rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/_/rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/_/rdo rje theg pa bla na med/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang /_/theg pa chen po mngon 'dus 
[\[106a.5\]]pa/_/rdo rje theg pa bla na med/_/mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po dum bu bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[106a.6\]]bam po brgyad pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi de kho na nyid kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la re zhig dang por ni phyag rgya chen po dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[106a.7\]]pa phyag rgya che/_/bcings nas mkha' dbyings thams cad du/_/sangs rgyas sku gzugs byin brlabs la/_/rang gi snying du bcug nas ni/_/ci ste 'dod na tshe 'di la/_/zhi ba dam pa mchog gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas nyid 'thob nges 'di bsgrub/_/ci ste mi 'dod dngos grub bzhin/_/
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang /_/de nyid chen po tshig re rer/_/brjod nas kun dang ldan par yang /_/thams cad bdag ni yin bsgoms na/_/ci ste 'dod na bdag nyid des/_/de bya gzi can dge ba yi/_/go 'phang tshe 'di nyid la 'thob/_/mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/_/
[\[106b.2\]]de nas dam tshig phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/_ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin 'grub pa/_/de ltar bdag ces bsgoms na ni/_/sangs rgyas dang ni gzi chen 'thob/_/mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/_/de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/_chos 
[\[106b.3\]]rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis/_/dag ces brjod na nges par yang /_/sangs rgyas dang ni gzi can 'gyur/_/mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/_/de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/_thams cad kyi ni kun dag par/_/las rnams thams 
[\[106b.4\]]cad sbyangs na ni/_/sangs rgyas gzi can thob ci ste/_/mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub rnams so/_/de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa'i dngos grub kun gyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/dngos grub kun sbyor sangs rgyas kyi/_/
[\[106b.5\]]bkas ni sems can kun don du/_/phyag rgya chen por bsgrub na ni/_/tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub/_/de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do/_/phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du ni/_/ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin grub pa/_/de bzhin bdag ces bsgoms na ni/_/skad cig 
[\[106b.6\]]gis ni gzi chen 'thob/_/de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/_yi ge med pa'i chos rnams la/_/rab tu spros pa yod min te/_/chos mchog 'di ni rjod byed cing /_/bsgoms na gzi can nyid du 'gyur/_/de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad 
[\[106b.7\]]de/_dge ba'am yang na mi dge ba'i/_/gang gi las rnams byas pa ni/_/rgyal ba rnams la phul byas na/_/skad cig gis ni gzi can 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes pad+ma'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la dang por ni 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/_'dod chags ngo bo nyid kyis dag_/mu stegs can gyis mi gyur la/_/de la chags pa'i chos 'di ni/_/theg pa che la 'grub par 'gyur/_/de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te/_ting 
[\[107a.2\]]'dzin brtan pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/byams pa chen po bsgoms nas kyang /_/cho ga bzhin ldan khyab byas na/_/skad cig gcig gis gzi can 'thob/_/de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/_'dod chags ngo bo nyid dag ces/_/smra bar gyur ba'i tshul 'di ni/_/
[\[107a.3\]]'dod chags pha rol phyin rnyed de/_/skad cig gis ni gzi can 'thob/_/de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/_bdag gi lta dang reg pa dang /_/mnyan pa dang ni dran pa'ang rung /_/sems can rnams ni thams cad kyi/_/sdug bsngal kun gyi mthar phyin 
[\[107a.4\]]'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes nor bu'i rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la phyag rgya chen po dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di yin te/_rdo rje snying po ji bzhin du/_/sangs rgyas kun dbang bdag gyur ces/_/bsgom par 
[\[107a.5\]]bya ba rnams bsgoms nas/_/skad cig gis ni gzi can 'thob/_/de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/_nam mkha'i snying po 'dra bar ni/_/sems can kun gyi re ba kun/_/yongs su rdzogs par byed gyur cig_/skad cig gis ni gzi can 'thob/_/de nas 
[\[107a.6\]]chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/_/bdag nyid kyang ni spangs nas su/_/nor byin rab tu dga' byed cing /_/chos byung phyag rgya smra na ni/_/gzi can tshe 'di nyid la 'thob/_/de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/_dbul po rnams la phan pa'i 
[\[107a.7\]]phyir/_/nor bsgrub pa la brtson ldan na/_/gzi can 'gyur ro ci ste yang /_/mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/_/rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dam pa rnams kyi dngos grub thob pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di yin te/_gang gis 'dod la snyoms zhugs pa/_/de la 'dod pas spyod par byed/_/sangs 
[\[107b.2\]]rgyas phyag rgya chen po yi/_/ye shes dam tshig yin par bshad/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/_'dod pa rnams la chags bral min/_/dam tshig mdzes pa chen po 'di/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa/_/rgyal bas 
[\[107b.3\]]kyang ni 'da' mi mdzad/_/de nas rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/_sems can don du khro min yang /_/khro bo chen por rab tu ston/_/rdo rje'i rigs ni chen po yi/_/dam tshig 'di ni 'da' dka'o/_/de la pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 
[\[107b.4\]]ni 'di yin te/_rang bzhin dag par shes nas kyang /_/de yi dgos pa de byed de/_/pad+ma'i rigs ni chen po yi/_/dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o/_/de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/_nyung ngam yang na mang yang rung /_/ci tsam nus pa nyid du ni/_/
[\[107b.5\]]sbyin pas nyi ma stongs par ni/_/bya min dam tshig 'di yin no/_/rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di 
[\[107b.6\]]gsungs so/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/_sangs rgyas chos zhes grags so zhes/_/brjod na chos nyid yi ge ni/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi phyag rgya che/_/ye shes mchog gi tshul yin no/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi 
[\[107b.7\]]dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/_/'dod chags las ni dag pa'i chos/_/bde ba thams cad rab sbyin byed/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ni/_/dngos grub byed pa'i mchog 'di'o/_/de la rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/_/sangs rgyas bka' ni sbyang ba dang /_/
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]sems can drang bar bya ba'i phyir/_/de la khro bar ma gyur yang /_/ma rungs bdud byas dngos grub 'thob/_/de la pad+ma'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/_/pad+ma chu yis mi chags pa/_/de bzhin 'dod pas mi chags zhes/_/smra zhing dgos min 
[\[108a.2\]]byed kyang ni/_/sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/de la nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/_/sbyin dang mnyam pa'i chos med de/_/sgrub par byed cing smra ba ni/_/nor bu'i rigs ni chen po'i chos/_/mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/_/rigs thams cad kyi chos 
[\[108a.3\]]kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos grub rgyud ni 'di yin te/_sems can thams cad sangs 
[\[108a.4\]]rgyas dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' nyid rnams su/_/ji bzhin du ni btul nas su/_/las kyi phyag rgya'i mchog 'grub sbyin/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/_/dus bzhi yi ni tshul dag tu/_/mchod pa rnam pa bzhi yis ni/_/rtag tu ldan 
[\[108a.5\]]pa rnam bzhir yang /_/byas nas las rnams bsgrub par bya/_/de la rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/_/ma rungs sems can gnod bya'i phyir/_/dgos pa gang dang gang de byed/_/las kyi rdo rje rigs kyis 'dis/_/dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin byed/_/de la pad+ma'i 
[\[108a.6\]]rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/_/'jigs pas gzir la mi 'jigs sbyin/_/ji bzhin par ni 'dul de bzhin/_/'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi las/_/sangs rgyas dngos grub sbyin pa'o/_/de la nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/_/sangs rgyas dbang 
[\[108a.7\]]bskur de bzhin du/_/lus can rnams la sbyin pa dang /_/re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i/_/las kyi don du bsgrub pa'o/_/rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dgongs/_/'di ni sangs rgyas sangs 
[\[108b.2\]]rgyas nyid/_/gzhan la sangs rgyas 'gyur ba med/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/_phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni/_/dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs rigs kyi/_/chos nyid 
[\[108b.3\]]dngos grub dam pa 'thob/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis ni/_/dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang /_/las rnams thams cad bsgrubs na ni/_/rdo rjes dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs 
[\[108b.4\]]kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni/_/chos kyi phyag rgya rjod byed cing /_/rdo rje chos ni chos rnams kyi/_/chos nyid du ni 'dis bsgrubs pa'o/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul 
[\[108b.5\]]gyis ni/_/las kyi rdo rje snying gar gzhag_/chos nyid 'di dag bsgoms na ni/_/las kyi chos nyid thob par 'gyur/_/rigs thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[108b.6\]]cad kyi rigs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin te/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/_/zla ba'i rdo rje tshul gyis ni/_/ji ltar de gnyis kha dog shes/_/de ltar 'jig rten de shes 
[\[108b.7\]]te/_/dag la dag dang dkar 'od gsal/_/chags la dmar dang dmar ser 'phro/_/shes nas kha dog ji bzhin pa'i/_/de yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas pa'i/_/phyag rgya chen 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]po bcings nas ni/_/rang gi lus la ji ltar shes/_/de ltar 'gro ba'i yid shes so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/_/'phros par gyur nas dkyil 'khor ni/_/ji lta bur yang mthong 
[\[109a.2\]]'gyur ba/_/de lta bur ni yid shes so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_nam mkha' 'am sa phyogs phra mo'am/_/yi ge phreng ba mthong gyur na/_/mdor na kha dog ci 'dra bar/_/shes pa de 'drar des sems shes/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi 
[\[109a.3\]]ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_'jig rten kun la bltas nas kyang /_/ji lta bur ni snang gyur cing /_/mthong bar gyur na de 'dra bar/_/'gro ba'i sems ni shes par bya/_/de gnyis snyoms par zhugs nas ni/_/'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba dang /_/byed pa dang ni 'chags pa'ang rung /_/
[\[109a.4\]]ji ltar mthong ba de ltar rtogs/_/snyoms par zhugs nas bsams na ni/_/sems can gang dang gang yin pa'i/_/de dang de ni de bzhin du/_/sems can thams cad rtogs par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i 
[\[109a.5\]]rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/_sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs tshul gyis/_/
[\[109a.6\]]sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag bsgoms na/_/ye shes kyi ni tshul de yis/_/sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/_nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/_/dkyil 'khor 'di ni ser skya mthong /_/
[\[109a.7\]]sems dpa' nyid ni phyag rgya nyid/_/mngon sum du ni mthong 'gyur na'o/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud do/_/de lta bu'i dbyibs gyur pa yi/_/dbus na sngo bsangs snang na ni/_/rdo rje rigs mchog dngos grub 'thob/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/_de nyid la ni mkha' 'dra ba'i/_/pad+ma sngon po lta bur mthong /_/pad+ma chen po'i rigs rig pa'i/_/dngos grub de ni legs par 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/_/de nyid 
[\[109b.2\]]mkha' bzhin dri med las/_/'od zer dkyil 'khor 'phro bar ni/_/mthong na dngos grub myur du 'thob/_/rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa'i rnams/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas par/_/dngos grub dus su rang bzhin du/_/bdag nyid kyi ni mdun mthong na'o/_/rigs thams 
[\[109b.3\]]cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[109b.4\]]rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/_/lus kun de bzhin gshegs rnams dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsgoms la/_/de bzhin lus las byung mthong na'o/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[109b.5\]]rigs kyi mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/_/rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni/_/sgrub pas cho ga 'di yis ni/_/mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni 'phrul gyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub yin no/_/phyag rgya chen 
[\[109b.6\]]por zhugs nas ni/_/mig gi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang /_/gang yang rung ba des bsams na/_/shin tu ring ba'ang mthong 'gyur zhes/_/bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/_/phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni/_/rna ba'i rnam shes bskyed nas kyang /_/de ni dgos pa gang 
[\[109b.7\]]bsams kyang /_/shin tu ring na gnas thob zhes/_/bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/_/phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni/_/yid kyi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang /_/sems can gang la des brtags na/_/de yi sems ni des shes 'gyur/_/phyag rgya chen por zhugs 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]nas ni/_/bdag gam sems can gang yang rung /_/yid kyis bltas nas gar skyes pa/_/gzugs ni de yis shes par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/_/de nas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho ga shes pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin no/_/phyag rgya 
[\[110a.2\]]chen po bcings nas kyang /_/rdzu 'phrul gang dang gang 'dod pa/_/de nas gang yang rung bar ni/_/ting 'dzin gyis ni mthong bar 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems chen pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/khams 
[\[110a.3\]]gsum rnam rgyal mchog tu ni/_/rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang /_/cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos/_/mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo/_/khros nas dgos pa thams cad ni/_/ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin bya/_/rdzu 'phrul mig la sogs tshul gyis/_/mngon shes kun bdag 
[\[110a.4\]]nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/'gro bo 'dul ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog_/rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni/_/cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos/_/mngon par shes 
[\[110a.5\]]pa lnga 'thob bo/_/ltag 'og [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin du/_/cho ga bzhin du 'dod pas chags/_/'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis/_/mngon shes thams cad thob 'gyur zhes/_/bcom ldan 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i 
[\[110a.6\]]dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/don kun grub pa'i phyag rgya ni/_/rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni/_/cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos/_/mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo/_/ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/_/'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis/_/sangs rgyas rnams la mchod byas 
[\[110a.7\]]la/_/mngon shes lnga ni des 'thob bo/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/_/bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa yi/_/tshig gis mna' ni 'dor byed cing /_/bden pa chen po bsrungs na ni/_/myur 
[\[110b.2\]]du sangs rgyas nyid thob bo/_/zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i/_/dam tshig la ni mna' bor la/_/rdo rje'i bden pa bsrungs 
[\[110b.3\]]na ni/_/dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/ci ste dngos grub mchog 'dod na/_/shin tu 'di las 'da' bar dka'/_/rdo rje 'dzin la mna' 'dor cing /_/bden pa 
[\[110b.4\]]'di la bsrung bar bya/_/zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/ci ste dngos grub mchog 'dod na/_/pad+ma chen po'i rigs mchog gi/_/pad+ma chos la mna' 'dor zhing /_/bden pa'i dam tshig bsrung 
[\[110b.5\]]bar bya/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/'di las shin tu 'da' dka' bar/_/sangs rgyas chos la mna' 'dor zhing /_/bden pa mchog 'di gsungs na ni/_/dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[110b.6\]]zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mchod pas gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi mna'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs 
[\[110b.7\]]so/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/sa ma ya stAM zhes brjod nas/_/de yi 'og tu ma bsgrubs pas/_/rigs kun gyi ni phyag rgya rnams/_/nyid kyis bcings nas dam tshig 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/sur ta s+t+waM zhes brjod na/_/de nyid bskul ba'i bdag nyid che/_/ma bsgrubs par yang phyag rgya kun/_/nyid kyis bcings na 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom 
[\[111a.2\]]ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/hU~M zhes bya ba gcig tsam gyis/_/mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni/_/bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung /_/nyid bcings 'ching du bcug kyang rung /_/de la 'di 
[\[111a.3\]]ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/sarba shud d+hA zhes brjod na/_/bdag gam yang na gzhan dag gis/_/bud med chags la sogs ldan na/_/thams cad du ni grol mi 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi 
[\[111a.4\]]rgyud do/_/oM zhes bya bas mdor bsdus na/_/phyag rgya thams cad 'grub 'gyur te/_/'jig rten kun gyi mchog nyid kyi/_/rang 'byung nyid la mchod par 'gyur/_/rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[111a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dran byed cing /_/sangs rgyas phyag rgya bcings nas ni/_/sangs 
[\[111a.6\]]rgyas byang chub brtan par yang /_/bsgrubs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/_/bcings nas de yi mdun du yang /_/rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms na ni/_/shin tu myur bar dngos 
[\[111a.7\]]grub 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings na/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms na ni/_/nyi rim du ni dngos grub 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/'jig rten dbang 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]po'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/chos kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang /_/'jig rten mgon po bsgoms na ni/_/nyi rim du ni dngos grub thob/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/_/rdo rje snying po bsgoms 
[\[111b.2\]]na ni/_/nyi rim du ni dngos grub thob/_/rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub sgrub pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[111b.3\]]pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do/_/phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni/_/bdag nyid dang ni mdun du yang /_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom/_/de nas de ma thag tu 'grub/_/ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de la 
[\[111b.4\]]'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do/_/rdo rje bzlas pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/'dod pa bdag ces bsgoms nas kyang /_/phyag rgya thams cad bsgrubs na ni/_/grub pa'i mchog ni kun bsgrubs pa'o/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das 
[\[111b.5\]]rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do/_/bdag nyid nyid kyis rdo rje dbyibs/_/rab mnyam bzhag pas sgom byed cing /_/phyag rgya thams cad bcings na ni/_/de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das 
[\[111b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_ye shes kun 'byung dngos grub kyi/_/pad+ma chen po'i rigs la gnas/_/bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid nyid/_/pad+ma'i dbyibs su bsgom par bya/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das 
[\[111b.7\]]kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i rgyud do/_/nor bu rin chen 'od zer 'bar/_/bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni/_/nor bu chen po'i rigs mchod na/_/kun las 'byung ba'i dngos grub 'thob/_/
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]ces bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub 
[\[112a.2\]]kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/rdo rje dbyings dbang phyag rgya ni/_/rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang /_/snying ga mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor/_/bzhag nas sangs rgyas byin rlob bo/_/zhes sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[112a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyud yin te/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/sems dpa'i rdo rje dam byas la/_/snying ga mdzod spu mgrin pa dang /_/spyi bor bzhag na byin gyis rlob/_/ces bcom ldan 'das 
[\[112a.4\]]rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlab pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/rdo rje hU~M gi phyag rgya ni/_/rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang /_/snying ga mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor/_/bzhag na nyid du byin gyis rlob/_/ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtso 
[\[112a.5\]]bos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlab pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/rdo rje pad+ma dam byas la/_/snying ga mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor/_/byin gyis brlab phyir gzhag par bya/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs 
[\[112a.6\]]dbang pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyud do/_/rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/rdo rje nor bu che bcings la/_/snying ga mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor/_/byin gyis brlab phyir gzhag par bya/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/_/
[\[112a.7\]]rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/rin chen rdo rje bcings nas ni/_/dpral bar rab tu gzhag byas na/_/rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen gyis/_/dbang bskur bar ni de 'gyur ro/_/zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang bskur 
[\[112b.2\]]ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rdo rje dbyings dbang la sogs pa/_/sangs rgyas phyag rgya mdun nas ni/_/brtsam pa byas nas ngos bzhir yang /_/phreng ba nyid kyis dbang bskur 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/rdo rje dbang gi phreng ba ni/_/
[\[112b.3\]]bcings nas dpral bar bzhag na yang /_/phreng ba'i dbang ni de yin te/_/rdo rje rnams ni de dbang 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_chos kyi rdo rje bcings nas kyang /_/mgo bor bzhag ste de dbang bskur/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni 'jig 
[\[112b.4\]]rten gyi/_/dbang phyug gis ni dbang bskur ro/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i rgyud de/_rdo rje rin chen myu gu bcings/_/dpral bar bzhag ste des dbang bskur/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni mchod pa 
[\[112b.5\]]yi/_/dbang phyug tu ni dbang bskur 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub 
[\[112b.6\]]kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rgyal ba kun gyi rnam par ni/_/phyag rgya mnyam par bzhag par bcings/_/zlos shing sngags kyi rig pa ni/_/myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes sangs 
[\[112b.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sems dpa'i byin brlabs tshul gyis ni/_/ting 'dzin rdo rje chos kyis kyang /_/snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams/_/zlos pas myur du 'grub par 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/'dod chags las ni khyod phyung ste/_/bdag ni khro bo yin bsgoms nas/_/snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams/_/
[\[113a.2\]]myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_'jig rten dbang po rig zlos pas/_/byams pas 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/snying po la sogs bsgrubs na yang /_/dngos grub 
[\[113a.3\]]myur du thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_nam mkha' kun gyi ting 'dzin ni/_/rab mnyam bzhag par bsgoms na yang /_/snying po phyag rgya sngags rig 
[\[113a.4\]]rnams/_/bsgrubs na kun du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phyag 
[\[113a.5\]]rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rab mnyam bzhag pas dang por ni/_/bdug pa la sogs mchod byas la/_/de nas dngos grub 'dod pa yis/_/bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[113a.6\]]zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam bzhi yis/_/gsang ba'i mchod pa rjod byed cing /_/bdag dbul ba la sogs pa yi/_/mchod pa byas na 'grub 
[\[113a.7\]]par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_khro bo rdo rje mchod chen po/_/khro bo gsang ba rjod byed cing /_/khro bo'i khu tshur rab sbyar na/_/myur du bdag gi rigs 'grub bo/_/zhes bcom ldan 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_mdo sde zab cing rgya che ba'i/_/tshul rnams legs par brjod nas kyang /_/yid dang ngag gis phul na ni/_/dngos grub myur du 'thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du 
[\[113b.2\]]spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/gdugs dang 'phan dang rgyal mtshan gyis/_/rgyal po'i mchod pas mchod byed cing /_/sbyin pa thams cad byin na ni/_/nor bu'i rigs ni thob par 'gyur/_/zhes 
[\[113b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/_/nyid la byin gyis brlabs sogs ldan/_/rdo rje sems dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi yis ni/_/rdo rje sna tshogs ting 'dzin gyis/_/dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas 
[\[113b.4\]]gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab pa dang /_dbang bskur ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_mchod pa rnams kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes 
[\[113b.5\]]kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin no/_/lus la sangs rgyas ting 'dzin ni/_/'di ni bde gshegs nyid mngon shes/_/de ni rab tu rtogs nas ni/_/sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub 'thob/_/
[\[113b.6\]]ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/'phrul gyi mig sogs mngon shes ni/_/rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang /_/mngon shes lnga ni bdag gyur na/_/
[\[113b.7\]]dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_khro bo mngon shes bskyed nas ni/_/rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na yang /_/mngon shes lnga ni bdag 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]gyur nas/_/dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_'dod chags mngon shes bskyed nas kyang /_/rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms 
[\[114a.2\]]na ni/_/mngon shes lnga ni bdag 'gyur nas/_/dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spyan gyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_/mchod pa'i mngon shes bskyed nas kyang /_/rab mnyam 
[\[114a.3\]]bzhag pas bsgoms na ni/_/mngon shes lnga yang bdag gyur nas/_/dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen 
[\[114a.4\]]po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas dran 
[\[114a.5\]]byed cing /_/sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di/_/bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin 
[\[114a.6\]]gnas/_/phyag rgya chen por sgom byed cing /_/byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di/_/bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_khro 
[\[114a.7\]]bo'i rgyal po'i ting 'dzin gnas/_/lag pas dam tshig mchog bcings la/_/byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di/_/bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]'jig rten dbang phyug ting 'dzin gnas/_/de bzhin chos kyi phyag rgya bzlas/_/byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di/_/bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i 
[\[114b.2\]]ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gnas/_/las kyi phyag rgya las legs byed/_/byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di/_/bsgoms na dngos grub thob bar 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi byang chub chen 
[\[114b.3\]]po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 
[\[114b.4\]]do/_/nyid kyi sangs rgyas byang chub phyir/_/sems can don rnams rab byed cing /_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed/_/ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chags pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba 
[\[114b.5\]]gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_ji ltar yul dang ldan 'gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed ces/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sgom byed cing /_/de nyid bskul na myur bar ni/_/mnyes par 'gyur ba des 'grub bo/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/de la 
[\[114b.6\]]'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mnyes par byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sangs rgyas bka' ni bsrung ba dang /_/sems can don ni spyad pa'i phyir/_/rngam pas mngon spyod byas na ni/_/rdo rje rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas gsungs 
[\[114b.7\]]so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/chags pa kun du blta ba dang /_/byams dang snying rjes chos smra dang /_/mi 'jigs kun sbyin byed pa rnams/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis mnyes par byed/_/ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spyan gyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]bu'i rigs mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_dbang bskur ba ni rab sbyin dang /_/nor bsags rab tu sbyin byed cing /_/de yang sangs rgyas don du sbyor/_/'di ni sangs rgyas mnyes par byed/_/ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs 
[\[115a.2\]]so/_/rigs thams cad kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[115a.3\]]rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_de ltar rnam dag bde sbyin pa/_/'dod chags la ni brnyas mi bya/_/sems can kun gyi don du brtson/_/'di ni sangs rgyas dbang du byed/_/ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[115a.4\]]rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_/'dod sten bde ba'i bdag nyid kyis/_/su ra ta s+t+waM zhes smra zhing /_/rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrubs na ni/_/de nyid bskul na dbang du 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dbang 
[\[115a.5\]]du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/sangs rgyas bka' ni sems can rnams/_/dag bya lus can skyabs sbyin dang /_/sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/_/bsad na yang ni dbang du 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dbang du 
[\[115a.6\]]bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_pad+ma 'dab ma kha 'byed cing /_/'dod chags dag la kun rtog la/_/gdul ba'i phyir ni chags byed cing /_/'dod par byed pa dbang du 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i 
[\[115a.7\]]rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur phyir/_/rdo rje rin chen nyin re rer/_/spyi bor bzhag ste dbang bskur na/_/sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi dbang du 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]bya ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sems can kun 
[\[115b.2\]]don ma mthong zhing /_/sangs rgyas de nyid ma sbyangs la/_/yid dang ngag dang lus kyis ni/_/bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_dngos 
[\[115b.3\]]grub thams cad ma thob la/_/rigs rnams kyang ni mi brtson zhing /_/rdo rje kun du brtags nas ni/_/bsad na dngos grub myur du thob/_/ces bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_ma rungs mi brtul khro med 
[\[115b.4\]]cing /_/de bzhin sems can mi 'dul la/_/bdag nyid sdug bsngal 'thob byed na/_/hU~M zhes bya bas gsang bar bya/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi gsang pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_snying rje med cing byams med la/_/sems can 
[\[115b.5\]]ma rungs mi sbyong zhing /_/bdag nyid kyis ni bslus na yang /_/bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_mi gtong bdag la nor med 
[\[115b.6\]]cing /_/nor stor ba dang gnod byed la/_/dbul por gyur la sems can rnams/_/bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das re ba thams cad skong bas gsungs so/_/kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi/_/rnal 'byor ma thob gsod bcug na/_/de dag drang bar bya ba'i phyir/_/
[\[115b.7\]]bdag gi dngos grub sbyin par bya/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun du bzang pos gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsrung 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sems can thams cad mi gtong zhing /_/rtag tu sangs rgyas mchod bdag nyid/_/rtag par sangs rgyas yid la byed/_/'di ni bsrung ba rmad kyi 
[\[116a.2\]]mchog_/ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan tsam zhig_/lan cig tsam yang brjod gyur na/_/'di ni bsrung ba rtag chen po/_/skad cig dngos grub thob par 
[\[116a.3\]]'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rigs dang rgyud kyis chog mi shes/_/'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid kyi/_/rdo rje hU~M la mos byed pa/_/'di ni bdag dang gzhan la bsrung /_/zhes bcom ldan 
[\[116a.4\]]'das rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_'dod chags dag cing byams pa che/_/thams cad la ni mi 'jigs sbyin/_/'jig rten dbang gi mtshan zlos pa/_/bsrung ba 'di ni rmad du che/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis 
[\[116a.5\]]gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sangs rgyas sems can gtong byed par/_/ci nus par ni sbyor byed cing /_/nyi ma stong par mi bya bar/_/bsrung ba 'di ni rmad kyi mchog_/ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bsrung bas gsungs so/_/rigs 
[\[116a.6\]]thams cad kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rgyud 'di bzhes par gsol/_gang gis sems can 
[\[116a.7\]]thams cad brtag pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu gyur nas rtogs par bgyi ste/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_phyag 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]na rdo rje la legs par bshad pas nged kyis blangs shing byin gyis brlabs kyis legs so legs so/_/de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rdo rje theg pa bla na med/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[116b.2\]]pa kun gyi gsang /_/theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/_/mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa/_/legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/_/rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/_/rdo rje chos ni khyod legs te/_/rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 
[\[116b.3\]]bsdus pa las brtag pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la dang po 'dir ni de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[116b.4\]]thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud de/_sangs rgyas byang chub ting nge 'dzin/_/rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni/_/byang chub bde bas thob par 'gyur/_/bsams nas de ni rtogs par bya/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/_/
[\[116b.5\]]de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sems dpa' rdo rje snying gar bcings/_/nga yi chung ma khyod sdug pa/_/brtan par gyur cig ces smras nas/_/phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub bya ste/_/cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni/_/rang 
[\[116b.6\]]gi las rnams ma grub kyang /_/gsang ba'i chung ma zhes smras na/_/shin tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rjes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_ji lta ba bzhin bsgrubs na yang /_/dngos grub 
[\[116b.7\]]thob par ma gyur na/_/hU~M gi phyag rgyas bsad na ni/_/skrag ste dngos grub sbyin par byed/_/ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis hU~M zhes bya bas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud de/_ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]nas kyang /_/rdo rje blta bas bltas nas kyang /_/bdag gi chung ma'am gzhan chung ma/_/sdug pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i 'dod pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_dbang 
[\[117a.2\]]po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/_/bde ba'i mchog ces smra byed cing /_/sangs rgyas kun la nyid dbang po/_/phul na myur du dngos grub 'gyur/_/ces bcom ldan 'das nor bu bzhed pas gsungs so/_/rigs dam pa thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/_de nas byang 
[\[117a.3\]]chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod cing /_/bud med kun la chags 
[\[117a.4\]]byas la/_/sems can don gyis mi skyo na/_/nges par sangs rgyas des mnyes so/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_'dod chags la ni brnyas mi bya/_/bud 
[\[117a.5\]]med kun dang rtse byed pa/_/rdo rje rnams kyi gsang dam tshig_/'di ni bsrung na 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_gsod pa 'jig rten thams cad gsod/_/
[\[117a.6\]]lus dang ngag la dam dgyes pa/_/'jig rten rnam par sbyangs nas ni/_/dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin pa'o/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_dag pa'i bdag 
[\[117a.7\]]nyid 'dod chags dag_/mu stegs rnal 'byor ma dag la/_/dag pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig ni/_/bsrung na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]de/_rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/rdo rje nor bu sngar bcings la/_/ma rungs rnams kyi nor phrogs na/_/dam tshig dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/_de nas byang 
[\[117b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_chos rnams rang bzhin dag par ni/_/rab mnyam bzhag 
[\[117b.3\]]pas bsgoms nas kyang /_/dgos pa thams cad byas nas kyang /_/sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub 'thob/_/ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_sems can kun la chags byed cing /_/
[\[117b.4\]]yul la skyo bar ma gyur la/_/bud med dga' ba'i dag pa ni/_/gsang chos dngos grub rab sbyin no/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_rna yi hU~M gi sbyor ba yis/_/phra ba'i rdo rje ting 'dzin gnas/_/
[\[117b.5\]]mi 'grungs rnal 'byor 'di bsad ces/_/rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rjes bsgyel/_/dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin pa'o/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig dam pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/_/rdo rje chos kyi ting 
[\[117b.6\]]'dzin gyis/_/bud med kun dang rtse byed cing /_/chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/_/re ba thams 
[\[117b.7\]]cad yongs bkang nas/_/bud med dam ni sdug pa yi/_/dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran bsgoms la/_/bud med lugs kyi bu gar blugs/_/
[\[118a.2\]]bud med rnams ni dbang du 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/_/bu gnas ni de bzhin zhugs/_/bud med lus su legs 
[\[118a.3\]]khyab byas/_/sems med pa yang mgu bar 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dgyes pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_rdo rje hU~M gi phyag rgya ni/_/rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang /_/khros nas bu gar zhugs na 
[\[118a.4\]]ni/_/yid kyis de ni dbab par bya/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_chos kyi las kyi phyag rgya ni/_/bcings nas pad+ma'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/bu gar bcug na bud med rnams/_/thams cad 
[\[118a.5\]]kyang ni bsrung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad+mas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/_/las kyi rdo rje nor bur bcings/_/bu gar bcug na bud med rnams/_/nyid du phab nas gar byed 
[\[118a.6\]]'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di 
[\[118a.7\]]gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo dag pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bya zhing /_/phyag rgya bud med rnams kyis bskor/_/des ni sangs rgyas gzhag par bya/_/gsang 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]ba der ni zhugs nas kyang /_/sangs rgyas la ni nyid du smra/_/'di khyab pa yi btsun mo ste/_/kun gtong bas ni bdag sogs zhes/_/rigs rnams kun gyi phyag rgya ni/_/tshul rnams la yang de skad brjod/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyam med pa'i/_/gsang ba'i dngos grub 
[\[118b.2\]]thob par 'gyur/_/zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud de/_rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bar ni/_/dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar bya/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[118b.3\]]pa'i rigs rnams ni/_/thams cad kyi ni mchog 'tshal te/_/dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs nas kyang /_/dngos grub 'dod pas myur bar ni/_/su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM ho/_/badzra sa twa Ad+ya sid d+h+ya mAM/_zhes brjod snying po 'di bzlas te/_/bsgrubs na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/
[\[118b.4\]]de nyid bskul ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/mgu nas myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dra bar ni/_/rdo rje rigs 
[\[118b.5\]]kun rnams kyi ni/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jug par yang /_/mkhas pas legs par bri bar bya/_/der zhugs nas ni myur bar yang /_/dngos grub gsol ba 'debs byed cing /_/'dod chags las ni khyod 'byung zhes/_/zhes smras kun du 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom 
[\[118b.6\]]ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M gis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_pad+ma'i rigs ni thams cad kyi/_/'gro ba 'dul ba'i tshul du ni/_/mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/der zhugs nas ni brjod bya ba/_/
[\[118b.7\]]'dod chags chos te pad+ma che/_/khyab pas bdag ni myur dngos grub/_/de skad smras nas dkyil 'khor ni/_/kun gyi des ni dngos grub thob/_/ces bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]ba'i rgyud de/_nor bu chen po'i rigs rnams ni/_/don kun 'grub pa'i tshul du yang /_/dkyil 'khor legs par bris na ni/_/zhugs nas 'di skad smra bar bya/_/bsam pa kun gyi dngos grub las/_/'dod chags bsam pa dngos grub mchog_/
[\[119a.2\]]grub shig grub shig sems dpa' che/_/bcom ldan thams cad grub ba po/_/de skad smras nas dkyil 'khor kun/_/zhugs nas mchod gsang bla med pa'i/_/dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur/_/phyin chad dngos grub bdag nyid kyis/_/bsgrubs na dngos grub 
[\[119a.3\]]'grub par 'gyur/_/gang tshe myur du mi 'grub na/_/de nyid bskul na 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[119a.4\]]dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba'i rgyud dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha mo che/_/sdug cing bde ba kun sbyin 
[\[119a.5\]]pa/_/bden las byung ba'i tshig bden pas/_/bsgrubs kyang de ni ma grub na'o/_/zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_ltag 'og [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin du/_/phyag
