[\[119a.6\]]rgya chen po bcings nas ni/_/'di ni de nyid gsang ba yi/_/rdo rje tshul gyis 'di smros shig_/bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/_/khyod nga'i chung ma snying la gnas/_/lus kun la ni 'khyud nas kyang /_/rdo rje 'gying bas 'gying bar mdzod/_/rdo rje 'gying ba'i lha mo che/_/de nyid bskul 
[\[119a.7\]]bas chags 'gyur bas/_/lus kun la ni brtan 'gyur nas/_/ji bzhin myur du dngos grub 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'gying ba'i bdag pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_dngos grub dam tshig grub pa ni/_/
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]khyod dgyes dam tshig bdag yin no/_/zhes bskul myur du chags gyur na/_/rab tu yang ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rtogs pa sems dpa' rtogs 
[\[119b.2\]]chen khyod/_/bdag gi chung ma shin dgyes mdzod/_/zhes ni bskul na myur bar yang /_/rjes su chags nas 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_las kun byed 
[\[119b.3\]]pa'i chung ma khyod/_/bdag la 'grub mdzod rdo rje ma/_/rdo rje can gyis bskul myur bar/_/rjes su chags nas 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/_/rig pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de 
[\[119b.4\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_mu stegs can rnams phan gdags 
[\[119b.5\]]phyir/_/ri mo'i phyag rgya'i tshul du ni/_/sangs rgyas btsun mo rab sba bar/_/shes na rab tu grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos 
[\[119b.6\]]grub kyi rgyud de/_sems can kun gyi yid la khyab/_/sems can kun la bde sbyin zhing /_/sems can kun gyi yab nyid ni/_/dam tshig mchog gi 'dod pa'i mchog_/ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/_/'di ni sangs rgyas thams 
[\[119b.7\]]cad kyi/_/gsang ba'i mchog ste rmad che bar/_/dad ldan shes nas dad byas nas/_/bsgrub dka' ba yang 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_chags pa dag pa'i 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]chags bral gyi/_/sems can don gyi yid byung nas/_/mu stegs lta bar byas pa ste/_/lta ba ngan pa'i gcong rong ltung /_/theg pa che la dgod pa'i phyir/_/gsod pa'i tha tshig mchog yin te/_/de ltar shes na 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das 
[\[120a.2\]]rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_mu stegs can rnams gzhom pa'i phyir/_/'byung ba che las thams cad 'byung /_/mi gtsang zhes ni ci phyir brjod/_/nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 
[\[120a.3\]]'das rdo rje spyan gyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_bud med chags phyir rin chen rnams/_/rtag tu legs par bsag par bya/_/bud med bla med rin chen zhes/_/bsams nas de ni grub par 'gyur/_/zhes 
[\[120a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du mdzad pas gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang 
[\[120a.5\]]ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_bud med chags rnams yongs bskor la/_/kun nas gtses pa'i bde ba ni/_/sangs rgyas mchod phyir phul na yang /_/mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes 
[\[120a.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_rab dgas ngal te skyo ba na/_/rab dga' las byung bde ba de/_/phyag bzhi pos ni mchod pa'i phyir/_/phul na myur du grub par 'gyur/_/zhes 
[\[120a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_hU~M gi dam tshig bcings nas ni/_/skye bo bud med 'khyud nas ni/_/'khyud par 'gyur ba'i skye bo de/_/phul na de ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M gis 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_'jig rten dbang por bdag bsgoms la/_/sdug pa'i gdong du bltas nas ni/_/bltas par gyur pa'i bde ba de/_/phul na de ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i spyan gyis 
[\[120b.2\]]gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_las kyi phyag rgya bcings 'gyur la/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas kyang /_/bud med 'khyud pa'i longs spyod ni/_/mchod phyir phul na 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 
[\[120b.3\]]rin chen gyis gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin 
[\[120b.4\]]gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sangs rgyas su ni bdag bsgoms la/_/ci nas sus kyang mi tshor bar/_/gzhan gyi bud med rtse byed na/_/mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/
[\[120b.5\]]de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rgyud de/_rdo rje 'jo ma byas nas kyang /_/rdo rje phreng ba 'ching byed cing /_/de nas rdo rje glu blangs la/_/rdo rje gar gyis mchod byas la/_/'dod pa'i dga' bas dbang bskur mchog_/glu dang gar gyi bde ba las/_/bde ba 
[\[120b.6\]]gzhan gyis myong min te/_/de phyir gsang mchog 'di bla med/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal bsgom/_/cho ga ji bzhin tshul du yang /_/gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod na ni/_/mchod pa'i dngos grub 
[\[120b.7\]]thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgyar gnas/_/gsang ba'i tshul ni ci bzhin par/_/las kyi phyag rgyas rab mchod na/_/mchod pa'i 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_don kun grub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/gsang ba'i tshul 
[\[121a.2\]]ni ji bzhin par/_/las kyi phyag rgyas rab mchod na/_/mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na 
[\[121a.3\]]rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na nyid bskyed pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_mdor na ting 'dzin ye shes las/_/sems can rnams la chags 
[\[121a.4\]]tshul gyis/_/sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub 'gyur na/_/myur du bla med thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid chen po bskyed pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_sems can 
[\[121a.5\]]thog ma tha ma med/_/nam mkha' 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid de/_/kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid/_/'dod pa'i 'gro ba kun bdag po/_/sems can kun gyi sems gang ni/_/bstan phyir sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/rdo rje mnyam par mnyam gzhag na/_/nges par rdo rje nyid gyur 
[\[121a.6\]]ba/_/sems dpa'i byin brlabs tshul gyis ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du gyur/_/bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid de/_/rdo rje bzhad pa de bzhin gshegs/_/nyid sems rab tu rtogs la sogs/_/sangs rgyas byang chub cho ga bzhin/_/de nyid bcom ldan de bzhin 
[\[121a.7\]]gshegs/_/thams cad kyi ni rigs su 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpas gsungs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs nyid de/_/de nyid rdo rje'i rigs chen po/_/de nyid pad+ma'i rigs dag pa/_/de nyid nor bu'i rigs kyi mchog_/
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad bskyed pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[121b.2\]]kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' thugs la gnas/_/mnyam 
[\[121b.3\]]par bzhag las ting 'dzin te/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu bsgrub/_/ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_rab tu rtogs phyir rdo rje ste/_/
[\[121b.4\]]gzung ba'i tshul gyis lcags kyu yin/_/phra mo rtogs phyir mda' yin la/_/mgu bar gyur phyir legs zhes bya/_/spras pa'i phyir yang rin chen gsungs/_/gzi brjid tshul gyis nyi ma ste/_/rgyal mtshan legs par sgreng bar gsungs/_/'dzum phyir bzhad par grags 
[\[121b.5\]]pa la/_/'dod chags dag phyir pad+ma yin/_/ral gris nyon mongs dgra gcod yin/_/dkyil 'khor tshul du 'khor lo ste/_/tshig gis brjod pas smra zhes bya/_/rgya gram tshul du kun rdo rje/_/mi tshugs tshul gyis go cha yin/_/'jigs byed tshul gyis mche ba ste/_/phyag 
[\[121b.6\]]rgya'i tshul gyis bsdams pa'o/_/ji ltar bcom ldan sems rtag pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa' kun 'gro ba/_/de bzhin rdo rje mtshan la sogs/_/bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan mas gsungs so/_/
[\[121b.7\]]rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/_/rdo rje skyil mo krung bcings la/_/lag gnyis rdo rjer bsdams pa las/_/myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur/_/zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[122a.2\]]'das kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_ji ltar rgyal po nyid phyag rgya/_/rgyal po khrims la 'debs pa ltar/_/bdag nyid chen po skye bo rnams/_/sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi/_/
[\[122a.3\]]gzugs brnyan gyi ni tshul du yang /_/nyid kyi phyag rgya btab pa ni/_/bdag nyid che ba'i phyag rgya cher/_/shes na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya chen pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang 
[\[122a.4\]]ba'i rgyud de/_ji ltar dam tshig dam pa ni/_/skye bo 'gas ni bcing gyur na/_/shin tu 'da' bar mi bya ba/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/_/dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa yis/_/rdo rje bcing ba'i mchog bcings na/_/ma shi bar du mi 'da' bar/_/shes nas dngos grub thob 
[\[122a.5\]]par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_mdor na rgyal bas rdo rje bka'/_/'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/_/'di ni bcings par shes nas kyang /_/des 
[\[122a.6\]]ni chos kyi dngos grub 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje las kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/_rdo rje bka' dang las mang rnams/_/'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing /_/bka' nyan pa yi las 
[\[122a.7\]]de ni/_/shes na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa gsang ba'i rgyud do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di yang bdag gis yongs su gzung zhing byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes 
[\[122b.2\]]bya ba byin no/_/rdo rje theg pa bla na med/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang /_/theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/_/mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na/_/legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/_/rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/_/rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/_/rdo rje las ni 
[\[122b.3\]]khyod legs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos dam pa'i 
[\[122b.4\]]dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran tshul gyis/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi ting 'dzin ni/_/mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms na yang /_/bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[122b.5\]]zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_chags pas rjes su dran tshul gyis/_/sems dpa' thams cad ting 'dzin gnas/_/rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni/_/
[\[122b.6\]]dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_khams gsum rnam rgyal cha lugs su/_/bsgoms nas mdun dang de bzhin 
[\[122b.7\]]te/_/phyag na rdo rje'i mthur gyur nas/_/khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_'gro ba 'dul ba'i chos su ni/_/bsgoms nas mdun du de bzhin te/_/
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan par/_/'dul bar de ni rab byed ces/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_don kun grub pa'i skur yang ni/_/bsgoms nas mdun du de bzhin te/_
[\[123a.2\]]rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa yi/_/phun sum tshogs don des 'thob bo/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs 
[\[123a.3\]]pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran 'gyur la/_/rdo rje phra mo tshul gyis ni/_/badzra badzra zhes brjod na/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[123a.4\]]dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin du/_/rdo rje phra mo sgom byed cing /_/badzra satwa zhes brjod na/_/rdo rje 
[\[123a.5\]]sems dpa' nyid 'grub bo/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_khams gsum rnam rgyal cha lugs su/_/dran byed mdun du de bzhin te/_/hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes brjod na/_/dngos grub bla 
[\[123a.6\]]med thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M gis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_/'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs kyis ni/_/rdo rje phra mo sgo ma byed cing /_/sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya zhes brjod na/_/dngos grub dam pa thob par 
[\[123a.7\]]'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_don grub pa yi gzugs kyis ni/_/rdo rje phra mo bsgoms nas kyang /_/sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya zhes brjod na/_/don gyi dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/_/
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]zhes bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i chos kyis gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di 
[\[123b.2\]]gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_dam pa'i chos ni yi ge med/_/ting 'dzin ye shes 'byung ba ste/_/a zhes bya bas chos rnams ni/_/skye ba med par dgongs pa ste/_/phyag rgya 'di yi tshul gyis ni/_/
[\[123b.3\]]shes pas bsgoms te de nas kyang /_/yi ge kun gyi ye shes ni/_/bde gshegs skad cig gis 'gyur zhes/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi 
[\[123b.4\]]ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_de bzhin gshegs kun de nyid kyi/_/mdo sde 'di ni dad pa yis/_/dad nas bcangs sam bklags gyur na/_/dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam 
[\[123b.5\]]pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sdig pa'i sems can phan don du/_/sdig can sdig spyod bzlog pa dang /_/sangs rgyas bka' ni bsrung ba'i phyir/_/bsad pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i 
[\[123b.6\]]rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/'dod chags rang bzhin dag par shes/_/dam pa'i don du dgongs nas kyang /_/thog ma tha mar 'di bsgoms na/_/chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[123b.7\]]kyi dbang pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos mkhyen pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sems can kun gyi don phyir sbyin/_/bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed cing /_/chos bsgoms 'di ni nor bu yi/_/rigs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]'das chos rin chen gyis gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di 
[\[124a.2\]]gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sangs rgyas kyi ni ting 'dzin las/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrubs pa/_/'di ni bsgom par byas nas kyang /_/dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/_/zhes 
[\[124a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/bla med dang ni las mang rnams/_/sems dpa' kun 'gyur thams cad dang /_/shes na 
[\[124a.4\]]yang ni grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sdig pa dag pa rgyu ba'i phyir/_/mtshams med byed las mi zlogs na/_/gsod pa'i las la dad pa na/_/
[\[124a.5\]]des ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sdig kun rnam par dag pa'i bdag_/kun dag pas na dgos pa kun/_/des byed las 'di yin no bar/_/shes 
[\[124a.6\]]na yang ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sred ldan dbul po thams cad kyi/_/rtag tu bsam pa kun bkang la/_/don kun grub pas kun bdag ni/_/'grub 
[\[124a.7\]]'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/ces bcom ldan 'das rin po che rgyal mtshan gyis gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rtag tu rdo rje phra mo'i tshul/_/'bad pa kun gyi sbyor na ni/_/rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa yi/_/mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[124b.2\]]zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_slob dpon ma yin gzhan dang ni/_/slob ma ma yin bu min pa'i/_/mdun du phyag rgya mi brjod de/_/de dag gsang bas phyag rgya 'grub/_/
[\[124b.3\]]ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi phra mo'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/_rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/_/sna nas hU~M byung ldan gyur la/_/rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed/_/ces bcom ldan 'das 
[\[124b.4\]]rdo rjes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_pad+ma chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas/_/rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/_/rdo rje blta bas bltas na ni/_/'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+ma bzhad pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i 
[\[124b.5\]]rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/_/rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/_/shin tu phra ba'i lta 'bar bas/_/don ni thams cad 'dren par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi phra mo'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 
[\[124b.6\]]do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mig gi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_gang tshe phyag rgya'am ting nge 'dzin/_/bsgrub 
[\[124b.7\]]phyir stsol bar gyur pa na/_/gang tshe mkha' la skar ma 'dra/_/dkar po rgyug par des mthong na/_/de tshe blo ldan sangs rgyas kyi/_/spyan ni bdag gis thob 'gyur zhes/_/phyin cad sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/_/rtog pa kun las bsgrub par bya/_/zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_gnas dang 'gro ba de bzhin te/_/ji snyed dngos po yod 'gyur ba/_/de snyed kyi ni gzugs brnyan rnams/_/mkha' rgyug 'gro ba'am 'ong yang rung /_/mthong 
[\[125a.2\]]na rdo rje spyan dag par/_/shes pas mchod na dngos grub ni/_/bla na med pa thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_g.yas pa'am ni g.yon phyogs kyi/_/mkha' la nam mkha'i 
[\[125a.3\]]dbyings nyid ni/_/sprin 'drar myur du 'khor bar yang /_/mig gis mthong bar gyur bas kyang /_/rdo rje las byung phyag rgya de/_/mthong nas 'jigs par ma gyur la/_/phyag rgya de ni bzung na ni/_/rdo rje spyan ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so/_/de la 'di 
[\[125a.4\]]ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_gang tshe skya'am dmar ba dang /_/dkar ba'am ser ba'am sna tshogs kyi/_/dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur pa'i tshe/_/dgongs 'gyur 'khor lo'i spyan 'grub 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad+mas gsungs so/_/
[\[125a.5\]]de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_mkha' la rin chen 'dra ba dang /_/gser la sogs par 'dra bar ni/_/gang tshe mkha' mthong mkha' yi mig_/de ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/_/rigs thams 
[\[125a.6\]]cad kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub 
[\[125a.7\]]kyi rgyud de/_chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/_/'dod chags bde ba rnam smin phyir/_/gtso bo thams cad mchod byas pa/_/sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_'dod chags bdag ces sgom byed cing /_/gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas na/_/rdo rje 'dod pa'i gzi can mnyam/_/dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bzhad pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi 
[\[125b.2\]]las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_khro ba bdag ces sgom byed cing /_/gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas pa/_/khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dra ba yi/_/dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/_/de la 'di 
[\[125b.3\]]ni chos kyi rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_nang du song ba'i yid kyis ni/_/'dod pa dam par sgom byed cing /_/dbyangs dang ldan pa'i yi ge yis/_/sangs rgyas mngon par mchod na ni/_/dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 
[\[125b.4\]]kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rdo rje snying por mnyam bzhag la/_/bsam pa g.yos pas btud nas ni/_/phyag la rtag tu brtson byas na/_/dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur/_/zhes 
[\[125b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbang rin po ches gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di 
[\[125b.6\]]gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_'dod la sogs pa'i bde ba kun/_/rtag tu bdag gi snying la gnas/_/e ma'o sems can don rnams la/_/skyob par gyur pa gang bshad rmad/_/'di ni las kyi dam 
[\[125b.7\]]tshig ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin du/_/bsgoms nas sangs rgyas mchod na ni/_/dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/_/zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/_/sems can kun la bde sbyin pa'i/_/kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te/_/mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs 
[\[126a.2\]]kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sems can kun la phan byed pa'i/_/kun bzang khro bo bdag yin te/_/rdo rje hU~M gi rnal 'byor gyis/_/mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi 
[\[126a.3\]]las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa'i/_/kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te/_/bdag nyid 'gro 'dul skur gnas la/_/mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+ma chags pas gsungs so/_/de la 
[\[126a.4\]]'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sems can kun la don chen sbyin/_/kun bzang rgyal po bdag yin te/_/don kun 'grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni/_/mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub 
[\[126a.5\]]pas gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi las kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de 
[\[126a.6\]]la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rang gi ting nger 'dzin pa yis/_/g.yas pa'i mdzub mos mdud nas ni/_/go char bcings te spyi bor bzhag_/shin tu yang ni bsrungs par 'gyur/_/zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[126a.7\]]gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rtsig pa la ni ldan 'dra ba/_/ri mor bris nas mtshan bsgreng ste/_/mnyes na bud med gang bsams pa/_/de ni 'di yi dbang du 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sa la gnod sbyin gdong bris te/_/de yi mig gi phyogs su ni/_/mdzub mo'i sen mo btsugs na yang /_/bud med mchog ni 'dren par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom 
[\[126b.2\]]ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_lag pa gnyis su pad+ma blangs/_/'dod chags dag pa lta byed cing /_/rdo rje lta bas bud med de/_/bltas na yang ni dga' bar 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das 
[\[126b.3\]]pad+ma 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gnas/_/lag pa gnyis kyis nor bu bzung /_/hU~M zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/bud med kun la 'dud byed do/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M 
[\[126b.4\]]gis gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi 
[\[126b.5\]]las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_mchod pa'i las kyi cho gar sbyar/_/gang dang gang gi dgos bsams pa/_/de dang de ni gsol btab ste/_/mkhas pas phyag rgya bsgrub par bya/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin 
[\[126b.6\]]gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho gar sbyar/_/dgos pa gang zhig smras pa de/_/myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/_/de la 
[\[126b.7\]]'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_khro bo'i ting 'dzin zhugs nas kyang /_/rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod chen byas/_/mkhas pas cung zad gang bsams pa/_/de ni myur du dngos grub 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khro bos gsungs so/_/de la 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/yid kyis mchod pa byas nas kyang /_/mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa/_/de yi dngos grub thams cad thob/_/ces bcom ldan 'das pad+ma 'dzin pas 
[\[127a.2\]]gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/bdug pa la sogs mchod byas la/_/mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa/_/de kun skad cig nyid 'grub 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 
[\[127a.3\]]snying pos gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[127a.4\]]byin gyis brlabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gyis/_/rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/_/sangs rgyas phyag rgya rab bsgrubs pas/_/dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs 
[\[127a.5\]]so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_kun gyi bdag nyid sems dpa' ni/_/bdag gi lus la gnas pa ste/_/sems dpa' bdag ces byin brlabs la/_/bdag ces bya ba'i nga rgyal gyis/_/
[\[127a.6\]]bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de/_sems dpa' ji bzhin phyag rgya 
[\[127a.7\]]bzhin/_/phyag rgya ji bzhin bdag de bzhin/_/cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni/_/phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub par bya/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi chos kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de/_chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]gyis ni/_/rdo rje phra mo bsgoms byas la/_/ngag gi phyag rgyas de dag kun/_/sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin/_/ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor 
[\[127b.2\]]gyi rgyud de/_sangs rgyas kun la dbang bskur dang /_/mchod dang dam tshig dngos grub rnams/_/bcom ldan 'das zhes bsgoms nas kyang /_/rdo rje'i las rnams bsgrub par bya/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las kyis gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i 
[\[127b.3\]]dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/rdo rje theg pa 
[\[127b.4\]]bla na med/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang /_/theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/_/mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na/_/legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/_/rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/_/rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/_/rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/_/de bzhin 
[\[127b.5\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las brtag pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//bam po dgu pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/_/lta ba ngan 
[\[127b.6\]]cing chags bral la/_/gsang ba 'di ni mi rigs te/_/sems can kun la phan don du/_/de bzhin cho ga bshad par bya/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni 
[\[127b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/_de la 'di ni snying po'i yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud yin te/_dkyil 'khor chen po mthong nas bdug pa dang /_mar me dang /_me tog dang /_dri'i phyag rgya rnams kyis mchod pa byas te/_de nas rdo rje tshig 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]gis bzlas pa brtsam par bya'o/_/de la 'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/_zla ba bzhir gnas ji bzhin par 'dug ste/_dus bzhir bdug pa la sogs pas cho ga bzhin du mchod nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan 
[\[128a.2\]]brgya rtsa brgyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod de/_phyag rgya bzhis phyag bya ba'i tshul gyis phyag byas la sngags 'di bzhis bdag gi lus dbul zhing mchod pa bya'o/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzo pas+thA nA ya At+m+ba naM nir yA ta yA mi/_/sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwA tiSh+Tha swa mAM/_oM sarba 
[\[128a.3\]]ta thA ga ta pU dzA a b+hi She kA ya A t+mA naM nir yA ta yA mi/_sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta phU dza pra brta nA ya At+mA naM ni ra yA ta yA mi/_sarba ta thA ga ta nadzra ng+harma pra brta ya mAM/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA karma ne At+mA naM nir yA ta yA mi/_sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru mAM/_
[\[128a.4\]]de nas 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang ma bral la kha zas kun dang 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod cing /_bdag nyid snying po'i don du sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan mdun du tshig tsam gyis kyang bsgoms la ci dga' bar byed cing rdo rje tshig gis lan brgya rtsa bzlas na myur bar dngos grub 
[\[128a.5\]]tu 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/ci ste bla na med pa'i dngos grub 'dod na de ni ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbus na bzhugs/_de'i sems dpa' chen po bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du kha dog dang rgyan rnams ci dga' bar bya ste/_
[\[128a.6\]]bri zhing sems dpa' chen po rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs la rigs kyi lha mo rnams grwa rnams su bri'o/_/de nas ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas la 'dzab bya ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas mthar mchod pa rgya cher byas 
[\[128a.7\]]la mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/yang na phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na ni des de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi phyag rgya'i spyan sngar ci dga' ba bzhin du ji lta ba bzhin bcings shing bkrol te rdo rje'i tshig 'bum bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas mthar mtshan thog thag ngal mi bso bar cung zad tsam zhig phyag rgya bkrol te/_ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[128b.2\]]bcings nas bzlas brjod bya'o/_/de nas phyag rgya 'bar zhing 'bab la 'phar zhing nyung bar smra bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyag rgya bcings bzhin du nam mkha' la lding bar 'gyur ro/_/gzugs ci dga' ba dang /_mi snang ba dang las thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur ro/_/bcings ma 
[\[128b.3\]]thag tu phyag rgya thams cad kyis kyang las thams cad ji lta ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/yang na ting nge 'dzin bsgrub par 'dod na ni/_des rdo rje phra mo nas brtsams te/_ting nge 'dzin de gang la dga' ba'i snying po'i rnal 'byor gyi tshul 
[\[128b.4\]]du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bsgoms la/_de nas mthar mtshan thog thag skyil mo krung mi zhig par snyoms par zhugs te 'dug par bya'o/_/de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/de nas ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu thob 
[\[128b.5\]]par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du bzlas zhing zla ba gcig gi bar du bsgrubs la/_de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas las thams cad kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro 
[\[128b.6\]]zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/ci ste las shig bya bar 'dod na yang lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis bdag dang gzhan dang /_grong dang grong khyer rnams go cha bcing ba la sogs pas bsrungs par 'gyur ro/_/dbab pa yang bya ste tsan+dan dri zhim pos gdon gyis zin 
[\[128b.7\]]pa dang /_gdon gyis ma zin pa rnams rdo rje dang /_lcags kyu dang /_mda' dang /_lag pa dang /_rin po che dang /_nyi ma dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_so'i phreng ba dang /_pad+ma dang /_ral gri dang /_'khor lo dang /_lce dang /_rdo rje rgya gram dang /_go cha dang /_mche ba dang /_khu tshur gyi 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]phyag rgya la sogs pa dngos po thams cad la lan cig brjod pas 'bebs par byed do/_/sgyu ma'i las kyang byed de/_rma bya'i mjug sgro'i nang du rdo rje bcug ste bcings la/_de nas rma bya'i mjug sgro de sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas mnan la/_de bzhin 
[\[129a.2\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya babs kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas rma bya'i mjug sgro las gzugs sna tshogs pa la sogs par snang bar 'gyur te/_de phyin cad rma bya'i mjug sgro rang gi lus la cho ga bzhin du gzugs thams cad kyang ston te/_
[\[129a.3\]]mjug sgro de nyid lan cig bzlas te/_bskor bas kyang bdag nyid las gzugs thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mjug sgro de nyid kyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu ma'i las rnams kyang ston/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs brnyan yang ston/_phyogs bcu'i 
[\[129a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis/_bdud sde dang bcas pa rnams 'dul ba la sogs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rol ba la sogs pa mdzad pa rnams kyang ston pa nas/_bdag nyid las rnam pa'i 
[\[129a.5\]]mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyang ston pa'i bar du'o/_/ci ste dbang du byed par 'dod na yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems ma'i rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la phyag rgya de 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings ba 
[\[129a.6\]]tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed cing dbang du byed na sems dpa' gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/_ci ste 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod na yang des dang po kho nar de bzhin du/_zlos shing zla ba gcig tu brgyad stong bzlas la 
[\[129a.7\]]de nas mthar phyag rgya bcings te de bzhin du mtshan thog thag phyag rgya 'bar gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o/_/de phyin cad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi dngos grub gang yang rung ba gcig tu 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas rdo rje'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/_de la dang por ni sngar bsnyen pa bya ste/_de ltar ci 'dod pa bzhin du yi ge 'bru 'bum bzlas par bya'o/_/de'i mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas pa byas la de phyin 
[\[129b.2\]]chad sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang /_chad pas gcad par nus par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/'on te bsgrub par 'dod na yang /_des ji lta ba bzhin du ri mo'i sku gzugs bris la/_des de bzhin du mchod pa byas nas zla 
[\[129b.3\]]ba gcig tu 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing ci dga' ba bzhin du byas nas brgya stong du bzlas par dus bzhir rdo rje'i tshig gis zlos shing zla ba'i mthar phyin pa dang /_ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas nas rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings la phyag rgya bcings pa de las hU~M 
[\[129b.4\]]zhes bya ba'i sgra byung gi bar du bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas nam langs pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mdun du gnas nas bka' nod par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rig 'dzin gyis 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o/_/gang gi tshe ngas khyod 
[\[129b.5\]]tshur shog 'di byos shig_/ces bsgo ba de'i tshe na khyod 'dir 'ongs la nga'i bka' bzhin byos shig_/de phyin cad 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag por 'gyur te/_yud tsam gyis kyang sa gsum pa thams cad la ci dgar bka' stsol cing bskor te/_slar 'ongs 
[\[129b.6\]]nas kyang phan gdags pa dang /_chad pas gcad pa rnams byed cing lha rdzas kyi 'jig rten gsum longs spyod la nye bar spyad nas ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du byed cing lha thams cad kyi dbang po'i bud med la sogs pa bud med thams cad mgu bar byas nas/_nye bar spyad kyang de la 
[\[129b.7\]]su gang gis byas kyang gnod par byed nus pa med de hU~M zhes bya bas lha la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad gnon cing de nas bskal pa chung ngu'i stong gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod pa na yang ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]bzlas pa byas la bzlas pa'i mthar rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/_mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas nam langs pa dang phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas hU~M zhes bya ba dang ldan par ji lta ba'i cho ga bzhin du/_phyag 
[\[130a.2\]]rgya bcings na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /_gzugs sna tshogs ston pa dang /_mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang /_sgyu ma rnams ston pa dang /_thams cad la dbab pa dang /_dgug pa dang /_dbang du bya ba dang /_thams cad kyi dga' ba bskyed par bya ba dang /_rin po che thams cad 
[\[130a.3\]]'phrog pa dang /_'od zer 'bar ba chen po bstan pa dang /_rin po che'i char 'bebs par bstan pa dang /_gad mo cher bgad pa dang /_sems can thams cad sbyang ba dang /_gcad pa dang /_dbye ba dang /_dus kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang /_ji lta ba bzhin pa'i de kho na nyid 
[\[130a.4\]]brjod pa dang /_las thams cad la 'jug pa dang /_bsrung ba dang /_rmongs pa dang /_gnon pa dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_bsad pa dang /_sems can thams cad phyag rgya gdab pa dang /_'dod pa'i dga' ba la 'jug pa dang /_dbang bskur ba dang /_dngos po thams cad glu len du 
[\[130a.5\]]gzhug pa dang /_gar byed du gzhug pa dang /_dgug pa dang /_gzhug pa dang /_bcid ba dang /_dbab pa la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/ci ste rdo rje phra mo bsgrub par 'dod na yang des rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[130a.6\]]'dzin du bsgom zhing de bzhin du bzlas pa'i tshul gyis zla ba gcig tu bsgrub par bya ste de nas mthar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas nam langs pa dang mngon par shes pa lngar gyur nas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang /_tshar 
[\[130a.7\]]gcad pa nus par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du zlos zhing zla ba gcig tu bsgrub la de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/de nas las rnams byed par 'dod na yang lan cig brjod de/_yid kyis bsam pas bsrung ba la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas pad+ma'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga 
[\[130b.2\]]rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/_de la dang por 'bum bzlas pa byas na bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bsgrub par bya ste ras la bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba la sogs pa bris la/_de'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du sems dpa' chen po bzhi 
[\[130b.3\]]bris la grwa rnams su lha mo rnams bri'o/_/de nas bzlas pa'i cho ga de bzhin du rgyas par byas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byon te/_dus ji bzhin par dam pa'i skabs 'byed par 'gyur ro zhes 
[\[130b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang des de bzhin du pad+ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag brgyad tshang bar brjod pa'i bar du dus bzhir bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag du phyag rgya bcings te bzlas pa 
[\[130b.5\]]byas la nam langs pa dang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyag rgya bcings pas ji lta ba bzhin 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/_/ci ste ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul du bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du zla ba'i 
[\[130b.6\]]mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu ji ltar dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas nam langs pa dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba'i 
[\[130b.7\]]mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/pad+ma'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]te/_de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag rnam bzhi byas la 'bum bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas de bzhin du ras la bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du bris la/_de nas de bzhin du bsgrub la zla ba'i mthar mtshan 
[\[131a.2\]]gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che/_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po byon nas dbang bskur ba sbyin pa mdzad do/_/dbang bskur ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[131a.3\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der rig 'dzin gyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du chos kyi rdo rje ma'i tshul rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i phyag rgya/_ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs na bsam pa thams 
[\[131a.4\]]cad kyi las byed par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/ci ste nor bu ye shes bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du rdo rje rin po che 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_ji lta ba'i rim pa bzhin du bsgom pa byas te dngos po med pa'i nam mkha' las rin chen ji ltar 'byung 
[\[131a.5\]]ba rin po che las byang chub sems dpa'i sku ji ltar 'byung zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dus bzhir bsgoms la ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin du bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas zla ba'i mthar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin 
[\[131a.6\]]gshegs pa thams cad byon nas/_ci dga' ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/_/de nas las bsgrub pa bshad de/_de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas nam langs 
[\[131a.7\]]pa dang bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/nor bu'i rigs kyi nye bar sbyong ba'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas rigs thams cad kyi 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]thun mong du bsgrub pa'i yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/_de la dang por snying po thams cad kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas par bshad do/_/snying po bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub par gyur cig ces brjod la snying po ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub 
[\[131b.2\]]pa'i cho ga bya'o/_/de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i yo byad dang cho ga ste/_phyag rgya thams cad bdag la dga' bar gyur cig ces smras la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te ci dga' bar ci nus kyis bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas ci lta ba bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di ni sngags thams 
[\[131b.3\]]cad kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ste/_spros pa med pa'i tshig grub par gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bdag la skye bar gyur cig ces smras la sngags ci dga' bar bzlas pa byas te 'di ni dngos grub bo/_/de la 'di ni rig pa'i yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa 
[\[131b.4\]]ste/_kye sems can 'di dag thams cad ni ma rig pas ldongs par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rig pa rtogs shing sdom par gyur to zhes smras la/_rig pa ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/
[\[131b.5\]]de nas snying po dang /_sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_rig pa thams cad ji ltar bsgom pa nyid du rdo rje bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/_sems pa gang gi snying po dang /_phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags dang /_rig pa rnams bzlas pa'i don du bsgrub par bya ba de ni bdag gam 
[\[131b.6\]]sems dpa' bsgoms na bsgrub par bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di lta 
[\[131b.7\]]ste/_de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste/_nor 'grub pa'i dngos grub dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub dang /_rig 'dzin nyid du 'grub pa dang /_dngos grub chen po rnams so/_/de la nor 'grub pa ni 'di yin te/_gang na 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]gter yod par dogs pa der phyag rgya bcings la rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gter gyi gnas der/_rdo rje blta bas blta ba na/_ci ste rdo rje lta bu yar bar mthong na/_de na gter yod par shes par bya'o/_/de nas rdo rje lcags sgrog gi dam 
[\[132a.2\]]tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te sa brkos la ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du blangs na rtsod pa med par thob par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te/_phyag rgya gang sgrub par byed na badzra sid+d+hi zhes brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[132a.3\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub ni rnam pa bzhi yod de/_de ni 'di ltar chu'i steng nas phar 'gro zhing 'dug pa la sogs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi gzugs ston pa dang /_ji srid du dga' ba de srid du mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang /_nam mkha' la 'gro ba 
[\[132a.4\]]dang /_dpag tshad stong gi steng du lding ba dang /_'og tu 'gro zhing 'ong ba dang /_phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong du ci dga' bar song la bskor te slar 'ong ba dang /_dpag tshad stong khor khor yug gi sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa shes pa dang /_dngos po thams 
[\[132a.5\]]cad mig gis mthong zhing rna bas thos pa dang /_phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong khor yug na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad ci dga' bar 'phang du blangs te 'dug pa dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig la sogs pa'i dbyig thams cad dang /_nor thams cad 
[\[132a.6\]]phrogs nas kyang sus kyang cung zad kyang brgal mi nus te/_bdag gi rdo rjes kyang mi thub par 'gyur na/_gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/_skyes bu stong phrag bcu bsdams pa'i stobs dang ldan pa dang /_rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan pa dang /_rtag tu 'dod pa thams cad longs 
[\[132a.7\]]spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /_rtag tu dar la bab cing lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa dang /_rdo rje sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rdo rje'i dngos grub bla na med pas mchod pa byed cing lo stong phrag bcu bzhi'i bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dngos grub kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te/_phyag rgya sgrub pa na rdo rje rig 'dzin ces brjod la 'grub pa dang /_rdo rje rig 'dzin gyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/_'dod pa thams 
[\[132b.2\]]cad la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig gis bskor te/_slar 'ong zhing bde ba thams cad la yongs su spyod pa dang /_lo [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'i na tshod dang ldan pa dang /_skra 'khyil ba dang ldan pa dang /_rdo rje chen po'i rig 'dzin du gyur nas 
[\[132b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad mthong zhing bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig 'dzin gyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni dngos grub chen po 'grub pa yin te/_
[\[132b.4\]]bdag nyid phyag rgya'i snying po don du bdag nyid kyis phyag rgya bsgrubs na sems dpa'i gzugs su gyur nas skad cig gcig gis kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gzugs sna tshogs kyis bya ba sna tshogs byed pa dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems 
[\[132b.5\]]dpar bcas pa thams cad mthong nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas sems can ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don byas nas slar 'ongs te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa'i mchog thams 
[\[132b.6\]]cad dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa thams cad dang /_bde ba dang /_yid bde ba thams cad la spyod cing rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur nas tshe'i tshad ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i bskal ba chen po'i tshad du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 
[\[132b.7\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi dngos grub chen pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub ste/_de yang 'di ltar gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub dang /_dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub dang /_bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]grub dang /_dngos grub dam pa rnams so/_/de la 'di ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub yin te/_khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la dbang phyug chen po rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te bsgrub par bya'o/_/de 
[\[133a.2\]]nas gzugs de skad 'byin pa dang hU~M zhes bya bar brjod par bya'o/_/hU~M zhes brjod pa tsam gyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams sgrub pa'i mdun du bka' nyan cing dbang du 'gyur ro/_/da phyin cad 'jig 
[\[133a.3\]]rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur te/_nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'jig rten gsum po 'khor lo thams cad kun du bskor te/_slar 'ongs nas lha ma rungs pa la sogs pa sems can thams cad hU~M zhes bya bas 'dul bar byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[133a.4\]]pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i gzugs dang ldan pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad la bka' stsol cing rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong nas mnyes par byed cing lo stong du 'tsho bar byed par bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M zhes byed pas gsungs 
[\[133a.5\]]so/_/de la 'di ni dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub ste/_phyag rgya bsgrub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dang por bdag nyid dbang bskur la bsgrub par bya ste/_de nas grub pa dang dbang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/_rdo rje'i 
[\[133a.6\]]dbang dang /_rin po che'i dbang dang /_chos kyi dbang dang /_las kyi dbang rnams so/_/de la rdo rje'i dbang thob na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/rin po che'i dbang thob na rin po che thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi dbang gis 
[\[133a.7\]]ni chos thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/las kyi dbang gis ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni bde ba dang yid bde ba thams 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]cad kyi dngos grub ste/_/de yang 'di ltar rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas na/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[133b.2\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni dngos grub dam pa ste/_de yang ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag mnyam mo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di dag ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub rnams 
[\[133b.3\]]te/_de ni 'di ltar mnyes par bya ba dang /_dbang du bya ba dang /_bsrung ba dang /_pad+ma'i dngos grub rnams so/_/de la mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te/_ji ltar pad+ma 'dod pa bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams cad 
[\[133b.4\]]mnyes par byed nus par 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug rjes su dran par byas na sems can thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro/_/byams pas 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_bskyab nus par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[133b.5\]]bdag nyid pad+ma'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la pad+ma lag par blangs te bsgrubs na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs dang ldan pa dang /_rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing lo stong phrag bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pad+mas 
[\[133b.6\]]gsungs so/_/de la 'di dag ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub rnams te/_de yang 'di ltar rigs thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub dang /_gzi brjid chen po dang /_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_rin po che'i dngos grub rnams so/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[133b.7\]]pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste/_nyid kyis dbang dbul ba dang /_mar me dbul ba dang /_ci nus kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_rin po che bsgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]na ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po ches gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi thun mong ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas rtog pa thams cad 
[\[134a.2\]]kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpas gsungs so/_/de la dang po kho nar ni snying po thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_'jig rten 'dul ba ji lta bar/_/de 'dra bar ni dngos grub 'dod/_/de yi 
[\[134a.3\]]thabs ni phyag rgya ste/_/dngos grub chen po kun sbyin no/_/de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_'jig rten 'dul ba chags bral min/_/phyag rgya'i dngos grub chags las skyes/_/de yi thabs ni bsgom pa ste/_/dngos grub kun gyi mchog 
[\[134a.4\]]tu 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni sngags kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_bden las 'jig rten 'di nyams pas/_/sngags kyi dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/_/spros pa med pa'i thabs kyis ni/_/dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni rig pa thams cad kyi dngos 
[\[134a.5\]]grub kyi rgyud de/_ma rig mun chags 'di la ni/_/rig pa'i dngos grub yod min te/_/de yi thabs ni rgya che ba/_/dngos grub kun gyi mchog thob bo/_/rtog pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi yi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad 
[\[134a.6\]]par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/_/de la dang po kho nar ni snying po thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_mchod pa rnam bzhi byas nas ni/_/bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te/_/bsod nams med kyang 
[\[134a.7\]]sangs rgyas mchod/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_dam tshig gsang ba bsrungs na ni/_/bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te/_/bsod nams med kyang myur bar ni/_/dam tshig bsrungs na myur 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]du 'grub/_/de la 'di ni sngags kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_sangs rgyas mtshan la sogs brjod na/_/bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te/_/bsod nams med kyang myur bar ni/_/chos sbyin pas ni dngos grub 'thob/_/de la 'di ni rig pa'i 
[\[134b.2\]]bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_bsod nams nang na sbyin pa mchog_/byin na bsod nams thob 'gyur te/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs na/_/myur du sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub/_/rtog pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/_/de nas rtog pa 
[\[134b.3\]]thams cad kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/_/de la dang po kho nar snying po shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_yi ge a la 'jug byed cing /_/yi ge thams cad rnam bsgoms la/_/
[\[134b.4\]]rang gi kha nas gzhan zhal du/_/bsgoms na bsod nams thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dpal gyis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_shes rab nges 'bigs zhes bya ba/_/
[\[134b.5\]]ting nge 'dzin ces grags pa ste/_/des ni phyag rgya myur 'grub par/_/bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das shes rab mchog gis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni sngags kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_shes rab sgra yi rjes 'brang ba/_/
[\[134b.6\]]ting 'dzin tshig ni rab spros pa/_/de bsgoms na ni myur ba yang /_/sngags kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje blos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rig pa'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rig dang sngags dang khyad par du/_/khyad par yod pa ma 
[\[134b.7\]]yin te/_/shes rab bsgoms na myur bar ni/_/nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes kyis gsungs so/_/rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]nas rtog pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/_/de la dang po kho nar snying po thams cad tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_mchod pa thams cad rab byas na/_/dge ba yi ni chos 
[\[135a.2\]]rnams kyi/_/tshogs ni rnam par 'phel 'gyur te/_/de nas tshogs ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_'khor lo mang por zhugs pa dang /_/dkyil 'khor mang por bris pa'i phyir/_/tshogs rdzogs pas na phyag rgya rnams/_/
[\[135a.3\]]dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni sngags kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_rjes su yi rangs la sogs tshul/_/de bzhin dam pa'i chos bklags dang /_/bzlas pa mang po byas nas ni/_/nges par sngags kyi dngos grub 'thob/_/de la 'di ni rig 
[\[135a.4\]]pa'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/_ma rig rab tu spangs pa dang /_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin tshul phyir/_/tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs nas kyang /_/myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/rtog pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud rdzogs sto//_//de nas byang 
[\[135a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma byung ba'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la ji ltar rdo rje 'byung zhe na/_/de nyid bcom ldan sems dpa' ste/_/thams cad sems de nyid bdag po/_/sku dang gsung dang 
[\[135a.6\]]thugs rdo rje/_/sems dpa' rang byung brtan pa ste/_/sems dpa' kun gyi mchog sems dpa'/_/rdo rje snying gar rab bsgoms na/_/rdo rje sems dpa' zhes grags te/_/'di la rdo rje rab tu gnas/_/de nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/_/ye shes tshul te mnyam pa 
[\[135a.7\]]med/_/snying las sna tshogs byung nas ni/_/sna tshogs pa yi gzugs 'gyur te/_/khams kun gyi ni rdul grangs su/_/de dag nyid ni rgyal ba yin/_/rdo rje'i sku ni de dag las/_/rdo rje sems dpar yang dag 'gyur/_/sems dpa' dang po las de nyid/_/mtshan ma thams 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]cad yang dag 'byung /_/mtshan ma las ni sems dpa' che/_/de las tshul 'di thams cad 'byung /_/gang gis 'di ni thos 'gyur la/_/dad cing 'dzin byed snying gar yang /_/rtag tu dga' bas bsgoms nas ni/_/de dag myur du dngos grub thob/_/ces bcom ldan 
[\[135b.2\]]'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rtog pa thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/_/de la 
[\[135b.3\]]dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud 'di yin te/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes ni/_/rtag tu rnam smin rtog las byung /_/mi rtog pa yi ye shes las/_/de phyir rtag pa zhes brjod do/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin 
[\[135b.4\]]gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/_/mi rtog gang la rtog nyid du/_/brtags pas rtog las byung ba ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/_/
[\[135b.5\]]cho ga bzhin du ri mor bris/_/rtog pa grub sbyin zhes brtags pa/_/rtog dang bral ba'i bdag nyid kyis/_/de phyir rtog pa zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/_rtog pa las ni 'dod chags 'byung /_/pad+ma la ni de 
[\[135b.6\]]gnas te/_/de phyir rtog la gnas pa ni/_/grub pa nyid du de 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/_rtog pa med pa'i nor bu ni/_/mthu yis shin tu mchog tu 'gyur/_/de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas/_/lha rdzas dngos grub 
[\[135b.7\]]'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i rgyud do/_/de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/_yid kyis 'dod pa'i cho ga yis/_/yid kyis 'dod pa 'grub 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]'gyur te/_/ting 'dzin bsgrub pa snying la gnas/_/de phyir snying po zhes brjod do/_/de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/_ji ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog_/khrims ni 'da' ka mi phyed bzhin/_/bdag nyid chen po gzugs 
[\[136a.2\]]brnyan gyis/_/mtshan ma phyag rgya zhes par grags/_/de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi sngags 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/_'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing /_/dbye bar dka' la gsang ba nyid/_/gsang ba grub phyir brjod pas na/_/de yi phyir ni sngags zhes brjod/_/de nas rig pa 
[\[136a.3\]]'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/_ma rig pa ni gzhom pa dang /_/ngag gi rig mchog 'grub pa'i phyir/_/rtogs shing rig pa dngos grub ste/_/de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/_/rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po la sogs 
[\[136a.4\]]pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do/_/de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/_de la dang po kho nar snying po'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud yin te/_snying po bzlas te bdag gam ni/_/gzhan yang rung ste byung ba na/_/byung dang 'byung 'gyur gang gis ni/_/mthong zhing thos 
[\[136a.5\]]'gyur shes par bya/_/de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te/_bdag gi cho ga ji bzhin du/_/gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya bcings/_/'jig rten pa la bltas nas ni/_/gong ma bzhin du kun shes 'gyur/_/de la 'di ni sngags kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud 
[\[136a.6\]]yin te/_lan cig tsam yang sngags brjod na/_/'das dang 'byung dang byung gang yin/_/rang gi lce la smra 'gyur ba/_/de dag thams cad bden par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rig pa'i 
[\[136a.7\]]ye shes skye ba'i rgyud de/_rig pa lan cig brjod na ni/_/byung dang 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rnams/_/ji ltar rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du/_/yid kyis de ni shes par 'gyur/_/rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes skye ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas rigs 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]thams cad kyi thun mong gi gsang ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud yin no/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa yin te/_ji ltar de ltar 'dug nas kyang /_/skyil mo krung bcas bsgrub bya ste/_/ji ltar ri mo'i tshul byas 
[\[136b.2\]]nas/_/sems dpa' chen po grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa yin te/_ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni/_/brgyad bsgrub tshul du rab tu gnas/_/shin tu khros nas 
[\[136b.3\]]bsgrub byas na/_/the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud yin te/_rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas la/_/lag gnyis rdo rje bcings nas kyang /_/
[\[136b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi sku gyur la/_/pad+ma 'byung ba bsgrub par bya/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i sems dpas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa yin te/_ji ltar 'dug gam nyal ba'am/_/'chag kyang rung ste de ltar ni/_/rdo rje 
[\[136b.5\]]rin chen dbang bskur na/_/the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/_lce rtse shin tu mi bsgul zhing /_/so dang mchu gnyis sbyar 
[\[136b.6\]]nas ni/_/rtog pa thams cad bsgrub bya zhing /_/sgra bral rdo rje'i tshig yin no/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsung gis gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/_/hU~M zhes bya ba 'brug sgrar bsgrags/_/khro bo'i ngag ni 
[\[136b.7\]]zab cing bstan/_/rdo rje chen po khro bo'i gsal/_/rdo rje khro bo'i gsung 'grub bo/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/_dbugs mi 'byin ltar dbugs 'byin cing /_/
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]phra ba'i tshig ni shin tu gsal/_/ting 'dzin ye shes snying po yis/_/zlos pa po rnams grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung 
[\[137a.2\]]gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/_shin tu yongs su gsal tshig gis/_/rtag tu 'dud la brtson byed cing /_/tshul 'di bzlas par gyur na ni/_/myur du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de 
[\[137a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/_rtag tu 'dod pa bcom ldan 'das/_/sems can thams cad bde sbyin pas/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid du/_/bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs 
[\[137a.4\]]so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/_sems can kun la phan pa dang /_/ma rungs pa rnams gdul ba dang /_/sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/_/khro bo dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[137a.5\]]pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/_ji ltar pad+ma rab chags la/_/bsgos pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa/_/de ltar bdag gis chags skyon yang /_/srid na chags pa de 'grub 'gyur/_/zhes 
[\[137a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das pad+ma bzhad pas gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/_nam zhig sems can thams cad kyi/_/dgos pa'i don ni kun sgrub cing /_/rin chen char ni 'bebs 'gyur zhes/_/grub na myur bar de 'grub bo/_/
[\[137a.7\]]zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/_ji ltar langs sam 'dug pa'am/_/'chag kyang rung ste de ltar ni/_/lag pa g.yon pas phyag rgya mchog_/thams 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]cad byed na 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba phyag rgya rdo rjes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/_de lta de ltar gnas nas kyang /_/ji lta ji ltar byed kyang 
[\[137b.2\]]rung /_/rdo rje khro bo mdzub mo bcings/_/gos kyis g.yogs na 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rgyal pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/_lag ni g.yon 
[\[137b.3\]]pas pad+ma yi/_/khu tshur bcings te sbas nas ni/_/ji dgar myur du pad+ma yi/_/dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/_
[\[137b.4\]]g.yon pa'i rin chen khu tshur ni/_/bcings te dam pa'i lag g.yogs la/_/ci dga' bar ni rim gror byed/_/rin chen dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i thun mong gi 
[\[137b.5\]]phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/_rang gi sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du ni/_/rdo rje dag dang rdo rje'i lta/_/ring por mi thogs mchog 'grub bo/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/_/rigs 
[\[137b.6\]]thams cad kyi gsang ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud rdzogs sto//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtog pa 'di ni 
[\[137b.7\]]byin gyis brlab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_/de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas yang legs so zhes bya ba 'di byin no/_/rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang /_/theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/_/mdo 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]'di legs par bshad pas na/_/legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/_/rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/_/rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/_/rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las rgyud thams cad kyi phyi ma'i phyi 
[\[138a.2\]]ma'i rgyud rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab bo/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa' che/_/sems can don mchog bdag nyid can/_/
[\[138a.3\]]shAkya'i rgyal po ye shes che/_/rdo rje bdag nyid khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sems dpa' 'byung ba de nyid don/_/sems can rgyu ste tshul chen po/_/sems can don chen dgos pa'i don/_/sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sangs rgyas chos ni chos chen po/_/
[\[138a.4\]]chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor ba/_/smra ba chen po rab rig mchog_/sems dpa' chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/_/las chen bsrung ba chen po ste/_/las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa/_/bdag nyid chen po 'gro spyod mchog_/sems dpa' rgyu khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/pha 
[\[138a.5\]]rol phyin pa kun brnyes pa/_/kun mkhyen ye shes mkhyen pa po/_/sems dpa' kun te thabs chen po/_/shes rab chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/_/thugs rje chen po mchog gi mchog_/thugs rje thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/_/thams cad gtong ba byams pa che/_/kun 
[\[138a.6\]]mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shAkya seng ge shAkya che/_/shAkya shAkya thub pa che/_/'dul ba chen po khyab pa po/_/'gro don 'dul mchog khyod phyag 'tshal/_/chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam brnyes pa/_/chos dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa ste/_/rdo rje mgon po mgon 
[\[138a.7\]]chen po/_/sems can tshogs ni khyod phyag 'tshal/_/'od chen snang ba chen po ste/_/brtson 'grus chen po stobs chen po/_/dpa' bo chen po rab dpa' mchog_/bde spyod dpa' bo khyod phyag 'tshal/_/tshangs pa rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das/_/shAkya dpa' bo thub pa 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]che/_/kun bdag thub pa dag pa yi/_/chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nam mkha'i sku ste sku yi mchog_/sku gsum sku min sgom pa po/_/kun gyi sku ste sku che ba/_/rdo rje'i sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/gsung min gsung ste gsung gi mchog_/gsung gsum 
[\[138b.2\]]gsung min ston pa pa po/_/gsung kun shin tu gsung che ba/_/rdo rje'i gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems min sems te sems kyi mchog_/sems gsum sems min ston pa po/_/thams cad sems te sems che ba/_/rdo rje sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdor min 
[\[138b.3\]]rdo rje rdo rje'i mchog_/rdo rje gsum pa rdor min sbyong /_/rdo rje thams cad rdo rje che/_/rdo rje rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/_/kun khyab srid pa'i rtse mo mchog_/bde gshegs bdag po rgyal ba ni/_/khams gsum pa yi rgyal po che/_/snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[138b.4\]]mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/_/gang gis skad cig nyan byed dam/_/klog gam yang na sgom pa'ang rung /_/kun gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/_/mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/thugs rje chen po bskyed nas kyang /_/chos 
[\[138b.5\]]kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bka' stsal pa'i tshig gsan nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[138b.6\]]gshegs pa rnams yang gcig tu 'du bar mdzad par gsol/_de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/_/rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs 
[\[138b.7\]]pa'i/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi mdun du rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor kun du khyab par byas nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/_/rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/
[\[139a.2\]]ji ltar 'dul ba'i sna tshogs pa'i/_/rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyis rdo rje dbyings 
[\[139a.3\]]la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu bskor bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/_/rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/ji ltar 'dul ba 
[\[139a.4\]]sna tshogs pa'i/_/khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[139a.5\]]kyi khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/_/rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/ji ltar 'dul bar sna 
[\[139a.6\]]tshogs pa'i/_/pad+ma'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal pos pad+ma'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 
[\[139a.7\]]gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/_/rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/ji ltar 'dul bar sna tshogs pa'i/_/nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]bskor/_/de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can phra ba'am/_sbom pa yang rung /_de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ri rab ri'i rgyal po rtse mo rdo rje dang /_nor bu dang /_rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs 
[\[139b.2\]]par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gdan la bzhugs nas/_rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu bskor bar phyogs kun nas mthong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/_/mi yi nang du 
[\[139b.3\]]babs nas kyang /_/dgos phyir sems can kun gyi don/_/rdo rje'i 'khor lo mchog bskor zhing /_/mgon po rab tu bsgrub par mdzod/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[139b.4\]]gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'du ba mdzad du gsol/_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
