[\[139b.5\]]cad rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs rdo rjer bdag nyid du gyur par mkhyen nas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyed kyang nga'i thugs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_rigs thams 
[\[139b.6\]]cad dang /_dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su zhugs shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snang bas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/_/mdor na sangs rgyas thams 
[\[139b.7\]]cad kyi/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/_/zhugs nas sems can thams cad la/_/phan pa'i phyir ni bsgrub par bya/_/de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/_de bzhin 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]gshegs pa ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams las/_de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i sku 'phro ba mdzad pa rnams kyang /_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so/_/de 
[\[140a.2\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad dang /_gsung thams cad 'jug pa'i gnas dang /_sems kyi rgyud 'byung ba thams cad dang /_rdo rje'i tshul thams cad dang /_yan 
[\[140a.3\]]lag dang /_nying lag thams cad dang /_gnas thams cad dang /_mtshan thams cad dang /_dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /_ba spu'i khung bu thams cad dang /_rdul shin tu phra mo snyed kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /_thugs rnams su zhugs nas bzhugs so/_/
[\[140a.4\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon pa zhig na/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs rdo rjer de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid gyur par mkhyen nas/_ri rab ri'i rtse mo nas snying po 
[\[140a.5\]]byang chub pa gang na ba der gshegs nas ched du bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi shing drung du 'jig rten pa dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir rtswa blangs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/e ma sems can brtan pa yi/_/sems can don ni bdag don mchog_/gang phyir gdul 
[\[140a.6\]]dbang brtan pa rnams/_/mu stegs lta bas gnas bar mdzad/_/mdor na mi 'dul 'jig rten pa/_/lta ba ngan pas ldongs pa rnams/_/ye shes snang bas dag bya'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 
[\[140a.7\]]'das la de kho na nyid mi shes pas 'di skad du kye dge sbyong ji byang chub kyi phyir/_'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal drag cing mi bzad pa la bzod par mdzad dam zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtswa de bting ste steng du bzhugs nas lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]grogs po rnams/_kho bos byang chub thob par sgrubs shig_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don ma rtogs nas/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gang na ba der dong nas ched du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la de ltar gyur ba 
[\[140b.2\]]'di brjod do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi tshogs kyis bskor te/_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po la de ltar gyur pa 'di dag brjod do/_/de nas tshangs pa chen po 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na 
[\[140b.3\]]spyod pa'i lha thams cad dang /_lhan cig tu 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po la de ltar gyur pa rnams brjod do/_/de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po dbang phyug chen pos lha rnams kyi bdag po mthu bo che la sogs pa la 'di skad ces 
[\[140b.4\]]smras so/_/grogs po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dang mthun par mdzad cing /_yang bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ston gyis/_'di ltar 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no snyam du 
[\[140b.5\]]shes par ma byed cig_/lha nyid las de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur gyis/_lha de dag nyid du bsgrub par bya'i/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du ni ma yin no/_/de legs kyis der mchod du 'dong bar sgrub bo/_/de nas lha thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po la sogs 
[\[140b.6\]]pa snying po byang chub gang na ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por byang chub par bzhugs pa gang na ba der dong nas/_ched du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[140b.7\]]bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_ran gyi gdan 'di las bzhengs la/_lha rdzas kyi gdan la bzhugs te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_lha'i bdag 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/grogs po rnams/_kho bo la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par sgrubs shig_/de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bstsal bar mi nus so/_/
[\[141a.2\]]ci ste bdag cag gis nus par gyur na/_bdag cag nyid yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid gsal bar mdzad cing /_yang tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/_/de ni gzugs min gzugs min min/_/bden 
[\[141a.3\]]min [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]min gtsang ba yi/_/sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di/_/rtogs na rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur/_/de nas lha'i dbang po de dag gis cung zad cig cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rtswa'i gdan las bzhengs te/_lha de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[141a.4\]]stsal to/_/grogs po rnams/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di lta bu rtogs par bya ba sgrubs shig_/de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das/_bdag cag gis rngo mi thogs so/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa 'di 
[\[141a.5\]]gsungs so/_/yid kyis rab tu rtogs pas na/_/byang chub sems ni brtan par byos/_/sems dpa' rdo rje brtan byas la/_/sangs rgyas su ni bdag sgoms shig_/de nas de dag gis 'di skad du/_de lta bu legs so zhes bya ba thams cad kyis smras nas dong ngo /_/de 
[\[141a.6\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo de'i tho rangs 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir/_bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams 
[\[141a.7\]]cad la phan par mdzad pa/_'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs la zhugs pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/theg pa chen po bdag nyid che/_/snang ba che zhing dag pa che/_/mgon chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje che/_/rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun/_/sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus che/_/thabs chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje 'dod pa dag pa che/_/kun gyi bde ba bde ba che/_/bde mchog thog ma tha ma med/_/bzhad chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje legs pa 
[\[141b.2\]]dgyes pa che/_/legs zhes bya ba rab mnyes pa/_/mnyes pa che zhing dgyes pa che/_/rab dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje rin chen rgyal po che/_/dbang bskur bzang po bdag po che/_/rin chen thams cad mdzes pa che/_/rnam rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje gzi brjid gzi brjid 
[\[141b.3\]]che/_/'od chen lham pa chen po ste/_/rgyal ba'i 'od de 'bar ba che/_/sangs rgyas 'od khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje rgyal mtshan dbal che ba/_/rgyal mtshan che bas nor rab gtong /_/nam mkha'i rgyal mtshan yu ba che/_/gtong ba'i rgyal mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal/_/rdo rje bzhad pa bzhad 
[\[141b.4\]]pa che/_/dgyes pa che zhing rab dgyes pa/_/dgyes pa'i shugs kyis rol cing dgyes/_/chos dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje chos ni chos che ba/_/sems dpa'i chos ni rab sbyong ba/_/sangs rgyas chos te chos rab mchog_/'dod chos khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje rnon 
[\[141b.5\]]po ral gri che/_/shes rab ye shes blo gros che/_/sdig gcod ral gri chen po ste/_/sangs rgyas mtshon khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje rgyu ste 'khor lo che/_/sangs rgyas 'khor lo gter chen po/_/dkyil 'khor kun te chos kyi mchog_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor khyod phyag 'tshal/_/
[\[141b.6\]]rdo rje gsung ba gsung ba che/_/spros med yi ge chen po ste/_/yi ge med pa bzlas pa che/_/sangs rgyas gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje las te las rab mchog_/las chen las rab byed pa ste/_/gsang ba'i mchod pa mchod pa che/_/sangs rgyas mchod khyod phyag 'tshal 
[\[141b.7\]]lo/_/rdo rje bsrung ba go cha che/_/go cha'i mchog ste brtan pa che/_/bsrung ba che zhing snying po che/_/sangs rgyas brtson 'grus phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin khro bo che/_/ma rungs thams cad skrag byed pa/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen te/_/bsrung ba mchog khyod phyag 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]'tshal lo/_/rdo rje bsdams pa phyag rgya che/_/dam tshig chen po bcing ba che/_/khu tshur chen po phyag rgya che/_/rdo rje khu tshur khyod phyag 'tshal/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bya zhing /_/brjod de mchod de bsti stang bya/_/gang phyir thog ma tha ma med/_/byang chub sems ni 
[\[142a.2\]]khyod yin te/_/khyod la brten nas rgyal ba dang /_/dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa' kun/_/byung zhing yang dag 'byung 'gyur bas/_/sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi rgyu/_/rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/_/rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal/_/rdo rje chos khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje las 
[\[142a.3\]]ni khyod phyag 'tshal/_/yang dag par ni phyag 'tshal zhing /_/mtshan mchog gis ni khyod bstod pa'i/_/bsod nams gang yin de kun kyang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub thob par shog_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/_/rab dad pas ni lan cig tsam/_/gang gis legs 
[\[142a.4\]]par brjod pa ni/_/kun kyang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/_gsung gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba 'di byin no/_/
[\[142a.5\]]rdo rje theg pa bla na med/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang /_/theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/_/mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na/_/rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so/_/rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/_/rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/_/rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/_/bcom 
[\[142a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'phags pa byang chub sems dpar bcas pa rang gi thugs la zhugs pa thams cad dgyes shing mnyes nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa la mngon par dgyes par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[142a.7\]]pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rgyud nye bar bsdus pa dang bcas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgyud 'di la 'gyur byang mi snang na'ang /_paN+Di ta shrad+d+hA ka ra war+m+ma dang /_bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur bar grags//_//
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]{D480}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_badzra shi khar ma hA gu h+ya yo ga tan+t+ra/_bod skad du/_gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo/_oM kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la 
[\[142b.2\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang /_/kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis/_/'khor lo de ni brtags byas nas/_/rnal 'byor can ni mi gsung bzhugs/_/mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun/_/ma lus thub pa'i skyes mchog gis/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal 
[\[142b.3\]]po che/_/thub pa'i dbang phyug la gsol 'debs/_/rnal 'byor tshul chen sgrub byed cing /_/cho ga sna tshogs yang dag 'byung /_/rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba'i/_/'khor lo mchog ni bshad du gsol/_/mgon po khyod ni skal chen te/_/khyod ni bya ba don sems byed/_/
[\[142b.4\]]gsang ba mkhyen cing dgongs bshad mkhyen/_/rnal 'byor rig pa'i mchog gyur gsungs/_/de nyid rjes kyi de nyid ldan/_/rnal 'byor bdag nyid rnal 'byor che/_/rdo rje chen po byang chub sems/_/gsungs shig gsungs shig tshul chen po/_/rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor 
[\[142b.5\]]lo ste/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor sna tshogs bdag_/gsang ba'i snying po dkyil 'khor che/_/chos kyi tshul ni sgrub byed pa/_/rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi/_/chos kyi don 'di ci yin brjod/_/'dir ni rtog pa ji lta bu/_/sgrub pa'i don ni ji ltar lags/_/ci phyir 'di ni rgyud 
[\[142b.6\]]phyi ma/_/rgyud don ci yin brjod par bgyi/_/ci phyir rgyud dang phyi ma lags/_/rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar byung /_/rdo rje 'chang drag 'di ci zhig_/drag po'i don ni ji ltar byung /_/rdo rje zhi ba 'di ci zhig_/ci yi phyir na zhi bar brjod/_/phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir/_/rdo rje gtum po'ang ci zhig lags/_/
[\[142b.7\]]ci yi phyir na gtum por brjod/_/ci yi phyir na khro bor brjod/_/rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa/_/ci phyir rdo rjer brjod par bgyid/_/rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ci/_/de yi rdo rje ji lta bu/_/rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni du/_/rdo rje rigs kun gang gi lags/_/chen po gnas gang zhig na 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]gnas/_/rigs ni rnam pa du yin brjod/_/ci yi phyir na rigs su brjod/_/rigs bdag rang bzhin 'di ci zhig_/ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du/_/ci phyir rdo rje sems dpa' lags/_/rdo rje rgyal po ci yin brjod/_/
[\[143a.2\]]rdo rje chags pa 'di don ci/_/rdo rje legs pa ci yin brjod/_/rdo rje rin chen ci yi phyir/_/rdo rje gzi brjid ci yin brjod/_/rdo rje rgyal mtshan bzhad pa che/_/gsungs shig ci yin brjod pa gsungs/_/ci yi phyir na rdo rje chos/_/rdo rje rnon po ci yin brjod/_/rdo rje rgyu ni 'khor lo 
[\[143a.3\]]che/_/rdo rje smra ba ci yin brjod/_/rdo rje las dang gnod sbyin che/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che/_/rdo rje srung ba khu tshur che/_/gsungs shig ci yin brjod par gsungs/_/sems dpa' 'di rnams gang las byung /_/de bzhin pha dang ma ni gang /_/dang po gang zhig gleng gzhi gang /_/
[\[143a.4\]]dmigs pa'i rkyen ni gang zhig lags/_/gsang ba 'di ni gang las byung /_/khyab bdag 'di rnams gang nas byung /_/thog ma tha ma med 'di ci/_/gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen pos gsungs/_/rab tu dga' nyid rab bzang nyid/_/rdo rje snying bdag ji lta bu/_/ci yi phyir na 
[\[143a.5\]]kun tu bzang /_/de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'chang /_/dang po'i rigs ni ji ltar byung /_/chos kun skye ba med pa dang /_/'byung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod/_/ci phyir sangs rgyas brjod par bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod/_/bcom 
[\[143a.6\]]ldan 'das bcom ci yin brjod/_/de bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ci/_/ci yi phyir na ye shes brjod/_/shes rab ye shes ci yin brjod/_/ci phyir shes rab brjod par bya/_/de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin/_/tshul ni ci zhig ting 'dzin gang /_/bsam gtan rnal 'byor rnal 'byor 
[\[143a.7\]]ci/_/srid gsum 'jig rten gsum don ci/_/ci yi phyir yang khams gsum pa/_/'khor ba'i don ni ci zhig yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa'ang ci yin brjod/_/rtag dang 'jig dang de bzhin dag_/theg pa chen po ci yin brjod/_/nam mkha' yang ni ci yi phyir/_/sa nyid 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]kyang ni ci yin brjod/_/'byung ba chen po gang las 'byung /_/'gog pa ci zhig gang gis byed/_/ci yi phyir na phyag rgyar brjod/_/ci phyir sngags su brjod par bya/_/ci yi phyir na rig sngags brjod/_/de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags rnams/_/phyag rgya yi ni mtshan nyid gsungs/_
[\[143b.2\]]sngags kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya/_/rig sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid gsungs/_/de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags rnams/_/rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i gnas ni gang /_/ji ltar bcing ba thub chen po/_/phyag rgya dag ni 'ching ba na/_/ji ltar rdo rje can kun mnyes/_/rig sngags ji 
[\[143b.3\]]ltar bzlas par bgyi/_/thub pa chen po de gsungs shig_/rig sngags dag ni zlos pa na/_/ji ltar yid kyis rdo rje bzlas/_/dri ba'i tshogs mdor bstan pa'o//_//oM ni ci zhig yin par bshad/_/yi ge hU~M ni ci yin brjod/_/ci yi phyir na yi ge phaT/_/swA hA zhes pa ci yin brjod/_/
[\[143b.4\]]mchod par ci phyir brjod par bya/_/de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang /_/ci yi phyir na dkyil 'khor yin/_/dkyil 'khor cho ga ji lta bu/_/dkyil 'khor dang por zhugs pa yi/_/skyes pa yang na bud med kyi/_/bya ba gang zhig bya ba ni/_/gsungs shig gsang ba'i dbang phyug che/_/
[\[143b.5\]]thub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la/_/sdom pa ji ltar sbyin par bgyi/_/de yis srog gi phyir yang ni/_/dor bar mi bya gang zhig lags/_/khrus kyi las ni ji ltar bya/_/de bzhin kho nar phyogs bcing ba/_/bgegs rnams bcing ba dang bcas pa'i/_/log 'dren ji ltar bskrad 
[\[143b.6\]]par bgyi/_/dga' ba chen po ji lta bur/_/rab tu gus bcas phyag dag bgyi/_/spos dang me tog de bzhin du/_/mar me mchod sogs ji ltar lags/_/dkyil 'khor brtag pa ji lta bur/_/gzhug pa yang ni ji ltar lags/_/dam tshig ci zhig yin par bshad/_/rdo rje 
[\[143b.7\]]slob ma'i cho ga gang /_/sngon du bsnyen pa ji ltar bgyi/_/sgrub pa'i don ni ji ltar lags/_/gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ji lta bu/_/snyoms 'jug ji lta bu zhig lags/_/mdun du dgug pa'i don ni ji ltar lags/_/'dir ni rjes su chags pa'ang ji lta bu/_/bcing bar bya ba'i las 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]ni ji lta bu/_/'dren pa rnams ni mnyes par ji ltar 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'dir ni gshegs su gsol ba lags/_/dkyil 'khor mchog ni ji ltar gdeg par bgyi/_/'gro ba'i bya ba yang ni ji ltar bgyi/_/las kyi cho ga'i bya ba ji ltar bgyi/_/dge ba stug po gsang 
[\[144a.2\]]chen ji lta bu/_/las rnams tha dad bya ba ji lta bu/_/phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan ni ji ltar bgyi/_/mchod dang mchod pa'i lan ni ji ltar blang /_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lo ji ltar 'byung /_/'khor lo'i rnam pa'i bye brag du zhig mchis/_/dngos dang dngos med ji ltar spang ba 
[\[144a.3\]]lags/_/bla ma gsang byung 'od zer gsang ba ci/_/sbyin sreg rnam pa du ru brjod/_/thab khung ji lta bu zhig lags/_/sbyin sreg mdor bsdus ji lta bu/_/las rnams ji ltar 'byung ba la/_/las rnams rnam pa du ru brjod/_/gsang ba rnams ni rnam pa du/_/mchog tu 
[\[144a.4\]]gsang ba ji ltar brjod/_/de nyid ji lta bu zhig lag lags/_/phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya ci/_/mchod pa'i phyag rgya ji ltar lags/_/rigs kyi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/_/ji ltar bsgrub bya shin tu bsgrub/_/rdo rje phra mo ji ltar brjod/_/bgegs ni ji ltar bsal bar bgyi/_/mdor 
[\[144a.5\]]na rig pa 'dzin pa dang /_/slob dpon ji lta bu zhig lags/_/dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i/_/'khor lo rnam pa du ru brjod/_/dngos grub mtshan nyid sgrub byed pa'i/_/sna tshogs rtog pa ji lta bu/_/thig rnams rtag pa nyid dang ni/_/dngos grub ji ltar nye bar brjod/_/
[\[144a.6\]]dngos grub tshogs ni ji lta bu/_/gsang ba kun nas btus pa gsungs/_/bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur bar/_/bya ba'i cho ga ji lta bu/_/yang na gzhan dag nyid la ni/_/dbang bskur ba ni ji ltar lags/_/ji ltar sems ni bskyed par bgyi/_/ting 'dzin ji lta bu zhig lags/_/
[\[144a.7\]]de nyid rig pa 'di rtag tu/_/rdo rje ye shes ji lta bu/_/gzhan yang dgongs pa ji lta bu/_/spyod pa ji lta bu zhig lags/_/gang yang rung ba'i rtags las byung /_/ming dang ming med shes pa'i mtshan/_/las 'bras med par byed po dang /_/'byin par byed par gang las 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]bshad/_/lus ni nam mkha' bzhin 'byung ba/_/gang las 'byung bar brjod par bya/_/ci yi phyir na thar par brjod/_/rnal 'byor pa don ci yin brjod/_/rdo rje dbyings ni skyed byed pa'i/_/rdo rje phra mo'i rnal 'byor gang /_/gzhan yang rang gi rigs dag las/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[144b.2\]]brtul zhugs ji ltar rtsom/_/mdor na dbang du bya ba dang /_/de nyid gsang ba gang zhig lags/_/theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i/_/gsang ba rtog chen las gsungs pa/_/dgongs pa rnam pa du ma yis/_/gsang ba gsungs shig blo gros che/_/rnal 'byor rnam pa du ru brjod/_/
[\[144b.3\]]rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung du/_/ji ltar rtsa ba'i rgyud du brjod/_/gsang ba'i rigs byung ji lta bu/_/de ni rang byung nyid yin te/_/khams gsum 'jig rten sa 'og dang /_/sa steng sa bla mya ngan 'das/_/ji skad bshad pa'i gsang ba gzhan/_/rdo rje can nyid khyab 'jug rang nyid yin/_/
[\[144b.4\]]nyi ma zla ba gshin rje drag po nyid/_/rang nyid skye dgu'i bdag ste pha ma yin/_/'gal ba'i tshig ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/_/dri ba'i tshogs gnyis pa mdor bstan pa'o//_//tshangs pa 'jig rten gsum lus dbang phyug che/_/gdung drug tshogs btsas lha'i rigs dkyil 'khor rnams/_/
[\[144b.5\]]gzhan yang gza' dang tshogs sogs gang yin pa/_/da bdag nyid ces ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/_/nga ni 'dod pa thar ba dang /_/nga ni dmyal ba'i dmyal ba pa/_/nga ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dud 'gro bdag_/tshig de ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/_/de nas gzhan yang 'dod la chags sems ldan/_/
[\[144b.6\]]lta bcas tshig ldan 'dzin pa'i lta la chags/_mu stegs theg dman mngon dga' skye dgu'i rigs/_/ji ltar 'dod bzhin don rnams rtogs byed cing /_/ji skad bshad pa'i sna tshogs rigs dkyil 'khor/_/dag pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas dgongs mi shes/_/rang gi 'dod pas 
[\[144b.7\]]mu ngan rtog byed pa/_/de la skye dgu'i bdag chen brtse bas gsungs/_/mchod 'os chen po mchog dang ldan pa'i gnas/_/gsang ba'i dbang mchog mngon bsdus dbye bar gsol/_/skye dgu'i bdag po'i dkyil 'khor gsang mdun du/_/dam tshig mchod pas ji ltar mchod par 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]bya/_/'dod yon lngar bcas rol bar byed pa yi/_/dngos grub tshogs mchog chen po thob par 'gyur/_/dman pa'i 'dod las rigs kyi dngos grub 'byung /_/dga' ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin b+ha ga ji ltar rtags ci 'dra/_/de yi 'jug pa 
[\[145a.2\]]yang ni ji ltar 'gyur/_/rdzas de dag ni ji ltar rab tu bsgrub/_/'jig rten gsum na dman pa ji ltar 'gyur/_/de nas 'dod chags zhen pas dngos grub thob/_/'dod chags dag phyir de ni ji ltar rung /_/chags bral sdig pas chags dang bral ba la/_/gsang ba bstan pas 
[\[145a.3\]]sdig dngos ji ltar 'gyur/_/gtor mas bsod nams mchog thob ji lta bu/_/skye dgu bsad pas bsod nams ji lta bu/_/ma byin blangs bas bsod nams 'gyur zhes pa'i/_/'gal ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/_/dga' ba chen po'i bud med bsten pa yis/_/
[\[145a.4\]]tshe 'di la ni sangs rgyas mchog 'grub pa/_/mi gtsang 'dod pa bsten pas sangs rgyas dang /_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung bar ji ltar 'gyur/_/'dir ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang mtshungs pa'i bsod nams med/_/ji ltar [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ni bsod nams ldan par brjod/_/'dir ni sems can 
[\[145a.5\]]gzhan bsad bza' bar bya/_/'gal ba'i tshig ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/_/'khor ba spangs kyang chos min 'gyur ba dang /_/mya ngan 'das la gzhol ba chos ma yin/_/sangs rgyas rnal 'byor gyi ni rjes 'jug pa/_/chos min 'gyur zhes ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/_/dregs dang 
[\[145a.6\]]ser sna sdang ba'i sems ldan pa/_/chos min spyod cing [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'i tshig la chags/_/srid gsum mngon par chags pas rnal 'byor sgrub/_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags bcas pas lhag par rgyal/_/rigs kyi rnal 'byor las byang ji ltar 'grub/_/bla med go 'phang dngos grub 
[\[145a.7\]]'dod pa yis/_/dag cing ngo mtshar rnal 'byor lhur blang bya/_/skyor gcin 'thung dang bshang ba za ba yis/_/dag cing mchog gyur rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod/_/mi gtsang bshang gci zos shing 'thungs pa yis/_/yid 'dod dngos grub ji ltar dngos grub 'dod/_/bud med bcas 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]bar lhan cig chos spyod cing /_/gnyis ka lhan cig gyur bas dag gtsang mchod/_/ji ltar bud med lhan cig dkyil 'khor mchod/_/dngos grub dam pa mchog tu ji ltar 'gyur/_/gzhan yang rdo rje rigs 'byung kun ldan zhing /_/mchog tu mi bzad drag po'i las can 
[\[145b.2\]]te/_/dag cing shin tu sdug la mtho bar 'gro/_/'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/_/gzhan yang brdeg dang gsad pa lhur len cing /_/bskrad dang drag pa'i las can de dag ni/_/dag cing shin tu sdug la mtho bar 'gro/_/'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/_/
[\[145b.3\]]gzhan yang bza' dang btung ba lhur len cing /_/snying 'byin pa yis dag par 'dod pa nyid/_/de ni dag cing sdug la mtho bar 'gro/_/'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung ba yin/_/gzhan yang nor bu rin chen 'phrog pa yis/_/sdug cing bstan la dag cing mthor 'gro dang /_/gzhan yang 
[\[145b.4\]]nga rgyal ser sna lhur len pas/_/dag par 'gyur ba nyid ni 'gal ba yin/_/gzhan yang las kyi rig pa byung ba yis/_/mi dge ba yi las rnams thams cad bya/_/'khrig sogs las kyi ze tshogs rnam mang po'i/_/las byed pa ni ji ltar skyen mi 'gyur/_/gzhan yang 
[\[145b.5\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]tshig de bzhin 'khrig pa yis/_/dag 'dod 'phags pa min pas gsang ba yi/_/rgyal ba'i dbang chen 'dod pas bdud rtsi ltar/_/sdug cing mthor 'gro ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/_/kye mgon khyod ni dag pa'i chos kyi tshogs te khyod ni rtag tu rnal 'byor 'gyur/_/kye mgon 
[\[145b.6\]]khyod ni dgyes chen bdud rtsi 'chad pa dam chos gsang ba'i 'byung gnas te/_/kye rgyal khyod ni dri med nyi ma bzhin du mi shes kun du sbyong mdzad pa/_/khyab byed rgyal ba'i ngang tshul 'jig rten gsum gyi 'dren chen byang sems dga' ston kye/_/mdor bsdus pa'o//_//kun mchog 
[\[145b.7\]]thams cad rig pa ste/_/kun mkhyen dri ma gsum spangs pa/_/byang sems sangs rgyas rgyal po che/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid ni/_/ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas kyang /_/phyogs rnams kun du gzigs mdzad de/_/thub pas mgon rnams rab btud nas/_/sangs 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]rgyas kun la 'di skad gsungs/_/kye ma'o rnam dag ye shes bdag_/kye ma'o sangs rgyas nyer thob pa/_/kye ma'o gar mkhan 'khor lo 'di/_/rang gi ye shes 'dri bar byed/_/rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i/_/mchog tu gsang ba bshad par bya/_/shin 
[\[146a.2\]]tu rnyed dka' dam pa yi/_/rin chen sgrom gyi kha dbye bya/_/bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi/_/rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgreng bar bya/_/rin chen sgrom gyi kha phye nas/_/shes rab kyis ni snang bar bya/_/de nas gsang ba mchog gyur pa/_/dam pa yang dag bshad par bya/_/bya ba bsgrub pa'i 
[\[146a.3\]]thabs chen po/_/rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang /_/gsang ba'i bye brag 'byed byed cing /_/rnal 'byor dgongs pa rnam par 'grol/_/de nyid dam pa shes byed pa'i/_/rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang /_/rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga dang /_/'khor lo'i rnal 'byor cho ga ste/_/
[\[146a.4\]]mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya de'i/_/rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang /_/dus gsum khyab pa'i bya bar ldan/_/gsang ba rnal 'byor kun 'byung zhing /_/bya ba kun gyi thabs chen gyi/_/rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang /_/sangs rgyas rnal 'byor cho gar ldan/_/rdo rje chos ni rab 
[\[146a.5\]]'jug pa/_/sku gsum zhes bya gsang chen gyi/_/rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang /_/rdo rje rnal 'byor cho gar ldan/_/ma rungs thams cad 'dul byed pa/_/khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba'i/_/rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang /_/chos kyi rnal 'byor cho gar ldan/_/pad+ma 
[\[146a.6\]]gar mkhan skyed byed pa/_/'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i/_/rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang /_/sbyin pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan/_/rin chen 'khor lo skyed byed cing /_/byang chub sems dpa' yid ches byed/_/rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen 
[\[146a.7\]]po/_/sna tshogs gar mkhan skyed byed pa/_/las kyi rnal 'byor cho ga yi/_/rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang /_/de nyid shes shing dgongs pa shes/_/tshul chen mchog ni shes byed cing /_/mchog gi dang po sangs rgyas mchog_/rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa ste/_/
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du 'jug byed pa'i/_/gcig par sems can bya ba byed/_/bya ba chen po mchog zhi ba/_/chos dang longs spyod mchog gyur pas/_/sangs rgyas gar mkhan 'khor lo ni/_/mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur pa 'di/_/skal ba ji bzhin gsang ji bzhin/_/ji ltar 
[\[146b.2\]]sems can 'dul 'gyur bshad/_/sngon 'gyur 'das pa'i dus su ni/_/byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing /_/thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/_/spro ba chen pos ngo mtshar che'i/_/dka' ba dpag tu med pa spyad/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du de 
[\[146b.3\]]yis ni/_/dbang bskur bar du legs thob 'gyur/_/shes rab chen pos pha mthar phyin/_/gos kyi dbang ni thob gyur nas/_/'og min stug po nyams dga' bar/_/blo gros chen po bzhugs par gyur/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur zhes/_/rnal 'byor pa yis 
[\[146b.4\]]bsams nas ni/_/bya ba mthar phyin bdag gis ni/_/sems can don 'byung thob bya zhes/_/bya ba de la dgongs nas ni/_/sngon dang phyi mar bde chen med/_/chos kyi dga' ba rmad chen po'i/_/dka' ba spyad par bya snyam ste/_/byang chub shing drung bzhugs gyur nas/_/bya dka'i bya ba 
[\[146b.5\]]kun ldan de/_/dbugs 'byung rngub pa 'gog pa dang /_/sems pa med cing g.yo ba med/_/lus ni gang yang mi 'gul zhing /_/yan lag bskyod par mi byed de/_/de bas g.yo ba med chos ma/_/yun ring du ni gnas par gyur/_/phyogs bcu yi ni thub dbang po/_/sangs rgyas kun 
[\[146b.6\]]gyis dgongs 'gyur ba/_/'di ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub dus/_/sdug bsngal bya bar rigs pa min/_/de bas bdag cag kun lhan cig_/bskul bar bya phyir 'gro snyam du/_/dgongs nas thams cad rab chas te/_/sdug po ru ni byon par gyur/_/byon nas thub pa thams cad kyis/_/
[\[146b.7\]]bskul ba mchog ni mdzad par 'gyur/_/oM badzra uta tiSh+Tha ces pa yi/_/rigs pas se gol brdabs nas ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun du bslang /_/phyogs rnams kun du bltas pa na/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni rgya mtsho mthong /_/thub pas mgon rnams la btud de/_/bka' 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]stsol zhes ni gsol ba btab/_/mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/gsung gcig gis ni bka' stsal pa/_/sems kyi spyod yul ci 'dra zhes/_/rang gi sems ni so sor rtog_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas/_/rang gi sems la rtog bzhin du/_/yun 
[\[147a.2\]]ring du ni gnas pa na/_sems kyi rnam pa ma mthong ste/_/yan lag kun gyis rab btud nas/_/zhus pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/_/sems kyi rnam pa ma mthong ste/_/sems kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu/_/de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa/_/sems kyi spyod yul shes par 
[\[147a.3\]]dka'/_/khyod la snying po rab sbyin gyis/_/phra mo'i bzlas pa rab tu spyod/_/oM tsit+ta prati bed+haM ka ro mi/_snying po dag pa blangs nas ni/_/rang gi sems la rtog bzhin du/_/thang cig de la gnas pa na/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du mthong /_/de nas sems 'di ci zhig yin/_/
[\[147a.4\]]nyon mongs sa bon can nam ci/_/dge ba'am mi dge ba yi sems/_/kun gzhi sa bon can sems sam/_/chos kyi rgyu mthun rtogs gyur nas/_/pha rol phyin pa drug bsten pa/_/'di ni sems can dag pa ste/_/kun nas nyon mongs gnas ma yin/_/yun ring du ni bsod nams 
[\[147a.5\]]dang /_/ye shes tshogs chen bas gas pa ste/_/ji ltar zla ba gang ba 'di/_/dag cing gsal la rnyog ma med/_/de bzhin tshogs ni rdzogs pa'i phyir/_/sems ni zla ba gang dang mtshungs/_/dngos po yod dang med min pa/_/ji ltar zla ba mtshungs nyid yin/_/'on kyang bsod 
[\[147a.6\]]nams ye shes che/_/rdzogs pa zla ba dang mtshungs bas bstan/_/legs byas tshogs ldan rang sems kyi/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong nas ni/_/dga' zhing mgu ba skyes nas kyang /_/slar yang tshig tu rab smras pa/_/bcom ldan mgon po bdag gis ni/_/nyon mongs dri ma kun 
[\[147a.7\]]dag cing /_/gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i/_/rang sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong /_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/_/thog mar byung ba'i sems 'di bzang /_/dang por blo bur nyon mongs rnams/_/byang chub sems kyis dag par byed/_/dngos po thams cad rnam 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]spangs pa'i/_/dag pa yi ni snying po 'dis/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/byang chub kyi ni sems la rtogs/_/oM bod+hi tsit+ta ut+bA da yA mi/_snying po dag pa blangs nas ni/_/sems kyi dbus su rtog pa na/_/zla ba'i dbus su yang zla ba'i/_/dkyil 'khor gnyis pa mthong ba ni/_/
[\[147b.2\]]thub pa rnams la tshig smras pa/_/dkyil 'khor gnyis pa dag mthong ngo /_/de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa/_/byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin brtan/_/brtan par bya ba'i ched du ni/_/de ni legs par bsgrub par gyis/_/khyod la snying po sbyin bya ste/_/zlos shing de ni brtan par 
[\[147b.3\]]dgongs/_/o~MtiSh+Tha badzra/_dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus gnas pa'i/_/rdo rje chen po sems byed cing /_/thang cig so sor brtags pa na/_/shin tu brtan pa mthong gyur nas/_/smras pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su rdo rje mthong /_/zla ba'i dkyil 
[\[147b.4\]]'khor gnyis pa yi/_/dbus na rdo rje dang ldan mthong /_/de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa/_/lha rnams kun gyi rdo rje che/_/rdo rje dbyings ni skyed pa yi/_/shin tu brtan pa 'di smros shig_/oM badzra At+ma ko \u0f85haM/_/snying po dag pa blangs nas ni/_/rdo rje'i lus ni rnam bsgoms 
[\[147b.5\]]pa/_/des ni sra brtan khong stong med/_/rdo rje'i sku ni thob gyur nas/_/smras pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/rang bdag rdo rje'i skur mthong ngo /_/de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa/_/sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par bsgom/_/oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga tA sta thA a haM/_snying 
[\[147b.6\]]po dag pa blangs nas ni/_/sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgoms pas/_/rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/_/kun mkhyen ye shes thob par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kun la rab btud nas/_/smras pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/_/mgon po bdag la byin rlob 
[\[147b.7\]]cing /_/bdag gi byang chub brtan par mdzod/_/grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi tshig thos nas/_/mgon rnams thugs kar zhugs par gyur/_/rdo rje yi ni rnal 'byor gsungs/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi sa ma bod+hi dr-i D+ha badzra ba na d+ha/_grags 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/rig sngags chen po brjod pa na/_/rdo rje dbyings ni shin tu brtan/_/de nyid ye shes mngon sangs rgyas/_/de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni/_/rdo rje thugs ka nas byung ste/_/chos kyi dbang bskur bzhi po yis/_/de tshe thub pa 
[\[148a.2\]]dbang bskur gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa' byas pa yi/_/byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ba/_/'bras bu byang chub sems ldan gang /_/rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur yin/_/bskal pa grangs med gsum dag gi_/sbyin dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bzang dang /_/mkha' mtshungs 
[\[148a.3\]]rin chen thob byed pa/_/nor bu rin chen dbang bskur yin/_/bskal pa grangs med gsum du ni/_/gzhan gyis dka' ba spyad pa dang /_/brtson 'grub kyis ni 'bras bsgrub pa/_/rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dag_/chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul 
[\[148a.4\]]chen te/_/nyon mongs 'dam gyis ma gos pa/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang bskur yin/_/byang chub sems rdzogs rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi/_/dbang bskur bzhi po de rnams chos kyi dbyings/_/de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba/_/sangs rgyas rang bzhin yon tan dam pa'i tshogs/_/
[\[148a.5\]]rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas/_/ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru 'dod/_/rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur bas/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'dod/_/rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur bas/_/de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad do/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che/_/mkha' mtshungs chos nyid snying po can/_/
[\[148a.6\]]rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur bas/_/sprul pa yi ni sku ru 'dod/_/gsang ba bzhi yi dbang bskur bas/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob/_/de nas ming gi dbang bskur bas/_/thub de rnam snang mdzad chen gyur/_/chos nyid kyang ni yang dag rtogs/_/chos dang longs spyod rdzogs 
[\[148a.7\]]par brtag_/chos kun dngos po med pa ste/_/mtshan ma med cing gsal byed med/_/mtshan nyid med cing mkha' dang mtshungs/_/dmigs pa rnam par spangs pa ste/_/rang bzhin med cing brjod du med/_/chos kun tshig gi spyod yul min/_/gzhan yang gsang bar brtags 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]pa ste/_/de phyir 'dir ni rtogs par brjod/_/rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi/_/chos kyi don 'di ci yin brjod/_/bdag med dngos po yod pa min/_/chos rnams med cing rtog pa med/_/'on kyang chos nyid yang dag rtogs/_/chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par rtogs/_/
[\[148b.2\]]rtogs pa nyams su myong bar brjod/_/'dir ni ngo mtshar nyid du rtogs/_/chos kun gzugs can min pa dang /_/gzugs can du yang 'di ru bstan/_/chos kun tshig gi spyod yul min/_/sgra ru yang ni 'dir bstan te/_/de bas ngo mtshar chos 'di ru/_/rtog pa rtog pa yin 
[\[148b.3\]]par brjod/_/ci phyir 'di ni ngo mtshar chos/_/de nyid gsang ba bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/las rnams drug po nyid dang ni/_/gzugs can tshig gi mthu dag dang /_/'bras phyir sdom pa'i ngo mtshar te/_/de phyir 'di ni ngo mtshar chos/_/de phyir 'di ni rtog par brjod/_/de bas ngo mtshar 
[\[148b.4\]]chos 'di ru/_/rtog pa 'ba' zhig rtog pa yin/_/yang 'dir rtog pa ji lta bu/_/sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/_/byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas/_/pha rol phyin drug spyod pa dag_/sten pa rtog pa nyid yin no/_/sgrub pa'i don ni ji lta bu/_/gang zag chos la 
[\[148b.5\]]bdag med dang /_/gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa yi/_/rab tu dga' ba'i sa sgrub pa/_/de tshe sgrub pa'i don yin no/_/ci phyir 'di ni rgyud phyi ma/_/rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste/_/'khor ba rgyud du 'dod pa yin/_/phyi ma zhes bya pha rol te/_/rgyud ni phyi mar brjod pa yin/_/rgyud rgyun 
[\[148b.6\]]chags zhes bya ste/_/phyi ma snga ma las byung ba'i/_/de nyid gsang ba sbas zhes pa/_/rgyud ni phyi mar brjod pa yin/_/ci phyir rgyud dang phyi ma lags/_/sa mthar phyin pa'i rgyal ba mchog_/srid pa'i btson ra las rgal yin/_/yang na gang zhig rgal gyur pa/_/rgyud ni phyi ma yin par 
[\[148b.7\]]bshad/_/rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar byung /_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos longs spyod/_/sangs rgyas thugs rjes bskul ba ni/_/rgyud don yang dag byung ba yin/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs byung ba'i/_/chos dang longs spyod byung ba ste/_/
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni/_/rgyud don yang dag byung ba yin/_/rdo rje 'chang drag 'di ci zhig_/sangs rgyas gzugs kyis mi 'dul ba'i/_/sems can gdug tshogs de yi phyir/_/rang gi ye shes byang chub sems/_/rdo rje drag por yang dag 'byung /_/drag 
[\[149a.2\]]po'i don ni ji ltar 'byung /_/drag po drag po'i mig gis ni/_/drag po'i khro bo zhes su bstan/_/drag po'i las ni spyod byed rnams/_/'chos shing bzlog par bya ba yin/_/rdo rje zhi ba 'di ci zhig_/gdug pa de kun btul nas ni/_/slar yang zhi bar yang dag byung /_/de nyid rgyal po rdo rje 
[\[149a.3\]]'chang /_/sems can don gyi thabs ston mdzad/_/bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad ni/_/khro bo'i dbang phyug dag tu bstan/_/de nyid zhi dang drag po dang /_/phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che/_/ci yi phyir na zhi bar brjod/_/sna tshogs gzugs can rnal 'byor che/_/sems can smin bya 'ba' 
[\[149a.4\]]zhig phyir/_/nyon mongs gdug la brtser dgongs shing /_/zhi ba'i don ni yang dag byung /_/phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir/_/nyon mongs gdug pa nyes gzhom phyir/_/byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin bzang /_/rdo rje phyag na bsnams mdzad pa/_/de ni phyag na rdo rjer brjod/_/dus gsum 
[\[149a.5\]]bdud rnams de bzhin du/_/mi mthun phyogs kyis mi shigs pa/_/byang sems rang bzhin rdo rje ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa'i tshogs/_/de nas sangs rgyas kun dang ldan/_/gsang chen rdo rje de lta bu/_/phyag na rtag tu bsnams pas na/_/de ni phyag na rdo rjer brjod/_/rdo rje 
[\[149a.6\]]gtum pa'i don ci zhig_/rdo rje gtum po gnod sbyin che/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin shin tu brtan/_/nga rgyal nyon mongs zhags pa za/_/byang chub sems dpa' rang byung ba/_/ci yi phyir na gtum por brjod/_/gtum gdug drag po chen po ni/_/rang byung nga nyid kho na ste/_/srid pa'i 
[\[149a.7\]]zhags pa gcod byed cing /_/drag po'i don ni gtum po yin/_/rdo rje khro bo ci yin brjod/_/gsod dang skrod pa drag po ste/_/de ni khro bo'i don du brjod/_/nga ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar/_/nyon mongs phyogs rnams sreg byed yin/_/rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa/_/ci phyir rdo rjer brjod par bya/_/sra 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]zhing snying po khong stong med/_/gcad dang gzhig par bya ba min/_/bsreg par bya min 'jig med pas/_/stong nyid rdo rjer brjod par bya/_/'gro drug 'khor lo spong byed cing /_/sdig pa dral bar byed pa yi/_/byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/_/nyon mongs thams cad sel bar byed/_/
[\[149b.2\]]rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ci/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes dang /_/byang sems brtan pa gang yin pa/_/de ni rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag_/de yi rdo rje ji lta bu/_/rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing /_/chos su 'dzin pa rnams spangs pa/_/chos 
[\[149b.3\]]rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid/_/stong pa nyid ni rdo rjer brjod/_/gzugs sogs chos kyi rang bzhin gang /_/'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid/_/chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa gang /_/de lta bu ni 'di rdo rje/_/rdo rje rigs kyi don 'di ci/_/bden zhing don yod de bzhin nyid/_/'gyur ba 
[\[149b.4\]]med cing skye ba med/_/'gag med de kho na nyid gang /_/de lta bu ni rdo rje yin/_/don yod 'gyur ba med pa yi/_/de lta bu yi rigs gyur pa/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su brjod/_/de ni rdo rje'i rigs zhes bya/_/thog ma tha ma med pa'i chos/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhes su 
[\[149b.5\]]brjod/_/bden zhing slu ba med pa yi/_/byang chub sems gang de rigs yin/_/rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni du/_/phyogs rnams thams cad kun khyab pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni/_/chos dbyings dang mnyam thug pa med/_/rdo rje 'chang rnams de snyed do/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[149b.6\]]rigs kun gang gi yin/_/chos kyi bdag po bla med pa/_/rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/mgon des yongs su bzung ba de'i/_/de yi dkyil 'khor yin gsungs ba/_/ston pa gang zhig 'di rnams su'i/_/rjes su ston par byed pa gang /_/de yi spyod lam bya 
[\[149b.7\]]ba ci/_/gsang ba kun du bsdus pas gsungs/_/'di yi ston pa byang chub sems/_/rjes su ston byed shes rab thabs/_/phyag rgya rnams ni spyod lam ste/_/sngags rnams de yi bya ba yin/_/rdo rje 'chang gi rigs gang yin/_/rdo rje 'chang ba de kun gyi/_/rigs ni byang chub 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]sems yin te/_/byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs bzang /_/sangs rgyas kyi yang de nyid yul/_/chen po gnas gang zhig na gnas/_/chos rnams kun la gnas med de/_/rtsa ba med sems spyod yul lo/_/chos rnams thams cad gzugs can min/_/chos 
[\[150a.2\]]kyi dbyings te spyod yul med/_/rigs ni rnam pa du yin brjod/_/rtag dang mi 'khrugs rin chen dbang /_/'od dpag med pa dngos grub rnams/_/rigs ni rnam pa brgyar gsungs te/_/mdo ru bsdu na rnam pa lnga/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang /_/chos dang las dang rnam pa lnga/_/
[\[150a.3\]]ci yi phyir na rigs su brjod/_/mchog dang dman pa'i bye brag gis/_/rigs zhes bya ba de rnams gnyis/_/sems can lam ngan zhugs pa yi/_/rigs ni dman pa yin par brjod/_/lam ngan 'gro ba spangs nas ni/_/byang chub sems la 'jug pa chos/_/de bas rdo rje 
[\[150a.4\]]rigs brjod pa/_/rigs de yang ni lnga pa yin/_/rigs bdag rang bzhin 'di ci zhig_/byang chub sems ni rgyal po che/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs pa med/_/mgon po chen po rigs kyi bdag_/de ni rigs kyang lnga pa yin/_/ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod/_/sems 
[\[150a.5\]]dpa' zhes bya rnam gsum ste/_/byis pa de bzhin mkhas pa dang /_/de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/rnam gsum sems dpa' brjod par bya/_/yang gsungs pa/_ci yi phyir na sems dpa' brjod/_/sems dpa' ci yin byis pa brjod/_/sems dpa' mkhas pa 
[\[150a.6\]]ci yi phyir/_/byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod/_/gnas gang zhig tu brjod bya ba/_/de ni de yi sems dpar brjod/_/chos sam yang na chos min dang /_/legs byas nyes par byas pa la/_/mi shes mun pas bsgribs gyur cing /_/chos la nyon mongs bdag nyid 'dzin/_/
[\[150a.7\]]dman zhing gti mug rigs can gyur/_/de lta bu ni byis par brjod/_/nyon mongs kun la chags pa dang /_/de bzhin srid pa ngan song gsum/_/mi shes mun pa la chags pa/_/de 'dir byis par brjod par bya/_/sems dpa' mkhas pa gang zhig yin/_/dri ma las 'das 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]nyon mongs spong /_/rnal 'byor ldan zhing brtul zhugs che/_/mi shes ling tog 'joms byed pa/_/de ni sems dpa' mkhas par brjod/_/'dir ni byang chub sems dpa' gang /_/chos kyi de nyid rtogs gyur cing /_/'khor ba'i gnas nas sad 'gyur te/_/sems 
[\[150b.2\]]can rnams ni sad byed pa/_/de ni byang chub sems dpar brjod/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du/_/de la byang chub rnam gsum ste/_/dman dang mchog dang bar ma'o/_/dman pa nyan thos sems yin te/_/bar ma rang rgyal byang chub bo/_/mchog ni byang chub sems 
[\[150b.3\]]yin te/_/de ni mi 'gyur rdo rje yin/_/sku gsung thugs rnams gzhag pa gang /_/byang chub mchog tu brjod par bya/_/ci phyir rdo rje sems dpa' yin/_/byang chub mchog gi ye shes gang /_/de ni rdo rje nges par brjod/_/ye shes rdo rje las byung ba/_/de ni rdo rje sems dpar 
[\[150b.4\]]brjod/_/rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rgyal/_/ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod/_/rdo rje sems dpa' mgon po che/_/dga' chen de ni chags sam ci/_/sems can thams cad dgrol ba'i phyir/_/sems can rnams la chags pa ste/_/de ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/_/rdo rje sems 
[\[150b.5\]]dpa' zhes su bsgrags/_/byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu ste/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bla med gang /_/de ni rdo rje sems rang bzhin/_/chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'o/_/rdo rje rgyal po ci yin brjod/_/rdo rje rigs kun rgyal po ste/_/rdo rje lcags kyu zhes su brjod/_/
[\[150b.6\]]dgug dang dbab pa'i rdo rje ni/_/de ni rdo rje rgyal por brjod/_/bsdu ba yi ni dngos po bzhi/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang spyad pa/_/sems can dgug pa'i thabs zhes pa/_/rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung /_/rdo rje chags pa 'di don ci/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed pa/_/
[\[150b.7\]]rjes su chags pa zhes su brjod/_/rdo rje chags pa bdud chen po/_/de ni rdo rje chags par brjod/_/sems can smin phyir bcom ldan kyis/_/gang tshe byang chub spyod pa spyad/_/byang chub spyod pa rjes chags pa/_/rdo rje chags par yang dag 'byung /_/rdo rje legs pa ci yin 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]brjod/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing /_/legs so zhes bya rab ster byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun mgu byed/_/de ni rdo rje legs par brjod/_/sems can dag pa mgu byed cing /_/rdo rje 'chang rnams sgrub par byed/_/sems can 
[\[151a.2\]]mkhas rnams dga' byed cing /_/gsang ba 'dzin pa rangs par byed/_/chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sku'i phyir/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di chos rnam drug_/gang gi tshe ni sngon bsgrubs pa/_/rdo rje legs par yang dag byung /_/rdo rje rin chen ci yi phyir/_/byang chub sems 
[\[151a.3\]]dpa'i sbyin pa gang /_/mkha' mnyam rin chen lta bu ste/_/rdo rje rin chen skal ba che/_/de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod/_/sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur te/_/sems can kun gyi dbang bskur ba/_/byang chub snying po'i dbang bskur gyis/_/rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'dzin par byed/_/
[\[151a.4\]]sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin pa gang /_/mkha' mtshungs rdo rje yang dag byung /_/de ni rin chen don yod de/_/de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod/_/rdo rje gzi brjid ci yin brjod/_/ma rig ling tog 'khor ba yi/_/mi shes mun pa 'joms byed cing /_/thar ba'i snang ba gzi brjid che/_/de ni rdo rje 
[\[151a.5\]]gzi brjid brjod/_/ci phyir rdo rje rgyal mtshan yin/_/rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/_/thar pa'i lam 'gro rgyal mtshan te/_/chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyal mtshan che/_/de ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan brjod/_/rdo rje bzhad pa ci yin brjod/_/rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje bzhad/_/sangs 
[\[151a.6\]]rgyas thams cad bzhad byed cing /_/byang chub sems dpa' kun dbugs 'byin/_/de ni rdo rje bzhad par brjod/_/ci yi phyir na rdo rje chos/_/rnal 'byor chen po sangs rgyas chos/_/sangs rgyas sems can rtogs byed pa/_/dag pa de bzhin gshegs snying po/_/de ni rdo rje chos su 
[\[151a.7\]]brjod/_/rdo rje rnon po ci yin brjod/_/shes rab rnon po ye shes che/_/shin tu sdug pa'i nyon mongs gcod/_/shes bya'i sgrib pa'ang gcod pas na/_/de ni rdo rje rnon por brjod/_/rdo rje rgyu yi don ci zhig_/'khor lo sangs rgyas gar byed pas/_/chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu brten/_/
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]dam chos ro yi bcud las byung /_/de ni rdo rje rgyu zhes bya/_/rdo rje smra ba ci yin brjod/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi chos chen po/_/mkha' mtshungs tshig dang bral ba ste/_/tshig me tshig las yang dag byung /_/de ni rdo rje smra bar brjod/_/ci yi phyir na rdo rje las/_/sems can smin dang 
[\[151b.2\]]grol ba yi/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi las gang dang /_/sangs rgyas las ni bdag med pa/_/de ni rdo rje las zhes bya/_/rdo rje srung ba ci yin brjod/_/byang chub sems dpa'i srung ba ste/_/theg pa dman pa spong byed cing /_/rtse mo nas ltung srung byed pa/_/de ni rdo rje srung bar brjod/_/
[\[151b.3\]]rdo rje gnod sbyin 'di don ci/_/sdig pa thams cad zad byed cing /_/nyon mongs thams cad nges par gcod/_/srid pa za byed gnod sbyin che/_/de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin brjod/_/rdo rje khu tshur ci yin brjod/_/bden zhing gzhan min de bzhin nyid/_/'gyur med de kho na nyid gang /_/
[\[151b.4\]]sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid ye shes/_/de ni rdo rje khu tshur brjod/_/sngon du byang chub sems 'gyur gang /_/rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag byung /_/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni/_/rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung /_/sems can smin byed chags pa'o/_/byang chub spyod pa legs pa ste/_/
[\[151b.5\]]de nyid ces bya dam tshig che/_/byang chub sems las yang dag byung /_/sngon gyi sbyin pa'i spyod gyur gang /_/de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod/_/sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/_/de ni rdo rje gzi brjid brjod/_/'byung po kun la byams pa ni/_/rdo rje rgyal mtshan yang dag byung /_/
[\[151b.6\]]chos kyi sbyin pa bzhad pa ste/_/dbang bskur bzhi por bstan pa yin/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin gang /_/rdo rje chos ni de las byung /_/nyon mongs gcod byed rdo rje che/_/rdo rje rnon por yang dag byung /_/mngon shes dang ni mthu la sogs/_/de ni rdo rje rgyu ru brjod/_/gsungs la 
[\[151b.7\]]sogs pa grub pa ni/_/rdo rje smra bar yang dag byung /_/ye shes chen po chos chen po/_/dam tshig ces bya'i dga' chen po/_/ye shes mngon par rtogs te dag_/rdo rje chos las yang dag byung /_/brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rgyal po/_/rdo rje las su yang dag byung /_/theg pa 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]dman pa spong byed pa/_/de phyir rdo rje srung bar brjod/_/nyon mongs srid pa'i gdon chen po/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin yang dag byung /_/de nyid ye shes mngon byang chub/_/de nyid rdo rje khu tshur brjod/_/las kyi dam tshig bzhi po ste/_/las kyi sems dpa' bdag nyid che/_/las 
[\[152a.2\]]kyi 'khor lo las byung ba'i/_/rdo rje las ni de las byung /_/gzhan yang byang chub sems ni bskyed pa las/_/rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag byung /_/rdo rje rang bzhin sems de yang /_/rnam pa bzhi ru byung ba ste/_/sgrol ba dang ni grol ba dang /_/dbugs 'byin mya ngan 'das 'god 
[\[152a.3\]]byed/_/sems dpa' rgyal po chags pa che/_/rdo rje legs par yang dag byung /_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs nyid las/_/rdo rje rin chen rab tu bsgrags/_/bsod nams rang bzhin rin chen de/_/rnam bzhi ji skad bshad pa bzhin/_/ye shes kyi ni tshogs brjod pa/_/de ni rdo rje 
[\[152a.4\]]chos zhes bya/_/ye shes rang bzhin chos de yang /_/rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag byung /_/brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa nyid/_/de ni rdo rje las su brjod/_/brtson 'grus rang bzhin las de yang /_/rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag byung /_/rtsom dang sbyor ba zhes bya dang /_/so sor rtog dang sgrub 
[\[152a.5\]]pa ste/_/brtson 'grus de bzhin las bzhi po/_/de las mthar gyis byung ba yin/_/sems dpa' 'di rnams gang las byung /_/rdo rje sems sogs de bzhin du/_/byang chub sems las yang dag byung /_/pha rol phyin drug spyod pa las/_/rdo rje can rnams byung bar 'dod/_/de bzhin 
[\[152a.6\]]pha dang ma ni gang /_/ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin/_/pha ni thabs la mkhas pa ste/_/pad+ma las ni sangs rgyas sras/_/rdo rje can rnams gang las byung /_/rdo rje rgyal po de bzhin chags/_/rdo rje rin chen rgyal mtshan dang /_/rdo rje chos dang de bzhin rno/_/de rnams shes rab gtso bor bstan/_/
[\[152a.7\]]rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje legs/_/gzi brjid de bzhin bzhad pa nyid/_/rgyu dang smra ba sems dpa' che/_/de rnams thabs las byung ba yin/_/rdo rje las dang rdo rje bsrung /_/gnod sbyin de bzhin khu tshur nyid/_/shes rab thabs su grags pa ste/_/brtan pa chen po tshogs su bshad/_/rdo 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]rje'i rigs rnams kun gyi gtso/_/rdo rje lcags kyu ma ru bshad/_/rdo rje rin chen mchog gyur pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin pha/_/pha ni rdo rje rgyal po rgyu/_/ma ni rdo rje rnon po ste/_/pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang po yi/_/pad 'dzin gang las byung ba'o/_/rdo rje gzi brjid rin chen 
[\[152b.2\]]pa/_/rgyal mtshan ma ni yin par bstan/_/nor bu rin chen bzang po yi/_/rin chen gang las byung ba'o/_/pha ni rgyal po rdo rje las/_/ma ni gnod sbyin srung ba ste/_/las kyi rigs can bzang po yi/_/las rnams gang las byung ba'o/_/dang po gang zhig ci zhe na/_/dngos kun dang 
[\[152b.3\]]po sa bon te/_/rdo rje can kun dang po sems/_/'dun dang dran dang ting nge 'dzin/_/rigs rnams kun gyi dang por bshad/_/yang gleng gzhi ci yin zhe na/_/rigs bzhi las ni yang dag byung /_/tshangs ba'i gnas chen dang ldan pa'i/_/snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams kyi/_/snying rje 
[\[152b.4\]]chen po gleng gzhi yin/_/dmigs pa gang zhig yin zhe na/_/rtog pa med cing dmigs pa med/_/dang por byang chub sems byung ba'i/_/pha rol phyin pa mchog drug ni/_/de yi dmigs pa yin par bshad/_/rkyen gang zhe na/_rtag tu srid gsum mngon dga' ba/_/sems 
[\[152b.5\]]can sdug bsngal gyur bltas nas/_/snying rje dang ni ldan pa yi/_/byang chub sems kyis bskul ba'o/_/gsang ba 'di ni gang du byung /_/'og min stug po nyams dga' zhing /_/stug po'i zhing khams 'jigs med pa/_/de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos/_/rdzogs par 
[\[152b.6\]]longs spyod tshul 'di byung /_/khyab bdag 'di rnams gang nas byung /_/rdo rje rin chen mchog chen gyi/_/gzhal yas khang pa yid 'ong zhing /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos ldan pa/_/de nas khyab bdag 'di rnams byung /_/thog ma tha ma med 'di ci/_/gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen po 
[\[152b.7\]]gsung /_/sems can kun gyi shes pa dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang /_/chos dbyings rdo rje chen po ste/_/thog ma tha ma med par bshad/_/rab tu dga' ba nyid 'di ci/_/bde chen rab tu grub bya'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]rab tu dga' ba nyid ces bshad/_/rab bzang nyid ni ji lta bu/_/dngos po kun mchog rdo rje ni/_/byang chub kyi ni sems zhes brjod/_/sangs rgyas skyed byed bzang po yi/_/rdo rje rab bzang nyid ces bshad/_/rdo rje snying bdag ji lta bu/_/gdul bya 'phags pa'i skyes 
[\[153a.2\]]mchog nyid/_/de ni rdo rje snying por brjod/_/de rnams bdag po rgyal po ni/_/rdo rje snying po bdag por bshad/_/ci yi phyir na kun du bzang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ldan pa'i/_/'gro ba srid pa'i skye gnas gang /_/de kun rtag tu bzang bas na/_/kun du bzang por brjod par bya/_/
[\[153a.3\]]rdo rje rdo rje 'chang ba gang /_/byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/_/rdo rje gang de rdo rje 'chang /_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/rdo rje rdo rje 'chang bar brjod/_/dang po'i rigs ni ji ltar byung /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub kyis/_/grags chen rdzogs par byang chub pa/_/de ni dang po'i rigs 
[\[153a.4\]]byung ste/_/de kho na nyid rigs las so/_/yang na rab tu mkhas pa rnams/_/bskal pa grangs med 'das nas ni/_/rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob gang /_/de ni dang po'i rigs byung yin/_/chos kun skye ba med pa dang /_/'byung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/_/de nyid rtogs shing shes pa yis/_/
[\[153a.5\]]chos rnams thams cad rtog pa med/_/chos dang gang zag bdag med las/_/rigs de byung ba nyid du 'dod/_/chos rnams 'ga' yang skye ba med/_/chos rnams 'gag par 'gyur ba med/_/rnam par rtog pa nyer zhi gang /_/de nyid sangs rgyas rigs chen yin/_/byang chub sems 
[\[153a.6\]]dpa' ci yin brjod/_/chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa dang /_/'khor ba'i gnas las sad gyur cing /_/sems can rnams kyis rtogs byed pa/_/de ni byang chub sems dpar brjod/_/ci phyir sangs rgyas brjod par bya/_/de bzhin nyid bden shin tu brtan/_/de kho na nyid gang 
[\[153a.7\]]rtogs nas/_/chos kun rtogs pa zhes bya gang /_/de ni rtogs pas sangs rgyas brjod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod/_/chos kyi de nyid yang dag gnas/_/slar yang gzhan du mi 'gyur zhing /_/de nyid lam ni ston byed pa/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs zhes bya/_/bcom 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]ldan 'das ni ci yin brjod/_/las dang nyon mongs de bzhin skye/_/de bzhin nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib/_/mi mthun phyogs kyi chos rnams gang /_/de bcom pas na bcom ldan brjod/_/de yi bcom pa ci yin brjod/_/bcom ldan de bzhin bcom par brjod/_/'dod pa'i 
[\[153b.2\]]'dod chags gcod byed cing /_/nyon mongs 'joms shing pham byed pa/_/de ni de yi bcom par brjod/_/de bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ci/_/nyon mongs bdud sogs gcod byed cing /_/skye dgu ma lus thabs chen gyis/_/ngan 'gro srid las skyob byed pa/_/ston pa'i ston par brjod pa 
[\[153b.3\]]yin/_/ci yi phyir na ye shes brjod/_/de nyid shes pas ye shes te/_/slar yang chos su rtog pa min/_/rtag dang chad pa spong byed cing /_/'chi med de bzhin ye shes ni/_/shes rab ye shes ci yin brjod/_/rnam pa mang po shes byed cing /_/rtogs pas sdug bsngal las grol 
[\[153b.4\]]byed/_/kun nas nyon mongs chos spong pa/_/shes rab ye shes zhes su brjod/_/ci phyir shes rab brjod par bya/_/rab sbyor sbyor ba shes 'gyur zhing /_/khyad par du ni rtogs par byed/_/bden pa de bzhin nyid shes pa'i/_/shes rab shes rab shes su bshad/_/shes rab pha rol phyin don 
[\[153b.5\]]ci/_/nyan thos rang rgyal phyi rol gyi/_/shes rab las ni bla mar brjod/_/de bzhin nyid gzhol pha rol phyin/_/shes rab pha rol phyin zhes bshad/_/tshul zhes bya don ci yin brjod/_/na ni dgag pa'i don chen te/_/dngos med dngos po med min pas/_/gang du dri ma med gyur pa/_/de ni 
[\[153b.6\]]de yi tshul du brjod/_/ting 'dzin don 'di ci yin brjod/_/chos kun dngos po med ces pa'i/_/mnyam pa nyid du rab gnas pa'i/_/shes rab can gyis lhag par bsten/_/sems la dmigs par brjod par bya/_/ci yi phyir na bsam gtan brjod/_/sdug bsngal thams cad spong byed 
[\[153b.7\]]cing /_/nyon mongs dra ba rab 'joms pa'i/_/shes rab bcas par sems pa ni/_/srid pa 'joms par byed pa'i mchog_/rnal 'byor don ni ci yin brjod/_/chos rgya chen po dam pa dang /_/zab mo'i mchog tu gyur pa des/_/kun shes kun rig ldan 'byor pa'i/_/rnal 'byor du ni brjod 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]par bya/_/rnal 'byor pa ni ci yin brjod/_/shes rab kyi na des sems pa/_/rnal 'byor rnal 'byor don sems shing /_/sems can kun gyi don sems gang /_/de ni rnal 'byor pa don brjod/_/nga ni kun gyi rgyal po che/_/thams cad rig cing thams cad ster/_/
[\[154a.2\]]rdo rje 'chang chen dang po ste/_/bde ba yi ni rgyu 'di yis/_/de bzhin nga ni 'jig rten gsum/_/khams gsum rnal 'byor rig pa'i mchog_/de bzhin 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/_/bde 'gro dang ni ngan 'gro dang /_/'dod pa lnga la longs spyod yi na/_/srid gsum 'di yi don ci 
[\[154a.3\]]zhig_/sems can kun gyi sems gang yin/_/srid pa gsum du brjod par bya/_/'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med las/_/'di ltar thams cad rig pa mchog_/bdag med byed pa po yang med/_/chos kyang yod pa ma yin te/_/dge dang mi dge byed pa yi/_/bag chags 
[\[154a.4\]]kyis ni kun du bsgribs/_/chos ni thog med dus can te/_/byed pa po ni yod ma yin/_/rtog pas nyams pa'i sems ldan pas/_/rgyu dang 'bras bur mthong bar 'gyur/_/kun gzhi sa bon thams cad pa/_/de ni chos kun skyed par byed/_/bsgos shing bag chags dang ldan 
[\[154a.5\]]pa/_/de ni srid pa gsum zhes bya/_/'dod pa'i las skyes khams gsum gyi/_/rgyur ni kun gzhi de nyid snang /_/gzugs dang gzugs med 'gro ba yi/_/chos rnams kun gyi gnas kyang yin/_/chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_/nyes pa kun dang bral ba ste/_/thog ma 
[\[154a.6\]]med 'byung chos snying po/_/blo bur dri mas nyon mongs 'gyur/_/nga ni kho na chos chen po/_/nga ni chos kyi snying por ba shad/_/de bas nga ni rgyal po che/_/nga ni srid pa gsum du bsgrags/_/'jig rten gsum ni ci yin brjod/_/'dod pa 'jig rten de bzhin gzugs/_/gzugs med 
[\[154a.7\]]pa yi skye dgu rnams/_/'jig rten gsum po zhes pa ste/_/rang byung nga nyid kho na yin/_/'dod pa zhes bya chos chen te/_/dag pa btsal bar bya ba'i phyir/_/gzung 'dzin chos rnams zhes bya ba'i/_/de bzhin nyid las so sor rtog_/chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med phyir/_/nga ni 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]chos de dag par byed/_/de bas nga ni rgyal po che/_/'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por bstan/_/ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin gzugs/_/de bzhin gzugs med rab tu bsgrags/_/stong pa nyid dang dbyer med pa'i/_/nga ni snying po'i bdag por bshad/_/khams gsum pa yi don ci 
[\[154b.2\]]zhig_/'dod khams de bzhin gzugs khams dang /_/gzugs med pa ni nyid dag dang /_/khams gsum bzang po 'di dag ni/_/rang byung nga nyid kho na yin/_/'di ni khams dang rgyu dang don/_/khams gsum gyi ni rgyu sems pa/_/stong dang mtshan ma med bshad cing /_/smon 
[\[154b.3\]]pa med pa nga nyid bstan/_/'khor ba'i don ni ci zhig yin/_/byis pa rnams ni kun du 'byung /_/de bzhin yang dang yang du 'khor/_/'khor ba dag pa'i bdag nyid de/_/rang byung nga nyid kho na yin/_/gang la 'khor ba yod pa yi/_/chos ni rdul tsam yod ma yin/_/yang dag ma 
[\[154b.4\]]yin kun brtags phyir/_/de ni thog mtha' med pa yin/_/med gang de ni stong pa ste/_/stong pa nyid gang nga nyid do/_/de bas 'khor ba de nyid ni/_/rdo rje 'chang rgyal nga nyid bsgrags/_/mya ngan 'das pa ci yin brjod/_/gang zhig de bzhin nyid rtag stong /_/bden bzhi rang bzhin 
[\[154b.5\]]bzang po nyid/_/mtshan nyid dang ni dngos po gzugs/_/mtshan ma nyid kyang rnam par spangs/_/tshig dang sgra yis gzung bya min/_/rnam par rtog pa yod ma yin/_/de bas mya ngan 'das sgra ru/_/nga nyid kho na rab shes bya/_/de yi rtag pa'i don ci zhig_/rtag nyid rtag la 
[\[154b.6\]]'byung gnas te/_/rnam par rtog pa dang bral gang /_/rtag pa de nyid kho na ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra ru bsgrags/_/'jig pa yang ni ci yin brjod/_/gang zhig 'khor bar mi 'jug cing /_/thams cad mi rtag pa nyid dang /_/sdug bsngal 'byung ba 'gog byed pa'i/_/'jig 
[\[154b.7\]]pa mya ngan 'das sgra yin/_/dag pa yang ni ci yin brjod/_/yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang min/_/dngos po'ang ma yin dngos med min/_/brjod bya rjod byed ma yin min/_/dag pa mya ngan 'das nyid yin/_/theg pa chen po ci yin brjod/_/sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]gyur cing /_/theg pa kun las nges rgyal ba/_/yang dag gyur pa'i sems can ni/_/theg pa chen po zhes su bstan/_/mthu dang las rnams 'jug pa dang /_/tshogs rnams rnal 'byor ngo mtshar rnams/_/rgya che zhes pa theg chen te/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo 
[\[155a.2\]]mtshar mchog_/nam mkha'i don ni ci zhig yin/_/sa nyid kyang ni ci yin brjod/_/'byung ba med cing rdzas kyang med/_/skye ba med cing 'chi ba med/_/dus gsum dngos po dang bral mchog_/nam mkha' zhes pa'i sgra ru bstan/_/yang dang yang du skye ba dang /_/de bzhin nyon mongs kun 
[\[155a.3\]]bdag nyid/_/grangs med dpag med dang bral ba/_/de ni sa nyid brjod par bya/_/'byung ba chen po gang las byung /_/'gog pa ci yin gang gis byed/_/ma rig nyon mongs la sogs las/_/'byung ba chen po yang dag 'byung /_/sa bon kun ldan kun gzhi ni/_/phyi dang nang gi bdag 
[\[155a.4\]]nyid 'dod/_/gnas ni yongs su gyur pa dang /_/kun gzhi sa bon mi 'byung zhing /_/rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba/_/'byung ba chen po 'gog pa yin/_/rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po mchog tu gsang zhing sbas pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud/_rdo rje rtse mo las shin tu gsang ba stug 
[\[155a.5\]]po'i tshogs kyi las thams cad bsdus pa ste/_drug pa las sems dpa' bcu drug gi bshad pa zhes bya ba bshad pa'i dang po rdzogs sto//_//ci yi phyir na phyag rgyar brjod/_/gang gis phyag rgya bcings gyur pa/_/des ni srog chags gdug kun dang /_/'gro ba sdig can thams 
[\[155a.6\]]cad dang /_/rtag tu rgyas ni btab par 'gyur/_/ci phyir sngags su brjod par bya/_/gsang sngags rnams ni 'bod byed cing /_/gdug pa thams cad skrod par byed/_/nyon mongs sngags rnams 'joms byed cing /_/sangs rgyas chos ni spyan 'dren yin/_/ci phyir zhe na rig sngags brjod/_/
[\[155a.7\]]'dod chags mun pa rnams 'dul zhing /_/nyon mongs rnams kyang rnam par 'dul/_/ma rig pa ni zlog byed pa/_/nga ni rig sngags legs par brjod/_/gzungs sngags rnams ni ci yin brjod/_/chos rnams kyi ni rten byed cing /_/srid pa'i phyogs ni rab 'joms byed/_/
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]sangs rgyas chos rnams thob byed cing /_/dge ba la rten sbyin pa'ang yin/_/phyag rgya yi ni mtshan nyid brjod/_/sangs rgyas kun dang brtul zhugs ldan/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni/_/rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad dag_/spyod lam phyag rgya mtshon par byed/_/sngags 
[\[155b.2\]]rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid kyang /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin te/_/chos kyi snying po sgrub byed cing /_/chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag ldan/_/sngags kyi mtshan nyid yin par brjod/_/rig sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid gsungs/_/'khor bar myong ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_/'dod 
[\[155b.3\]]chags la sogs nyes pa'i tshogs/_/rigs dang bcas pa zhi byed pa'i/_/rig sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod/_/de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags kyi/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dzin byed cing /_/chos rnams 'dzin par byed pa dang /_/dge ba zhes bya 'dzin byed pa/_/
[\[155b.4\]]gzungs sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod/_/rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i gnas ni gang /_/ji ltar bcing bya thub chen po/_/phyag rgya dag ni 'ching ba na/_/ji ltar rdo rje can kun mnyes/_/dang po kho nar khrus bya zhing /_/de bzhin phyogs dag bcing ba dang /_/log 'dren rnams kyang bcing bya 
[\[155b.5\]]ste/_/gos dag gtsang ma bgo bya zhing /_/grong dang yul 'khor dag dang ni/_/grong khyer dang ni grong rdal rnams/_/de yi dbus su phyag rgya dag_/nam yang bcing bar mi bya ste/_/lha khang yang na dgon pa'am/_/ri bo yi ni phug dag gam/_/rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 
[\[155b.6\]]dben zhing /_/'du 'dzi med pa'i gnas gtsang ma/_/der ni skyil krung bca' bar bya/_/bkra shis skyil krung nyid bya ste/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yis/_/byang chub snying por bcings pa bzhin/_/der ni mig dag btsum bya zhing /_/so la so ni gzhag par bya/_/mchu 
[\[155b.7\]]gnyis dag kyang mnyam bya zhing /_/dran pa rtse gcig byas nas kyang /_/sbyor med sbyor ba'i sngags bzla zhing /_/phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya/_/phyag rgya'i rnam pa de lta bu'i/_/bcings pas rdo rje can kun mnyes/_/rig sngags ji ltar bzla bar bya/_/dbang phyug chen po gsang bas 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]gsungs/_/rig sngags dag ni zlos pa na/_/ji ltar yid kyis rdo rje bzlas/_/skyil krung ji lta ba bzhin bya/_/dran dang yid ni ma g.yengs pas/_/rig sngags dag ni bzla bya zhing /_/sku nyid kyang ni bsam par bya/_/mchu yis ma yin gcig kyang min/_/
[\[156a.2\]]rkan gnyis kyis kyang ma yin te/_/lce dang lkog mas kyang ma yin/_/rtag tu snying ga nas kyang min/_/shin tu phra ba'i yid kyis ni/_/sems ni cho sa nyid nang chud bya/_/de ltar bzlas pa byas na ni/_/yid kyis rdo rje bzlas pa yin/_/o~M ni ci zhig yin par ba shad/_/mchog 
[\[156a.3\]]dang nor ster dpal dang g.yang /_/skal bzang rnam pa dang ldan zhing /_/dam bca' ba dang bkra shis don/_/nor bu 'dzin pa'i snying po yin/_/yi ge hU~M ni ci yin brjod/_/sdug bsngal 'chos shing 'joms par byed/_/srid pa'i zhags pa gcod byed cing /_/gdug pa 
[\[156a.4\]]sngangs shing gsod byed pa'i/_/hU~M ni mchog tu dran par bya/_/yi ge phaT ni ci yin brjod/_/gdug dang sdug bsngal 'joms byed cing /_/bde bdag ni 'gugs par byed/_/phaT ni 'joms byed sgra yin te/_/grogs dang bcas pa 'joms par byed/_/swA hA zhes pa ci yin 
[\[156a.5\]]brjod/_/sdig pa thams cad zhi byed cing /_/dge ba'i tshogs ni 'phel bar byed/_/nyes par byas pa 'phrog byed cing /_/sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog_/mchod pa ci phyir brjod par bya/_/mchod par byed pas mchod pa ste/_/gang du gsang bya mi 'jigs 
[\[156a.6\]]pa'i/_/de yi mchod pa rnam mang 'gyur/_/phyi rol gyi ni mchod pa min/_/'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyis mchod/_/de bzhin du ni thar pa'i mchog_/gsang ba'i mchod pa de rnams ni/_/'jigs med rgyal sras rnams kyi ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin dang /_/nyid kyi sras 
[\[156a.7\]]kyis mtshungs med pa'i/_/cho ga bsgrub pa'i gsang ba ni/_/rtag tu rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog_/de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang /_/zhugs pa gang dang gang yin pa/_/de ni dam tshig shes pa yin/_/dam tshig goms par byed pa yang /_/dam tshig shes pa yin par 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]brjod/_/bskal pa grangs med 'das pa yi/_/byang chub sems dang mtshungs par 'gyur/_/gsang ba'i dam tshig la zhugs pa/_/de yi dam tshig shes par brjod/_/ci yi phyir na dkyil 'khor yin/_/dam pa'i chos kyi bcud snying po/_/'byung bas de ni dkyil 
[\[156b.2\]]'khor brjod/_/dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba che/_/chos chen shin tu bstan pa'o/_/dkyil 'khor cho ga ji lta bu/_/cho ga chos dang rnal 'byor te/_/gsang ba'i thar pa yang dag 'byung /_/skye ba 'di nyid kho na la/_/rab dga' sgrub par byed pa'i mchog_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[156b.3\]]du ni zhugs pa yi/_/skyes pa'am yang na bud med kyis/_/bya ba gang zhig bya ba ni/_/gsungs shig gsang ba'i dbang phyug che/_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro dang /_/byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang /_/de bzhin du ni sgrub pa'i mchog_/shin tu brtan 
[\[156b.4\]]par bya ba yin/_/thub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la/_/sdom pa ji ltar sbyin par bya/_/khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya/_/ma byin pa yang blang mi bya/_/'dod pas log par g.yem mi bya/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du yang ni smra mi bya/_/nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba yi/_/chang dag 'thung 
[\[156b.5\]]ba spang bar bya/_/bya ba ma yin thams cad dor/_/mchog tu sems can gdul bar bya/_/dam pa rnams la rim gro dang /_/rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya/_/rnal 'byor rig pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/mkhas pa rnams la bsten par bya/_/lus kyi las ni rnam gsum 
[\[156b.6\]]dang /_/ngag gi yang ni rnam pa bzhi/_/yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag kyang /_/ci nus par ni bsrung bar bya/_/slob dpon brnyas par mi bya ste/_/bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs/_/sngags dang phyag rgya rnams la yang /_/nam yang brnyas par mi bya'o/_/'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma 
[\[156b.7\]]sogs/_/mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gang yin pa/_/'gom pa nyid du mi bya zhing /_/bza' bar yang ni mi bya'o/_/de bzhin sman ma lha yi grib/_/rkang pa dag gis brdzi mi bya/_/de yi steng du 'dug mi bya/_/slar yang gzhag par mi bya'o/_/lha yi phyag mtshan bzang po dang /_/
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]lha yi bzhon pa'i mtshan ma rnams/_/'gom zhing brnyas par mi bya ste/_/sems can la ni gnod mi bya/_/de yis srog gi phyir yang ni/_/'dor bar mi bya gang zhig yin/_/'tsho ba'i srog gi phyir yang ni/_/byang chub sems ni dor mi bya/_/rdo rje dril bu phyag 
[\[157a.2\]]rgya ni/_/nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/_/dkon mchog gsum la dad pa yang /_/rnam pa kun tu gtang mi bya/_/sdom pa gtang bar mi bya'o/_/bdag nyid gdung bar mi bya'o/_/khrus kyi las ni ji ltar bya/_/mi dge bcu ni spongs nas su/_/dge ba bcu ni sten byed cing /_/'byung 
[\[157a.3\]]po rnams la phan 'dod pa/_/nang gi bdag nyid khrus su 'dod/_/bdag nyid rab tu dag bya'i phyir/_/bdag nyid phyag rgyas rgyas gdab phyir/_/phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bcings/_/rnal 'byor pa yi khrus su brjod/_/gsang ba'i khrus lnga khas len pa'i/_/chu yi khrus 
[\[157a.4\]]ni bya ba ste/_/las 'di rnam par rtog pa'i khrus/_/rdo rje slob dpon dag gis bya/_/yang na cho gas khrus bya ba/_/mchog tu ngo mtshar bshad bya ste/_/dang por bdag nyid go bgo zhing /_/bdag nyid bkru ba'i phyir du ni/_/khro bo yang ni dran par bya/_/don kun rab tu sgrub byed 
[\[157a.5\]]pa'i/_/yig gnyis go cha bzang po yin/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin drag chen dang /_/khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste/_o~M badzra kI li kI li badzra hU~M phaT/_o~M TuM go cha'o/_/o~M hU~M A rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi'o/_/o~M a mr-i te hU~M phaT/_bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i 'o/_/rdo rje'i gsang sngags 
[\[157a.6\]]'di dang ni/_/rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/rdo rje 'bar rab bzod dka' bas/_/bdag nyid dag ni 'bar ba bya/_/oM d+hu pi d+hu pi kA ya d+hu pi pra dzA la ni swA hA/_chu yi nang du 'jug pa dang /_/snyim pa gsum ni blugs pa dang /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs dag la/_/rig 
[\[157a.7\]]sngags 'di ni 'dod pa yin/_/rig sngags mngon par bzlas pa yi/_/sa yi phung po gsum dag ni/_/bdag gi stod dang smad dang dbus/_/rab tu dag byed mchog yin no/_/o~M b+hU ra dza la hU~M/_sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran pas/_/rig sngags thams cad mngon bzlas 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]pa'i/_/chu ni phyag rgya kun gyis blang /_/rig sngags 'di ni gsang bar 'dod/_/phyogs ni ji ltar bcing ba yin/_/me lha rgyal chen shar phyogs su/_/lho yi phyogs su gshin rje dang /_/nub tu rlung lha nyid dang ni/_/byang du chu lha gzhom par 'dod/_/rnal 'byor pa yis gzugs 
[\[157b.2\]]bzhi ni/_/phyogs bzhi dag tu nges par bcing /_/de nas steng 'og mtshams rnams su/_/rdo rje nag mos nges par gcad/_/bgegs bcing ba ni ji ltar lags/_/rdo rje khu tshur rab 'bar dang /_/rdo rje nyi ma ltar 'bar dang /_/rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs bcing 
[\[157b.3\]]ba ni brtan par 'gyur/_/dga' ba chen po ji lta bu/_/rab tu gus bcas phyag dag bya/_/phyag rgya bzhi yis phyogs bzhi ru/_/lnga pa brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/steng dang 'og dang mtshams rnams su/_/bstod dang bcas pas phyag bya'o/_/rdo rje slob dpon skal chen gyi/_/
[\[157b.4\]]mchog tu gsang ba'i dam pa yis/_/brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du/_/de bzhin du ni bcing bar bya/_/mchod pa ji ltar yin zhe na/_/rig sngags mngon par bzlas mchod dang /_/phyag rgya bcing ba lhur len dang /_/rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i mchod pa dang /_/sgrub pa dag gi 
[\[157b.5\]]mchod pa'o/_/sbyin sreg las ni ji lta bu/_/lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang /_/ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang /_/yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag dang /_/bsreg bya sbyin sreg mchog yin no/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung ba'o/_/de nas rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi/_/snying po gsang ba kun 
[\[157b.6\]]bsdus pa'i/_/shin tu sbas pa dam pa'i mchog_/de kho na nyid bshad par bya/_/rdo rje slob dpon spyod chen ldan/_/dkyil 'khor gsang bar rab tu zhugs/_/slob dpon las ni dbang bskur thob/_/gsang dang dgongs pa kun shes shing /_/dpa' zhing brtan la brtson 'grus che/_/
[\[157b.7\]]yid gzhungs 'dzin cing gsal bar ldan/_/dul drang bshes gnyen can dag gis/_/rdo rje slob dpon nyid bya'o/_/dang por ji srid tshogs bar du/_/zla ba'am yang na zla ba phyed/_/yang na lo yi bar du ni/_/rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad par bya/_/gal te de ni sangs rgyas kyi/_/rig 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]'dzin sgrub pa rnam gsum mo/_/ji ste rdo rje can gyi yin/_/rnam pa gsum du nges pa yin/_/nor bu rigs can bzang po la/_/rnal 'byor bzhi po nyid bya'o/_/ji ste pad 'byung dag pa la/_/rnal 'byor bzhi ni rab tu bsgrub/_/ji ste las kyi rang bzhin bzang /_/las 
[\[158a.2\]]rnams kun gyi rigs las ni/_/sbyor ba bzhi ni yang dag byung /_/rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dag tu 'gyur/_/snga dro phyi dro nyin phyed dang /_/nam gyi stod smad gung la ni/_/bya ba chen po kun bya ste/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rigs/_/dang por re zhig rnal 'byor ches/_/chen pos phyogs 
[\[158a.3\]]kun phyag bya ste/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga yis/_/rdo rje slob dpon nyid bya'o/_/shes rab chen pos sangs rgyas kun/_/yang dang yang du dran bya ste/_/bdag nyid chen pos sangs rgyas kun/_/rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dze pa swA nA ya/_At+mA nAM ni r+yA ta 
[\[158a.4\]]yA mi/_sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/_shar gyi phyogs su song nas ni/_/yan lag kun gyis phyag byas te/_/rdo rje'i gsang sngags 'di yis ni/_/bdag nyid dbul bar bya ba yin/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA a b+hi She kA ya At+mA nAM ni r+yA ta yA mi/_sarba ta thA ga ta 
[\[158a.5\]]badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/_rdo rje'i gsang sngags 'di yis ni/_/lho phyogs su ni phyag byas te/_/sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad la/_/bdag ni dbul bar bya ba yin/_/de nas nub kyi phyogs su ni/_/sngags 'di yis ni phyag byas te/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA pra brta 
[\[158a.6\]]nA ya/_At+mA nAM ni r+yA ta yA mi/_sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+ha rma pra brta yA mi/_dag pa'i chos can slob dpon ches/_/nub phyogs su ni phyag byas te/_/rdo rje'i sngags 'dis bskul bya zhing /_/bdag nyid rab tu dbul bar bya/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA karma Ne At+mA nAM ni r+yA ta yA mi/_sarba 
[\[158a.7\]]ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru mAM/_mchod dang dbang bskur las ldan zhing /_/byang du chos la nges sbyor bas/_/byang phyogs su ni phyag byas te/_/bdag nyid rdo rje las su 'gyur/_/shar du mchod pa'i las yin te/_/lho phyogs su ni dbang bskur ba/_/nub phyogs su ni chos chen 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]po/_/byang du chos la nges par sbyor/_/thub pa kun gyi nyi ma'o/_/mgon po chen po rab btud nas/_/phyogs rnams kun du sngags 'di yis/_/phyag ni rab tu btsal bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta pra Na me na badzra ban+da naM ka ro mi/_de nas ji skad bshad pa'i phyag 
[\[158b.2\]]bya ba/_/sangs rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni/_/rab tu gus bcas phyag rgya rgya rnams/_/myur du bsnyen pa'i sgrub pa yin/_/phyag byas 'og tu langs nas ni/_/bdag nyid kyis ni las rnams bya/_/bdag nyid dbul ba bzang po yi/_/sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya ste/_/ma lus 
[\[158b.3\]]phyogs bzhugs mchog gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/'di ltar nye bar zhi ba bdag_/ci nas rdo rje nyid gyur mdzod/_/rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchog gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad la/_/rtag tu rnam pa thams cad kyis/_/bdag nyid dag ni 
[\[158b.4\]]dbul bar bya/_/rdo rje'i gsang sngags de yis ni/_/bdag nyid dbul bar 'gyur ba yin/_/sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad ni/_/yang dang yang du rjes dran te/_/sdig pa la sogs nyon mongs kun/_/mya ngan 'das par bshags par bya/_/skye ba 'di 'am gzhan dag gi_/
[\[158b.5\]]sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/_/sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad kyi/_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs bskyed dang /_/de bzhin sems can kun gyi la/_/rjes su yi rang bya ba yin/_/byang chub mya ngan mi 'da' bar/_/sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba gdab/_/byang 
[\[158b.6\]]chub sems ni thabs chen gyis/_/sems can sangs rgyas rjes dran bya/_/shin tu ngo mtshar mchod pa ni/_/ci nus par yang bsgrub par bya/_/yang na mya ngan 'da' sogs dang /_/rnal 'byor dge ba sogs pa la/_/ngo mtshar gyur pa'i mchod pa yis/_/mchod pa'i sprin dag 
[\[158b.7\]]dbul bar bya/_/gnas 'di 'am ni gzhan dag na/_/lha sogs bdag gir ma byas pa'i/_/me tog chu skyes thang skyes rnams/_/thabs chen sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_/de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nas/_/thub pa'i dbang po rnams la dbul/_/rdo rje'i rnal 'byor 'di 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]yis ni/_/me tog mchod pas rab mchod cing /_/phyag rgya rnal 'byor bcas pa yis/_/phyogs rnams kun du nges par spro/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pU dzA me g+ha samu drA s+pha ra Na sam ye hU~M/_gang dag spos kyi shing bzang po/_/thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la dbul/_/
[\[159a.2\]]lha yi spos sogs rmad byung ba/_/phyogs rnams kun du spro bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_dri yi zhing rnams bzang po ni/_/thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la 'bul/_/phyag rgyar bcas rab bskul nas ni/_/phyogs rnams kun du spro bar bya/_/
[\[159a.3\]]oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha pU dzA me g+ha samu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_rin chen rang bzhin rgya mtsho dang /_/rin chen ri bo la sogs mchog_/mchod pa'i sprin ni spro ba yis/_/phyogs rnams kun du dbul bar bya'o/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta bo d+h+yang+ga rat+na a laM kA ra pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sam 
[\[159a.4\]]ye hU~M/_rtsed 'jo bde ba dga' chen dang /_/dgod dang sgeg la sogs pa'i tshogs/_/phyogs rnams kun du thams cad nas/_/dga' ba'i mchog ni spro bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta hA s+ya lA s+ya ra ti krI DA sau khya a nut+ta ra pU dzA me g+ha samu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_gos dang rgyan sogs 'byung 
[\[159a.5\]]ba yi/_/de bzhin dpag bsam shing bzang po/_/rdo rje sngags ni brjod bya zhing /_/sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra bo d+hi a laM kA ra bas+t+ra pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_rin chen bzang po cher 'bar dang /_/snang ba'i shing las byung ba dang /_/zla 
[\[159a.6\]]ba nyi ma la sogs 'od/_/phyogs rnams kun du spro bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga tA lo ka pU dzA me g+ha samu drA s+pha ra Na sam ye hU~M/_sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal che/_/yang dang yang du rjes dran nas/_/snying rje bskyed pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya/_/byang 
[\[159a.7\]]chub tu ni sems bskyed nas/_/sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing /_/phyogs rnams kun du spro bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra bo d+hi tsi t+ta pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_sems can kun la bde legs dang /_/'byung po kun la 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]byams pa dang /_/dud 'gro kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/_/ngan 'gro thams cad zhi 'dod dang /_/byams dang snying rje btang snyoms dang /_/dga' ba tshangs pa'i rnal 'byor byung /_/rdo rje'i sngags ni brjod bya zhing /_/sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta 
[\[159b.2\]]ra ma hA tsa tur bra h+ma bi hA ra pU dzA me g+ha samu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin spyod pas/_/sems can thams cad dpal dang ni/_/nor dang ldan pa grub par shog_/bde ba ma tshang med par shog_/ces pas dbul zhing spro bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA badzrod b+ha ba dA na 
[\[159b.3\]]pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_sems can thams cad byang chub dang /_/sdom la rab tu gnas par shog_/rgyags sogs nyes pa chen po rnams/_/zhi 'gyur kun du spro bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra ma hA bo d+hi ha ra shI la pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa 
[\[159b.4\]]ma ye hu~M/_'jigs dang 'khon sogs sdug bsngal las/_/[{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i 'jigs kun zhi gyur cig_/byams dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/chos la bdag med bsgrub par bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra ma hA d+harma a ba bo d+hi k+ShA na ti pA ra mi tA pA dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na 
[\[159b.5\]]sa ma ye hU~M/_'khor ba mthar thug bar du ni/_/bdag 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig_/de bzhin sems can thams cad ni/_/de nyid sgrub pa byed par shog_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta saM sA ra pa ri t+yA ga a nut+ta ra bIr+ya pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sam ye hU~M/_srog chags 
[\[159b.6\]]kun gyi 'dod chags sogs/_/nyon mongs chen po zhi bar shog_/sems can thams cad g.yeng med cing /_/bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan par shog_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra ma hA sau khya bi hA ra d+h+yA na pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sam ye hU~M/_sangs rgyas ye shes shes rab che/_/
[\[159b.7\]]sdug bsngal gcod byed bla na med/_/shes rab sbyor bas dag byed pa'i/_/sangs rgyas sems can dag gyur cig_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra kle sha ts+tshe da sarba d+harma sa ma n+ta dz+nyA na ma hA pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sam ye hU~M/_stong gsum gyi ni 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]rdul snyed kyi/_/bdag nyid kyis ni rnam bsam zhing /_/mchod pa'i phyir ni rnam bsams nas/_/sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya ni r+yA tan pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_stong gsum gyi ni rdul snyed kyi/_/bdag nyid
