[\[160a.2\]]kyis ni rnam bsam zhing /_/lce ni de snyed ldan dang bcas/_/sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod par bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka ni r+yA tan pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_de nas rnal 'byor de nyid kyi/_/lus dang ngag sems byung ba yi/_/mchod pa dag ni bsdus nas su/_/
[\[160a.3\]]sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta ni r+yA tan pU dzA me g+ha samu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/_grags chen ldan pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/ma lus kun la mchod nas ni/_/dge ba dag ni bsdus byas nas/_/sems can don du bsngo bar bya/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[160a.4\]]thams cad rjes dran nas/_/sems dpa'i skyil krung bca' bar bya/_/byams sogs rnal 'byor chen po rnams/_/phyogs rnams kun du spro bar bya/_/go cha mchog gi yig gnyis kyis/_/blo ldan bdag nyid go bgo zhing /_/rig sngags gang zhig mngon 'dod pa'i/_/
[\[160a.5\]]rig sngags de ni bzla bar bya/_/rgyud chen gsang ba 'di ru ni/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i sngags bzlas pa/_/brgya rtsa bcu ru bshad pa yin/_/yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig go/_/cho ga'i sbyor ba 'bring la ni/_/thun mong du ni rnam lngar bshad/_/gang gis sdig can 'grub 'gyur 
[\[160a.6\]]ba'i/_/gsang ba'i bzlas pa rnal 'byor che/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mchog la/_/bzlas pa 'di ni mchog yin no/_/bkra shis skyil krung bcas nas ni/_/sems kyis sangs rgyas la dmigs nas/_/blo dang ldan pa bdag nyid ni/_/rtag tu kun 
[\[160a.7\]]mkhyen sangs rgyas bsam/_/gtsug tor la sogs mtshan bzang dang /_/ldan par bdag gis lus bsams te/_/sangs rgyas snying po nang 'dug cing /_/nga nyid sangs rgyas zhes su bsam/_/sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las byung ba'i/_/gang gis 'khor lo rnam sprul pa/_/
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]mngon par byang chub chan po yi/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya/_/gdul bya'i tshogs ni longs spyod pa'i/_/chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'ang 'grub/_/gnas ni yongs su gyur ba yis/_/sems ni kun gzhi las byung min/_/bsod nams ye shes rab rdzogs 
[\[160b.2\]]phyir/_/zla ba gang bar rnam par brtags/_/zla ba gang ba dri med pa/_/snying ga ru ni bsgom par bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bsgom/_/de lta bu yi tshul mchog gis/_/zla ba phyed na 'grub par 'gyur/_/mtshams med lnga po byed 
[\[160b.3\]]pa yang /_/lo gcig na ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/ji srid skyo bar mi 'gyur ba'i/_/de srid rnal 'byor chen pos bzlas/_/lus ni ngal bar gyur pa na/_/phyag rgya bcing ba brtsam par bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas pa'i/_/de tshe byang chub mchog bcing 
[\[160b.4\]]bya/_/yang na chos 'byung zhes pa'am/_/shin tu rmad byung dpal be'u'o/_/de nas rdo rje'i rigs bzlas pa/_/phyag na rdo rje rang bdag nyid/_/byang chub snying po la gnas bdag_/bdag ni phyag na rdo rje bstan/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/rdo rje'i gzugs ni rnam 
[\[160b.5\]]par bsgom/_/gsang chen rdo rje'i dbus su ni/_/rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bsgom/_/de nas pad+ma'i rigs bzlas pa/_/pad+ma sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/_/zla ba'i dbus su pad+ma che/_/pad+ma'i dbus su yi ge rnams/_/de bzhin rin chen rigs bzlas pa'i/_/rin chen 
[\[160b.6\]]rgyal po rang bdag nyid/_/zla ba'i dbus su rin chen che/_/rin chen dbus su'ang yi ge rnams/_/de na las kyi rigs bzang po/_/rnal 'byor don kun sgrub byed la/_/sangs rgyas snying po rang bdag nyid/_/rdo rje las su rnam par bsgom/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su 
[\[160b.7\]]ni/_/rin chen rdo rje rnam par bsgom/_/rin chen rtse mo rdo rje che/_/de yi dbus su'ang yi ge rnams/_/rigs lnga yi ni bzlas pa 'di/_/gsang ba'i bzlas pa brjod par bya/_/de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/_/bzlas rgyud gsang ba mchog 'dzin pa/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]pa'i rigs bzlas pa'i/_/sangs rgyas bdag nyid bkra shis 'dzin/_/stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/_/sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par bsgom/_/sangs rgyas de yi thugs dbus su/_/rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bsgom/_/rang gi lus ni 
[\[161a.2\]]bdag med cing /_/chos dang gang zag stong pa nyid/_/sangs rgyas de dag gi gzugs ni/_/bdag med par ni rnam par bsam/_/lus ni sangs rgyas zhes brjod pas/_/sangs rgyas de yang yod ma yin/_/phung po dang ni skye mched khams/_/chos zhes bya ba'i sangs 
[\[161a.3\]]rgyas med/_/gang zag nyid kyis sangs rgyas med/_/sangs rgyas med pa yang ma yin/_/pha rol phyin drug sa bon te/_/shes rab sa bon sbyong mdzad pa'i/_/gnas dang gnas min skal ldan pa/_/de nyid byang chub bdag med 'dzin/_/de lta bus ni gsang chen gyi/_/de 
[\[161a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas na/_/myur bar slob dpon chen po yis/_/rab tu dga' ba 'grub par 'gyur/_/de nas rdo rje'i rigs bzlas pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/_/stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/_/rdo rje'i gzugs su rnam par bsgom/_/rdo rje 
[\[161a.5\]]de yi lte dbus su/_/rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bsgom/_/dngos med ces bya rdo rje de/_/byang chub 'bras bu gang yin pa'o/_/gang zhig rdo rje zhes su bshad/_/gang zhig de nyid 'gyur med pa'i/_/lus kyi de nyid ces brjod la/_/gang zhig chos dang chos nyid stong /_/
[\[161a.6\]]gzugs la sogs pa'i chos chen po/_/'byung ba che sgra 'dzin pa min/_/lus ni gzugs zhes bya bar brjod/_/gzugs zhes bra bar yod ma yin/_/gzugs de yang ni rnam phye la/_/phra mo'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom/_/cha shas su ni rnam phye na/_/gzugs zhes 
[\[161a.7\]]bya ba yod ma yin/_/cha shas de ming rnam phye na/_/cha shas zhes bya yod ma yin/_/gzugs ni stong pa zhes bshad do/_/'di de rdo rje zhes byar bstan/_/gzugs sogs chos rnams thams cad ni/_/stong pa nyid ni rnam par bsgom/_/de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis/_/rab tu 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]dga' ba bsgrub par bya/_/de nas rin chen rigs bzlas pa/_/rdo rje rin chen rigs bdag nyid/_/stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/_/stong nyid nam mkhar rnam par bsgom/_/de ni nam mkhar rnal 'byor chos/_/rtog pa dang bcas yi ge bsam/_/chos kun dngos 
[\[161b.2\]]med ces bya ba/_/stong nyid de bzhin nyid ces brjod/_/dngos med ces bya'i gzugs med de/_/mkha' mtshungs sangs rgyas spyod yul lo/_/gang la gzugs ni yod min pa'i/_/mig ces bya ba ci yin brjod/_/mig de yang ni gang zhig gi/_/mig ces bya ba 
[\[161b.3\]]yin par brjod/_/bdag po rgyal po 'di gang zhig_/'di yi skye ba'ang ji lta bu'i/_/'byung ba chen po bzhi 'dus las/_/mig gi dbang po yang dag byung /_/mig de la yang gzugs med la/_/ci zhig byed de yod pa'ang min/_/mig ni ji lta ba bzhin du/_/thams 
[\[161b.4\]]cad gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs/_/bzlas pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/chos chen po yi dbang bskur 'gyur/_/de nas pad+ma'i rigs bzlas pa/_/pad+ma'i sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/_/stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/_/pad+ma'i gzugs su rnam par bsgom/_/
[\[161b.5\]]pad+ma shin tu dag de la/_/rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bsgom/_/shes rab chen pos pad+ma de/_/chos kyi snying por bsam par bya/_/pad+ma chu yis ma gos shing /_/'dam gyi nyes pas gos mi 'gyur/_/sems can thams cad de bzhin dag_/chos ni gzod nas ma skyes 
[\[161b.6\]]pa'i/_/de bzhin gshegs nyid 'di gang zhig_/chos dang chos nyid stong gang yin/_/gzugs sogs chos rnams thams cad kyi/_/chos nyid de bzhin nyid du 'dod/_/de nas las kyi rigs bzlas pa'i/_/las kyi rnal 'byor rnam par bsam/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[161b.7\]]rnam 'phrul 'khor lo 'di/_/chos dang longs spyod thob byed yin/_/gang la chos zhes bya ba med/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul snang /_/e ma'o sangs rgyas de dag snang /_/rang gi las kyang sgrub par mdzad/_/de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis/_/rdo rje slob dpon dka' 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]thub che/_/tshe 'di nyid la dam pa yi/_/sangs rgyas nyid ni mchog thob 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i snying sogs phyag rgya ni/_/rdo rje'i rigs la bdag por bshad/_/rin chen la sogs dbang bskur zhing /_/dag pa'i mchog ni pad mchog 'dzin/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[162a.2\]]sku ni chos chen la/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor nges bstan bya/_/byang chub mchog ni kun 'dul ba/_/'di ni bzlas pa dam par 'dod/_/de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'dzin/_/phreng ba nges par bsten par bya/_/gang du bzlas pa bye ba byed/_/rnam gnyis rnam gsum nyung ba'ang rung /_/
[\[162a.3\]]phreng ba sangs rgyas la mdzub ba bcas/_/gung mos rdo rje'i rnal 'byor skyes/_/srin lag steng du rin chen skyes/_/mthe'u chung gis ni pad kha phye/_/las kyi phreng bas las byed pa/_/sor mo kun gyis bya bar bshad/_/rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa yi/_/'di ni gsang ba'i bzlas pa che/_/
[\[162a.4\]]sangs rgyas rnal 'byor bo de tse/_/rdo rje can la ru drA k+Sha/_/phyi rol rdor rigs dbang po ste/_/mu tig nor bu'i rnal 'byor can/_/pad+ma'i snying po'i phreng ba ni/_/pad+ma'i rigs rnams kun la bsngags/_/yang na kun las mchog gyur pa/_/bo de tse de srog 'dzin pa/_/lcags 
[\[162a.5\]]kyi bzlas pa nyis 'gyur te/_/zangs kyi yang ni bzhir 'gyur ro/_/ru drA k+Sha yi bye ba gnyis/_/mu tig gi ni brgyar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po'i stong 'gyur rnal 'byor te/_/dngul gyi 'bum du 'gyur ba yin/_/pad+ma'i bye ba brgya 'gyur brjod/_/bo de tse yi grangs med do/_/lag pa g.yon 
[\[162a.6\]]pas phyag rgya bcing /_/g.yas pa phreng ba dang ldan bya/_/ji ltar sngar bshad gsang ba sogs/_/rmad byung chen po'i bzlas pa bya/_/ci yi phyir na bzlas pa brjod/_/dge ba la brtson rgyal 'gyur zhing /_/rmad byung rnams kyang mthong 'gyur la/_/byang chub spyod pa rgyal 
[\[162a.7\]]'gyur zhing /_/sangs rgyas rol pa mngon par 'gyur/_/bzlas pas skyon langs nas ni/_/phyag rgya dag ni bcing bar bya/_/sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/_/phyogs kun du ni 'dud par bshad/_/byang chub sems tshul thob byed pa'i/_/mdo sogs gsang ba bklag 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]par bya/_/bsod nams tshogs ni bskyed pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas mchod pa yang dag bya/_/de nas zas kyi dus su ni/_/rnam pa kun du chang bu sbyin/_/sangs rgyas rig pas mngon bsrungs la/_/bza' bdag pa dbul bar bya/_/sangs rgyas bdag nyid bza' ba dbul/_/
[\[162b.2\]]legs par bgos nas bza' ba dbul/_/snga dro sdom pa blang bya ste/_/de nyid nyin phyed dang mtshams su/_/nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje nor bu dang /_/pad+ma byed pa'i rnal 'byor gang /_/rnam pa bzhi po de las sbyor/_/sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs 
[\[162b.3\]]byang chub/_/nyin dang mtshan la rnam pa drug_/rdo rje dril bu tshogs slob dpon/_/rdo rje can rnams de bzhin drug_/zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang ni/_/byams pa nyin zhag kun la yang /_/chos gsum tshangs pa bzhi zhes pa/_/rnam pa brgyad du bzlas par bya/_/'di yi chos 
[\[162b.4\]]chen gsum po la/_/rtag tu snyoms par 'jug par bya/_/gsang mchog dkyil 'khor mchog dang ni/_/de bzhin las kun byed pa'o/_/gang du sdig par mi 'gyur ba'i/_/thams cad bza' zhing thams cad len/_/lus nas lhag mar gyur ba spang /_/de bzhin 
[\[162b.5\]]dri ma thams cad spang /_/nyin re zhing ni lan gsum du/_/khrus gsum bya zhing gsang blang ba/_/gos kyang lan gsum brje bar bya/_/gtsang gos lan gsum yang ni sbyin/_/sha dang chang dang btsong la sogs/_/dri ngan kha yi sgregs pa dang /_/'khrig pa 'dod dang 
[\[162b.6\]]bsten pa dang /_/sems can 'tshe la dga' mi bya/_/brtson zhing las mkhas spyod par ldan/_/sgrin zhing dul la dga' dang gtsang /_/bya ba byed cing bla ma 'khur/_/dge legs rgyan ni 'chang bar byed/_/kun rdzob don dam rnam pa gnyis/_/bslab pa'i sdom pa 
[\[162b.7\]]blang bar bya/_/chung ngu bza' zhing bsnyen par bya/_/kha ni nang du lta yid ches/_/sngags dang phyag rgya rig sngags dang /_/gzungs dang lha dang bla ma dang /_/rdo rje la sogs mtshon cha bzang /_/lha yi gnas dang yang dag ldan/_/'jigs min g.yo dang sgyu can min/_/
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]mi brtan pa yi blo can min/_/mya ngan 'das la dga' ba min/_/sems ni dbang pos phrogs pa min/_/blo ldan 'jig rten 'dir mi dga'/_/de bzhin pha rol dga' ba min/_/lus srog btang snyoms mi bya zhing /_/bslab pa las ni 'da' mi bya/_/
[\[163a.2\]]skrag ldan nga rgyal ldan pa min/_/'jig rten bya ba 'dod mi bya/_/de lta'i ngo mtshar tshul la ni/_/rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub par bya/_/smra ba spang zhing brjod chen ldan/_/rten pa spang zhing legs rnyed ldan/_/dpa' zhing brtan la bla mar gus/_/sdig pas 'jigs 
[\[163a.3\]]shing kun du bsdams/_/ci nus ji ltar spro bar bya/_/zla ba'am yang na lo re'am/_/nyin zhag gcig la lan gnyis su/_/de bzhin bla ma blta bar bya/_/mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang /_/de lta bu yi tshul gnas shing /_/phyag rgya rnam pa brgyad bcings nas/_/rtag 
[\[163a.4\]]tu 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/_/brtul zhugs tshangs par rdzogs gyur nas/_/rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje 'chang ba slob dpon la/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 'gyur/_/rig pa kun bdag rgyal po ste/_/dkyil 'khor kun gyi de nyid 
[\[163a.5\]]rig_/rnal 'byor cho ga de nyid shes/_/de bzhin lha yi rigs rnams mthong /_/sdom pa blangs shing rnam par mkhas/_/rig pa'i slob dpon dbang bskur 'gyur/_/lam rnams chen po byed rgyal po/_/rig pa ldan zhing de nyid shes/_/phan pa dang ni gnod 
[\[163a.6\]]par shes/_/lha la sogs pa kun dbang byed/_/gnod sbyin 'byung po lha dbang sogs/_/rig pa'i rgyal po mngag gzhug pa/_/'di ni chos kyi gru la gnas/_/sangs rgyas mchod pa legs mchod byed/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rgyal po/_/mdzod 
[\[163a.7\]]'dzin rtag tu gsang ba 'dzin/_/'khor lo grong khyer chen por gnas/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin pa'i/_/dam chos bcud kyi snying po skyes/_/snying po 'dzin cing dkyil 'khor mchod/_/dgongs pa de nyid tshul shes 'di/_/theg pa chen po'i tshul don 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]shes/_/mchod sbyin lhag pa'i mchod dam pa'i/_/gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor bya/_/rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyi/_/gang zhig gi ni thog ma ru/_/bgegs kun nges par 'joms pa yi/_/gsang sngags drag po brjod par bya/_/bkra shis sdig pa 'joms byed 
[\[163b.2\]]pa'i/_/bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga yang /_/nga ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar/_/drag po'i bzod dka' ye shes 'dzin/_/dkyil 'khor mchod pa bya ba ni/_/yo byad yongs su brtag par bya/_/yang na phyi nas byed pa yis/_/ci rigs par ni brtag par bya/_/dpag 
[\[163b.3\]]tshad las lhag mi bya zhing /_/khru drug las ni chung ba min/_/sgrub pa bcu gnyis zhes bya ste/_/gzhan yang byed pa bcu gnyis so/_/gal te de ni rgyal por 'gyur/_/dpag tshad kyi ni khyon tsam bya/_/yang na kun nas bzang po ste/_/ngos bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan/_/
[\[163b.4\]]yang na sgrub pa blon po yin/_/khru stong yod pa mchog yin no/_/yang na kun nas bzang ba yi/_/khru drug pa las chung mi bya/_/yang na tshong dpon 'ga' zhig gam/_/yang na ded dpon yin yang rung /_/ngos bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan/_/lnga ba las ni chud mi bya/_/
[\[163b.5\]]yang na gang zhig gzhan dag gam/_/sgrub pa po dag yin yang rung /_/bcu pa las ni chung mi bya/_/zur bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan/_/rgya cher yang ni mi bya'o/_/yang na sgrub byed slob dpon yin/_/drug pa las ni chung mi bya/_/yang na dpag tshad dang ldan pa'o/_/
[\[163b.6\]]yang na yo byad ldan par bya/_/gal te sgrub byed de rgyal po/_/rin chen phye ma rab tu bya/_/rin chen btags las legs bya zhing /_/shin tu khyad 'phags yid du 'ong /_/in+d+ra nI la sngon po che/_/tshon rtsi sngon po rab tu bya/_/pad+ma rA ga rA ga che/_/tshon rtsi dmar po 
[\[163b.7\]]yang dag ldan/_/tshon rtsi ser po mdog bzang po/_/dri ma med pa'i 'od zer ldan/_/tshon rtsi dkar po ldan pa yi/_/dkar po dag ni shel las bya/_/baiDUr+ya dang btsod mdog ste/_/tshon rtsi lnga zhes bya bar bshad/_/gal te de ni ma 'byor na/_/rin po che dang 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]bsres pas bya/_/tshong dpon yang na ded dpon rung /_/tshon rtsi dag la rab tu bya/_/yang na gzhan ni 'ga' zhig yin/_/tshon rtsi gzhan ni dam par sbyar/_/thal ba yis kyang dus ci bzhin/_/'dir ni slob dpon dag gis bya/_/rin chen phye mar 
[\[164a.2\]]yang dag ldan/_/yang na yo byad dang ldan pa/_/gal te sgrub byed de rgyal po/_/sna tshogs bye ba'i tshad du bya/_/yang na 'bum dang yang dag ldan/_/stong las nyung bar mi bya'o/_/spos dang mar me'i mchod bstod dang /_/dri yi bum pa nyid dang ni/_/de bzhin bum 
[\[164a.3\]]gang gtor ma dang /_/bum pa rnams dang mar me dag_/tshong dpon yang na ded dpon rung /_/bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o/_/gzhan 'ga' zhig ni 'ongs kyang rung /_/bca' bdag ni stong phrag bcu/_/bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o/_/bza' bdag ni brgya'am 
[\[164a.4\]]stong /_/bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o/_/g.yos kyi rnam pa kun dang ni/_/de bzhin dri rnams thams cad kun/_/rol mo sgeg dang rtsed mo dang /_/de bzhin phun sum tshogs pa kun/_/de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/_/de tshe mchod pa byed nas ni/_/ci nas song ni 
[\[164a.5\]]khyed cag rnams/_/grub par bya phyir brtul zhugs brtsam/_/rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byugs/_/dag cing gtsang ma'i gos gyon cing /_/rnam par dben pa'i gnas 'dug ste/_/sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya/_/me tog spos snod lag thogs shing /_/
[\[164a.6\]]phyogs rnams kun tu phyag bya'o/_/sangs rgyas ye shes mchog ldan pa'i/_/sangs rgyas la sogs kun gshegs shing /_/gsang ba'i spyan ni 'gugs pa yi/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/_/rdo rje'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis/_/sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya/_/
[\[164a.7\]]de nas gnas ni yang dag bsgrub/_/dben zhing kun du g.yeng ba med/_/ri bo yang ni dgon pa'am/_/de bzhin phug gi nang dag gam/_/shing drung gi ni gnas dag gam/_/chu bo'i 'gram mam yang na ngogs/_/dngos grub gnas su 'dug nas ni/_/lha rnams myur du gshegs 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]par 'gyur/_/rdo dang gseg ma rus par ldan/_/thal ba ljan ljin mi gtsang bcas/_/rtsub cing rtsa ba khyab la sogs/_/de 'brir sa gzhi rnam par spang /_/shin tu bzang zhing 'od bzang snum/_/tshad dang ldan zhing gseg ma med/_/'dom gang yang na khru gang 
[\[164b.2\]]tsam/_/dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyang bar bya/_/grong dang yul 'khor nyid dag dang /_/grong khyer dag dang ljongs dang ni/_/rgyal po'i pho brang tshong dus su/_/dkyil 'khor chen po bya ba min/_/de 'dra'i sa gzhi bsgrubs nas ni/_/steng gi char ni bsgrub par bya/_/
[\[164b.3\]]'dom gang yang na khru gang tsam/_/skas gdang bzhi dang ldan pa ru/_/sbyangs te de nas gnas kyi ni/_/dbus su phur bu gzugs par bya/_/rdo rje phur bu'i sngags dang ni/_/rdo rje phur bu'i phyag rgya yis/_/mchod pa'i sa gzhi mdzes par bya/_/rig pa 'dzin 
[\[164b.4\]]pa byed pas bcag_/bgegs bcing ba yi phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams kun tu bcing bar bya/_/me dang gshin rje chu dang ni/_/rlung dang dbang po rdo rje phyogs/_/rdo rje bzod dka'i phyag rgya dang /_/rdo rje'i sngags kyis sbyang bar bya/_/mchod gnas dpag tshad 
[\[164b.5\]]tshad tsam du/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga nas ni yang dag brtsam/_/gnyis pa'am ni gsum pa yi/_/nyal nyes par mi 'gyur ro/_/ci ste 'byor pa med na ni/_/zla ba gcig tsam rab tu sbyar/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga nas ni yang dag brtsam/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la ni rdzogs par bya/_/ci ste 
[\[164b.6\]]zla ba phyed tsam du/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la ni rnam par sbyang /_/ci ste [{]rings [,]ring [}]na tshes brgyad nas/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la ni rdzogs par bya/_/tshes dgu dang ni bcu dang ni/_/bcu gsum pa dang bcu bzhi pa/_/bdun pa lnga pa nyid dang ni/_/nyal nyes par mi 'gyur ro/_/ci ste 
[\[164b.7\]]nyin zhag de brtsams nas/_/de nyid la ni yongs rdzogs bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po dag bya'i phyir/_/rnal 'byor sa gzhi rab tu bsgrub/_/rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byugs/_/rnam pa sna tshogs gos bgo zhing /_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu spras/_/
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]rdo rje slob dpon rnam par brgyan/_/gtsang zhing gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan/_/gtsang ma'i grogs dang lhan cig tu/_/sems can kun don yang dag ldan/_/byang chub sems ni yang dag gzung /_/bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang /_/ci nas mngon par 
[\[165a.2\]]brtson byas kyang /_/gang zag bzhi po 'jig rten du/_/bsgrubs kyang 'grub pa nyid mi 'gyur/_/sems ni bskyed par ma gyur dang /_/dad med 'grub par mi 'gyur nyid/_/the tshom 'dzin pa nyid dag dang /_/bka' bsgo ba ni mi byed pa'o/_/dri yi chu yis 
[\[165a.3\]]legs bskus pa'i/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gnas de ni/_/dri dang ldan pa'i chu dag gis/_/phyogs rnams kun du chag chag btab/_/ba yi lci bas legs sbyangs te/_/dri dang bcas pas legs byugs te/_/de nas gur gum la sogs pa'i/_/dri 
[\[165a.4\]]dag gtsang mar sbyar bar bya/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor phyag rgya yis/_/dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyis brlab/_/rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya yis/_/pad+ma'i mig can dag gis blta/_/dkyil 'khor bar dang tha ma ru/_/sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/_/sbyin sreg 
[\[165a.5\]]las ni rnam pa lnga/_/sbyin sreg las ni rnam par sbyar/_/rig pa'i dngos grub cho ga la/_/sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/_/de bzhin sngags dang phyag rgya tshogs/_/de 'dra'i sngags dang phyag rgya'ang min/_/sngon la bgegs rnams gzhom par bya/_/
[\[165a.6\]]de nas sbyin sreg yang dag brtsam/_/de 'og gsang ba'i mchod chen gyi/_/dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya/_/sbyin sreg rnam pa lnga ru bshad/_/yang na bcu drug dag tu 'gyur/_/rang rang gi ni cho ga bzhin/_/sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/_/dgongs 
[\[165a.7\]]pa'i gang zhig bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/gang zhig mchod pa yang dag brtsam/_/gal te mi nus skal chen gyis/_/bza' bdag ni rab tu bya/_/dri dang bcas pa dang sbyar ba'i/_/yang na dkar gsum bza' bar bya/_/'di ltar rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/byin gyis rlob 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]pa mdzad par 'gyur/_/bgegs rnams nges 'dzoms nga yi ni/_/slob dpon gyi ni las bzang po/_/bgegs rnams zlog par byed pa'i mchog_/bcing ba dam pa bshad par bya/_/rtag tu rdo rje khro bo dang /_/rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag bya zhing /_/rdo rje lcags kyu'i 
[\[165b.2\]]phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya/_/rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad drang bar bya/_/rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad kun tu dgug_/sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig_/sems 
[\[165b.3\]]can rnam par 'tshe ba'ang med/_/rang gi rnam rtog las byung bgegs/_/ma rig las byung mi dge bzhin/_/rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bcing bar bya/_/rdo rje ra ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin bya/_/rdo rje gnod 
[\[165b.4\]]sbyin phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad gzir bar bya/_/rdo rje lug rgyud phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bkri bar bya/_/rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad kun du dbab/_/rdo rje brdab pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs 
[\[165b.5\]]rnams thams cad brdab par bya/_/rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad sbar bar bya/_/rdo rje ral gri phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad gcad par bya/_/rdo rje cod pan phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad brdung bar 
[\[165b.6\]]bya/_/rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya/_/rdo rje 'khrul 'khor phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad btsir bar bya/_/rdo rje khaT+wAM phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad gtub par bya/_/rdo rje mdung thung 
[\[165b.7\]]phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya/_/rdo rje sreg byed phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bsreg par bya/_/rdo rje 'khor byed phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bskor bar bya/_/rdo rje srad bu'i phyag rgya yis/_/
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]bgegs rnams thams cad bskyod par bya/_/rdo rje zlog byed phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad rnam par brlag_/rdo rje 'joms byed phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad gzhom par bya/_/rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs 
[\[166a.2\]]rnams thams cad 'jigs par byed/_/rdo rje za byed phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya/_/rdo rje 'cha' byed phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bca' bar bya/_/rdo rje dral ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad 
[\[166a.3\]]dral bar bya/_/rdo rje sgyel byed phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar bya/_/rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bslang bar bya/_/rdo rje gsod pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad gsad par bya/_/rdo rje 
[\[166a.4\]]'tsho byed phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad 'tsho bar bya/_/rdo rje sgrub pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad yang dag bsgrub/_/rdo rje rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yis/_/gdug pa thams cad rgyas gdab bya/_/rdo rje rlung gi phyag rgya yis/_/
[\[166a.5\]]bgegs rnams thams cad rlung la bskur/_/rdo rje chu yi phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad chu la g.yeng /_/rdo rje me ni rab rno bas/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bsreg par bya/_/rdo rje brgyal byed phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad 
[\[166a.6\]]brgyal bar byed/_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad sbyin sreg bya/_/rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad gzung bar bya/_/rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad sos gdab bya/_/rdo rje 
[\[166a.7\]]'bigs pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya/_/rdo rje 'jig byed phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya/_/rdo rje bka' bzhin byed pa yis/_/bkug nas bka' la dgod par bya/_/rdo rje sdigs mdzub phyag rgya yis/_/
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]bgegs rnams thams cad bsdigs par bya/_/rdo rje 'gas byed phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad dgas par bya/_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs kyi rigs kun gzhom par bya/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin bzod dka' dang /_/rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba 
[\[166b.2\]]dang /_/rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis/_/rdo rje rkang pas bsnun par bya/_/bgegs 'joms pa yi phyag rgya yis/_/de nas steng gi bgegs gzhom bya/_/mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i mchog_/rdo rje chen po'i gsang rgyud las/_/rdo rje khro bo'i snyoms 
[\[166b.3\]]'jug bya/_/brgya dang rtsa bcu lhag pa dang /_/rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba ni/_/rgyas pa ru ni yongs su bstan/_/bgegs la sogs pa gdug pa kun/_/chad pa gcad phyir btus pa yin/_/dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub bya'i phyir/_/sbyin sreg las ni yang 
[\[166b.4\]]dag brtsam/_/rnam pa brgyad dang rtsa bcu lhag_/rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba ni/_/'di ni gsang ba'i rgyud chen po/_/rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad/_/gsang ba'i sbyin sreg cho gar bcas/_/gzhan yang dang po rab bshad bya/_/rnal 'byor chen po gsang ba'i 
[\[166b.5\]]las/_/sbyin sreg las ni rgyun mi gcad/_/las rnams thams cad btus pa yi/_/gsang ba rgyud chen 'di ru ni/_/sbyin sreg rnam pa nyi shu yis/_/thams cad bsdus par 'gyur ba yin/_/zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang /_/mngon spyod kyi ni las dang ni/_/tshe 
[\[166b.6\]]spel ba dang dgug pa dang /_/nor dang 'bru ni 'phel ba dang /_/bsrung dang bsrung ba min dang bgegs/_/sdig pa thams cad rab gzhom dang /_/bcing dang gsad dang drag po dang /_/chags dang rjes su bcom pa dang /_/dbang du bya dang gzugs bzang nyid/_/
[\[166b.7\]]'dod dga'i gzugs su snang ba dang /_/mkha' la 'gro dang dngos grub kyi/_/rdzas ni grub par bya ba la/_/sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor byed pa yi/_/rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bya/_/de lta bu yi rnam pa yi/_/sbyin sreg bzang po nyi shur bshad/_/ji ltar sbyin 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]sreg cho ga bzhin/_/sngon du thab khung bya ba yin/_/gru bzhi la ni rgyas pa ste/_/zlum po la ni zhi ba'o/_/gang zhig 'gugs par byed pa yi/_/rdo rje'i rnam par yang dag bya/_/de bzhin pad+ma'i rnam pa gzhan/_/mngon spyod la ni gru gsum ste/_/
[\[167a.2\]]sdig pa thams cad rab gzhom phyir/_/zlum po rta babs ldan pa yin/_/rin chen rnam pa rigs rgyas la/_/tshe 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang /_/shin tu dag phyir phyag rgya'i dbyibs/_/bsrung la go cha lta bu yin/_/bcing ba la ni 'obs kyis bskor/_/gsad la 
[\[167a.3\]]mche ba dang ldan pa'i/_/ci 'dod gzugs la gang yang rung /_/mi snang ba la gzhu dang ldan/_/phyogs dang mkha' 'phur la lcags kyu/_/bka' byed phyag rgya bsgrub pa dang /_/dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub pa la/_/'khor lo 'am ni gru bzhi'o/_/rdzas dang sman ni 
[\[167a.4\]]'grub pa la/_/thab khung bud med yan lag mtshungs/_/yang na thun mong dngos grub kyi/_/dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya/_/dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ji lta ba/_/sbyin sreg thab khung de mtshungs 'gyur/_/rig 'dzin dngos grub bzang ldan zhing /_/thams 
[\[167a.5\]]cad phun tshogs de ltar 'gyur/_/'khor lo sogs la cung zad mthar/_/sbyin sreg thab khung brko bar bya/_/thab khung nyi shu'o/_/dkyil 'khor cho ga thams cad la/_/thab khung gang zhig mthong tsam gyis/_/sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/_/thab 
[\[167a.6\]]khung bstan pa bshad par bya/_/sngon du thig ni gdab bya zhing /_/tshon gyis sa phyogs legs par bri/_/gru bzhir thig brgyad ces bya ba/_/dbus kyi 'khor lo dbyung bar bya/_/gru bzhi'i cha ni mnyam pa ste/_/legs par bgos shing legs bris pa/_/rta babs 
[\[167a.7\]]bzhi dang yang dag ldan/_/sgo khyud rnams kyis legs par spras/_/sgo bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan/_/sgo ni cha brgyad ldan par bya/_/dra ba zla ba phyed pas spras/_/rdo rje sgo khyud rdo rjer ldan/_/pad+ma'i nags kyi lcug ma dang /_/phreng ba rab tu 'khor ba dang /_/spyi 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]blugs phyag rgya chen po ni/_/shar gyi phyogs kyi cha ru bri/_/rtse gsum zla ba phyed pa dang /_/ral gri khyu mchog mdzes rgyal mtshan/_/'dod ces bde ba phyag rgya che/_/lho yi phyogs su bri bar bya/_/'khor lo dung dang dbyug to dang /_/rta babs glang po dang ni phag_/
[\[167b.2\]]phyag rgya nub tu bri bar bya/_/mdung thung dril bu ba dan dang /_/rma bya de bzhin ra skyes dang /_/khyim bya 'thab mo la phyogs pa/_/byang gi phyogs su bri bar bar bya/_/de yi dam tshig 'khor lo la/_/sangs rgyas phyag rgya yang dag bri/_/dbus kyi gnas su cod pan 
[\[167b.3\]]te/_/phyi rol rdo rjes nye bar spras/_/rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar ba yi/_/rdo rje shar gyi phyogs cha ru/_/lho ru nor bu sna tshogs pa/_/nub tu pad+ma rdo rje'o/_/byang du rdo rje hU~M mdzad de/_/gdug pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa'o/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje thabs chen 
[\[167b.4\]]rnams/_/phyi rol phyag rgya bcu drug tu/_/thab khung brkos pa gang yin pa/_/de yi bla re rnam par bsgom/_/me tog shing dang spos sogs kyis/_/ji bzhin du ni dkyil 'khor mchod/_/rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byugs/_/sna tshogs gos dang rgyan 
[\[167b.5\]]ldan pa/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu spras/_/dri dag bzang pos dbang bskur 'gyur/_/nga ni pad 'dzin rgyal po ste/_/thor tshugs dbus na de bzhin gshegs/_/yang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur ldan/_/bud 
[\[167b.6\]]med sdug dang lhan cig tu/_/dpung pa dam du bsdams byas te/_/mtshan ma 'greng bar rab gyur nas/_/sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/_/e ma'o bde ba bde chen po/_/'dod chags bde ba bla na med/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'dod chags che/_/'jig 
[\[167b.7\]]rten dbang phyug bdag grub mdzod/_/'dod chags bde ba rjes dran nas/_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags brtag mi bya/_/bud med khams ni bkug nas su/_/'khrig pa bdun ni spang bar bya/_/mtshan ma langs par rab gyur nas/_/dbang po nye bar ni byas 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]te/_/'dod chags rjes dran gyur nas ni/_/sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/_/mtshan ma phyag mtshan zhes brjod de/_/langs pa lhag par bya ba yin/_/rdo rje can gyi phyag mtshan las/_/mkhas pas lhag par bcang bar bya/_/rdo rje can dang byang 
[\[168a.2\]]sems kyi/_/byang chub sems ni brtan pa dang /_/pha rol phyin pa drug gis mtshan/_/brtse bas rjes chags dngos grub ster/_/shes rab thabs la dga' ba bstan/_/rtag tu bsten par bya ba yin/_/mtshan ma langs par rab gyur nas/_/lhag par yang 
[\[168a.3\]]ni bsten par bya/_/mngon 'dod rig ma sdug gang yin/_/de la rnal 'byor pas 'o bya/_/lhag pas phyag rgya che gyur nas/_/dpung pa dam du bsdam par bya/_/rab tu dga' ba mang po gang /_/de ni rab dga'i sa ru 'dod/_/gang la chags pa rab brtags pa/_/
[\[168a.4\]]yang dang yang du bran par bya/_/brtse dang byams pas yang dag byugs/_/khrel yod pa yi gos kyis dgab/_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag byugs/_/byang chub kyi ni sems kyis brgyan/_/de 'dra'i brtul zhugs ldan pa yi/_/tshon rtsi chen po 
[\[168a.5\]]bsten par bya/_/gzhan yang phyi yi yan lag dag_/gang phyir rdo rje can gyis 'dzin/_/sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga bzhin/_/shar du kha bltas sbyin sreg bya/_/ci skad gzhung las gsungs pa bzhin/_/rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bya/_/zhi la sangs rgyas byang chub mchog_/
[\[168a.6\]]rgyas la rdo rje rin chen gyis/_/rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la/_/lcags kyu yis ni 'gugs par bshad/_/bcud kyis len la rdo rje'i sman/_/tshe 'phel de bzhin mi g.yo ba'i/_/rdo rje sman gyi rgya chen dang /_/rdo rje'i rtse mo nor 'phel la/_/bsrung la 'khor lo cho ga 
[\[168a.7\]]ste/_/bzlog pa la ni rdo rje gzung /_/g.yon pa lcags sgrog phyag rgya ches/_/sdig pa gzhom par bya bar bshad/_/bcing la rdo rje bcing ba ste/_/gsod la rdo rje gsod byed do/_/chags la rdo rje chags pa yis/_/rjes su bstan pa la yang bshad/_/
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]dbang la rdo rje dbang gis so/_/ci 'dod gzugs la sna tshogs te/_/mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la/_/rdo rje'i dngos grub rnam 'phrul gyis/_/pad+ma'i sman gyi phyag rgya ches/_/rdzas su grub pa'i bde mchog yin/_/dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i grub pa la/_/rdo rje 
[\[168b.2\]]dkyil 'khor phyag rgya yis/_/rig pa kun bdag rgyal po yi/_/phyag rgya'i mchog de yongs su gzung /_/dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa la/_/pad+ma chen po'i sman mchog gis/_/lag pa g.yon pas phyag rgya bcing /_/g.yas pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya/_/rdo rje 
[\[168b.3\]]sna tshogs phyag rgya yis/_/sbyin sreg las la rgyas gdab bya/_/g.yon pa hU~M ldan sdigs mdzub ste/_/g.yas pa mche ba gtsigs pa ste/_/mngon spyod kyi ni phyag rgya yis/_/rus pa'i phye mas phyogs rnams bcing /_/o~M suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hU~M/_gr-i h+Na 
[\[168b.4\]]grah+Na hU~M/_gr-i d+NA ba ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hU~M/_A na ya ho ba ga pan bih+yA rA dza hU~M phaT/_g.yon pa chos 'chad dang ldan zhing /_/g.yas pa yi ni sbyin sreg bya/_/sangs rgyas chos ni snyoms 'jug pas/_/til bsregs pas ni sdig pa bsregs/_/o~M sarba pA paM 
[\[168b.5\]]da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/_/lag pa g.yon pa rin chen gyur/_/g.yas pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya/_/'bru bdun yang na rin chen nas/_/yo byad kun gyis mnyes par bya/_/o~M ma Ni rat+na kra ma kA ya swA hA/_shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas ni/_/mngar 
[\[168b.6\]]bas me ni rab spar te/_rnal 'byor pas ni 'bras bsregs na/_/khyim ni nges par rgyas par 'gyur/_/oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/_/shin tu mngar ba'i bud shing gis/_/me ni rab tu sbar byas te/_/ku sha'i myu gu til bcas pas/_/sbyin sreg 
[\[168b.7\]]byas na bsrung don mchog_/oM badzra a pra ti ha ta badzra ya swA hA/_yam shing mngar po nyid dang ni/_/de bzhin dUr ba'i myu gu dag_/mar smyugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya yis/_/bsregs na che 'phel byed pa'i mchog_/oM badzra A yu She swA hA/_/bud 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]shing tsha ba rnams kyi ni/_/rdo rje khro bdag ting 'dzin gyis/_/thab khung du ni me sbar te/_/tsher ma rnams kyis dgug par bya/_/o~M badzra A kar Sha ya swA hA/_/de bzhin sna tshogs thams cad kyis/_/mkhas pa yis ni me sbar te/_/rtag tu chu skyes sbyin 
[\[169a.2\]]sreg byas/_/rdo rje 'ching bar 'gyur ba yin/_/o~M badzra ban d+ha ya paM/_/de bzhin sbyor ba'i cho ga yis/_/mkhas pas yam shing bsreg bya zhing /_/'bras bu kha ba'i sbyin sreg byas/_/skad cig gis ni gsod par 'gyur/_/o~M badzra mA ra na ye hU~M/_de bzhin 
[\[169a.3\]]pA k+Sha dmar po/_/bsregs na dbang du byed par 'gyur/_/o~M badzra rA ga na yehrIH/_sha pus pas ni sbyin sreg byas/_/de bzhin chags par byed pa'i mchog_/o~M badzra shaM karA ya swA hA/_/khros pas 'dod pa'i 'bras bsregs na/_/ci 'dod gzugs ni thob 
[\[169a.4\]]par 'gyur/_/o~M badzra kA ma rU pa Ni swA hA/_/o~M badzra kha ra tsi re Ni swA hA/_/bud shing ro ni kha ba yis/_/shin tu khros pas me sbar te/_/khros pas rdo rje me tog bsregs/_/rdo rje bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/_/hU~M badzra shaM karA ya swA hA/_/o~M b+hu ta ba shaM ka 
[\[169a.5\]]rA ya swA hA/_/dngos grub kun gyi cho ga bzhin/_/mkhas pas yungs kar sbyin sreg bya/_/yungs kar shin tu bkra shis pas/_/dngos grub sbyin sreg mchog yin no/_/o~M sarba sid d+ha ye swA hA/_/rig pa 'dzin pa grub bya'i phyir/_/mkhas pas swa sti ka bsreg bya/_/
[\[169a.6\]]grub pa'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/_/sbyin sreg rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du/_/o~M sid d+ha sid d+ha ye swA hA/_/o~M dal a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/_/maN+Dal a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/_/o~M b+huHswA hA/_/o~M b+hu ba swA hA/_/o~M swa swA hA/_/o~M b+hur b+hu ba swaHswa hA/_/o~M swa sti swA hA/_/o~M swa sti na maH
[\[169a.7\]]swA hA/_/o~M sid d+he pra b+hA ta ye swA hA/_/o~M sarba duHkha u pa sha ma ne swA hA/_/o~M badzra sid d+ha ye swA hA/_/o~M kAr+ya kA ra Ni puSh+Ta shan ti ke swA hA/_yi ge phaT ni mngon spyod la/_/yi ge dzaHyis 'gugs par 'gyur/_/yi ge pa~M ni bcing la sbyar/_/dbang du byal yi 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]ge shrI/_/yi ge hU~M ni bsdigs la sbyar/_/gsad pa la yang yi ge hU~M/_/ha ni bsrung ba bzang po la/_/yi ge hU~M ni bzlog pa la/_/shrIs ni sna tshogs gzugs bsgrub bya/_/oM ni mi snang bstan pa la/_/ho ni tshags dang dgug pa la/_/u ni gsang ba'i dag 
[\[169b.2\]]pa 'dzin/_/mngon spyod ldan la yi ge hU~M/_/hU~M ni rdzu 'phrul sgrub byed pa/_/lha mo chen po sgrub la A/_/oM ni kun la nges par sbyar/_/yam shing ser po rgyas pa la/_/zhi ba la ni dkar po'o/_/dbang du bya ba dmar po ste/_/nag po mngon spyod las la'o/_/
[\[169b.3\]]zhi la mar gyis byugs pa ste/_/rgyas pa la ni 'o ma bcas/_/dbang du bya la lan tshwar ldan/_/tsha ba dang bcas mngon spyod la/_/dbye ba rgya chen dag gis ni/_/sbyin sreg las rnams shes par bya/_/de nyid sbyin sreg nyi shu 'di/_/rdo rje 'chang gis gsang 
[\[169b.4\]]ba yin/_/de kho na nyi shu pa zhes bya ba sbyin sreg gi gsang ba'o//_//de nas dngos grub thabs chen po/_/thams cad 'grub 'dod dkyil 'khor du/_/grub pa'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis/_/dngos grub tshogs kyi sbyor ldan zhing /_/rdo rje yi ni slob dpon che/_/
[\[169b.5\]]brtan bcas rigs su yang dag skyes/_/theg pa chen por yang dag gnas/_/bskal pa grangs med mthar thug par/_/chos kyi shing rta che la zhon/_/shes rab thabs dang yang dag ldan/_/sems can kun gyi don la brtson/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs su 
[\[169b.6\]]bzung /_/slob dpon chen po'i tshul la gnas/_/mchog tu sa yi mthar phyin pa/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs su skyes/_/rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bsal nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor gnas su yang dag ldan/_/sbyin 
[\[169b.7\]]sreg cho ga byas nas kyang /_/chos sbyin chen po yang dag brtsam/_/dam chos snying po bcud las byung /_/sangs rgyas mchod pa bla med pa/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul/_/shes rab thabs kyi tshul thob ba byed/_/rgyal chen shes rab chen po 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]dang /_/thabs kyis rmad byung chos nyid do/_/bram ze bzhin du rigs mchog skyes/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gsang chen 'dzin/_/gal te nus na skal chen gyis/_/gang tshe mchod pa rtsom pa nas/_/ji srid zin par gyur gyi bar/_/bza' ba 
[\[170a.2\]]dag ni mi bya'o/_/dri dang bcas par legs sbyar ba'i/_/yang na dkar gsum bza' bar bya/_/gang phyir rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/byin gyis rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur/_/ci ste bzod ldan nyin mtshan du/_/bza' ba dag ni mi bya ste/_/gang phyir chos kyi rang bzhin 
[\[170a.3\]]zas/_/tshim par 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/dkyil 'khor dag ni dag byas shing /_/dri rnams kun gyis mngon 'dus byas/_/sngags kyis bsangs ba'i chu yis ni/_/thams cad kun nas chag chag gdab/_/gang tshe mchod par byed pa na/_/phyogs rnams 
[\[170a.4\]]kun gyi phyag bya zhing /_/bshags dang gsol ba gdab nyid dang /_/mchod pa'i sprin dang rjes yi rang /_/bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa'i/_/las rnams rim bzhin byas nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor chen po mnyam dbus su/_/sems dpa'i skyil krung 
[\[170a.5\]]bca' bar bya/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus pa yi/_/skyil krung rnam pa bcu ru bshad/_/gsang chen de nyid mchog 'di ni/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa'o/_/dpal dang bkra shis sdigs mdzub byed/_/de bzhin g.yas kyi phyed krung nyid/_/
[\[170a.6\]]phyi rol brkyang dang bzhugs pa'o/_/de bzhin rin chen rang bzhin te/_/de dag bcu ru rang bzhin bshad/_/skyil krung brgya dang bcu lhag pa/_/gsang ba'i rgyud kyi gsang ba yi/_/rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad/_/sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas te/_/sangs 
[\[170a.7\]]rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum/_/byams pa chen po rjes dran nas/_/dang po sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin mchog_/rnal 'byor pas ni snyoms 'jug bya/_/de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog_/de nas yang ni las rgyal po/_/
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]ting 'dzin lhag pa'i bzang po nas/_/bcu phrag gcig lhag brgya ru bshad/_/las thams cad pa gsum du brjod/_/gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad/_/ting 'dzin sbyor ba med par ni/_/dkyil 'khor brtan par mi 'gyur ro/_/dkyil 'khor sbyor ba 
[\[170b.2\]]med par ni/_/dngos grub nyid ni 'byung mi 'gyur/_/de bas rtag tu 'bad pas ni/_/ting 'dzin dngos grub dkyil 'khor bya/_/gal te mchog tu gsang ba ni/_/bla med theg pa'i gsang 'dod na/_/ting 'dzin gsum gyi spyod yul ni/_/de nas yang dag bshad par 
[\[170b.3\]]bya/_/de nas byang sems rnam 'phrul du/_/so so'i skye bos mi nus so/_/de rnams kyi ni ting 'dzin mchog_/sems nyid kyis ni yang dag bya/_/dang po'i rgyud las bshad pa bzhin/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul bshad/_/blo ldan byang sems ting 'dzin 
[\[170b.4\]]gyis/_/bdag nyid rdzu 'phrul chen po bsam/_/dka' thub sna tshogs drag po ni/_/bdag gis byas par bsam par bya/_/'og min zhes bya gnas yin pa/_/lha yi gnas ni bsam par bya/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus ba yi/_/dag pa'i 
[\[170b.5\]]'dus pa rnam par bsam/_/dang por sangs rgyas phyag byas nas/_/de nas thub rnams la de bzhin/_/bka' mnos ji skad bstan pa yi/_/slar yang skyil krung bca' bar bya/_/mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/_/kun tu dga' byed bsam par bya/_/mtshan nyid 
[\[170b.6\]]thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i/_/bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku dang ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba/_/lnga ni bdag nyid la bsam bya/_/rdo rje'i gnas su 'dug bya zhing /_/rtse mo mthon por bsam par bya/_/dang por sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[170b.7\]]to//_//rdo rje shar du 'dug bya zhing /_/sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang spro/_/'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul/_/rgyal po dang bcas rigs dkyil 'khor/_/sgo srung sgeg mo la sogs dang /_/
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]lha mo dang bcas phyag rgya yi/_/sbyor bas rdo rje can dbang bskur/_/rdo rje'i las su yang dag bya'o/_/bdag nyid kyi ni mkha' dbyings su/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mos byas te/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid/_/dbang bskur bar ni yang dag bya/_/
[\[171a.2\]]rdo rje chos 'dzin rgyal po ru/_/dkyil 'khor bkod la brtag par bya/_/sangs rgyas thams cad dgug bya zhing /_/rdo rje can rnams mchog zhugs bya/_/bsgrub pa dang ni dbang du bya/_/bya ba 'di ni mchog yin no/_/rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/gnas de 
[\[171a.3\]]lhag par mos par bya/_/'khor lo ji bzhin bkod ji bzhin/_/phyag rgya ji bzhin dbang byas pa'o/_/las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//_//rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byugs/_/rgyan dang gos ni sna tshogs ldan/_/dpung rgyan gdu bu nyid 
[\[171a.4\]]dang ni/_/de bzhin sor gdub dbu rgyan bcas/_/gser skud mu tig dang ldan pa'i/_/lag pa rkang pa de nas ske/_/lus kun rnam par brgyan 'gyur ba/_/de bzhin ko sha'i ras lhag pa'i/_/gos dag bzang po bgos zhing bsang /_/yang na chos gos 
[\[171a.5\]]'dzin pa ste/_/sangs rgyas phyag rgya rgyal mtshan bzhin/_/gal te skra bregs dge slong ste/_/ring zhing 'khyil la mdog sngo ba'i/_/skra ni sngon po bcing bar bya/_/yang na rang gi mgo la skyes/_/bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/_/yang na rdo rje las su 
[\[171a.6\]]bya/_/rnal 'byor rang bzhin gsang med par/_/dngos grub bzang po thob mi 'gyur/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su mnyam pa ru/_/ci rigs par ni 'dug nas su/_/shar du kha bltas langs nas ni/_/khengs pa med cing ma 'khrul bar/_/rdo rje sems 
[\[171a.7\]]dpar yongs su bskor/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/_/lan cig tu ni brjod par bya/_/bstod pa byas nas rang bdag nyid/_/dngos grub sbyor ba yang dag bya/_/snying rje chen po sbyor ba yis/_/bdag gis drang srong bskul bar bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]sems dpa' che/_/don yod dbang phyug dam pa ste/_/theg pa che mchog skyes pa'i mchog_/byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/_/sems dpa' chen po thabs chen po/_/rdo rje 'khor lo mchod pa che/_/dngos grub chen po rdzu 'phrul che/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 
[\[171b.2\]]bdag grub mdzod/_/rdo rje ming ni yang dag gzung /_/phyogs rnams kun tu yang dag bskor/_/dkyil 'khor rdzogs par blta bya zhing /_/rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rjes dran bya/_/slar yang skyil mo krung bcas te/_/nga ni rang nyid 'khor los sgyur/_/phyag rgya'i tshogs ni bcing 
[\[171b.3\]]ba la/_/stong las nyung bar mi bya'o/_/tha na rdo rje sems dpa' ni/_/de nyid phyag rgya yongs su gzung /_/langs nas tshig ni brjod par bya/_/bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/_/dkyil 'khor chen po rab sgrub pa/_/rdo rje la sogs kun gshegs shig_/bdag ni 
[\[171b.4\]]rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/rdo rje sems dpar bdag grub mdzod/_/tshon chen kha bsgyur dri ldan pa'i/_/srad bu lhag pa grims par bsgril/_/rdo rje srad bu phyag rgya ches/_/dkyil 'khor chen po thig gdab bya/_/'khor lo ji bzhin bkod ji bzhin/_/ji bzhin gzhung gi rjes 'brangs 
[\[171b.5\]]nas/_/dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ji bzhin bri/_/rdo rje'i thig ni yongs su gdab/_/de nas de yi rang rigs gsang /_/'khor lo chen po rab tu sgrub/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo ni/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du bshad par bya/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhis ni 
[\[171b.6\]]mdzes byas pa'i/_/thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/_/dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan/_/mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad dang /_/sgo yi sgo khyud mtshams su ni/_/rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/_/phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/_/de yi nang gi rim pa ni/_/'khor lo 
[\[171b.7\]]lta bur bri bar bya/_/rdo rje phreng bas yongs su bskor/_/ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/_/rdo rje ka ba'i mdun gnas pa'i/_/dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan/_/ji ltar phyi dang nang gnas pa'i/_/dkyil 'khor re re rnam par dbye/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]du/_/dkyil 'khor lnga bris gang yin de/_/ka ba mchog ni brgyad kyis spras/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi pa yin par bshad/_/dbus kyi shin tu dbus song nas/_/chos 'dzin rgyal po chen po ste/_/rnam par snang mdzad khyab bdag che/_/sangs rgyas gzugs 
[\[172a.2\]]ni dgod par bya/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du/_/dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ni/_/dam tshig mchog rnams bzhi po yang /_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du yang dag bris/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/mdun rgyab tu ni gnas pa yin/_/rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas 
[\[172a.3\]]phyogs su/_/nub kyi phyogs su bdud 'joms pa/_/rdo rje legs pa rgyal po che/_/chos 'dzin chen po dbang dang ldan/_/chos 'dzin pa ni byang du ste/_/mdun du rdo rje bsnyems tshul lo/_/de la de yi snying po gsang /_/shin tu rtog par byed pa'i mchog_/sdug bsngal 
[\[172a.4\]]kun las rab grol byed/_/byang chub sems ni rab bskul ba/_/hU~M dzaHho sA/_/shar phyogs cha yi dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor de yi dbus de ru/_/mi bskyod pa ni dgod par bya/_/rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni/_/the tshom gcod 
[\[172a.5\]]pa sngon 'gro can/_/tshogs sngon 'gro ba bzang po ste/_/sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms byed/_/oM be ga kra ma ho/_sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che/_/thub pa skyes chog mi bskyod pa/_/glang po phyag rgya la gnas shing /_/zhi ba'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin/_/de la snying po 
[\[172a.6\]]'di yin te/_/hU~M/_de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/rdo rje mchog rnams dgod pa ni/_/rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras shing /_/khros bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/rdo rje lcags kyu bstan pa che/_/rdo rje 'dod chags bdud 
[\[172a.7\]]chen po/_/rdo rje legs pa rdzu 'phrul che/_/rdo rje rin chen dgod par bya/_/rdo rje chags pa gang bshad pa/_/rdo rje chos ni dgod par bya/_/rdo rje legs par gang bshad pa/_/rdo rje las ni yongs su gzung /_/dam tshig rnam pa bzhi po ni/_/'khor los sgyur ba dgod par 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]bya/_/thams cad sangs rgyas cod pan ldan/_/'khor los sgyur bar dbang bskur ba/_/rdo rje rin chen de bzhin las/_/pad+ma sna tshogs dga' chen po/_/bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyis/_/byang chub mchog de yang dag gzung /_/yan lag 'gyur ba lhag ma rnams/_/
[\[172b.2\]]rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs dgod/_/de nas sangs rgyas rigs bzhag ste/_/rdo rje'i rigs kyi snying po la/_/phyag rgya dang ni snying po bshad/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung /_/hU~M dzaHho swa/_yi ge dza sogs bshad pa la/_/yi ge oM ni yang dag dgod/_/ho d+hi chos 
[\[172b.3\]]dbyings yi ge a/_/yi ge swa ni yongs su bsgyur/_/rdo rje shugs kyis lhor song nas/_/rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor lo/_/bcom ldan mchog ni yongs su 'dzin/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/rdo rje rin chen la sogs bris/_/rin chen 
[\[172b.4\]]gzi brjid rgyal mtshan dang /_/rin chen so yi rgyan bcas pa/_/de la rnams kyi snying po ni/_/oM aHtrA ha/_nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su/_/de yi dbus su rdo rje chos/_/'od dpag med ni dgod par bya'o/_/de yi snying po ni hrIH/_de yi phyogs 
[\[172b.5\]]rnams thams cad du/_/rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bri/_/pad+ma rnon po de bzhin rgyu/_/smra ba phyag rgya pad+ma bcas/_/de la 'di rnams kyi snying po ni hrIHrda~M ma~M ra~M/_rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/_/byang gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/bcom ldan 'das ni don yod grub/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[172b.6\]]nyid ni dgod par bya/_/de yi snying po ni ka~M/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/rdo rje las la sogs pa bri/_/thams cad bsrung ba gnod sbyin che/_/las dang khu tshur shin tu brtan/_/de la 'di rnams kyi snying po ni/_ka~M ha~M hU~M pa~M/_dbus kyi 'khor lo grwa bzhi ru/_/lha 
[\[172b.7\]]mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/_/rdo rje rin chen de bzhin las/_/pad+ma lha mo bzhi ru bshad/_/de la de rnams kyi snying po ni/_/o~M o~M hrIHa thams cad kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po las cha dang po'i dkyil 'khor dbus ma rdzogs so//_//dkyil 'khor dbus ma rdzogs 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]nas ni/_/phyag rgya thams cad yongs su bri/_/phyag rgya de ni byin brlab pa/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung /_/byang chub mchog tu dbus nas mchog_/shis pa shar gyi phyag rgya ste/_/lho yi phyogs su mchog sbyin no/_/nub tu chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[173a.2\]]'dzin/_/byang du mi 'jigs sbyin zhes pa/_/don yod grub pas yongs su gzung /_/phyag rgya lhag ma phyag mtshan bcas/_/de nas rdo rje sems tshogs bri/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las rdo rje 'khor lo chen po'i dbus kyi cha zhes bya ba 
[\[173a.3\]]rdzogs so//_//rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su/_/shar phyogs kyi ni dkyil 'khor la/_/rdo rje rigs chen nyams dga' ba'i/_/dkyil 'khor lnga ni yang dag bri/_/ka ba brgyad ni rdo rje che/_/dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi 
[\[173a.4\]]dang ldan pa yi/_/rdo rje'i 'khor lo yongs su dgod/_/de yi shar gyi dbus su ni/_/sangs rgyas gzugs can yang dag bri/_/ut+pal sngon po 'od chen ldan/_/khro bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i/_/drag po 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab/_/rdo rje ti rin ti ri 'dzin/_/
[\[173a.5\]]khro bo rdo rje'i lta ba 'dzin/_/gtum pa thams cad rab 'dul byed/_/sangs rgyas mdun du rdo rje 'dzin/_/'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya/_/de bzhin 'bar dbus pad+ma dang /_/de bzhin rin chen sna tshogs mtshan/_/de nyid shar gyi 'khor lo che/_/shar gyi cha ru song 
[\[173a.6\]]nas ni/_/de yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad yang dag bri/_/zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa/_/phyag rgya brgyad ni yongs su 'dzin/_/mche ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs/_/khro bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i/_/lcags kyu rdo rje lcags sgrog 
[\[173a.7\]]dang /_/zhags pa phyag rgya bzhi ru bshad/_/mda' dang gzhu ni gnyis su 'dzin/_/gnyis ni yi ge hU~M gis bsdus/_/des ni rkang pa g.yon pa yis/_/dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya/_/g.yas pas lha mo u ma yi/_/nu ma'i bar du mnan pa ste/_/g.yon 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]brkyang pa yis legs par gnas/_/'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab 'od ldan/_/sku mdog sngon po drag po ste/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byed pa/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/rdo rje khro bo dgod par bya/_/thams cad khro bo'i 'bar bas khyab/_/
[\[173b.2\]]mche bdag ni cung zad gtsigs/_/khro bo sems dpa' khro rdo rje/_/de bzhin khro bo chags pa ste/_/khro bo legs pa drag pa ste/_/dbus kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/_/khro bo'i rgyal po g.yas phyogs su/_/khro bo'i bdag nyid chen pos 
[\[173b.3\]]bskor/_/dbus su khro bo khro gnyer can/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/rdo rje khro bo'i dbang bskur ldan/_/thams cad bri zhing yang dag da god/_/khro gnyer can gyi dkyil 'khor mchog_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/rin chen khro bo dgod 
[\[173b.4\]]par bya/_/khro gnyer nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang /_/khro bo bzhad pa shin tu byung /_/dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum pa ru/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/_/khro bo'i bdag nyid chen por bskor/_/rdo rje'i sde ni yang dag bri/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/pad+ma'i 
[\[173b.5\]]khro bo dgod par bya/_/chos dang rnon po de bzhin rgyu/_/bzhad pa khro bo rdzu 'phrul che/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/_/las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/_/las kyi rgyal po bdag nyid che/_/rdo rje dbab pa yang dag bri/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/las 
[\[173b.6\]]kyi khro bo la sogs bri/_/las kyi gnod sbyin srin po dang /_/bsdu ba'i rdzu 'phrul khu tshur che/_/dkyil 'khor lnga po kun tu bri/_/de ni rdo rje'i rigs su bshad/_/dkyil 'khor chen po che zhes bya/_/gsang ba de nyid tshogs kyi bdag_/de nas kun gyi snying po ni/_/rdo rje 
[\[173b.7\]]rigs kun nyams dga' ba'i/_/yi ge hU~M ni 'dir brjod do/_/drag po ha ha zhes sgrogs hU~M/_/hU~M hU~M zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed/_/de yi dkyil 'khor rgyal po ni/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i legs 'dus bya/_/'khor lo dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su/_/lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/_/khro bo'i 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]sems ma rin chen dang /_/pad+ma dang ni las shes bya/_/kun nas mtshams rnams dag tu ni/_/phyag rgya dam bcas de dag bzung /_/dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po las cha gnyis pa rdzogs so/_/shar phyogs kyi cha'i dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so//_//
[\[174a.2\]]dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi/_/ka ba'i phyi rol dkyil 'khor du/_/sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/_/gar ma lha mo phyag rgya bcas/_/shar gyi rdo rje rigs nyid la/_/phyi rol gnas su de bzhin nyid/_/nyi ma la bskyed bzhi po ni/_/rdo rje lha mos yongs su bzung /_/rdo rje'i 
[\[174a.3\]]dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba/_/yi ge hU~M ni kun tu dgod/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas rigs rgyal po/_/yi ge hU~M ni 'dir brjod do/_/phyag rgya rang gi yan lag 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung /_/phyag rgya thams cad rab sbyor bas/_/de dag gsang zhing mchog 
[\[174a.4\]]gsang bshad/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las rdo rje rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//lho yi rin chen dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/de ru phun tshogs dkyil 'khor 
[\[174a.5\]]gyi/_/'khor lo lnga po dgod par bya/_/de yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/_/rin chen chen po rta la bcibs/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma de bzhin gshegs/_/'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa'i sku/_/'od zer phreng bas kun tu khyab/_/rin 
[\[174a.6\]]chen phreng ba mchog 'dzin pa'i/_/rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_/so yi phreng ba rab bzhad cing /_/so yi phreng ba'i phyag rgyar ldan/_/mthe bo'i rtse mo rgyal mtshan 'dzin/_/nyi ma'i dbus na sangs rgyas che/_/zla ba lta bu'i bdud rtsi'i sku/_/rdo rje rin chen skal ba che/_/
[\[174a.7\]]rdo rje nyi ma'i rigs mchog go/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/rin chen sems dpa' pad+ma dang /_/de bzhin rdo rje las nyid do/_/rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/_/'khor los sgyur bas rnam par brgyan/_/rin chen chen po rigs las byung /_/nor bu'i rdo rje nyi 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]ma 'dzin/_/de nas snying po ni trA~M/_lho yi shar gyi dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/_/de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/_/nor bu'i 'od chen yang dag bri/_/rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje dbang bskur ldan/_/de yi phyogs rnams 
[\[174b.2\]]thams cad du/_/rin chen de bzhin yang dag bri/_/rin chen sems dpa' de bzhin chags/_/rgyal po legs pa rdzu 'phrul che/_/rdo rje rin chen sogs phyag rgya/_/rang gi phyag rgya phyag mtshan phrag_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/lho yi gnas kyi steng 'dug 
[\[174b.3\]]nas/_/rin chen rigs chen bzang po la/_/rdo rje rin chen bzang po bri/_/rin chen bzhi yi dbang bskur ldan/_/sangs rgyas spyi po 'dzin pa'i mchog_/rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/_/rin chen phreng ba'i dbang bskur ldan/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad 
[\[174b.4\]]du/_/sems dpa' bzhi ni yang dag bri/_/rin chen rgyal po rgyal mtshan dang /_/bzhad dang rin chen rgyal po che/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/nub kyi rdo rje dkyil 'khor la/_/pad+ma rin chen bdag nyid che/_/rin chen phreng bas dbang bskur ldan/_/rin chen 
[\[174b.5\]]pad+ma'i mchog 'dzin pa/_/sangs rgyas dbu rgyan sems dpa' che/_/rin chen zhi ba yongs su 'dzin/_/zur mig 'dod chags chags pa'i spyan/_/skyes bu 'dul ba la gzigs pa/_/pad+ma 'dzin pa'i rgyal po che/_/'jig rten dbang phyug tshe dpag med/_/de yi phyogs 
[\[174b.6\]]rnams thams cad du/_/rin chen pad+ma yang dag bri/_/rin chen pad+ma de bzhin no/_/de bzhin rgyu dang smra ba 'dzin/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/byang gi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la/_/rin chen las chen rgyal po ni/_/bdag nyid chen pos yang dag bri/_/bcom ldan 
[\[174b.7\]]thub pa'i dbang po don yod grub/_/las kun 'dzin pa'i sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa'i/_/rdo rje las te rgyal po mdzod 'dzin pa/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i gtso bo mchog dam pa/_/sangs rgyas dbu rgyan las rnams bzhi dang ldan/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis yan lag 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]legs par brgyan/_/las kyi rin chen dam pas rgyas gdab cing /_/rin chen dkyil 'khor tshogs chen mchog gyur pas/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/las kyi rin chen yang dag bri/_/las kyi srin po gnod sbyin dang /_/de yi bsdu ba'i khu 
[\[175a.2\]]tshur 'dzin/_/de nas kun gyi snying po ni/_/trAM/_rin chen rigs chen rnal 'byor pa/_/yi ge trAM ni brjod par bya/_/ci rigs par ni rang nyid kyi/_/phyag rgya phyag mtshan yang dag bri/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las rkang pa gsum pa 
[\[175a.3\]]rdzogs so/_/lho phyogs cha'i dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so//_//de nyid kyi ni grwa bzhi ru/_/lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/_/phyi yi dkyil 'khor mdun nas su/_/lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/_/sems ma'i rin chen de bzhin chos/_/las ma 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du/_/sgeg 
[\[175a.4\]]mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/_/gar ma rnam par sgeg mo yi/_/nor bu rigs chen bzang po ni/_/rin chen phyag rgyas kun khyab la/_/phyag mchog rang gi phyag rgyas mtshon/_/'od zer phreng bas khyab 'od ldan/_/rin chen rdo rjes dbang bskur ba/_/rang rang phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin/_/
[\[175a.5\]]rin chen mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs/_/rin chen las byung rin chen ldan/_/rin chen rang bzhin khang par gnas/_/spos dang rin chen me tog bcas/_/rin chen mchog chen la gnas shing /_/lus la rin chen gos gyon pa/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 
[\[175a.6\]]'khor chen po gsang ba mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las nor bu'i rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/nub kyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la/_/pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang po ni/_/dga' ba chen pos yang dag bri/_/de yi nub kyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[175a.7\]]la/_/dkyil 'khor lnga ni yang dag bri/_/dbus kyi lte ba'i 'khor lo la/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/_/pad+ma bzang po 'dab ma brgyad/_/'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba/_/chos dbyings brtan pa'i rnal 'byor can/_/pad+ma'i phreng bas rnam par mdzes/_/de yi 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]dbus su rgyal po che/_/sna tshogs gzugs can rang bzhin mchog_/sangs rgyas shes rab thabs ldan pa/_/chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin/_/pad+ma gcig po de gnas shing /_/de yi dkyil 'khor la brten pa/_/pad+ma'i sems dpa' bzhi po bri/_/'khor los sgyur ba 'jigs 
[\[175b.2\]]pa med/_/rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/_/sangs rgyas pad+ma dbang bskur ldan/_/rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bri/_/pad+ma'i sems dpa' 'jigs pa med/_/kun kyang sangs rgyas cod pan ldan/_/chos kyi phreng bas dbang bskur bas/_/pad+ma'i phyag mtshan mtshon cha bsnams/_/
[\[175b.3\]]sangs rgyas 'phrul pas rnam par rol/_/pad+ma'i sems dang de bzhin rgyal/_/rin chen chos ni tshul chen po/_/dam tshig mchog rnams bzhi po ni/_/rim pa bzhin du yang dag bri/_/nub kyi shar gyi dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/de yi dbus su 
[\[175b.4\]]rgyal po che/_/sna tshogs 'khor lo dgod par bya/_/chos kyi snying po rab tu gnas/_/pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la brten/_/pad+ma'i ge sar dbus su ni/_/sna tshogs gzugs can dgod par bya/_/rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/_/gzugs bzang ldan pa'i sku mnga' ba/_/
[\[175b.5\]]sangs rgyas lnga yi dbang bskur ldan/_/spyan gsum phyag ni brgyad pa ste/_/thor tshugs tshangs pa dpral bar dbang /_/me tog mtshon cha smin mtshams su/_/mig la nyi ma zla ba dgod/_/tha skar gzhon nu rna ba la/_/khyab 'jug sna yi rtse mo ste/_/mche ba nag po 
[\[175b.6\]]gsus po che/_/lce la dbyangs can ma yin te/_/gsung dbyangs la ni dbyangs chen ma/_/ku mu da dang pad phreng can/_/kha dang 'gram pa dag la gnas/_/spyan la shes rab pha rol phyin/_/gdong gi phyed ni sprul par byed/_/phrag pa g.yas par seng ge ste/_/g.yon pa phag 
[\[175b.7\]]ni yang dag gnas/_/sna yi bu gu gnyis la ni/_/rgya mtsho nye bar gdung ba dag_/dga' bo nye dga' dpung ba la/_/lto ba la ni rgya mtsho gnas/_/brla g.yas pa la dpung chen gnas/_/tshogs kyi dbang phyug dpung pa la/_/lha chen dbang phyug chen po ni/_/mtshan ma'i 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]steng gi sgo na gnas/_/dpal be'u snying ga la gnas te/_/lhag pa lha mo chen mo dpal/_/'og gi kha yi sgo ru ni/_/gshin rje'i rgyal po rnam par brten/_/rdzong dang 'jigs byed lha mo che/_/pus mo la ni yang dag gnas/_/rkang pa'i sor mo bcu la ni/_/ma mo bcu ni kun 
[\[176a.2\]]du gnas/_/drag po rje ngar gnas pa nyid/_/chu yi lha mo rgyab na gnas/_/dpyid dang so ga dbyar dang ni/_/ston dang dgun dang dgun smad lha/_/g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa yin/_/rkang pa dag la yang dag gnas/_/'og gi 'khor lo rtsibs stong la/_/drag po'i phung po 'ching ba dang /_/sgra gcan 
[\[176a.3\]]thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris snang byed/_/lha ma yin rnams kun du gnas/_/lag pa bcu yi thal mo la/_/pha rol phyin pa bcu dag gnas/_/mngon par 'dod pa nyid dag gi_/lha chen la sogs 'di dag bri/_/zhal bzhi phyag ni brgyad pa ste/_/zhal re zhing ni spyan gsum pa'i/_/gos dang gzugs ni 
[\[176a.4\]]bzang por ldan/_/de 'dra'i rang bzhin thub pa dgod/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/pad+ma'i sems dpa' yang dag bri/_/pad+ma'i sems dpa' lcags kyu dang /_/mda' dang pad+ma legs par sbyin/_/nub kyi lho yi phyogs mchog tu/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/de yi dbus su 
[\[176a.5\]]sems dpa' che/_/rin chen pad+ma yang dag bri/_/zhal ni bcu gnyis ldan pa nyid/_/phyag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i mchog_/rin chen pad+mar yang dag bzhugs/_/rin chen las ni 'byung bar 'dod/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/pad+ma'i rin chen dra sogs bri/_/khro gnyer nyi ma'i rgyal 
[\[176a.6\]]mtshan dang /_/de bzhin zhal ni bcu gcig pa/_/nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/_/'od dpag med ni dgod par bya/_/pad+ma chen po rab ster ba/_/pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gtso/_/spyan dang phyag ni stong par ldan/_/
[\[176a.7\]]phyag rgya mtshon cha thams cad bcang /_/zhal bcu gnyis pa bzang po ste/_/pad+ma'i lha mo yang dag ldan/_/pha rol phyin pa bcu dang ldan/_/tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par rol/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/pad+ma'i sems dpa' yang dag bri/_/sgrol ma gzhon nu'i mthu can dang /_/mgrin 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]sngon tshangs pa'i mdog las byung /_/nub kyi byang gi cha ru ni/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/_/pad+ma la sogs dgod par bya/_/zhal drug phyag ni bcu gnyis pa'i/_/phyag rgya mtshon cha 'dzin pa'i mchog_/chen po sna tshogs rab ster ba/_/pad+ma las ni yang 
[\[176b.2\]]dag bri/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug rgyal/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun gnas pa/_/pad+ma'i srin po gnod sbyin dang /_/pad+ma'i khu tshur yang dag bri/_/g.yas dang g.yon dang rgyab dang ni/_/mdun nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor ro/_/de nas snying po ni ha/_sangs rgyas 
[\[176b.3\]]kyi snying po hrIHste/_thams cad kyi snying po yin no/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las rkang pa bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//pad+ma'i rigs kyi tshogs dag gi_/dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs nas ni/_/de yi 'khor lo'i grwa 
[\[176b.4\]]bzhi ru/_/lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/_/pad+ma'i sems dpa' rin chen dang /_/las dang chos ma yang dag bri/_/sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/_/gar ma 'di ni yang dag bri/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las pad+ma'i rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//byang gi 
[\[176b.5\]]las kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/de yi dkyil 'khor rgyal po ni/_/'khor lo lnga lnga dgod par bya/_/de yi dbus su las chen po/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/_/chos 'dzin pa yi rgyal po che/_/nam mkha' lding gi gdan la bzhugs/_/de yi phyogs 
[\[176b.6\]]rnams thams cad du/_/las kyi phyag rgya yang dag bri/_/las kyi sems dpa' rin chen dang /_/de bzhin las dang chos nyid do/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/_/byang gi shar gyi dkyil 'khor la/_/mi bskyod pa ni sangs rgyas che/_/rdo rje las ni dgod par bya/_/de yi mchod pa mtshon cha bcas/_/de 
[\[176b.7\]]yi phyag rgya bcas pa bzung /_/las chen 'dzin pa bzang po ste/_/sangs rgyas mdzad pa yang dag ldan/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/las kyi sems dpa' yang dag bri/_/sems dpa' chags pa'i rgyal po che/_/legs pa de bzhin las nyid do/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/byang gi lho yi char 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]ru ni/_/rin chen ting 'dzin rgyal po che/_/rin chen las ni yang dag bri/_/rin chen char ni rab 'bebs shing /_/sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu 'joms/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/rin chen las ni yang dag bri/_/sems dpa'i gzi brjid rgyal mtshan dang /_/
[\[177a.2\]]las dang bzhad pa rnam sbyong ba/_/las kyi rin chen bzang po la/_/rin chen dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/byang gi nub kyi cha ru ni/_/pad+ma'i las kyi sems dpa' che/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su yang dag bri/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/pad+ma'i 
[\[177a.3\]]las ni yang dag bri/_/pad+ma rnon po de bzhin rgyu/_/de bzhin smra ba las yin no/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/byang gi byang phyogs dkyil 'khor la/_/las chen 'dzin pa dbang ldan pa/_/las kyi rgyal po yang dag bri/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/las kyi sems dpa' dgod 
[\[177a.4\]]par bya/_/las kyi srin po gnod sbyin dang /_/de bzhin bsdu ba'i khu tshur nyid/_/de nas snying po ni aH/_sangs rgyas kyi snying po ni aHste/_thams cad kyi snying po yin no/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba zhes bya ba las rkang pa lnga pa rdzogs so/_/
[\[177a.5\]]byang gi cha'i dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so//_//byang du dkyil 'khor bri byas te/_/las kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas ni/_/de yi 'khor lo'i grwa bzhi ru/_/lha mo bzhi ni dgod par bya/_/sngar gyi dam tshig bzhi po ni/_/thams cad sum cu rtsa gsum yin/_/dbus ma zhes bya sum cu gsum/_/
[\[177a.6\]]shar gyi phyogs na sum cu gsum/_/de bzhin nub kyi phyogs cha'o/_/byang dang lho yang de bzhin no/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba las las kyi rigs zhes bya ba rdzogs so/_/dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor thams cad kyang rdzogs so//_//
[\[177a.7\]]brgya drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o/_/de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchog_/thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che/_/'khor lo chen po'i grwa bzhi ru/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bri bar bya/_/'khor lo sbyor chen shar lho ru/_/zla ba'i gzugs su dgod par bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/rdo rje sems 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]dpa' dgod par bya/_/'dzum zhing zla ba'i mdog can te/_/'od zer dmar po sna tshogs 'bar/_/sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag bzhugs/_/rdo rje bsnyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog_/phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje bsnams/_/de bzhin g.yon na dril bu bsnams/_/mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dpa' che/_/
[\[177b.2\]]sems can kun gyi don sems pa/_/de yi pad+ma yang dag gnas/_/de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa/_/lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/_/gsang ba lnga ni yang dag bstan/_/dang po dang ni gnyis pa ni/_/g.yas kyi phyogs na yang dag gnas/_/gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa ni/_/g.yon logs na ni rab tu 
[\[177b.3\]]gnas/_/lha mo rdo rje ca co sgrogs/_/pus 'khyud rang gi lha mo de/_/de yi glo na mgo sgyur zhing /_/'dzum bcas kun du lta ba ste/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag la 'jus/_/chu srin gyi ni rgyal mtshan bsgreng /_/de yi glo na bzhad bcas shing /_/rdeg byed skye dgu'i bdag mo yi/_/rdo rje ca co'i sgra sgrog 
[\[177b.4\]]dang /_/de bzhin rdo rje don yod dga'/_/lha mo rdo rje 'dod dbang phyug_/gzi brjid dga' ba'i rdo rje ma/_/lho dang nub kyi mtshams su ni/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/de yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/pad+ma chen po dgod par bya/_/pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/pad+ma'i sems dpa' dgod 
[\[177b.5\]]par bya/_/zhal bzhi phyag ni brgyad pa ste/_/'khor los dkyil 'khor 'od bcas pa/_/de yi pad+mar yang dag ga gnas/_/de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa/_/pad+ma'i rigs can las byung ba/_/lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/_/kun nas gsang ba'i lha mo yi/_/de nas ming ni rab bshad bya/_/rdo rje dpal 
[\[177b.6\]]dang rdo rje dkar/_/rdo rje sgron ma rdo rje can/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/nub byang mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bri nas ni/_/rdo rje nyi ma yang dag ldan/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/rin chen sems dpa' dgod par bya/_/sngon dmar gyi ni 'od kyis khyab/_/rgyan 
[\[177b.7\]]rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i/_/de yi pad+ma yang dag gnas/_/de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa/_/rin chen rigs chen las byung ba'i/_/lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/_/nam mkha' las byung mkha' rdo rje/_/nam mkha'i mdog can skye dgu'i bdag_/rin chen dpal ldan lha mo che/_/rin chen dang bcas rigs 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]mdzes ma/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/byang shar mtshams kyi 'khor lo la/_/de bzhin ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab/_/dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya/_/ut+pal sngon po de dbus su/_/las rnams 'dzin pa chen po'i mchog_/sangs rgyas kun las sogs bshad pa/_/rdo rje'i las ni 
[\[178a.2\]]dgod par bya/_/de yi pad+mar yang dag ga gnas/_/de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten cing /_/las kyi rigs can las byung ba'i/_/lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/_/las rgya rdo rje rin chen ma/_/las ma chos ma dpal ldan che/_/ji ltar sngon du rdo rje'i rigs/_/de bzhin dkyil 'khor thams cad la/_/de nyid pho nya mo 
[\[178a.3\]]ru gnas/_/de nyid lha mor yang dag gnas/_/de nyid sgeg mo rnam sgeg sogs/_/phyag rgya'i rgya mtsho gzhan yang byed/_/ser mo dmar mo nyi ma mtshungs/_/ut+pal sngon po'i mdog 'drar 'gyur/_/bsnyems bcas zhi ba'i dbang bskur ldan/_/rang gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin/_/de nas snying po hU~M 
[\[178a.4\]]hrIHoM aH/_dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las rkang pa drug pa rdzogs so/_/mtshams rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so//_//brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa lngar ldan/_/'khor lo yongs su rdzogs nas kyang /_/de yi mtshams 
[\[178a.5\]]kyi logs rnams su/_/lha bzhi dag ni yang dag bri/_/shar du rdo rje chen po ste/_/rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o/_/rdo rje rigs chen mtshan ma ste/_/'bar ba'i phreng ba rab 'jigs pa'i/_/lho ru rin chen phun tshogs pa/_/chu lha rin chen chu srin rnams/_/rin chen rigs chen mtshan ma ste/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas 
[\[178a.6\]]brjod/_/nub tu sa lha bri bar bya/_/rtsal ldan skyes bu zhes bya yi/_/dkyil 'khor chen po 'dzin byed cing /_/pad+ma'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'ang yin/_/byang du rlung gi skyes bu ni/_/rlung gi shugs kyis gos 'chang zhing /_/de bzhin las kyi rigs 'dzin ma/_/g.yo zhing rtsal ldan bri bar bya/_/brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa dgu ru/_/
[\[178a.7\]]dbus kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bsgrub/_/chos kyi tshul gyi gru chen po/_/thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//thun mong mchog tu gsang ba yi/_/rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog_/_rang 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]rigs 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/phyogs gcig tu ni bshad par bya/_/dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni/_/thub pa'i dbang phyug rnam snang mdzad/_/seng ge pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/_/de ni byang chub mchog 'dzin pa/_/mi bskyod pa ni glang chen bcibs/_/rin chen dbang ni rta la 
[\[178b.2\]]bcibs/_/bcom ldan tshe dpag med pa ni/_/rma bya'i khri la yang dag bzhugs/_/don yod grub pa bla na med/_/mkha' lding dbang po yang dag bzhugs/_/'di rnams kyi ni bzhon par bshad/_/rigs mchog kun gyi dbye ba'o/_/mi bskyod pa yi sa gnon te/_/de bzhin rin 
[\[178b.3\]]chen dbang mchog sbyin/_/tshe dpag med kyi ting 'dzin sbyin/_/don yod grub pa'i mi 'jigs sbyin/_/sngon po ser po de bzhin dmar/_/kha dog ljang gu las 'dzin pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yid 'ong /_/sku mdog dkar po rab tu bsgrags/_/de bzhin rdo rje rin 
[\[178b.4\]]chen la/_/rdo rje phreng bas rdo rje mtshan/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba/_/rdo rje'i ri mo yang dag bri/_/pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang po la/_/pad+ma'i phreng bas pad+ma mtshan/_/pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba/_/pad+ma'i srad bus thig gdab bya/_/rin chen rigs can bzang po la/_/rin chen phreng bas rin 
[\[178b.5\]]chen mtshan/_/rin chen dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba/_/rin chen ri mo rnam par mdzes/_/las kyi rigs la sna tshogs bshad/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas rigs mchog la/_/'on kyang rdo rje khyad par gyis/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba'i/_/rdo rje shar gyi phyogs cha ru/_/lho ru rin 
[\[178b.6\]]chen dkyil 'khor te/_/nub tu pad+ma yang dag bshad/_/byang du las ni yang dag sbyor/_/rdo rje can kun khro gnyer can/_/rin chen tshogs ni rab bshad pa/_/pad+ma chen po dul zhing zhi/_/drag po zhi ba las 'dzin pa/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo ru/_/'khor lo chen po yang dag bri/_/de 
[\[178b.7\]]nas phyi rol 'khor lo sogs/_/cho ga 'di kun de dang 'dra/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsang ba zhes bya ba rkang pa bdun pa rdzogs so/_/las kyi rnal 'byor las byung ba rdzogs so//_//
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]nang gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas ni/_/tshon rtsi las ni dgang bar bya'o/_/thig dang ri mo thams cad ni/_/tshon rtsi kun gyis rab tu dgang /_/dang po nas ni tha ma ru/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun du bri/_/mnyam zhing kun du cha mnyam pas/_/gru bzhi ru ni rab tu brtag_/zur bzhi 
[\[179a.2\]]pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas pa/_/ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan/_/yid du 'ong zhing legs par phye/_/thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/_/dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan/_/rdo rje rin chen srad bu yis/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/_/kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor/_/
[\[179a.3\]]rdo rje kha khyer mdzes byas la/_/zla ba phyed pa'i lcug mas khyab/_/rdo rje phreng ba'i tshogs dang ldan/_/dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras/_/zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes/_/g.yer ka'i dra bas yang dag ldan/_/kha dog sna tshogs rnam par brgyan/_/de dang dbus kyi bar thig la/_/byang chub sems rnams yang 
[\[179a.4\]]dag bri/_/bskal pa bzang po stong dag ni/_/'das pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams/_/shar du thams cad rdo rje mtshan/_/lho ru rin chen phyag mtshan bsnams/_/nub tu pad+ma rdo rje sogs/_/byang du las kyi rdo rje bsnams/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha gang dag_/phyi rol thig la yang dag bri/_/drag 
[\[179a.5\]]po la sogs lha chen rnams/_/snam bu las ni lus phyed phyung /_/dbang phyug chen po tshangs pa che/_/khyab 'jug g.yung drung gzhon nu ni/_/rigs bcas dpung dang bcas rgyal po/_/shar gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bri/_/'khyil pa'i 'od can gtum po dang /_/ser skya rdo rje ser skya rnams/_/
[\[179a.6\]]rigs bcas 'khor lo yang dag ldan/_/lho yi phyogs su yang dag bri/_/myos pa phreng ldan rgyal nyid pa/_/rnam par rgyal dang skyel byed rnams/_/rigs bcas dpung dang yang dag ldan/_/nub kyi cha ru yang dag bri/_/ko shi gos can me dang rlung /_/rdo rje 'jigs byed la sogs rnams/_/nub kyi 
[\[179a.7\]]cha las 'og tu ni/_/byang gi cha ru yang dag bri/_/de bzhin dpung dang bdag por bcas/_/ma mo 'jig rten rab grags dang /_/gtso bo 'khor lo rnam rol pa/_/lha min la sogs rdzu 'phrul che/_/phyi rol 'khor lo'i rigs su bshad/_/rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya las/_/stong phrag bcu ru bshad pa 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]rnams/_/ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri/_/phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas zur du/_/dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bri bar bya/_/me tog spos la sogs ldan pa/_/mchod pa'i lha mo yang dag bri/_/ji ltar nus shing bri ba dang /_/ji ltar mdzes shing rjes su mthun/_/ji ltar rang gi rigs bshad pa/_/ji 
[\[179b.2\]]ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor mchog tu mdzes pa zhes bya ba rkang ba brgyad pa rdzogs so//_//de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ma lus pa 
[\[179b.3\]]rdzogs so//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma lus par dgug pa 'di 'byung ngo /_/'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dgug pa nyid dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la thabs mkhas pa chen po 
[\[179b.4\]]'jug par byed pa nyid dang /_don thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa dang /_byang chub chen po'i tshogs bsags pa dang /_sems can gyi don la mi slu ba dang /_theg pa chen po 'di las theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa mi bskyed cing 'gyur ba med par 'ching ba nyid 
[\[179b.5\]]dang /_thabs dang /_shes rab dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa sdud par byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po nyid la yang dag par byed pa nyid do/_/de la shar gyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu chen po zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin dgod par bya'o/_/lho ru 
[\[179b.6\]]ni rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba dang /_nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bya ba dang /_byang du rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgod par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba zhes bya ba las byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshul ched du brjod pa las rab tu 
[\[179b.7\]]'jug pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs so//_//de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul thob byed/_/dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs nas ni/_/dam tshig mchog chen sems dpa' yis/_/bskor ba dag ni lan gsum bya/_/ma lus gsang ba 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]blta bya zhing /_/kun du tshogs nas dga' bar bya/_/gsang ba chad na dag bya zhing /_/lhag ma rnam par sbyang bar bya/_/de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis/_/myur du phyag rgya che bsten bya/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/_/lan cig tu ni brjod par bya/_/'khor lo zur ni yang dag 
[\[180a.2\]]gnas/_/rdo rje lha mo spyan drang bya/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/_/sangs rgyas mchod rten spyan drang bya/_/sgo yi dbus na gang gnas pa/_/sgo srung rnams ni spyan drang bya/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/_/sems dpa' chen po spyan drang bya/_/de nas sgo rnams 
[\[180a.3\]]thams cad du/_/lcags kyu la sogs las byas te/_/phyag rgya bzhi ni yang dag bcing /_/brgya dang rtsa brgyad dag bya ba/_/rdo rje lcags kyu kun du dgug_/rdo rje zhags pas gzhug par bya/_/rdo rje lcags sgrog kun du bcing /_/rdo rje dril bus dbab par bya/_/sgo'i bya ba'o/_/de 
[\[180a.4\]]nas dbus su 'dug byas nas/_/rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches/_/rdo rje dbye ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/sgo rnams thams cad dbye bar bya/_/sgo srung ba ru dmigs nas ni/_/sgo rnams dbye bar bya ba yin/_/rdo rje sdigs mdzub phyag rgya yis/_/gdug pa thams cad bsdigs par bya/_/
[\[180a.5\]]gang tshe mchod pa yang dag rtsom/_/ji srid dus kyis rdzogs 'gyur ba/_/grwa ni thams cad dag tu ni/_/bdug spos rnams ni gdul bar bya/_/sngon du sgo yi las byas te/_/de nas mchod pa yang dag bya/_/dang por me tog shing la sogs/_/spos dang mar me phyag rgyar bcas/_/
[\[180a.6\]]mtshams kyi dus las sngon du ni/_/bum pa rdo rje spyan drang bya/_/rdo rje bum pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/ci nus bar ni spyan drang bya/_/bum pa shin tu bzang po gcig_/rin chen sna bdun las byas mdzes/_/yang na rin chen dang bsres pa'i/_/rdo rje dri yi chu ldan bya/_/rdo rje chu yi sngags dang ni/_/
[\[180a.7\]]rdo rje phyag rgya chu gtsang ma/_/stong dang rtsa brgyad bzlas byas na/_/rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i chu ru 'gyur/_/bum pa'i sngags ni oM badzra u da ka hUM/_me tog gi sngags ni/_/oM badzra puSh+pe hUM/_mar me'i sngags ni/_/oM badzra A lo ke hUM/_/dri'i sngags ni/_oM badzra gan+dA hUM/_'dug spos kyi sngags 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]ni/_oM badzra d+hU pe hUM/_/spos dang me tog la sogs pa/_/thams cad phyag rgya ldan par bya/_/rdo rje phyag rgya gzung byas nas/_/rdo rje'i sngags kyis rab tu sbyor/_/dgongs ka'i dus nas brtsams nas ni/_/khrus kyi cho ga yang dag bya/_/lus la dri yis byug pa dang /_/
[\[180b.2\]]rgyan rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan/_/rdo rje'i shugs kyi sngags dang ni/_/rdo rje'i shugs kyi phyag rgya yis/_/'byung ba dang ni 'jug pa yi/_/rdo rje'i rnal 'byor nyes mi 'gyur/_/smin ma rdo rje ri mo mtshan/_/sangs rgyas phyag rgya la sogs tshogs/_/sems dpa' 
[\[180b.3\]]thams cad 'gom byas kyang /_/rdo rje'i rnal 'byor nyes mi 'gyur/_/der ni 'gyod pa med par 'gyur/_/rdo rje dril bu dkrol ba yis/_/cho ga chad dam lhag kyang ru/_/'grub 'gyur nyes par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te de ni cho gar ldan/_/kun du 'jigs par mi bya'o/_/
[\[180b.4\]]grub pa'i rnal 'byor go cha yis/_/sangs rgyas skyon du 'dzin mi mdzad/_/rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya ches/_/dkyil 'khor mchod phyir 'jug par bya'o/_/zhugs nas dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/rdo rje dag ni dgug par bya/_/rdo rje lcags kyu kun bcings nas/_/sor mo 
[\[180b.5\]]yis ni dgug par bya/_/de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu yis/_/rgyud las dgug pa nyid du gsungs/_/de bzhin rdo rje rigs chen la/_/rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bcing /_/rin chen lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/_/rin po che ni dgug par bya/_/pad+ma lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni/_/pad+ma'i 
[\[180b.6\]]rigs chen dag la bshad/_/las kyi lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/_/las kyi rigs chen dgug par bya/_/rdo rje chen po'i lcags kyu bcing /_/sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya/_/dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang bya/_/phyi rol rdo rje
