[\[180b.7\]]lcags kyu bcing /_/phyi rol rdo rje rigs spyan drang /_/bkra shis rdo rje'i lcags kyu yis/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan drang bya/_/byang mchog lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/_/dkyil 'khor pa rnams spyan drang bya/_/rin chen lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa spyan drang bya/_/snying 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]po'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/_/phyag na rdo rje spyan drang bya/_/rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/_/kun la nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/_/bsnyems tshul sngags kyi phyag rgya yis/_/rnam snang yang dag spyan drang bya/_/sangs rgyas lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/_/de bzhin 
[\[181a.2\]]kho nar sangs rgyas rnams/_/dam tshig lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/_/dam tshig sems dpa' spyan drang bya/_/dgug pa'i sbyor ba byas nas ni/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad gdon par bya/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs nas ni/_/mchod pa'i sprin rnams yang dag sgrub/_/bdag 
[\[181a.3\]]nyid dbul ba la sogs pa'i/_/ji skad bshad pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/_/bshags dang gsol gdab mchod pa dang /_/bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs rnams/_/bdag gi bya ba rdzogs nas ni/_/phyag rgya bcing ba yang dag brtsam/_/brgya 'am yang na stong dag gam/_/
[\[181a.4\]]brgya phrag brgya ni bsdus pa yis/_/phyag rgya'i tshogs ni bcing byas nas/_/dkyil 'khor dag ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/de nas dkyil 'khor las byas te/_/ji srid skya rengs shar gyur pa/_/de srid phyag rgya yang dag bcing /_/nges par dngos grub ster bar byed/_/de nas 
[\[181a.5\]]langs te phyag rgya bcas/_/dkyil 'khor phyi rol byung nas ni/_/gdug pa la sogs kun bsdigs te/_/dkyil 'khor mchod phyir 'jug par bya/_/rang gi khrus byas lus dris byugs/_/ji ltar 'tsham pa'i rgyan gos ldan/_/shin tu mdzes pa'i gos gyon zhing /_/phreng ldan kha 
[\[181a.6\]]ni dri zhim pas/_/rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis/_/me tog spyi bor gzhag byas te/_/rol pa'i rdo rje dga' ba yis/_/zhugs nas mgon la rab btud cing /_/de nyid 'dod chags rjes chags dang /_/de nyid bskul ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba/_/sangs 
[\[181a.7\]]rgyas kun ni bskul bar bya/_/skyon dang bral zhing rtag pa ste/_/'dod chags kun la rjes chags pa/_/mchod 'os chen po rgyal po che/_/bcom ldan de nyid bdag grub mdzod/_/de nas dam tshig mchog gi ni/_/phyag rgya cho ga bzhin bcings nas/_/rdo rje slob dpon zhugs nas ni/_/
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]lcags sgrog phyag rgya yang dag bcing /_/de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/_/de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu bcing /_/steng du se gol brdabs pa yis/_/sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya/_/sangs rgyas bsdu ba'i sngags ni dzaHdzaHdzaH/_/shar gyi sgo ru yi ge dzaH/_/de bzhin lho ru yi 
[\[181b.2\]]ge hU~M/_/nub tu lcags sgrog chen po baM/_/byang du kun du dbab pa aH/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la/_/las 'di dag ni yang dag bshad/_/las ni kun du rdzogs byas nas/_/de bzhin ngo mtshar mthong 'gyur ba/_/cho 'phrul chen po rmad 'byung che/_/sna tshogs brgya 
[\[181b.3\]]dang rtse bcu ste/_/cho 'phrul rmad byung chen po rnams/_/rdo rje slob dpon gyis mthong 'gyur/_/dngos grub bdag nyid chen po kun/_/dkyil 'khor kun tu 'ong bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje can dang byang chub sems/_/de bzhin rigs ni rnam lnga dang /_/rdo rje dbyings ni bdag nyid che/_/
[\[181b.4\]]bcom ldan mchog kyang gshegs par 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems sogs sangs rgyas sras/_/ngo mtshar slob dpon gyis mthong 'gyur/_/mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid/_/ji bzhin cho ga bcas par 'gyur/_/de bzhin rdzu 'phrul dngos grub dag_/mthong nas dkyil 'khor bya ba yin/_/
[\[181b.5\]]ji ltar bkod pa 'khor lo dang /_/ji ltar yo byad zad pa dang /_/ji ltar brtul zhugs spyad pa bzhin/_/de bzhin dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen dang /_/sangs rgyas yang dag mthong bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'khor lo chen po byon/_/'di ni ngo mtshar mchog yin 
[\[181b.6\]]no/_/ji ltar de rnams bzhugs pa bzhin/_/de bzhin 'khor lo yongs su bzung /_/ye shes bzang po khyab pa yi/_/rmad byung dam pa thob par 'gyur/_/dkyil 'khor rmad byung thams cad ni/_/sa dag brtol nas mthong bar 'gyur/_/yang na dkyil 'khor bar snang gi/_/
[\[181b.7\]]nam mkha' la gnas mthong bar 'gyur/_/yang na sangs rgyas kun gang ba'i/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur/_/yang na phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/sangs rgyas sku ni rab mthong 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs bzhin du/_/rdo rje can gyis bdag nyid mthong /_/
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]yang na gsang ba lnga zhes pa'i/_/yang na sangs rgyas mkhas pa'i mchog_/yang na dkyil 'khor gnas de ni/_/stong phrag gsum ni yongs su gzung /_/yang na rdo rje sems gcig po/_/dkyil 'khor bdag po zhes bshad do/_/de yi mtshan 
[\[182a.2\]]mo nyin mo mthong /_/nyi ma'i 'od kyis kun khyab pa'i/_/yang na nyi ma 'char ba ste/_/yang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/dag pa'i zhing ni mthong nas su/_/sangs rgyas rol pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/'dus pa shin tu dag pa yi/_/dbang bskur ba ni mthong bar 'gyur/_/
[\[182a.3\]]rmad byung sna tshogs zhes bya ba/_/rnam 'phrul ngo mtshar 'di mthong 'gyur/_/rdo rje slob dpon skal chen gyis/_/dkyil 'khor mchod pa sna tshogs 'gyur/_/yo byad tshogs par gyur kyang ni/_/gang zhig bsgribs par gyur pa yi/_/de bzhin ngo mtshar nyid mi mthong /_/rnal 'byor 
[\[182a.4\]]gzhan ni yang dag rtsom/_/phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni/_/sdig pa dral ba yang dag bya/_/rmad byung sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_/la lar zhugs pa tsam gyis ni/_/'grub pa nyid du gdon mi za/_/dang po thun la 'grub par 'gyur/_/de bzhin la lar mtshan phyed na/_/gsum 
[\[182a.5\]]pa'ang skya rengs 'char na 'grub/_/de bzhin la lar nyi shar na/_/de ma thag tu mngon 'dod pa'i/_/sangs rgyas byang chub mchog 'grub 'gyur/_/skal ldan thar par 'dod 'gyur na/_/sa ni dang por 'dod pa ste/_/rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob nas/_/gang gis gnas med 'gro ba'o/_/
[\[182a.6\]]yang na rig pa 'dzin nyid dam/_/de bzhin rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/_/ji ltar mngon par 'dod par 'grub/_/sangs rgyas byang chub yongs su 'dzin/_/mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang /_/de bzhin sdig pa kun byed pas/_/gang tshe lan bdun byas nas ni/_/bsgrub pas rnal 'byor 
[\[182a.7\]]'grub par 'gyur/_/'byung ba bzhi las gzugs can min/_/nam mkha'i gzugs su rtag tu 'gyur/_/chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur ba nyid/_/rdo rje'i bka' ni gzhan du min/_/gang dag lan bdun bsgrubs na ni/_/sdig pa dge ba nyid 'gyur zhing /_/nyes par byas pa 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]bsod nams tshogs/_/gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur te/_/dad pa med par gnas pa dang /_/gang tshe the tshom za 'gyur ba/_/de ni rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems ni yongs ma bzung /_/sngon du bsnyen pa nyams 'gyur te/_/rtag tu brtul zhugs nyams 
[\[182b.2\]]par 'gyur/_/de 'dra la sogs bgegs mang dang /_/nga rgyal 'di dag rnam par spangs/_/sdom pa yongs su ma bzung zhing /_/rnal 'byor de nyid tshul shes min/_/rdo rje slob dpon mi brtan 'gyur/_/'grub pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/_/de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/_/
[\[182b.3\]]gal te rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur/_/mkhas shing sdom pa blangs pa dang /_/byang chub sems ni yongs su gzung /_/gang tshe 'tsho ba don yod cing /_/gal te skye ba 'bras bcas 'dod/_/'bad pas thams cad nyid kyis ni/_/rnal 'byor chen po yang dag brtsam/_/byang chub sems 
[\[182b.4\]]dang ldan gyur nas/_/rig pa'i sdom pa 'dzin pa yi/_/de nas rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'grub 'gyur/_/yang zhus pa/_/rig pa'i rgyud ni rab bsgrub phyir/_/sdom pa ji ltar blang bar bgyi/_/ji ltar dam tshig bsrung bar bgyi/_/dam tshig 
[\[182b.5\]]nyams pa ji lta bu/_/sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/_/byang sems yang dag bskyed nas ni/_/theg pa gzhan la 'dod mi bya/_/de nas rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam/_/dkyil 'khor gang na gnas kyang rung /_/slob dpon gyi ni mdun song ste/_/zhabs dag la ni btud nas 
[\[182b.6\]]brjod/_/dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/_/slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa/_/mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/_/dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/_/sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol/_/gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol/_/
[\[182b.7\]]slob dpon gyis ni nye bar brtag_/rnam pa kun du dri bar bya/_/dam tshig brjod bya gang zhig ni/_/snod du rung ba de gzhug bya/_/bu dang slob ma ma yin min/_/snod dang ldan la sbyin par bya/_/gal te snod dang ldan par shes/_/srog dang bdog pa kun sbyin bya/_/sngon du dkyil 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]'khor rab 'jug cing /_/cho ga bzhin du bcug nas ni/_/de nas me tog bcas thal mo/_/lus btud dga' ba che rnams kyis/_/bshags pa dang ni gsol ba gdab/_/rjes su yi rang kun du bya/_/rgyud dbang gsang ba las gsungs bzhin/_/
[\[183a.2\]]mchod pa dang bcas yongs su bsngo/_/phyogs rnams kun du phyag bya zhing /_/sdom pa chen po blang bar bya/_/slob dpon la ni rab tu mdzod/_/gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol/_/thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa'i/_/sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/bdag ming 'di zhes 
[\[183a.3\]]bgyi ba 'di/_/slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la/_/sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba/_/mi ldog 'khor lo'i 'byor bar ldan/_/thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog_/gsang ba chen po 'jug par bgyi/_/gsang ba'i rigs mtho thams cad du/_/slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug 
[\[183a.4\]]mdzod/_/mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba/_/skal ba chen po bdag la stsol/_/mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing /_/dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/_/sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba/_/slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/_/dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung che/_/sems 
[\[183a.5\]]can kun gyi don bgyid phyir/_/bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur/_/slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/_/gsang ba'i rigs las byung ba yi/_/rdo rje'i rigs bcas 'khor lo ste/_/rta babs bcas par yang dag ldan/_/slob dpon gyur par shes par bya/_/bdag nyid nye 
[\[183a.6\]]bar zhi ba nyid/_/byang chub sems ni yongs su gzung /_/gsang ba yi ni 'khor lo ru/_/sdom pa dang bcas 'jug par bgyi/_/de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/_/gsang ba chen po rigs dag pa/_/gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni/_/bdag nyid 
[\[183a.7\]]chen po khyod 'dod dam/_/des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya/_/yang slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song /_/'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i/_/dam tshig brtan par gyur 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]ba'o/_/rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang /_/blo chen gyis ni gzung bar gyis/_/byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/_/shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do/_/slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bya/_/bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/_/'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i/_/sdom pa dam tshig 
[\[183b.2\]]yin par gsungs/_/rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/_/nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/_/zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/_/sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/_/phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/_/dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya/_/'di ni pad+ma'i rigs 
[\[183b.3\]]dag pa'i/_/dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/_/las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/_/sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/_/yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/_/mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya/_/de las gzhan pa bcu bzhi ni/_/phas pham par ni rab tu bshad/_/spang zhing 
[\[183b.4\]]dor bar mi bya ste/_/rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad do/_/nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/_/nyin re zhing ni bzla bar bya/_/gang tshe nyams 'gyur rnal 'byor pa/_/kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur/_/khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya/_/ma byin pa yang mi blang ngo /_/'dod pa log 
[\[183b.5\]]par mi spyad cing /_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra bar mi bya'o/_/phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba yi/_/chang ni rnam par spang bar bya/_/sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs pa/_/bya ba ma yin thams cad spang /_/dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing /_/rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya/_/lus 
[\[183b.6\]]kyi las ni rnam gsum dang /_/ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang /_/yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni/_/ci nus par ni rjes su skyongs/_/theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya/_/sems can don la rgyab phyogs min/_/'khor ba dag kyang spang mi bya/_/rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags/_/
[\[183b.7\]]lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/_/khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing /_/phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang /_/mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya'o/_/'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad/_/khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya/_/rjes mthun sdom pa rgya cher ni/_/gsang ba'i rgyud las rab 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]tu bshad/_/de nyid kyis kyang brjod par bya/_/'dir ni slob dpon bdag la gson/_/gtso bo ji ltar bka' stsal pa/_/de bzhin du ni bgyid par 'tshal/_/ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/_/byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/_/byang chub 
[\[184a.2\]]sems ni bla na med/_/dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/_/sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/_/tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang /_/dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang /_/sems can don byed tshul khrims gas gsum/_/bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi/_/sangs 
[\[184a.3\]]rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/_/bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/_/deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/_/rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/_/rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang /_/yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/_/slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/_/rin chen rigs 
[\[184a.4\]]mchog chen po yi/_/dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/_/nyin re zhing ni dus drug tu/_/sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin/_/byang chub chen po las byung ba/_/pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/_/dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi/_/las kyi 
[\[184a.5\]]rigs mchog chen po la/_/sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/_/yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/_/mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/_/byang chub sems ni bla med pa/_/dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas/_/sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/bdag gis sdom pa 
[\[184a.6\]]ma lus gzung /_/ma grol ba ni grol bar bgyi/_/ma rgal ba ni bsgral bar bgyi/_/dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing /_/sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/_/de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/_/cho ga ji bzhin dbang bskur bya/_/rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur ba/_/
[\[184a.7\]]gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad/_/de lta bu yi cho ga yis/_/rtag pa nyid du spyod pa na/_/slob dpon rdo rje 'chang chen du/_/'di ni 'gyur ba the tshom med/_/rdo rje slob dpon gyi las rdzogs so//_//de nas slob ma gzhug pa'i las/_/yang dag nyid du bshad 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]par bya/_/slob ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis/_/ji bzhin gsang ba chen por gzhug_/snod dang snod min brtag pa nyid/_/bdag nyid chen pos mi bya'o/_/'di ni mthong ba tsam gyis kyang /_/sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub par 'dod/_/gal te de ni snod min na/_/de la 
[\[184b.2\]]gzhug pa sbyin par bya/_/yang na gang zhig don gnyer 'gyur/_/de la ji ltar bde ba nyid/_/ci ste gang zhig 'dug par 'gyur/_/mkhas pas gzhug pa sbyin par bya/_/gang phyir mthong ba tsam gyis ni/_/thams cad 'grub par gdon mi za/_/'on kyang gang 
[\[184b.3\]]zhig 'dug par 'gyur/_/de la las ni bya ba min/_/gzhug pa tsam zhig sbyin bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad nyid mi bya/_/dga' zhing dad dang ldan gyur na/_/snod du rung ba brtag par bya/_/gsum la skyabs 'gro sngon song ba'o/_/de la gzhug pa sbyin par bya/_/
[\[184b.4\]]rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/_/rdo rje slob ma la sbyin bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' ches/_/sbyor bzhin su yin brjod par bya/_/dkar po dmar po dang ldan pa'i/_/gos kyis mig ni bkab gyur dang /_/rdo rje 'jug byed phyag rgya yis/_/rdo rje slob ma gzhug 
[\[184b.5\]]par bya/_/de nas sgo yi las bya ste/_/sngon la rdo rje lcags kyu yis/_/rdo rje lcags kyu dgug bya zhing /_/yi ge dzaHni brjod par bya/_/badzra aM ku sha dzaH/_rdo rje lcags kyu bkug nas ni/_/rdo rje zhags pas gzhug par bya/_/lho yi sgor ni sbyor bya zhing /_/yi ge hU~M ni 
[\[184b.6\]]brjod par bya/_/hU~M badzra pA sha hU~M/_rdo rje zhags pas bcug nas ni/_/lcags sgrog ldan pas bcing bar bya/_/nub kyi sgo ru bcings nas ni/_/yi ge baM ni brjod par bya/_/badzra s+pho Ta baM/_rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag dgug_/rdo rje zhags pas gzhug bya zhing /_/rdo rje 
[\[184b.7\]]lcags sgrog gis bcing bya/_/rdo rje dril bus yang dag dbab/_/badzra g+han+De aH/_rdo rje gzhug pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/dkyil 'khor mchod phyir gzhug par bya/_/dam tshig phyag rgya chen po yis/_/rdo rje'i ye shes yang dag dbab/_/sa ma ya s+t+waM/_dam tshig 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]phyag rgya chen po yis/_/rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya/_/dam tshig bdag nyid chen po yis/_/sangs rgyas ye shes dbab par bya/_/sa ma ya hUM/_de nas mchod pa phyag rgyar bcas/_/spos dang me tog la sogs tshogs/_/phyag rgya dag ni thams 
[\[185a.2\]]cad bya/_/rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya/_/de nas cho ga ji bzhin du/_/rdo rje slob ma mna' bsgag bya/_/badzra ud ka/_rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas/_/ji ltar 'dod pas dbang bskur bya/_/badzra a b+hi She ka/_rdo rje ye shes bla na med/_/de nas de la dbab pa 
[\[185a.3\]]sbyin/_/badzra A be sha a a/_bcu/_nyi shu/_sum cu/_bzhi bcu/_lnga bcu/_drug cu/_bdun cu/_brgyad cu/_dgu bcu/_brgya/_rdo rje yis ni sngags 'di yis/_/thams cad du ni yang dag dbab/_/de nas gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya/_/rdo rje'i mig ni bla 
[\[185a.4\]]na med/_/badzra ak+Sha/_rdo rje'i rigs ni skal ldan gyi/_/dkyil 'khor ltos shig ces brjod bya/_/badzra pA sh+ya ho/_de nas de la bum pa bzang /_/rdo rje slob dpon gyis dbang bskur/_/gang ming bzang ba tsam gyis ni/_/sdig pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur/_/oM badzra 
[\[185a.5\]]a b+hi Shiny+tsa/_snod ni yang dag brtag bya zhing /_/de yi ye shes yongs su sbyang /_/gal te snod du rung shes na/_/rnam par dbye bar dga' bar bya/_/he badzra nA ma/_cho ga bcu/_gzung nyi shu/_chu sum cu/_rdo rje bzhi bcu/_rin chen lnga bcu/_pheg rdob drug cu/_kha sbyar 
[\[185a.6\]]bdun cu/_bzhad pa brgyad cu/_dag pa dgu bcu/_sems dpa' brgya/_sangs rgyas stong /_las nyis stong /_gzugs sum stong /_rnal 'byor bzhi stong /_'dzin pa lnga stong /_gzugs drug stong /_kha dog bdun stong /_dbyibs brgyad stong /_mtshan ma dgu stong /_tshig 'bum/_
[\[185a.7\]]a 'bum phrag gcig ni yongs rdzogs nas/_/'khor lo'i mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/_/gsang ba yi ni spyod yul gzhan/_/de nas las ni rab bshad bya/_/slob ma'i cho ga dang ming gi dam tshig rdzogs so//_//ye shes dag pa bdag nyid che/_/de nas gsang ba 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]rab bshad bya/_/gang gi cho ga thams cad kyis/_/'khor lo chen po brtan 'gyur ba/_/sangs rgyas sems dpa' sems dpa' nyid/_/sa yi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/_/gsang ba'i dam bcas yi rang bzhin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dag pa/_/rdo rje'i sku dang 
[\[185b.2\]]gsung dang thugs/_/ye shes dag pa rdzu 'phrul che/_/rdo rje'i thugs 'dzin gyur nas ni/_/mtshan nyid dag ni yang dag brtag_/rnal 'byor dpe byad don ldan pa/_/mtshan nyid rjes su brtag par bya/_/rdo rje'i thugs kyi rjes sbyor bas/_/ye shes dag pa yang dag gzung /_/
[\[185b.3\]]mchog tu gsang ba dam pa mchog_/ye shes bzhugs pa kun du bshad/_/de nas ye shes dam pa yis/_/'jig rten 'das pa rab gzhug bya/_/mtshan nyid chen po dang ldan pa'i/_/rtogs pa'i sa la yang dag brten/_/rnal 'byor pa yi spyod yul mchog_/rdo rje chos ni 
[\[185b.4\]]yid 'ong ba'o/_/thim dang chos sku zhes bya dang /_/bsdigs dang 'od zer lnga pa dang /_/glog dang chu zla zhes bya bas/_/sangs rgyas ye shes yang dag 'thob/_/chu yi zla ba bzang po yis/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor spang bar bya/_/nyi ma lnga dang yang dag ldan/_/rigs chos 
[\[185b.5\]]skar ma zhes bya ba/_/nyon mongs gnod pa 'joms byed pa/_/e ma'o gsang ba chen por bshad/_/gsang ba zhes bya rdor 'od 'byung /_/gzhan yang zla ba phyed par 'dod/_/pho nya'i dkyil 'khor kha T+wAM ga_/bcing brtse gsum sbyor las byung /_/lcags kyu shin tu 'bar ba dang /_/
[\[185b.6\]]gtum po rdo rje can gyi tshogs/_/rtog pa'i gnas ni yongs 'gyur ba/_/thob byed rdo rje chen por 'dod/_/kun gyi gong ma'i 'og ma yis/_/nyi tshe ba de spang bar bya/_/mchog tu gsang ba rdzogs so//_//de nas mchog tu gsang ba rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul 
[\[185b.7\]]can/_zab pa/_tshul rgya che ba mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul las kyi tshogs ston pa/_dga' ba chen po'i bkod pas kun khyab pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba la sogs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'byung 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]pha rol pa'i 'khor lo chen po 'di las phyag rgya chen po'i rgyud mchog ces bya ba 'byung ste/_gsang ba mchog tu rgya che ba/_/bsam gyis mi khyab las rnams ston/_/rol pa'i 'khor lo chen po ru/_/chos kyi mdzod ni 'dzin par bya/_/re zhig dang por las kyi 
[\[186a.2\]]tshogs bstan par bya ste/_'di lta ste hU~M/_'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gzung ba yi/_/sbyor thabs yi ge hU~M brjod de/_/'di yis kyang ni rgyal po dang /_/phyag rgya'i rgyal mo brgya ru 'gyur/_/gnyis pa ni byang chub chen po'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i 
[\[186a.3\]]tshul la 'jug pa yin no/_/'di lta ste hU~M/_'dis ni phyag rgya zhes bya yi/_/yi ge hU~M ni brtan par 'gyur/_/phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis/_/phyag rgya'i rgyal mo rnam pa stong /_/gsum pa phyag rgya stong phrag ni/_/brgya yi tshogs su 'gyur ba yin/_/sangs rgyas 'khor lor 
[\[186a.4\]]'jug pa yi/_/yi ge hU~M gis brtan par 'gyur/_/hU~M rnal 'byor bzhi pa'i dbye ba ni/_/brgya phrag khri ru 'dir 'gyur ro/_/rig pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/_/phyag rgya'i rgyal mo kun hU~M bcas/_/'khor lo'i phyag rgya ji snyed yod/_/mngag gzhug pa ni bye bar 'gyur/_/rtse gsum 
[\[186a.5\]]la sogs mtshon cha ni/_/rtag tu phyag rgya'i rgyal po yin hU~M/_/de nas sngags kyi tshogs 'byung ste/_/Tag gi bcu/_maT nyi shu/_phaT sum cu/_raT bzhi bcu/_baT lnga bcu/_riT drug cu/_khaT bdun cu/_waT brgyad cu/_taT dgu bcu/_taT brgya/_ka tani lan stong 
[\[186a.6\]]yin/_/ta dang wa zhes bya ba dang /_/Da ni rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur/_/yi ge Da ni lan gsum sbyar/_/yi ge a yang rnam pa bzhi/_/yi ge ba ni rnam pa lnga/_/yi ge a ni lan drug sbyar/_/ka ni lan bdun yang dag sbyar/_/yi ge d+ha ni lan brgyad sbyar/_/yi ge sha ni phyed du 'gyur/_/
[\[186a.7\]]khiT ni stong phrag brgya ru 'gyur/_/stong phrag brgya las rnal 'byor gyis/_/phyag rgya'i rgyud ni btu bar bya/_/rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i drug pa gsang ba'i tshogs chen po'i mchog_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]chen po shin du gsang ba'i rnal 'byor rdo rje rtse mo las/_byang chub pa'i tshul rgya chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba yang rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rgya chen po 
[\[186b.2\]]'di las dkyil 'khor chen po'i dang por phyag rgya dang nye ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye shes 'byung ste/_gang tshe rdo rje slob dpon dang /_/rdo rje slob mar gyur pa na/_/phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya bcing /_/gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas/_/gang tshe rdo rje sems dpa' 'ching /_/rdo rje khu tshur dam 
[\[186b.3\]]du 'ching /_/gang tshe rdo rje rgyal po 'ching /_/rdo rje gnod sbyin rab tu 'ching /_/gang tshe rdo rje chags pa 'ching /_/rdo rje srin po rab tu 'ching /_/gang tshe rdo rje legs pa 'ching /_/rdo rje las ni rab tu 'ching /_/gang tshe rdo rje rin chen 'ching /_/rdo rje smra ba rab tu 'ching /_/gang tshe rdo rje gzi 
[\[186b.4\]]brjid 'ching /_/rdo rje rgyu ni rab tu 'ching /_/gang tshe rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'ching /_/rdo rje rnon po rab tu 'ching /_/gang tshe rdo rje bzhad pa 'ching /_/rdo rje chos ni rab tu bcing /_/de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/_/phyag rgya'i lan ni yang dag sbyar/_/phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya 
[\[186b.5\]]brtan par 'gyur/_/mchod pa'i phyag rgya ji ltar lags/_/rdo rje'i lcags kyus bkug nas su/_/rdo rje'i mdas ni dga' bar bya/_/rdo rje'i mdas ni 'phangs nas su/_/rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis bsgrub bya/_/phyag rgya ji bzhin bkrol nas ni/_/de ni bcing ba rab tu bya/_/mchod pa'i cho 
[\[186b.6\]]ga 'di yis ni/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchod par 'gyur/_/de bzhin g.yon pas gar bya zhing /_/g.yas pas khu tshur bcings nas ni/_/dpral bar yongs su bskor nas su/_/kha yi mdun du dgod par bya/_/rdo rje nyi ma bzhad pas bgad/_/mnyam zhing cung zad gdangs te 
[\[186b.7\]]gnas/_/ral gri dri ma med snang bas/_/rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya/_/rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo ni/_/yang dag bsgreng ba legs par bsgrub/_/de nas spyi gtsug kha dag tu/_/las byas dkyil 'khor mchod pa na/_/rigs kyi lha yi sbyor ba yis/_/legs par bsgrub pas gtam 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]'grub bya/_/dang por bdag nyid rdo rje sems/_/de bzhin lha nyid brtag par bya/_/brtul zhugs sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/rigs kyi lha nyid bsgrub par bya/_/'khor lo rnam pa du ru brjod/_/ji ltar rigs de bzhin 'khor lo/_/ji ltar dgod pa de bzhin 'gyur/_/
[\[187a.2\]]ji skad gsungs pa dgongs pa bzhin/_/mdor bsdu na ni rnam pa lnga/_/rdo rje rin chen de bzhin chos/_/pad+ma sna tshogs shin tu bstan/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas rnal 'byor gsang /_/'khor lo rnam pa lnga ru bshad/_/gsang ba rnam pa du ru 'gyur/_/gsang ba rnam pa lnga ru brjod/_/
[\[187a.3\]]rgyas pa'i sgo nas rnam pa mang /_/sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang /_/chos dang las ni grags chen no/_/cho ga rnam pa du ru brjod/_/mdor na rnam pa gsum du 'dod/_/zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang /_/mngon spyod kyi ni rtog pa la/_/rdo rje sbyor ba las byung du/_/rdo rje sbyor ba bla med pa/_/
[\[187a.4\]]tshad med bgrang du med pa yis/_/ji ltar gdul bya rnams kyi khams/_/de bzhin rdo rje sbyor 'byung rnams/_/rtsa ba'i rgyud du ji ltar brjod/_/gsang ba lnga ldan gang yin pa'i/_/de ni rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya/_/dbang bskur phyag rgya chen po dang /_/rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor 
[\[187a.5\]]'byung /_/ji ltar gsang ba'i rigs las byung /_/gang zhig sngon du chos nyid snang /_/yid la byed pa dang ldan pa/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi thabs chen po/_/de bzhin gsang ba rab tu brtag_/'di yi rtag tu de nyid rig_/rdo rje'i ye shes ji ltar 'gyur/_/ji ltar bsgoms pas rdo rje 
[\[187a.6\]]can/_/mngon par sbyor ba de nyid rig_/de tshe ye shes rang bzhin sems/_/de nyid ye shes brtan par 'gyur/_/mchog tu gsang ba ci 'drar brjod/_/phyag rgya rnam pa lnga ldan pa/_/de ni mchog tu gsang ba bsgrags/_/phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya bsdu/_/nye bar bzhad pa'i mchod 
[\[187a.7\]]pa'o/_/de nyid kyang ni ji lta bu/_/rig pa'i bsgom pa bstan pa dang /_/ting 'dzin sgo dang yang dag ldan/_/rig pa'i lha mo'i 'khor gyi mchog_/de nyid du ni rtag tu 'gyur/_/rdo rje phra mo ji ltar brjod/_/shes rab can gyis bdag bsam bya/_/da ni su zhig bdag mi dmigs/_/
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]'byung ba bzhi yi rang bzhin lus/_/'byung ba rnams las ji ltar 'byung /_/de nas lus 'di thams cad ni/_/rnal 'byor spyi bo nas brtsams te/_/rkang pa yi ni mthil bar du/_/mi gtsang rdzas ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zla ba'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/_/yang na bdag nyid 
[\[187b.2\]]bsam par bya/_/yang na snying ga'i dbus su ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/yang na zla gnyis yang dag ldan/_/dbus su rdo rje rnam par bsgom/_/yang na rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa/_/lus kun brtan par spro bar bya/_/yang na rdo rje bdag nyid sku/_/rdo rje'i dngos 
[\[187b.3\]]po rnam spangs pa'i/_/yang [(]namakha' [,]nam mkha' [)]mtshungs chos shes pa'i/_/rdo rje'i rnal 'byor yang dag gzung /_/lce ni rkan la sbyar byas te/_/sna yi rtse mor blta bya zhing /_/rdo rje phra mo bde reg pas/_/sems ni mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur/_/rdo rje phra mo'i bde reg la/_/rtag tu mtshan 
[\[187b.4\]]ma'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mtshan ma de ni spro byas te/_/phyogs kun du ni yongs su spro/_/s+pha ra Na badzra/_ci ste sems ni spro bar 'dod/_/phyogs rnams kun du yongs su spro/_/sna yi rtse mor phyin bar du/_/sems ni slar yang bsdu bar bya/_/saM ha ra Na badzra/_de nas brtsams te 
[\[187b.5\]]mnyam bzhag pas/_/gang zhig cung zad ci bsgom pa'i/_/chos dang gang zag bdag med cing /_/gzung dang 'dzin pa spang ba'o/_/badzra badzra tiSh+Tha badzra/_sems can gang la byams pa ni/_/rtag tu brtan par dmigs nas su/_/sems ni spro ba'i spyod pa yis/_/phyogs rnams 
[\[187b.6\]]kun du yongs su spro/_/ma hA badzra mai tri s+phar Na/_sdug bsngal kun la yang dag gnas/_/sems can 'di rnams rab tu dka'/_/snying rje chen po'i sbyor ba yis/_/phyogs rnams kun du yongs su spro/_/ma hA kA ru Ni s+pha ra Na/_mya ngan 'das la btang snyoms gzhag_/sems 
[\[187b.7\]]can don ni yang dag brtsam/_/kye ma sems can 'di 'dul dka'/_/phyogs rnams kun du yongs su spro/_/ma hA u pe k+Shi s+phar Na/_thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/_/gzod nas dag pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur/_/kun nas nyon mongs mi dmigs 'gyur/_/mya ngan 'das pa 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]grol ba'ang med/_/sarba bud+b+ha pra mo da s+pha ra Na/_mkha' 'am gzhan gyi phyogs dag tu/_/rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis/_/snying ga'i rdo rje byang chub sems/_/shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/_/rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji lta ba bzhin du/_/phyag 
[\[188a.2\]]na rdo rje'i gzugs chen po/_/dam pa'i chos nyid bsgom par bya/_/rnam pa mchog rnams kun ldan pa/_/sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par bsgom/_/rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya/_/bud+d+ha a nu smr-i t+yA bi sha/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su 
[\[188a.3\]]ni/_/rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya/_/rang gi snying ga'i dkyil 'khor du/_/zla bsgom rmad byung rnal 'byor che/_/sa man+ta b+ha dra A be sha/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/rang bdag nyid ni rdo rje'i gzugs/_/rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i/_/rdo rje sems dpa' cho ga 
[\[188a.4\]]bzhin/_/badzra sa twa/_rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/_/snying gar zla ba'i dbus su ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/badzra satwa sa mA d+hi dz+nyA nA be sha/_rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i/_/sangs rgyas gzugs 
[\[188a.5\]]su rang bdag nyid/_/bsgom zhing snying gar zla ba'i dkyil/_/dbus su sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/_/ta thA ga to haM/_rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam bsgom pa/_/rnam pa brgya dang rtsa bcu ni/_/rgyas ba ru ni ci rigs par/_/gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad/_/rdo rje phra mo 
[\[188a.6\]]rdzogs so//_//'jig rten pa ni ji ltar 'dod/_/rdo rje'i gzugs ni gter gnas pa/_/snying gar yongs su bsgom par bya/_/sa yi gnas kyang bsgoms na ni/_/gter dag rab tu mthong bar 'gyur/_/badzra ni d+hi/_rin chen chen po'i rdo rje gzugs/_/nam mkha' la 
[\[188a.7\]]ni yongs su bsgom/_/gang du lhung bar mthong ba ni/_/de ni gter yod shes par bya/_/rat+na ni d+hi/_lce la pad+ma'i gzugs dag ni/_/shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/_/de na yod ces bcas nas ni/_/rdo rje'i lce nyid rang nyid smra/_/d+ha rma ni d+hi/_lus kun rnal 'byor 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]chen po yis/_/rdo rje'i gzugs su rnam par bsgom/_/kun du babs nas gar lhung ba/_/de na gter yod bstan pa yin/_/karma ni d+hi/_gter shes pa rdzogs so//_//rdo rje dbab pa 'byung ba yin/_/chu ni rdo rje'i gzugs rang bzhin/_/sgom zhing rdo rje'i shugs 
[\[188b.2\]]kyis ni/_/chu yi steng du 'gro bar bya/_/badzra dza la/_ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs su ni/_/rdo rje sems sogs 'dod pa rnams/_/rang bdag nyid ni bsgom bya ste/_/'dod pa'i gzugs nyid thob par 'gyur/_/badzra rU pa/_chos kun mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste/_/bdag ni 
[\[188b.3\]]nam mkha' zhes rang nyid/_/de nyid dag pa bsgom bya ste/_/de ni mi snang ba nyid 'gyur/_/badzra A kA sha/_/rdo rje'i skas la 'dug nas ni/_/'dzeg pa ru ni bsgom byas na/_/ji srid du ni 'dzeg pa'i gnas/_/de srid nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur/_/badzra ma haM/_mi snang ba dang /_
[\[188b.4\]]mkha' la 'gro ba dang /_chu'i steng du 'gro bar bya ba dang /_/'dod pa'i gzugs nyid shes pa rdzogs so//_//zla ba'i gzugs la 'dug nas su/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/_/lag na rdo rje bsgoms na ni/_/rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/badzra d+ha ra/_zla ba'i 
[\[188b.5\]]gzugs la 'dug nas su/_/rdo rje rin chen bdag rang nyid/_/rab tu rin chen bsgoms nas ni/_/rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/rat+na d+ha ra/_zla ba'i gzugs la 'dug nas su/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa rang bdag nyid/_/lag pa pad+ma dag tu bsgom/_/pad+mo'i rig pa 'dzin 
[\[188b.6\]]par 'gyur/_/pad+ma d+ha ra/_/zla ba'i gzugs la 'dug nas su/_/rdo rje'i las su yang dag brtan/_/lag tu las ni bsgom byas na/_/las kyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_karma ng+ha ra/_rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid rdzogs so//_//phyag rgya kun gyi ting nge 
[\[188b.7\]]'dzin/_/nam mkha'i dbyings su kun bsams nas/_/rdo rje'i bdag nyid ji srid 'dod/_/de srid skad cig gis 'phar 'gyur/_/badzra/_dngos grub kyi ni ting 'dzin ni/_/nam mkha'i dbyings su kun bsams nas/_/mngon par shes pa lnga thob cing /_/myur du ye shes rang 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]grub 'gyur/_/shud+d+ha/_shud+d+ha/_rin chen rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun/_/nam mkha'i dbyings su kun bsams nas/_/rjes su dran pa bstan pa yin/_/myur du rin chen 'dzin mtshungs 'gyur/_/badzra badzra/_thams cad sangs rgyas gzugs rang bzhin/_/
[\[189a.2\]]nam mkha'i dbyings su mos byas nas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin ni/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyi ched du 'gyur/_/bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/_mchog gi dngos grub rdzogs so//_//rang nyid rdo rje khu tshur ni/_/chags pa'i dga' bas mig gdangs pa/_/de yis gang la bltas 
[\[189a.3\]]ba ni/_/des kyang rdo rje can du mthong /_/oM badzra dr-iSh+Ti maT/_gsal zhing rab tu 'bar ba'i mig_/mig 'bras kun du 'dren byed pa/_/'bar ba'i lta ba zhes su brjod/_/'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed pa/_/dIp+ta dr-iSh+Ti aM ku sha dzaH/_khro gnyer bsnyer ba rab 'joms 
[\[189a.4\]]pa/_/khros pas mig ni rab tu g.yo/_/khro bo'i lta ba la brten nas/_/'jig rten gsum yang gzhom par bya/_/krod+ha dr-iSh+Ti hriH/_ri rab ri bo man+dA ra/_/brtan zhing mi 'dzums pa yi mig_/byams pa'i lta ba zhes bshad de/_/gdon dang rims dang dug 'joms pa'o/_/
[\[189a.5\]]dr-i D+ha tiSh+Ta traM/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dgug pa dang /_dbang du bya ba dang /_chad pa gcad pa dang /_yongs su bskyab pa'i las rdzogs so//_//bde ba gzhan ni yod nyid min/_/rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches/_/'on kyang dgug pa bde ba ste/_/de ni 
[\[189a.6\]]kun las khyad par 'phags/_/dus 'dir skal ba chen po ni/_/dkyil 'khor chen po byed pa las/_/dngos grub med kyang bde ba gang /_/bde ba kun las khyad par 'phags/_/lha dang mi yi 'jig rten pa'i/_/bde ba bsdus par 'gyur ba yis/_/rdo rje slob dpon bde ba 
[\[189a.7\]]gang /_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/yang na gang zhig dngos grub thob/_/sangs rgyas nyid du rab shes bya/_/rang gis rtogs pa gang yin pa/_/gzhan dag gang gis shes par 'gyur/_/sar chud rgyal ba'i gnas dang ldan/_/gsang ba'i dngos grub ster mdzad pa/_/bde 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]ba thob pa gang yin pa/_/de ni gsang ba 'dzin ji bzhin/_/gsang ba yi ni tshogs chen po/_/'di la zhugs pa gang yin pa/_/sa thob par ni shes bya ste/_/mi ldog rgyal ba'i bdag nyid sras/_/rgyal ba'i gnas kyi sa thob kyang /_/yid ches par ni mi 'gyur te/_/de 
[\[189b.2\]]yis sa brgyad kyi bar du/_/theg pa dman pa spong mi 'gyur/_/gsang chen rtog pa 'di ru ni/_/zhugs pa bdag nyid rgyal ba'i sras/_/theg chen la ni gzhol ba rnams/_/yid ches bar ni 'gyur ba ste/_/gsang ba yi ni phan yon ni/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni rab tu 
[\[189b.3\]]mkhyen/_/'dir ni yon tan mdor bsdus pa/_/sangs rgyas bde ba thob par 'gyur/_/yon tan gyi dbang du byas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//_//byed pa po dang skyed byed med/_/las dang 'bras bu gang las bshad/_/nga zhes ji skad bshad pa la/_/nga ni byed 
[\[189b.4\]]po skyed byed dang /_/nga ni skye dgu'i bdag po yin/_/nga ni sna tshogs bdag po ste/_/byed po skyed byed mes po yin/_/yang gsungs pa/_dag pa de bzhin gshegs snying po/_/sems dpa'i snying po zhes byar bshad/_/nga ni de bzhin gshegs snying po/_/sems can 
[\[189b.5\]]thams cad bdag dang mtshungs/_/mya ngan 'das bcas sa 'og steng /_/sa bla 'jig rten 'di sems can/_/ma lus srid pa dag gi gnas/_/sems tsam du ni rab tu 'jug_/sems can kun gyi sems gang yin/_/de ni byed po 'byin byed brjod/_/nga ni rgyal po sems 
[\[189b.6\]]dbang phyug_/ci phyir nga ni byed por bshad/_/ji skad gsang ba gzhan las gsungs/_/nga nyid rang las byung ba ste/_/mya ngan 'das bcas sa 'og steng /_/sa bla srid gsum 'jig rten gsum/_/gang zhig gnas zhes bya ba'i sems/_/gnas med las byung gang yin 
[\[189b.7\]]pa/_/snying po de bzhin gshegs dag pa/_/de nyid rang byung nga nyid do/_/nga ni rdo rje can yang yin/_/sdug bsngal thams cad spangs pa dang /_/nyes pa thams cad zad pas na/_/nga ni byang chub sems rdo rje/_/nga nyid rang nyid byung ba'o/_/nga nyid yang ni khyab 'jug ste/_/
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]gzung ba la sogs kun spangs pa'i/_/dag pa de bzhin nyid rnam shes/_/bdag dang nyon mongs med pa ste/_/de bas nga ni khyab 'jug bshad/_/nga ni de bzhin nyi ma ste/_/ci phyir de nyid ces bshad pa/_/zab mo'i chos ni ngas rtogs pa/_/de phyir rang 
[\[190a.2\]]byung nga nyid ni/_/nyi ma zhes ni bya bar brjod/_/nga ni zla ba ru brjod de/_/nga ni chos rnams thams cad kyi/_/zhi ba ru ni rtogs par bshad/_/de bas zhi ba chen po yis/_/nga ni zla ba blo gros ches/_/nga ni de bzhin gshin rje ste/_/ji bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyi/_/ye 
[\[190a.3\]]shes chen po lhag par bshad/_/de nyid rtogs pa gang yin pa/_/gshin rje nga ste gshin rje 'dzin/_/dbang po ste/_dbang po mi 'phrul zhes bya ba/_/'khor ba las rgal pha rol phyin/_/ye shes nor ni bsgrubs pa yis/_/nga ni dbang byed dbang po yin/_/skye dgu 
[\[190a.4\]]yi ni bdag po ste/_/chos rnams kun gyi rnam pa ni/_/skye ba rtsa nas 'don byed pa/_/sdug bsngal chen po yongs su shes/_/de phyir nga ni skye dgu'i bdag_/nga bdag nyid ni mes po ste/_/nga yis bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs nas/_/thar pa'i grong khyer chen po ru/_/'khor ba'i rgya 
[\[190a.5\]]mtsho las sgrol bas/_/nga nyid kho na mes po yin/_/nga ni 'dod pa'i 'jig rten yin/_/ngo bo nyid dang longs spyod rdzogs/_/sprul pa'i sku ni rab 'jug byed/_/lo chen 'jig rten zhes bya ba/_/'jig rten lta ba ston byed yin/_/srid pa'i 'jigs pa las bsgral yin/_/
[\[190a.6\]]nyon mongs chen po rnam par spang /_/srid par bshad de/_srid pa'i zhags pa gcod byed pa/_/nga ni srid pa'i rgyal po che/_/khams gsum pa ni/_rgyud ni khams zhes rab tu brjod/_/byang chub sems zhes bya bar bshad/_/nga ni theg pa gsum 'dzin pas/_/nga ni khams 
[\[190a.7\]]gsum pa ru bshad/_/sa 'og ni/_yang dag de nyid rdo rje che/_/stong nyid de bzhin nyid ces bshad/_/ji ltar sa ni 'dzin pa'i mchog_/de bzhin nga ni chos 'dzin pa/_/sa steng ni/_sa steng nam mkha' zhes su brjod/_/nga ni rang bzhin gyis mkha' mtshungs/_/chos dang 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]gang zag bdag med pa/_/nga ni sa steng de nyid bshad/_/me ni/_nga ni gzod nas ma skyes 'byung ba med/_/bdag min bdag med nga ni skye dgu'i bdag_/srid pa'i 'khri shing gis bcings sems can gdungs/_/nga ni grol byed 'khri shing dag byed pa/_/rlung ni/_mtshan ma 
[\[190b.2\]]rnam par bsgoms nas ni/_/mtshan ma med pa 'dus ma byas/_/byang sems 'khri shing zhags pa dag_/'thor byed de bzhin rlung yin no/_/nga ni dbang phyug chen po ste/_rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag po chen po byed/_/nga ni sangs rgyas dbang phyug gzhan ci smos/_/bdud rtsi chen po 
[\[190b.3\]]thar pa'i grong khyer che/_/nga ni dbang phyug dbang sgyur dbang phyug che/_/nga ni brtul zhugs zhes bshad de/_/nga ni nyon mongs 'joms par bshad/_/nga ni rga dang 'chi ba las/_/nges par grol bas tshangs par bshad/_/'jig rten gsum gyi lus su ni/_/zhags pa zhe sdang 
[\[190b.4\]]gti mug ni/_/khams gsum 'jig rten gsum yin no/_/nga ni srung ma bran du 'gyur/_/de rnams 'byung bas khams gsum nga /_/gdong drug ni/_sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang /_/chos dang las dang gsang 'dzin bcas/_/rnam pa drug ni 'khor lo che/_/nga ni gdong 
[\[190b.5\]]drug mchog chen po/_/gzhan yang /_bza' dang tshogs sogs gang yin pa/_/nga bdag nyid ces ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig gdon la sogs pa kun/_/sems las kun du byung ba'i rlabs/_/nga ni thugs 'dzin rgyal po ste/_/de bas nga ni srid pa'i gnas/_/nga 
[\[190b.6\]]ni 'dod pa ste/_thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che/_/dgongs pa mthar thug nga yis bshad/_/nga ni sems can kun la 'dod/_/de bas nga ni 'dod par bshad/_/thar pa nga ste/_nga nyid thar cing sems can kun/_/so sor yang ni grol bar byed/_/de bas rang byung nga nyid ni/_/
[\[190b.7\]]thar par 'dzin pa'i rgyal po yin/_/nga ni dmyal ba ste/_nga ni bdag dang chos rnams min/_/nga ni chags sdang kun du bral/_/nga yis 'chi med lam bstan pas/_/nga ni dmyal ba'i dmyal ba pa/_/nga ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]te/_mngon par 'dod pa nga yis 'thob/_/sems can 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]sgom pa smin par byed/_/nga yis dga' ba'i gnas thob pas/_/nga ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]skyes/_/dud 'gro nga ste dud 'gro skyes/_/'khor ba'i chu bo brgal dka' bas/_/sems can dag ni thams cad gnas/_/ji ltar mi shes rmongs gyur pa/_/de bzhin 
[\[191a.2\]]nga yis grol bar byed/_/gzhan yang nga ni chags pa ste/_/sems can grol ba rjes chags phyir/_/srid pa gcod byed zhe sdang dang /_/gsang mdzod 'dzin pas ser sna can/_/sems can 'dod pas 'dod pa dang /_/sems can smin byed sems can nga /_/gsang ba 
[\[191a.3\]]'dzin pa'i rgyal po gang /_/de ni nga yi 'jigs byed sras/_/des na gsang ba chen po yi/_/nga ni chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa/_/sangs rgyas byang chub gsang 'dzin po/_/de bas nga ni gsang ba'i bdag_/yang na byin gyis rlob pa dang /_/bsnyems bcas sgeg pa'i zhal mnga' 
[\[191a.4\]]ba/_/tha ni de yi steng sbyar nas/_/gang du gsang bar brjod pa'o/_/da ra d+ha rma da ra gsang /_/nga ni lnga lnga 'dzin pa yin/_/rma bya chen po mdzod ldan ma'i/_/nga ni gsang ba'i bdag por bshad/_/rtsa dang pags pa nu mar ldan/_/mdzod sogs gsus pa 'phyang ba dang /_/zla ba'i 
[\[191a.5\]]steng na gar byed pa/_/de rnams gsang ba'i rgyal po yin/_/sa la bsnyems pa'i gar byed pa/_/rdo rje gar byed skra dkar 'joms/_/dra ba spus len gsus pa can/_/mdzod ldan dang ni gos 'dzin ma/_/yi ge ta 'don zla ba dang /_/mchog dang 'jigs byed bzhin ldan ma/_/
[\[191a.6\]]sgra gcan rdo rje rjes mthun sgra/_/mche ba 'byin pa myos pas khyab/_/de bzhin spyod pa yang dag ldan/_/phreng ldan gti mug 'joms byed ma/_/spyan 'dren 'dus byas thams cad ma/_/yun ring gar gyi tshogs ldan ma/_/rigs kyi gar na spyod ma dang /_/'jigs byed rnam par 
[\[191a.7\]]'jigs byed dang /_/gar gyi gnas byed ces bya dang /_/gar byed rdo rje'i gar byed ma/_/phul byung thams cad 'thor byed ma/_/lnga phung skyabs dang 'dzin byed pa/_/rkang gdub kyis ni bdud kyi tshogs 'joms byed/_/'brug gi bdag po rkang gdub kyis 'dar byed/_/rkang 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]gdub kyis ni yang yang bdag chen skyel/_/bskyod pa'i 'dar 'dar brtan pa skyel byed pa/_/lag pa rked pa ji bzhin bskyod pa'o/_/gar gyi phyi rol pas kun du sdud byed ma/_/rdo rje nyi ma sa yi gar/_/de bzhin na di ki si ri/_/zas chen gar ma'i gsang ba ste/_/de bas nga ni gsang 
[\[191b.2\]]ba'i bdag_/hA hA hA thA pA tA pa kA ta sa ra ma ra hUM/_rnal 'byor chen po spyan 'dren ma/_/gus ldan ma dang sprul byed gzhan/_/'phrog ma 'joms byed gzhu ma dang /_/snying po bdud ma sgra sgrogs ma/_/pheg rdob 'dzin dang drag po dang /_/gzhan yang rdo rje ldan par bshad/_/
[\[191b.3\]]rta sgra'i tshogs ni drug ldan ma/_/'od tshogs kyis ni mtshan mo 'joms byed ma/_/seng ge yi ni nga ro sgra sgrogs pa/_/rta yi sgra sgrogs sgra gcan ma dang ni/_/gzhan yang gsang ba stug pos khrus byed ma/_/sna tshogs ha ha sgra yis 'phrog bdag ma/_/spyan bzang yangs ma gsang 
[\[191b.4\]]ba ston byed ma/_/gzhan yang 'bad pas dga' ba nyid byed ma/_/gzhan yang spyan yangs ut+pal gyis brgyan ma/_/sprin 'joms byed cing sa rnams kun 'joms ma/_/seng ge'i bzhin rol gong nas [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ldan/_/de 'dra'i 'khor ni dam pa dang ldan pa/_/gzhan yang 
[\[191b.5\]]gsang ba'i yid la taM sgrogs pa/_/de bzhin rim gyis dge legs nyid byed ma/_/Tu hUM Tu hUM d+ha ri d+ha da ri/_ma hA shri ri sha yang na shri ya ri kaM ma ta sa ta kaM_/de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba rdzogs so//_//de yi dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ni/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mchog 
[\[191b.6\]]gis/_/rnal 'byor pa ni rol byed na/_/des ni dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/gsang ba'i mdo yi dbang bshad pa'i/_/sems can spyod pa ji lta bu/_/yang gsungs pa/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bshad pa/_/gsang ba yi ni rab sgrub pa/_/dang por de bzhin gshegs 
[\[191b.7\]]pa'i rigs/_/sgrub pa yi ni rol par bya/_/b+ha ga ci yin brjod par bya/_/'joms pas b+ha ga zhes su brjod/_/gang du nyon mongs 'joms byed pa/_/shes rab lus 'joms nyon mongs pa/_/de bas shes rab b+ha gar brjod/_/de bas rtags ni ci yin brjod/_/rtags ni 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]mtshan ma zhes byar bshad/_/blo ldan shes rab rtags las byung /_/byang chub sems ni thabs chen po/_/de ni rtags su rab tu bsgrags/_/b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su/_/'khor lo'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya/_/ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs gang yin/_/
[\[192a.2\]]mkhas pas sgo gnyis gzung bar bya/_/de ni bcug pa zhes bshad de/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por 'gyur/_/de nas dgongs pas bshad pa yi/_/b+ha ga ru ni rdzas bsgrub pa/_/gsang rgyud dbang po las gsungs bzhin/_/bsgrub pa dag ni ji ltar bya/_/b+ha gar gur 
[\[192a.3\]]gum phyung nas ni/_/mtshan ma yang ni gzhug par bya/_/rdzas rnams bzang po thob par 'gyur/_/rnam pa bzhi yang 'grub par 'gyur/_/b+ha ga pad+ma zhes byar brjod/_/mtshan ma rdo rje zhes bshad do/_/rdzas ni pad+ma'i steng bzhag nas/_/rdo rje srub mas bsgrub par bya/_/
[\[192a.4\]]shin tu chags pas 'dod chags can/_/des ni gsang ba rab bsgrub 'gyur/_/'dod chags chags pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/dngos grub chen po ji ltar 'gyur/_/'di ni chags can rab bsgrub 'gyur/_/bden pa nyid du yang dag bshad/_/'dod chags bral ba gsang ba med/_/
[\[192a.5\]]de ni gsang ba 'grub mi 'gyur/_/dad pa'i dad pa chen po yis/_/gsang ba'i sbyor ba las byung chags/_/bsgrub pa la ni 'jug 'gyur ba/_/de yis sgrub pa gdon mi za/_/chags dang bral ba'i sdig pa ni/_/gang zhig gsang la chags bral 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[192a.6\]]byang chub spyod byed pa/_/sdig chen kha na ma tho che/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu smad/_/chos la kha na ma tho med/_/de yis gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur/_/rnam pa thams cad nyon mongs kun/_/'joms pa 'dod chags mchog yin no/_/'dod chags zhe sdang sogs nyon 
[\[192a.7\]]mongs/_/rtogs dang mtshungs pa'i chos med do/_/skye dgu kun bsad bsod nams ji lta bu/_/ji srid 'khor bar bcings bar du/_/srid pa zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/'khor ba'i btson ra 'di ru ni/_/sems can kun gyis gzhom par bya/_/gang zhig gzhan gyi nor 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]'phrog pa/_/des ni gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur/_/nor ni 'khor ba zhes bshad de/_/sems can de rnams nyon mongs 'gyur/_/gang zhig gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa/_/byang chub sems ni rab 'grub 'gyur/_/bud med rnams dang lhan cig rtse/_/des ni gsang ba 
[\[192b.2\]]'grub par 'gyur/_/rang gi rigs kyi lha mo gang /_/rig pa'i lha mo bla med dang /_/lhan cig rnal 'byor rol pa yis/_/rol pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/gal te rigs ni 'grub 'dod na/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'i tshig kyang smra bar bya/_/chos kun dngos po med pa ste/_/brjod 
[\[192b.3\]]min tshig gi spyod yul min/_/med pa gang yin [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]tshig ldan/_/rig pa'i bzlas pa bden pa yin/_/gal te dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub 'dod na/_/sems can gsad bya de bzhin bza' bar bya/_/sems can chags pa zhes bshad de/_/ming dang gzugs la 
[\[192b.4\]]kun du chags/_/bkug nas zos par gyur na ni/_/bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur/_/'khor ba spangs kyang chos min 'gyur ba ni/_/'khor ba spong ba gang yin pa/_/sems can don la rgyab phyogs 'gyur/_/blo ldan theg pa dman dga' ba/_/de ni rtag tu 
[\[192b.5\]]nyes ldan yin/_/mya ngan 'das la mngon dga' na/_/sems can don la phyir phyogs 'gyur/_/blo ldan theg pa dman dga' ba/_/de ni rtag tu nyes ldan yin/_/ser sna can ni de yi rigs bsgrub 'gyur/_/tshul khrims rnam par dag 'gyur zhing /_/srog gi phyir yang 
[\[192b.6\]]gtong mi byed/_/rig pa'i brtul zhugs ldan 'gyur ba/_/des ni gsang ba rab bsgrub 'gyur/_/drag dang ldan pa'i sems ldan pa/_/des ni 'grub par 'gyur bar 'dod/_/sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa'i phyir/_/rtag tu drag po nyid du 'gyur/_/sdig pa sdang ba rnams 
[\[192b.7\]]spong na/_/des ni gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur/_/chos min spyod pa rnal 'byor mchog grub yin/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa chos shes pa/_/gang tshe spong bar gyur pa ni/_/rtag tu chos mchog spyod pa ste/_/des ni gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur/_/srid gsum mngon par chags pas 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]rnal 'byor bsgrub/_/srid gsum la ni chags par 'gyur/_/sems tsam du ni rtogs pa'i phyir/_/de ni rnal 'byor bsgrub pa yin/_/rtag tu 'dod pa'i 'dod chags rgyal 'gyur gang /_/gsang ba chen por brtan par bsgrub pa yin/_/'dod par bya ba 
[\[193a.2\]]'dod pa ste/_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags zhes bshad do/_/rab tu dga' la chags pa ste/_/blo ldan blo gros de la chags/_/gci ba khyor ba gang 'thungs na/_/bshang ba cung zad bza' bar bya/_/thams cad dag pa'i brtul zhugs kyis/_/myur du dngos grub mchog thob 
[\[193a.3\]]'gyur/_/gci ba rdo rje zhes bshad de/_/bshang ba pad+ma yang dag ldan/_/dga' ba'i chos la reg pas ni/_/de nas thar pa'i grong khyer 'gro/_/rnal 'byor chen po b+ha ga 'thungs/_/rnal 'byor rab tu bsgrub par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes gang /_/b+ha ga yi ni sgra ru 
[\[193a.4\]]bsgrags/_/gang zhig bdud rtsi btung ba btung /_/rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu/_/dkyil 'khor chen po brtag par bya/_/rigs kyi lha mo rnal 'byor byung /_/rig pa sdug pa nyid yin te/_/dkyil 'khor gsang ba brtag byas na/_/skad 
[\[193a.5\]]cig de la rang 'grub 'gyur/_/khro zhing gtum la drag po ste/_/rdo rje yi ni rigs su 'gyur/_/gang zhig sdug bsngal rnams la khro/_/'khor ba'i sbyor 'byung las sdang ba/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor phun tshogs 'gyur/_/rigs ni nyams par 'gyur ba yin/_/dge ba thams cad 
[\[193a.6\]]spangs nas ni/_/chos min pa ni yang dag spyad/_/bya min byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/las kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur/_/rnam par rtog pa kun spangs nas/_/dge ba la ni rab tu 'jug_/chos la lta bar gyur pa nyid/_/chos min kun tu spyod mi bya/_/bya min gang 
[\[193a.7\]]zhig dngos med de/_/de nyid brtan par byed par 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor chen po de lta bus/_/rtog pa chen pos rab 'grub 'gyur/_/rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa'i drug pa gsang ba'i tshogs chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba rtogs pa'i rgyal po chen po shin tu gsang ba'i rnal 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]'byor rdo rje rtse mo las rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dgongs pa rnam par 'grel pa zhes bya ba rnam par bshad pa gsum pa rdzogs so//_//rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mchog_/gsang ba'i 
[\[193b.2\]]chos kyi gnas mchog tu gsang ba yang rdzogs so//_//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dus gsum gshegs pa sras bcas la/_/yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas/_/mchog tu rmad byung rig pa'i rgyud/_/mdor bsdus nas 
[\[193b.3\]]ni bshad par bya/_/hUM a dza kar/_d+ha ra ho/_d+ha ra sa/_oM a dra na ha ha he war/_d+hi d+ha d+ha/_d+hI ng+hAr Ni/_ma he to raM ka kra NaM/_ka ba tse hUM baM/_de la gsang ba mchog tu gsang /_/ye shes dam pa'i rang bzhin che/_/rgyal po gsang ba'i mdo dbang po/_/theg pa chen po kun du bsdus/_/
[\[193b.4\]]rigs 'byung blo ldan chen po dang /_/sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba dang /_/rdo rje kun dbang cho ga ni/_/shin tu rmad byung rab bshad bya/_/ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru ni/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje can kun 'byung /_/rmad byung chos kyi rgyud chen po/_/thar ba mchog tu bstan pa ste/_/thub pa'i 
[\[193b.5\]]dbang phyug rnam snang mdzad/_/thugs ka nas ni rgyud 'di byung /_/kun du bzang po rdo rje'i bdag_/phyag na rdo rje 'od po che/_/rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/don yod dbang phyug dam pa ste/_/theg pa chen po byang chub sems/_/bden pa dam tshig ces bya ba/_/thub pa 
[\[193b.6\]]chen po chos phung po/_/stong phrag dag ni grangs med gsungs/_/rdo rje sems dpa' mchog chen gyis/_/chos kyi mngon par rtogs pa bshad/_/so sor rtogs pa'i mngon rtogs dang /_/de bzhin mngon par byang chub dang /_/dpe byad mchog ni mngon du byung /_/de bzhin ye shes thob 
[\[193b.7\]]pa nyid/_/ye shes chen po'i chos 'di ni/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni mngon rtogs bshad/_/theg pa chen po'i mngon rtogs yin/_/shin tu gsang ba'i tshul chen po/_/rang sems so sor rtogs pa ni/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul chen po/_/pha rol phyin drug spyod pa mchog_/theg 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]pa chen po mngon par bsdus/_/mthar thug sa ste sa chen po/_/sangs rgyas sa ni bla na med/_/theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs/_/ye shes thob par rtogs byed pa/_/spyod pa bcu yi byang chub che/_/pha rol phyin pa dam pa bcu/_/sa bcu kun du rtogs pa ste/_/
[\[194a.2\]]theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/_/byang chub chen po rgya che ba/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog_/kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byang chub/_/theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/_/mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/_/theg pa chen po chos 
[\[194a.3\]]kyi mchog_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang /_/chos kyi gnas ni yongs su gyur/_/sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog_/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu dag_/mkha' mnyam dang ni mtshungs pa yin/_/gnas ngan len ni kun las grol/_/rnam par 
[\[194a.4\]]rtog pa kun las grol/_/nyon mongs dri ma kun dag pa/_/dang por zla ba bzhin du mthong /_/thugs rje'i brtse ba yang dag byung /_/sems can yongs su 'dzin par byed/_/byang chub sems ni dag pa che/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni gos pa med/_/dge ba'i chos kyis kun 
[\[194a.5\]]du gang /_/nyon mongs thams cad nges par 'joms/_/zla chen gang ba'i dbus su ni/_/byang chub zla ba gnyis pa ste/_/bskal pa grangs med gsum byang chub/_/yang dag blangs las byung ba nyid/_/dam pa'i chos mchog grangs med pa/_/sbyin pa'i spyod pa mchog dang 
[\[194a.6\]]ldan/_/sa dang sa ru rtogs byed pa/_/ye shes dag pa zag pa med/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/de ni rdo rje shin tu brtan/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin/_/snang ba med cing gnas med pa/_/ma skyes ma byas dag pa ste/_/skyes dang 'jig pa rnam par spangs/_/
[\[194a.7\]]mi tshig mi chod mi phyed pa/_/lhag ma med pa'i chos kyi sku/_/rdo rje'i bdag nyid yang dag byung /_/rdo rje'i sku ni bla na med/_/sku dang gsang ba de bzhin spyod/_/spyod yul kun du rtogs pa dang /_/lnga po de dag kun thun mong /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid can/_/mngon 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]par byang chub rnam pa lnga/_/chos kyi ye shes bla na med/_/lnga po de dag gsang zhes bya/_/snying por yang ni de dag gsungs/_/gang phyir don kun grub pa'i phyir/_/sngon ni don kun grub par byed/_/bcom ldan kun du bzang po dang /_/rdo rje'i las ni bla na med/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[194b.2\]]dbyings ni brtan pa'i bdag_/rnam par snang mdzad bla na med/_/de dag gsang ba'i mtshan yin te/_/rnal 'byor gyi ni gnas skabs thob/_/de nas snying po ni/_oM tsit+ta pra ti bo d+haM ka ro mi/_oM bo d+hi tsit+ta uta pA da yA mi/_oM tiSh+Tha badzra oM badzra At+ma ko haM/_oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga tA 
[\[194b.3\]]sta thA a haM/_de nas sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/_/thub pa yi ni thugs kar bzhugs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsung /_/rdo rje'i rig pa 'di brjod do/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi saM bo d+hi dr-i D+ha badzra tiSh+Tha/_sangs rgyas grags chen thams cad kyis/_/rig pa 
[\[194b.4\]]'di ni brjod pas na/_/rnam par snang mdzad thub chen po/_/de nyid ye shes mngon sangs rgyas/_/de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni/_/nyid kyi thugs las byung bar gyur/_/chos bzhi'i rnal 'byor chen po ni/_/byin nas lha mo dbang bskur 'gyur/_/sems can kun don yang dag 
[\[194b.5\]]ldan/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed/_/mkha' mtshungs brjod las yang dag byung /_/rin chen chen pos dbang bskur 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes gang /_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/_/rnam kun mkhyen nyid ye shes che/_/'jig rten dbang phyug chen 
[\[194b.6\]]po byin/_/bya ba kun la don yod pa/_/dga' ldan la sogs rnam par 'phrul/_/gdul bar bya ba thabs kyi las/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlabs/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba gang /_/byang chub sems ni tshul chen po/_/nyon mongs kun las rnam par grol/_/
[\[194b.7\]]sangs rgyas gtso bo chen pos byin/_/dbang bskur tsam gyi mod la ni/_/gsang ba'i ming ni yang dag byung /_/sangs rgyas kun bdag rgyal po ste/_/kun mchog dbang bskur dam pa'o/_/de nas snying po ni/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta e shwa dz+ya a b+hi She ka hUM/_de nas sangs rgyas 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]rgyal po che/_/chos ni mngon sum gyur mdzad pa/_/stug po'i gnas nas gshegs nas ni/_/sangs rgyas lhan cig sna tshogs che/_/rnal 'byor dang bcas bdag nyid che/_/rdo rje'i dbang po'i gnas su gshegs/_/de nas ngo bo nyid sku las/_/
[\[195a.2\]]slar yang byung ba spros par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las chen po/_/ci bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brangs nas/_/rdo rje'i dbus su bzhugs par gyur/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas mdzad pa bzhin/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni mdzad pa bstan/_/gsang ba rol pa'i 'khor lo ru/_/sku ni 
[\[195a.3\]]longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchog_/sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid che/_/sna tshogs rnal 'byor bdag nyid che/_/'khor lo thams cad bzhugs par 'gyur/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du/_/ci bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brangs nas/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[195a.4\]]rol pa yang dag ldan/_/sangs rgyas ston pa bzhugs par 'gyur/_/dus gsum ye shes rjes mthun ni/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni rnal 'byor brjod/_/hUM badzra sa twa/_oM badzra rat+na hrIH/_badzra d+harma/_aHbadzra karma/_bskal pa grangs med gsum sngon du/_/bcom ldan byang 
[\[195a.5\]]chub mdzad pa gang /_/rnal 'byor sems dpa' bzhir bcas pa'i/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor snang bar bgyi/_/byang chub chen po chos kyi mchog_/byang chub sems ni tshul chen po/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin bgyi/_/zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang /_/pha rol phyin pa spyad 
[\[195a.6\]]pa ni/_/sngon du bcom ldan spyad pa gang /_/rdo rje rin chen sbyor ba yis/_/zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang /_/theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs/_/chos kyi mchog ni rab rtogs pa/_/rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba yis/_/zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang /_/sems can smin cing grol bar 
[\[195a.7\]]byed/_/sangs rgyas mdzad pa rab tu 'jug_/brtson 'grus dang ldan las chen po/_/zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang /_/byang chub sems ni gsang chen po/_/bsod nams tshogs dang shes rab dang /_/byang chub spyod pa rab sbyor ba/_/rgyal po bzhi ni rab tu 'byung /_/go 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]cha'i sbyor ba gang yin dang /_/spyod pa de bzhin mngon rtogs te/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub che/_/rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung /_/byang chub snying po mngon rtogs dang /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur dang /_/chos kyi 'khor los brtul ba dang /_/rgyal po bzhi ni 
[\[195b.2\]]rnam par byung /_/chos mchog mngon par rtogs pa dang /_/ting nge 'dzin sgo gzungs dang ni/_/sangs rgyas thams cad thabs chen po/_/rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung /_/rgyal chen rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /_/de bzhin chos ni mngon rtogs dang /_/chos mchog byang chub chen 
[\[195b.3\]]po dang /_/rnam pa bzhi ni yongs su byung /_/mgon po thugs ka nas spros nas/_/rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung /_/phyogs rnams thams cad kun nas ni/_/sa ni thams cad g.yos byas nas/_/phyogs rnams thams cad kun nas ni/_/'od kyi snang bas gsal bar byas/_/
[\[195b.4\]]mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/ched du brjod pa ched brjod do/_/e ma'o gsang ba'i chos chen po/_/e ma'o ye shes bla na med/_/e ma'o rol pa'i 'khor lo'o/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas rmad byung che/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas thabs chen po/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar 
[\[195b.5\]]ldan pa nyid/_/mi snang rang bzhin chos rnams ni/_/'di ni snang ba bcas par dmigs/_/rgyal po rnal 'byor che de rnams/_/phyogs rnams kun du gsal byed cing /_/chos kyi sku yi ting 'dzin brnyes/_/nam mkha' dang mtshungs rmad byung ba/_/gang zhig shar gyi phyogs cha ru/_/
[\[195b.6\]]sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/chos kyi dbyings su yang dag spros/_/chos kyi sku ru spros nas ni/_/chos kyi dbyings ni stug por 'gyur/_/gang phyir shar du yang dag byung /_/mi bskyod pa ni bdag nyid byas/_/lho ru rdo rje rin chen te/_/nub 
[\[195b.7\]]tu rdo rje chos yin no/_/byang du rdo rje las nyid de/_/chos kyi sku ru ldan par 'gyur/_/ma lus mchog tu bstan pa yi/_/sangs rgyas thams cad phyogs bzhi ru/_/mi bskyod rdo rje rin chen dbang /_/don yod grub pa bla na med/_/rgyal po bzhi ni phyogs bzhi ru/_/rdo rje'i steng du 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]bzhugs par 'gyur/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams bzhi dag tu/_/mnyam par dmigs nas bzhugs par gyur/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor rgyal po che/_/sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag bsdus/_/chos dbyings brtan pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/gsang ba kun du 
[\[196a.2\]]khyab par bsdus/_/dbus su mgon po rnam snang mdzad/_/sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur ba/_/phyogs dang mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kun/_/brtan par mdzad nas rab tu bzhugs/_/gdug pa kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal/_/thub pa'i skyes mchog mi bskyod pa/_/
[\[196a.3\]]sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas/_/shar gyi phyogs su yang dag bzhugs/_/dbang bskur ba ni rgyal po che/_/nam mkha' thub pa'i skyes mchog ni/_/sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas/_/lho yi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/_/dag pa'i chos 
[\[196a.4\]]'dzin rgyal po che/_/chos 'dzin gtso bo chen po ni/_/sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas/_/nub kyi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/_/sangs rgyas mdzad pa 'dzin rgyal po/_/don yod grub pa bla na med/_/sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas/_/byang gi phyogs su 
[\[196a.5\]]bzhugs par gyur/_/mi bskyod rdo rje sems dpa' ste/_/mkha' snying rin chen 'byung ldan yin/_/'jig rten dbang phyug 'od dpag med/_/rdo rje las ni don yod grub/_/gsang zhing shin tu gsang ba mchog_/chos dbyings brtan pa gang yin pa/_/de nyid mgon po rnam snang mdzad/_/
[\[196a.6\]]sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag por bshad/_/sangs rgyas thams cad phyogs bzhi ru/_/sbyin pa bzhi ni rab tu bshad/_/phyogs mtshams drug ni brtan mdzad nas/_/rnam par snang mdzad yang dag ldan/_/shar gyi sangs rgyas dbang phyug rgyal/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs mi mnga'/_/
[\[196a.7\]]thub pa mi bskyod snang ba des/_/snying po bzhi ni gsungs par 'gyur/_/hUM badzra satwa/_dzaHbadzra rA dza/_ho badzra rA ga_/sA badzra sA d+hu/_dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya ba/_/de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' sogs/_/'jigs pa mi mnga' sems dpa' bzhi/_/mgon po yi ni thugs las 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]byung /_/phyag na rdo rje bzang po mchog_/rdo rje lcags kyu chen po bsnams/_/rdo rje chags pa bdud chen po/_/rdo rje legs pa rdzu 'phrul che/_/rdo rje rgyal po bzhi thub pa/_/thub pa'i thugs ka nas byung ba/_/grangs bzhi dang ni ldan pa dag_/'khor lo'i rim gyis bzhugs par 
[\[196b.2\]]gyur/_/rdo rje rin chen skal ba che/_/rin chen 'byung ldan rab grags pa/_/lha yi bdag po sangs rgyas chos/_/snying po bzhi ni gsungs par 'gyur/_/oM badzra rat+na/_oM badzra te dzaH/_trAM badzra ke tu/_hA badzra hA sa/_rdo rje rin chen stobs po che/_/grangs bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/_/
[\[196b.3\]]rin chen rgyal po las byung ba/_/thub pa'i thugs ka nas byung ba/_/rdo rje rin chen rin po che/_/rdo rje gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul che/_/rdo rje rgyal mtshan shin tu mthong /_/rdo rje bzhad pa rdzu 'phrul che/_/de dag re re las kyang ni/_/rgyal po grangs med rab tu byung /_/g.yas dang g.yon dang 
[\[196b.4\]]rgyab dag dang /_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun du bzhugs/_/dag pa'i chos ni ye shes che/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med/_/shes rab pha rol phyin dag pas/_/snying po bzhi ni gsungs par 'gyur/_/hrIHbadzra d+harma/_d+h+r-iHbadzra tIk+Sh+Na/_maM badzra he tu/_raM badzra b+hA Sha/_chos 
[\[196b.5\]]kyi rgyal po bzhi yang ni/_/mgon po'i thugs ka nas byung ba/_/sems can kun la phan don du/_/'khor lo rim bzhin bzhugs par gyur/_/chos rnams kun la don yod pa/_/spyod pa yi ni slob dpon mchog_/don yod grub pa rgyal po ches/_/snying po bzhi ni gsungs 
[\[196b.6\]]par 'gyur/_/kaM badzra karma/_haM badzra rak+Sha/_hUM badzra yak+Sha/_baM badzra muSh+Ti/_kun kyang 'khor lo yang dag ldan/_/ye shes dag pa mchog gi rnams/_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'khor lo ni/_/chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchog_/sngon gyi byang chub sems gang ni/_/rdo 
[\[196b.7\]]rje sems dpa' rnam par byung /_/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni/_/rdo rje rin chen nyid du 'gyur/_/shes rab pha rol phyin dag pa/_/de ni rdo rje chos mchog ldan/_/thabs la mkhas pas 'khor lo ni/_/rdo rje las su rnam par 'phrul/_/de nas chos ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rten/_/byung gyur byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mdzad pa bla na med/_/byang chub sems ni mchog tu 'dzin/_/dag pa'i chos kyis 'dul mdzad pa/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po che/_/dbu ma'i chos las rnam par 
[\[197a.2\]]byung /_/gzhan yang rjes su brtse dang de bzhin sbyin/_/shes rab thabs dang yang dag ldan/_/chos kyi rgyal po bzhi po de/_/rnam par snang mdzad thugs las byung /_/'du shes 'du shes med pa min/_/btags pa ma yin gnas pa med/_/bdag dang chos nyid lta ba 
[\[197a.3\]]min/_/rnam rtog las ni byung ba min/_/ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru ni/_/so sor snang ba yang dag byung /_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yis ni/_/chos kyi longs spyod 'di lta bu/_/thams cad brjod pa dang bral zhing /_/zhi dang phra ba blta bar dka'/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni dgongs mdzad 
[\[197a.4\]]cing /_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mthong bar 'gyur/_/de nyid theg pa che rang bzhin/_/mdzod chen po yi rang bzhin mchog_/shes rab chen po thabs chen po/_/theg pa chen po'i mngon par bsdus/_/sangs rgyas ye shes mngon par rtogs/_/sngon du bcom ldan mdzad gang yin/_/
[\[197a.5\]]sems dpa' bzhi po de rnams te/_/theg chen mngon par rtogs par 'dod/_/byang chub kyi ni sems de las/_/thub pa mi bskyod rnam par byung /_/sems de yang ni rnam pa bzhi/_/rnam pa bzhi ni yang dag byung /_/byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/_/rdo rje phyag na rdo rje yin/_/sgrol 
[\[197a.6\]]dang grol dang dbugs 'byin pa/_/lcags kyu 'dzin pa rab tu gnas/_/sems dpa' bstan pa don yod pa/_/ye shes de nyid shin tu chags/_/slar yang bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_/legs pa las ni yang dag byung /_/gang zhig mgon po thub 'byin pa/_/sems can rjes su 
[\[197a.7\]]'dzin mdzad pa/_/rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bya ba/_/de ni slar yang rnam pa bzhi/_/chos kyi sbyin pa rin po che/_/mi 'jigs gzi brjid yang dag gnas/_/byams pa rgyal mtshan yang dag brjod/_/zang zing bzhad par yang dag ldan/_/shes rab pha rol phyin rgyal po/_/tshe 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]dpag med ni rnam pa bzhi/_/so sor rig pa mngon par rdzogs/_/ting nge 'dzin sgo pad+ma can/_/sdug bsngal gcod pa shin tu rno/_/chos kyi 'khor lo tshe dang ldan/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul gzhan/_/brjod du med pa'i chos kyi mchog_/don yod grub pa mdzad pa ste/_/
[\[197b.2\]]thabs de yang ni rnam pa bzhi/_/sems can la sogs 'dul ba las/_/rdo rje las ni mchod pa che/_/theg pa gzhan du mi 'jug pa/_/rdo rje bsrung bar rab tu brjod/_/gdug pa 'dul zhing nges byed pa/_/phyir mi ldog pa khu tshur yin/_/de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang pa'i mtshan ni rdo rje 
[\[197b.3\]]sems dpa'/_rdo rje rgyal po/_rdo rje chags pa/_rdo rje legs pa/_rdo rje rin chen/_rdo rje gzi brjid/_rdo rje rgyal mtshan/_rdo rje bzhad pa/_rdo rje chos/_rdo rje rnon po/_rdo rje rgyu/_rdo rje smra ba/_rdo rje las/_rdo rje srung ba/_rdo rje gnod sbyin/_rdo rje khu tshur/_de la dang po ni rdo rje sems 
[\[197b.4\]]dpa'/_rdo rje chos/_rdo rje rin chen/_rdo rje las de nas rnam grangs mi bskyod pa/_rin chen 'byung ldan 'od dpag tu med pa don yod par grub pa/_de nas 'di rnams gsang ba'i snying po ni hUM oM A ha/_rgyal po'i snying po ni oM hUM hrI hoH/_bcu drug gi snying po ni hUM dzaHho sA/_oM AM twAM ha/_hrI 
[\[197b.5\]]d+hi maM raM kaM haM hUM baM/_shin tu gsang ba'i rgyud chen po 'di'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa rnam pa bcu drug tu yang dag par byung ba gang yin pa de ni rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa'o/_/byang chub spyod pa'i mthu yis ni/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyi pha rol byon/_/de bas pha rol phyin ldan pa/_/rdo rje sems 
[\[197b.6\]]mar brjod par bya/_/bsdu ba yi ni dngos po bzhi/_/so sor rtogs pa mngon par rdzogs/_/chos bzhi gcig tu gyur pa ni/_/rdo rje rin chen ma ru brjod/_/gsang ba'i chos kyi ye shes ni/_/de nyid pha rol phyin pa mchog_/pha rol phyin pa che las byung /_/rdo rje chos mar brjod par 
[\[197b.7\]]bya/_/sbyor ba yang dag shes pa gang /_/rdo rje las mar brjod par bya/_/rgyal po pha rol phyin bzhi ni/_/rdo rje pha rol phyin pa mchog_/gang phyir rnam par rol pa mchog_/sgeg mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/_/brgyan pa'i lus can yid 'phrog pa/_/phreng ba tshul khrims 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]pha rol phyin/_/ched du brjod pa ched du brjod/_/glu ma bzod pa'i pha rol phyin/_/myur du sangs rgyas ster byed pa/_/gar ma brtson 'grus pha rol phyin/_/'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pa/_/me tog bsam gtan pha rol phyin/_/kun tu mtshungs par 'phro ba yi/_/
[\[198a.2\]]bdug pa shes rab pha rol phyin/_/dring mi dge las phyir phyogs/_/thabs ni dri dang yang dag ldan/_/phyogs rnams kun du snang byed pa/_/smon lam snang ba chen po yin/_/thob pa'i pha rol phyin zhes pa/_/stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa mchog_/mi shes mun pa 'joms 'byed pa/_/
[\[198a.3\]]lha mo ye shes pha rol phyin/_/bdud rnams thams cad pham byed pa/_/lha mo mi thub pha rol phyin/_/byang chub rdzogs pa'i byang chub che/_/rdo rje'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad ma/_/bdag med chos kyi rang bzhin mchog_/rdo rje'i lha mo yang dag byung /_/
[\[198a.4\]]rdo rje pha rol phyin pa mchog_/de nas de rnams kyi gsang ba'i ming ni rdo rje sems ma/_rdo rje rin chen ma/_rdo rje chos ma/_rdo rje las ma/_rdo rje sgeg mo/_rdo rje phreng ba ma/_rdo rje glu ma/_rdo rje gar ma/_rdo rje me tog ma/_rdo rje bdug pa ma/_rdo rje dri ma/_rdo rje mar me ma/_rdo rje tho ba ma/_rdo rje 
[\[198a.5\]]ye shes ma/_rdo rje mi thub ma/_rdo rje las ma/_sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po/_/rnam pa bzhir ni rab tu 'jug_/sems can dgug pa'i thabs chen po/_/rdo rje lcags kyu zhes byar bshad/_/byang chub spyod pa la spyod la/_/rdo rje zhags par rab tu bsgrags/_/theg pa gzhan 
[\[198a.6\]]la 'dod med pa/_/de ni rdo rje lcags sgrog bshad/_/chos rnams thams cad skye ba med/_/rab tu 'od gsal gzod nas zhi/_/rdo rje theg pa theg chen po/_/rdo rje dril bu zhes byar brjod/_/de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i ming dag ni rdo rje lcags kyu/_rdo rje zhags pa/_rdo rje lcags 
[\[198a.7\]]sgrog_/rdo rje dril bu/_de nas pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs kyi 'khor lo de dag thams cad kyi snying po ni hUM trAM hrI ho/_rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi'o/_/dzaHhUM baM hoH/_'khor lo'i rol pa la gnas pa/_/sangs rgyas rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/_/chos kyi longs spyod rdo rje can/_/
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]chos sku bla na med par 'gyur/_/dbus kyi sangs rgyas sangs rgyas bzhi/_/'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun/_/rnal 'byor ting 'dzin 'thob mdzad la/_/re re zhing yang rdo rje ni/_/grangs med pas kyang yongs su bskor/_/chos dang longs 
[\[198b.2\]]spyod rdzogs las byung /_/dag pa'i chos kyi tshul chen po/_/de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni/_oM satwa badzrI oM rat+na badzrI/_oM d+harma badzrI/_oM karma badzrI/_oM badzra lA s+ye/_oM badzra mA le/_oM badzra gI te/_oM badzra naMr r+ya/_oM badzra puSh+pe/_oM badzra d+hU pe/_oM badzra gan d+he/_oM badzra 
[\[198b.3\]]A lo ke_/oM badzra ang ku sha_/oM badzra pA sha_/oM badzra s+pho Ta/_oM badzra g+haN+De/_de nas 'di dag thams cad kyi thun mong gi snying po ni hUM/_mgon po rnam par snang mdzad che/_/'khor los sgyur ba chen po bzhi/_/sems dpa' chen po bcu drug dang /_/gsang chen lha mo 
[\[198b.4\]]bcu gnyis dang /_/sgo srung ba ni bzhi dag ste/_/sum cu rtsa bdun las mi nyung /_/gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi po ni/_/phyis kyi pha rol phyin pa mchog_/gsang ba'i lha mo kun las ni/_/rjes thog nyid du yang dag byung /_/byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid ches/_/sum cu 
[\[198b.5\]]rtsa bdun bgrang mi bya/_/rnam par snang mdzad thugs ka nas/_/chos kyi rigs mchog yang dag byung /_/byang chub sems las kun du byung /_/mi bskyod la sogs tshogs chen po/_/nga yis rdo rje rigs su brjod/_/phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che/_/sbyin pa'i spyod pa kun du 
[\[198b.6\]]byung /_/rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa/_/nga yis rin chen rigs su bshad/_/rin chen rdo rje bdag nyid che/_/sbyin pa spyod pa kun du byung /_/dag pa'i chos la kun du byung /_/tshe dpag med pa la sogs pa/_/de ni pad+ma'i rigs su bshad/_/rdo rje chos ni bdag 
[\[198b.7\]]nyid che/_/grub pa'i las las kun du byung /_/don yod grub pa la sogs las/_/de ni las kyi rigs su bshad/_/nam mkha'i mdzod ni las chen po/_/rdo rje ji bzhin lha mo yang /_/lha mo ji bzhin bsten te 'dra/_/ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin zhi/_/ji ltar zhi ba de bzhin 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]byung /_/rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod mtshungs/_/shar gyi phyogs su yang dag bzhugs/_/rdo rje rin chen rin chen mchog_/lho yis phyogs su yang dag bzhugs/_/rgyal po 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon/_/nub kyi phyogs su yang dag bzhugs/_/
[\[199a.2\]]bya ba kun la don yod pa/_/byang phyogs su ni bzhugs par 'gyur/_/dbus su mgon po rnam snang mdzad/_/kun mkhyen ye shes rnal 'byor che/_/zla ba gang ba bzhin du zhi/_/rdo rje 'khor lo bla na med/_/gang phyir kun du sngon 'gro ba/_/rdo rje byang chub sems don ldan/_/
[\[199a.3\]]de las spyod pa de las chos/_/de las spyod pa spyad dka' ba/_/sems dpa' chen po bla na med/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor bzhugs par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gcig gis/_/mgon po la ni gsol ba btab/_/thub pa'i dbang phyug rdo rje sems/_/mgon po la ni 
[\[199a.4\]]gsol ba 'debs/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag lus/_/khyod la brten nas de bzhin gshegs/_/sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun/_/khyod la brten nas 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dang po'i thugs ni rnal 'byor che/_/byang sems shin tu rnyed dka' ba/_/kye ma sems 
[\[199a.5\]]can 'di sdug bsngal/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi snod min pa/_/sems can kun gyi don ched du/_/'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dam pa gsungs/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug gis/_/mgon po'i gsung ni gsan nas su/_/'khor lo'i sbyor ba 
[\[199a.6\]]gsungs par 'gyur/_/de ni yang dag bshad par bya/_/'khor lo chen po grong khyer che/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs las byung /_/snying po'i chos mchog rnal 'byor ldan/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje'i bstan pa yin/_/sems can 'di dag gdul bya min/_/de rnams bde ba'i don ched 
[\[199a.7\]]du/_/rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya/_/rdo rje slob dpon cho ga'i tshul/_/bdag nyid ji bzhin rnal 'byor byas/_/sangs rgyas byang chub thob 'gyur ba/_/de la dang por rab bshad bya/_/de ru sems can thams cad kun/_/shin tu brtan par rab 'jug na/_/sangs rgyas byang chub 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]rdo rje nyid/_/thob 'gyur de la the tshom med/_/theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/_/sangs rgyas byang chub shin tu gsang /_/thar pa mchog tu bstan pa nyid/_/sngon du gzhung mchog mnyan par bya/_/bskal pa brgya phrag dag tu ni/_/ji ste mngon par brtson byas kyang /_/gang 
[\[199b.2\]]zag bzhi ni 'jig rten du/_/bsgrubs kyang 'grub pa nyid mi 'gyur/_/byang chub sems ni ma skyes dang /_/the tshom ldan pa nyid dang ni/_/bka' bzhin du ni mi byed pa/_/dad pa med nyid 'grub mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar dus gsum gshegs de bzhin/_/byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 
[\[199b.3\]]nas/_/dkon mchog gsum la dad byas te/_/the tshom med par byed pa'i mchog_/khyim pa dang ni rab tu byung /_/phyogs ni gnyis po 'dis bsgrub bya/_/ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham pa ru/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du rab bshad bya/_/byang chub sems ni lhur blangs nas/_/lha gzhan 
[\[199b.4\]]'dod pa brtson mi bya/_/dkon mchog gsum la dad bya ste/_/de gzhol ba la brtson par bya/_/srog gcod rku dang 'khrig pa dang /_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang myos byed rnam par spang /_/khyim pa'i sdom pa la gnas nas/_/de tshe rig pa'i rgyal po bsgrub/_/gal te de ni rab byung gyur/_/sdom 
[\[199b.5\]]pa gsum la yang dag gnas/_/so sor thar dang byang chub sems/_/rig 'dzin sdom pa mchog yin no/_/zla ba'am yang na lo re'o/_/de bzhin yang na lo gcig tu/_/gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/_/sngon du rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya/_/nyin re zhing ni ci nus par/_/thun 
[\[199b.6\]]gsum du ni cho ga bsgrub/_/rtog pa 'di ni thun bzhi ru/_/ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham par ni/_/sdig pa thams cad bshags par bya/_/bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang /_/sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba gdab/_/de yi bsod nams byang chub bsngo/_/de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig 
[\[199b.7\]]rten gyi/_/sangs rgyas bla med thams cad la/_/gsol ba gdab cing rab btud nas/_/zhabs la mnyam bzhag phyag bya'o/_/ji skad gzhung rgya che las gsungs/_/phyag rgya bzhi ni sbyor ba yis/_/rgyud gzhan dag ni thams cad kyi/_rdo rje'i sngags ni rab brjod bya/_/de la 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]snying po ni 'di yin te/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzo pa s+thA nA yA At+mA naM nir+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa twa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA a b+hiShe kA ya At+ma naM nir+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA pra bar ta nA ya At+mA naM nir+yA 
[\[200a.2\]]ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma pra bar ta ya mAM/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA kerma Ne At+mA naM nir+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru mAM/_phyag rgya dang bcas cho gar ldan/_/yang dag nyid du rab bshad bya/_/sor mo thams cad sbyar ba ni/_/rdo rje thal mor rab tu brjod/_/sa phyogs 
[\[200a.3\]]gtsang mar 'dug nas ni/_/mkhas pas yan lag kun phyag bya/_/rdo rje thal mo brkyang nas ni/_/rgyal ba rnams la dbul bar bya/_/mgo bos de bzhin byas nas ni/_/mkhas pas dpral bas phyag bya'o/_/mgo bo nas ni phab byas nas/_/de bzhin kha yis phyag bya'o/_/
[\[200a.4\]]de bzhin snying gar bzhag byas nas/_/spyi bo nas ni phyag bya'o/_/cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor pas phyag bya/_/slar yang cho ga la gnas te/_/mchod pas cho ga dang ldan pa/_/spos dang me tog mar me dang /_/dri dang phreng ba byug pa ni/_/sangs rgyas rjes su 
[\[200a.5\]]dran byas nas/_/sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/_/sbyin pa rnam bzhi'i sbyor ba yis/_/ci nus par ni mkhas pas dbul/_/gtsang zhing gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan/_/gtsang ma'i grogs dang lhan cig tu/_/rdo rje'i sdom pa bla med par/_/bslab pa'i gnas ni 
[\[200a.6\]]blang bar bya/_/sbyin pa rnam bzhi'i sbyor ba yis/_/dad cing de la rab gzhol bya/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang /_/slob dpon yang ni phyi ma yin/_/nyin re zhing ni ci nus par/_/khrus bzhi dag ni rab tu bya/_/rnal 'byor ji ltar khrus bya ba/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du 
[\[200a.7\]]rab tu bshad/_/sdom pa gsum la rab tu gnas/_/dang po khrus su brjod pa yin/_/gnyis pa rgyud las gsungs pa yis/_/bshags dang gsol ba 'debs la sogs/_/phyag rgya bcing ba gsum pa ste/_/bzhi pa chu ste tha ma yin/_/khrus kyi cho ga 'di yis ni/_/
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]mkhas pas 'dir ni khrus bya'o/_/gos ni lan gsum brje ba yi/_/sgrub pa pos ni cho ga bya/_/sdom pa la ni legs gnas pa/_/gos ni dang por brje ba dang /_/gnyis pa cho ga bsgrub pa dang /_/gsum pa ngo tsha khrel yod pa/_/gtsang ma'i gos ni gsum po 
[\[200b.2\]]dag_/lan gsum du ni brje bar bya/_/gang la kha na ma tho med/_/thams cad bza' zhing bsten par bya/_/sha dang chang dang sgog pa sogs/_/bza' ba min pa rnam par spang /_/dri nga ba dang mi gtsang nyid/_/bza' dang btung ba rnam par spang /_/gzhan la gnod 
[\[200b.3\]]pa dang ldan pa/_/lus kyi phyir yang bya ba min/_/'khrig pa bdun dang yang dag ldan/_/mi sdug sgom pas spang bar bya/_/yid gzhungs mkhas shing gsal ba dang /_/theg pa chen po'i don sems pa/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rgya che/_/shes rab pha rol 
[\[200b.4\]]phyin la sogs/_/klog pa dang ni bsam pa dang /_/yang dang yang du gsol ba gdab/_/dgra dang grogs dang bar ma la/_/sems snyoms mi 'jigs rab tu byin/_/snyan cing bden par smra ba yis/_/zhe sdang 'joms byed byams pa bsgom/_/chos dang gang 
[\[200b.5\]]zag bdag med cing /_/'dus byas dang ni 'khrul pa tsam/_/blo ldan brtan pas brtag par bya/_/'dus byas kun la rmongs mi bya/_/'tsho ba'i srog gi phyir yang ni/_/byang chub sems ni dor mi bya/_/rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams/_/nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[200b.6\]]byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/_/shes rab dril bu zhes bya gzhan/_/slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya/_/bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/_/sbyor ba lhod par mi bya zhing /_/cho ga ston pa lhur blang bya/_/pha rol phyin drug spyod pa la/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du bslab par bya/_/
[\[200b.7\]]sems can gyi ni don ldan pas/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad/_/kha na ma tho chung ngu yang /_/srog ni btang snyoms dor mi bya/_/khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba'ang rung /_/'dris pa thams cad rnam par spang /_/bu dang chung ma dag la yang /_/srid pa'i bcing ba las grol 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]bya/_/brkam zhing chags la sdang ba dang /_/rmongs shing le lo ldan pa'ang min/_/bag yod shin tu brtson pa yis/_/rnal 'byor cho ga bsgrub par bya/_/lta ba kun las rnam par grol/_/de nyid las ni legs par mthong /_/dge zhing dgongs 
[\[201a.2\]]pa bshad pa yi/_/don shes don ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/rigs dang mi rigs cho ga shes/_/de nyid rnal 'byor shin tu mkhas/_/brtse ldan byang chub spyod par ldan/_/spyod pa rnams la rab tu mkhas/_/de 'dra'i tshul ni sna tshogs dang /_/de lta bu yi bsgrub pa yi/_/
[\[201a.3\]]dngos grub dang ni thar pa 'thob/_/dngos grub kun la the tshom med/_/gnas dang gos dang bza' ba yi/_/lhag pa thams cad rnam par spang /_/lha rnams brnyas par mi bya zhing /_/bya ba ma yin thams cad spang /_/le lo med par nyin re zhing /_/bsrung ba yi ni cho ga bya/_/
[\[201a.4\]]bgegs med 'jigs par mi bya ste/_/rang sems 'di ni gdul bar dka'/_/pha dang ma ru 'dzin pa dang /_/bram ze dge slong de dang 'dra/_/dag cing dul la zhi ba dang /_/bsdams shing thar ba shes pa dang /_/rgyal srid mtho ris longs spyod min/_/'dod pa'i 
[\[201a.5\]]longs spyod 'phel phyir min/_/gzhan du sems can don gyi phyir/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges byas pa/_/zas kyi tshod ni shes pa dang /_/mtshan mo gnyid kyang sad par bya/_/'dod chags skyon la sogs pa gzhan/_/sems kyis rnam par mi brtag go/_/sems ni 
[\[201a.6\]]rab tu dang byas nas/_/g.yo ba med cing nges byas pas/_/legs par smra zhing rab tu 'byed/_/chos ni nges par don gnyer byed/_/mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba bzhin/_/sems can gnod dang 'tshe mi bya/_/nyes ldan gdug pa'i sems can rnams/_/dkyil 'khor du ni 
[\[201a.7\]]gzhug mi bya/_/lha yi sku dang phyag mtshan dang /_/lha yi bzhon pa dag dang ni/_/dman ma lha yi grib ma dang /_/lha yi mtshan ma thams cad dang /_/bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs pa/_/mtshan ma gzugs su byas pa dang /_/bgom par mi bya bza' mi bya/_/nam yang 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]brdzi bar mi bya'o/_/dkon mchog gsum dang 'brel pa'i zas/_/nam yang nye bar longs mi spyod/_/tha na phul dang dman ma yi/_/dri yang mnam par mi bya'o/_/ri bo 'am ni nags kyi nang /_/gtsang zhing yid 'ong dben pa'am/_/chu bo'i 'gram mam skyed mos tshal/_/
