[\[201b.2\]]ne'u gsing shin tu yid 'ong ba'am/_/lha khang gtsang ma nyams dga' 'am/_/khang pa gtsang ma dben pa'am/_/gang du tshogs pa med pa ru/_/sangs rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni/_/gtsang ma'i grogs dang lhan cig tu/_/de 'dra'i gnas su 'dug nas ni/_/thar 
[\[201b.3\]]pa'i mchog tu bstan pa nyid/_/rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag brtsam/_/thun bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis/_/mgon po mchog la phyag bya zhing /_/sangs rgyas rjes dran sgom pa pos/_/bshags pa la sogs de bya'o/_/mchod pa nyid kyang ci nus bya'o/_/gzhan 
[\[201b.4\]]yang phyag rgya yang dag bcing /_/mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad ni/_/phyogs kun du ni yang dag spro/_/sa gzhi dag ni ma lus nyid/_/kun nas rin chen shing ldan dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs mchog ldan dang /_/rgyal ba rnams la dbul bar bya/_/me tog shing dang 
[\[201b.5\]]bdug pa dang /_/dri yi tshogs ni yid 'ong dang /_/rin chen rang bzhin rgya mtsho ni/_/thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la 'bul/_/de nas phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/me tog bdug pa la sogs sprin/_/rol mo'i tshogs ni yid 'ong ba/_/mchod pa'i sprin ni rnam par bsam/_/
[\[201b.6\]]mchod pa thams cad rab byed pa/_/rig pa'i rgya chen 'di rnams dang /_/phyag rgya dag kyang yongs gsal ba'i/_/bsam pa yis ni gzung bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+p+ra pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta br-ik+Sha pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_oM 
[\[201b.7\]]sarba ta thA ga ta gan d+ha pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_gang du rgyal chen me tog dang /_/bdug pa dang ni dri yi tshogs/_/de bzhin kun du yang dag sbyar/_/tha na rgyan spel rnams kyang ngo /_/mchod pa'i phyag rgya tshul chen dang /_/phyag rgya chen po bslab par bya/_/
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]theg pa chen po bsdus pa las/_/ji skad rgya chen gsungs de bzhin/_/sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang /_/bde ba chen po'i rgyu dang ni/_/'gro ba gsum las dgrol ba'i phyir/_/de lta bu yi bsam pa bya/_/'dir ni lha rnams thams cad 
[\[202a.2\]]kyi/_/bag med nye bar zhi ba dang /_/mi rnams sdug bsngal sna tshogs pa/_/rab tu mthar phyin de bzhin nyid/_/theg pa dman par 'dod byed pa/_/'khor pa rnam par gzhol ba'i phyir/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor bdag nyid ches/_/'di de bsam par bya ba yin/_/bdag 
[\[202a.3\]]gi bsod nams stobs dag gis/_/bde ba thams cad tshogs kyi mchog_/sems can thams cad bde chen ldan/_/ma lus par ni grub gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bde gyur cig_/'byung po kun la byams par shog_/dud 'gro thams cad 'jigs 
[\[202a.4\]]med shog_/ngan song thams cad zhi gyur cig_/bde ba chen po 'di bsams nas/_/sdig pa dral ba bcing bar bya/_/sdig pa thams cad dral byas shing /_/de bzhin ngan song thams cad do/_/phyogs rnams thams cad sangs rgyas kun/_/yang dang yang du rjes dran nas/_/gsang 
[\[202a.5\]]ba'i mdo sde ma lus pa/_/yang dang yang du bklag par bya/_/mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' ru/_/gcig tu 'gyur 'dod sems kyis bya/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor bla na med/_/rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya/_/zla ba'am yang na zla ba drug_/lo gcig gam ni de las gzhan/_/
[\[202a.6\]]rig pa'i brtul zhugs 'di 'drar bya/_/phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bcing /_/sangs rgyas rnams la nyin re bzhin/_/nges par lha bshos dbul bar bya/_/lha bshos snang ba ster byed pa/_/de bzhin rig pa'i lha bshos la/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin khro bo che/_/thams cad 
[\[202a.7\]]du ni rjes dran bya/_/'ching ba'i sbyor ba'i cho ga ni/_/rdo rje khu tshur gyis brtan bya/_/rdo rje go cha'i sbyor ba yis/_/dkyil 'khor kun du bsrung bar bya/_/de lta bu yi cho ga yis/_/rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya/_/bsrung ba byas shing brtson 'grus brtsam/_/stobs 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]chen spro ba bskyed pa yis/_/nyin re zhing ni brtags nas su/_/rtog pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/_/sku mdog dkyil 'khor ji bzhin par/_/ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham pa ru/_/dgug pa la sogs las rnams ni/_/thams cad mnyam par gzhag par 
[\[202b.2\]]bya/_/ci nus par ni nyin re zhing /_/rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang /_/lo gcig na ni rab 'grub 'gyur/_/theg pa chen po'i tshogs nang na/_/mchog 'gyur rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/_/rgyud gzhan gyi ni cho ga dang /_/mdo sde dang bcas 
[\[202b.3\]]ci bzhin du/_/de nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs blang /_/sdom pa'ang dor bar mi bya zhing /_/kha na ma tho rdul tsam yang /_/'gyod pa ru ni bya ba yin/_/gnas ni yang dag brtag par bya/_/tsher ma la sogs dang bral ba/_/ri bo 'am ni dgon pa'am/_/lha khang skyed mos 
[\[202b.4\]]tshal dang ni/_/chu yi 'gram dang 'brog dgon par/_/gang du phyogs ni gtsang mar gyur/_/gseg ma gyo mo bong ba dang /_/rdo ba dag ni bsal bar bya/_/shin tu legs par dag bya ste/_/gang phyir lha rnams yongs su 'dzin/_/gal te de ni sbyor lhod gyur/_/rnam pa 
[\[202b.5\]]kun du mi 'jigs bya/_/sangs rgyas thams cad rgyal po che/_/chos kyi bdag po dgongs pa can/_/thugs rje snying por ldan gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas nyes par 'dzin mi 'gyur/_/gnas ni kun du dag bya zhing /_/dkyil 'khor yang ni ci nus par/_/rgya ru dpag tshad 
[\[202b.6\]]tsam bya ste/_/khru drug las ni dma' ba min/_/sngon la phur bu gdab bya ste/_/rdo rje lta las sogs pa bcing /_/de nas yo byad thams cad ni/_/cho ga mchog gi blang bar bya/_/rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid 'dir/_/dkyil 'khor dag ni bsgrub par bya/_/thal ba la sogs dus 
[\[202b.7\]]ji bzhin/_/mkhas pas dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/_/ji ltar nus shing spro ba dang /_/ji ltar rdzas ni 'byor pa dang /_/de bzhin rnal 'byor chen pos bya/_/yang na sems kyis brtag par bya/_/ci ste bsgrub pa rgyal por 'gyur/_/cho ga gzhan gyis blo ldan 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]pas/_/gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/_/dkyil 'khor dag ni dag par bya/_/tshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/_/khru ni stong dang ldan pa mchog_/yang na rgyang grags tsam du ni/_/sa yi cha ni thig gdab bya/_/gal te 'byor pa ldan pa min/_/khru 
[\[203a.2\]]bzhi mdo ru bsdus par bya/_/yang na phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/khru brgyad dang ni yang dag ldan/_/in+d+ra nI la shin tu sngo/_/tshon rtsi sngon po rab tu bya/_/pad+ma rA ga shin tu dmar/_/tshon rtsi dmar po zhes byar bshad/_/rdo rje mchu dang mchu chen po/_/ser po yang ni yang dag 
[\[203a.3\]]ldan/_/dag cing dang ba'i gser dang ni/_/kha dog ser po ldan par bya/_/shin tu dag pa shel dang bas/_/tshon rtsi dkar po rab tu bya/_/gang phyir rgyal po nor chen ldan/_/tshon rtsi 'di dag yang dag bshad/_/phyug cing nor dang yang dag ldan/_/gal te de ni khyim bdag 
[\[203a.4\]]gyur/_/khru brgya yongs su tshang bar bya/_/bcu drug las ni nyung mi bya/_/tshon rtsi dri dang yang dag ldan/_/gur gum la sogs dang bsres pa/_/tshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/_/mkhas pa yis ni dkyil 'khor bya/_/phyug cing nor dang yang dag ldan/_/tshong dpon yang ni 
[\[203a.5\]]ded dpon nam/_/khyim pa 'byor pa dang ldan pa/_/gzhan dag dga' zhing 'ongs gyur na/_/rin chen phye ma dang bsres pa'i/_/tshon rtsi chen po rab tu bya/_/rams dang ba bla la sogs pa/_/tshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/_/bdag nyid chung ba'am che ba'ang rung /_/de yi 'byor pa 
[\[203a.6\]]brtag bya ba/_/ji ltar rigs par nges par sbyar/_/rgyal po la ni tshad bshad pa/_/khyim bdag la yang de bzhin no/_/tshong dpon dang ni ded dpon gyi/_/khru ni lnga bcu nyid kyang ngo /_/gzhan dag dga' zhing 'ongs gyur na/_/khru ni nyi shur byas pa yin/_/gal te dngos grub bsgrub 
[\[203a.7\]]'dod na/_/khru drug las ni chung mi bya/_/mang po de bzhin nyung ba yang /_/dri dang kun du yang dag ldan/_/rtag tu sna tshogs dri yis ni/_/sngon du sa gzhi dag par bya/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor ngos dag gi/_/grwa ni bzhi po thams cad du/_/shes rab can gyis bdug spos 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]bsreg_/gang phyir rdo rje can dag gshegs/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gnas de na/_/sngags kyis bsangs pa'i dri chu yis/_/rtag tu legs par chag chag gdab/_/gang phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gyur/_/nyin zhag drug gam bdun brgyad dang /_/mar dang 'o ma 'bras 
[\[203b.2\]]chan nyid/_/slob dpon zas ni dkar gsum bza'/_/yang na thun mong gyur pa'i zas/_/ci ste bzod ldan nyin mtshan du/_/mi bza' bar ni bsgrub par bya/_/gang phyir chos kyi rang bzhin zas/_/stobs ldan 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/dkyil 'khor mchog ni rgyal chen po/_/
[\[203b.3\]]gang yin bsam pas bya ba'o/_/bco lnga la ni brtsams nas su/_/gnyis pa'i nya la rdzogs par bya/_/yang na mar gyi ngo la ni/_/bcu bzhi la ni yang dag brtsam/_/bco lnga la ni thug par bya/_/legs pa ru ni rdzogs par bya/_/yang na tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/_/tha 
[\[203b.4\]]ma nya la kun du bri/_/yang na bcu bzhi la brtsams te/_/nyin zhag gnyis par yang dag bri/_/yang na bco lnga de yi ni/_/snga dro de yi yang dag brtsam/_/tshul chen po dang mtshungs pa yi/_/dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis bri/_/gang gi tshe nas brtsams nas su/_/ji srid 
[\[203b.5\]]rdzogs par ma gyur par/_/gal te kun nas mi bza' bar/_/brtson 'grus chen po brtsam par bya/_/dri dang bcas shing legs byas pa/_/yang na dkar gsum bza' bar bya/_/gang phyir rgyal ba'i rdo rje 'dzin/_/byin gyis brlab par mdzad par 'gyur/_/bsod nams che zhing 
[\[203b.6\]]bkra shis pa'i/_/nyin zhag dag pa gang yin pa/_/de la rdo rje slob dpon ni/_/skal ba chen pos dkyil 'khor brtsam/_/sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas/_/dbus kyi cha ru 'dug par bya/_/sangs rgyas thams cad la dmigs nas/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom/_/
[\[203b.7\]]sems ni yongs su 'dzin byed pa/_/lus ni drang por byas nas su/_/bshags la sogs pa'i las rnams ni/_/thams cad sdon du bya ba yin/_/byang chub sems la brtson gyur cing /_/rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad pa yis/_/phyogs bcu ru ni phyag byas nas/_/bdag 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]nyid kyang ni spro ba bskyed/_/deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas/_/bdag gi 'tsho ba'ang 'bras bu yod/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang dam tshig gis/_/deng ni srid par mnyam par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtse gcig pa'i/_/sems kyis phyir mi 
[\[204a.2\]]ldog par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i/_/bdag 'gyur bar ni the tshom med/_/deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste/_/deng ni bdag mchod bla na med/_/sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/_/deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no/_/de ltar dga' 
[\[204a.3\]]ba dang ldan pas/_/de nas dbus su 'dug gyur nas/_/spos kyi reng bu lag thogs pas/_/sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya/_/sems ni dga' zhing mgu ba yis/_/tshig ni 'di skad brjod par bya/_/yan lag kun gyis rab btud de/_/sangs rgyas kun la gsol 
[\[204a.4\]]ba gdab/_/ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/rdo rje bdag ming 'di zhes bya/_/bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'bri bar 'tshal/_/sangs rgyas la sogs kun gshegs te/_/dngos grub 'di ni bdag la stsol/_/tshig ni de skad brjod 
[\[204a.5\]]nas su/_/sems dpa'i skyil krung bca' bar bya/_/chos chen po la snyoms zhugs nas/_/bdag nyid ting 'dzin dang ldan bya/_/gal te nus na skal ba ches/_/yang na sems kyis bsgrub par bya/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog_/ting 'dzin zhes bya ci 'dra dang /_/
[\[204a.6\]]rdo rje'i gzugs dang ldan pa la/_/rnal 'byor pa yis snyoms 'jug bya/_/yang na rnal 'byor gang rung la/_/nus na snyoms par 'jug par bya/_/sems ni mnyam par gzhag 'gyur ba/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du bshad par bya/_/bcom ldan sngon ni ci 'dra ba'i/_/byang chub sems 
[\[204a.7\]]dpa' nyid 'gyur ba'i/_/de 'dra bar ni bdag rang nyid/_/rnal 'byor don sems bsam par bya/_/dka' thub sdom pa sna tshogs pa/_/bdag gis bya bar bsam par bya/_/sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po ni/_/stong gsum pa ni bsam par bya/_/sangs rgyas bskul ba bla na med/_/
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]shes rab can gyis bskul ba bsam/_/sangs rgyas kun la phyag byas shing /_/ci 'dod pa ni bka' nod bya/_/nges par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/_/rang sems so sor brtag par bya/_/byang sems yang dag bskyed nas ni/_/dbus su zla ba brtag par bya/_/de nas rang gi 
[\[204b.2\]]ye shes brtag_/zla ba'i dbus su rdo rje bzhin/_/rang lus rdo rje'i gzugs su ste/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rang bzhin nyid/_/de nas sangs rgyas mngon rtogs nas/_/rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur bya/_/rang bdag sangs rgyas thams cad du/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor blta bar bya/_/
[\[204b.3\]]ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru/_/stug po'i gnas las babs nas su/_/rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug nas ni/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul bya/_/sems dpa' bzhi ni phyung nas su/_/phyogs rnams kun du yongs su spro/_/chos kyi dbyings ni brtan byas nas/_/phyogs bzhi ru ni dgod par 
[\[204b.4\]]bya/_/mtshams su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/_/bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlabs/_/phyogs bzhi ru ni sangs rgyas kyi/_/'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po byung /_/'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bcas nyid/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad blta bar bya/_/sems dpa' 
[\[204b.5\]]gsang ba'i lha mor bcas/_/sgo srung rnams ni bsam par bya/_/'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dag pa ni/_/snying po chen po brtag par bya/_/rang gi 'khor lo yang dag bzhugs/_/'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan/_/thabs chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/mtshan ni rjes su 
[\[204b.6\]]dran pa bsgom/_/ting nge 'dzin las langs nas kyang /_/rdo rje'i lta bas blta bar bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/slar yang snyoms par 'jug par bya/_/rnam par snang mdzad thugs dbus su/_/byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 
[\[204b.7\]]ni/_/mgon po'i snying ga nas gzung bya/_/sems dpa' kun gyi spyan snga ru/_/bka' ni rim bzhin nod par bya/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur gyis/_/rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur bya/_/gsol ba btab pas gsan par bya/_/bdag ni rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor mchog_/
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]chos kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/ting 'dzin shin tu bla na med/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas kun/_/byin gyis brlab pa mdzad par 'gyur/_/ting nge 'dzin las langs nas kyang /_/bka' ni nye bar nod bya ste/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/_/nam yang 
[\[205a.2\]]dor bar mi bya'o/_/skyil krung bshig ste langs nas ni/_/rang gi 'dren pa'i zhabs phyag bya/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ba ru/_/phyogs rnams bzhi ni blta bar bya/_/theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs/_/rdo rje'i tshig ni brjod par bya/_/bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can/_/rdo 
[\[205a.3\]]rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che/_/bdag ni stobs chen rdo rje can/_/bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal/_/bdag ni phyag na rdo rje mchog_/oM badzra sa twa hUM/_rdo rje yi ni gsang sngags 'di/_/lan cig nyid ni brjod par bya/_/bdag ni 
[\[205a.4\]]gtso bo rdo rje che/_/byin gyis brlab pa mi 'dor ro/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtshos kun du gang /_/'khor los lnga par yang dag gnas/_/bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni/_/rdo rje bsnyems tshul ldan par bya/_/slar yang bdag nyid go bgo zhing /_/bdag nyid dbang ni bskur bar 
[\[205a.5\]]bya/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad gcad par bya/_/lag nyed pa yi phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad rab tu mnye/_/rdo rje gtun shing nyid kyis ni/_/bgegs rnams thams cad brdung bar bya/_/rdo rje ral gri rab rno bas/_/bgegs 
[\[205a.6\]]rnams thams cad gtub par bya/_/rdo rje mche ba drag po yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya/_/rdo rje bzang po'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad gzhom par bya/_/rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya/_/
[\[205a.7\]]rdo rje mche ba rab grags pas/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya/_/rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bcing bar bya/_/rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya/_/rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]bgegs rnams thams cad drang bar bya/_/rdo rje mdung thung phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya/_/rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar bya/_/rgyas pa yis ni ci nus par/_/lus rnams thams cad dgug 
[\[205b.2\]]par bya/_/bgegs ni 'ga' yang yod min zhes/_/sems ni dag par gyur pa yin/_/rang sems bdud ces bya bar bshad/_/bgegs nyid kyang ni rang gi sems/_/rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsal/_/rnam rtog las ni bgegs rnams 'byung /_/gdul bar 
[\[205b.3\]]dka' ba'i sems gzung zhing /_/'dod pa lnga ni spang par bya/_/sngon du rjes dran nas brtsams te/_/yang na rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/_/bcom zhing nges par bcad nas ni/_/yi ge hUM gis bskrad par bya/_/rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya yis/_/rdo rje ra ba bcing bar bya/_/hUM mdzad rdo rje 
[\[205b.4\]]bsdam bya zhing /_/de ni rdo rje ra bas bskor/_/rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya ches/_/dkyil 'khor yang dag byin brlabs nas/_/ci nus par ni rgyas pa ru/_/ra ba mchog ni bcing bar bya/_/rtog pa kun la nges sbyar nas/_/sems ni dag par 'gyur ba yin/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[205b.5\]]dag gi mtshan nyid ni/_/mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya/_/grogs dag dang ni thams cad la/_/g.yel ba med par bsrung bar bya/_/gsor zhing legs par bkal ba dang /_/tshad dang ldan zhing mdzes pa dang /_/dri zhim reg bya 'jam pa dang /_/legs par byas shing sra ba dang /_/
[\[205b.6\]]dri bsung dang ni yang dag ldan/_/sna tshogs tshon gyis kun du khyab/_/dri bcas tshon du spang bya zhing /_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab ba/_/de nas de ni yang dag bshad/_/dkyil 'khor mchog ni chen po ste/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che/_/dkyil 'khor kun gyi gsang 
[\[205b.7\]]ba che/_/sangs rgyas brtan pa'i rdo rje can/_/sems can 'di rnams gdul bya min/_/bsod nams ye shes rgya mtsho che/_/tshogs ni kun du ma bsags pa/_/bsod nams tshogs dang mi ldan zhing /_/sangs rgyas 'byung la chags dang bral/_/sems can de rnams mos bya'i phyir/_/
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]dkyil 'khor chen po bstan pa yin/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang ldan pa/_/de ni dkyil 'khor 'dzin du 'jug_/yang na bsod nams dag gi tshogs/_/de ni rang nyid kyis mthong 'gyur/_/gang phyir tshogs bcas longs spyod dang /_/chos kyi sku ni bla na med/_/
[\[206a.2\]]rdo rje'i dam chos las byung ba'i/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'dzin du gzhug_/gal te de ni tshogs bsags gyur/_/sngon du sangs rgyas rjes su mthong /_/dkyil 'khor sbyor ba la gnas te/_/sangs rgyas thams cad des mthong 'gyur/_/tshogs ni bsags pa med pa dang /_/sangs 
[\[206a.3\]]rgyas mthong ba med ba ru/_/des ni thos pa rnyed mi 'gyur/_/dang por 'dir 'jug smos ci dgos/_/gang phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/'di ni gsang ba mtshungs med pa/_/'di ni theg chen snying po ste/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med/_/bskal pa grangs med pa ru byung /_/sa 
[\[206a.4\]]yi pha rol phyin pa mchog_/gang phyin gsang ba mtho ba thob/_/rab tu dga' ba sgrub par 'gyur/_/gal te rnal 'byor pa de brtson/_/tshe 'di nyid la mya ngan 'das/_/rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob cing /_/rdo rje nyid ni the tshom ma med/_/yang na mthong ba tsam gyis ni/_/skye ba bcu drug mya 
[\[206a.5\]]ngan 'da'/_/rab tu dga' ba thob pa yang /_/yang na rdo rje nyid kyang ngo /_/sa la nyi zla ltung byed cing /_/de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'gyur/_/so so'i skye bos sangs rgyas nyid/_/'grub par 'gyur te gzhan du min/_/rnal 'byor mchog ni bla med pa/_/de phyir rnal 'byor chen po sbyor/_/
[\[206a.6\]]gal te sangs rgyas nyid 'dod na/_/brtson 'grus chen pos bsdad mi bya/_/tshad ni ji skad bshad pa ru/_/de bzhin gzhung gi rjes 'brangs nas/_/phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/_/gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas/_/zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhis ni mdzes 
[\[206a.7\]]par bya/_/thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/_/cha mnyam pas ni mdzes par gyur/_/dar gyi chun pos brgyan gyur cing /_/rin chen dra bas rnam par brgyan/_/g.yer ka'i dra bas yang dag ldan/_/kha dog lnga pos rab tu mdzes/_/dril bu'i dra bas shin tu spras/_/rnga yab 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa/_/phreng ba rnga yab bla re dang /_/nyi zla dag gis nye bar mdzes/_/kun nas phyi rol gnas dag tu/_/rdo rje kha khyer yang dag rten/_/kun du kha khyer dang ldan pa/_/sgo ni kha khyer med pa'o/_/rtse mo rdo rje sdo rang bzhin/_/gzhan ni gser gyi mdog can 
[\[206b.2\]]dang /_/dmar po pad+ma lta bu dang /_/gzhan yang shel ltar dkar ba dang /_/rin chen rang bzhin mchog kun gyi/_/dkyil 'khor mdzes par bri bar bya/_/sna tshogs gzugs ni mdzes pa mchog_/rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod/_/rim gnyis sgo dang yang dag ldan/_/rta babs 
[\[206b.3\]]sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_/dkar zhing gsal dang rdo rje dang /_/nyi zla dag gis rnam par spras/_/'dab ma bzhi dang yang dag ldan/_/sgo bzhi dag ni mchog tu mdzes/_/mtho zhing yangs la mdzes pa ste/_/rdo rje rdo rje yang dag ldan/_/rdo rje sgo srung skal chen po/_/bdag nyid rdo rje 
[\[206b.4\]]lcags kyu 'dzin/_/gtum po srung byed rnal 'byor pa/_/shar gyi sgo ru yang dag gnas/_/lho ru rdo rje zhags pa ste/_/nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog go/_/rdo rje dril bu skal chen po/_/byang gi sgo ru yang dag gnas/_/'jug pa dang ni 'byung ba'ang rung /_/rdo rje shugs ni brjod par bya/_/
[\[206b.5\]]ri mo dman ma brdzis byas na/_/dam tshig de nyid mthong mi 'gyur/_/oM badzra be gA kra ma hUM/_gang gi dus su thig 'debs pa/_/rdo rje'i thig ni brjod par bya/_/sa yi cha ni ma lus pa/_/thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gyur/_/oM badzra sa ma ya sU tra mA ti kra ma hUM/_sngon du tshon rtsi'i 
[\[206b.6\]]phye ma la/_/'bar ba'i blta bas yang dag blta/_/badzra rA ga zhes brjod na/_/thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gyur/_/oM badzra rA ga hUM/_mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad dang /_/sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/_/rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab ba 
[\[206b.7\]]bya/_/logs dang cha ni mnyam pa dang /_/kun nas cha ni rnam par phye/_/dkyil 'khor cha ni rnam par gsal/_/'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/_/de yi nang gi rim pa ru/_/zhugs nas 'khor lo de mtshungs pa/_/kun du cha ni mnyam par bri/_/ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/_/
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]rdo rje'i ka ba'i mdun gnas su/_/dkyil 'khor dag ni lnga yis brgyan/_/gnas lnga dag ni thams cad du/_/'khor lo lnga ni dgod par bya/_/'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/kun du bri zhing dgod par bya/_/rdo rje bsnyems tshul gyis bltas nas/_/rdo rje 
[\[207a.2\]]sems dpa' gzung bar bya/_/oM badzra satwa hUM/_de la dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/sangs rgyas rgyal po dgod par bya/_/gang gi thugs las nges byung ba/_/gsang ba'i tshogs ni stug cing brtan/_/rnam par snang mdzad rnal 'byor che/_/phyogs rnams kun du rnam par gsal/_/gang 
[\[207a.3\]]gi mtshan smos tsam gyis ni/_/sdig pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur/_/'khor los sgyur ba tshogs chen po/_/sems dpa' bzhi po rgyal po che/_/phyogs rnams dag ni thams cad du/_/rdo rje shugs 'chang dag gis dgod/_/shar du rdo rje sems dpa' ste/_/lho ru rdo rje rin chen no/_/
[\[207a.4\]]nub tu rdo rje chos zhes pa/_/rdo rje'i las ni byang du'o/_/rdo rje sems dpa' lnga po ni/_/thams cad sangs rgyas cod pan ldan/_/rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/_/nam bza' dkar po dag man bas pa/_/de la 'di rnams kyi snying po ni/_/oM sarba yo gI shwa ra ya hrI hUM/_/oM badzra satwa 
[\[207a.5\]]hUM/_oM badzra rat+na hUM/_oM badzra d+harma hUM/_oM badzra karma hUM/_rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che/_/rtse mo lnga pa dgod par bya/_/rdo rje rin chen rin po che/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i pad+ma ste/_/rdo rje las kyi rdo rje ni/_/rdo rje rnon po mtshon cha che/_/rnam snang rang gi phyag rgya ni/_/ye shes khu tshur yongs su 'dzin/_/
[\[207a.6\]]zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/_/'od kyi dbus su yang dag gnas/_/bdag nyid chen po bzhi po kun/_/bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung /_/gang na 'khor lo med pa yi/_/dbus kyi 'khor lo'i grwa bzhi ru/_/btsun mo chen mo lha mo bzhi/_/dgod pa'i chos nyid bsam 
[\[207a.7\]]par bya/_/rdo rje sems ma rdo rje chos/_/de bzhin rdo rje rin chen ma/_/rdo rje las ma btsun mo che/_/dkyil 'khor grwa bzhir bri bar bya/_/rdo rje sems ma byang sems ma/_/pha rol phyin pa chen po mchog_/lha mo chen mo rdo rje chos/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog_/dpal chen 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]rdo rje rin chen ma/_/bsod nams kyi ni tshogs gter byed/_/mkha' mdzod ces bya rdo rje las/_/las kyi pha rol phyin pa mchog_/de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i ming ni/_dpal chen rdo rje dkar mo dang /_/rdo rje sgrol ma mkha' rdo rje/_/rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad las/_/
[\[207b.2\]]de dag gsang mchog bla na med/_/thams cad zla ba gang 'od ldan/_/rked par bsnyems bcas rol par ldan/_/ji ltar rgyal ba'i rnam bzhi bzhin/_/rang gi phyag mtshan gyis brel phyag_/seng ge'i snyoms tshul rol ldan pa/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su/_/shar gyi mi bskyod 
[\[207b.3\]]dkyil 'khor la/_/zla ba'i dbus su mi bskyod pa/_/ston pa'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin/_/mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod/_/de yi phyogs rnams yongs su 'dzin/_/mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/dam tshig dag ni bzhi po 
[\[207b.4\]]bri/_/mdun du phyag na rdo rje ste/_/rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas su'o/_/rdo rje chags pa de bzhin g.yon/_/rgyab tu legs pa yang dag bri/_/rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras shing /_/rdo rje phyed pa'i dbang bskur ldan/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/_/lho yi rin chen dkyil 
[\[207b.5\]]'khor du/_/zla ba'i dbus su rin chen 'byung /_/mchog 'dzin pa yi phyag rgya 'dzin/_/mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/rin chen sems dpa' bzhi po ni/_/mdun du rdo rje rin chen te/_/g.yas su rdo rje gzi brjid do/_/g.yon du 
[\[207b.6\]]rdo rje rgyal mtshan te/_/rgyab tu bzhad pa yang dag bri/_/rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras shing /_/rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur ldan/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/_/nub tu pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la/_/chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin/_/dbus su 'dug pa 'od dpag med/_/
[\[207b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po ye shes che/_/phyogs bzhi ru ni dgod par bya/_/rdo rje chos ni mdun du ste/_/g.yas su rdo rje rnon po'o/_/g.yon du rdo rje 'khor lo ste/_/rdo rje smra ba rgyab tu'o/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/byang gi las kyi dkyil 'khor la/_/mchog sbyin phyag rgya 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]yongs su 'dzin/_/thub pa don yod grub pa dgod/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/las chen po dag yang dag bri/_/kun nas phyogs ni bzhi dag tu/_/phyag na rang gi phyag mtshan mtshon/_/mdun du rdo rje las yin te/_/g.yas su rdo rje srung 
[\[208a.2\]]ba'o/_/g.yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin te/_/rdo rje khu tshur rgyab tu'o/_/de nas phyag mtshan bcu drug dang /_/dbus ma nyi shur rab bshad bya/_/bcu drug dbus ma nyi shu ni/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du rab bshad bya/_/ji ltar rigs shing 'tsham pa la/_/rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa/_/rdo 
[\[208a.3\]]rje rin chen rin po che/_/rdo rje pad+ma chen po dang /_/rdo rje rnon po dbus ma yin/_/phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje che/_/de bzhin rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin/_/rdo rje chags pa gzhu nyid do/_/rdo rje legs pa'i rdo rje gnyis/_/rdo rje rin chen chen po che/_/rdo rje gzi brjid nyi ma ste/_/rdo rje rgyal mtshan 
[\[208a.4\]]rgyal mtshan sgreng /_/rdo rje bzhad pa tshems chen po/_/rdo rje chos kyi pad+ma ches/_/rdo rje rnon po ral gri bzang /_/rdo rje rgyu yi 'khor lo che/_/rdo rje smra ba'i yi ge ste/_/rdo rje rnon po las chen po/_/rdo rje srung ba'i cho ga ste/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin mche ba che/_/rdo rje khu tshur bsdams pa ste/_/
[\[208a.5\]]lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang /_/dril bu dag ni sgo ba bzhi/_/rdo rje sems ma'i rdo rje che/_/de bzhin rdo rje rin chen nor/_/pad+ma rdo rje chos ma ste/_/rdo rje rnon po las ma yin/_/grwa bzhi dag tu gsang ba yi/_/phyag mtshan de rnams dgod par bya/_/'khor lo chen po'i phyi rol 
[\[208a.6\]]gyi/_/grwa bzhi dag ni thams cad du/_/gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhi/_/rdo rje lha mo yang dag bri/_/rdo rje sgeg mo rdor phreng ma/_/de bzhin rdo rje glu ma nyid/_/bsnyems bcas phreng ba pi bang dang /_/glu gar gsang ba'i lha mo rnams/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su/_/
[\[208a.7\]]mchod pa'i lha mo yang dag bri/_/me tog spos dang de bzhin dri/_/mar me nub byang mtshams su'o/_/mar me la sogs bar nyid kyis/_/phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad du/_/bskal pa bzang po'i sems dpa' che/_/stong ni nges par dgod par bya/_/mtshan ma ji bzhin ci rigs 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]pas/_/byams pa la sogs ma lus pa/_/ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa yi/_/sems dpa' chen po dgod par bya/_/cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/kun du bri zhing dgod par bya/_/rang gi snying pos kun dbab phyir/_/rang rang gi ni snying po yin/_/de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin 
[\[208b.2\]]no/_/oM badzra pA Ni hUM/_badzra aM ku sha dzaH/_badzra rA ga ho/_badzra sA d+hu sa/_dam tshig mchog gi snying po'o/_/oM badzra ma Ni oM/_badzra te dza a/_badzra ke tu trAM/_badzra hA sa hA/_badzra pad+ma hrI/_badzra tik+Sh+Na d+haM/_badzra he tu maM/_badzra b+hA Sha raM/_dbang gi sems dpa' dang /_ye 
[\[208b.3\]]shes kyi sems dpa' chen po'i snying po'o/_/badzra karma kaM_/badzra rak+Sha haM/_badzra yak+Sha hUM/_badzra muSh+Ti baM/_las kyi sems dpa' chen po'i snying po'o/_/de rnams ni rab tu gnas pa'i snying po yin no/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi snying po ni/_badzra hUM/_rat+na trAM/_d+harma hrIH/_karma 
[\[208b.4\]]A/_lha mo rnams kyi sngar bshad zin to/_/sgo srung rnams kyi yang de bzhin no/_/cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad dgod par bya/_/de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi las bshad par bya ste/_kun nas rdo rje rnal 'byor gyis/_/chos kyi blo can gyis bri bya/_/
[\[208b.5\]]dpal mchog dang po las gsungs pa'i/_/sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/_/theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs/_/lan bdun du ni brjod par bya/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la/_/lan bdun du ni bskor bar bya/_/'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni/_/mkhas 
[\[208b.6\]]pas thams cad blta bar bya/_/gal te chad dam lhag kyang rung /_/rdo rje shugs kyis dag par bya/_/'khor lo chen po dag par byas/_/sangs rgyas rnal 'byor yang dag gzung /_/rgyal ba rnams la bdag nyid ni/_/dbul ba'i las ni kun du bya/_/de nas yo byad thams 
[\[208b.7\]]cad kyis/_/dkyil 'khor la ni mchod par bya/_/ci 'byor pas ni bya ba ste/_/dman par gyur kyang nyes pa med/_/'byor pa ci snyed yod pa kun/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du rab tu dbul/_/bum pa gang ba 'bum phrag gam/_/stong ngam yang na brgya yang rung /_/mar me 'bum 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]phrag stong ngam ni/_/yang na stong ngam brgya yang rung /_/dri dang spos kyi snod 'bum mam/_/yang na stong ngam brgya yang rung /_/ga pur a ga ru nyid dang /_/du ru ska dang tsan+dan sogs/_/mang sbyar dri zhim dang ldan pa/_/spos rnams 'di dag bsreg par bya/_/
[\[209a.2\]]gser ram dngul gyi snod dag dang /_/sa las byas kyang nyes pa med/_/yo byad ji snyed yod pa kun/_/dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya/_/de la kong bu stong phrag gam/_/mar me sdong bu shin tu 'bar/_/tha me snod gcig ste/_/ma tshang gyur kyang nyes pa med/_/
[\[209a.3\]]dar ni phyar bar bye ba bre/_/rnga yab phreng bas rnam par brgyan/_/dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras/_/zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes/_/sna tshogs bzhon pa brgya 'am ni/_/stong phrag gcig kyang nyes pa med/_/thams cad ma tshang gcig nyid kyang /_/bde bas rol mo mchog rnams 
[\[209a.4\]]bya/_/phan pa'i zas ni stong phrag dang /_/bye brag dag ni rgya mtsho tshogs/_/bca' ba sna tshogs pa yang ste/_/gal te ma tshang nyes pa med/_/dri dang gos bzang thams cad dang /_/dri zhim pa yi byug pa dang /_/bya ba mchog ni nye bar mdzes/_/bla re rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/
[\[209a.5\]]sna tshogs dri yi chus bkang ba/_/bum pa shin tu yid 'ong dang /_/me tog shing ni brgya nyid dang /_/bzhi yang nyes par mi 'gyur ro/_/dri dang me tog thams cad dang /_/bdug pa yid du 'ong ba kun/_/gal te sbyor ba ldan gyur na/_/mchod pa rnam pa thams cad bya/_/mchod 
[\[209a.6\]]pa dang ni gtor ma nyid/_/ji bzhin sgrub pa pos de phul/_/de bzhin dngos grub rdzu 'phrul ni/_/mthong ba'i chos la thob par 'gyur/_/sngar ni ji skad bsgrags pa bzhin/_/thams cad cho ga bzhin du dgod/_/sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing /_/mchod pa nyid kyang rab tu 
[\[209a.7\]]bya/_/de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi/_/dbus kyi 'khor lo phyag byas nas/_/pus mo btsugs te 'dug nas ni/_/yang dag par ni dgug par bya/_/sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu bcing /_/rdo rje lcags kyu brjod par bya/_/nyi shu gcig tu bzlas pa yis/_/de bzhin 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]gshegs rnams kun du gshegs/_/de nas sgo srung bcings nas ni/_/yi ge dzaHni yongs su brjod/_/rdo rje can ni thams cad dgug_/the tshom med par gshegs par gyur/_/rdo rje zhags pa bcings nas ni/_/cho ga ji bzhin nges par gzhug_/rdo rje lcags 
[\[209b.2\]]sgrog bcings nas ni/_/dbang du yang ni rtag tu bya/_/rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yis/_/de dag nyid kyang dbab par bya/_/rdo rje gnas pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/gnas rnams kun ni dgod par bya/_/ci nus par ni rab tu bsgrags/_/de nas mchod pa rab tu bya/_/spos dang me 
[\[209b.3\]]tog la sogs pa'i/_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor kun la sbyar/_/bdag nyid dbul dang mchod pa dang /_/bshags dang gsol ba btab la sogs/_/byang chub sems ni bskyed nas kyang /_/sdom pa yang dag spyad par bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches/_/bdag nyid 
[\[209b.4\]]la ni dbang bskur bya/_/se gol dag ni brdab bya zhing /_/sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya/_/sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun/_/bkug cing rab tu bcug nas ni/_/rdo rje lcags sgrog yang dag dbab/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches/_/dral nas de ni yang dag 
[\[209b.5\]]dbab/_/rdo rje ye shes bla na med/_/ye shes dag pa skye bar 'gyur/_/sems dpa'i ye shes 'bab par 'gyur/_/rdo rje dbab pa yang dag brjod/_/ji ste babs par ma gyur na/_/yi ge a yis dril bu dkrol/_/mtshams med lnga po byed pa yi/_/rdo rje slob dpon 'di lta bu/_/
[\[209b.6\]]ye shes dam pa skye 'gyur zhing /_/rmad du byung ba'ang 'dis mthong 'gyur/_/brgya las rtsa bdun lhag pa nyid/_/mtshan ma'ang de las lhag 'byung 'gyur/_/gzhan dag gang yang rung ba nyid/_/gal te bsod nams skal ba che/_/des ni sangs rgyas thams cad mthong /_/yang 
[\[209b.7\]]na byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_/yang na rdo rje 'dzin gang nyid/_/yang na 'od zer 'phros pas mthong /_/haM sgrogs 'brug gi sgra dang ni/_/spos dang me tog dag gi bar/_/ba spu langs pa la sogs byung /_/de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni/_/dkyil 'khor phyi rol byung nas ni/_/
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]sems ma'i phyag rgya ldan gyur pas/_/sor mo gnyis kyis phreng ba gzung /_/gar gyi tshul gyis zhugs nas ni/_/rdo rje gar ni rab bskor bas/_/dbus kyi 'khor lo rab zhugs nas/_/phreng ba nyid ni dor bar bya/_/phreng ba de ni gar babs pa/_/de 
[\[210a.2\]]dang de ni skad cig 'grub/_/sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas/_/phyag rgya thams cad bcing byas na/_/dngos grub thams cad nges pa ru/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/gzhan yang de la rdo rje 'chang /_/byin gyis rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur/_/langs nas 
[\[210a.3\]]der ni bcom ldan 'das/_/yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang rung /_/'dar ba dang ni g.yo ba'ang rung /_/de bzhin yan lag 'khums pa dang /_/yang na tshig ni byung ba dang /_/ci ste hUM ni brjod pa'ang rung /_/nges par legs so zhes bya ba/_/cho 'phrul bde ba chen po ni/_/
[\[210a.4\]]rmad byung bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/rdo rje slob dpon skal ba ches/_/mthong 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/_/de nas langs te brjod par bya/_/mgon po thub pa la btud nas/_/ci 'dod pa ni bka' nod bya/_/rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che/_/
[\[210a.5\]]bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/_/sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir/_/slob ma rab tu gzhug par bgyi/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu khams gsum gyi/_/sems can kun gyi bde gang yin/_/des ni rdo rje slob dpon de'i/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/rdo rje slob dpon gyi 
[\[210a.6\]]las rdzogs so//_//de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po der ni ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad 'jug tu rung ngo /_/snod dang snod ma yin pa yongs su 
[\[210a.7\]]brtag par mi bya ste/_gzhug pa la mngon par zhen pa yongs su gzung bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can thams cad kyis mthong ba tsam gyi mod la phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/dad pa med pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa dang /_rgyud yongs su ma smin 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]pa dang /_mos pa med pa mang du zin kyang 'on kyang mthong ba tsam gyis so/_/gang gi phyir gsang ba chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gsang bas 'dul ba'i thabs dang /_'khor lo'i tshul dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa dang /_
[\[210b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa pa ston pa yin te/_de'i phyir mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ngan song thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal ba'i sras ni 'jigs pa med/_/ngan song sgo ni bcad pa dang /_/thams cad thar pa la gzhol dang /_/phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 
[\[210b.3\]]'gyur/_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song ste/_/byang chub sems ni bskyed du gzhug_/sems can kun gyi don bsams nas/_/sdom pa yang ni sbyin par bya/_/srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba 
[\[210b.4\]]dang /_'bru'i chang dang /_bcos pa'i chang dang /_myos par 'gyur ba dag de nas brtsams te spang bar bya'o/_/sngon la sdom pa 'di dag ni/_/ji ltar 'dod cing mos pa ru/_/mkhas pa yis ni sbyin bya ste/_/rang dbang med par sbyin mi bya/_/gal te de ni dad gyur na/_/de 
[\[210b.5\]]la sdom pa sbyin par bya/_/sdom pa gsum la bkod nas ni/_/de nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/_/gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song ste/_/bslab pa lnga la rnam par gnas/_/byang chub sems la mchog brtson bya/_/sems 
[\[210b.6\]]can shin tu gdul dka' gang /_/sdom pa 'dzin par mi byed cing /_/dad dang ldan pa med pa yang /_/'jug pa nyid ni dgag mi bya/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas thugs rje can/_/de dag gi ni sku ru 'gyur/_/mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ni/_/sdom pa dag par 'grub par 'gyur/_/
[\[210b.7\]]bdag nyid ngan pa'i sems can gang /_/khro zhing shin tu gshe ba dang /_/bzhad gad byed cing 'phyar yang rung /_/de nyid rgyu ru 'gyur ba yin/_/gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ru/_/de nas yang dag bshad par bya/_/ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham pa ru/_/rdo rje slob ma gzhug 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]par bya/_/sbyor ba bzhi yis phyag bya zhing /_/rdo rje sngags kyang bsgom par bya/_/sngar bshad cho ga ji bzhin du/_/phyag bzhi dag kyang bya ba yin/_/stod g.yogs gos ni dmar po dang /_/dmar pos mig kyang dgab par bya/_/gos ni dmar 
[\[211a.2\]]po bskon byas te/_/gang phyir sangs rgyas sku 'dzin pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/_/shin tu gsal ba 'ching du gzhug_/snying po lan cig brjod bya zhing /_/sa ma ya staM zhes brjod/_/dga' zhing mgu la rangs pa yis/_/sor mo gnyis kyis phreng ba 
[\[211a.3\]]blangs/_/snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/_/slob dpon chen pos gzhug par bya/_/sa ma ya hUM/_shar gyi sgo yi nang du ni/_/yi ge dzaHni yang dag brjod/_/lho ru zhags pa'i yi ge hUM/_/nub tu lcags sgrog baM lhan cig_/byang du dril bu byang chub par/_/yi ge 
[\[211a.4\]]a ni brjod par bya/_/dus phyis rol pa dang bcas par/_/bkug ste phyag kyang btsal bar bya/_/bshags dang gsol gdab mchod pa dang /_/yongs su bsngo dang rjes yi rang /_/bdag nyid dbul ba nyid kyang ni/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du byed du gzhug_/deng 
[\[211a.5\]]bdag ye shes rdo rje ni/_/the tshom med par bskyed par bya/_/khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya ste/_/khyod ni phung bar gyur ta re/_/brjod nas phreng ba dor du gzhug_/rdo rje'i phreng ba sbyin par bya/_/phreng ba de ni gang du babs/_/'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/oM 
[\[211a.6\]]badzra mA le/_rdo rje'i tshig ni rab brjod cing /_/deng nas gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya/_/nges par yid ches sbyin bya zhing /_/dkyil 'khor ltos zhes brjod par bya/_/oM nga ni rdo rje sems rang nyid/_/sangs rgyas snying po las byung ba/_/rdo rje mig ni dbye bar bya/_/kyai rdo rje 
[\[211a.7\]]yi ni dkyil 'khor ltos/_/dam tshig nyid ni sbyin bya zhing /_/sems ma'i phyag rgya steng du bcing /_/'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig 'joms/_/rdo rje tshig ni brjod par bya/_/oM u da ka Tha/_rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni/_/phyag na rdo rjes srung bar byed/_/dam tshig nyid ni 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]mnyam gyur na/_/'bras bu 'di ni thob mi 'gyur/_/'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/_/dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/_/dam tshig bsrungs pas 'grub par 'gyur/_/'thungs shig rdo rje bdud rtsi 'thungs/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i mna' yi ni/_/snying po 'dis ni mna' bsgag 
[\[211b.2\]]go/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid ni/_/de ring khyod kyi snying la zhugs/_/gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/_/skad cig de la dral nas gshegs/_/gang zhig sdom pa mi len cing /_/shin tu gdul dka' dad med la/_/gzhug pa tsam ni sbyin par bya/_/de la las ni mi 
[\[211b.3\]]bya'o/_/dkon mchog gsum la dad dang ldan/_/sdig la 'jigs shing rab tu bsdams/_/dad dang ldan pa phun sum tshogs/_/de la dam tshig sbyin par bya/_/de la dam tshig gang zhe na/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang /_/gtso bo de dag lhur blang bya/_/'tsho 
[\[211b.4\]]ba'i srog gi phyir yang ni/_/byang sems nges par dor mi bya/_/lha rnams la ni smad mi bya/_/sngags dang phyag rgya nam yang min/_/rdo rje slob dpon brnyas mi bya/_/bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs/_/bzhon pa mtshon cha phyag mtshan dang /_/dman ma lus kyi grib ma rnams/_/
[\[211b.5\]]gya tshom du ni brdzi mi bya/_/nam yang bza' bar mi bya'o/_/bdag gis sngon ni ji ltar mthong /_/sems can gzhan la brjod mi bya/_/sngags dang phyag rgya bslab pa ni/_/nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/_/sems can gsad par mi bya zhing /_/theg pa gzhan la dga' mi bya/_/
[\[211b.6\]]sems can don dang 'khor ba las/_/nam yang skyo bar mi bya'o/_/pha rol phyin drug spyod pa ni/_/nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/_/bya ba ma yin rtag tu spang /_/khyod kyi dam tshig sdom pa yin/_/gal te snod ldan mchog yin na/_/'di 'dra'i dam tshig brjod par bya/_/ci ste 
[\[211b.7\]]min na btang snyoms gzhag_/ci ste 'dod pa bde bar bya/_/sbyor ba 'di dag thams cad kyis/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus ba ru/_/rgyud rnams kun gyi dam tshig mchog_/thams cad du ni sbyar bar bya/_/cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/rdo rje slob ma gzhug par 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]bya/_/rdo rje chos ni bsgrub pa yis/_/dngos grub mchog kyang sbyin par bya/_/gal te rdo rje can rang grub/_/mkhas pas gzhan la'ang bslab par bya/_/rang nyid ye shes yang dag skyes/_/de bzhin gzhan la bskyed par bya/_/dkyil 'khor mthong 
[\[212a.2\]]zhing cho ga shes/_/dam tshig dngos grub dang ldan pa'i/_/dad dang ldan pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/_/'dir ni slob dpon 'gyur ba yin/_/de yis mchod pa byas nas ni/_/the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/_/mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang /_/lan bdun gyis ni 'grub par 
[\[212a.3\]]'gyur/_/rdo rje slob ma la brjod bya/_/'di las 'jig rten gzhan du min/_/sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol/_/khyod 'dir rdo rje can du 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod sprul zhing /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye/_/'khor ba'i gnas kyi btson ra ru/_/
[\[212a.4\]]slar yang sdug bsngal 'gyur ba med/_/deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas/_/sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs pa ru/_/de ring khyod ni gyur pa yin/_/nga la spyi bos gus pas gtugs/_/lus ni theg gsum pha rol phyin/_/mi khom par ni skye mi 'gyur/_/byang chub spyod pas nyes 
[\[212a.5\]]pa med/_/rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob 'gyur/_/rdo rje can khyod brtson par gyis/_/gzhan tsho bcu drug gis thob ba/_/tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis sa thob kyang /_/dkyil 'khor gsang ba mthong ma gyur/_/ji ltar khyod ni der gyur pa/_/de 
[\[212a.6\]]bzhin theg pa yid ches min/_/skye dang skye ba thams cad du/_/rdo rje can ni ston brtson 'gyur/_/skye ba bcu drug mthar thug pas/_/zhi ba sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i gnas kyis thob cing /_/bskal pa grangs med gnyis dka' spyod/_/gsang ba'i theg 
[\[212a.7\]]par ma zhugs par/_/bcu drug gis ni 'gyur ba yin/_/'byung po kun gyis mthong mi 'gyur/_/khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba/_/lha tshogs gdug pa thams cad kyis/_/rdo rje can gyis zil mi non/_/rims gdon dug dang phyag rgya dang /_/mkha' 'gro la sogs 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]'jigs pa'i gdong /_/nga rgyal dang bcas gzhan dag gis/_/slar yang khyod ni zil non min/_/de ni bskal pa brgya ru yang /_/rdo rje'i yon tan nyid brjod 'gyur/_/gsang ba'i snying po mchog mthong 'gyur/_/nam yang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/sems dpa'i 
[\[212b.2\]]rang bzhin phyag rgya bcings/_/brtson 'grus chen pos brtan par bya/_/ji skad du ni brjod par bya/_/dbab pa bla na med pa ste/_/'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar bshad/_/rdo rje ye shes bla med pa/_/de nyid kyis ni dbab par bya/_/badzra A be sha 
[\[212b.3\]]aH/_de nas dbab par gyur pa nyid/_/mngon par shes pa drug thob cing /_/ye shes dam pa thang cig gis/_/sngon byung min pa'i dga' bde dang /_/dga' ba mgu ba mchog dag dang /_/rig pa thams cad mngon du 'gyur/_/rdzu 'phrul dag ni rdzogs par 'gyur/_/
[\[212b.4\]]snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/_/de nas phyag rgya snying gar dgrol/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/rtag tu snying gar zhugs par 'gyur/_/oM tiSh+Tha badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/_shA shwa to me b+ha ba/_hr-i da yaM me a d+hi tiSh+tha/_sarba sid d+hi ma me pra yats+tsha hUM ha ha ha ha hoH/_de nas 
[\[212b.5\]]snying po 'di yis ni/_/phreng ba nyid ni dor bar bya/_/pra tIts+tsha ho/_gnas gang du ni phreng ba babs/_/de yi lha ni rigs de yin/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi/_/gsang ba chen po bstan par bya/_/dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis kyang /_/sangs rgyas sa ni 
[\[212b.6\]]the tshom med/_/dri dang ldan zhing yid 'ong ba/_/bum pa'i chu ni blangs nas ni/_/snying po 'di yis dbang bskur bya/_/sdug bsngal rab tu 'khrud pa'i mchog_/oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/_de nas phyag rgya gang rung bas/_/phreng ba byin nas dbang bskur bya/_/rdo rje'i ming gi 
[\[212b.7\]]dbang bskur la/_/ming gi sgra ni rab sbyar bya/_/oM badzra sa twa a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/_badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta he badzra nA ma/_slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/_/rdo rje ye shes bla na med/_/de la ye shes bslab par bya/_/bzhi las gang yang rung ba ni/_/skal ba ji bzhin 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]dri bar bya/_/gal te nor gyi dngos grub smra/_/de ni rnam bzhir bshad par bya/_/nor gyi ye shes chen po bzhi/_/dngos grub rnams ni bslab par bya/_/gang na gter ni yod re ba/_/der ni skyil mo krung bcas te/_/snying gar rdo rje bsgoms na ni/_/gter 
[\[213a.2\]]gyi gnas ni rab mthong 'gyur/_/badzra ni d+hi/_nam mkhar rdo rje bsgom bya zhing /_/me long la ni yang dag blta/_/gang du lhung bar mthong gyur pa/_/de na gter ni yod par bstan/_/rat+na ni d+hi/_rang gi lce la rdo rje bsgom/_/'di na yod ces rang nyid smra/_/d+ha rma ni d+hi/_rdo 
[\[213a.3\]]rje las ni yang dag babs/_/gang du babs pa der bstan to/_/karma ni d+hi/_gal te rdo rje'i dngos grub smra/_/rnam pa bzhi ni bslab par bya/_/chu ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin mthong /_/shin tu mnyam gzhag dga' bar 'gyur/_/chu ni stug pa'i rang bzhin mthong /_/chu yi 
[\[213a.4\]]steng du bcag par 'gyur/_/badzra dza la/_bdag nyid ting 'dzin dang ldan pas/_/yang dang yang du dga' bar bya/_/bdag nyid dga' ba'i gzugs su ni/_/bsgoms na de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/badzra rU pa/_bdag nyid nam mkha'i rang bzhin mtshungs/_/rang 
[\[213a.5\]]bzhin med pa nyid bsgoms shing /_/rdo rje dbab pa bskyed byas na/_/myur du mi snang ba nyid 'gyur/_/badzra A kA sha_/rdo rje'i skas ni nam mkha' la/_/bsgom zhing steng du 'dzeg byas na/_/ji srid du ni 'dzeg pa'i gnas/_/de srid mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/_/badzra ma hA/_
[\[213a.6\]]rig pa 'dzin pa 'dod smra na/_/ye shes rnam bzhi sbyin par bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing /_/nam mkha' la ni bdag nyid gnas/_/lag na rdo rje dang ldan par/_/bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/gal te chos 
[\[213a.7\]]kyi phyag 'dod na/_/gnas sam yang na gzhan yang rung /_/bdag nyid gnas par bsgoms na ni/_/de ltar gnas shing lag pa ru/_/rdo rje pad+ma rab bsgom zhing /_/bdag nyid rdo rje chos su ste/_/pad+ma rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/badzra d+ha ra/_pad+ma d+ha ra/_zla ba'i 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste/_/bdag nyid las dang yang dag ldan/_/nam mkha' la gnas bdag nyid ni/_/las kyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/bdag nyid rdo rje rin chen dang /_/de bzhin du ni bdag nyid gnas/_/lag tu rin chen rnams bsgoms na/_/
[\[213b.2\]]rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/_/karma d+ha ra/_rat+na d+ha ra/_gal te sangs rgyas dngos grub smra/_/ye shes rnam bzhi brjod par bya/_/rtag tu nam mkhar bsgoms nas ni/_/lus ni yang ba nyid 'gyur zhing /_/rdzu 'phrul gyi ni gnas thob 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i bdag nyid 
[\[213b.3\]]myur du 'phar/_/badzra r-i d+hi/_stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/_/thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin bstan/_/rdo rje'i bdag nyid ji srid 'dod/_/de srid skad cig gis 'phar 'gyur/_/badzra badzra/_chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dag_/yan lag pad+ma dang ldan zhing /_/bdag 
[\[213b.4\]]nyid dag par rab bsgoms na/_/mngon par shes pa lnga thob 'gyur/_/shud d+ha/_shud d+ha/_nyin mtshan brtson 'grus dang bcas pas/_/rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' yi/_/dbyings su bzhugs par bsams na ni/_/rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/_/khams 
[\[213b.5\]]gsum 'di dag thams cad ni/_/sangs rgyas gzugs su mos byas nas/_/brtan par rjes su dran grub na/_/sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba yin/_/satwa satwa/_bud d+ha bud d+ha/_gang tshe gsang ba'i lha mor 'gyur/_/de yi rigs kyi lha ru 'gyur/_/ye shes dag 
[\[213b.6\]]pa brjod bya zhing /_/de la mna' yang bsgag par bya/_/ji skad gsang mdo dbang gsungs pa/_/de bzhin b+ha gar gzhug par bya/_/yid kyis thams cad bcug nas ni/_/de yi lus ni mnyam du spro/_/mi bskyod thugs ka nas byung ste/_/rnam par snang mdzad thugs 
[\[213b.7\]]ka nas/_/de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni/_/sangs rgyas kun ni mnyam du spro/_/ting 'dzin sbyor ba la gnas te/_/mnyam par bzhag pas pheg rdob ba bya/_/rdo rje thal mo'i pheg brdabs pas/_/dngos grub thams cad dbang du 'gyur/_/badzra pA sha/_rin 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]dbang thugs ka nas byung ste/_/rnam par snang mdzad thugs ka nas/_/sangs rgyas kun ni bcug nas kyang /_/bdag nyid rdo rje'i lha mo ru/_/rdo rje thal mo byas nas ni/_/rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthil brdab bya/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor bsgrub bya zhing /_/rdo rje 
[\[214a.2\]]ye shes yang dag brdab/_/rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni/_/de bzhin du ni b+ha gar zhugs/_/rdo rje thal mo byas nas ni/_/sor mo'i rtse mos mnyam du brdab/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/rtag tu nyon mongs dang 'brel ba/_/nyon mongs zhes bya'i sgrib pa dag_/
[\[214a.3\]]skad cig gis ni rigs brgya 'joms/_/badzra ha na/_de bzhin b+ha gar gnas nas ni/_/sangs rgyas sku ni mnyam du spro/_/rdo rje lha mor rang bdag nyid/_/rnam par snang mdzad thugs kar gnas/_/rdo rje lha mo bcings nas ni/_/badzra badzra lan gnyis brjod/_/rdo rje 
[\[214a.4\]]bsdams pa nges bkrol na/_/sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog_/badzra ha ra/_de nas rnam par snang mdzad bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni/_sngar gyi ting 'dzin ji bzhin du/_/rdo rje dbyings ni rab tu bya/_/rnal 'byor lnga la'ang rab tu gnas/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[214a.5\]]nyid kyang rnyed dka' min/_/oM tsit+ta pra ti bo d+haM ka ro mi/_oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mi/_oM tiSh+Tha badzra/_oM badzra At+ma ko haM/_oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga tA sta thA a haM/_rnal 'byor lnga po 'di yis ni/_/phyag rgya lnga ni yang dag bsgrub/_/rnam par snang mdzad rang bdag nyid/_/
[\[214a.6\]]dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyag rgya rnams so/_/sems dpa'i skyil mo krung 'dug ste/_/rdo rje gsor la gzung bar bya/_/sku dang gsung thugs phyag rgya dag_/rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid 
[\[214a.7\]]'gyur/_/badzra sa twA haM/_bsgrub pa dag gi mchog chen po/_/de nas yang dag bshad par bya/_/rang nyid rdo rje gsung gis bshad/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor bsgrub par bya/_/bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni/_/rdo rje bsnyems tshul yang dag gzung /_/rdo rje dbab 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]bar rang gyur nas/_/bdag nyid rdo rje zhes byar bsgom/_/badzra satwA haM/_rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan zhing /_/dkyil 'khor ma lus ston mdzad pa/_/phreng ba'i rnam pa 'od dang ldan/_/rgyan dang gos dang kha dog ldan/_/Da ba ta ni brjod bya zhing /_/sems 
[\[214b.2\]]dpa' chen po rjes dran bya/_/ye shes sems dpa' gos pa med/_/dga' bdag ji srid mthong bar du/_/badzra satwa dr-i sh+ya/_sems dpa' mdun du bltas nas ni/_/bdag nyid la ni yang dag dbab/_/oM badzra sa twa aH/_sdug cing che ba'i sku de ni/_/
[\[214b.3\]]rdo rje lcags kyus yang dag dgug_/dzaHhUM baM hoH/_rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis/_/bdag nyid chen pos blta bar bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ka ru/_/slar yang de yi snying gar gzhug_/sa ma ya aH/_zhes brjod nas ni rnal 'byor pa/_/zla ba dang 
[\[214b.4\]]ldan steng du gnas/_/ci 'dod pa yi bya ba byed/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyang bsgrub par bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'di ji bzhin/_/de nas sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/rang gi phyag rgya yongs 'dzin pa'i/_/rdo rje can kun bsgom par bya/_/gang dang gang la mos gyur pa/_/de bzhin 
[\[214b.5\]]snying po bzla bar bya/_/rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/rdo rje can dang mtshungs par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rjes dran rab grub nas/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor bya/_/rang gi phyag rgya yongs 'dzin pa'i/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs grub pas/_/'khor los 
[\[214b.6\]]sgyur ba nyid thob 'gyur/_/rgyal po bya ba sngon 'gro bas/_/mnyes pa dang ni dbang bskur bya/_/thun ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_/chos kyi bzhad dang dga' bar 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin gzungs kyi 'khor lo dang /_/gsang ba'i mdzod ni bla na med/_/smin pa dang ni grol ba 
[\[214b.7\]]nyid/_/sangs rgyas byang chub brtan pa'i mchog_/rtog pa gsang chen 'di las ni/_/phyag rgya grangs med yang dag byung /_/rigs kyi dbye ba yang dag ldan/_/rgya cher rab tu bsgrags pa yin/_/go cha ma bgos snod mi 'gyur/_/le lo khro dang g.yengs bcas 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]pas/_/nges par 'dzin par mi nus te/_/de bas nyung bar rab tu bsgrags/_/mdo sde'i dbang po gsang rgyal po/_/de nas phyag rgya rab tu bshad/_/theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs/_/rin chen snod du blta bar bya/_/ye shes kyi mngon par 
[\[215a.2\]]rtogs pa rdzogs so//_//rdo rje 'chang rnams kyi snying po/_gang las 'khor lo yang dag byung /_/rnal 'byor thams cad kun 'byung ba/_/mchog tu gsang ba bshad par bya/_/dbus kyi 'khor lor yang dag bshad/_/rnam 'phrul zhes ni rab tu 
[\[215a.3\]]bsgrags/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul te/_/'khor lo thabs ni rab ston pa/_/'khor lo lnga ru yang dag bshad/_/thabs ni rnam pa lnga yang yin/_/gsang ba yi ni dbye ba gnas/_/'khor lo yi ni rnam 'phrul ston/_/dbus ma gang yin byang chub 
[\[215a.4\]]sems/_/shar gyi bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi/_/lho yi tshogs su bshad pa ste/_/bsod nams tshogs dang yang dag ldan/_/ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs rnams dang /_/chos su 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa/_/nub tu yang dag brjod pa yin/_/byang ni sems can smin byas 
[\[215a.5\]]te/_/phyi rol grwa bzhi gang yin pa/_/tshad med pa ni bzhi dang bcas/_/byams pa snying rje btang snyoms dang /_/dga' ba zhes ni bya bar bshad/_/gang zhig thig skud yang dag bshad/_/chos kyi rgyun gyi lam las byung /_/lta ba thams cad rnam dag 'di/_/
[\[215a.6\]]theg pa gzhi ni rnam par spangs/_/gang zhig kha khyer zhes bya ba/_/ting 'dzin chos nyid dag pa ste/_/rdo rje lha mor yang dag bshad/_/gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya bar bshad/_/sgo ru yang dag bshad pa gang /_/thar pa'i sgo ni bzhi po yin/_/rta babs dang ni dra ba 
[\[215a.7\]]nyid/_/chos mdzod rang bzhin grong khyer yin/_/dra ba dra phyed bla bre ni/_/rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rnam 'phrul pa/_/tshon rtsi yang dag bshad pa gang /_/de 'dra ba yi byang chub tshogs/_/gang zhig mar me yang dag bshad/_/de na chos kyi snang ba mchog_/dri 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]ru yang dag bshad pa gang /_/grags pa'i dri ni bla na med/_/rdzu 'phrul byug pa gang yin pa/_/tshul khrims dri yis byugs pa yin/_/bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs pa/_/chos kyi zas ni bla na med/_/rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bar bshad/_/rtog pa thams cad rnam 
[\[215b.2\]]par spangs/_/grong khyer du ni bshad pa gang /_/de ni thar pa'i grong khyer mchog_/gang zhig dkyil 'khor yang dag bshad/_/chos kyi snying po rang bzhin grong /_/nad med ces ni bya bar brjod/_/de ni dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/_/dbus su rnam snang mdzad ces pa/_/
[\[215b.3\]]chos kun gcig tu bsdus pa yin/_/sangs rgyas rgyal po gtso bo che/_/phyogs rnams kun du rnam par gsal/_/rdo rje sems dpar yang dag bshad/_/byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin mchog_/de bas rgyal po byang chub sems/_/byang chub sems las yang 
[\[215b.4\]]dag byung /_/rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung /_/sems ni rnam pa bzhi zhes bya/_/sgrol dang grol dang dbugs dbyung dang /_/mya ngan 'da' bar lcags kyu'o/_/rdo rje chags par yang dag bshad/_/byang chub spyod pa la sbyor ba/_/rdo rje legs par yang dag 
[\[215b.5\]]bshad/_/rab tu sbyor ba ston pa nyid/_/rdo rje rin chen yang dag bshad/_/sems can bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed/_/rdo rje gzi brjid yang dag bshad/_/chos kyi sbyor ba 'od byed pa/_/rdo rje rgyal mtshan yang dag bshad/_/sems can 'khor ba las grol 
[\[215b.6\]]byed/_/rdo rje bzhad par yang dag bshad/_/sems can the tshom gcod par byed/_/rdo rje chos su yang dag bshad/_/chos kyi ye shes bla na med/_/rdo rje rnon por yang dag bshad/_/nyon mongs gcod cing 'joms byed pa/_/rdo rje rgyu ru yang dag bshad/_/
[\[215b.7\]]'khor lo rnam 'phrul ston byed pa/_/rdo rje smra bar yang dag bshad/_/rdo rje chos ni ston byed pa/_/rdo rje las su yang dag bshad/_/sems can 'dul bar byed pa'i mchog_/rdo rje srung bar yang dag bshad/_/sems can grol bar byed pa'i mchog_/rdo rje gnod sbyin 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]yang dag bshad/_/'khor ba'i zhags pa zad byed pa/_/rdo rje khu tshur yang dag bshad/_/byang chub mchog ni brtan par byed/_/rdo rje sems ma rdo rje chos/_/rin chen las kyi rdo rje ma/_/rdo rje rin chen chos chen po/_/las kyi gsang ba las 
[\[216a.2\]]byung ba/_/rdo rje lha mo lhag pa brgyad/_/pha rol phyin mchog lhag ma brgyad/_/chos ma shes rab pha rol phyin/_/las ma thabs kyi mchog yin no/_/pha rol phyin bcu dam pa ni/_/sa bcu dag tu yang dag bshad/_/dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer srung /_/
[\[216a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' zhes byar bshad/_/e ma'o ye shes e ma'o chos/_/e ma'o thar pa'i grong khyer mchog_/e ma'o rnam 'phrul 'khor lo ni/_/thub pa'i dbang phyug dag gis bstan/_/chos kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/mgon pos thar par dgod par 
[\[216a.4\]]mdzad/_/gang du sangs rgyas rgal gyur nas/_/sems can rnams kyang grol bar mdzad/_/'di ni chos kyi rang bzhin grub/_/'di chos rang bzhin shing rta ste/_/chos kyi rang bzhin snying po 'di/_/'di chos rang bzhin grong khyer yin/_/de kho na nyid mchog tu gsang 
[\[216a.5\]]ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje rtse mo las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa ste le'u dang po rdzogs so//_//dngos grub thams cad bla na med/_/de nas gsang ba bshad 
[\[216a.6\]]par bya/_/rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa ni/_/bdag nyid kyis ni sbyar bar bya/_/cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du/_/phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya/_/ci rigs par ni bcing bya yi/_/gzhan du myur du 'grub mi 'gyur/_/thal mo mnyam pa bcing bya ste/_/sdon la thal mo mnyam 
[\[216a.7\]]par bya/_/de nas rdo rje thal mo bcings/_/rdo rje bsdams pa bcing bar bya/_/sor mo rdo rje bsdams bcings nas/_/snying po brjod cing dral bar bya/_/de nas phyag rgya dbang du gyur/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/badzra ban+d+ha traT/_'di ni sngon du brjod 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]bya zhing /_/de nas phyag rgya yang dag bcing /_/gang gi drung du bcings pa ni/_/bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlabs/_/ma hA sa ma ya sa twA haM/_shes rab can gyis dbab pa bsam/_/bdag la sems dpa' dbab par bya/_/dam tshig phyag rgya bcings 
[\[216b.2\]]nas ni/_/snying po yang ni brjod par bya/_/a phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/_/yan lag kun la yongs su gnas/_/snying po brjod par bya ba ste/_/snying po 'di dag nyid yin no/_/sa ma yo ha~M/_de nas bdag nyid byin brlabs nas/_/rang lha yang dag 
[\[216b.3\]]rjes su dran/_/snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/_/snying po brjod par bya ba yin/_/sa ma ya satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/_phyag rgya bsgrub pa lhur len pa/_/de nas shes rab can gyis bsgrub/_/dam tshig sems dpa' chen po dag_/rnam pa bzhi ni bsgrub par bya/_/
[\[216b.4\]]de la 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i snying po ni/_ar+tha sid+d+hi/_badzra sid+d+hi/_badzra bIr+ya/_bud d+ha sid+d+hi/_de nas phyag rgya brtan par byed pa ni/_oM badzra sa twa sa ma ya/_ma nu pA la ya/_badz+wa satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha dr-i D+ho me b+ha wa/_su to Sh+yo me b+ha wa/_su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/_a nu 
[\[216b.5\]]rak+to me b+ha wa/_sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/_sarba karma su tsa me/_tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hUM/_ha ha ha ha hoH/_b+ha ga wAn sarba ta thA ga to badzra ma me muny+tsa badzrI b+ha wa ma hA sa ma ya satwa AH/_mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang /_/rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'drar 'gyur/_/phyag rgya 
[\[216b.6\]]thams cad 'grub 'gyur zhing /_/thams cad 'grub par the tshom med/_/de nas phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba ni thun mong yin no/_/phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni/_/tha mar bdag nyid dbang bskur bya/_/sor mo'i rtse mos phreng ba che/_/rnam bzhi yang na rnam pa 
[\[216b.7\]]gsum/_/oM badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa/_shes rab can gyis go cha bcing /_/ci nus par ni dbang bskur bya/_/snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/_/phyag rgya thams cad brtan par bya/_/badzra ka pa tse na baM/_gang nas byung ba der grol te/_/snying po 'di dag nyid kyis 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]ni/_/gnas de ru ni dgrol bar bya/_/gzhan du bya ba mi byed do/_/oM badzra muH/_mgon po thal mo mnyes bya zhing /_/rdo rje thal mo bcing bar bya/_/snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/_/rdo rje can kun mnyes par bya/_/badzra tu Sh+ya ho/_/cho ga 
[\[217a.2\]]'di yis dgrol bya ste/_/phyag rgya dgrol ba mchog yin no/_/phyag rgya thams cad brtan 'gyur na/_/rdo rje can ni mnyes par 'gyur/_/snga dro'i dus su nyin re zhing /_/shin tu bsdams shing gsang gyur pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa' ci 'dod bzlas/_/bzlas pa tsam 
[\[217a.3\]]gyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/badzra satwa/_gsang ba'i yi ge hU~M bzlas pas/_/rnam pa lnga ni mthong bar 'gyur/_/gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/zla ba gnyis pa yongs su bsgom/_/
[\[217a.4\]]bdag nyid sangs rgyas dang ldan pa/_/rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom par bya/_/mdor na rdo rje'i dbus su ni/_/yi ge hU~M ni sbyar bar bya/_/rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/yi ge hU~M ni bsgrub par bya/_/hU~M/_de ltar rnam pa bcu drug ni/_/phyag mtshan thams cad rab tu bsgom/_/
[\[217a.5\]]zla ba'i dbus su rab sbyor bas/_/bdag nyid thams cad skad cig 'grub/_/yang na yi ge sbyor bas ni/_/dbus su sbyor bas bsgrub par bya/_/zla ba yi ni sbyor ba yis/_/yi ge dza sogs 'grub mi 'gyur/_/yi ge ho dang sa dang ni/_/yi ge oM sogs rab sbyor bas/_/
[\[217a.6\]]zla ba la ni oM a tra~M/_/yi ge ha~M ni rab tu bsgrub/_/hrIHdang d+hIHdang ma~M paM raM/_/kaM haM hU~M baM bsgrub par bya/_/rdo rje'i tshig ni 'di dag gis/_/rdo rje bzlas pas 'grub par bya/_/bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/_/bcu drug bdag nyid rab sbyor bas/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[217a.7\]]rgyud du bsgrub bya zhing /_/zla ba'i dbus su bsgom par bya/_/de kho na bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ni/_nyi ma shar ba nas brtsams te/_/bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa/_/sangs rgyas kun la mchod par bya/_/rdo rje can rnams bzod par gsol/_/
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]phyag rgya thams cad bcing bya zhing /_/rdo rje thal mos mnyes par bya/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/_/thams cad byas nas gdon par bya/_/lan gsum dang ni lan bdun du/_/bskor ba dag kyang rab tu bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/_/mkhas 
[\[217b.2\]]pa yis ni dral bar bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/_/'khor lo'i dbus su steng du bcing /_/gang gis sems ni dag gyur pa/_/phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bcing /_/oM badzra muH/_snying po 'di ni brjod nas su/_/phyag rgya thams cad steng 
[\[217b.3\]]du bcing /_/sgo dang phyi rol mchod pa la/_/rdo rje'i mu ni brjod par bya/_/gsang ba 'di ni gsang ba che/_/rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa ni/_/shes rab can gyis kun mi bstan/_/ldom dang ldan pa mchog la sbyin/_/shin tu snod ldan pha rol la/_/de ni rig pa'i brtul 
[\[217b.4\]]zhugs te/_/lag pa g.yas su rdo rje ste/_/g.yon du dril bu sbyin par bya/_/rdo rje'i brtul zhugs gsang chen po/_/snying po 'di ni sbyin par bya/_/de byin snying gar 'dzin du gzhug_/thams cad bsgrub pa'i mchog yin no/_/'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/
[\[217b.5\]]rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na gnas/_/khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang /_/phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha twaM d+hA ra yA mi badzra satwa/_hi hi hi hi hU~M/_de nas thams cad mtshungs pa ru/_/phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor 
[\[217b.6\]]dgrol bar bya/_/badzra sa twa muH/_rdo rje slob dpon gyi bya ba rdzogs so//_//ji ltar cho gar rab ldan nyid/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che/_/de bzhin kun du bsgrub par bya/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che/_/kun mchog dbang 
[\[217b.7\]]phyug dam pa yis/_/rnal 'byor gyi ni rgyud bsdus pa/_/mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par gyur/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas mgon po che/_/spyod pa spyod phyir byung ba ste/_/chos kyi mgon po rnal 'byor che/_/rgyud rnams thams cad yang dag byung /_/sangs rgyas 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]med cing sems dpa' med/_/rnal 'byor rnal 'byor sgrub pa med/_/sa dang gsang ba mchog med de/_/de bzhin gdul ba'i don du byung /_/sangs rgyas mchog dang dam tshig mchog_/sems dpa' mchog gi bsgrub pa dang /_/gsang 
[\[218a.2\]]mchog sems dpa'i spyod pa mchog_/rdo rje rnal 'byor yang dag byung /_/yon tan mchog dran dam tshig rnams kyi mchog_/yon tan mchog dran dbu rgyan dam pa ste/_/grags chen dang ldan spyod pa mchog 'dzin pa/_/yon tan mchog ldan rnams kyi spyod pa 
[\[218a.3\]]mchog_/rdo rje chen po rab bsdams can/_/rnal 'byor chen po spyod pa chen po spyod/_/gsang ba chen po'i yon tan 'dzin mdzad pa/_/bde ba chen po yang dag 'byung ba stsol/_/yon tan mchog dran ldan pa cod pan mchog_/dam tshig tshogs mchog 'byung bas 
[\[218a.4\]]rgyan gyur pa/_/mi g.yo rab mchog mchog ster dri ma med/_/spyod mchog spyod pa'i mchog ste dri ma med/_/tshogs kyis bskor bar shin tu bzhad mdzad pa/_/gnod byed 'joms pa tra Ta tra Ta sgrogs/_/g.yo byed bskyed pa'i bzhad cing bzhad par mdzad/_/yon 
[\[218a.5\]]tan mchog drag tsa la tsa la pa/_/da ha da ha pa ya gnod mdzes 'joms/_/ha ra ha ra ha re ha re las mchog 'joms/_/gnas chen po ni stobs kyis grub mdzad pa/_/rigs mchog stobs kyis sgrol zhing sgrol mdzad pa/_/ha ha hA ha ha hA ha ha hA/_hi hi hI hi hi hI 
[\[218a.6\]]hi hi hI hi hi hI/_hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu/_rab mchog bdag nyid mkhas pas 'dren gyur pa/_/Ta Ta TI Ta Ta TI Ta Ta TI Ta Ta TI Ta Ta TI Ta Ta TI Ta Ta TI/_Tu Tu T+ya T+ya/_n+ya n+ya T+ya T+ya T+ya T+ya T+ya T+ya T+ya T+ya/_rgyan gyi spyod pa 'dar zhing 'dar bar mdzad/_/spyod pa spyod pa rnams kyi 
[\[218a.7\]]mchog tu gyur/_/spyod pa spyod byed rab mchog bdag nyid can/_/dam tshig rgyan te rigs drug mchod gyur pa/_/bdag po chen po 'phrog byed 'joms par mdzad/_/'phrog byed bsgrub pa rnams ni grub mdzad pa/_/mchog stsol mchog gi bdag nyid yang dag 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]byung /_/ta te Ta te bstan pa'i spyan mnga' ba/_/yi ge dza las rab byung mchog ste hUM ni dang po las sbyor ba/_/ho ho 'dod chags mchog ldan bud med bstan byed sa ni len pa rab ster ba/_/oM ni dang po bla med Ta Ta Ta Ti sa a ni gzi brjid rab 'bar ba/_/
[\[218b.2\]]traM traM rjes su chags pa'i rnal 'byor rdzogs byed ha ni bzhad pa yang dag sbyor/_/hrI ni chos can byed cing rab rno dri med hi ni rgyu yi 'khor lo che/_/haM dang raM ni mkha' dgyes smra ba'i sbyor ba 'ching byed a ni sna tshogs byed/_/haM ni bsrung ba tra ta 'ges byed ta Ta ta Ti sa hUM/_
[\[218b.3\]]ni za zhing 'cha'/_/baM ni dga' byed dga' ste tsha ta tsha ti Ta ni rab dga' byed/_/haM ni rdo rje bstan pa dang bcas bde brtan 'dod chags bcas pa dga' byed do/_/ho ni mgon po skye ba mchog gi rgyur gyur hri ni dga' ba bdag nyid can/_/hi ni spyod pa 'god byed dul 
[\[218b.4\]]spong mchog ste dus gsum mgon pos bskor gyur pa/_/gsang zhing gsang ba'i yon tan kun mchog dri med ho ni byang chub spyod pa mchog_/mchog gi mchog ste mchog stsol go 'phang mchog thob yi ge hUM ni stsol ba mchog_/nyon mongs dri ma thams cad 
[\[218b.5\]]'joms shing rab 'phro hUM gi mche ba'i mtshon char ldan/_/sna tshogs dga' ba mchog gis rnam par brgyan mdzes yi ge oM dang yang dag spel/_/he ho haM ni yid 'ong hUM gis rnam 'joms gnod mdzes nges 'joms bdag nyid can/_/bde mchog glu dang rol 
[\[218b.6\]]mo dang bcas pa/_/gzugs bzang dang ldan lha mo rnams kyis mchod/_/zla ba ltar dkar 'phro ba'i zhal mnga' ba/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i yon tan brtsegs pas mtshan/_/rin chen kun gyis rnam spras yid 'ong ba/_/rin chen dra ba'i bla res rnam par mdzes/_/rdo rje 
[\[218b.7\]]lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod cing mdzes/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ni 'jigs med pa/_/sa rnams kun gyis rnam sbyang dri med pa/_/byang chub spyod pa yongs rtogs bdag nyid can/_/chos mdzad yongs su rtogs pa'i zas dang ldan/_/bsod nams de yis 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]bskyed pa'i dga' ba che/_/tshangs pa'i gnas 'byor gru bzhir yang dag gnas/_/chos mchog [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du thig btab pas/_/'khor lo mu khyud rab tu mdzes bris pa/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni gtso bo bzhugs/_/ting 'dzin 
[\[219a.2\]]mchog rnams kha khyer gyis mdzes pa/_/gzungs kyi lha yi tshogs kyis mchod pa'i tshogs/_/thar pa'i theg pas byams pa'i sgo yis brgyan/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor la ni 'dren pa bzhugs/_/pha rol phyin pa btsun mo gar byed pa/_/sems can smin byed rnam 
[\[219a.3\]]par 'phrul la dga'/_/bsam gtan zas ldan mngon shes mchog gis brgyan/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'dren pa bzhugs/_/dkyil 'khor de ni gtso bo'i chos nyid can/_/chos nyid bstan pa'i snying po kun zhugs pa/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi tshogs 
[\[219a.4\]]'dus mdzes pa yis/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i gsang ba zhes byar bshad/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug dam pa che/_/gsang ba kun 'byung ting 'dzin yang dag gnas/_/de ni rnam snang thub pa'i chos nyid gzigs/_/gzungs dang dam tshig yang dag 
[\[219a.5\]]'byung ba mchog_/dga' ba'i chos bzhin rdo rje yang dag gnas/_/de ni rnam snang thub pa'i dbang phyug gtso/_/rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po nges par phyung /_/hUM/_shin tu dag ba'i chos nyid lta bur byung /_/sangs rgyas dbang phyug dam pa'i kun gyi mchog_/
[\[219a.6\]]rtse gcig dang bcas e ma'o dga' bo che/_/sangs rgyas sku yang bud med gzugs can te/_/sems can khams ni gdul phyir yang dag gnas/_/bud med gzugs kyang chos nyid dag pa ste/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gdung rgyud gnas gyur pa/_/rang gi rigs 
[\[219a.7\]]chen byung ba des byung mdzod/_/oM badzra d+hA twI shwa ri hUM/_oM badzra badzrI Ni hUM/_oM rat+na badzrI Ni hUM/_oM d+harma badzrI Ni hUM/_oM karma badzrI Ni hUM/_mchog gi dang po rmad byung gsang ba lnga/_/sangs rgyas lngas byas bud med gzugs can te/_/smad byung dang bcas dbang 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]phyug dam par gnas/_/rdo rje gsang chos nyid kyi gsang ba mchog_/'khor lo'i sbyor bas kyang ni bzhugs gyur pas/_/rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis ni shar du bzhugs/_/de ni rigs kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor brjod/_/re re zhing yang rnal 'byor mchog dang 
[\[219b.2\]]ldan/_/rnal 'byor 'khor lor yongs su bshad pa mchog_/de yis mi bskyod mchog tu byung ba yi/_/mchog tu gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor gsungs/_/oM badzra sa twa gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/_oM gu h+ya badzra sa twa/_aM ku sha hUM/_oM badzra gu h+ya rA ge rA ga ya hUM/_oM 
[\[219b.3\]]badzra gu h+ya sA d+hI shwa ri hUM/_rdo rje rin chen dkyil 'khor bstan gyur pa/_/de yis slar yang snying po bzhi gsungs so/_/oM badzra gu h+ya rat+na sa ma yaM hUM/_oM badzra gu h+ya pra b+ha hUM/_oM badzra d+h+wa dzA gra gu h+ya hUM/_oM badzra gu h+ya hA sa hUM/_rdo rje chos ni dbang phyug dam pa che/_/
[\[219b.4\]]de yis slar yang snying po bzhi gsungs so/_/oM badzra d+ha rma gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/_oM badzra g+ho Sha gu h+ya hUM/_oM badzra gu h+ya maN+Da le hUM/_oM badzra gu h+ya bA tsa sa ma ye hUM/_rdo rje las ni yongs su dag pas mchod/_/'khor lo thams cad la ni yongs gnas mdzes/_/chos 
[\[219b.5\]]mchog dbang phyug dam pa mchog gyur pa/_/de yis snying po bzhi ni gsungs par 'gyur/_/oM badzra gu h+ya karma sa ma ye hUM/_oM badzra gu h+ya ka ba tse hUM/_oM badzra gu h+ya daM Sh+T+ra d+hA ra Ni hUM/_oM badzra gu h+ya muSh+Ti hUM/_sngar bzhin 'khor lo'i grong khyer yongs gnas pa/_/
[\[219b.6\]]rdo rje'i gzugs su yongs gnas mdzes gyur pa/_/de nyid sangs rgyas sras te rdo rjer bcas/_/'on kyang da ltar bud med gzugs su sprul/_/de dag srid pa dag byed rab tu 'bar/_/thar pa'i grong du 'dod chags dag byed pa/_/rtog dang rnam par rtog pa bzlog 
[\[219b.7\]]pas dag_/chos la dga' zhing sku mchog 'byung 'gyur ba/_/bden dang mi bden rnam dag nyi shu dang /_/chos dang chos min dga' zhing dga' ba'i snod/_/byed dang byed min rdo rje tha dad gcig_/rdo rje bstan pa ho yis rab sbyong spyod/_/gsang 'byor rin chen 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]las byas chos grong ste/_/rnam 'phrul 'khor lo 'di ni ma pham don/_/rdo rje bla re'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/_/gsang dbang rdo rje chen po yis/_/thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer mdzad/_/sems can kun la phan don du/_/'khor lo 
[\[220a.2\]]lnga ni yang dag byung /_/de bzhin gshegs rigs zhes bya dang /_/mi phyed brtan par byed pa dang /_/byang chub spyod pa rab spyod mchog_/theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog_/gdul bya ji bzhin 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/_/gtso bo'i spyod pa ji 
[\[220a.3\]]bzhin lhan cig spyod/_/sems can gdul bya ma yin snod mchog min/_/mthu chen rnams ni dngos grub stsol mi mdzad/_/der ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin dag_/yon tan mang po yang dag 'byung /_/sems can rnams ni gdul bya'i phyir/_/rdo rje'i btsun mo yang dag 
[\[220a.4\]]byung /_/de nyid sangs rgyas sras bcas pa/_/de nyid 'khor lo'i grong khyer che/_/mchod pa sgo srung dang bcas pa/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag byung /_/mgon po rdo rje gsang dbang phyug_/rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad/_/rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje 
[\[220a.5\]]pha rol phyin pa mchog_/sngon ni ji ltar de bzhin phyis/_/de bzhin dbus su rab tu gnas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs yin te/_/gsang ba'i sbyor ba yang dag byung /_/rdo rje dbyings ni ji skad brjod/_/de nyid gsang ba zhes byar brjod/_/theg pa chen po mngon 
[\[220a.6\]]bsdus pa/_/rgyas par phyag rgya dang bcas par/_/'khor lo lnga yi dkyil 'khor mchog_/rgyas ba ru ni yang dag bshad/_/mdo sde'i gsang dbang rgyal po ni/_/theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las/_/gsang ba'i rgyud dang phyag rgyud dang /_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[220a.7\]]'khor lo zla ba dag_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ni/_/de dag rnam pa lnga ru bshad/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi snying rab mchog_/mdor na drug tu bshad pa yin/_/dam chos spyod pa dang ldan pa/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/_/nus pa ji 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]bzhin rigs pa bzhin/_/ji ltar spyod pa dkyil 'khor mchog_/ci rigs par ni tsho ga bzhin/_/mchog tu rmad 'byung bshad par bya/_/sngon la de bzhin gshegs rigs kyi/_/sems dpa' nga yis dbye bar bya/_/nga yis mdo sde gsang dbang 
[\[220b.2\]]bshad/_/gang du byis pa dag rmongs pa/_/rdo rje slob dpon skal ba che/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/_/gsang ba'i phyag rgya bcu drug ni/_/gsang ba nges par bslab par bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/rkang lag thal sbyar 
[\[220b.3\]]rdo rje ni/_/kha gyes pa ni bsgom bya zhing /_/rdo rje can yang chags par bya/_/stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/_/zla ba gcig tu yongs su bsdu/_/rdo rje'i dbang phyug lha mo nga /_/dbus ma la ni yongs su gzung /_/sgeg pa dang bcas 'gro bya zhing /_/rnam 
[\[220b.4\]]par 'phrul pas bzhin rmongs bya/_/bsgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/rdo rje can yang mnyes par bya/_/sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni/_/spyi bor thal mo sbyar bar bya/_/phyag rgya 'di ni bcings nas su/_/bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlab/_/bsgom 
[\[220b.5\]]pa'i phyag rgya 'di yis ni/_/sku yi phyag rgya rnam par bcing /_/lag ngar lcags kyur bskum bya zhing /_/bdag nyid yongs su bsgrub par bya/_/de bzhin bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje'i mda' ni kun du dgang /_/lag pas legs so zhes bya zhing /_/dpung 
[\[220b.6\]]pas bdag nyid go bgor bya/_/slar yang gsang ba bya ba ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/bdag nyid rdo rje gcig pu gnas/_/gsang ba lha mo'i dbang phyug mchog_/de bzhin lag ngar bkug bya zhing /_/spyi bor rdo rje bsam par bya/_/phyogs gcig 
[\[220b.7\]]tu ni nga 'dug ste/_/rdo rje gnyis kyi go cha bya/_/thams cad rdo rje'i lus yin te/_/rin chen mig ni yongs gsal ba/_/gdong dang tshig ni pad+ma dang /_/me tog kun 'dar bsgom par bya/_/byis pa bzhin du mig bskyod cing /_/bud med rgyu mtshan yang dag 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]bsgrub/_/smin ma bskyod cing khro gnyer gtsigs/_/khro bo'i lta bas mig gdangs pa/_/khro mo'i lta ba 'dod chags che/_/'dzum bcas mig ni btsum par bya/_/mig gdangs pa yi sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje'i lta bas bgrad par bya/_/
[\[221a.2\]]slar yang tshig ni rnam pa bzhi/_/ho ni rkan dang lkog ma la/_/dza ni lce yi dbus dang rtse/_/oM ni lkog ma mchu dag la/_/mchu dang mchu yi rtse la baM/_/de rnams gsang ba rab rgyas pa/_/bskrad dang spyos dang gcad pa dang /_/bcing ba rdo rje tshig gis bya/_/
[\[221a.3\]]de bzhin kho nar zla dbus na/_/phyag na rdo rje'i rang bdag nyid/_/rin chen chos dang de bzhin las/_/gsang ba'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya/_/cho ga thams cad rgyas pa ru/_/rdo rje gsang ba rjes su srung /_/ji ltar rnal 'byor yang dag gnas/_/de bzhin 
[\[221a.4\]]gsang mchog 'dzin pa gnas/_/rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bla na med/_/de nas yang dag bshad par bya/_/rdo rje'i rnal 'byor yang dag gnas/_/rdo rje phra mo bsgom par bya/_/dpa' bo rdo rje sems dpa' ni/_/phyi rol las grol yang dag gnas/_/langs sam 
[\[221a.5\]]yang na 'dug kyang rung /_/rdo rje'i rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam/_/theg pa chen po'i tshul dag pa/_/spyod pa chen po tshul chen po/_/bdag nyid chos chen rab bsgoms na/_/rdo rje'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/'du byed sdug bsngal chen po las/_/dga' 
[\[221a.6\]]ba'i spyod pas spro bar bya/_/snying rje chen pos dmigs nas ni/_/sems can btang snyoms dor mi bya/_/lce dang rkan la sbyar bya zhing /_/sna yi rtse mos bsgom par bya/_/rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/_/sna yi rtse mor de bzhin gnas/_/snying ga'i spyi bo ci nus 
[\[221a.7\]]par/_/sku ni thams cad yongs su spro/_/rdo rje phra mo'i bde reg pas/_/sems ni mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i mdun du rdo rje ste/_/rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje bsgoms pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje phra mo yongs su spro/_/rang gi lus kyi 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]mdun du ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs dbus su/_/rdo rje kun gyi dkyil 'khor ro/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/lte bar sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs/_/rdo rje phra mo bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje rnam bsgoms 
[\[221b.2\]]sems gang zhig_/gzugs med bstan du med pa dang /_/rmongs pa med cing 'jigs pa med/_/rdo rje phra mor 'dir brjod do/_/dngos po med cing rdzas med pas/_/snang ba med par rab tu bsgom/_/bdag med sems can med pa ru/_/rnal 'byor pas ni 
[\[221b.3\]]rnal 'byor bsgom/_/lus ni rdzas lnga'i bdag nyid can/_/khams bzhi la ni yang dag brten/_/skye mched bcu gnyis nyid dang ni/_/gzhan yang khams ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dag_/sha dang rus pa khrag nyid dang /_/rkang dang klad pas kun du khyab/_/sna tshogs 
[\[221b.4\]]rdzas kyis kun du khyab/_/bad kan mkhris pa la sogs tshogs/_/sna tshogs srin bu'i rigs kyis khyab/_/dri ngan mi gtsang 'byung ba ru/_/rang gi lus la so sor brtag_/sdug bsngal gsum ni kun 'byung bar/_/nyin dang mtshan mo rtag tu ni/_/lus ni rjes 
[\[221b.5\]]su dran pa bsgom/_/rang sems so sor brtag bya ste/_/gang zhig de ru yang dag byung /_/'gro ba med cing song ba med/_/de la 'pho ba yod ma yin/_/de la 'byung ba yod min na/_/gang las sems ni yang dag byung /_/yang dag ma yin kun rtog 'di/_/
[\[221b.6\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]bzhin sems ni rmongs par byed/_/sems med tsam yang yod ma yin/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]bzhin 'byung ba snang bar 'gyur/_/'di la gnas dang mtshan nyid dang /_/rab gnas 'byung ba yod ma yin/_/gzung bar dga' ba gti mug che/_/rdo rje phra mor brjod 
[\[221b.7\]]par bya/_/de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis/_/sems bsgom pa yi rnam pa bzhin/_/lus dang sems dang tshor ba dag_/phra mo'i rnam par bsgom par bya/_/sU k+Sh+ma badzra/_rdo rje reg pa'i mtshan ma yi/_/gnas ni yang dag shes par bya/_/de ni byung na spro bya ste/_/
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]stong gsum du ni yongs su spro/_/s+pha ra Na badzra/_reg pas sbyor ba bsdu bya ste/_/skrag cing rmongs par mi bya'o/_/gnas gsum du yang bsdu bya ste/_/blo yis so sor brtag par bya/_/saM ha ra Na badzra/_chos la dmigs pa'i sems 
[\[222a.2\]]nyid ni/_/rmongs shing gzhom par mi bya'o/_/rdo rje de ni brtan bya zhing /_/rdo rje phra mo reg par bya/_/badzra dr-i D+ha tiSh+Tha/_rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/_/rgyal po tshangs pa'i gtsug phud can/_/spyi bor sems dpa' bsgom bya zhing /_/sku ni thams cad 
[\[222a.3\]]yongs su spro/_/badzra At+ma ka_/dpral bar rdo rje rin chen ni/_/mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya/_/mtshan ma dag ni spro bya zhing /_/sems dpa' kun yang spro bar bya/_/badzra rat+na At+ma ka_/rdo rje chos ni shin tu dag_/sna yi rtse mor bsgom par bya/_/
[\[222a.4\]]de yi mtshan ma spro bya zhing /_/lus rnams kun yang spro bar bya/_/badzra pad+ma At+ma ka_/lus kun la ni yang dag khyab/_/chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su bsgom/_/de yi mtshan ma spro bya zhing /_/sems dpa' kun yang spro bar bya/_/sarba badzra At+ma ka/_sems 
[\[222a.5\]]dpa' de bzhin rin chen las/_/chos ni spyi bor bsgom par bya/_/de yi mtshan ma spro bya zhing /_/sku ni thams cad yongs su spro/_/sarba badzra/_sna la lcags kyu yang dag gnas/_/blo ldan mi yis bsam par bya/_/sangs rgyas thams cad gzhug bya zhing /_/
[\[222a.6\]]rang gi lus ni brtan par bya/_/snying ga 'dod chags gnas su ni/_/'dod chags rnam par dag pa bsam/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes bya ste/_/chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par 'gyur/_/legs so zhes pa gzung bya ste/_/spyi bor yang dag gnas pa'i 
[\[222a.7\]]mchog_/sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes bya zhing /_/chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su spro/_/hr-i da badzra aM ku sha_/tiSh+Tha badzra rA ga hr-i da ye A di badzra duSh+Ti/_snying gar rdo rje nyi ma ni/_/blo ldan mi yis bsgom par bya/_/'od kyi gzi brjid spro bya zhing /_/'jig rten 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]kun kyang spro bar bya/_/spyi bor 'khri shing 'od bcas pa/_/rgyal mtshan rtse mor rnam par bsam/_/rin chen char dag spro bya zhing /_/snod kyi sprin ni yang dag spro/_/bzhad pas bde ba bsams nas ni/_/shin tu sdug bsngal nges par sbyang /_/chos kyi char
