[\[222b.2\]]yang spro bya zhing /_/snang ba'i sprin yang spro bar bya/_/hr-i da ya badzra sUr+ya tiSh+Ta badzra d+hA dzA gre/_hr-i da ya badzra hA sa/_spyi bor rjes dran nas brtsams nas/_/ral gri gtso bo bsam par bya/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gcad bya zhing /_/sems dpa' thams cad spro bar 
[\[222b.3\]]bya/_/snying ga'i 'khor lo'i gnas su ni/_/chos kyi rgyu mthun bsgom par bya/_/nam mkha' kun du spro bya zhing /_/chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su spro/_/de yi rigs las byung ba'i sgra/_/shes rab can gyis lce rtser bsam/_/chos kyi tshig ni spro bya zhing /_/phyogs 
[\[222b.4\]]rnams kun du yongs su spro/_/hr-i da badzra g+ho Sha/_tiSh+Tha badzra hr-i da yaM/_phra be sha badzra wAk+t+ra/_spyi bor rjes dran nas brtsams te/_/mchod pa'i las ni rnam par bsam/_/mchod pa'i phyir ni rdo rje spro/_/phyogs rnams kun du spro bar bya/_/snying gar rdo rje go cha ni/_/shin tu 
[\[222b.5\]]mnyam par bzhag pas bsam/_/sdug bsngal kun las grol byed pa/_/go cha'i rnam par spro bar bya/_/spyi bo nas brtsams rkang mthil du/_/rdo rje bsdams pa bsam par bya/_/rdo rje'i snying po gzhug bya zhing /_/rdo rje'i rang bzhin thams cad spro/_/hr-i da badzra sha ba 
[\[222b.6\]]tse/_tiSh+Tha badzra yak+Sha badzra badzra muSh+Ti hr-i da yaM/_grogs dang grogs min ma lus pa/_/'byung po kun la byams pa ni/_/ma lus lus pa med pa ru/_/mnyam du khyab par spro bar bya/_/kye ma sems can 'di sdug bsngal/_/'gro ba lnga ru kun du 'khyams/_/
[\[222b.7\]]nyin dang mtshan du rab sbyor bas/_/snying rje nyid ni spro bar bya/_/nyin mtshan dge dang zhe sdang med/_/sems can dge ba don gnyer gang /_/rjes su yi rang bde chen po/_/sems can kun la yongs su spro/_/rgal bar dka' ba'i lam zhugs shing /_/sangs 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]rgyas byang chub la gnas pa/_/sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/_/blo chen ldan pas btang snyoms bzhag_/ma hA mai tri sA ra Na/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya s+pha ra Na/_sarba bud d+ha pra mo da s+pha ra Na/_ma ho pe k+Sha s+pha ra Na/_nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs 
[\[223a.2\]]gzhan du/_/rdo rje'i gzugs ni rnam par bsam/_/sems can mnyam par dmigs pa yis/_/nam mkha' kun du yongs su spro/_/badzra muSh+Ti b+ha ba/_rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/snying ga rdo rje chos nyid brtan/_/don rnams thams cad bsgom par bya/_/
[\[223a.3\]]chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su spro/_/sangs rgyas rjes dran nas brtsams te/_/rnam pa kun du sna tshogs nyid/_/de ni rang gi bdag nyid bsgom/_/chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su spro/_/rdo rje phra mo gzhan dang ldan/_/chos rnams thams cad rnam bsgom pa/_/myur 
[\[223a.4\]]du phyogs kun yongs su spro/_/snying gar rdo rje bsgom bya zhing /_/ma hA bo d+hi satwa bi shwa/_bud d+ha a nu smr-i ti bi shwa/_badzra pA Ni r+sha ya/_sa rU paM/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya/_/sa man+ta b+ha dra bi shwa/_zla ba'i dkyil 
[\[223a.5\]]'khor dbus gnas pa/_/bdag nyid rdo rje rnam par bsgom/_/badzra satwa/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/rdo rje bsnyems pa rol bcas pa/_/badzra satwa sa ma ya sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na pi shwa/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[223a.6\]]gzugs su rang bdag nyid/_/ta thA ga ta sa mo haM/_dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa/_/rdo rje slob dpon dag gis bya/_/gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/_/shes rab can gyis nges par bya/_/mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis ni/_/sangs rgyas rjes su 
[\[223a.7\]]dran pa bsam/_/ji bzhin mtshan gyis brgyan pa ru/_/rtag tu bdag nyid rnam par bsgom/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas de bzhin bdag_/bdag nyid sangs rgyas rtag tu bsgom/_/sangs rgyas gang yin de bdag nyid/_/sangs rgyas mang por yang dag gnas/_/
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]bdag ni de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs/_/rdo rje'i tshig ni yang dag brjod/_/dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa/_/sangs rgyas kun kyang mnyes par bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa mo haM/_rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/ji ltar sku mdog cho ga bzhin/_/dbang po 
[\[223b.2\]]gnyis ni yang dag gnas/_/de bzhin bdag ni rtag tu bsgom/_/oM badzra satwa sa mo haM/_bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs/_/rdo rje'i tshig ni yang dag brjod/_/dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/_/nges par 'jig rten pham par bya/_/khams kyi snying po 
[\[223b.3\]]gang yin dag_/de ni rdul bral dri med dag_/bdag ni rdo rje chos nyid du/_/rtag tu bsgom par bya ba yin/_/badzra d+harma sa mo haM/_bdag nyid rdo rje chos dang mtshungs/_/rdo rje'i tshig ni yang dag brjod/_/dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/_/rdo rje'i chos ni 
[\[223b.4\]]thob par 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i las ni bdag nyid de/_/tha dad med cing rtags gcig gis/_/sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod de/_/rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya/_/oM badzra karma sa mo haM/_bdag ni rdo rje las dang mtshungs/_/rdo rje'i tshig ni yang yang 
[\[223b.5\]]brjod/_/dbang po gnyis na snyoms 'jug pas/_/rdo rje las dang mtshungs par 'gyur/_/nga ni rdo rje rin chen nyid/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur ba/_/rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje rin chen mtshungs par 'gyur/_/oM badzra rat+na sa mo hUM/_bdag 
[\[223b.6\]]ni rdo rje rin chen mtshungs/_/rdo rje'i tshig ni yang yang brjod/_/rdo rje rin chen sbyor ba yis/_/sangs rgyas dbang bskur thob par 'gyur/_/gzugs gnyis 'brel pa ni dbang po gnyis zhes bya'o/_/bdag gi lus gang yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku gang yin 
[\[223b.7\]]pa gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/_/rdo rje gcig tu mos byas shing /_/sangs rgyas gzugs dang mtshungs pa ru/_/dbus su bdag nyid bsgom par bya/_/nam mkha' la ni 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]rdo rje bsgom/_/rdo rje gcig na yongs gsal ba/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/dbus su bdag nyid bsgom par bya/_/stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/_/rdo rje gcig ni yongs gsal bas/_/rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin 
[\[224a.2\]]gyis/_/dbus su bdag nyid bsgom par bya/_/ci nus par ni byin gyis brlab/_/rdo rje gcig ni rnam par bsgom/_/rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis/_rtag tu bdag ni bsgom par bya/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing /_/rin chen bdag nyid dbus su 
[\[224a.3\]]bsgom/_/kun du rdo rje'i dbus su ni/_/rtag tu bdag nyid las su bsgom/_/gtso bo gang dang gtso dag gis/_/sku mdog cha byad ji bzhin du/_/rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya/_/sems can dam pa de nyid thob/_/bdag gtso rdo rje'i tshig brjod cing /_/
[\[224a.4\]]rdo rje'i thugs su bsam par bya/_/dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur/_/yang ni bsgom pa'i sbyor ba ni/_/rang dbang du ni rab bshad bya/_/ji ltar yid las byung ba bzhin/_/rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam par bsgom/_/sna 
[\[224a.5\]]yi rtse mo la brten nas/_/sems kyi rgyun ni yang dag gnas/_/brgya las rtsa bdun lhag par ni/_/rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya/_/gal te bsgoms pas dngos grub 'dod/_/rdo rje bsgom pa bsgrub par bya/_/sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba yis/_/sgrub pa'i 
[\[224a.6\]]rnal 'byor yang dag gnas/_/sems dpa' rjes dran sbyor ba yis/_/gdon mi za bar nges par bya/_/gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid/_/bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgom par bya/_/sku mdog rnal 'byor ji bzhin du/_/ci rigs par ni sna tshogs bdag_/yang na rdo rje 
[\[224a.7\]]bsgom gtso bo/_/sgrub pa yang ni bsgom par bya/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar rnam 'phrul 'khor lo byung /_/e ma'o ngo mtshar spyod mchog dam pa bsgrub/_/kye ma'o ngo mtshar gsang mchog gnas thob pa/_/bdag ni rdo rje'i rnal 'byor sgom pa'i mchog_/rnal 'byor mkhas 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]pa'i sgrub pa ste/_/rnal 'byor rig pa sgrub byed pa/_/mchod pa bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya yis/_/de nas mchod pa rab bshad bya/_/thun bzhi dang ni kha dog bzhi/_/dus bzhi yi ni rab sbyor bas/_/sangs rgyas rnal 'byor rjod byed cing /_/sangs rgyas la ni mchod 
[\[224b.2\]]par bya/_/phyogs rnams kun du yongs spros shing /_/mchod pa rnams ni yongs spro zhing /_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pas/_/rtag tu yang dag rnal 'byor bsgom/_/mchod la spro ba yang dag sbyor/_/zhes bya chos ni yongs su spro/_/ting 'dzin sbyor ba la 
[\[224b.3\]]gnas te/_/chos kyi mchod pa rab tu bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa twa a nut+ta ra pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_rdo rje yi ni gsang sngags 'di/_/yang dang yang du rab tu bzlas/_/rdo rje dbyings ni sbyor ba yis/_/phyag rgya lnga ni rab tu bya/_/so sor rtogs dang mngon rtogs 
[\[224b.4\]]dang /_/rdo rje de bzhin rdo rje bdag_/rgyas par ru ni sngar bshad pa/_/rdo rje dbyings ni rab tu bskyed/_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ma lus pa/_/rang gi bdag nyid bsgoms nas su/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis/_/thub pa dbang phyug dag la dbul/_/rdo rje sems 
[\[224b.5\]]dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/thub la mchod pa phul nas ni/_/bdag ni mgon po rnam snang mdzad/_/bdag gis khams ni rnam par spros/_/byang chub sems ni spros nas su/_/thub pa'i dbang phyug dag la dbul/_/rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni/_/mchod pa 
[\[224b.6\]]thams cad rab tu bsgrub/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa/_a nut+ta ra pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur ba/_/rdo rje rin chen spros nas ni/_/bdag ni mgon po rnam snang mdzad/_/bdag gis khams ni rnam par spros/_/rdo rje'i sngags 
[\[224b.7\]]kyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/thub pa'i dbang phyug dag la dbul/_/rin chen mchod pa rab spro zhing /_/bsdams pa'i sbyor ba rab tu bsgrub/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta padzra rat+na a nut+ta ra pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du/_/rnam par snang mdzad ting 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]'dzin gyis/_/ji ltar sems dpa' phyung ba bzhin/_/de bzhin bdag ni bsgom par bya/_/rang bdag nyid ni bsgoms nas su/_/rmad 'byung chen po yongs spro zhing /_/sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/_/rdo rje'i sbyor bas 'grub par 
[\[225a.2\]]'gyur/_/de lta bu la snyoms zhugs te/_/rdo rje chos ni rab tu byung /_/phyogs rnams kun du spro bya zhing /_/sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma a nut+ta ra pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_ting 'dzin sbyor ba la gnas te/_/rdo rje las 
[\[225a.3\]]rnams spro nas ni/_/sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing /_/thams cad du ni spro bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma a nut+ta ra pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_mchod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/_/thun bzhi ru ni bsgom par bya/_/mchod pa'i cho gas 'grub 'gyur te/_/
[\[225a.4\]]sdig pa can yang 'grub par 'gyur/_/mchod pa'i las ni bla na med/_/ci rigs par ni rab bshad bya/_/chos kyi phyag rgya'i rgyal por ldan/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba A t+ma ni r+yA ta na pU dzA sA ra Na karma badzri a/_rdo rje sems dpa' rang 
[\[225a.5\]]bdag nyid/_/mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya/_/bdag nyid yang dang yang du ni/_/sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma ni r+yA ta na pU dzA s+pha ra Na karmA gre dza/_rdo rje lcags kyu rang bdag nyid/_/phyogs kun du ni spro bar bya/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[225a.6\]]thams cad dgug bya zhing /_/thub pa dag la dbul bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma ni r+yA ta na a nu rA ga pU dzA s+pha ra Na karma bANi hUM ho/_rdo rje'i rigs ni rjes chags par/_/rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya/_/chos rnams dag la mnyes byas shing /_/'di brjod 
[\[225a.7\]]nas ni spro bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma ni r+yA ta na sA d+hu kA ra pU dzA s+pha ra Na karma tuSh+Ti maM/_rdo rje rin chen rnal 'byor che/_/bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya/_/rin chen mchod pa bla na med/_/phyogs rnams kun du spro bar bya/_/oM namaHsarba ta thA ga ta kA ya a b+hi 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]She ka rah+ne b+h+yo badzra ma Ni oM/_sangs rgyas thams cad rgyal po che/_/byang chub snying por dbang bskur ba/_/sems kyang de ltar bsams nas ni/_/rdo rje rin chen nyid thob 'gyur/_/bdag nyid rdo rje gzi brjid ni/_/phyogs rnams kun du snang byed pa/_/sangs rgyas thams 
[\[225b.2\]]cad bskul bya zhing /_/mchod pa gzi brjid yongs su spro/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta sUr+ye b+h+yo/_badzra te dzo ni dz+wA la hrIH/_rdo rje rgyal mtshan kun du mthong /_/shes rab can gyis rgyal mtshan bsgreng /_/sangs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing /_/rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul 
[\[225b.3\]]bar bya/_/oM namaHsarba ta thA ga ta A shA pa ri pU ra Ni/_tsin+tA ma Ni d+h+wa dza a gre trAM/_grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis blta/_/rtag tu bdag nyid dga' bya zhing /_/rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya/_/oM namaHsarba ta thA ga ta 
[\[225b.4\]]ma hA prI ti bra mo d+yaka re b+h+yo badzra hA se hA/_sems can thams cad chos chen po/_/bdag ni chos chen dag pa ste/_/sangs rgyas thams cad rab bskul bya/_/sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kun/_/dkyil 'khor grong khyer thams cad gdab/_/shes rab can 
[\[225b.5\]]gyis bdag nyid bsam/_/rdo rje'i sngags kyis rab bskul bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma sa mA d+hi b+hi stu no mi ma hA d+harma a gre hrIH/_bdag ni shes rab ral gri rno/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/_/'khor lo'i yi ge rab tu bskor/_/mdo sde thams 
[\[225b.6\]]cad 'dzin pa yin/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA ni ra ha re tu no mi ma hA g+ho Sha nu ge d+h+waM/_sems can dag ni kun gyi tshig_/bdag ni sems dpa' smra ba brtan/_/rdo rje smra ba gsang ba'i bdag_/sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta san+d+hi b+hA 
[\[225b.7\]]Sha bud d+ha saM gI ti b+hirga ya stu no mi badzra wA tse rbaM/_bdag ni chos kyi 'khor lo skor/_/'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor sbyin byed pa/_/rdo rje'i 'khor lo yongs su bsngo/_/mchod pa thams cad yongs spro bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsakra ak+Sha ra pa ri brtI d+ha na sarba mu trAM te na ya stu no mi 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]sarba man+Dale hUM/_bdag ni rdo rje las rgyal po/_/phyogs rnams kun du rab mchod byed/_/me tog bdug pa la sogs dri/_/rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul bar bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hu pa me g+ha s+pha ra Na pU dzA karma ka ra ka ra/_cho ga bgos 
[\[226a.2\]]pa dang ldan pa/_/me tog mchod pa 'bul byed pa/_/bdag nyid rang nyid rgyal po ste/_/rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pra sa ra s+pha ra Na pU dzA karme ki ri ki ri/_bdag ni rdo rje gnod sbyin te/_/nyon mongs za byed chos sgron 'bar/_/phyogs 
[\[226a.3\]]rnams kun du spro bya zhing /_/snang ba 'bar ba yang dag spro/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo kadz+wal s+pha ra Na pU dzA karme b+ha ra b+ha ra/_rdo rje khu tshur yang dag nyid/_/dri yi snod dang yang dag ldan/_/phyogs rnams kun du spro bya zhing /_/char rnams kun gyis rab mchod byed/_/
[\[226a.4\]]oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha samu dra s+pha ra Na pU dzAkarma ku ru ku ru/_sems can kun don yang dag ldan/_/byang chub sems ni bskyed nas kyang /_/sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/_/mchod pa mchog ni rab bsgrub pa/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra At+ma nir+yA ta na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra 
[\[226a.5\]]s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri/_/yan lag kun gyis rab btud bya/_/sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing /_/phyogs rnams kun du spro bar bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya nir+yA ta na pUdzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_rdo rje sems dpa' 
[\[226a.6\]]bsdus pas ni/_/rdo rje rin chen bla na med/_/rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas/_/rdo rje las rnams byed par 'gyur/_/rdo rje yi ni glu 'di yis/_/rang bdag nyid ni dga' bar bya/_/sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing /_/rdo rje'i sngags kyang rab brjod bya/_/oM sarba 
[\[226a.7\]]ta thA ga ta bAka ni r+yA ta na pU dzA me g+has mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_phyogs rnams kun du mchod pa kun/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsam par bya/_/sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing /_/rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta nin+yA ta na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]ra Na sa ma ye hUM/_phul nas shes rab can gyis ni/_/rdo rje btsun mo'i ting 'dzin bsam/_/rdzas mchog ldan pas spro bya zhing /_/sangs rgyas kun la yongs su dbul/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra haR+Sha ra ti prI ti su kha a nut+ta ra pradz+nyA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa 
[\[226b.2\]]ma ye hUM/_cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/sangs rgyas kun la rab mchod bya/_/rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches/_/bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/dkyil 'khor thams cad kun bsdus pa/_/shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bsam/_/mchod pa'i tshogs ni 
[\[226b.3\]]bla med pas/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/_/rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/tshe dang mdog dang nad med nyid/_/phun tshogs bde ba thams cad 'thob/_/sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms pa/_/rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gang zhig gis/_/nyin re bzhin du mchod 
[\[226b.4\]]byas na/_/the tshom med par dngos grub kun/_/rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas thob 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i sngags kyis bslab pa dang /_/phyag rgya thams cad bsam par bya/_/theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las/_/phyag rgya shin tu rgyas par bshad/_/rdo rje las kyi [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]
[\[226b.5\]]bzhin/_/shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bslab/_/rdo rje dbyings dang rab mtshungs pa/_/slar yang rnal 'byor pa la bshad/_/'jig rten mgon po rdzu 'phrul che/_/rtag tu de bzhin mchod bya ba/_/gsang mchog rnal 'byor pa dag a/_/de las gzhan 
[\[226b.6\]]yang rab bshad bya/_/gang tshe sngon du sems bskyed pa/_/rdo rje sems ni bla na med/_/byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed nas/_/mchod pa'i bya ba bslab par bya/_/rdo rje slob dpon gyis sbyor ba/_/rdo rje dga' ba bsam par bya/_/'dod chags dga' ba bskyed 
[\[226b.7\]]nas ni/_/dga' ba'i mchod pa rab tu mchod/_/bdag nyid sangs rgyas bsgom bya zhing /_/bsgoms nas mchod pa rab tu bya/_/dga' ba chen po'i bde don du/_/rig pa'i lha mo rab 'brel pas/_/bud d+ha At+ma ko haM/_byang chub sems ni rab bskyed nas/_/
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes bsam bya/_/stobs dang mi 'jigs sogs rnams kyis/_/rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur bya/_/bud d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/_byang chub sems ni rab bskyed nas/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas zhes bsam bya/_/rdo rje yi 
[\[227a.2\]]ni glu blang zhing /_/bdag nyid mngon par mchod par bya/_/bud d+ha sid+d+hi ka ro mi/_byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed nas/_/bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes bsam bya/_/rdo rje gar gyis gar bya zhing /_/mkhas pas bdag nyid mchod par bya/_/bud d+ha pA dzA/_sku dang 
[\[227a.3\]]gsung thugs rdo rje mchog_/sbyor bas de bzhin phyag byas shing /_/sangs rgyas thams cad mchod byas nas/_/nges par phyag ni byas par 'gyur/_/pra Na mA mi/_rdo rje sku gsung thugs las byung /_/sangs rgyas bsod nams chen po kun/_/rjes su yi rang mchog 
[\[227a.4\]]bdag gis/_/myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/_/a nu mo de/_bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa/_/sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi/_/mchod pa kun gyis sangs rgyas nyid/_/mchod pa'i bdag nyid can gyis mchod/_/bud d+ha pUdzA/_rdo rje sku gsung 
[\[227a.5\]]thugs las byung /_/dge ba'i tshogs ni thams cad kun/_/yongs su bsngo ba'i mchod pa yis/_/sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs par 'gyur/_/ba ri NA maH/_chos kyi dbyings ni snying po che/_/'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pa/_/gzod nas dag pas skye ba med/_/
[\[227a.6\]]'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pad+ma mtshungs/_/sarba shud d+ha/_chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa/_/gzod nas zhi zhing gos pa med/_/blo bur dri mas gos pa med/_/yi ge a yis rnam par sbyangs/_/sa man+ta b+hadra/_e ma'o 'khor lo bde rang bzhin/_/chos kyi 'khor 
[\[227a.7\]]lo bla na med/_/chos rnams thams cad nyid kyi ni/_/'dir ni de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu/_/d+harma tsakra/_sgra brnyan dang ni mtshungs pa'i sgra/_/med de gzhan yang yod ma yin/_/chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin du/_/bdag ces bya ba 'ga' yang med/_/nis pra 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]pany+tsa/_sdon du blo dang ldan pas bsam/_/mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom bya zhing /_/de 'og rdo rje sna tshogs brjod/_/de nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i/_/rang gi lus ni phra rab dag_/rdo rje'i gzugs su bsgom bya zhing /_/
[\[227b.2\]]rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya/_/badzra kA ya/_sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i/_/yan lag rnam pa ji snyed pa'i/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing /_/thams cad yongs su spro bar bya/_/d+harma kA ya/_rang gi lus la gnas pa yi/_/phra rab rdul ni 
[\[227b.3\]]ji snyed pa/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya/_/don yod mchod pas rab mchod bya/_/satwa kA ya/_de bzhin lus ni thams cad kyi/_/rang gi phra rab rdul rnams ni/_/kun du bkod pa'i bsgom byas te/_/de ni sangs rgyas mchod par bshad/_/bud d+ha kA 
[\[227b.4\]]ya/_sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su mnyes/_/byang chub sems dpa' slob gang yin/_/shes rab can gyis mchog gsang bslab/_/sangs rgyas sa ni thob par 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/lus rnams thams cad yongs su bsdams/_/
[\[227b.5\]]yan lag kun la chags pa dang /_/ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pa yis/_/lus kun la ni yongs su chags/_/bde ba'i mchod pa rang byung ba/_/e ma'o rjes su chags mchod bdag_/rdo rje'i tshig ni brjod par bya/_/e ma'o yid 'ong e ma'o sdug_/e 
[\[227b.6\]]ma'o dga' ba rab tu mdzes/_/chos kyi chags pa 'dod chags che/_/gang la rab dga' chags 'gyur ba/_/chos dang gang zag bdag med pa/_/stong pa 'dod chags brjod par bya/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal spang bya zhing /_/sems can yang ni dor mi bya/_/sred 
[\[227b.7\]]pa dang ni chags dang spyod/_/rtog pa thams cad rnam par spang /_/ming dang gzugs ni shes bya zhing /_/mtshan nyid gsum ni rtogs par bya/_/theg chen bde ba zhes bya ba/_/'dod chags chags par rab brjod par/_/lta ba thams cad mi gzung zhing /_/srid pa'i 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]sdug bsngal rnam par spang /_/rtog dang rnam par rtog pa med/_/sdug bsngal thams cad nges par gcod/_/phung po dang ni skye mched khams/_/rtog pa rdul tsam yod ma yin/_/de la 'dus byas yod ma yin/_/'dus byas min pa nyid kyang 
[\[228a.2\]]med/_/skyes pa bud med dag nyid med/_/bdag dang sems can rnam rtog med/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug med/_/nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs spangs/_/de lta bu yi chags pa yis/_/gang du rdo rje can chags 'gyur/_/de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje 
[\[228a.3\]]sems dpa' rjes chags bya/_/kha yi'o ni mchog dag pa/_/gsang ba'i sbyor bas rab bsgrub bya/_/oM mahA su kha badzrasatwa/_rjes su chags pa'i cho ga bstan/_/dpung pa dam por bsdam bya zhing /_/'dod chags chags par bstan pa yis/_/rdo rje sems 
[\[228a.4\]]dpa' rab 'grub 'gyur/_/chags pa lnga las rnam grol bas/_/'dod la chags par mi bya zhing /_/blo ldan cho gas dga' ba yis/_/dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga yis/_/gsang ba thams cad rab bstan bya/_/
[\[228a.5\]]zhi ba thams cad mnyes bya zhing /_/rdo rje sems sogs mnyes par bya/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am/_/rdo rje can dang dga' chen po/_/'dod chags chen po 'di lta bus/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/oM sarba rAg ra ti su kha yA mi hUM/_
[\[228a.6\]]mchog tu gsang ba dam pa mchog_/gang zhig byas nas gsang ba kun/_/brtags nas 'grub bar 'gyur ba yin/_/lhag par shes rab can gyis bslab/_/mtshan ma brtan por rang 'grub nas/_/pad+ma'i lte bar 'dug bya zhing /_/mtshan ma mchod rten byin 
[\[228a.7\]]brlabs nas/_/rang bdag rdo rje mtshungs pa nyid/_/mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las/_/de yis shin tu gsang tshig gsungs/_/de ni dgongs pas gsungs pa ste/_/de ni dgongs par shes par bya/_/mtshan ma phyag mtshan zhes byar brjod/_/brtan 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]pa lhag pa nyid yin te/_/byang chub sems dpa'i phyag mtshan gang /_/mkhas pas lhag par bcang bar bya/_/pha rol phyin pa drug spyod pa/_/de yi mtshan mar rab tu bsgrags/_/gang phyir lhag par bstan par bya/_/blo ldan rnams kyi rigs 'byung 'dod/_/
[\[228b.2\]]mtshan ma brtan par rang gyur pa/_/de dag kho nar rab tu bsgrags/_/pha rol phyin drug spyod pa ni/_/rdo rje'i rigs su brjod par bya/_/byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/_/rdo rje mtshan mar 'di brjod bya/_/byang chub sems kyi rab sbyor bas/_/mtshan ma brtan por brjod 
[\[228b.3\]]par bya/_/pad+ma shes rab pha rol phyin/_/pad+ma'i lte bar 'dug bya ba/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi/_/rnal 'byor yang yang snyoms 'jug bya/_/b+ha ga ling ga'i sbyor ba ni/_/yang dang yang du bsten byas nas/_/g.yo dang nyes pa rnam spangs par/_/gdon mi 
[\[228b.4\]]za bar yang dag byung /_/shes rab dang ni byang chub sems/_/yang dang yang du bsten byas nas/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/_/byang chub gdon mi za bar 'gyur/_/bsgrub byar gyur pa'i chos 'di ni/_/lus can kun gyis rnyed par dka'/_/byang chub sems 
[\[228b.5\]]dad shes rab che/_/mchod rten mtshan ma'i rjes chags bya/_/rnal 'byor pas ni 'di bsgom dang /_/'di lta bu yi sgrub pa dang /_/spyod pa gsang ba 'di yis ni/_/rdo rje gsang ba nyid thob 'gyur/_/gsang ba dgongs pas bsdus pa yi/_/mdo las rgya cher ji skad 
[\[228b.6\]]gsungs/_/gsang ba'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/_/sems can thams cad rnam par bsgom/_/rdo rje gsang dbang bsdus pa yi/_/sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/_/gsang ba chen po bsgrubs na ni/_/skad cig de la rab 'grub 'gyur/_/kha cig nyin zhag de nyid 
[\[228b.7\]]la/_/yang dang yang du 'grub par 'gyur/_/nyi ma gnyis gsum bzhi lnga'am/_/drug dang bdun la the tshom med/_/mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang /_/ci rigs pa yi cho ga yis/_/lo gcig tu ni rab sbyor bas/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]rdo rje gsang ba'i cho ga rdzogs so//_//gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog_/rdo rje slob dpon cho ga ni/_/ji ltar rigs shing 'tsham pa ru/_/de nas yang dag bshad par bya/_/mdor na rig pa'i brtul zhugs ni/_/gong du dkyil 
[\[229a.2\]]'khor las bshad bzhin/_/ci ltar spro zhing ci nus par/_/sngon du mkhas pas bshad par bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa' skal ba che/_/rgyal po kun du khyab pa'i 'od/_/the tshom med par stong phrag brgya/_/rtag tu rdo rje'i tshig brjod bya/_/sems dpa'i rdo rje goms 
[\[229a.3\]]bya ste/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor goms byas te/_/chos rnams dag pa goms par bya/_/goms pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/nyon mongs rab spong nyon mongs bzlog par bya/_/rnal 'byor goms pa yis ni rnal 'byor bsgrub/_/bzlas pa tsam gyis dga' chen 
[\[229a.4\]]'grub 'gyur te/_/rnal 'byor cho gas bsgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur/_/yang na bzlas pa tsam nyid ni/_/bzlas pa mchog gis bzlas pa bya/_/rnal 'byor rig pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/dngos grub cho gas bzlas par bya/_/de ni rnal 'byor cho ga yis/_/skad cig 
[\[229a.5\]]sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor cho ga med par ni/_/'grub min 'di la the tshom med/_/rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi/_/gsang ba bzhi ni yang dag bshad/_/gsang ba chen po tshad med pa/_/bzhi po thams cad bsdus pa yin/_/bzlas brjod 
[\[229a.6\]]sbyin sreg cho ga dang /_/phyag rgya bcing ba lhur len pa/_/rig pa'i mchog gi cho ga ni/_/gsang ba bsdus pa dang po yin/_/gsang dang skem byed phur pas btab/_/brdeg pa dang ni mngon spyod dang /_/bgegs bskrad pa yi 'khrul 'khor 'di/_/gsang ba'i 
[\[229a.7\]]bsdus pa gnyis pa yin/_/go cha mi 'gyur bcing ba dang /_/spyod dang de bzhin rab bskyod dang /_/bdag nyid mngon par bsrung nyid dang /_/bgegs rnams bsal bar bya ba dang /_/rdzas 'phrog pa dang gzhom pa dang /_/gdug pa thams cad mngon bsrung 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]ba/_/rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi/_gsang ba bsdus pa gsum pa yin/_/sngags dang phyag rgyas mchod pa dang /_/de bzhin rig pa'i dngos grub nyid/_/bgegs rnams bsod nams nye bar bsdu/_/gsang ba bzhi par 'dod pa yin/_/gsang ba 
[\[229b.2\]]bzhi po thams cad ni/_/rang bzhin rdzu 'phrul kun bsdus pa/_/gsang ba mchog gi rgyud chen po/_/rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad/_/bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga ni/_/de ni rgyud mchog las bshad bya/_/gang phyir rig pa 'dzin kun gyi/_/bzlas brjod sbyin sreg bsgrub par bya/_/
[\[229b.3\]]bzlas brjod sbyor ba med par ni/_/rig pa'i dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur/_/sbyin sreg tsam ni med pa ru/_/rig pa'i bya ba byed mi 'gyur/_/gang gis rnal 'byor brtson 'gyur ba/_/bzlas pa'i rim pa bshad bya ba/_/rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi/_/snying po 'di ni 
[\[229b.4\]]gsang mchog yin/_/gsang ba'i rigs 'dir bzlas pa ni/_/rnal 'byor nyi shu yang dag byung /_/bzlas pa rnam pa nyi shu ni/_/gsang ba'i rgyud du nyi shu gcig_/gnas ngan len gyi bag chags rtogs/_/rtog pa bag chags zhes bya ste/_/bzlas pa tsam 
[\[229b.5\]]gyis thim 'gyur te/_/bzlas pa tsam gyis brjod par bya/_/nyes pa byas pa spong ba dang /_/de bzhin srid pa sbyong byed cing /_/rmad byung sna tshogs mthong 'gyur te/_/de bas bzlas pa brjod par bya/_/byang chub spyod pa 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/tshul mchog mthong 
[\[229b.6\]]bar 'gyur ba ste/_/de bas bzlas pa'i cho ga ni/_/rnal 'byor pas ni nges par bya/_/gsang ba chen po'i rgyud 'di ru/_/hU~M ni dang por rab tu bsgrags/_/gsang ba thams cad yang dag 'byung /_/hU~M gis bzlas pa brjod par bya/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo ni/_/
[\[229b.7\]]de bzhin yi ge hU~M rab mchog_/gsang ba thams cad 'khor lor bcas/_/rigs lnga dag dang bcas pa 'byung /_/'dir ni yi ge hU~M 'byung bar/_/sngon la shes rab can gyis brtag_/lce sogs thams cad khong stong du/_/lus kun la ni brtag par bya/_/
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]sbyor ba bcu las 'byung mi 'gyur/_/so las rnam pa kun du min/_/lce dang rtsa ba las kyang min/_/rkan las rnam pa kun du min/_/gnas gang las ni sbyor ba 'byung /_/snying ga nyid las 'byung mi 'gyur/_/khong stong dngos po thams cad la/_/
[\[230a.2\]]skye ba nyid ni snang mi 'gyur/_/yi ge hU~M gi sbyor ba yis/_/rang gi dbyings la yang dag sbyar/_/de nyid nyon mongs can mi 'gyur/_/kun gzhi sa bon thams cad pa/_/rkan dang lkog ma'i 'bad pa dang /_/lce yi tshogs las yang dag 'byung /_/yi ge hU~M gi sgra byung 
[\[230a.3\]]ba/_/de ni mi rtog yang dag byung /_/de ltar 'byung ba'i sbyar ba las/_/gnas kyi nyon mongs can mi 'gyur/_/tshig dang bcas pa'i ji bzhin sgra/_/'dus byas thams cad dor bar bya/_/ji bzhin hU~M gi sbyor ba las/_/chos rnams thams cad skye ba med/_/
[\[230a.4\]]rnam par rtog las yang dag byung /_/de ni mi rtog yang dag 'byung /_/'khor ba dag gi thog ma ni/_/ji ltar yang ni shes mi 'gyur/_/'dir ni skye ba mi snang zhing /_/'dus byas dag ni 'jig pa min/_/de bas yi ge hU~M tsam gyis/_/'dus byas so sor brtag par 
[\[230a.5\]]bya/_/dag cing mthar thug gnas nyid ni/_/hU~M gis kyang ni sbyar bar bya/_/rang bzhin med pa'i sgra 'di ni/_/yi ge hU~M las yang dag byung /_/'di la dngos po yod ma yin/_/rang bzhin med cing bdag med pa/_/de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyi/_/rang bzhin 
[\[230a.6\]]nyid ni yod ma yin/_/bdag gam sems can gso ba med/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spang /_/zag pa med cing 'dus byas min/_/gnas ni dag pa brtan par bya/_/dngos grub sbyor ba'i ye shes kyis/_/sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/de lta bu yi 
[\[230a.7\]]sbyor ba yis/_/yi ge hU~M ni yang dag 'byung /_/ye shes dag pa yang dag 'byung /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis brtan par bya/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po yang /_/'dir ni nye bar mi dmigs te/_/gang phyir dus gsum gshegs snying po/_/sangs rgyas snying po 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]tshogs su bshad/_/sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad dang /_/rdo rje can ni rgyal sras bcas/_/hU~M tsam gyi ni sbyor ba yis/_/kun du yang dag dgug par bya/_/yi ge sbyor ba gcig gis ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po brtan/_/gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/_/
[\[230b.2\]]'di ni rang gi sbyor bas gnas/_/chos kyi rgyu mthun bag chags ni/_/byang chub sems ni ma rtogs par/_/thog ma med ldan 'khor ba las/_/'byung ba cung zad yod ma yin/_/nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul ni/_/byang chub kyi ni 
[\[230b.3\]]sems med par/_/'gas kyang mya ngan 'da' mi nus/_/gal te sangs rgyas 'byung med na/_/nyan thos dag ni ga las byung /_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba yod min na/_/rang rgyal de ni 'byung mi 'gyur/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' med/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni gang 
[\[230b.4\]]las 'byung /_/gal te byang chub sems med na/_/de bas 'khor lo 'di kun ni/_/byang chub sems las yang dag byung /_/byang sems gsang ba chen po ni/_/yi ge hU~M las yang dag byung /_/sangs rgyas thams cad rab 'byung ba/_/yi ge hU~M gi snang bar 'gyur/_/gang phyir 
[\[230b.5\]]mtshan ldan gzugs can ni/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas rab 'byung ba/_/hU~M yig gi ni sbyor ba hU~M/_/de nyid rdo rje yang dag byung /_/chos dbyings rab sbyor rdo rje ni/_/de las yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de las rdo rje rnal 'byor che/_/rnal 'byor dbang phyug bla na med/_the tshom med par rnal 'byor kun/_/
[\[230b.6\]]yi ge hU~M gi sbyor bas 'grub/_/de lta bu yi bzlas pa yis/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/_/sngon ni bsngo ba mdzad pa ltar/_/rnal 'byor las byas dge ba bsngo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/_/rang gi sems kyang bsngo bar bya/_/rdo rje chen po mthar phyin byed/_/
[\[230b.7\]]byang chub sems kyis bsgral bar bya/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po che/_/sems can thams cad gos pa med/_/thams cad de bzhin gshegs snying po/_/nyon mongs 'dam gyis gos pa med/_/ji ltar zla ba bzhin du dag_/zla ba gang ba'i 'od gsal ba/_/rtag tu 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]yang dag rdzogs par gnas/_/rab tu dang ba 'grub par 'gyur/_/'di ni dang po chos ye shes/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yin/_/rtag tu dag par gnas pa ste/_/rang gi nyon mongs dag gis bsgribs/_/de bas rang sems rnam pa ni/_/zla ba gang 
[\[231a.2\]]bar shes par bya/_/bdag ni 'ga' yang yod ma yin/_/chos nyid 'di ni rgyal bas shes/_/ye shes zla ba gang ba min/_/gang phyir bdag ni yod ma yin/_/zla ba gang ba dang mtshungs rigs/_/gang phyir dag cing gos pa med/_/sangs rgyas ye shes skyon med pa/_/zla ba'i sbyor bas 
[\[231a.3\]]bsgom par bya/_/mthong nas shes rab can gyis bsam/_/'di yang gang gis rtogs par 'gyur/_/yun ring dus su sdug bsngal ba'i/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das/_/nyon mongs pa yi bag chags kun/_/de bzhin sbyong bar byed par bsam/_/byang chub 
[\[231a.4\]]sems ni sems chen po/_/nyon mongs thams cad 'joms byed pa/_/chos kyi rgyu mthun bag chags kyi/_/gnyen po ru ni byung ba yi/_/de bas 'di yi mthu yis ni/_/sangs rgyas ye shes rnam par spyod/_/gnas ngan len ni bag chags bcas/_/'dod pa'i 'dam gyis 
[\[231a.5\]]gos pa med/_/nyi ma lta bu'i sems chen po/_/nyon mongs rtsa ni rab sreg byed/_/zla ba lta bu'i sems chen po/_/dge ba'i sman ni rnam 'phel byed/_/sos ka'i tsha ba'i zla ba bzhin/_/nyi ma'i gdung ba rab sreg byed/_/shar bar gyur pas zhi bar byed/_/gdung ba 
[\[231a.6\]]thams cad zhi bar byed/_/nyon mongs gdung bas ma gdungs shing /_/mi shes pa la nyi ma nyid/_/byang chub sems ni zla ba che/_/nyon mongs gdung ba zhi byed par/_/kun nas nyon mongs bag chags bcas/_/gnas ngan len ni 'joms pa'i mchog_/khab len 
[\[231a.7\]]gyis ni lcags bzhin du/_/nyon mongs bag chags 'dren byed pa/_/rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor pas/_/byang chub sems de bsgom bar bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas de ru/_/slar yang zla ba rnam par bsgom/_/byang chub sems kyi mthu yis ni/_/bag 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]chags thams cad sreg byed pa/_/ye shes de ru 'byung 'gyur te/_/gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa spangs/_/rnam par mi rtog mtshungs med pa/_/bdag med de bzhin stong pa nyid/_/mi shes ri bo 'joms par byed/_/rdo rje dang mtshungs khong stong med/_/rdo rje'i rang bzhin 
[\[231b.2\]]snying po che/_/'jig tshogs ri bo brtan pa ni/_/rdo rje des ni 'joms par byed/_/de phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin bstan/_/de bas rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bas/_/zla ba'i dbus su zla ba mtshungs/_/zla ba gnyis dbus rdo rje yis/_/rdo rje'i ye shes brtan par bya/_/stong nyid de bzhin nyid 
[\[231b.3\]]de nyid/_/yang dag mtha' dang 'dus ma byas/_/skye ba med cing 'gag pa med/_/yi ge hU~M ni bsgom par bshad/_/chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa mchog_/nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa ni/_/zla ba'i dbus su bsgom par bya/_/hU~M gi sbyor ba de yis ni/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[231b.4\]]mchog ni bsgom par bya/_/lus kun la ni spro bya zhing /_/stong pa nyid dang mtshungs par spros/_/gzugs 'di nyid ni ming tsam ste/_/dngos po 'ga' yang yod ma yin/_/cha shas kyis ni rnam dpyad na/_/gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin/_/de dag phra rab rnam brtags 
[\[231b.5\]]kyang /_/phra rab zhes bya yod ma yin/_/'jig rten kun rdzob ces bya ste/_/dam pa'i don du yod ma yin/_/de lta bu yi rang bzhin du/_/gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin/_/gzugs de yod pa ma yin na/_/ji ltar yod ces bya ba yin/_/gal te gzugs de yod 
[\[231b.6\]]min na/_/ming yang de la yod ma yin/_/ming ni gang las yang dag byung /_/ming zhes bya ba ci 'dra bar/_/dngos zhes bya ba de dang mtshungs/_/ming des so sor brtags byas na/_/gnas gang zhig na rab tu gnas/_/dngos po gcig ni rnam phye na/_/ming ni mang po yang 
[\[231b.7\]]dag byung /_/re re yi ni dbye ba yis/_/sngar gyi ming ni nyams par 'gyur/_/de la ming ni yod min pa/_/ming ni yang dag 'byung ba med/_/gang la ming ni yod min na/_/ji ltar ming du brjod par bya/_/gang gis ming ni rab gnas pa/_/rnam pa kun du dmigs mi 'gyur/_/
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]gzugs ni nye bar mi dmigs la/_/de la gzugs ni ji ltar yod/_/'di ni yang dag mi rtog pa/_/bag chags dag gis kun nas dkris/_/gang du byis pa rab rmongs shing /_/mya ngan 'das pa thob mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar gzugs ni rnam bsgom pa/_/de 
[\[232a.2\]]bzhin tshor dang 'du shes dang /_/so so ru ni rnam phye na/_/de la snying po dmigs mi 'gyur/_/gang la snying po yod min pa/_/de la dngos po ji ltar yod/_/gang la dngos po mi dmigs pa/_/dam pa'i don ni ji ltar yod/_/gang zhig bstan par mi dmigs pa/_/de ni yod 
[\[232a.3\]]min dngos por med/_/chos rnams thams cad med pas na/_/skye ba med par brjod par bya/_/gang zhig ma skyes de yod min/_/gang zhig yod min ji ltar yod/_/mkhas pas chos rnams thams cad ni/_/'gag pa med ces bya bar brjod/_/skye ba med cing 'gag pa 
[\[232a.4\]]med/_/de ni gzod nas zhi bar 'dod/_/de phyir rang bzhin mya ngan 'das/_/'di ni stong pa nyid du brjod/_/'di ni yang dag de nyid che/_/yang dag mtha' ru brjod par bya/_/chos kyi dbyings ni snying po che/_/theg pa chen por brjod par bya/_/de ni snying po khong stong med/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[232a.5\]]bstan pa bla na med/_/lus kun la ni spro bya ste/_/bdag gi lus ni 'di lta bu/_/rdo rje'i bdag nyid ces bya gang /_/yi ge hU~M ni yongs su spro/_/bsgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/'di 'dra'i chos ni skye ba med/_/'dir yang 'byung ba 
[\[232a.6\]]snang ba med/_/hUM zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba yis/_/skye bar yang ni snang mi 'gyur/_/chos nyid dag pa bden pa gang /_/yang dag mtha' ni zag pa med/_/chos dbyings brtan pa dam pa ni/_/yi ge hU~M du 'dir rab bsgrags/_/rdo rje yi ge hU~M de nyid/_/chos dbyings 
[\[232a.7\]]stug po bstan pa yin/_/byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/_/rdo rje gang yin de nyid hU~M/_/chos nyid dag pa 'di lta bu/_/rdo rje ye shes yid 'ong ba/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che/_/rdo rje bdag gi lag na gnas/_/de bas rdo rje can kun gyi/_/gsang ba'i rnal 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]'byor thams cad dang /_/yi ge hU~M la sbyor ba yis/_/spros med rnal 'byor bsam par bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/_/snying ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya/_/zla ba de la zla ba gnyis/_/dbus su zla ba rab bsgom bya/_/zla ba'i dbus su rdo rje ni/_/mkhas pa 
[\[232b.2\]]yis ni bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje'i dbus su yi ge hU~M/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgom bya/_/de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/_/lus kun rab tu bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad bzlas pa yis/_/rdo rje'i bdag nyid myur du thob/_/hU~M rdo rje hU~M mdzad bsgom pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[232b.3\]]hU~M gi sbyor ba ji bzhin du/_/yi ge thams cad rnam par bsgom/_/sems dpa' chen po'i sbyor ba yis/_/yi ge bcu drug dag pa yin/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi yi ge hU~M/_/gang phyir sangs rgyas rigs byung ba/_/rdo rje can dag kun gyi hU~M/_/drag po gcod kun rab tu bsgom/_/
[\[232b.4\]]oM ni rin chen yang dag ldan/_/hrI ni pad+mar yang dag ldan/_/yi ge a ni sna tshogs brjod/_/de lta bur yang bsgom par bya/_/hU~M ni sangs rgyas rdo rje dag_/trA~M ni rdo rje snying po ste/_/yi ge hrIH_ni rdo rje bstan/_/sna tshogs rdo rje yi ge a/_/hU~M ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/_/rdo rje rgyal 
[\[232b.5\]]po yi ge dza/_/ho ni rdo rje chags pa ste/_/rdo rje legs pa yi ge sa/_/oM ni rdo rje rin chen te/_/rdo rje gzi brjid yi ge a/_/trA~M ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan te/_/rdo rje bzhad pa yi ge ha/_/yi ge hrIHni rdo rje spyan/_/rdo rje rnon po yig d+hoM/_/oM ni rdo rje 'khor lo ste/_/rdo rje smra ba yi ge sa/_/
[\[232b.6\]]yi ge kaM ni rdo rje las/_/rdo rje bsrung ba yi ge ha~M/_/hUM ni rdo rje gnod sbyin te/_/rdo rje khu tshur yi ge pa~M/_/gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid/_/snying gar de bzhin bsgom par bya/_/yi ge hU~M ni rnal 'byor pa/_/de ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis/_/
[\[232b.7\]]gzugs gcig rnam par spro bar bya/_/yi ge hU~M bzlas tsam gyis ni/_/sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya/_/bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugs su ste/_/rdo rje gcig ni rnam par bsgom/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]dbus kyi lte bar ni/_/de ru yi ge hU~M bsgom bya/_/theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/_/ji bzhin mdo yi rjes 'brangs nas/_/ji bzhin rgyal po skyes bur bcas/_/yi ge hU~M ni dang por bcas/_/de bzhin yid kun rnal 'byor pas/_/snying ga ru ni bsgom 
[\[233a.2\]]par bya/_/bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugs su ste/_/dbus su yi ge hU~M bsgom bya/_/de bzhin yi ge thams cad kyang /_/rnal 'byor pas ni snying gar bsgom/_/zla ba'i gzugs las yang dag gnas/_/bdag nyid yongs su bsgom bya zhing /_/rigs kyi lha yi sbyor ba yis/_/rang 
[\[233a.3\]]bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa' gang 'ga' zhig_/gang dang gang zhig mngon 'dod pa/_/rigs pa de ni snying gar bsgom/_/yi ge hU~M ni dang por sbyar/_/gang phyir de las rtogs pa 'byung /_/de bzhin yid kun rnal 'byor pas/_/snying gar bsgoms pas bsgom 
[\[233a.4\]]par bya/_/yang na nam mkha'i sbyor ba yis/_/yi ge hUM ni dang por sbyar/_/nam mkha'i rang bzhin bsgom bya zhing /_/yi ge dag ni thams cad sbyar/_/yang na nam mkha'i zla dbus su/_/gnas pa'i yi ge hU~M bsgom bya/_/bdag nyid rigs kyi lha mor bsam/_/skad cig 
[\[233a.5\]]de la rab 'grub 'gyur/_/hU~M ni ji skad bstan pa bzhin/_/sngags kun rab tu bsgom par bya/_/rig pa kun gyi gsang ba ni/_/rgyud kun yang dag bsdus pa ste/_/bzlas pa'i gsang ba des spangs pa/_/gsang ba 'di ni rnam pa drug_/rig 'dzin rnams kyi snying po dang /_/rnal 
[\[233a.6\]]'byor rgyud ni bsdus pa dang /_/don yod shin tu rmad 'byung ba/_/gsang ba las kyang mchog gsang bshad/_/bzlas brjod tsam gyi sbyor ba yis/_/lta ba'i ri bo 'joms par 'gyur/_/rang gi snying ga'i dbus su ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 
[\[233a.7\]]'khor de dbus su/_/zla ba gnyis pa bsgom par bya/_/dbugs 'byung rngub pa gang yin pa/_/rdo rje yi ge hU~M du bsgom/_/me bsrubs pa yi sbyor ba yis/_/steng dang 'og tu rgyu bar bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag gnas/_/dbus su yi ge hrIHbsgom bya/_/steng 'og 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]'gro ba bsgom par bya/_/yi ge hUM ni de sbyar nas/_/ji ltar shing skam gtsub stan pa/_/gtsub shing yang dag sbyor gnas su/_/rtsol ba byas pa tsam gyis ni/_/skad cig gis ni me 'byung bzhin/_/yi ge a ni gtsub stan te/_/yi ge hUM ni gtsub shing yin/_/rgyu 
[\[233b.2\]]ba'i rnal 'byor pa yis ni/_/skad cig gis ni ye shes skye/_/shes rab pha rol phyin ye shes/_/yi ge hrIHru 'dir brjod bya/_/byang chub sems ni yi ge hU~M/_/me yi sbyor bas bsrub par bya/_/bsrub pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/ye shes dam pa skye bar 'gyur/_/
[\[233b.3\]]rdo rje de ni bsreg bya ste/_/rdo rje ye shes bla na med/_/b+ha ga sangs rgyas kun shes rab/_/ling ga rdo rje brjod par bya/_/byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/_/b+ha ga ling gar rab tu bsgrub/_/b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas ni/_/mdo sde gsang dbang las gsungs so/_/b+ha ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/mkhas pas 
[\[233b.4\]]ling ga gzhug par bya/_/gsang ba gzi brjid chen po 'di/_/mi bsrub pa yi sbyor ba yis/_/'ga' zhig gis ni 'di bsgrubs na/_/skad cig gis ni ye shes skye/_/bzlas pa gsang ba rnam pa bdun rdzogs so//_//sbas pa gsang ba rgyud chen po/_/'di nyid rnal 
[\[233b.5\]]'byor kun du bsdus/_/'di nyid chen po bsdus pa ni/_/de ni gzhan yang rab bshad bya/_/zla ba gang ba yang dag gnas/_/bdag nyid rdo rje bsgom par bya/_/de yi dbus su rdo rje ste/_/rdo rje rigs kyi bzlas pa bya/_/zla ba gang ba la gnas par/_/bdag nyid pad+mar bsgom 
[\[233b.6\]]par bya/_/de yi dbus su pad+ma de/_/pad+ma'i rigs kun bzlas par bya/_/zla ba gang ba la gnas par/_/bdag nyid nor bur bsgom par bya/_/de yi dbus su rin chen dang /_/rin chen rigs kyi bzlas par bya/_/bdag nyid rdo rje gcig pu ni/_/rdo rje non por rab tu bsgom/_/
[\[233b.7\]]de yi las kyi rigs mchog la/_/las kyi rigs kun bzlas par bya/_/sangs rgyas rjes dran nas brtsams te/_/sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par bsgom/_/de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni/_/sangs rgyas rigs kun bzlas par bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs chen po/_/
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]sems dpa' gcig ni rnam par bsgom/_/de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni/_/rdo rje rigs kun bzlas par bya/_/pad+ma'i sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs/_/'jig rten dbang phyug rnam par bsgom/_/de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni/_/pad+ma'i rigs kun 
[\[234a.2\]]bzlas par bya/_/nor bu rin chen skal ba che/_/rdo rje rin chen rnam par bsgom/_/de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni/_/rin chen rigs kun bzlas par bya/_/sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las/_/sems dpa'i gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/_/de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni/_/las 
[\[234a.3\]]kyi rigs kun bzlas par bya/_/bden pa dam tshig mchog gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas thams cad rab grol byed/_/thos pa tsam gyis thabs chen po/_/yang na snying gar rdor rang bzhin/_/sna tshogs bdag po bzlas brjod mtshungs/_/shes rab can gyis gang bsams pa/_/phun 
[\[234a.4\]]sum tshogs kun bde bar thob/_/gsang ba yang dag bshad par bya/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya/_/de yi thugs kar 'jug bya zhing /_/yid kyis thams cad bcug nas ni/_/de yi sku ni mtshungs bar spro/_/de yi thugs ka'i dbus su ni/_/rdo rje'i rigs 
[\[234a.5\]]ni rab tu bshad/_/ji bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brangs nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spro/_/de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas na/_/the tshom med par sangs rgyas kun/_/skad cig de nyid kyis 'grub 'gyur/_/rdo rje'i mda' ni 
[\[234a.6\]]zhi ba 'di/_/'di lta bu yi gzugs bsgom bya/_/de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni/_/rdo rje'i gar dang mtshungs par bsgom/_/de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje'i rigs can thams cad ni/_/the tshom med par dngos grub kun/_/ye shes bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur/_/
[\[234a.7\]]pad+ma'i sems dpa' bsgom bya zhing /_/thugs kar ji bzhin 'jug par bya/_/sna tshogs thabs ni rab bsgoms na/_/pad+ma'i rigs can 'grub par 'gyur/_/rdo rje rin chen bsgom bya zhing /_/thugs kar ji bzhin 'jug par bya/_/rin chen mdzod ni bcug nas su/_/
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]yang dang yang du spro bar bya/_/de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje rin chen dga' chen po/_/the tshom med par dngos grub kun/_/bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/_/rdo rje las su rnam par bsam/_/de yi thugs kar zhugs 
[\[234b.2\]]nas ni/_/sna tshogs rnam 'phrul spro bar bya/_/de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/_/sna tshogs mdzod ni rab spros nas/_/the tshom med par dngos grub kun/_/bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/shin tu gsang ba 'di lnga ni/_/bzlas pa gsang ba bla na med/_/de lta bu yi sbyor 
[\[234b.3\]]ba yis/_/sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/bzlas pa'i cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di/_/rgyud kyi snying po kun bsdus shing /_/nyon mongs thams cad rab 'joms la/_/rig pa 'dzin pas bzlas par bya/_/bzlas pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/rig pa'i brtul zhugs nges par 
[\[234b.4\]]blang /_/gal te 'di ni dngos grub 'dod/_/rnal 'byor pa yis brtul zhugs bya/_/bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga ni/_/rnal 'byor mchog tu brtson par bya/_/theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa/_/bye ba gsum ni yongs su bzla/_/bye ba gsum ni bzlas byas nas/_/sgrub 
[\[234b.5\]]pa dag ni brtsam par bya/_/byang chub sems ni dga' chen po/_/shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/sems can gcig gis yang dag bri/_/gang phyir rgyal po mchog gsang dbang /_/rdo rje mchog ni rab ster byed/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi 
[\[234b.6\]]sbyor ba yis/_/de ni sngon du yang dag brtsam/_/shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri/_/khru ni bcu par yang dag bri/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhes ni rnam par brgyan/_/ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan/_/dar gyi chun pos rnam par brgyan/_/thig bzhi dang 
[\[234b.7\]]ni yang dag ldan/_/kha khyer dag gis shin tu spras/_/rin chen dra bas yongs su bres/_/gser skud dril bu g.yer khas brgyan/_/sgo khyud dang ni mtshams rnams su/_/rdo rje 'ching bas rab tu bcing /_/rdo rje rin chen rab tu bkod/_/rdo rje thig gis thig btab pa/_/
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]dri yi sbyor ba'i cho ga dang /_/phur bus bgegs ni bsal bya zhing /_/tshon rtsi lnga yi srad bu ni/_/rdo rje gsang bas bsrung bar bya/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/_/ji skad sngar bshad de nyid ni/_/rdo rje gsang ba yongs su 
[\[235a.2\]]bkod/_/rdo rje gsang ba yongs bkod nas/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/_/rdo rje 'khor lo rab mdzes la/_/'khor lo'i dbus su rab tu dgod/_/rdo rje chags pa yongs su dgod/_/tshon rtsi lnga ni rab tu dbye/_/ji skad gsang rgyud las gsungs bzhin/_/dkar 
[\[235a.3\]]po sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba/_/sngon po ser po shin tu 'bar/_/btsod sogs dang ni rab tu ldan/_/'od zer dmar po sna tshogs ldan/_/sna tshogs tshon rtsis bri bar bya/_/'od zer dmar po sna tshogs 'bar/_/rdo rje 'khor lo yongs bkod nas/_/zla ba gang bar rab bkod do/_/
[\[235a.4\]]'khor lo thams cad yongs su bzung /_/kha dog ji bzhin rigs pa bzhin/_/ji ltar mdzes shing shin tu dkar/_/ji bzhin zla ba nya ba mtshungs/_/zla ba gang ba yang dag bri/_/zla ba gang ba'i dbus su ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bri/_/gang gis mtshan ni bzung 
[\[235a.5\]]ba yis/_/skad cig gis ni sdig las grol/_/'dzum pa dang bcas zla ba'i mdog_/shin tu chags pa dga' chen po/_/myur du rdo rje'i tshig brjod de/_/rdo rje nyid kyi snying po yin/_/oM ma hA su kha badzra satwa hU~M dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/_rdo rje'i glu ni blang bya zhing /_/byang chub 
[\[235a.6\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa che/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster byed/_/'dod pa'i chags pa yang dag dran/_/thams cad rjes chags bde ba thugs mchog mnga'/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba mchog_/kye khyod bde chen bstan pas 'phel mdzad pa/_/rab tu myur 
[\[235a.7\]]du sgrub pa 'grub par mdzod/_/rdo rje'i glu ni de lta bu/_/blang zhing 'khor lo spyan drang bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/rjes su chags shing rab 'grub 'gyur/_/sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag gnas/_/rdo rje bsnyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog_/rol pa dang 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]bcas spyan g.yo ba/_/bsnyems tshul chen po dga' ba che/_/g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje ni/_/thugs ka ru ni 'dzin pa'i mchog_/g.yon pa dril bu yang dag ldan/_/slar yang bsnyems tshul dang bcas pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje che/_/rgyal po 
[\[235b.2\]]chen po thub pa che/_/spyod pa chen po theg pa che/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/_/rin chen chen po rdo rje che/_/rgyal mtshan chen po dran pa che/_/sangs rgyas dran pa rdo rje che/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/_/'dod chags chen po bde ba che/_/
[\[235b.3\]]bde ba chen po bla na med/_/sa dang pha rol phyin bde bar/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/_/shes rab chen po rdo rje che/_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad las byung ba/_/byang chub sems ni rdo rje che/_/rdo rje sems ni rdo rje che/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/_/rdo rje chen po chags 
[\[235b.4\]]pa che/_/rgyal po chen po thub pa che/_/don yod rgyal po rdo rje mchog_/rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/_/chos kyi srid pa 'khor lo che/_/smra ba'i las ni bla na med/_/bsrung zhing bsrung ba drag po che/_/rdo rje khu tshur bdag grub mdzod/_/rdo rje yi ni glu 'di yis/_/de 
[\[235b.5\]]nyid mchog tu bskul nas ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom bya zhing /_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/mkhas pas dkyil 'khor dgod par bya/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[235b.6\]]snga ma dang mtshungs par/_/dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag bri/_/de nas rdo rje bltas nas ni/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad gdon par bya/_/chos kyi rig pa 'dzin pa ni/_/dbab dang gzhug pa la sogs pa/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis/_/las rnams thams cad yang dag bya/_/
[\[235b.7\]]bum pa la sogs yo byad dang /_/spos dang me tog la sogs mchog_/rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis/_/las rnams thams cad yang dag bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i rig pa yis/_/bum pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/_/de ni zhabs kyi drung bzhag na/_/rdo rje bdud 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]rtsi'i chu ru 'gyur/_/rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis/_/cho ga ji bzhin 'jug bya zhing /_/rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches/_/bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur bya/_/hU~M gis yang dag zhugs nas ni/_/rdo rje mchod pas yang dag mchod/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i 
[\[236a.2\]]ting 'dzin gyis/_/ci rigs par ni bsgrub par bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang bar gnas/_/phyag rgya chen po yongs su gzung /_/rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/rang bdag nyid ni bsgrub par bya/_/de nas gsang ba phyag rgya che/_/skad cig re re bsgrub par 
[\[236a.3\]]bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/brtan par 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bsgrubs nas ni/_/shin tu bstan pa bla med pa/_/rjes chags sems dpa' chen po ni/_/skad cig gis ni bsgrub par bya/_/de 'dra'i mchog tu gsang ba mthar 
[\[236a.4\]]phyin pa/_/sems dpa' rgyal chen yongs su dag pa mchog_/dag pa'i tshul 'di cung zad mtshungs pa med/_/rjes chags 'dod chags yongs su dag pa mchog_/rdo rje rgyal mchog ra ba dag dri ma med/_/gsang ba las byung 'khor lo dam pa 'dzin/_/rig pa'i 
[\[236a.5\]]gsang sngags tshul 'di byang chub byed/_/snying rje dang ldan spyod pa spyod byed pa/_/de bzhin rab 'jigs sdug bsngal chen po'i pha rol phyin gyur pa/_/mchog tu mkhas shing phra la rgyud dang rgyud dag las byung ba/_/de ru srid pa dag gi dra ba chen po gcod mdzad pa/_/gsang 
[\[236a.6\]]sngags 'khor lo las byung gsang ba de 'drar bshad/_/gsang rigs mchog tu byung ba'i 'khor lo ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dgongs pa gcig_/sras kyi gtso bo dbang sgyur rgyal po ste/_/de yis thar pa'i grong khyer rab tu bshad/_/gsang ba rnal 'byor chen 
[\[236a.7\]]po de kho na nyid dam pa mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rtse mo las/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdo sde gsang ba'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa ste le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//de nas rnal 'byor 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]gsang ba che/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kun 'dus pa/_/chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa'i mchog_/nam mkha' sna tshogs dngos ldan pa/_/ri dbang rgyal bo chen po ste/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa sprul/_/rdo rje dbang po chen po'i gnas/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[236b.2\]]yang dag 'dus/_/rdo rje rgyal po rtse mo ste/_/gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag byung /_/rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che/_/chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mtshungs/_/rdo rje kun gyis rab mdzes pa/_/mchog tu gyur ba'i gnas de ru/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che/_/rnal 
[\[236b.3\]]'byor pa ni mi gsung bzhugs/_/sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag bzhugs/_/gtso bos chos kun dbang du 'gyur/_/rol bcas rdo rje bsnyems tshul ldan/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas gcig ste/_/chos chen po yi rnal 'byor mchog_/
[\[236b.4\]]sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni/_/thub pa'i dbang phyug la gsol btab/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dga' chen po/_/sems dpa' byang sems las byung ba/_/rang gi rigs 'byung bshad du gsol/_/rdo rje 'chang ba rgyal po ste/_/
[\[236b.5\]]rgyud kyi snying po gsang ba che/_/gsang ba chen po rigs kyi dbang /_/mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po ste/_/theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa/_/zhi bas byang chub 'grub 'gyur te/_/thams cad yang dag bsdus pa min/_/gtum po thams cad rab 'joms pa/_/rang 
[\[236b.6\]]rigs rtag tu bshad du gsol/_/rdo rje 'chang ba rgyal po ste/_/kun du mi gsung bzhugs par gyur/_/mi gsung gsang ba ma gsungs te/_/zhi ba'i bde ba la bzhugs gyur/_/gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa mchog_/sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs/_/
[\[236b.7\]]rtog cing gzigs par mi mdzad de/_/gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bzhugs par gyur/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni/_/chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mdzad/_/sangs rgyas gcig bzhin yang dag 'gyur/_/don yod grub pa bla na med/_/sangs rgyas thams 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]cad rnal 'byor che/_/gsang ba kun las yang dag byung /_/rdo rje'i sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/rdo rje can la bskul ba gsungs/_/o~M badzra sa twa uta tiSh+Tha/_rdo rje bskul ba gsungs pa na/_/chos dbyings sangs rgyas gcig pu nyid/_/gsang 
[\[237a.2\]]ba'i rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gyis/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bzhengs par gyur/_/thub pas mgon rnams la btud nas/_/tshig ni 'di skad gsungs par gyur/_/rnam pa kun du ci zhig bgyi/_/bdag la sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs/_/phyag na rdo rje brtan pa la/_/de nas 
[\[237a.3\]]sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs/_/gsang ba rdo rje rigs zhes pa/_/rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas/_/rdo rje dbang po'i gnas snang byed/_/rab tu btud nas tshig gsungs pa/_/mgon po rnal 'byor gzigs su 
[\[237a.4\]]gsol/_/bdag gi snod dang ldan pa'i mchog_/'di ni sems can 'ga' yang med/_/gang phyir mu stegs la chags shing /_/skye dgu lta ba'i dri mas khyab/_/sems can 'di dag gdul bya min/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi snod ma yin/_/log pa'i lam du yang dag 
[\[237a.5\]]zhugs/_/mun pa stug po la gzhol ba/_/la la lha mi lta la chags/_/kha cig brtul zhugs lta ba'i gnas/_/kha cig dka' thub gdungs pas 'khrul/_/nyon mongs pas ni 'khrug pa'i sems/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chags/_/skyo bar yang ni mi 'gyur te/_/
[\[237a.6\]]rdo rje rigs kyi gsang 'di la/_/nam yang sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'dod chags che la chags/_/'dod pa'i chags pa dag las rgyal/_/sangs rgyas byang chub chags bral ba/_/gsang ba 'di la sbyor mi 'gyur/_/lta ba'i chags pas rgyal bar 'gyur/_/
[\[237a.7\]]'dod pa'i chags pas lta ba can/_/srid pa'i zhags pas shin tu chags/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa la chags bral/_/nga rgyal lhag pa'i nga rgyal bcing /_/gdug cing drag la shin tu khro/_/snying rje med cing brtse med 'gyur/_/de la gsang ba rung ma yin/_/rmongs 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]pa kun mkhyen yin snyam pa/_/ye shes chen po la mkhas pa/_/gsang ba 'di ni rung ma yin/_/'dren pa ji ltar bshad par bgyi/_/gnod sbyin dang ni srin po nyid/_/sha za 'byung po gsang ba pa/_/lha la sogs pa gdug chen po/_/bstan pa la ni 'jug mi 'gyur/_/
[\[237b.2\]]nga ni sangs rgyas rab tu zhi/_/byang chub sems ni dga' chen po/_/sems can 'di dag shin tu gdug_/bdag gi tshig ni 'grub mi 'gyur/_/nga ni rgyal chen theg chen la/_/nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin rab tu yangs/_/kye ma sems can 'di dag dman/_/
[\[237b.3\]]bdag gi tshig ni 'grub mi 'gyur/_/nga ni theg chen dag pa ste/_/nyon mongs 'dam gyis gos pa med/_/kye ma'o sems can 'di nyon mongs/_/bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur/_/nga ni shes rab ye shes che/_/theg pa che la shin tu bstan/_/kye ma sems 
[\[237b.4\]]can shes rab ngan/_/bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur/_/bsod nams chen po ye shes che/_/nga ni mchod pa chen po'i tshogs/_/kye ma'o sems can bsod nams chung /_/bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur/_/sems can 'di dag nye bar 'tshe/_/'jigs pa sna 
[\[237b.5\]]tshogs kun du khyab/_/rnam rtog gis bskyod shes rab ngan/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi snod ma yin/_/stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/_/bdag po chen po dbang phyug kyang /_/rmongs pa kun sel nyid gyur pa/_/stobs chen rdzu 'phrul chen po ste/_/de la rgyal po grogs byed yod/_/
[\[237b.6\]]sgyu ma'i sngags ni yongs su 'dzin/_/de ni mi rgyud ces bya ste/_/sems can rmongs byed lhur len pa/_/de ni rgyal po lha chen po/_/gtso bo rgyal po chen po mtshungs/_/de ni dbang phyug che zhes bya/_/gdug pa'i sems can 'joms byed pa/_/de yi gzugs can rgyal po 
[\[237b.7\]]che/_/skyed byed byed pa po bdag po/_/tshangs pa chen po rgyal po che/_/lta ba sna tshogs rab ster ba/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi rgyal po che/_/dbang po zhes bya sha ci'i bdag_/brtson 'grus dbang phyug chen po'i bu/_/gdong drug rdzu 'phrul chen po can/_/dbung chen zhes bya'i 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]ming che ste/_/gzhon nu mi pham 'od lnga ming /_/rgyal po chen po 'di lnga ni/_/khams gsum gyi ni bdag por bshad/_/rgyal po lnga ni gzi brjid che/_/lus gsum gyi ni ngo mtshar che/_/skul byed dbang phyug chen po ni/_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/_/
[\[238a.2\]]de yi lus can rgyal po che/_/dbang phyug chen po zhes grags pa/_/sems can gdug pa shin tu drag_/sngags bcas 'khor dang bcas pa yi/_/rgyal po lnga po de dag ni/_/sems can dag ni rnam rmongs byed/_/lta ba chen po 'dzin byed cing /_/bdud kyi dbang du 
[\[238a.3\]]gyur pa ste/_/nyon mongs chen pos rab nyon mongs/_/gzhan yang kun nas nyon mongs byed/_/sems can dag ni 'joms byed cing /_/bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur/_/dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid che/_/bdag nyid dam pa'i yid chen po/_/de lta bu yi rnam rtog 
[\[238a.4\]]gis/_/sems can rnam par rmongs par byed/_/tshangs pa 'byin byed skye dgu'i bdag_/byed pa rang bdag byed pa po/_/lta ba chen po de lta bus/_/sems can dag ni rnam rmongs byed/_/khyab 'jug kun song khyab byed pa/_/khyab 'jug rang bzhin grong khyer kun/_/de ltar yang 
[\[238a.5\]]dag mi 'dzin pa/_/lta ba'i 'ching ba rab ster byed/_/rgya cher rgyal po 'di rnams ni/_/lta bar smra la nges par ston/_/rmongs pa mkhas pa yin sems shing /_/sems can 'ching bar byed pa yin/_/sems can de rnams gzhan gyis bskul/_/lta bar smra ba nges par sten/_/
[\[238a.6\]]khyab 'jug tshangs pa la sogs pa/_/dbang phyug chen po phyag byed de/_/sangs rgyas ye shes rnam kun du/_/bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi byed/_/sems can 'di rnams rmongs par gyur/_/de la gsang ba rung ma yin/_/de lta bu yi rnam pa yis/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dga' 
[\[238a.7\]]chen po/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis mkhyen nas ni/_/rnal 'byor pa ni mi gsung bzhugs/_/mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun/_/thub pa nyi ma ma lus pas/_/gsung gcig gis ni gsang ba che/_/rdo rje yi ni tshig gsungs pa/_/kye ma'o sems can 'di gdul dka'/_/
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]gdug cing drag la shin tu gtum/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis mi 'dul ba/_/de phyir bdag cag gsol ba 'debs/_/mgon khyod shes rab chen po ste/_/khyod ni thabs chen brjod par bya/_/byang chub sems ni thabs chen po/_/nyon mongs thams cad nges par 'joms/_/
[\[238b.2\]]gdug pa thams cad rab gdul ba/_/mgon po khyod la gsol ba 'debs/_/gdug pa 'dul byed rnam 'phrul pa/_/thabs chen po ni rab tu gsungs/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis sems can 'di/_/'dul bar mi 'gyur snod min la/_/thabs chen khro ba chen po ni/_/thub pa 
[\[238b.3\]]chen pos bstan du gsol/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi tshig gsan nas/_/phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che/_/tshig dag gis ni zhus gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas kun la 'di skad gsungs/_/e ma'o gsang ba 'khor lo che/_/thabs chen bdag nyid chen po ste/_/chos kyi dbyings ni bstan 
[\[238b.4\]]pa'i dngos/_/thabs kyi 'khor lo rab ston pa/_/ji skad du ni bka' stsal pa/_/de bzhin du ni bdag gis bgyi/_/sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir/_/drag po nyid ni bstan par bya/_/de skad gsungs nas sems dpa' che/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/_/
[\[238b.5\]]mi gsung bzhugs nas rnal 'byor gyis/_/drag po nyid la snyoms par zhugs/_/drag po'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje mchog_/ces bya'i ting 'dzin de lta bu/_/drag po chen po snyoms par zhugs/_/de bzhin thugs ka nas byung ba/_/drag po 'jigs rung yi ge hU~M/_/khro bo 
[\[238b.6\]]chen po brjod par 'gyur/_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad khro rgyal po/_/mgon po thugs ka nas byung gyur/_/sa gzhi ma lus g.yos gyur cing /_/sa 'di dag ni sgra sgrogs gyur/_/stong gsum ma lus 'di dag ni/_hU~M hU~M zhes bya brjod par gyur/_/tshad med gzhal du med pa yi/_/
[\[238b.7\]]khro bo'i rgyal po byung gyur pas/_/phyogs rnams kun du gdug chen dag_/skad cig de la gtum par gyur/_/slar yang gcig nyid gyur nas ni/_/gong bur byas nas rab bsdams te/_/khro bo'i rgyal po sku chen po/_/'jigs su rung ba gcig tu gyur/_/de ni 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]khro bo'i rgyal po che/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi grags chen po/_/khro rgyal mdun du 'dug nas ni/_/slar yang snying po rab tu brjod/_/hU~M t+ya hU~M t+ya/_'jigs su rung ba'i spu langs byed/_/gnod sbyin kun bdag gnod sbyin te/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul 
[\[239a.2\]]che/_/khro bo chen po brjod pa yin/_/stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/_/'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'od kyis khyab/_/rdo rje me ni drag po che/_/ma lus gsal zhing me 'bar gyur/_/phyi rol gyi ni gdug pa can/_/ma lus dkyil 'khor las byung ba/_/rdo rje me ni rab 'bar 
[\[239a.3\]]bas/_/g.yo ba med cing shi bar gyur/_/lha chen la sogs gdug pa rnams/_/gang dag rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis gdungs nas/_/g.yo ba med cing 'bar bar gyur/_/de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin che/_/drag po'i gzugs can rab 'jigs 
[\[239a.4\]]byed/_/khro gnyer bsnyer ba'i gdong can te/_/de bzhin gnag dang sngo bar gyur/_/mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' ba/_/dbu skra gyen brdzes shin tu skrag_/spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa ste/_/de bzhin rdo rje bstan pa'i zhal/_/drag po rdo rje drag tshogs 'dzin/_/
[\[239a.5\]]gcig bu 'bar ba rab ldan pa/_/zhags pa lcags kyu rdo rje bdag_/sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byed pa/_/sa rnams ma lus g.yo bar byed/_/sa 'di yang ni g.yo bar byed/_/gnod sbyin chen po 'byung po sogs/_/g.yo ba med cing 'og tu 'gyel/_/de ni 
[\[239a.6\]]drag po gnod sbyin che/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs par byed/_/de yi spyan sngar 'dug nas ni/_/ched du brjod pa yang dag brjod/_/e ma'o byang chub kyi ni sems/_/kun du bzang po kun dge ba/_/sems can 'dul ba'i thabs su ni/_/brtse med khro bo nyid du gyur/_/
[\[239a.7\]]sngar ni rdo rje sems dpa' gang /_/zhi ba'i gzugs su rnam gnas pa/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin 'dzin gyur nas/_/rdo rje drag po zhes byar grags/_/de ni drag po rdo rje 'dzin/_/'jigs rung ba spu langs par byed/_/yi ge hU~M bzhi'i phyag rgya yi/_/snying po gtum po nyid kyang 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]gsungs/_/o~M sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M/_gr-ih+NA pa ya/_gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M/_A na ya ho b+ha ga bA na badzra hU~M phaT/_shin tu gtum zhing cher grags pa/_/de bzhin thugs ka nas byung ste/_/zhal bzhi dang ni phyag brgyad pa/_/bskal pa yi ni me ltar drag_/
[\[239b.2\]]rdo rje dus kyi me ltar byung /_/nyon mongs phyogs ni rab sel byed/_/smin ma bskyod pas gtsigs pa'i zhal/_/de bzhin rnam par 'jigs pa'i gdong /_/'jig rten gsum sreg dam tshig ste/_/rdo rje can kun sreg par byed/_/'bar phreng kun du 'khrigs pa'i sgra/_/
[\[239b.3\]]rdo rje bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar/_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad phyag rgya ni/_/phyag gnyis kyis ni yongs su gzung /_/rdo rje bsdams pa 'dzin rgyal po/_/lcags kyu dang ni zhags pas brgyan/_/rdo rje yi ni lu gu rgyud/_/phyag gnyis na bsdams 'jigs rung zhal/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[239b.4\]]thams cad bsdigs byed pa/_/rdo rje gtum po yang dag byung /_/drag po bka' ni nod par byed/_/myur ba ru ni bka' stsol cig_/min na sangs rgyas khyed rnams kun/_/the tshom med par bza' bar bya/_/de nas sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs/_/Taka ki dzaHhU~M 
[\[239b.5\]]shin tu drag_/rigs dang bcas par lha chen po/_/stobs chen po yis dgug par gyis/_/de nas rig pa'i mchog rgyal po/_/bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis bzhad byed cing /_/khro bo drag po rnga sgra sgrogs/_/rdo rje zhags pa bskul bar bya/_/rdo rje zhags pa drag po che/_/
[\[239b.6\]]dpung bcas grogs dang bcas pa dang /_/de bzhin rigs dang dkyil 'khor bcas/_/song la dbang phyug chen po khug_/badzra pA dza hU~M/_dbang ldan rgyal po chen po ni/_/sna tshogs rang gi 'khor na gnas/_/'jigs byed ma dang lhan cig tu/_/'dod pa can 
[\[239b.7\]]ni mchog tu rol/_/rdo rje zhags pa der song ste/_/khro bo'i sgra yis bsdigs par gyur/_/dbang ldan rgyal po la smras pa/_/khyod la ston pa spyan 'dren mdzad/_/skrag cing khros nas lha chen pos/_/'jigs pa yi ni tshig brjod pa/_/nga ni 'jig rten gsum 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]rgyal po/_/nga las ston pa gzhan yod dam/_/rdo rje zhags pa khro bo ches/_/tshig ni lan gsum brjod par gyur/_/rdo rje khro bo rgyal po che/_/khyod la shin tu spyan 'dren mdzad/_/lha chen dbang phyug chen po yis/_/slar yang lan gsum smras 
[\[240a.2\]]pa ni/_/nga ni kho na rgyal po rang /_/nga la spyan 'dren gang zhig yod/_/de nas zhags pas bka' bzhin byed/_/khro bo drag po rab 'jigs pas/_/yan lag thams cad bcings nas ni/_/dbang phyug chen po bkug par gyur/_/'jigs shing skrag nas lha chen po/_/
[\[240a.3\]]shin tu smre sngags 'don cing ngu /_/skyabs ni gang yang yod ma yin/_/'jigs pa chen po kun du byung /_/stobs dang de bzhin nga rgyal gyis/_/stobs dang shugs ni bstan nas su/_/zhags pa bcad nas bros par gyur/_/rang gi gnas su song gyur nas/_/
[\[240a.4\]]'jig rten gsum gyi lha rnams bos/_/lha dang lha min dri zar bcas/_/skad cig gis ni 'dus gyur nas/_/'khor rnams dag ni ngu bar gyur/_/ji ltar sngon gyis ma byas pa'i/_/de lta bu ni yang dag mthong /_/sems can rab drag 'di su zhig_/rdo rje zhags 
[\[240a.5\]]pa'i mdun song ste/_/rdo rje rig pa mchog la zhus/_/dbang phyug chen pos bdag bcad de/_/drag po tshangs pa rab tu bros/_/rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po/_/khro bo gtum po shin tu drag_/de lta bu yi tshig gsan nas/_/thams cad du ni 'bar bar gyur/_/
[\[240a.6\]]khro bo rdo rje lu gu rgyud/_/drag po yis ni bka' bsgo ba/_/myur du song la lha chen po/_/rigs chen po dang bcas pa khug_/khro bo'i rgyal po lu gu rgyud/_/gsan na dbang phyug che gnas song /_/yan lag thams cad bcings nas su/_/lha mo dang bcas kun du 
[\[240a.7\]]bkug_/skad cig 'jigs pas ngu byed cing /_/lha rnams thams cad shin tu 'jigs/_/'jigs pa'i sdug bsngal smre sngags 'don/_/de ring 'dren pa lha chen min/_/stobs dang shugs ni thams cad kyis/_/rdo rje kun dang 'thab par gyur/_/mthu dang 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]stobs dang shugs kyis ni/_/bcag nas thams cad bros par gyur/_/lha chen la sogs thams cad ni/_/phyogs rnams kun du bros par gyur/_/mun pa yis ni kun du 'khrug_/phyogs rnams kun du 'jigs par gyur/_/khro bo lu gu rgyud 'ongs nas/_/rnam pa 
[\[240b.2\]]kun du smra bar byed/_/ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/bdag cag gnas ni bros par gyur/_/khro bo rdo rje rig pa mchog_/slar yang shin tu khros par gyur/_/'bar ba'i phreng bas rab 'bar zhing /_/rdo rje drag po nyid du gyur/_/drag po ha ha zhes bzhad dgod/_/
[\[240b.3\]]rang gi yan lag za bar byed/_/rang gi mgo la rdeg byed cing /_/rdo rje gsor ba bskor bar 'bar/_/de lta bu yi khyad par dang /_/bcas pas khro bo yang dag byung /_/slar yang rang gi bdag nyid dran/_/khro bo'i rgyal po brjod par gyur/_/o~M sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M/_gr-ih+Na 
[\[240b.4\]]gr-ih+Na hU~M/_gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M/_A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badzra hU~M phaT/_khro bo'i rgyal po bcas nas ni/_/yi ge dzaHni yongs su brjod/_/rdo rje lcags kyur rab tu bsngags/_/stobs dang ldan pa khrug la shog_/o~M badzra dz+wa la ag ni sa tri Sha aM ku sha dzaHdzaH/_
[\[240b.5\]]rdo rje 'bar ba lcags kyu ni/_/song nas phyogs kun bdag nyid che/_/skad cig gis ni stobs chen rnams/_/lha rnams thams cad bkug par gyur/_/rgyal bo dbang phyug lnga dang ni/_/lha rnams thams cad grangs med par/_/rigs bcas dpung dang bcas pa nyid/_/
[\[240b.6\]]gcig nyid du ni bsdus par gyur/_/rdo rje lcags sgrog rab tu mngags/_/chings shig stobs chen dang ldan pa/_/tshogs dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kun/_/bcing ba lnga yis bcings par gyur/_/nang gi 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs/_/lha tshogs gnod sbyin srin po 
[\[240b.7\]]dang /_/lha min rlung dang 'byung po'i tshogs/_/gzhan yang gdug pa'i tshogs rnams ni/_/thams cad bcings par gyur nas ni/_/rdo rje zhags pa rab tu mngags/_/rdo rje lcags kyu dang bcas par/_/song la dkyil 'khor dag khug cig_/rdo rje zhags 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]pas mngon chags pas/_/yan lag kun las yongs su spro/_/rdo rje'i rang bzhin zhags pa ste/_/brtan bar gyur par the tshom med/_/bye bdag ni grangs med bcu/_/rdo rje lcags kyu rab tu byung /_/lha la sogs pa'i re re zhing /_/spyi bo nas 
[\[241a.2\]]'gugs yang dag sbyor/_/lha chen dbang phyug chen po yi/_/spyi bo'i gtsug tu btab nas ni/_/rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal po yis/_/dbang phyug chen po 'gugs par byed/_/lha sogs 'khor dang bcas pa kun/_/phan tshun du ni ngu bar byed/_/shugs [{]rings [,]ring [}]kun 
[\[241a.3\]]du phyung nas ni/_/phan tshun du ni smra bar byed/_/kye ma'o sdug bsngal kye ma'o shi/_/tshogs ni gang du khyer bar gyur/_/rdo rje 'bar ba chen po des/_/skad cig de la bsregs gyur nas/_/ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru/_/lha la sogs pa thams cad bkug_/gnas de ru 
[\[241a.4\]]ni thams cad dag_/yongs su bskor nas kun du gnas/_/rdo rje kha khyer phyi rol du/_/lha rnams de dag thams cad gnas/_/rdo rje ra ba'i phyi rol du/_/lha la sogs pa thams cad bkug_/phyi rol rdo rje ra ba ni/_/lcags bsregs rang bzhin rdo rje mtshungs/_/
[\[241a.5\]]rdo rje can gyi rdor 'bar mas/_/nang nas shin tu gdungs par gyur/_/lha tshogs sems can de dag kyang /_/'jigs su rung ba'i 'o dod 'bod/_/stong gsum 'di dag thams cad kyang /_/hU~M hU~M sgra ni yongs su brjod/_/'o dod bos nas smra bar byed/_/ngan song 
[\[241a.6\]]dag ni ci zhig byed/_/sngon ma mthong ba 'di ci zhig_/'dir ni rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/_/rdo rje 'dzin pas rgyal po de/_/slar yang thugs rje kun du skyes/_/thams cad bcings pa las bkrol te/_/rdo rje me yi nye bar mdzes/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che/_/rang gi 
[\[241a.7\]]dkyil 'khor nas phyung ste/_/lha la sogs pa kun bos te/_/nga yi tshig 'di rab tu nyon/_/de nas lha rgyal la sogs pa/_/khyod ni su yin smra bar byed/_/nged kyis khyod ni sngar ma mthong /_/gnas mchog 'di yang sngar ma mthong /_/rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che/_/
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]ha ha zhes dgod bzhad pa yis/_/smras pa rdo rje gnod sbyin nga /_/thams cad za byed bzod dka' ba/_/de nas lha chen gyis smras pa/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin ngas mi shes/_/nga yis khyod ni sngar ma mthong /_/bdag nyid kho na rang byung ba/_/rdo rje drag pos rab smras pa/_/
[\[241b.2\]]nga yi bka' la myur gnas kyis/_/min na rdo rje 'bar ba 'dis/_/rang gi rigs ni sreg par byed/_/lha chen po yis tshig smras pa/_/bstan pa la ni nga mi gnas/_/'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug nga /_/su yi bstan pa la gnas pa/_/'khor dang bcas pa'i stobs 
[\[241b.3\]]gang yin/_/de ring nga yis bstan par bya/_/khyod la stobs ni ci yod pa/_/stobs chen ldan pas bstan par gyis/_/dbang phyug chen po rgyal po che/_/'byung po'i tshogs bcas lhan cig tu/_/tshig dag smras par gyur pa ni/_/drag po nyid ni bstan par bya/_/
[\[241b.4\]]stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/_/'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab/_/ha ha zhes bya shin tu drag_/dbang phyug chen pos bstan par bya/_/o~M shU la a tri shU la ma hA sa ha sra shU la A yu d+he/_rtse gsum mngag gzhug rgyal po ni/_/stong phrag gcig ni byung 
[\[241b.5\]]bar 'gyur/_/rtse bcas kun du 'bar ba yis/_/rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab/_/na rA ya nas smras pa/_/o~M ma hA sa ha sra tsakra A yu d+he/_khyab 'jug gis ni de dag smras/_/'khor lo gcig tu rnam pa stong /_/thams cad 'od zer 'bar bas khyab/_/
[\[241b.6\]]rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_/o~M ma hA sa ha sra badzra A yu d+he/_rdo rje stong ni byung bar gyur/_/rdo rje 'bar ba tsha bas khyab/_/brgya byin gyis ni smras pa yin/_/rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab/_/gzhon nus smras pa/_o~M ma hA sa ha sra 
[\[241b.7\]]sha k+Sh+yaA yu d+he/_gzhon nus de skad smras nas ni/_/mdung ni rtse gsum stong byung gyur/_/sgra ni drag po sgrogs byed cing /_/rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab/_/tshangs pas smras pa/_oM ma hA sa ha sra daN+Da A yu d+he/_tshangs pas de skad smras nas ni/_/dbyug 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]to stong ni byung gyur nas/_/mtshon cha drag po 'jigs byed pas/_/rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab/_/gzhan yang lhag ma ma lus pa/_/rnams kyis yang ni mtshon cha dag_/re re stong phrag gcig gyur nas/_/rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab/_/
[\[242a.2\]]tha na sprul pa gang yin dang /_/phyi rol gyi ni dam ldan pa/_/de rnams nges par stong gyur nas/_/rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab/_/me yang kun du 'bar gyur cing /_/'jigs par byed pa'i rlung yang byung /_/'brug gi sgra dang glog chen bos/_/khyad par srid 
[\[242a.3\]]gsum gnas par gyur/_/ha la ha la'i sgru chen po/_/nam mkha' bar snang la ni grag_/rdo rje drag po tshogs chen po/_/lha rnams thams cad 'thab par byed/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/gtum po drag po 'jigs byed pas/_/lha yi lan gyi phyag rgya 
[\[242a.4\]]ni/_/rdo rje yi ni snying po gsungs/_/o~M ma hA sa ha sra ha ra badzra tsa kre/_/o~M ma hA badzra shU le/_o~M dI b+ta dz+wAl ag ni badzra/_o~M badzra shak+ti/_o~M ma hA badzra ni d+hi/_de lta bu yi rnam pa ru/_/snying po dag ni stong phrag gcig_/srid gsum zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/_/
[\[242a.5\]]rdo rje 'chang ni chen pos phyung /_/gtum po 'od zer 'bar bas khyab/_/rdo rje me dang yang dag ldan/_/drag po'i snying po las byung gyur/_/rdo rje 'chang ni dbus na bzhugs/_/lha tshogs phyag rgya de dag ni/_/rnam par bshig cing dum bur byas/_/bcom 
[\[242a.6\]]zhing bsdams te bsres nas ni/_/phyogs rnams kun du thim par gyur/_/rdo rje me yis rab bsdams pas/_/lha yi rgyal po 'bar bar 'gyur/_/'og nas sa ni rab tu 'bar/_/steng nas me ni shin tu gdungs/_/rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches/_/dbang phyug chen 
[\[242a.7\]]po la gsungs pa/_/lus srul po ni drag po che/_/nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon/_/dur khrod gnas la rab tu dga'/_/lus la thal ba dag gis byugs/_/mi yi sha ni bza' bar byed/_/nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon/_/khrag rlon gyis ni rab tu bskus/_/
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]pags pa rlon pa gos su gyon/_/lha rnams thams cad khyod kyi 'khor/_/nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon/_/gdug pa drag chen mtshan mo rgyu ba slong mo ba/_/khrag la spangs pa'i pags can lus la thal bas byugs/_/nga yis bka' nyon drag po'i sems 
[\[242b.2\]]ldan lus srul po/_/min na bskal pa'i me yis rtswa bzhin khyod bsreg bya/_/ro bsregs thal ba'i phung po bzhin du thal bar 'gyur/_/rigs bcas dpung ldan dkyil 'khor dang bcas gnod sbyin drag_/rdo rje drag po yi ni rab gzhom gzhig par bya/_/dbang 
[\[242b.3\]]phyug chen pos smras pa/_nga ni ma lus dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor los sgyur/_/'jig rten gsum gyi lha tshogs ma lus pa yi 'khor/_/shin tu drag cing rnam gtsigs 'jig rten khyod yin yang /_/khyod kyis nga yi bka' ni mnyan par gyis/_/gdug dang 
[\[242b.4\]]sangs rgyas mang po'i 'khor ni sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas nga yis sprul/_/zhi zhing de la rnam 'dul gsang ba dri med nyon mongs med pa'i pha rol phyin/_/de 'dra'i mgon po dga' ba dus gsum bzhugs pa thams cad nas dbang bskur/_/slar yang 
[\[242b.5\]]nga yi 'byung po'i tshig nyon zhes pa'i tshig ni 'di lta bu/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/'dul ba'i don la shin tu mkhas/_/khro bo gdug pa gtum chen po/_/rab 'bar khro ba'i rgyal po ni/_/rdo rje'i byin brlabs phyag rgya las/_/bya ba de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/_/
[\[242b.6\]]snyoms par zhugs nas sems dpa' ches/_/rang rigs khro bo las byung ba/_/gdug pa rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir/_/khro bo'i chos kyi tshul bzung nas/_/rkang pa nas brtsams spyi bo'i bar/_/lus kun las ni rnam par phyung /_/o~M badzra kro d+ha uSh+Ni Sha hU~M/_
[\[242b.7\]]rdo rje'i gtsug tor khro bo che/_/'bar ba'i spyi bo nas phyung nas/_/sa rnams thams cad g.yo byed cing /_/khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad 'joms/_/o~M badzra b+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+ha hU~M/_khro bo'i rgyal po khro gnyer can/_/mdzod spu las ni rab tu byung /_/'jigs byed drag po 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]yang dag ldan/_/lus rnams thams cad 'bar 'gyur ba/_/o~M ni sum+b+ha badzra hU~M/_rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po/_/kha las rab tu byung bar gyur/_/spyi bo nas brtsams rkang mthil bar/_/rdo rje 'bar ba yang dag ldan/_/Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/_thugs 
[\[243a.2\]]kyi khro bo rgyal po che/_/thugs ka nas ni rab tu byung /_/'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa'i sku/_/'jigs su rung ba spu langs byed/_/o~M badzra aM ku sha A kar+Sha ya hU~M/_rdo rje lcags kyu khro bo che/_/phrag ba g.yas nas rab tu byung /_/rdo rje lcags kyu gsor byed 
[\[243a.3\]]cing /_/rdo rje 'bar ba yang dag ldan/_/o~M badzra bA sha kro d+ha A kad+D+h+ya hU~M phaT/_rdo rje zhags pa khro bo che/_/phrag pa g.yon nas rab tu byung /_/rdo rje 'bar bar yang dag ldan/_/rdo rje zhags pas bskor bar byed/_/o~M badzra kI li kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_khro bo'i rgyal po 
[\[243a.4\]]lcags kyu thogs/_/lte ba'i dbus gnas rab tu phyung /_/kun nas 'bar ba yang dag ldan/_/blo mchog rdo rje gnod sbyin mtshungs/_/o~M badzra me kha lA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_khro bo chen po ska rags ni/_/rked pa'i rdo rje rab tu phyung /_/kun nas 'bar ba yang dag ldan/_/
[\[243a.5\]]phyag rgya dang ni lhan cig ldan/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha ba la hU~M/_khro bo'i rgyal po chen po stobs/_/dpung ba g.yas nas rab tu phyung /_/rdo rje 'bar bas 'bar bar gyur/_/me yis shin tu nga rgyal gyur/_/o~M badzra ba lA ya kro d+ha hU~M/_khro bo'i rgyal po gdu bu ni/_/dpung 
[\[243a.6\]]pa g.yon las yang dag byung /_/gsang zhing rdo rje 'bar bas khyab/_/rdo rje khro bos rab tu khengs/_/o~M sa ma ya badzra kro d+ha hU~M hU~M phaT/_dam tshig khro bo'i rgyal po ni/_/de bzhin khro bo'i gnod byed pa/_/khu tshur g.yas nas rab tu phyung /_/kun nas 'bar ba 
[\[243a.7\]]yang dag ldan/_/o~M badzra muSh+Ti kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_khro bo khu tshur drag po che/_/khu tshur g.yon las rab tu byung /_/rdo rje 'bar ba dag gis gsal/_/rdo rje me yis rab tu brgyan/_/o~M badzra ban d+ha kro d+ha hU~M/_sa ma ya hU~M/_o~M badzra any+dza li ban d+ha kro d+ha hU~M/_sa 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]ma ya hU~M/_rdo rje 'ching ba rgyal po che/_/de bzhin rdo rje sor mo nyid/_/khro bo lag pa g.yas g.yon gyi/_/sor mo dag las yang dag byung /_/o~M badzra na kha hU~M/_o~M badzra kro d+ha aM ku li ma hA kro d+ha hU~M/_rdo rje sder mo khro bo che/_/de bzhin rdo rje sder mo'i gdong /_/
[\[243b.2\]]phyag ni g.yon dang g.yas pa yi/_/sor mo dag las rab tu byung /_/o~M badzra ku mA ra kro d+ha ka Ti rA ga hU~M/_o~M badzra ku mA ra kro d+ha mur+d+ha D+ha ka hU~M phaT/_khro bo'i rgyal po rked pa dang /_/de bzhin khro bo spyi gtsug dag_/rgyal po brla ni g.yon pa dang /_/g.yas pa dag 
[\[243b.3\]]las rab tu byung /_o~M shr-iM kha li ma hA kro d+ha ban d+ha hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha A shA ni ban d+ha hU~M/_gnam lcags rdo rje lu gu rgyud/_/khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/_/rgyal po 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab/_/pus mo'i lha nga dag las byung /_/o~M badzra ban d+ha kro d+ha ha na hU~M phaT/_
[\[243b.4\]]o~M badzra kro d+ha aM ku sha hU~M phaT/_rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo che/_/rdo rje yi ni yan lag drangs/_/'bar ba dang bcas gnod sbyin gnyis/_/rje ngar dag las rab tu phyung /_/o~M nU pu ra kro d+ha hU~M/_o~M badzra kro d+ha mo g+ha be ga A na ya hU~M phaT/_de nas dka' thub khro bo che/_/de
