[\[243b.5\]]bzhin rdo rje don yod nyid/_/rgyal po shugs chen gnyis po ni/_/gdu bu'i rkang las rab tu byung /_/o~M badzra ban d+ha ha la kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra pA tA la mA ra ya kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_rkang pa khro bo shugs chen po/_/de bzhin mthil gyi khro bo nyid/_/'bar ba 'phro ba lhur 
[\[243b.6\]]len pa/_/gnyis po zhabs kyi mthil las byung /_/de dag la sogs rgyal po ni/_/dpag tu med par rab tu byung /_/gang gA'i bye snyed grangs med pa/_/phra rab rdul gyi khams dag ni/_/ba spu'i gseb ni thams cad dang /_/lus kyi gseb ni thams cad nas/_/
[\[243b.7\]]rdo rje khro bo rgyal po che/_/rang gi snying po las byung 'gyur/_/rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/phyogs rnams kun du yongs spros te/_/slar yang gcig tu gyur nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag ga gnas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar 'dus/_/ched du 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]brjod pa yang dag brjod/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas thabs chen po/_/e ma'o ye shes shin tu bzang /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin ni/_/theg pa chen po zhes byar bshad/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad ni/_/dpag tu med pa zhes byar 
[\[244a.2\]]gyur/_/rdo rje'i rigs kyi khro bo 'di/_/thams cad rdo rje'i rigs su bshad/_/sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/_/de nyid sangs rgyas rigs chen po/_/de nas de yi gsang ba'i mtshan/_/thams cad rdo rje'i rigs su bshad/_/khro bo che las yang dag byung /_/
[\[244a.3\]]rdo rje khro bo'i dbang phyug bshad/_/rdo rje gtsug tor rdor mdzod spu/_/gnod mdzes bdag cag stobs po che/_/thugs kyi khro bo rgyal po che/_/rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba dang /_/rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje zhags/_/rked pa'i khro bo stobs po che/_/ska rags stobs ldan 
[\[244a.4\]]nyid dang ni/_/lag gdub de bzhin dam tshig dang /_/rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje bsdams/_/rdo rje sor mo shin tu drag_/rdo rje sen mo rdo rje gdong /_/de bzhin rked pa khro rgyal po/_/khro bo spyi gtsug rgyal po dang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po lu gu rgyud/_/rdo rje gnam lcags rdo rje 
[\[244a.5\]]dbyig_/rdo rje khro bo yan lag drag_/rdo rje rkang gdub rdor don yod/_/rdo rje zhabs dang de bzhin mthil/_/dam tshig rdo rje rgyal po 'di/_/rdo rje yi ni rigs su bshad/_/de dag la sogs rgyal po ni/_/rgyal po chen po rdzu 'phrul che/_/byang chub sems las yang 
[\[244a.6\]]dag byung /_/rtag tu gzhan yang grangs med pa/_/khros pas rang gi sha za zhing /_/'bar ba'i phreng ba sa khyab par gnas/_/bskal pa yi ni me ltar 'bar/_/rdo rje khro bos dkyil 'khor ni/_/rdo rje'i rigs ni bskyed nas kyang /_/rab tu drag 'dzin bka' bsgos 
[\[244a.7\]]pas/_/gdug pa rnams ni 'dul bar gyis/_/nga yi bka' yang mnyan par gyis/_/rdo rje can kun rang nyid kyi/_/bka' thob nas ni gzung bya ste/_/lha rnams kun gyi gsung gcig gis/_/rig pa 'di ni brjod par gyur/_/o~M ni sum+b+ha badzra hU~M phaT/_rdo rje 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]khro bo stobs po che/_/gtsug tor la sogs kun gsungs pa/_/lha chen la sogs gdug pa rnams/_/'og tu kha bltas 'gyel bar gyur/_/rdo rje khro bo stobs po ches/_/lha rnams brgyal bar gyur nas ni/_/rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar zhes pas/_/snying po 
[\[244b.2\]]dag ni yang dag brjod/_/o~M badzra a na la da ha pa tsa ma tha b+hany+dza ra Na hU~M phaT/_khro bo chen po rdo rje'i me/_/skad cig de las byung nas ni/_/lha rnams de dag bsregs nas kyang /_/de bzhin 'og tu bsgyel bar gyur/_/rdo rje mes ni rab tu sreg_/rdo rje 'bar bas 'bar 
[\[244b.3\]]bar gyur/_/tshig cing btsos par gyur nas ni/_/lha la sogs pa 'o dod 'bod/_/rdo rje khro chen de rnams de/_/de bzhin khro chen la sogs pas/_/thams cad gsung gcig byas nas ni/_/slar yang snying po gsungs par gyur/_/o~M badzra A be sha a/_rdo rje dbab 
[\[244b.4\]]pa'i khro ba che/_/rdo rje can gyi thugs las byung /_/lha rnams kun gyi gnas song nas/_/de bzhin lha chen la sogs pa/_/lha rnams kun la yang dag babs/_/rdo rje dbab par rab sdug bsngal/_/byas nas rang gi yan lag dag_/gcig la gcig ni za bar 
[\[244b.5\]]byed/_/rdo rje can dang bcas pa kun/_/rdo rje zhags pa yang dag brjod/_/o~M badzra dz+wa la ag+ni pra dI p+ta ma hA badzra aM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya hU~M/_rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal song nas/_/skad cig gis ni yang dag 'gugs/_/lha rnams thams cad bkug nas ni/_/spyi bo ru 
[\[244b.6\]]ni ltung bar byed/_/rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag 'gugs/_/rdo rje zhags pas drangs par gyur/_/rdo rje 'bar bas rab bsregs nas/_/steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo/_/ha ha zhes ni sgrogs byed cing /_/'jigs pa'i skad chen sdug bsngal gyur/_/rdo rje can la 
[\[244b.7\]]gsol ba 'debs/_/stobs chen gzhom par ma mdzad cig_/de bzhin lha la sogs pa kun/_/dkyil 'khor du ni dgug par gyur/_/rdo rje can dang bcas kun gyis/_/rdo rje lcags sgrog yang dag brjod/_/o~M badzra s+pho Ta ban d+ha hUM phaT/_lha tshogs gdug pa 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]de dag ni/_/'ching ba lnga yis bcings par gyur/_/rdo rje lcags sgrog khro bo che/_/'ching ba brtan pa bcings par gyur/_/khro bo rdo rje rgyal po che/_/shin tu gtum po stobs chen po/_/slar yang snying po yang dag dran/_/rang gi snying po yang 
[\[245a.2\]]dag brjod/_/hU~M/_snying po drag po brjod pa yis/_/gdug pa de rnams rab tu 'gyel/_/g.yo med shi ba bzhin du gyur/_/'chi ba'i sdug bsngal nye bar 'thob/_/de nas rgyal po rnam snang mdzad/_/chos kun dbang phyug dbang dang ldan/_/rdo rje khro bo rgyal po che/_/
[\[245a.3\]]rdo rje 'chang la bos par gyur/_/sems dpa' chen po mnyan par gyis/_/'di rnams sems can rab 'jigs byed/_/'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo 'di/_/srog ni gzhom par ma byed cig_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/rdo rje kun bdag dbang ldan pas/_/
[\[245a.4\]]sangs rgyas gsung ni thos nas su/_/rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod/_/o~M badzra ut+tiSh+Tha/_rdo rje slong ba rdzu 'phrul che/_/de ni brjod pa tsam gyis ni/_/lha la sogs pa thams cad ni/_/slar yang gson pa nyid du gyur/_/sdug bsngal kun dang rab tu phral/_/
[\[245a.5\]]'chi ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar gyur/_/rdo rje slong ba'i byams pa yis/_/sangs rgyas thams cad rab bskul bas/_/de nas lha la sogs pa kun/_/sangs rgyas byams pas langs par gyur/_/thal mo sbyar nas tshig gcig gis/_/bcom ldan 'das la zhus 
[\[245a.6\]]gyur pa/_/bcom ldan nyes pa gang gis ni/_/bdag cag 'di ltar 'dul bar mdzad/_/sangs rgyas thugs rje can kun gyis/_/bdag cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/khyed cag yongs su bskyab pa dang /_/phan 
[\[245a.7\]]gdags par ni ngas mi nus/_/'di ni drag po rdo rje 'dzin/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag por bshad/_/de rnams kyis gsol ba/_khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi don/_/ji ltar rung lags mi 'tshal lo/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas bdag por gyur/_/
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]sangs rgyas 'phags pa ji lta bu/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub gang /_/de nas rdo rje can du gyur/_/byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/_/rdo rje gang yin drag po 'dzin/_/de rnams kyis gsol pa/_sangs rgyas 
[\[245b.2\]]thams cad rab tu zhi/_/de ni byang chub de dang mtshungs/_/brtse dang byang chub sems las byung /_/de 'dra'i drag po ga las byung /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/'di ni thabs kyis 'dul ba ste/_/gdug pa thams cad rab 'dul byed/_/dpal ldan 
[\[245b.3\]]rdo rje 'dzin pa 'di/_/byang chub sems las yang dag byung /_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/rdo rje khro bo bdag chen pos/_/lha tshogs kun la bos nas ni/_/dbang phyug chen po la gsungs pa/_/nga yi bstan pa'i bka' dag ni/_/kyai gdug pa dag mnyan par gyis/_/
[\[245b.4\]]min na rdo rje 'bar ba yis/_/rigs dang bcas pa nga yis sreg_/khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams kyis/_/tshig gcig tu ni 'di skad zhus/_/gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/_/rgyal po chen po de bzhin bgyi/_/de nas lha chen gyis smras pa/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin ngas mi 
[\[245b.5\]]shes/_/nga ni rang nyid rgyal po ste/_/nga yi bka' ni mnyan par gyis/_/lha chen po yi tshig gsan nas/_/rdo rje khro bo rab 'bar bas/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin 'joms zhes pa/_/khro bo'i rgyal po yang dag brjod/_/o~M badzra ni sum+b+ha hU~M/_shin tu gtum pa stobs chen po/_/
[\[245b.6\]]khro bo 'di ni brjod pa yis/_/dbang phyug chen po brgyal gyur nas/_/de bzhin sa la 'gyel bar gyur/_/g.yo med 'chi ba'i dbang du gyur/_/shing 'gyel bzhin du gnas par gyur/_/'gul ba med cing g.yo ba med/_/rdo rje khro bos gdungs par gyur/_/bcom 
[\[245b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rdo rje khro bo thams cad mkhyen/_/bdag nyid chen po 'di yis ni/_/srog gi rgyu ni zad pa dang /_/de nyid nyams par ci phyir byed/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/sangs rgyas thugs rjes bskul ba yin/_/rdo rje tshe zhes bya ba ste/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]rig pa 'di gsungs so/_/o~M badzra A yuH/_rig pa 'di ni brjod pa yis/_/dbang phyug chen pos yang dag langs/_/rdo rje tshe yis gson byas nas/_/bde ba chen po thob par gyur/_/rnam par snang mdzad thub chen la/_/zhabs dag la ni btud 
[\[246a.2\]]nas gsol/_/mgon po bcom ldan skyabs su gsol/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa de gdug min/_/kun mkhyen bcom ldan bka' stsal pa/_/nga yis brtse bar bya mi nus/_/'di ni gdug pa shin tu drag_/de nyid la ni skyabs su song /_/rdo rje khro bos lha chen po/_/kun du 
[\[246a.3\]]bos nas 'di skad smras/_/nga yis bstan pa'i bka' dag ni/_/gdug pa chen po mnyan par gyis/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin bdag chen la/_/lha chen po yis slar smras pa/_/'chi ba chen po bzod nus kyi/_/khyod kyi bka' la gnas mi byed/_/rdo rje khro bo drag po che/_/
[\[246a.4\]]khros pas gdug pa 'phel 'gyur na/_/hU~M ni shin tu 'jigs byed pa/_/snying po drag po brjod par gyur/_/hU~M/_yi ge hU~M ni brjod pa yis/_/dbang phyug chen po slar yang 'gyel/_/rdo rje khro bo drag po che/_/rkang par dgug pa yang dag brjod/_/o~M pA ta A kaR+Sha Na 
[\[246a.5\]]badzra hU~M/_de nas rdo rje dbang po 'di/_/brjod pas rdo rje khro bo phyung /_/tshig ni 'di skad brjod par gyur/_/bka' stsal brjod cing 'od chen po/_/rdo rje khro bos bka' stsal pa/_/o~M bA ta A kaR+Sha ya sarba badzra d+ha ra ka tsa ra phaT badzra hU~M dzaH/_khro bo chen pos 'di gsungs 
[\[246a.6\]]nas/_/dbang phyug chen po u mar bcas/_/rkang pas 'gugs pa'i rdo rje yis/_/rdo rje rkang pa dag gis bkug_/rdo rje khro bos de dag bkug_/steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo/_/'jig rten thams cad dgod 'gyur cing /_/rdo rje gdung bas gdungs par gyur/_/de 
[\[246a.7\]]nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/dbang phyug chen po u mar bcas/_/zhabs kyis mnan nas rdo rje yis/_/dbang phyug chen po rdeg par byed/_/des ni rkang pa g.yon pa yis/_/dbang phyug chen po mnan byas nas/_/g.yas pas lha mo u ma yi/_/nu ma dag gi bar du btsir/_/
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni/_/dbang phyug chen po rab tu mnan/_/o~M badzra A kra ma ho/_slar yang dbab pa'i rig pa ni/_/rdo rje khro bos yang dag brjod/_/o~M badzra A be sha ha na ha na tra Ta/_dbang phyug chen po bcas gyur pas/_/rang gi lag pas lan stong du/_/
[\[246b.2\]]rang gdong 'jigs su rang la brdeg_/stong phrag gcig tu yang dag gyur/_/'jig rten gsum gnas thams cad ni/_/'o dod chen po 'bod par gyur/_/bdag cag gi ni rgyal po 'di/_/de lta bu yi bdag nyid gyur/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/brtse 
[\[246b.3\]]dang snying rje skyes par 'gyur/_/snying rje steng du gzhug bya ste/_/sangs rgyas byams pa yang dag brjod/_/o~M bud d+ha mai tri rak+Sha/_dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin gtso bos/_/de nas sngags 'di gsungs pa yis/_/dbang phyug chen po'i sdug bsngal de/_/skad cig de 
[\[246b.4\]]la nye bar zhi/_/phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs dag gis/_/reg pas dbang phyug chen pos ni/_/sa chen po ni yang dag 'thob/_/ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs de bzhin/_/tha mal ba yi lus bor nas/_/rdo rje 'dzin la phul bar gyur/_/lha chen 'di nas shi 'phos nas/_/shi 
[\[246b.5\]]zhing lus ni bor nas su/_/gang gA sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi/_/bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing dang mnyam/_/thal bas g.yogs pa'i gnas zhes pa/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni yid 'ong ba/_/de ru song nas lha chen po/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang bstan par gyur/_/thal ba'i 
[\[246b.6\]]dbang phyug sgra dbyangs can/_/de bzhin gshegs pa der gnas gyur/_/de nas shi ba'i lus de yis/_/ched du brjod pa yang dag brjod/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yis ni/_/tshigs bcad gcig ni mngon par brjod/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/sangs 
[\[246b.7\]]rgyas ye shes bla na med/_/bsad nas skad cig bdag gis ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas dgod mdzad/_/rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches/_/dbang phyug chen po yang dag phyung /_/khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams la/_/kun du bos nas 'di gsungs pa/_/rab mchog 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/_/gtso bo rab tu zhugs par gyis/_/gal te de bzhin mi byed na/_/dbang phyug chen po bzhin du bya/_/de nas lha kun 'jigs gyur te/_/skrag nas thams cad kyis zhus pa/_/de bzhin du ni bgyid par 'tshal/_/bdag 
[\[247a.2\]]cag khyed kyi bran du gyur/_/rgyal po khyod kyi dam tshig ni/_/ji ltar bsgrub par mi bgyid lags/_/bdag cag rnams ni khyod kyi 'khor/_/bskal pa chen po bka' stsol cig_/rdo rje khro bos bka' stsal pa/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/_/skyabs su 
[\[247a.3\]]rab tu 'gro bar gyis/_/byang sems yang dag bskyed nas ni/_/sems can kun la yang dag sbyor/_/srog gcod pa na spang bar gyis/_/rku dang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_/gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin du/_/de ni dang por spang bar gyis/_/sems can gnod dang ldan pa ni/_/
[\[247a.4\]]ci nas kyang ni mi bya'o/_/byang chub spyod pa rab sbyor ba/_/de la lhod min brtson par bya/_/nga yi bstan pa'i bka' yi ni/_/'di dag dam tshig yang dag brjod/_/nga yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis/_/min na khyod ni kun du sreg_/de nas 'jig rten gsum 'khor los/_/
[\[247a.5\]]de nas tshig ni blangs nas kyang /_/byang sems yang dag bskyed nas ni/_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song /_/rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches/_/kun du phyag rgya byin nas kyang /_/phyag rgya'i snying po 'di yis ni/_/rdo rje ti rin+ti ri yi/_/dkyil 'khor du ni bcug gyur pas/_/
[\[247a.6\]]o~M badzra sa ma ya gr-ih+Na bud+d+ha sa ma ye badzra satwa sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/_sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya traM/_dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/_a pra ti ha ro me b+ha ba/_sarba karma su tsa me tsit+taM shre yaH/_ku ru ha ha ha ha hU~M/_de nas brjod pa tsam gyis ni/_/phyag rgya kun du babs par gyur/_/rdo rje ti rin+ti 
[\[247a.7\]]ri yi/_/phyag rgya kun du bstan par gyur/_/de dag rim bzhin bcug nas ni/_/rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur gyur/_/rdo rje mtshan ma lag byin nas/_/rdo rje ming ni dbang bskur gyur/_/de la lha rnams thams cad ni/_/rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur 'gyur/_/sngon la 'jig 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]rten gsum bdag po/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du dbang bskur 'gyur/_/khyab 'jug ces byar gnas pa ni/_/sgyu ma'i rdo rje zhes byar grags/_/gzhon nu rdo rje dril bu ste/_/tshangs pa rdo rje thub pa nyid/_/dbang po rdo rje mtshon cha nyid/_/de dag rig pa'i bdag 
[\[247b.2\]]por bshad/_/rgyal po bzhi po gzi brjid che/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs chen pos/_/bar snang la ni rgyu ba nyid/_/rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur gyur/_/nyi ma rdo rje 'khyil ba ste/_/de bzhin zla ba rdo rje 'od/_/dbyig chen rdo rje dbyig to ste/_/ser skya rdo rje ser 
[\[247b.3\]]skya min/_/de la sogs pa khro rgyal po/_/rdo rje khro bor dbang bskur gyur/_/de nas mkha' spyod lha rnams ni/_/rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur gyur/_/myos chen rdo rje myos pa ste/_/rdo rje phreng ba sbrang rtsi byed/_/rnam par rgyal dang rgyal byed dang /_/rdo rje shes dang rgyal bar 
[\[247b.4\]]ldan/_/tshogs kyi bdag po rgyal po dag_/zhes bya la sogs dbang bskur gyur/_/de nas sa la gnas pa rnams/_/rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur gyur/_/gtun shing mdzod ni bsrung ba ste/_/me ni de bzhin rdo rje me/_/rdo rje rlung ni rlung chen po/_/rdo rje 'jigs byed 
[\[247b.5\]]nga na rdo rje/_/de 'dra la sogs pho nya rnams/_/rdo rje mchog gis dbang bskur gyur/_/de nas sa 'og gnas pa ni/_/rdo rje lcags kyu rkang za ba/_/de bzhin gshin rje rdo rje nag_/sa yi gtsug ni bgegs rdo rje/_/chu lha mgon po rdo rje 'dzin/_/de nas lha mo ji bzhin 
[\[247b.6\]]du/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du dbang bskur gyur/_/rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur gyis/_/yum gyi mchog rnams dbang bskur gyur/_/khyab 'jug ma ni rdo rje gser/_/drug ldan rdo rje gzhon nu ma/_/tshangs pa rdo rje brgyad cu ma/_/dbang mo rdo rje khu tshur ma/_/gsod byed rdo rje 
[\[247b.7\]]gsod nyid ma/_/snar ma rdo rje 'od ldan ma/_/de las dbyig pa rdor mchog ma/_/'phrog ma rdo rje ska rags te/_/gsod byed rdo rje 'jigs ma ste/_/gnam lcags rdo rje gnam lcags ma/_/nam gru rdo rje dbang ldan ma/_/gos can rdo rje gos can ma/_/rdo rje pho nya 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]zhi ba ma/_/rlung lha rdo rje shugs can ma/_/lus ngan ma ni rdo rje gdengs/_/me lha de bzhin rdo rje 'bar/_/phag mo rdo rje gdong can ma/_/rdo rje nag mo tsa muN+Di/_/chu lha rdo rje chu srin ma/_/sna chad ma ni sprul mo ste/_/de 'dra la sogs grangs med pa/_/
[\[248a.2\]]lha mo rnams ni dbang bskur gyur/_/rang rang rigs ni rtogs nas su/_/ji bzhin lha yi bdag por bshad/_/de nas phyag rgya bcing ba byin/_/de bzhin dam tshig snying po'o/_/lha rnams kun gyi bdag po kun/_/bkug nas de bzhin dbang du 'gyur/_/rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis 
[\[248a.3\]]bcings nas/_/sdigs mdzub dang ni lcags kyu bcings/_/'ching ba dang ni grol byed par/_/dngos po bya ba'i don sems dpa'/_/de yi mdun du khyed rnams ni/_/bya ba bsgrub phyir gnas par gyis/_/khyod kyi srog ni nyams gyur pa'i/_/de bzhin dam tshig sbyin mi bya/_/
[\[248a.4\]]rgya cher phyag rgya chen por ni/_/theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pas/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor sbyor byed pa/_/de nyid ces bya bstan pa yin/_/dkyil 'khor mchog rnams de dag dang /_/de bzhin lha la sogs pa kun/_/bkug cing rab tu bcug par gyur/_/rdo rje can gyis dbang 
[\[248a.5\]]byas nas/_/rdo rje thams cad dbang bskur gyur/_/rdo rje ming gis mtshan par byas/_/lha chen po ni gcig pu nyid/_/zhabs kyis 'og tu brdabs nas bzhag_/'jig rten gdug pa cher gyur pa/_/gdug pa'i snying po zhes byar grags/_/gdug pa'i dkyil 
[\[248a.6\]]'khor rgyal po yi/_/sems can 'ongs par the tshom med/_/thang cig tshes grangs re re ma/_/gang du zla gcig dkyil 'khor du/_/sems can stong phrag brgya dag ni/_/skad cig de la sdug bsngal byed/_/yid ni nye bar 'jal bar byed/_/mdangs ni nye bar 
[\[248a.7\]]'phrog pa'i nad/_/mi yi skye bo gsod pa dang /_/tha na dug chen nyid dang ni/_/grong khyer dang ni grong rdal dang /_/grong dag 'joms par byed pa dag_/sems can rnams ni gcod byed dang /_/skye bo stong pa sbyor byed dang /_/de ltar drag cing 'jigs su rung /_/
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]brtse ba med cing sdig byed pa/_/gsod pa dang ni 'joms par byed/_/shes rab 'phrog par byed pa dang /_/drag po sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin pa/_/dud 'gro'i 'gro ba'i bar dang ni/_/sems can rnams la gnod byed dang /_/myur du mdangs ni 'phrog pa dang /_/
[\[248b.2\]]lo nyes thog dang char dang ni/_/char ni mi 'bab byed pa dang /_/grang dang dro ba'i gdung ba da ga_/skad cig de la skyed pa dang /_/gdon ni 'bab par byed pa dang /_/nges bzhin bdud mchog skyed pa dang /_/sems ni rnam par g.yeng byed dang /_/de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mtha' 
[\[248b.3\]]yas dang /_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/dkon mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug ste/_/skye dgu sna tshogs nad kyis btab/_/ye shes kyi ni spyan gyis gzigs/_/dam tshig sdang ba'i sems can dang /_/yams dang de bzhin nye bar 'tshe/_/rims dang gdon dang 
[\[248b.4\]]dug drag po/_/skye dgu 'di rnams 'joms par byed/_/sna tshogs sdug bsngal kun du 'khrugs/_/'jigs pa sna tshogs dag gis khyab/_/thams cad nyams shing zil gyis non/_/sdug bsngal drag pos sdug bsngal gyur/_/slar yang bde bar bya ba'i phyir/_/
[\[248b.5\]]nag po'i sngags ni yongs su gzung /_/mkha' 'gro ma mo rnal 'byor mas/_/'gro ba'i don ni kun du khyab/_/rims dang gdon dang 'byung po dang /_/mkha' 'gro ma mo 'byung po dang /_/gdug pa rnams kyis kun du khyab/_/'jig rten sdug bsngal snod 'di ni/_/gzigs 
[\[248b.6\]]nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/_/thugs rje dag ni bskyed par gyur/_/kye ma'o sems can 'di sdug bsngal/_/de la rjes su brtse byed med/_/nga ni kho na rang byung ste/_/de bzhin sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog_/nga la log par rtog pa ste/_/skye dgu de la brtse ba med/_/dbang 
[\[248b.7\]]phyug chen po gang yin dang /_/gdug pa thams cad rab 'dul byed/_/yang dag byang chub rang byung 'gyur/_/skye dgu ma lus bskyab par bya/_/thams cad dag ni dgug bya zhing /_/de bzhin dam tshig bsrung bar bya/_/gnod dang phan pa byas nas ni/_/skye dgu 'di dag rnam par 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]grol/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/dkyil 'khor skyob dang phan 'dogs pa/_/zhes bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/_/sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs/_/mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun/_/'di ltar bka' ni nod par byed/_/de nas sangs rgyas thams 
[\[249a.2\]]cad kyi/_/de bzhin snying po phyung bar gyur/_/oM badzri sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M phaT/_de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/sangs rgyas bka' ni bzung nas kyang /_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i phyir/_/lcags kyu'i snying po rab tu phyung /_/o~M badzra sa ma ya A kaR+Sha ya sarba maN+da la 
[\[249a.3\]]badzra d+ha ra satwa mA ti kra ma hU~M phaT/_rig pa brjod par gyur pa yis/_/rdo rje lcags kyu shin tu brtan/_/lcags kyu bdag nyid che mchog ni/_/brgya phrag grangs med byung bar gyur/_/stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/_/rim bzhin rab tu thim par gyur/_/gang zhig phyogs 
[\[249a.4\]]rnams bcu po ru/_/gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur/_/gdug pa de rnams bkug nas kyang /_/de bzhin gong bu gcig tu bya/_/rdo rje me yis kun du gsungs/_/ri rab rtse mo phab nas ni/_/tshad med bgrang du med pa rnams/_/phyi rol gyi ni dkyil 'khor 
[\[249a.5\]]'ongs/_/rdo rje dbang po'i gnas kun du/_/'khor nyid du ni yang dag gnas/_/de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/_/gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor bos nas ni/_/kye gdug skye dgu rnams la ni/_/rnam par 'tshe ba spang bar gyis/_/khyed rnams kyis ni dam tshig long /_/srog 
[\[249a.6\]]chags thams cad gsod pa spangs/_/min na khyed rnams g.yas 'bar bas/_/de bzhin nga yis thal bar bya/_/gdug pa'i dam tshig dkyil 'khor gyis/_/tshig gcig tu ni zhus gyur pa/_/mgon po bdag cag sha za ste/_/ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig_/de nas 
[\[249a.7\]]rdo rje 'dzin drag pos/_/ma bsdams pa yi tshig gsan nas/_/rdo rje khro bo rab brjid bka'/_/snying po drag po gsungs par gyur/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+hAM sa ya bi kr-i ha sarba duSh+TAn sa ma ya mu drA man+Da la b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_mar d+ha mar d+ha/_khA da khA da/_pA ra man+t+ra/_badzra 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]sa ma ya hA phaT/_khro bo chen pos 'di brjod pas/_/rab drag gdug pa de dag ni/_/tshig cing rab tu 'gyel 'gyur zhing /_/dam tshig phyag rgya nyams par gyur/_/'o dod 'bod cing ngu bar gyur/_/gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/_/ji skad smra ba bzhin byas te/_/'on kyang 
[\[249b.2\]]bden par smra mi bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa' drag po che/_/rang bzhin gyis ni sangs rgyas bdag_/stobs chen gsang ba'i dbang po yis/_/bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/_/o~M ni sum b+ha ha na da ha pa tsa gr-ih+Na ban d+ha hUM phaT/_de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/sangs 
[\[249b.3\]]rgyas bka' la rab gnas pas/_/rdo rje khro bo rab za byed/_/snying po drag po brjod par gyur/_/o~M ma hA badzra kro d+ha pA da sarba duSh+Ta man+Da la phinA sha ya/_/sarba duSh+Ta sam ya yan bi ki ra bi d+h+waM sa ya s+pho Ta ya/_b+hany+dza ya/_b+hany+dza ya/_sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drAM b+han d+ha gr-ih+Na/_ha nad ha pa tsa/_sarba 
[\[249b.4\]]duSh+Ta sa ma ya sa twa sa ma ya hUM phaT/_de nas 'di ni brjod tsam gyis/_/rdo rje khro bo bdag nyid che/_/gtum po drag po shin tu 'jigs/_/rdo rje khro bo rab tu phyung /_/rigs bcas dpung dang bcas ldan pa/_/dam tshig sdang ba bzung nas ni/_/shin tu 'jigs pas skrag gyur cing /_/
[\[249b.5\]]rgya mtsho yang ni rab tu sgul/_/phyag rgya rab 'jigs de dag gis/_/rnam par bcom zhing zil gyis mnan/_/rdo rje me yis bsregs nas ni/_/thams cad du ni thal bar byas/_/byang sems las byung rdo rje can/_/ji ltar sems can sreg par byed/_/'di ni gzhug pa'i 
[\[249b.6\]]tshig yin te/_/phan pa'i rigs can rgyal bdag skyes/_/'dod chags skyon la sogs lta ba/_/nyon mongs dri ma gang shes nas/_/rdo rje can gyis dri ma 'di/_/bzung nas ye shes me yis bsregs/_/sems can shin tu 'jigs te skrag_/byang chub spyod pas byang 
[\[249b.7\]]chub gnas/_/mi bskyod pa yi gnas skyes shing /_/rdo rje can ni mchog tu gyur/_/phyag na rdo rje sems dpa' che/_/rdo rje chen po phyag rgya 'gugs/_/zhes bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/_/'jigs pa med par snyoms par zhugs/_/mkha' 'gro ma ni rjes sbyang phyir/_/
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]rgyal ba la ni bka' nod gyur/_/phyag na rdo rje stobs chen la/_/de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa/_/o~M ha na ha na badzra hU~M phaT/_de nas rdo rje 'dzin drag pos/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas/_/'jigs pa 'gugs pa'i rdo rje ni/_/rang 
[\[250a.2\]]nyid kyi ni sngags 'di brjod/_/o~M badzra A kaR+Sha ya shI g+h+raM/_sarba duSh+Ta gr-ih+Na badzra sa t+ye na hU~M dzaH/_de nas brjod pa tsam gyis ni/_/mkha' 'gro ma ni mdangs 'phrog pa/_/rnal 'byor sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas/_/ri rab tu ni kun du 'dus/_/rdo rje lcags kyus bkug 
[\[250a.3\]]nas ni/_/'bar ba dang bcas 'bar bar gyur/_/spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas rtsig_/smras pa rdo rje 'dzin pas skyobs/_/skal chen rdo rje can gyis gsungs/_/kye gdug tshogs chen po myur ba ru/_/gsod pa spongs la bka' nyan gyis/_/de dag re re zhing smras pa/_/bdag 
[\[250a.4\]]cag 'di rnams sha za ste/_/gang zhig rtag tu gson gyur pa/_/bdag cag la ni thabs bstan gsol/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang /_/de yis thabs ni 'di gsungs so/_/zla gcig lon nas shi ba gang /_/de ni bza' ba blang bar gyis/_/byang chub sems la chags 
[\[250a.5\]]bral nas/_/gsang ba smod pa lhur len pa/_/khyod dang lhan cig yang dag sbyor/_/de bza' ba ni gnang bar gyis/_/phyag rgya yi ni snying po 'di/_/rtag tu bcang bar bya ba ste/_/phyi rol thams cad spangs nas ni/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar gyis/_/o~M badzra 
[\[250a.6\]]pra ti gr-i h+Na hr-i da ya A kaR+Sha ya/_tsar+ya yaM me sa d+ho d+he na mi ni ya te hA sa ri d+ha yaM ni Sh+ka ma du sa ma ya hU~M dzaH/_de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan/_/khro bo spyi gtsug rgyal po ni/_/rnal 'byor pa ni de yis spros/_/gal te dam tshig las 'das na/_/
[\[250a.7\]]khra bo bdag nyid chen po yi/_/rtag tu mgo bo 'gas byed cing /_/rigs dang bcas pa nges par sreg_/bdud rtsi sman gyi rgyal po zhes/_/bya ba de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/_/sems dpa' chen po snyoms zhugs nas/_/nad kyi don du tshol bar gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_/o~M badzra hU~M phaT/_de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/sems can thams cad 'jig byed pas/_/nad rnams thams cad bkug nas ni/_/'gugs pa yi ni snying po brjod/_/o~M badzra sa ma ya A na ya sarba duSh+Ta dz+wA ra Ni di nA sha ya hUM phaT/_de nas 
[\[250b.2\]]brjod pa tsam gyis kyang /_/nad dang gdon gyi tshogs kun dang /_/rims sogs kyis ni de thos nas/_/steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo/_/'bar ba'i me dang yang dag ldan/_/ha ha zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed/_/bdag cag rigs ni ma gzhom par/_/
[\[250b.3\]]khro bo chen po bka' stsol cig_/rdo rje rnal 'byor chen pos gsungs/_/nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon/_/sems can nye bar 'joms pa spongs/_/mdangs kyang 'phrog par ma byed cig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_kye rgyal po rdo rje bdag cag gis/_/srog gi srung ba 
[\[250b.4\]]mdzad du gsol/_/bdag cag kun nas gzi brjid za/_/thabs ni cung zad brtsam du gsol/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/de nas stobs chen gyis smras pa/_/nga yi sngags dang phyag rgya dag_/gang zhig bsrung la gnod ma byed/_/o~M badzra karma bi sho d+ha ya 
[\[250b.5\]]sarba A pa ra Na ni bud d+ha sa twe sam ye hU~M/_de nas phyag rgya chen po kun/_/theg pa chen por mngon bsdus pa/_/mdo sde gsang ba rgyal po las/_/yongs su bshad pa thams cad kun/_/sngags dang phyag rgya gnas gang na/_/rtag par rab tu sbyong byed pas/_/gnas 
[\[250b.6\]]de ru yang rtag pa ru/_/khyed rnams shin tu gnod ma byed/_/de skad gsungs pas gdon kun ni/_/hi hi zhes ni sgrogs par gyur/_/spyi bo'i rnal 'byor pa la ni/_/gnod pa byed pa thams cad gtad/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug 
[\[250b.7\]]gis/_/sdig pa bral ba'i phyag rgya che/_/blo gros chen po snyoms par zhugs/_/ngan song bcing bar bya ba'i phyir/_/mgon po dag la bka' nod byed/_/mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/kun nas snying po brjod par gyur/_/o~M k+She pa ya badzra swA hA/_rdo rje sha 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]sems dpa'i thabs chen po/_/rdo rje las ni yang dag byung /_/sems can rnams la brtse bya'i phyir/_/sdig pa thams cad bkug par gyur/_/o~M sarba pA paM a pA ya na bi sho d+ha na badzra sa ma ya hU~M phaT/_de skad brjod nas rnal 'byor ches/_/skad cig 
[\[251a.2\]]gis ni ngan song bkug_/ri yi rgyal po nye ba ru/_/ngu 'bod la sogs snang bar gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rnal 'byor ches/_/ngan song sems can la smras pa/_/dkon mchog gsum dang nga bstan la/_/myur du bstan pa skyabs su song /_/de dag thams cad kyis 
[\[251a.3\]]smras pa/_/stobs chen bdag cag bskyab tu gsol/_/gtso bos ji skad bka' stsal pa/_/de bzhin du ni bgyi bar 'tshal/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/sdig pa dral ba nges 'ching ba/_/sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms pa/_/mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par 
[\[251a.4\]]gyur/_/o~M badzra pA Ni bi s+pho Ta ya/_sarba a pA ya b+han d+ha nA ni pra mo k+Sha ya sarbA pA ya ga ta b+h+yaH/_sarba satwaM/_sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sam ya T+wA tha/_sems can ngan song rgyu can rnams/_/rig pa 'di yis dbang bskur bas/_/ngan song 'khor lo dral bar gyur/_/rgya mtsho ru 
[\[251a.5\]]ni rab tu ltung /_/de bzhin ngan song shi 'phos nas/_/de kun rab tu grol bar gyur/_/sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol/_/rdo rje dbang po'i gnas thob gyur/_/de bzhin thub pa rnam snang gi/_/zhabs drung du ni skyes par gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i mthu yis 
[\[251a.6\]]ni/_/de bzhin mi khom zad par gyur/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/_/de nas skad cig des zhi thob/_/rmad byung sna tshogs gsang chen po/_/cho 'phrul dag ni skyes par gyur/_/stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/_/rdo rje rin chen rang bzhin gnas/_/rin chen bdun 
[\[251a.7\]]gyis rab tu spras/_/rdo rje rin chen gyis rab mdzes/_/de yi rigs kyi nang song kun/_/sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par sbyangs/_/sems can bde ba skyes par gyur/_/rdo rje bde ba yang dag ldan/_/mchog chen po yi zhing 'di ni/_/dag pa'i zhing du rab tu grags/_/
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]sems can dag pa kun du khyab/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor rdor rang bzhin/_/slar yang shing gi nags la sogs/_/rmad byung chen po snang ba med/_/rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin kun/_/nags dang rtswa las skyes par gyur/_/mthon dman dag dang rnam par bral/_/lag 
[\[251b.2\]]mthil bzhin du mnyam par snang /_/ka tsa li ltar reg na bde/_/stong gsum rab tu gnas par gyur/_/dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal kun/_/dang por ngan song nye bar zhi/_/bkres skom pa yi sdug bsngal dag_/kun du 'gags par mnyam par gnas/_/rgya 
[\[251b.3\]]mtsho kun du thim par gyur/_/ri bo gzugs kyang kun du khyab/_/gzhan 'phrul gyi ni lha rnams dang /_/mtshungs pa ru ni mi rnams gyur/_/slar yang mu khyud 'khor lo med/_/ri rab man+da ra dag med/_/lha yi 'jig rten gnas kyang med/_/rgya mtsho med cing lha min med/_/
[\[251b.4\]]klu yi gnas gzhi dag kyang med/_/mi yi khyim dang khang pa med/_/grong khyer ljongs dang yul 'khor dang /_/phug dang bcas par rnam par bral/_/mi yi gnas kyang med pa nyid/_/chu bo phug dang lung pa med/_/mi dag gi ni lus kyang med/_/sems can 'ga' yang 
[\[251b.5\]]'dir mi snang /_/ngan song 'khor lo dag kyang med/_/mi khom med cing sdug bsngal med/_/bud med skyes pa la sogs med/_/rnga mo glang po lug kyang med/_/dpag bsam shing dang spos kyi shing /_/rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin mdzes/_/spos kyi chu yi rgya mtsho dang /_/rin 
[\[251b.6\]]chen sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes/_/shing ni yid 'ong thams cad la/_/rol mo'i sgra ni mngon par phyung /_/rol mo'i chos kyi sgra dag kyang /_/stong gsum du ni yongs su byung /_/ji ltar rdo rje dbang po yi/_/ri rab ri yi rtse mo ltar/_/de bzhin stong gsum gyi ni gnas/_/rnam 
[\[251b.7\]]pa sna tshogs 'od 'bar gyur/_/stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/_/gru bzhir rab tu gnas par gyur/_/kun nas phyi rol gnas rnams ni/_/kha khyer du yang snang bar gyur/_/slar yang nyi ma zla ba med/_/skur ma med cing lha yang med/_/rang gi khang pa'i nang du yang /_/
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]lha rnams nyid kyang mthong mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas 'od kyis yongs su gsal/_/'od zer sna tshogs yid 'phrog pa/_/gang gis zhing ni yang dag sbyangs/_/rdo rje rin chen yid 'ong ba/_/rdo rje dbang po'i gnas nyid kyang /_/slar yang snang bar 
[\[252a.2\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan du gzhi ni gcig pa'i gnas/_/gang du sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa/_/stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/_/lha yi pad+ma yongs su gsal/_/rin chen sna bdun rab tu mdzes/_/dri yi tshogs ni yid 'ong ldan/_/bskal pa chen po'i zhing 
[\[252a.3\]]gi dbus/_/dkyil 'khor shin tu sdug steng du/_/dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu yi/_/rdo rje seng ge'i khri byung gyur/_/kun nas phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu ldan/_/rdo rje rin chen rang bzhin mdzes/_/seng ge'i khri ni bzhi byung gyur/_/
[\[252a.4\]]rdo rje bla re rnam par bres/_/dar gyi chun pos rnam par 'phyang /_/dril bu'i dra ba rnam par 'phyang /_/zhing ni kun nas rab tu spras/_/me tog sna tshogs kun du bkram/_/sna tshogs sprin gyis rab tu g.yogs/_/sna tshogs dri yis kun du khyab/_/dpag bsam shing gis 
[\[252a.5\]]nye bar spras/_/dpag bsam shing ni yid 'ong ldan/_/rdo rje'i rol mo mdzes pa dag_/sgra ni mngon par 'byin par byed/_/'di nyid dang ni lhan cig zhing /_/sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin du/_/phyogs rnams kun du snang bar gyur/_/slar yang 'jigs par 'gyur ba 
[\[252a.6\]]med/_/stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/_/gang gA'i bye snyed grangs med pa/_/shin tu phra ba'i rdul snyed kyi/_/sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su gsal/_/til gyi gang bu gang ba bzhin/_/sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su gsal/_/phyogs rnams kun nas 
[\[252a.7\]]ma lus par/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 'dir gshegs 'gyur/_/dbus kyi seng ge'i gdan dag la/_/chos dbyings 'jigs pa med pa la/_/rnam par snang mdzad stobs chen po/_/ston pa bcom ldan bzhugs par gyur/_/shar du yang ni mi bskyod pa/_/lho ru 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]rin chen 'byung ldan te/_/nub tu 'od dpag med pa yin/_/byang du don yod grub pa ste/_/mgon po chen po phyogs bzhi ru/_/rdo rje yi ni steng du bzhugs/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu ni/_/mnyam du dmigs nas rnam par gnas/_/chos kyi dbyings 
[\[252b.2\]]nas bstan par gyur/_/sangs rgyas thams cad brtan par bzhugs/_/mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/_/chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mdzad/_/sangs rgyas grangs med thams cad ni/_/rdo rje can ni lnga la bzhugs/_/phyogs ni re rer khyab gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[252b.3\]]gcig gis yang dag bzhugs/_/mtshams dang steng dang 'og dag gi/_/rnam snang mdzad kyis brtan par mdzad/_/chos kyi dbyings ni brtan gyur pa/_/dbus kyi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bzhugs/_/de nas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa/_/chos dang longs spyod rdzogs 
[\[252b.4\]]snying po/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul pa/_/sangs rgyas thams cad rang nyid kyi/_/seng ge'i khri ni lnga la bzhugs/_/grangs med tshad ni med pa yi/_/sangs rgyas chos nyid ma lus pa/_/ri mo gsal ba dang mtshungs par/_/stong gsum dag ni ma lus 
[\[252b.5\]]gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba che/_/pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs par gyur/_/dbus kyi 'khor lo yang dag ldan/_/bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/_/sangs rgyas rol pa dang ldan par/_/rdo rje can ni thams cad bzhugs/_/shar gyi cha las yang dag bzhugs/_/
[\[252b.6\]]bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/_/rdo rje rnam 'phrul ston byed pa/_/'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur/_/lho yi phyogs na thams cad gnas/_/bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/_/rin chen rnam 'phrul yang dag ldan/_/'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur/_/
[\[252b.7\]]bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/_/nub kyi phyogs na yang dag gnas/_/pad+ma'i rnam 'phrul ston byed pa/_/'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur/_/bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/_/byang gi phyogs na rnam par gnas/_/las kyi rnam 'phrul ston byed pa/_/'khor 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur/_/gsang dang mchod pa gang yin dang /_/lha mo rdo rje lha mo ni/_/grangs med tshad ni med pa dag_/bcu gnyis kyis ni dkyil 'khor gang /_/sgo srung dag ni grangs med pa/_/rnal 'byor mchog dang ldan pa 
[\[253a.2\]]bzhi/_/rgyal po shar dang lho dag tu/_/nub dang byang ni yang dag gnas/_/chos kyi sku las yang dag byung /_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gyur pa/_/sems dpa' chen po 'di dag kun/_/chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung /_/gang zhig phyogs bcu dag gi 
[\[253a.3\]]yang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid che/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i sa thob pa/_/de dag kun kyang 'dir 'ongs pa/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni gang gA yi/_/bye ma dang mnyam ji snyed pa/_/yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i tshogs/_/de dag thams cad yang dag gshegs/_/
[\[253a.4\]]sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yis ni/_/zhing dag rgya ni chen por gyur/_/yul rnams thams cad bya ba yang /_/gnod pa med cing 'tshe ba'ang med/_/stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten pa'i/_/ji ltar sngon ni bar med pa'i/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/bar med 
[\[253a.5\]]pa ni de bzhin gnas/_/gang nas sangs rgyas mi snang ba/_/phyogs ni rdul tsam yod ma yin/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor che/_/gang dag sa ni bzhi bcu dang /_/yang na chos las byung ba nyid/_/sangs rgyas sras ni grags pa che/_/rigs lnga byung ba la sogs 
[\[253a.6\]]pa/_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston pa dang /_/'dir gnas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs/_/mchog rnams phyogs dang phyogs mtshams mthong /_/sangs rgyas dag ni grangs med kun/_/lha rnams yang dag gnas 'di ru/_/sangs rgyas lnga ni mthong bar gyur/_/
[\[253a.7\]]sangs rgyas dgra bcom ma gtogs par/_/zhing 'dir 'ga' yang mthong ma gyur/_/rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor lo min/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni tshogs kyang min/_/dbus dang phyogs ni yang dag bzhugs/_/sangs rgyas lnga na mthong bar gyur/_/dbang phyug chen po gnod 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]byed pa'i/_/rdo rje khro bo mthong bar gyur/_/sangs rgyas lnga dang de bzhin du/_/khro bo drug bdun rnam par gnas/_/tshangs sogs lha rnams de dag kyang /_/ngo mtshar dag ni skyes par gyur/_/'jigs shing skrag nas lha de dag_/gcig la gcig ni smra bar 
[\[253b.2\]]byed/_/gtso bo ji bzhin mthong 'gyur zhing /_/shin tu ngo mtshar ci zhig snang /_/slar yang lha yi 'jig rten dag_/srid pa nang du mthong mi 'gyur/_/'gro ba lnga yi sems can min/_/ri rab dang ni rgya mtsho min/_/zla ba nyi ma ma mthong zhing /_/ri dang khang pa dag kyang 
[\[253b.3\]]min/_/ci bdag cag ni rmongs gyur tam/_/yang na mig ni long bar gyur/_/yang na bdag cag sems g.yengs pa/_/sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul 'di ci zhig_/bdag cag gis ni sngar 'jigs mthong /_/drag cing bkug nas thal bar byas/_/ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru/_/sdug 
[\[253b.4\]]bsngal chen pos gzir bar gyur/_/slar yang ri rab yod ma yin/_/khro bo rdzu 'phrul chen po med/_/gzhan dang khro bo chen po gcig_/dbang phyug chen po gnod par byed/_/gnas ni chung ngur gyur pa yang /_/rgya chen po ru 'di ru snang /_/stong gsum 'di yang mi snang 
[\[253b.5\]]ste/_/bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin/_/de ltar brjod pa sna tshogs pa/_/gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/_/mi smra bar ni gnas gyur nas/_/rdo rje can la lta bar byed/_/gnod sbyin 'byung po sha za sogs/_/gdug pa kun dang gdon sogs kyis/_/mun 
[\[253b.6\]]par khyab pa bzhin du ni/_/stong gsum 'di ni mthong bar gyur/_/gzhan ni cung zad ma mthong ste/_/gzhan du phyogs dag mun pas khyab/_/rdo rje khro bo 'khrul gyur cing /_/sgyu ma yis ni rmongs gyur cing /_/kun du rmongs pa nyid gyur cing /_/gcig la gcig ni rmongs 
[\[253b.7\]]par gyur/_/ha ha zhes bya'i sgra sgrogs shing /_/bdag cag 'dir ni gang du phyin/_/tshig ni rab tu rjod byed cing /_/gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/_/'di ni su zhig bdag cag gang /_/'di ni su yi gam du phyin/_/bdag cag rang gi gnas na ltung /_/bdag 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin/_/rdo rje khro bos gsad par gyur/_/'o na 'di ni ci zhig yin/_/lha yi gnas kyang ma mthong bzhin/_/rdo rje can yang mthong ma gyur/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo min/_/bdag cag rnams ni mun par gyur/_/
[\[254a.2\]]rang gi gnas kyang ma mthong zhing /_/ri rab nyid kyang mthong ma gyur/_/mtsho dang rgya mtsho dag kyang min/_/skar ma zla ba nyi ma min/_/bdag cag thams cad gang nas 'ongs/_/yul gang zhig tu 'gro bar bya/_/'gro ba lnga yang yod ma yin/_/'jig rten med cing ma mo med/_/
[\[254a.3\]]mi dang mi ma yin pa dag_/rnam pa kun du mthong ma gyur/_/sngon ni ji ltar de bzhin phyis/_/rmad du byung ba nyid ma gyur/_/gzhan du sa ni g.yos par gyur/_/rlung dag gis ni rnam par bskyod/_/'brug gi sgra dang log chen po/_/sdug bsngal thams cad yang dag 
[\[254a.4\]]ldan/_/bkres skom la sogs sdug bsngal dang /_/bral min kun du sdug bsngal gyur/_/der ni lha chen rdzu 'phrul dag_/cung zad kyang ni mthong ma gyur/_/dmyal ba [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dud 'gro dag_/rnam par nyams shing bshig par gyur/_/sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya yis/_/
[\[254a.5\]]ngan song gsum ni nye bar zhi/_/lha gang 'du shes med pa dang /_/gzugs med pa na spyod par gnas/_/phung po lnga ru rang bdag nyid/_/ngo mtshar de bzhin mthong gyur nas/_/rang nyid la'ang rtog par byed/_/gcig la gcig kyang lta bar byed/_/de bzhin thams 
[\[254a.6\]]cad skrag cing 'jigs/_/ngo mtshar gyur pa 'di ci zhig_/tshad med bskal pa chen po ru/_/bdag cag dag par gnas par gyur/_/bdag mchog las ni bdag cag grol/_/slar yang bdag tu 'dzin par gyur/_/sngon gyi bag chags mngon 'dod la/_/
[\[254a.7\]]srid gsum gnas nas mthong bar gyur/_/srid pa gsum yang mthong ma yin/_/de bzhin 'gro ba lnga yang med/_/gzhan du shin tu dag par gcig_/chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa sprul/_/sangs rgyas lnga nyid mthong bar gyur/_/srid gsum 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]gnas ni gzhan dag min/_/tshogs la thams cad mnyes par gyur/_/gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/_/'di ni su zhig bdag cag gang /_/bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin/_/sngon nas bdag gis 'jig rten 'di/_/'gro ba lnga bcas de 
[\[254b.2\]]bzhin du/_/ri rab dang ni rgya mtshor bcas/_/lha rnams drug ni 'khor bcas mthong /_/srid pa gsum gyi lha rnams ni/_/gang zhig 'di ni mthong ma gyur/_/gzhal yas khang dang sems can ni/_/gtso bo ji bzhin mthong bar gyur/_/de 'dra'i ngo mtshar 
[\[254b.3\]]sna tshogs pa/_/gnas chen 'di ru mthong bar gyur/_/byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul 'di/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis rol ba yin/_/gang zhig stong gsum 'di yi ni/_/rang rgyal thams cad mchog gyur pa/_/de yang kun du rmongs gyur nas/_/rnam par 'phrul 
[\[254b.4\]]pa'ang mthong ma gyur/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma yin/_/rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras kyang min/_/chos kyi dbyings ni brtan zhi ba/_/gnas ni de ru mthong ma gyur/_/gzhan du stong ni gsum po 'di/_/rnam pa kun du ma mthong nyid/_/sa dang me dang chu khams min/_/
[\[254b.5\]]gser gyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang min/_/'gro ba lnga yi sems can min/_/zla ba nyi ma dag kyang min/_/skar ma gza' dang rgyu skar min/_/sems can dag kyang khams gsum min/_/'di dag thams cad stong par gyur/_/gzhan du nam mkha' dkyil 'khor 
[\[254b.6\]]min/_/de dag thams cad 'jigs skrag nas/_/mya ngan 'das pa nye bar thob/_/gang yang phyogs rnams bcu po yi/_/nyan thos 'jigs pa med pa rnams/_/byang sems can ni chen po yis/_/de dag kun nas skrag par gyur/_/rang rang gi ni zhing dag tu/_/
[\[254b.7\]]sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma gyur/_/'dus pa chen po dag dang ni/_/chos rnams ston pa dag kyang min/_/zhing de yi ni sems can min/_/lha dang mi rnams dag kyang min/_/khang pa med cing zhing yang med/_/sa dang me dang rlung yang med/_/rang gi 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]zhing yang ma mthong zhing /_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs par gyur/_/skad cig gis ni mi dgar gyur/_/thang cig tu ni rmongs par gyur/_/de lta bu yi rnam 'phrul du/_/byang chub sems ni rab tu snang /_/sngon gyi bskal ba chen po la/_/'khor lo 
[\[255a.2\]]rnam par 'phrul pa bstan/_/bcom ldan rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas/_/de lta bu ni byin gyis brlabs/_/sems can gang dag 'di na gnas/_/nyin dang mtshan mo mi shes gyur/_/de nas de nyid gsang ba che/_/chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa'i tshogs/_/chos dang longs 
[\[255a.3\]]spyod rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/de lta bu yi rnam 'phrul byung /_/stong gsum yongs su bsdus pa yi/_/lha yi gnas ni bkod par gyur/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas gcig pu/_/chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/_/la lar sngon pos rab tu mdzes/_/sa yi 
[\[255a.4\]]phyogs ni rab tu spras/_/rdo rje sdon pos rab tu brgyan/_/la lar gser gyi mdog tu snang /_/kha dog ser pos rnam par brgyan/_/sa yi cha yang rab tu spras/_/rdo rje ser pos rab tu brgyan/_/la lar kha dog dmar po ni/_/byi ru lta bus rab tu mdzes/_/sa yi 
[\[255a.5\]]cha yang rab tu spras/_/rdo rje dmar pos rab tu brgyan/_/la lar btsag gi mdog can gyi/_/baiDUr+ya mtshungs rab tu mdzes/_/sa yi cha yang rnam par spras/_/rdo rje btsod kyis rnam par mdzes/_/la lar shel gyi mdog can gyis/_/shin tu snang bas rab tu 
[\[255a.6\]]mdzes/_/sa yi cha yang rnam par spras/_/rdo rje shel gyis rnam par brgyan/_/shar du sngon po chen po ste/_/lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan/_/nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste/_/byang ni btsod dang yang dag ldan/_/dbus kyi sa yi cha dag ni/_/shel gyi mdog can 
[\[255a.7\]]bla na med/_/rdo rje chen pos shin tu dag_/tshon rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin bshad/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhi yis rab tu mdzes/_/cha mnyam legs par bgos pa ste/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]dang ni yang dag ldan/_/kun nas phyi rol gnas dag na/_/rdo 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]rje kha khyer yang dag ldan/_/kun nas kha khyer dang ldan zhing /_/sgo yi kha khyer dag gis spras/_/ri mo rdo rje sngo rang bzhin/_/gzhan yang gser gyi mdog can dang /_/kha dog dmar po mchog dang ni/_/gzhan yang shel ni bzang po dag_/rin chen kun gyi 
[\[255b.2\]]rang bzhin mchog_/dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdzes gyur pa/_/sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa'i mchog_/rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod/_/dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras/_/zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes/_/g.yer ka'i dra bas kun du khebs/_/dril 
[\[255b.3\]]bu'i mchog ni kun du 'phyang /_/sna tshogs shing ni yid 'ong ldan/_/dpag bsam shing ni yid 'ong ldan/_/spos dang me tog de bzhin dri/_/snang ba'i shing mchog yang dag ldan/_/sna tshogs bkod pa nye bar ldan/_/sna tshogs rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu/_/mtsho mchog 
[\[255b.4\]]chu yis gang bar gyur/_/rdo rje rgya mtsho rgya chen ldan/_/me tog sna tshogs kun du bkram/_/sna tshogs bdug pa dag gis bdugs/_/sna tshogs dri yi chu yis gtor/_/sna tshogs dri yis kun du khyab/_/drag po chen po sras bcu dag_/de nas nyams dga' ba 
[\[255b.5\]]dag byung /_/shing dang pad sogs thams cad las/_/chos rnams 'byung ba thos par gyur/_/phyogs rnams kun du rnam phyung nas/_/dag pa'i zhing du stong nyid bcas/_/rnam par sgra ni gang zhig grag_/chos kyi bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_/ya~M/_la~M/_sha~M/_baM/_
[\[255b.6\]]oM badzra sa twa kro d+ha ya hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha rA ga ya hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra duSh+Ti kro d+ha ya sA d+hu sA d+hu hU~M phaT/_khro bo rdo rje rin chen mchog_/'bar ba'i phreng ba bkod dka' bas/_/khro bo rdo rje bla na med/_/mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par 
[\[255b.7\]]gyur/_/o~M badzra b+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+ha ha na hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra sUr+ya ma hA dz+wa la mA la kro d+ha dz+wA la ya sarba hU~M phaT/_oM badzra ke tu ma hA kro d+ha d+he na hU~M phaT/_o~M aT+Ta hA sa badzra maT+Ta hA sa kro d+ha ha ha ha ha hU~M phaT/_khro bo chen po rdo rje chos/_/'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab gyur pas/_/
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]khro bo'i rgyal po rab bzod dka'/_/mchog tu 'jigs su rung ba smras/_/o~M badzra d+harma bi sho d+ha ya hU~M phaT/_o~M tik+Sh+Na kro d+ha ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra he tu kro d+ha pra be sha ya maN+Da laM sarba hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha b+hA Sha ta pA ta hU~M phaT/_rdo rje las ni rgyal 
[\[256a.2\]]po che/_/gsang ba thams cad kun bsdus pas/_/'bar ba gsal bas khyab pa byung /_/khro bo rgyal pos brjod par gyur/_/o~M badzra karma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra ka ba tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha khA da khA da hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha muSh+Ti sA d+ha ya sa 
[\[256a.3\]]ma ya hU~M phaT/_sems dpa' 'di rnams gsang ba che/_/zhi ba'i gzugs las rnam par gyur/_/rdo rje khro bo drag po che/_/'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs gyur/_/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/khro bo chen po stobs po che/_/gsang ba 'di rnams yongs 
[\[256a.4\]]su brjod/_/mchod pa'i lha mos gsungs par gyur/_/o~M badzra lA s+ye rA ga ya hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra mA lai a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra gI t+ye gA ta ya hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra nr-i t+ye ba shi ku ru hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra puSh+pa pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra gan d+ha pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa 
[\[256a.5\]]ma ye hU~MphaT/_o~M badzra d+hU pa pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra A lo kai pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M phaT/_de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/khro bo drag po shin tu gdug_/rdo rje khro bo rab gtum pa/_/sgo srung dag ni kun du byung /_/o~M aM ku sha ma hA kro d+ha A 
[\[256a.6\]]kaR+Sha ya sarba sa ma ya hU~M dzaH/_o~M badzra pA sha ma hA kro d+ha pra be sha ya sarba sa ma ya hU~M hU~M/_o~M badzra s+pho Ta ma hA kro d+ha ban d+ha ya sarba sa ma ya hU~M ba~M/_o~M badzra A be sha ma hA kro d+ha A be sha ya sarba sa ma ya hU~M phaT/_hoH/_'khor lo yongs su zlum por ni/_/rdo rje 'dzin 
[\[256a.7\]]pa chen por gyur/_/khro bo chen po'i tshogs kyis khyab/_/dkyil 'khor chen po yang dag ldan/_/gnas chen po dang yang dag ldan/_/dkyil 'khor chen por kun bsdus pas/_/shin tu gsang ba chos chen po/_/chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/_/
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]de nyid snying po gsang ba che/_/thar pa chen po grong khyer mchog_/dkyil 'khor rgyal po chen po ste/_/sems can don kun yang dag ldan/_/chos nyid rdzogs par byang chub pa/_/'di 'dra chos dang longs spyod rdzogs/_/rigs lnga'i gsang ba gang yin 
[\[256b.2\]]pa/_/gdon mi za bar byed pa yi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zhi ba/_/gang phyir dag pa'i tshogs chen po/_/de bzhin rdo rje'i rigs drag po/_/gang phyir lha chen rab 'dul byed/_/lha chen la sogs sprul byed pa/_/de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs mchog ste/_/
[\[256b.3\]]gang phyir gdul bya'i sems can rnams/_/sprul pa sna tshogs yang dag byung /_/sprul pa'i 'khor lo zhi ba ste/_/drag po'i mchod pa rab bskor ba/_/sna tshogs rigs can 'khor lo ste/_/rigs bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 
[\[256b.4\]]mchog ni/_/shar gyi 'khor lo yang dag byung /_/de nas rdo rje'i rigs drag po/_/sems can don du yang dag 'jigs/_/rdo rje'i rigs mchog chen po 'di/_/dkyil 'khor tshogs ni kun bsdus pa/_/gsang ba'i dbang phyug rgyal po che/_/gang phyir 
[\[256b.5\]]gsang ba'i bdag por bshad/_/rdo rje thams cad kun bsdus pa/_/rang gi rigs mchog bshad nas ni/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po ches/_/dkyil 'khor chen po kun du sprul/_/lha la sogs pa gdug pa kun/_/skad cig de la yang dag bkug_/slar ni 
[\[256b.6\]]bcug par byas nas kyang /_/skad cig gis ni dam tshig phog_/rdo rje mtshan ma'i dbang bskur ba/_/dam tshig ldan pa byin nas ni/_/bkug ste rab tu bcug nas kyang /_/de bzhin bcings te dbang du byas/_/dam tshig la ni brtson byas te/_/dam tshig sdom 
[\[256b.7\]]pa de bzhin no/_/mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir/_/dkyil 'khor mchog ni gsungs par gyur/_/'khor lo chen po grong khyer che/_/rdo rje rigs mchog chen po ste/_/khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba/_/de nas yang dag bshad par bya/_/'jig rten gsum 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]tshogs pham byas nas/_/lha la sogs pa rab bcug gyur/_/de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal gnas/_/'khor lo chen po grong khyer che/_/gang ming gzung ba tsam nyid kyis/_/sems can rab tu bcom nas ni/_/gdon la sogs pa 'bros 
[\[257a.2\]]par byed/_/rims dang gdon dang dug dag dang /_/drag po gdug pa dam tshig dang /_/mtshan bzang ba yi mod nyid la/_/skrag pa dang ni g.yo bar gyur/_/sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchog_/mi gang dag ni gdul bya min/_/de bas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni/_/dkyil 
[\[257a.3\]]'khor chen po sprul par gyur/_/rdo rje slob dpon skal ba che/_/shin tu byang zhing rab tu mkhas/_/dgongs pa yi ni cho ga shes/_/gzhung rnams thos shing don la mkhas/_/rab tu dang zhing blo ldan brtan/_/rigs dang rigs min rab tu shes/_/byang chub sems 
[\[257a.4\]]la brtson par gyur/_/lha gzhan dag la 'dod ldan min/_/gsang ba'i snying po mchog mthong ba/_/snying rje bdag nyid brtser ldan pa/_/dag cing des la rnam par dul/_/rang gi ngang gis rnam par gnas/_/zhen cing chags la gdug pa min/_/rmongs pa med 
[\[257a.5\]]cing le lo med/_/brtse ldan phan pa'i bsam pa can/_/rtag tu rnam par da god la dga'/_/gzugs sogs 'dod pa'i yon tan la/_/chags shing lhag par rgyal gyur nas/_/srid la sems ni skrag par byed/_/srid la mngon par chags pa med/_/theg 
[\[257a.6\]]pa chen po'i tshul la brtson/_/theg pa gzhan la 'dod ldan min/_/sems can kun gyi don la brtson/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi mchog byung ba/_/nyon mongs kun du chags pa spangs/_/gnyen po dag ni rab tu bsgom/_/'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs 
[\[257a.7\]]che/_/mi sdug pa la sogs pa bsgom/_/rigs dang rigs min cho ga shes/_/sngags dang phyag rgya shin tu mkhas/_/dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang /_/dbang du bya dang gshegs gsol dang /_/ji skad rdo rje dbyings bshad yin/_/sngon du rig 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]pa'i brtul zhugs bya/_/kha na ma tho rdul tsam la/_/kun du 'dzem par bya ba yin/_/tshad dang tshon rtsi srad bu dang /_/yo byad cho ga yang dag ldan/_/bcing dang phur bus gdab pa nyid/_/sngar bshad rdo rje dbyings bzhin du/_/bza' ba dang ni mi bza' ba/_/rdo rje 
[\[257b.2\]]snyems tshul ting 'dzin gyis/_/rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du/_/sngar ni ji ltar de bzhin bya/_/de nas yang dag rab bshad bya/_/dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/_/rdo rje dbyings dang rab tu mtshungs/_/dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog_/
[\[257b.3\]]gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhes ni rnam par brgyan/_/thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/_/dar gyi chun pos rnam par brgyan/_/rgya cher ji ltar rigs pa ru/_/ji bzhin rdo rje grong khyer che/_/rdo rje dbyings dang rab tu mtshungs/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i grong 
[\[257b.4\]]khyer bri/_/'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan/_/ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan/_/de dbus rang bzhin 'khor lo yi/_/dbus su sangs rgyas dgod par bya/_/rnam par snang mdzad ston pa che/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po 
[\[257b.5\]]che/_/sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs dkyil 'khor/_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni/_/'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya/_/rdo rje me ltar 'bar nyid ni/_/phyag rgya 'jig rten gsum 'joms pa/_/g.yas su rin chen phyag rgya ni/_/'bar ba'i dbus su 
[\[257b.6\]]dgod par bya/_/g.yon du pad+ma'i phyag rgya bri/_/rgyab tu rdo rje rnon po ni/_/'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya/_/phyag rgya yi ni rgyal po bzhi/_/'bar ba'i me dang rab tu ldan/_/rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor che/_/chos dbyings grong khyer chen po 
[\[257b.7\]]la/_/'khor los sgyur ba bzhi po yi/_/phyag rgya dag kyang dgod par bya/_/gang dang gang gi thig gyur pa/_/dkyil 'khor shes rab can thig gdab/_/rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis/_/rdo rje'i thig ni yongs su gzung /_/oM badzra sa ma ya sU traM mA ti kra 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]ma hU~M/_dkyil 'khor chen po bsdus pa yi/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs bsdus pa/_/rgyal po bri zhing dgod par bya/_/o~M badzra be gA kra ma hU~M/_tshon rtsi thams cad yang dag ldan/_/'bar ba'i lta bas thams cad 
[\[258a.2\]]blta/_/rdo rje tshon rtsi bkye bya zhing /_/rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul/_/o~M badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hU~M/_phyag rgya gang zhig dgod par du/_/snying po thams cad dgod par bya/_/sngar ni dgod pa gang yin pa/_/rdo rje gzugs ni skor byed pa/_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad dkyil 'khor du/_/
[\[258a.3\]]rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po/_/mi bskyod shin tu mnyam bzhag pa/_/zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa/_/mche ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs/_/khro bo'i rgyal po 'bar bas khyab/_/phyag na phyag rgya dang bcas mtshon/_/rdo rje hU~M 
[\[258a.4\]]mdzad phyag rgya ni/_/steng du phyag gnyis yang dag ldan/_/de bzhin kho nar phyag gnyis dag_/lcags kyu 'phyar ba yang dag ldan/_/phyag gcig gis ni zhags pa bsnams/_/gcig gis rdo rje yang dag bsnams/_/mda' 'gengs pa yi phyag rgya dang /_/phyag gnyis 
[\[258a.5\]]dag ni shin tu ldan/_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad phyag rgya ste/_/dbang phyug chen po kun du mnan/_/g.yas pas lha mo u ma yi/_/nu ma'i bar du gnon par byed/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/rdo rje khro bo dgod par bya/_/'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab cing 'bar/_/khro bo 'jigs 
[\[258a.6\]]par byed pa mchog_/mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' ste/_/g.yas su rdo rje rgyal po 'o/_/g.yon du rdo rje chags pa ste/_/rgyab tu rdo rje legs pa'o/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/lho ru khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/khro bo'i rgyal po khro gnyer can/_/khro bos yongs su 
[\[258a.7\]]bskor bar bri/_/thams cad 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab/_/gdong ni khro bcas bzhad ldan pa/_/rdo rje dbang phyug phyag rgyar ldan/_/khro gnyer can ni yongs su brjod/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/rdo rje khro bo bdag nyid che/_/sngags dang phyag rgya yongs su bsdu/_/
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]rang gi gnas su yang dag bri/_/mdun du rdo rje rin chen te/_/g.yas su khro bo gzi brjid do/_/g.yon du rgyal mtshan drag po ste/_/rgyab tu khro bo bzhad pa'o/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/nub kyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor ni/_/khro bo chen po 
[\[258b.2\]]rdo rje ste/_/khro bdag chen po rnams kyis bskor/_/rdo rje chos ni mdun du ste/_/rdo rje rnon po g.yas su'o/_/de bzhin g.yon du rdo rje rgyu/_/rgyab tu rdo rje smra ba'o/_/rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang /_/dkyil 'khor dag ni mchog bzhi pa/_/rdo rje dbab pa las 
[\[258b.3\]]chen po/_/khro bo chen pos yongs su bskor/_/rdo rje las ni mdun du ste/_/g.yas su rdo rje bsrung ba'o/_/g.yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin te/_/rgyab tu rdo rje khu tshur ro/_/dbus kyi 'khor lo'i mtshams bzhi ru/_/lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/_/mtshams su zla ba'i 
[\[258b.4\]]dkyil 'khor la/_/rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs bri/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su/_/rdo rje me tog la sogs bri/_/rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du/_/ji skad sngar bshad cho ga bzhin/_/sgo bzhi dag ni thams cad du/_/sgo srung rnams ni 
[\[258b.5\]]dgod par bya/_/lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang /_/dril bu dbab pa bla na med/_/rang gi phyag rgya snying gar bzhag_/rang rang gi ni snying po yis/_/rdo rje dril bu yid 'ong ldan/_/rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dgod/_/bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo ni/_/gtso bo rdo rje 
[\[258b.6\]]rig pa mchog_/rdo rje rgyal po mchog byin brlab/_/rang nyid rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog_/de yis dkyil 'khor de bris nas/_/rdo rje ti rin ti ri 'jug_/yang dag par ni brtag byas la/_/lan bdun du ni bskor ba bya/_/chad pa gang yin yongs su dag_/
[\[258b.7\]]mkhas pas lhag par dbri bar bya/_/rdo rje dril bu rtogs par bya/_/grub par gyur te nyes pa med/_/rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs kun/_/mnyam par bzhag pas las rnams bya/_/'khor lo'i dbus su zhugs nas ni/_/mkhas pas sgo ni dbye bar bya/_/yid kyis rdo rje ri 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]mo ni/_/bteg cing kun tu phye nas kyang /_/rdo rje sgo ni bzhi po dag_/yid kyis dbye bar bya ba yin/_/de la snying po ni 'di yin te/_o~M badzra d+ha ra ud g+ha Ta ya pra be sha ya sa ma ya hU~M/_dkyil 'khor phyi rol gnas rnams su/_/phyi yi rdo rje rigs dag 
[\[259a.2\]]bri/_/khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams ni/_/kha khyer gyi ni phyed la gnas/_/'khor lo dang bcas rigs bcas te/_/sems can gdug pa gdon la sogs/_/rims dang 'byung po sha za dang /_/mkha' 'gro 'byung po ma mo dang /_/lha mo mtshon cha dang ldan kun/_/
[\[259a.3\]]ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri/_/phyi rol kha khyer gnas su ni/_/rdo rje kha khyer mdzes pa rnams/_/de nas sngon la slob dpon ches/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su 'dug nas ni/_/rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas te/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 'jug bya/_/ji ltar rdo rje rigs byung ba/_/de 
[\[259a.4\]]bzhin bdag nyid rnam par bsam/_/rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po/_/bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlab/_/rdo rje khro bo rgyal po mchog_/ces bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/skal ba chen po snyoms zhugs nas/_/ji skad gong du grags 
[\[259a.5\]]pa bzhin/_/shes rab can gyis thams cad bsam/_/ji ltar rdo rje rigs 'byung ba/_/ji ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni/_/rgya chen gsang ba chen po dang /_/rdo rje slob dpon cho ga mchog_/rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya ba/_/rtog pa 'di las rab tu bshad/_/de nas dbus 
[\[259a.6\]]su 'dug byas nas/_/rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches/_/khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni/_/phyag rgya thams cad yongs su bcings/_/khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu bcings/_/sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/_/lan cig tu ni brjod par 
[\[259a.7\]]bya/_/rdo rje me tog sogs mchod pas/_/'dren pa thams cad mchod par bya/_/gsang ba'i mchod pa gang bya ba/_/phyag rgya thams cad yongs su bcing /_/phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya ldan/_/de bzhin du ni mchod pa nyid/_/phyag rgya'i lan la sogs pa kun/_/cho ga rab tu ldan pa 'bul/_/
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]rdo rje dril bu dkrol bya zhing /_/gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor bsdigs par bya/_/gdug pa'i sems ni gdul bya zhing /_/nyon mongs mchog tu gsad par bya/_/dbab cing brjod pa nyid du bya/_/rdo rje mchod pas mchod par bya/_/glu dang mchod pa yang dag ldan/_/rdo rje 
[\[259b.2\]]glu ni blang bar bya/_/rdo rje yi ni glu 'di dag_/blang zhing mchog rnams mnyes par bya/_/btud cing dbul bar bya ba nyid/_/rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya/_/sha ta sha ta ma tas ta ti ri/_Ta ta Ta ta bri ti ha ta/_ma ta sha ta bra ta ka ta/_ta bi Ta bi Ta Ta Ta Ta/_ba Ta i ti ta Ta 
[\[259b.3\]]Ta Ta/_ka ra Ta ra Ta ra ra Ta/_rdo rje ti rin ti ri yi/_/phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur bya/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bka' mnos nas/_/rdo rje'i sngags ni rab tu bskul/_/sngon po gos kyis stod g.yogs bya/_/sngon po yis ni mig dgab bya/_/rdo rje ti rin ti ri yi/_/
[\[259b.4\]]phyag rgya rdo rje slob ma bcing /_/o~M gr-ih+na badzra sa ma ya hU~M ba~M/_ci rigs par ni gzhug bya zhing /_/rdo rje'i sngags ni bskul bar bya/_/rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis/_/rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya/_/o~M badzra sa ma ya pra be she yA mi/_rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du/_/
[\[259b.5\]]rgyas par ji ltar snga ma bzhin/_/ye shes dbab pa'i las dag ni/_/mkhas pa dag gis bya nyid do/_/mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid/_/rdo rje can gyis sngar gsungs nyid/_/shes rab can gyis kun bslab cing /_/bdag nyid dang bas rab tu bya/_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad 
[\[259b.6\]]phyag rgya yis/_/shes rab can gyis hU~M bsgrub bya/_/lha la sogs pa gdug pa kun/_/bkug cing de ru gzhug par bya/_/rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bslab bya zhing /_/bdag nyid dam ni gzhan yang rung /_/rdo rje phreng bas dbang bskur bya/_/rdo rje mna' yi phyag rgya yis/_/sngon 
[\[259b.7\]]la mna' ni bsgag par bya/_/rdo rje ye shes ye shes che/_/rdo rje ye shes rab bsgrub bya/_/lag pas rdo rje mtshan ma bzung /_/rdo rje sngags ni rab bsgrub bya/_/rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis/_/rdo rje mtshan ma rab tu sbyin/_/o~M badzra pA Ni karma kA rod b+hA ba/_de nas ming gi dbang bskur 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]zhing /_/rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul/_/rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis/_/rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bya/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha s+t+wa~M a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/_o~M badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta he badzra nA ma/_ye shes 'byung ba phun sum tshogs/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/_/shes rab mchog 
[\[260a.2\]]gis bslab bya zhing /_/rdo rje rnal 'byor rab tu bsgrub/_/snying gar rdo rje bris nas ni/_/sna tshogs las rnams yang dag ldan/_/'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab cing 'bar/_/snying gar rdo rje bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po/_/bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par 
[\[260a.3\]]bya/_/rgyal po las rnams thams cad 'dzin/_/bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya/_/yang na khro bo'i nang nas gcig_/bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas/_/'gro ba thams cad dbab par bya/_/hU~M satwa badzra kro d+ha A be sha aH/_
[\[260a.4\]]khro bo rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/_/rdo rje rin chen yang dag bris/_/bdag nyid rdo rje rin chen te/_/sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du bya/_/rdo rje pad+ma mgrin bcings nas/_/lkog ma'i phyogs su yang dag bri/_/bdag nyid rdo rje chos bsgoms nas/_/des ni nyon mongs 
[\[260a.5\]]thams cad 'joms/_/spyi bor rdo rje bri bya zhing /_/rdo rje 'bar ba 'dzin pa dgod/_/bdag nyid rdo rje las bsgoms nas/_/gdug pa thams cad bsal bar bya/_/ho badzra rat+na krod+ha ba sha mA nA ya tra/_hriHbadzra d+ha rma kro d+ha nA sha ya phaT/_/hU~M karma badzra kro d+ha rak+Sha/_lha tshogs 
[\[260a.6\]]sangs rgyas thams cad ni/_/phyag rgya dang bcas dgug par bya/_/ye shes brlab cing de nas bzung /_/de bzhin kho nar yang dag brlab/_/lag par rdo rje lcags kyu bris/_/sdigs mdzub yi ge hU~M ldan pa/_/khro bo yis ni sor mo bskyod/_/lha rnams 'gugs par 
[\[260a.7\]]byed pa'i mchog_/o~M badzra kro d+ha A kar+Sha ya hU~M phaT/_de bzhin 'og tu rkang mthil la/_/rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bri/_/de yis lha ni gang zhig mnan/_/de yi dgug pa'i mchog yin no/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha a gra aM ku sha A kar+Sha ya hU~M phaT/_dpung pa brkyang dang yang dag ldan/_/
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bris/_/lha ni gang dang gang la mnan/_/de dang de ni dgug pa'i mchog_/o~M badzra kro d+ha na A kar+Sha ya hU~M phaT/_stan la rdo rje lcags kyu ni/_/yang dag bris pas de mnan zhing /_/lha ni gang zhig kun tu mnan/_/de dang de ni dgug pa'i mchog_/o~M badzra kro d+ha 
[\[260b.2\]]A sa na A gats+tsha ya A kar+Sha ya mi te he badzra sam ya ma nu sma ra hU~M phaT/_phyag rgya dbab par yang dag dbab/_/mkhas pas ye shes bslab par bya/_/rdo rje sbyor ba thams cad kyis/_/sgrub pa dag kyang yang dag brtsam/_/g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas rnams su/_/bdag nyid khro bor 
[\[260b.3\]]bsgom par bya/_/myur du sangs rgyas ye shes ni/_/ring por mi thogs yang dag dbab/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha kA ya A be sha hU~M phaT/_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad yang dag sbyor/_/khro bo bdag nyid bsgom par bya/_/sangs rgyas byang chub yang dag dgug_/rdo rje sngags ni rab tu 
[\[260b.4\]]bskul/_/o~M badzra bi d+yot+ta ma ma hA kro d+ha A na ya ho b+ha ga ban badzra hU~M phaT/_bdag nyid khro bo bsgom bya zhing /_/khro bo'i lta bas blta bar bya/_/'khor ba'i btson ra 'jigs rung bar/_/sems can thams cad gsad par bya/_/o~M dr-iSh+Ta ma hA kro d+ha ma ra ya sarba satwa 
[\[260b.5\]]hU~M/_rtag tu rang nyid go bgos par/_/yid kyis bdag nyid bsgom bya zhing /_/gzhan dag kyang ni bsgom byas nas/_/'gro ba 'di kun bsrung bar 'gyur/_/o~M badzra rak+Sha rak+Sha sarba sa twa hU~M phaT/_gsang ba'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor che/_/rnam pa bzhi ni bslab 
[\[260b.6\]]par bya/_/rdo rje ye shes de nyid che/_/sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes bsam/_/rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas/_/sems can gang phyir kun du chags/_/yid kyis gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing /_/yi ge hU~M ni rab tu brjod/_/rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di dag ni/_/rdo rje mkha' 
[\[260b.7\]]'gro'i phyag rgya yis/_/sems can gang la yongs su chags/_/de yi nyon mongs rnam par nyams/_/Tak+ki a sa la be/_/a la be ats+tsha Tak+ki hU~M phaT/_'di ni lan cig brjod pas kyang /_/kun nas nyon mongs zhu zhing g.yo/_/Tak+ki dza/_sems can gang gi 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]rgyud la ni/_/rdo rje yi ni lta bas bltas/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor spyan chen pos/_/de yi sdug bsngal nyams par gyur/_/Tak+ki hU~M/_yi ge hU~M ni gyur pa las/_/nye ba'i sems can gang yin pa/_/de yi snying gar rdo rje yang /_/shes rab can gyis yid 
[\[261a.2\]]kyis bsam/_/de nas 'jigs pa thams cad las/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgya yang /_/rdo rje rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro dang /_/rdo rje phyag rgyas gdab par bya/_/Tak+ki ho/_rdo rje rnal 'byor rmad byung che/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor rdo rje gang /_/rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro dkyil 
[\[261a.3\]]'khor ni/_/shes rab can gyis mchog gsang brlab/_/dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/_/yan lag kun la yongs su 'khyud/_/yi ge hU~M ni sbyor byed pa/_/sdug bsngal rnam par nyams par 'gyur/_/rdo rje khro bo rab drag 'dzin/_/rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom 
[\[261a.4\]]par bya/_/de yi khro bo'i sku gang yin/_/gcig tu mchog tu gsang ba bdag_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'ang rung /_/bdag nyid dang ni mtshungs pa ru/_/lus ni yang dag sbyor ba ni/_/dbang po snyoms 'jug brjod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems 
[\[261a.5\]]dpa' 'am/_/rdo rje khro bo'am sems dpa' gzhan/_/de'i lus gang yin pa dang /_bdag gi lus gang yin pa mtshungs par shes pa nyid/_'di ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/yang na rnam par bsgom pa yis/_/ji skad bshad bzhin yan lag 
[\[261a.6\]]'khyud/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/_/dpung pa dam por bsdam par bya/_/yan lag kun la yongs 'khyud pas/_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab grub 'gyur/_/dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa/_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags brtag mi bya/_/'di yis mtshungs 
[\[261a.7\]]par bsgoms pa yis/_/mtshungs pa nyid ni dbang po yin/_/ha~M tra~M hU~M gi sbyor ba'i so dag gis/_/mchu bzung nas ni 'o bya zhing /_/sems can gang zhig rnam bsgom pa/_/des ni bde ba don yod thob/_/hU~M dza/_sems can thams cad bde byed pa/_/yi ge hU~M de rab 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]sbyor zhing /_/bdag nyid khro bor rnam sbyangs nas/_/de nas bde ba thob par 'gyur/_/hU~M/_gang gis hU~M ni rab sbyor zhing /_/sems can dag ni gang dag gis/_/yan lag thams cad bsdus byas na/_/de yi nyon mongs bsrabs par 'gyur/_/hU~M phaT/_ye shes 
[\[261b.2\]]chen pos thabs ldan pa/_/rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad nyid/_/de bzhin 'khor lo'i 'khor bcas pas/_/mkhas pa yis ni bslab par bya/_/sangs rgyas sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/rtag tu bdag ni bsgom par bya/_/rnam smin mchog rnams kun ldan 
[\[261b.3\]]pa/_/sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par bsgom/_/bsgom pa'i sbyor ba de yis ni/_/skad cig sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/_/a/_rdo rje'i rig pa mchog rgyal po/_/bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya/_/hU~M/_rdo rje khro bo khro gnyer can/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgom 
[\[261b.4\]]par bya/_/tra~M/_/rdo rje sde ru rang bdag nyid/_/sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya/_/hrIH/_rdo rje dbab pa khro bo che/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/_/a/_bdag nyid rdo rje sems la ni/_/rdo rje sems dpar rnam par bsgom/_/hU~M badzra satwa/_rdo rje rgyal po bdag 
[\[261b.5\]]bsgom bya/_/dza badzra rA dza/_rdo rje chags par bsam par bya/_/ra badzra rA ga_/khro bo legs pa bsgom par bya/_/sa badzra sA d+hu/_de nas rdo rje rin chen no/_/o~M badzra rat+na/_rdo rje gzi brjid de bzhin no/_/dz+wA la ya/_bdag nyid rdo rje rgyal mtshan bsgom/_/d+he he/_rdo rje bzhad pa 
[\[261b.6\]]rnam par bsgom/_/hA sa badzra hA sa/_rdo rje chos ni bsgom par bya/_/sho d+ha ya/_rdo rje rnon po rnam par bsgom/_/ts+tshin da/_rdo rje rgyu ni 'khor lo che/_/pra be sha ya/_rdo rje smra ba rnam par bsgom/_/b+hA Sha/_rdo rje las ni bsgom par bya/_/karma/_rdo rje go cha rnam par bsgom/_/rak+Sha/_rdo rje 
[\[261b.7\]]gnod sbyin bsgom par bya/_/khA da/_rdo rje khu tshur rnam par bsgom/_/ba~M/_gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid/_/rigs kyi lha ni ci 'dra bar/_/rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya/_/de ni 'di yis skad cig 'grub/_/hU~M/_rdo rje phyag rgyas lan cig bcing /_/mkhas pas rdo rje bzlas 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]pa brjod/_/ji skad bzlas pa'i rgyud du bshad/_/gzhan du khro bo gzung bar bya/_/yid kyis kyang ni brjod bya zhing /_/lus kyi phyag rgyas bskul bar bya/_/dkyil 'khor gsum ni mnyam sbyor bas/_/skad cig de la mkhas pas bsgrub/_/de nas 
[\[262a.2\]]nyams dga' rdo rje'i rigs/_/phyag rgya chen po grangs med pa/_/lus kyi phyag rgya yang dag ldan/_/gang phyir sems can snod min pa/_/de yi phyir na nyung bar gsungs/_/phyag rgya chen po yongs bsdu ba/_/theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las/_/rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya ba/_/
[\[262a.3\]]rgyud der rab tu bshad pa yin/_/gsang ba'i cho ga 'di yis ni/_/rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis/_/skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'grub/_/'dir ni phan yon mang po dag_/rang gi las la nges par sbyar/_/gang zhig btul zhing 
[\[262a.4\]]mngon par sbyor/_/skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'grub/_/mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang /_/zhugs nas mngon par brtson 'gyur zhing /_/rnal 'byor cho ga sgrub byed na/_/'grub par 'gyur bar the tsom med/_/tshe 'di la ni rnal 'byor pas/_/rab tu dga' ba'i sa 
[\[262a.5\]]thob 'gyur/_/gang gis rdo rje can sbyor bas/_/gdon mi za bar sa thob 'gyur/_/bskal pa grangs med dka' ba ni/_/spyod pa'i bdag nyid med par min/_/rnal 'byor 'di la mngon par brtson/_/de bas sa ni rnyed dka' min/_/theg chen 'di ni gsang ba ste/_/
[\[262a.6\]]sangs rgyas chos kyi tshul bstan pa/_/sangs rgyas byang chub snying po che/_/de las sa ni thob dka' min/_/g.yon brkyang cha lugs gnas nas ni/_/khro bo'i tshig ni rab tu brjod/_/khro bo'i lta bas yang dag khros/_/las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/_/de 
[\[262a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdo sde'i dbang po gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gsang ba de kho na nyid dam pa mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rtse mo las khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba rnam par bshad pa ste le'u gsum pa rdzogs so//_//rdo rje'i 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]rigs las le'u dang po'o//_//de nas gsang ba dag ni kun bsdus mchog_/sems kyi dga' ba kun sbyor yang dag byung /_/bya ba byas shing mchog tu rnam par mdzes/_/rdo rje dbang phyug thams cad rnam 'phrul tshogs/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi ni rigs 
[\[262b.2\]]chen mchog_/rdo rje snying po'i thugs byung bde ldan pa/_/shin tu gsang ba'i yon tan mchog bsdus pa/_/rdo rje rgyal po bud med gzugs can gyur/_/e ma'o bud med dga' ba mchog spyod pa/_/gsang ba kun tu bsdus pa las byung ba/_/rdo rje sems dpa' 
[\[262b.3\]]mchog tu 'jigs mi mnga'/_/de yis gsungs nas cang mi gsung bzhugs so/_/gzungs kyi dam tshig yang dag byung ba mchog_/ting 'dzin gnas nas chos nyid gsang ba ni/_/spyi bo rkang mthil kun bsdus bstan pa las/_/de yi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs 
[\[262b.4\]]dag phyung /_/hrIH/_de nas dga' ba'i ming can dag kyang phyung /_/rdo rje bud med thugs las byung ba mchog_/gzugs khams mchog gi lha las shin tu 'das/_/rdo rje'i mtshams rnams lha mo'i tshig dag grag_/dga' bcas 'dzum pa dang ldan spyan mnga' ba/_/
[\[262b.5\]]bzhad cing sgeg dang bcas pa'i zhal ldan pa/_/tshangs sogs rigs kyi lha yi lha mo ste/_/yid 'ong dga' ba chen pos rgyal 'gyur ba/_/lha mo rdo rje rnal 'byor ma de yang /_/'khor lo'i dbus su gnas nas rtog byed pa/_/de yi rigs bsdus mdzes shing yid du 
[\[262b.6\]]'ong /_/rdo rje chen mo rdo rje rmongs byed ma/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA rA ga mo ha na ya hi/_snying po sangs rgyas rmongs par byed pas gsungs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog kyang rmongs par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dga' ba rmongs byed dga'/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[262b.7\]]gzugs dag yongs su sgyur ba mchog_/rnam snang thub pa'i dbang phyug mchog de ni/_/bud med gzugs kyi sprul pa nyid du 'gyur/_/dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul mchog mnga' gang de ni/_/'khor gyi sring mo gang yin bzhi bor gyur/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ye s+thi/_de nas 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]gsang ba brtan pa'i tshogs zhi ba/_/chos dang longs spyod rdzogs skus kun khyab pa/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang phyug rmongs byed bdag_/sangs rgyas btsun mo dag pa'i chos nyid bzhugs/_/sa ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur/_/'od zer sna tshogs 
[\[263a.2\]]phyogs bcu dag tu gsal/_/lha mo lha dang bcas pa'i lha mo rnams/_/zil gyis mnan cing shin tu rgyas par 'gyur/_/rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs lha mo'i tshogs/_/de dag rang gi gzhal yas khang na gnas/_/de nas sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ba yi/_/
[\[263a.3\]]gsang ba'i dbang phyug dam pa 'dren pa ste/_/rdo rje dga' ba chen po rnam par dgod/_/gdug pa kun gyi dbang phyug yi ge ni/_/snying po las byung chos nyid dag pa ste/_/rdo rje btsun mo bzhi dang dbus ma lnga/_/dkyil 'khor tshogs kyi shar phyogs cha la gnas/_/mi 
[\[263a.4\]]bskyod pa yi dbang phyug dam pa'i mchog_/de nas rdo rje'i rigs can las byung ba'i/_/shar gyi dkyil 'khor khro bcas dkyil 'khor bcas/_/mi bskyod dam pa'i dam tshig bdag nyid can/_/de yis snying po bskul ba gsungs par gyur/_/snying po rab mchog 'byung 
[\[263a.5\]]ba gsungs par gyur/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha sa ma ye dzi/_o~M badzra ro Sha a~M ku sha A na ya sarba dzi/_o~M badzra ro Sha karma badzri ba sha~M me A na ya di dzi/_o~M badzra duSh+Ti kro d+ha tiSh+Tha ya sarba dzi/_rin chen 'byung ldan de ni bud med gzugs/_/rin chen mchog tu yid du 'ong ba des/_/
[\[263a.6\]]'khor gyi snying po dag ni bzhi po gsungs/_/o~M badzra b+h+r-i ku TI kro d+ha ha ra ha ra sarba gar+b+ha dzi/_o~M badzra dz+wa la mA la pra be sha ma hA kro d+ha ag+ni dz+wA la ya sarba ra b+hi Sha dza dzi/_o~M badzra d+h+wa dza a gra ke yu ri ma hA kro d+hi de hi sarba dzi/_o~M badzra aT+TAT+Ta ha si ni hA sa ma yA T+TAT+Ta ha ra ha ra dzi/_yi ge 
[\[263a.7\]]dzi ni shin tu brtan par gnas/_/snying po mchog tu shin tu gyur pa gsungs/_/rin chen dbang phyug dam pa de yis ni/_/snying po bskul bar byed pa'i mchog dag gsungs/_/snying po mchog gsungs rmad byung gsungs par gyur/_/'od dpag med de bud med gzugs gyur 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]pa/_/rdo rje btsun mo dam pa 'byung ba'i mchog_/snying po bzhi po dag ni gsungs par gyur/_/o~M badzra shud d+hi ha na duSh+Ti d+hi/_o~M tIk+Sh+Na kro d+ha ts+tshin da na sarba d+hi ri/_badzra he tu ma hA kro d+ha bra be sha ya sarba d+hi/_o~M badzra dzi hwA ma hA kro d+ha b+hA Shi pa tsa ung+ga ra ya d+hiH/_snying po rig mchog 
[\[263b.2\]]brtan pa gsungs par gyur/_/pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbang dang ldan pa mchog_/'od dpag med pa'i gsang mchog bstan pa ste/_/snying po bskul ba'i mchog ni gsungs par gyur/_/Ni/_dga' ba chen pos mtshan ma dag kyang phyung /_/don yod grub pa bud med gzugs gyur 
[\[263b.3\]]pas/_/las la shin tu bskul ba dang ldan te/_/'khor gyi sring mo dag ni bzhi po gsungs/_/o~M sarba mu khe karma badzri Ni ma hA kro d+ha ku ru sarba Ni/_o~M badzra ka ba tsa kro d+hi rak+Sha ma Ni/_o~M badzra kro d+he ma hA yak+Shi Ni badzre da~MSh+TA ka rA li bi lA sa sarba Ni/_o~M badzra muSh+Ti badzra kro d+ha ni/_de nas 
[\[263b.4\]]las kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dag_/mchog tu gsang ba bsdus pa dga' chen po/_/dbus kyi gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor skul byed pa/_/las kyi btsun mo'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs/_/hU~M/_dbus kyi gsang ba sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur ba/_/gtso bo 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad 
[\[263b.5\]]gsungs/_/o~M badzre shwa rI hU~M/_o~M rat+ne shwa rI hU~M/_o~M pad+me shwa rI hU~M/_o~M karme shwa rI hU~M/_rdo rje rgyal mo dang bcas bskul ba las byung gang yin pa/_/rdo rje btsun mo rnal 'byor bzhi yis dbus kyi dbang phyug nyid du gnas/_/rdo rje rin chen chos ldan btsun mo yan lag mdzes pa dang 
[\[263b.6\]]ldan pa/_/'di ni gsang ba'i tshogs las gzhan du rnal 'byor mchog ni 'ga' yang med/_/rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'jigs mi mnga'/_/de ni rang gi 'khor tshogs dbus na bzhugs/_/des ni brtse dang phan pa'i sems kyis ni/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog 
[\[263b.7\]]gsungs gyur/_/de nas 'khor lo'i grong khyer bstan byas nas/_/khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i bdag nyid des/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug btsun mo yi/_/dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag bri/_/grong khyer rnam pa gnyis su yang dag bri/_/'khor lo rnam pa 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]gnyis su sbyar bar bya/_/de bzhin grong khyer 'di ru yang dag 'ong ba dang /_/yang na ji ltar 'dod bzhin yang dag bri/_/de yang phyag rgya dag gi tshogs dang bcas/_/bsgom par 'os pa rdo rje yang dag bri/_/yang na gsang ba'i chos kyis mchod gyur pa/_/
[\[264a.2\]]da ni gzugs dang ldan pa yang dag bri/_/dbus kyi rim par rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs/_/zhags pa dang ldan 'khor gyi phyag rgya bcas/_/rdo rje 'bar ba nor bu pad+ma las/_/'bar ba'i dang bcas me dang ldan par gzhag_/shar gyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo lnga yi 
[\[264a.3\]]bdag nyid che/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gang du mi bskyod gtso/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgya che dang rol par gyur/_/dbang phyug chen po rtse gsum ldan non mchog_/de nas phyogs bzhi'i gnas dag dang /_/rdo rje lcags kyu mda' dang dga' ba dag_/'bar ba'i me yi 
[\[264a.4\]]'od zer yang dag ldan/_/'bar ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i phyag rgya mnga'/_/de ni rin chen rigs na yid 'ong ba/_/rdo rje'i dbus na rdo rje rin chen bzhugs/_/de nas phyogs bzhi'i gnas dag tu/_/rin chen gzi brjid rgyal mtshan bzhad phyag rgya/_/de bzhin pad+ma'i 
[\[264a.5\]]rigs ni yid 'ong la/_/rdo rje pad+ma'i phyag rgya ste/_/de nas phyogs bzhi'i mtshams dag tu/_/pad+ma'i ral gri 'khor lo de bzhin smra/_/de bzhin las kyis byas pa'i rigs de las/_/rdo rje rnon po me chen dang ldan pa/_/de yi phyogs bzhi'i mtshams ni brtan pa ru/_/
[\[264a.6\]]las dang gnod sbyin bsrung ba khu tshur rnams/_/de las rgya cher gzugs kyi tshogs dag la/_/rdo rje btsun mo'i mchog drag mkha' 'gro ma/_/'bar ba'i mche ba chen po 'jigs rung ma/_/dbus na rdo rje nyi ma 'bar ba ldan/_/sa dag bsrung ba'i cho gar bcas/_/
[\[264a.7\]]rgya cher gzhung mchog rtag tu blta bar bya/_/sbyang dang dbab pa'i las rnams thams cad ni/_/yan lag mchog ldan dam pa las gzung bya/_/de nas phyag rgya phyag rgya'i yan lag bslab/_/mchod pa'i phyag rgyas mchod pa'i phyag rgyar brjod/_/de nas sgo dang mtshams 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]bcas dkyil 'khor du/_/btsun mo dag bos gnam lcags gnod sbyin mchog_/de nas sgor 'jug pa yi tshogs la ni/_/badzra dzaHdzaH/_dgug pa'i pheg rdob sprin ni rgya che ba/_/badzra hU~M hU~M/_de bzhin 'ching ba'i chos ni ster byed pa/_/badzra ba~M ba~M/_de nas ye shes 
[\[264b.2\]]chos nyid sna tshogs pa/_/badzra aHaH/_de nas gsang ba'i sgeg pa dang bcas mchod/_/badzra hU~M kha~M/_de nas yan lag phreng ba sna tshogs ldan/_/badzra hU~M g+hu~M/_de nas glu blang ba dang rol mo dag_/badzra hU~M ta~M/_de bzhin gzhan dag dkyil 'khor dbang 
[\[264b.3\]]phyug mchog_/badzra hU~M ste/_de nas phyi rol me tog rgya chen po/_/badzra ti te/_de bzhin rol cha stong phrag dag brdungs pa/_/badzra T+ra~M ta/_spos dang dri ldan rol mo dag bri ba/_/badzra d+hA tu/_de nas 'od zer snang ba rab tu spro/_/badzra kro d+ha/_de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i 
[\[264b.4\]]tshogs kyis dgug par bya/_/dga' bas mnyes bya rdo rje yang dag ldan/_/o~M sid d+hi ya badzra/_/A na ya badzra/_de nas chags pa'i sa ni 'dod chags pa/_/rA ga ya badzra a hi badzra/_de bzhin nyi ma la lta ba/_/dz+wA la ya badzra/_rgyal mtshan gyi ni/_de hi badzra/_
