[\[264b.5\]]bzhad pa yi ni/_/hA sa badzra/_de bzhin rjes su chags pa ni/_/kA ma ya badzra/_ral gri gzung bar bya ba ni/_/ts+tshe da ya badzra/_gzhan yang bskor ba yi ni/_b+h+ra ma ya badzra/_de nas tshig gi tshogs dbyung ba/_/brU hi badzra/_las kyi mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i 
[\[264b.6\]]tshogs ni/_t+yi badzra/_de nas cho ga'i cha'i ni/_rak+Sha badzra/_de bzhin du bza' ba'i ni/_khA hi badzra/_yid 'ong lus ni brtan par bcing bar bya/_/ban+d+ha ya badzra/_de nas ye shes kyi ni de bzhin brkyang /_/de nas khros pa'i yid kyis bskul bar bya/_/so dag gis ni ma mchu 
[\[264b.7\]]bsdam par bya/_/de bzhin mig dag kyang ni btsum par bya/_/de nas khro bo'i ting 'dzin rab tu bsgom/_/gsang ba'i phyag rgya dag gis bdud bzhi bcom/_/de nas rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po brjod/_/phyag rgya'i tshogs ni rnam pa sna tshogs bslab/_/lus kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs dag ni/_/theg pa 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]chen po mngon bsdus las/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' bzhin du/_/rgyas pa ru ni yongs su brjod/_/gsang ba mchog rdzogs so//_//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/_/kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug ni/_/rdo rje phra mo la bzhugs nas/_/
[\[265a.2\]]rdo rje phra mo brjod par gyur/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta sUk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaT/_bdag nyid sangs rgyas gzugs su ni/_/phan pa'i don du rnam bsam bya/_/rdo rje phra mo 'di yis ni/_/sems ni zhi ba nyid du gyur/_/o~M sUk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaT/_rdo rje rig 
[\[265a.3\]]pa mchog rgyal po/_/bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje phra mo 'di yis ni/_/rang sems skad cig gis 'dul 'gyur/_/o~M sUk+Sh+ma badzra rat+na kro d+ha kra ma ka hU~M phaT/_rdo rje rin chen rang bdag nyid/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[265a.4\]]chos ni myur thob cing /_/rin chen kun mchog gtso bor 'gyur/_/o~M sUk+Sh+ma badzra d+harma kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaT/_bdag nyid dag ni rdo rje chos/_/gzod nas dag pa rnam par bsgom/_/gsung gi phyag rgya 'di yis ni/_/rdo rje chos dang mtshungs par 'gyur/_/o~M sUk+Sh+ma badzra 
[\[265a.5\]]karma kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaT/_bdag nyid rdo rje las su ni/_/yang dang yang du bsgom bya zhing /_/rdo rje sngags kyis bskul nas ni/_/rdo rje las dang mtshungs par 'gyur/_/dbang bskur ba yi sems dpa' che/_/'khor los sgyur ba bzhi bo ru/_/rtag tu bdag nyid 
[\[265a.6\]]bsgom byas na/_/dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur/_/hU~M o~M sUk+Sh+ma dz+nyA na kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_rdo rje rgyal po rang bdag nyid/_/rnam par bsgoms na rengs par 'gyur/_/snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kun tu dgug_/o~M sU k+Sh+ma badzra a~M ku sha A 
[\[265a.7\]]kar+Sha ya ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_mda' 'gengs pa yi sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje chags pa bsgom par bya/_/snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/_/sangs rgyas thams cad rjes chags pa/_/o~M sUk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+ha a nu rA ga ya hU~M phaT/_sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byas shing /_/
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]bdag nyid kyang ni rnam par bsgom/_/rdo rje dga' ba bdag nyid de/_/rdo rje dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/o~M sUk+Sh+ma badzra duSh+Ti kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_rdo rje rin chen rgyal po nga /_/dbang bskur ba ni brtan pa'i mchog_/rdo rje sngags kyis bskul byas nas/_/rdo rje rin chen mtshungs par 'gyur/_/o~M 
[\[265b.2\]]sUk+Sh+ma badzra b+h+r-i ku TI kro d+ha ha ra ha ra hU~M phaT/_rdo rje gzi brjid ting 'dzin gyis/_/rtag tu bdag nyid 'bar bar bya/_/phyogs rnams kun tu yongs spros nas/_/rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul/_/o~M sUk+Sh+ma dz+wA la maN+Da la kro d+ha sUr+ya dz+wa la hU~M phaT/_sbyin pa rin chen rgyal mtshan du/_/rtag tu 
[\[265b.3\]]bdag nyid rnam par bsam/_/sems can thams cad dag bya zhing /_/rdo rje sngags ni rab bskul zhing /_/o~M sUk+Sh+ma badzra d+h+wa dza kro d+ha ya sho d+ha sarba AHhU~M me pra yats+tsha hU~M phaT/_chos chen po yi bzhad pa bzhad/_/rdo rje bzhad pa bdag brtan pa'i/_/rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bya zhing /_/
[\[265b.4\]]bdag nyid kho na chos kyi gsung /_/o~M sUk+Sh+ma badzra ha sa kro d+ha ha ha hU~M phaT ha ha/_gzod nas zhi ba skye ba med/_/chos rnams thams cad rnam dag pa/_/bdag nyid rdo rje chos rgyal po/_/rdo rje tshig gis lan cig brjod/_/o~M sUk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+ha ya sho d+ha hU~M phaT/_shugs can ral 
[\[265b.5\]]gri dag gi tshogs/_/rdo rje rnon po shin tu brtan/_/o~M sUk+Sh+ma badzra ts+tshe da krod+ha ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byas nas/_/rdo rje 'khor lo dang mtshungs 'gyur/_/o~M sUk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+ha ma hA~M tsakra ts+tshin+da pa hA i shwa ri/_pra be sha hr-i da yaM ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/_da ni rjod byed brjod bya min/_/bdag 
[\[265b.6\]]ni rdo rje smra ba brtan/_/chos 'dod pa nyid brtan byas nas/_/rdo rje smra ba thob par 'gyur/_/o~M sUk+Sh+ma badzra hU~M kA ra kro d+ha ha ra pa tsa ya wa mu dre Na hU~M phaT/_sangs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing /_/rdo rje las ni brtan par brtag_/rdo rje tshig gis chos bshad na/_/rdo rje las ni thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[265b.7\]]o~M sUk+Sh+ma badzra karma sarba kAr+ya hr-i da ya hU~M/_bdag ni rgyal po byams pa che/_/rdo rje srung ba brtan pa'i bdag_/rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom byas nas/_/ngan 'gro thams cad nyams par 'gyur/_/o~M sUk+Sh+ma badzra ka ba tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha hU~M phaT/_sdig pa thams cad bza' bya zhing /_/rdo rje srung ba 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]bsgom par bya/_/rdo rje sngags ni bskul byas na/_/rdo rje nyon mongs thams cad 'joms/_/o~M sUk+Sh+ma badzra yak+Sha ha ra b+hak+Sha sarba duSh+Ta badzra yak+Sha hU~M phaT/_rdo rje khu tshur rgyal po bdag_/byang chub sems ni rjes su dran/_/bgegs rnams thams 
[\[266a.2\]]cad bcing byas na/_/rdo rje khu tshur dang mtshungs 'gyur/_/o~M sUk+Sh+ma badzra muSh+Ti ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/_sna yi rtse mo'i sems de ni/_/brtan par byas nas yang dag brtsam/_/yi ge hU~M nyid sbyor byas nas/_/nyon mongs thams cad rnam nyams 'gyur/_/hU~M/_dang 
[\[266a.3\]]po snying ga sna rtse ru/_/brtan par byas nas de rang bzhin/_/mtshan ma de ni spro byas na/_/nad sogs dgra ni 'jig par 'gyur/_/nA sha ya badzrI hU~M/_sems de brtan par byas nas kyang /_/rnal 'byor 'dzin pas spro bya zhing /_/shes rab can gyis khro bdag 
[\[266a.4\]]brtsam/_/gnas ngan dag ni nges par 'jig_/bi nA sha ya sarba badzra hU~M/_rnal 'byor rig pas ji srid 'dod/_/mtshan ma de ni bsdu byas na/_/ma lus sdig pa thams cad ni/_/nyams shing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_o~M sUk+Sh+ma badzra pra t+ya shI g+hA~M hU~M/_gsal 
[\[266a.5\]]bar phyogs rnams ma lus par/_/sems can kun la byams pa spro/_/ji srid rdo rje spro byas pa/_/de srid sems can bde bar 'gyur/_/b+he ra ba badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_kye ma'o mgon med sems can 'di/_/'jigs pa las ni skyob pa dag_/snying rje'i sems 
[\[266a.6\]]de spro bar bya/_/rdo rje ye shes thob par 'gyur/_/kA ru NA badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_de bzhin gshegs pa kun snying po/_/sems can thams cad gzod nas dag_/e ma'o bde ba e ma'o chos/_/phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su spro/_/hU~M kA ra bi shud+d+ha hU~M phaT/_/
[\[266a.7\]]'khor ba'i sems can la dmigs nas/_/bde ba dang bcas btang snyoms bya/_/btang snyoms sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/sems can rnams la yongs su spro/_/o~M bi sho d+ha ya badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_rdo rje'i gzugs ni yang dag bris/_/gang gi steng du nges bzhag pa/_/
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]de nyid kyis ni dri ma'i tshogs/_/thams cad rnal 'byor pa yis 'joms/_/hU~M badzra pra brta/_gang la byang chub sems nyid ni/_/rjes su dran pas rab phab na/_/sems can de yis sangs rgyas kyi/_/byang chub nyid ni thob par 'gyur/_/hU~M bo d+hi satwa pra brta/_phyag 
[\[266b.2\]]na rdo rje rjes dran nas/_/dag pa'i chos nyid phab byas nas/_/sems can de yis bde ba ni/_/dam pa'i thob 'gyur the tshom med/_/hU~M badzra d+hA ra pra brta/_rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/_/sangs rgyas chos 
[\[266b.3\]]rnams pham byas na/_/'jigs pa nges par 'byung mi 'gyur/_/hU~M bud+d+ha pra brta/_zla ba rdo rje rang bzhin dngos/_/bskyed pa bzhin du bsgom byas na/_/blo bzang zla ba rdo rje mtshungs/_/myur du mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/_/bud+d+ha pra brta ya hU~M/_zla ba'i dbus su rang 
[\[266b.4\]]bdag nyid/_/bsgom zhing gang la phab byas pa/_/sems can de rnams mi ldog par/_/'gyur ba ru ni the tshom med/_/sa twa pra brta ya hU~M/_phyag na rdo rje rang bdag nyid/_/mkhas pa yis ni bsgom bya zhing /_/gang du phab pa'i gnas de ni/_/dpal dang bde 
[\[266b.5\]]ba 'phel bar 'gyur/_/myur ba nyid du the tshom med/_/badzra satwa pra brta ya hU~M/_sangs rgyas gzugs su rang bdag nyid/_/mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom bya zhing /_/rdo rje de ni gar phab pa/_/rdzu 'phrul rgya ni chen por gyur/_/bud+d+ha pra brta ya hU~M/_rdo rje 
[\[266b.6\]]khro bo snyoms 'jug pas/_/rang gi lus ni rab bskor ba/_/gang gi ming gis byas pa de/_/the tshom med par byang chub thob/_/o~M badzra ba li ta kro d+ha mA ra ya hU~M/_dbugs ni dbyung dang rngub pa la/_/yi ge hU~M ni rab sbyor zhing /_/rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas/_/'dod 
[\[266b.7\]]chags la sogs nyes pa gzhom/_/o~M badzra shwA sa bi bA ta la hU~M phaT/_rdo rje lta bas blta bya zhing /_/rdo rje khro bo rab sbyor bas/_/sems can gang la blta byas na/_/de ni 'khor ba las grol 'gyur/_/o~M badzra dr-iShI bi nA sha ya hU~M phaT/_lus ngag gi ni bdag nyid gnas/_/rang sems 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /_/byang chub sems ni rjes dran na/_/des kyang sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/_/hU~M hr-i da ya A kar+Sha ya badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal por/_/mkhas pa yis ni bdag nyid bsgom/_/'bar ba yis ni khyab pa'i sku/_/rdo rje 
[\[267a.2\]]bsgom pas 'grub par 'gyur/_/hU~M gsang ba'i bdag po kun gyi snying po'i sngags ni gsungs par 'gyur/_/de nas rdo rje 'chang bas rnal 'byor dbang po rtog par mdzad/_/gdul bya min la shin tu 'phrog cing gdul bya la chags blo/_/sa 'dzin mchog gi dbang 
[\[267a.3\]]po bslab pa rnam par rol pa'i sa/_/sUk+Sh+ma rdzogs so//_//gsang ba skar ma nyi zla ste/_/rdo rje dam tshig brjod par bya/_/rnam rtog gis brtags mdzes gyur pa/_/de nas mchod pa'i cho ga bshad/_/bdag nyid sangs rgyas gzugs dang ni/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[267a.4\]]rnam 'phrul rab tu bsgom/_/dang po sbyor byung ji skad bshad/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karme shwa ri hU~M/_rang gi snying khar byang chub sems/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi tshogs bsams nas/_/mchod pa yi ni mchog 'di yis/_/
[\[267a.5\]]'dren pa thams cad mchod pa bya/_/hU~M/_dbang phyug chen po dang bcas pa/_/lha rnams thams cad dgug bya zhing /_/bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo yis/_/khro bo'i mchod pas rab tu mchod/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA karma sa ma ya bi sti bi s+t+war trai lo kya bi dza ye shwa sarba 
[\[267a.6\]]duSh+TA na ma hA sa ma ya badzrI hU~M/_khro gnyer can kun nga bdag nyid/_/khro bo rin chen gyis bsgom bya/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs bya zhing /_/rin chen mchod pas rab tu mchod/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta ka pA sha sa ma ya s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dzA A kar+Sha ya bi d+hi bi s+t+wa ra sa ma ya 
[\[267a.7\]]hU~M/_chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par snang /_/rdo rje chos ni brtan pa bdag_/chos kyi mchod pas rab mchod pas/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dzA bi d+hi bi s+t+wa ra sa ma ya hU~M/_bdag nyid rdo rje las nyid 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]nas/_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul bsgom par bya/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing /_/las kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta lo ka d+hA tu dzI bi ta ma hA karma pU dzA be d+hi bi s+t+wa ra sa ma ye hU~M/_phyag na rdo rje bdag rdo rje/_/de bzhin gshegs rnams 
[\[267b.2\]]dgug par bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod pas/_/mchod pa ru ni bsgom par bya/_/o~M badzra satwa sid+d+hi dz+nyA na sa ma ye hU~M dzaH/_rdo rje lcags kyu brtan pa'i mchog_/rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya/_/bsgom pa bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/_/sangs 
[\[267b.3\]]rgyas thams cad dgug par bya/_/o~M badzra A kar+Sha dz+nyA na sa ma ya hU~M dzaH/_rdo rje chags pa bdag nyid de/_/bkug pa rnams ni mnyes par bya/_/rdo rje chags pas rab mchod pas/_/bsgrub bar bya zhes yang dag sbyar/_/o~M badzra ra ti rA ga sa ma ye hU~M 
[\[267b.4\]]dzaH/_rdo rje legs pa rang bdag nyid/_/bsgom zhing rgyal ba mnyes par bya/_/rdo rje legs pas rab mchod pas/_/sangs rgyas thams cad dgug par bya/_/o~M badzra sA d+hu karma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hU~M dzaH/_rdo rje rin chen rgyal po che/_/rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par 
[\[267b.5\]]bya/_/de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang bya zhing /_/rin chen char ni kun tu dbab/_/o~M badzra b+h+r-i ku TI ba shI ku ru hU~M/_rdo rje nyi mar rang bdag nyid/_/'od zer phreng ba dang ldan bsgom/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni dbang bya zhing /_/phyogs rnams su ni 'od zer spro/_/
[\[267b.6\]]o~M badzra sUr+ya maN+Da la ba shIM ku ru hU~M/_de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang bya zhing /_/bdag ni pad+ma'i rgyal po nyid/_/sems can bsam kun rdzogs par bya/_/rin chen rgyal mtshan rab tu mchod/_/o~M badzra d+h+wa dzA gra ke yU re ba shIM ku ru hU~M/_ha ha zhes dgod bzhad bya 
[\[267b.7\]]zhing /_/rdo rje bzhad pa bdag nyid de/_/sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du bya/_/bzhad pa'i mchod pas rab tu mchod/_/o~M badzra aT+Ta hA sa na ba shIM ku ru hU~M/_bdag ni pad+ma'i rgyal po nyid/_/btsun mo brtan par rang byung ba/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas rjes chags bya/_/
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]'dod la chags pas rab tu mchod/_/o~M badzra pad+ma rA ga ya hU~M/_bdag ni rang nyid rnon po ste/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa brtan/_/bdag gis nyon mongs gcad bya zhing /_/de bzhin gshegs rnams chags par bya/_/o~M badzra tik+Sh+Na rA ga ye hU~M/_lha mo rdo rje 
[\[268a.2\]]sgrol ma bdag_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/_/bdag gis rdo rje can mnyes bya/_/'dod chags brtan pas rab tu mchod/_/o~M badzra maN+Dal rA ga rA ga ya hU~M/_nam mkha'i lha mo chos smra ba/_/brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid bstan/_/dag pa'i chos la dga' bya 
[\[268a.3\]]zhing /_/de bzhin gshegs rnams mnyes par bya/_/oM badzra bA ka rA ga rA ga ya hU~M/_bdag ni rang nyid las yin te/_/phyogs rnams kun du rab tu grags/_/bdag ni nam mkha'i mdzod kyang yin/_/mchod pa'i char gyis rab tu mchod/_/o~M badzra karma sa ma ye pU 
[\[268a.4\]]dzA hU~M/_bdag ni rang nyid bsrung ba ste/_/sangs rgyas byams pa brtan pa dag_/bdag gis sangs rgyas mchod par bya/_/chos kyi mchod bas kun du mchod/_/o~M badzra ka ba tsa ban+d+ha ra kA hU~M/_bdag gis nyon mongs bza' bar bya/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin brtan pa bdag_/
[\[268a.5\]]bdag gis sangs rgyas mchod par bya/_/chos kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod/_/o~M badzra yak+Sha mA ra ya badzra da~MSh+T+ra hU~M phaT/_nga ni sangs rgyas byang chub yin/_/rdo rje khu tshur rang bdag nyid/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ste/_/las kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod/_/o~M 
[\[268a.6\]]badzra karma muSh+Ti sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya hU~M phaT/_'di 'dra'i sna tshogs mchod pa kun/_/ye shes gsang sngags rab thob ba byed/_/ma lus lha mo sems dpa' kun/_/rgyal po ji bzhin rab snying hU~M/_sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/_/gar ma me tog sogs sbyor bas/_/sems dpa' la 
[\[268a.7\]]sogs lha mo dag_/shin tu bsrung ba'i mchod pa'i mchod pa'o/_/de nas las ni thabs chen po/_/gang gis myur du rab grub 'gyur/_/gang gis dga' ba la sbyor ba/_/sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga'o/_/ji ltar sbyin sreg dngos grub kyis/_/las ni bla med byed pa ltar/_/de 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]bzhin rig pa'i las rnams kun/_/de lta bu ni byed pa min/_/sbyin sreg rnam pa mang ldan pa/_/mdo ru bsdu na rnam pa lnga/_/rgyas par rnal 'byor chen po yi/_/gsang ba'i mdo las rab tu bshad/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnam 'phrul ba/_/ji ltar sbyin sreg rnam pa 
[\[268b.2\]]yis/_/rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur ba/_/mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya/_/sbyin sreg las ni rnam pa lnga/_/re re zhing yang rnam pa mang /_/zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa nyid/_/mngon spyod kyi ni gsum pa ste/_/dgug pa yang ni bzhi pa yin/_/lnga pa dbang 
[\[268b.3\]]dang yang dag ldan/_/sbyin sreg lnga pa de rnams ni/_/dbang du byed pa mchog yin no/_/de nas thab khung rab bshad bya/_/sbyor ba ji bzhin sbyor bar bya/_/zhi la thab khung zlum po ste/_/kun nas yongs su zlum po yin/_/rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi ste/_/mngon spyod 
[\[268b.4\]]la ni gru gsum yin/_/thab khung rdo rje'i rnam pa can/_/kun du dgug par byed pa'i mchog_/de bzhin thab khung ring bor bya/_/dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/de dag rnam pa lnga ru bshad/_/thab khung las ni bla na med/_/srod kyi dus su zhi ba bya/_/snga dro'i 
[\[268b.5\]]dus su rgyas pa'i las/_/nyi ma phyed na mngon spyod kyi/_/drag po'i las ni nges par bya/_/dgug pa dus rnams thams cad du/_/mtshan mo dbang du bya ba yin/_/sbyor ba lnga po 'di yis ni/_/mnyam par gzhag pas las rnams bya/_/shar du kha bltas zhi don du/_/
[\[268b.6\]]rgyas pa byang du yang dag gnas/_/lho ru kha bltas gyur pa yis/_/mngon spyod kyi ni las rnams so/_/steng du kha bltas de bzhin dgug_/phyogs rnams kun du dbang du bya/_/phyogs mtshams thams cad mnyam sbyor bsam/_/yang na nub kyi phyogs su bshad/_/
[\[268b.7\]]zhi la sangs rgyas phyag rgya ste/_/rgyas la nor bu'i mtshan mas so/_/rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la/_/dbang la pad+ma'i rigs kyis so/_/shin tu dgug pa dang ldan pa/_/rdo rje lcags kyus dgug pa la/_/sbyor ba lnga po 'di yis ni/_/sbyin sreg las ni rab tu bsgrub/_/
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]zhi ba'i shing ni mngar ba ste/_/rgyas pa de bzhin 'bras bur bcas/_/tsha ba mngon spyod las dag la/_/dgug pa la ni tsher ma can/_/dbang la me tog bcas par bshad/_/de rnams yam shing [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin/_/sngon la yam shing 
[\[269a.2\]]rnam pa lnga/_/rnal 'byor pa yis yang dag sbyar/_/de la 'dam gyis byugs pa yi/_/shing la shi ba rab tu bsgrags/_/gang du sdig pa rnam 'jig cing /_/kun du 'khrug par sreg 'gyur ba/_/bud shing mngar ba dag gi me/_/mnyam par 
[\[269a.3\]]gzhag pas rab sbar nas/_/til mar gyis ni sbyin sreg byas/_/sdig pa thams cad sreg par 'gyur/_/o~M sarba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/_bud shing mngar ba dag gis ni/_/shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas sbar/_/'bras kyi sbyin sreg byas nas ni/_/
[\[269a.4\]]bsod nams tshogs ni 'phel bar 'gyur/_/o~M badzra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/_bud shing mngar po dag gis ni/_/mnyam par gzhag pas me sbar nas/_/mar smyugs dUr ba'i sbyin sreg gis/_/rdo rje tshe ni mngon 'phel 'gyur/_/oM badzra A yu She swA hA/_yam 
[\[269a.5\]]shing de dag nyid kyis ni/_/dge ba 'byung bas me spar nas/_/ku sha'i myu gu'i til mar gyis/_/'jig rten gsum yang srung bar 'gyur/_/oM a pra ti ha ta badzrA ya swA hA/_sngon la zhi ba sbyar bar bya/_/dbus kyi gnyis la rgyas de bzhin/_/zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa 
[\[269a.6\]]yi/_/sbyin sreg las ni dang por 'gyur/_/shing ni tsha ba'i yam shing gis/_/mngon spyod kyi ni las dag la/_/mngon spyod dang ni bcas pa yi/_/dgug pa la yang de nyid kyi/_/rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/sngon la tsha ba'i yam shing gis/_/khros pas me ni 
[\[269a.7\]]rab sbar nas/_/mkhas pas tsher mas sbyin sreg bya/_/tsher ma dang bcas shing dag kyang /_/tsher ma can gyis nges par dgug_/gang dang gang ni 'dod gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni nges par 'gugs/_/oM badzra A kar+Sha ya dzaH/_bud shing me tog dmar sogs 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]kyis/_/rab tu 'bar ba'i me sbar nas/_/me tog 'bras bu dmar po yang /_/sbyin sreg byas na dbang byed mchog_/hU~M badzra pA shA ya dza/_tsha ba'i yam shing dag bya zhing /_/rab tu drag pa'i me spar nas/_/'bras bu kha ba bsreg byas na/_/mngon spyod kyi ni mchog yin no/_/hU~M 
[\[269b.2\]]badzra mA ra ya phaT/_gsang ba'i sbyin sreg thams cad ni/_/de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/_/sbyin sreg 'khor lo cho ga yis/_/de nyid du ni ji bzhin sbyar/_/yam shing tsha ba dag gis ni/_/shin tu drag pas me sbar nas/_/'jigs rung lcags kyus sbyin sreg 
[\[269b.3\]]bya/_/gdug pa thams cad rab 'jigs 'gyur/_/o~M badzra ban+d+ha ya phaT/_me tog dang bcas shing me la/_/rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/sngags sogs 'bras bu'i sbyin sreg ni/_/dbang du byed pa mchog yin no/_/o~M badzra ba sha~M ka rA ya swA hA/_kha ba dang ni mngar ba 
[\[269b.4\]]nyid/_/yam shing mngar po sbyar bya zhing /_/'dod pa'i me tog 'bras bsregs na/_/'dod pa'i gzugs can mchog tu 'gyur/_/o~M badzra karma rU pa Ne swA hA/_de nas bud shing de dag nyid kyis ni/_/rab tu khros pas me sbar nas/_/smyug ma'i 'bras bu phra mo bsregs/_/myur du mi 
[\[269b.5\]]snang nyid du 'gyur/_/o~M badzra a tri Sha ya swA hA/_shes rab bud shing de nyid kyis/_/drag po'i me ni rab sbyar nas/_/nam mkha' stobs kyi me tog dang /_/bsregs na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/_/o~M badzra khe tsa re na swA hA/_de nas mngag gzhug pa dang g.yog_/bka' bzhin 
[\[269b.6\]]byed pa rab tu bskul/_/ci nas kyang ni myur 'grub pa'i/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du rab bshad bya/_/shing ni kha bos bud shing bya/_/thag khung rdo rje'i dbyibs su brko/_/khros pas rdo rje me tog sreg_/yi ge dza ni yongs su brjod/_/sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/rdo rje'i sngags ni rab tu bskul/_/
[\[269b.7\]]rdo rje me tog dag bsregs na/_/bka' byed mchog ni rnyed par 'gyur/_/o~M badzra A dz+nyA ka rA ya dza/_yam shing de dag nyid dang ni/_/thab khung de nyid brko bya zhing /_/byang chub sems dpa'i sman ma gang /_/bsregs na bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/_/oM badzra sau ri ba sha~M kA rA ya dza/_bud shing 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]de dag nyid kyis me/_/kun du thab khung de kho na/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i sman ma ni/_/bsregs na bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/_/hU~M badzra pA Ni ba sha~M ka rA ya dza/_yang na sangs rgyas sman ma'am/_/yang na bdag dang mtshan ma dag_/sgrub pa'i sbyor bas sbyin sreg bya/_/
[\[270a.2\]]sangs rgyas bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/_/o~M bud+d+ha sha~M ka rA ya dza/_tshig gi sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/sbyin sreg bya zhing myur du 'grub/_/rdo rje'i sbyor bas dngos grub kun/_/the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/_/rdo rje rigs la sogs kun kyang /_/de nas gsang ba phyag rgya che/_/
[\[270a.3\]]rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rab sgrub phyir/_/rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya/_/rig pa gang zhig yid 'ong ba/_/sring mo'i rigs ni thob bya'i phyir/_/rig pa'i lha mo dang ldan par/_/shin tu rnal 'byor bsgrub par bya/_/bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu/_/mkhas pas 'dug pa bsten par 
[\[270a.4\]]bya/_/mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las/_/de nyid du ni ji skad bshad/_/kun du gur gum phye ma dang /_/b+ha gar mig sman bcug nas ni/_/de yi sems dpa' shes par bya/_/gang phyir dgongs pa rab tu bsgrags/_/sdug pa de yi rig pa ni/_/mngon par 'dod pa gang yid 'ong /_/
[\[270a.5\]]rang gi rigs kyi lha mo gang /_/de ni bud med ces byar grags/_/rig pa'i sbyor ba de yis ni/_/rang gi rigs kyi lha dag sgrub/_/mig sman la sogs gzhug pa ni/_/pad+ma'i steng du yang dag dgod/_/b+ha ga pad+ma zhes bshad de/_/gzhug pa dgod par bshad par bya/_/b+ha ga'i 
[\[270a.6\]]sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/mig sman dag ni bsgrub par bya/_/b+ha ga mig sman gzhug pa ni/_/pad+ma'i steng du yang dag dgod/_/pad+ma dang ni lhan cig dgod/_/rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/o~M gu h+ya ra ti badzra ba sha~M ka rI sid+d+ha hU~M/_dro dang du ba 'bar dang rdul/_/rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub 
[\[270a.7\]]par 'gyur/_/o~M gu h+ya badzra sid+d+ha hU~M/_b+ha gar gi wang bzhag nas ni/_/gsang ba'i phyag rgya gzhag par bya/_/mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi dag gis/_/dngos grub rnam pa bzhi ru bshad/_/o~M gu h+ya badzri sid+d+hi hU~M/_rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya yis/_/b+ha gar gur gum bcug nas ni/_/dgab cing de ni 'bar gyur na/_/
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/o~M badzra d+ha ra gu h+ya sid+d+ha hU~M/_rdo rje bya ba'i sbyor ba dang /_/rdo rje phyag rgya bsdus pa dang /_/rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug dang /_/rdo rje khu tshur sbyor ba dang /_/dam tshig mchog ni 'di dag dang /_/hU~M gi sor mo'i sbyor ba dang /_/chos kyi phyag rgya de bzhin 
[\[270b.2\]]'dir/_/oM la sogs pa'i yi ge dang /_/sbyin sreg cho ga 'di yis ni/_/ye shes phyag rgya rab bsgrub bya/_/rgyas pa ru ni thams cad dag_/gsang ba'i rgyud du rab tu bshad/_/cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches/_/tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas ni/_/
[\[270b.3\]]mchog nyid bsgrub par 'gyur ba yin/_/rdo rje rigs chen yid 'ong ba/_/rgyud chen kun las btus pa la/_/gang zhig mngon par brtson 'gyur ba/_/don yod pa yi dngos grub 'gyur/_/tshogs ni bsags pa med pa dang /_/sangs rgyas mthong ba med pa ru/_/gsang ba'i snying po chen po 'di/_/
[\[270b.4\]]thos pa tsam du 'ang mi 'gyur ro/_/gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga rdzogs so//_//de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhi/_/dkyil 'khor mkhas pas bslab par bya/_/ye shes de nyid gsang ba yang /_/yongs su bsgrubs par rab tu bskor/_/shin tu gsang ba chen po ni/_/dngos po thams cad 
[\[270b.5\]]khyab la dgod/_/'di ni rdo rje drag po bzhi/_/rang nyid lnga pa dang bcas pa/_/gsang ba brjod du med pa mchog_/ye shes mchog gi tshul thob byed/_/bde ba chen po rab grub don/_/dga' ba chen po shin tu brtan/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ye hU~M/_hU~M badzra ma Ta/_o~M badzra pra ti b+h+r-i ku TI badzra ra 
[\[270b.6\]]ta/_o~M badzra pad+ma badzra ti ta/_/o~M badzra karma a tri kro d+ha/_shar dang lho yi phyogs cha dang /_/nub dang byang gi phyogs cha dang /_/dbus dang phyogs bzhi dag dang ni/_/sbyor bas phyag rgya dgod par bya/_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/_/thams cad bri zhing dgod par bya/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal 
[\[270b.7\]]po che/_/mthong 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/ji skad bshad pa'i rnal 'byor bzhin/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor rjes sbyor skyes/_/rnal 'byor dag ni lhag ma dag_/de dag thams cad brtan par bya/_/shin tu gsang ba de nyid che/_/mchog tu gsang ba de nyid mchog_/gsang ba chen po gsang ba 'dzin/_/
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]rdo rje gsang ba brtan pa che/_/rig pa mngon par 'dod 'gyur ba/_/rang gi lag gis yang dag bri/_/rgyal mo chen mo brjod byas na/_/dkyil 'khor du ni skad cig 'grub/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta bi shud+d+ha d+ha rma hoH/_rang gis dkyil 'khor che bris nas/_/rig pa 
[\[271a.2\]]brjod pa la brtson bya/_/byams pas dgug pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/'khor ba snying rje sbyad par bya/_/o~M bi shud+d+ha d+heSh+Ti dzaH/_rang gis gsang sngags bris nas ni/_/bu mo'i mchu la 'o byas te/_/'jig rten dbang phyug btsun mo che/_/shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo/_/o~M swa b+hA ba bi 
[\[271a.3\]]shud+d+haH/_mu khe hU~M/_pha rol phyin drug spyod pa yis/_/byang chub sbyod pa rab rnyed dka'/_/sangs rgyas rnal 'byor brtan gyur na/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'jug bya zhing /_/'dod pa'i yon tan mchog lnga yis/_/rol cing dga' 
[\[271a.4\]]ba nyid du bya/_/mdo sde gsang dbang las bshad pa/_/gsang ba lnga ni rab sgrub pa/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ru bshad/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ru brjod/_/'dod pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/skal ba can 
[\[271a.5\]]gyis dngos grub thob/_/gsang ba de nyid chen po ste/_/rigs lnga dag ni rab bsgrub pa/_/'dod chags chen po rab bsgrub phyir/_/rol cing rab tu dga' bar bya/_/bde ba chen po grub don du/_/spyod pa chen po tshul chen po/_/de nyid rnal 'byor kun 
[\[271a.6\]]bsdus pa/_/de nas yang dag bshad par bya/_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad rnal 'byor gyis/_/rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya/_/ji ltar yi ge hU~M las byung /_/gsang ba rgyal po chen po byed/_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad sbyor ba yis/_/rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya/_/de ltar 
[\[271a.7\]]min na phyag rgya che/_/dam tshig zhes bya gtan mi 'grub/_/phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus nas/_/rdo rje phyag rgya yongs su gzung /_/de nas grub pa'i phyag rgya che/_/grub pa'i yi ge yang dag gis/_/myur du rab tu 'grub 'gyur ba/_/rmad byung chen po rab bshad bya/_/
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]o~M sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ye hU~M/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang bar bzhugs/_/phyag rgya chen po yongs su gzung /_/rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bya zhing /_/sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu bsgrub/_/hU~M badzra ma Ta/_rdo rje'i rig pa mchog rgyal po/_/bdag nyid yongs su 
[\[271b.2\]]bsgom bya zhing /_/sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byas na/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/o~M b+h+r-i ku TI bar tha/_rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur ba/_/rin chen phyag rgya yongs su gzung /_/rin chen char ni dbab pa nas/_/'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/
[\[271b.3\]]o~M pad+ma badzri hrIHtha/_shes rab spyan du rang bdag nyid/_/rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bya zhes/_/pad+ma'i rigs chen bskul bar bya/_/hU~M karma badzra kri ti ta/_sna tshogs rdo rje rgyal po che/_/bya ba sna tshogs bdag nyid che/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mchod byas na/_/dngos 
[\[271b.4\]]grub las ni thob par 'gyur/_/bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu/_/dkyil 'khor dag ni yang dag bya/_/mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las/_/rnam pa bzhi ni rab tu byung /_/de nas mtshan nyid sna tshogs yongs bsdus pa/_/rab tu spyan yangs dga' ba chen po mchog_/
[\[271b.5\]]de bzhin chogs dang rdo rje spyan ldan ma/_/shes rab spyan gyis btsun mo mchog chen ldan/_/o~M badzra karma ho/_badzra hU~M hU~M/_ka Ta ma Ta/_ra Ta ba Ta/_ka ra na badzrI gri/_badzra gu ru/_badzra phaT/_ka ra ra gri/_shud+d+hi g+hi/_shud+d+hi/_shud+d+haM gri/_bud+d+ha/_satwa rA dza/_rA ga tuSh+Ti/_rat+na/_te dza/_ke tu/_
[\[271b.6\]]hA sa/_d+harma/_tI k+Sh+Na/_he tu/_g+ho Sha/_d+harma/_rak+Sha/_yak+Sha/_san+b+hi/_sid+d+hi/_yo ga_/gu h+ya/_bi Sha ka_/tsAr+ya/_tsa ri/_dz+nyA na/_ra twa/_sum b+ha/_ta ga gruM/_hU~M phaT/_hU~M ba~M/_hU~M tsa/_hU~M ma/_hU~M sa/_hU~M ha/_hU~M hU~M/_hU~M dza/_hU~M ho/_hU~M sa/_hU~M a~M/_hU~M a/_hU~M tra~M/_hU~M ta~M/_hU~M ha~M/_hU~M d+haM/_hU~M d+hi/_hU~M ma~M/_
[\[271b.7\]]hU~M ra~M/_hU~M ka~M/_hU~M ha~M/_hU~M ba~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi dz+nyA/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta tsa gre sa/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta bi shA tsa/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta tsakre d+ha~M/_o~M a nud pa na ne a/_o~M a nu ru he A/_o~M a na le i/_o~M nI le I/_o~M rat+ne u/_o~M rat+ta U/_o~M sa u r-i/_o~M la e r-I/_o~M a ta l-i/_
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]o~M A ha re ra l-I/_o~M A sha ne e/_o~M b+he he g+he ai/_o~M sarbA shA pa ri pUr+Ne o/_o~M b+ha ra de au/_o~M s+pha ra Ne a~M/_o~M bi shwa aH/_o~M ma ho tse bre ka_/o~M tiSh+Tha kha/_o~M a mu kha ga_/o~M a b+hi She g+ha/_o~M dz+nyA na nga /_o~M ts+tshe da tsa/_o~M bA rA hi r+ya tsha/_o~M b+ha she dza/_o~M b+ha d+he 
[\[272a.2\]]dz+ha/_o~M pra sha me nya/_o~M kro d+hi Ta/_o~M ha ra ne Tha/_o~M b+hi g+ha Da/_o~M k+Sha be D+ha/_o~M a Nu Na/_o~M Tak+ki le ta/_o~M bi su le tha/_o~M d+hA ra NI da/_o~M ba ta ke d+ha/_o~M ba lo ke na/_o~M tra te pa/_o~M sarba ha ra ni pha/_o~M b+hu sha ni ba/_o~M b+hi ba sha ni b+ha/_o~M a ra te ma/_o~M a li ni ya/_
[\[272a.3\]]o~M tra ha ra/_o~M bi sha la/_o~M bud+d+he wa/_o~M d+ha me sha_/o~M ya ma b+he Sha/_o~M sarbe sa/_o~M d+ha li ni ha/_ho tha/_hU~M dzaH/_hA sa/_o~M a/_ba ha/_a ro/_ni bi/_da sha_/tra ra d+hi/_b+hu pa/_sa ya/_a hi/_krod+ha/_d+ha ma sha_/b+ha ra ya/_yu ga ti/_dar+sha na/_hA sa ya/_he ma hA ne/_d+ha ra Na/_
[\[272a.4\]]o~M sarba ta thA ga ta sa bi dz+nyA ma hA mu ne rA dzA gar+b+ho rA dzA kra ya hi hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M ha/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di/_/mdo sde gsang dbang las gsungs pas/_/chos dbyings brtan pa'i rang bzhin te/_/chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung /_/bde legs bsgom pa byas dang mtshungs 
[\[272a.5\]]pa med/_/e ma'o sang pa chen po gsang ba kun bsdus pa/_/rnal 'byor rgya cher bsdus pa'ang mtshungs pa med/_/bde ba chen po 'di ni brtan zhing brtan pa'i dngos por 'gyur/_/dga' ba chen po'i slob dpon dga' chen nyi ma ste/_/mchod 'os gsang ba'i kun 
[\[272a.6\]]bsdus pa/_/kun mkhyen gsung las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa/_/tshogs rgyas rab tu 'phel bar gyur pa gsungs pa yin/_/rdo rje chen po skal ba ches/_/gsang ba thams cad rjes su bslab/_/de nyid chos ni rnal 'byor che/_/stug po bsdus par 'jug par 
[\[272a.7\]]bya/_/brgya dang sum cu rtsa drug lhag_/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa/_/bri dang rdor tshig yi ge yis/_/dkyil 'khor gsang ba bslab par bya/_/rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa/_/dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di ru ni/_/de nyid yi ge rnam dag pa'i/_/
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]rnal 'byor chen po 'jug par bya/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/rta babs bzhes ni rnam par brgyan/_/thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/_/dar gyi chun pos rnam par brgyan/_/rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yi/_/stug bo gsang ba shin tu brtan/_/de nyid gsang ba 
[\[272b.2\]]bslab bya'i phyir/_/shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bslab/_/e ma'o dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/_/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa/_/rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yis/_/mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod/_/gru bzhi mnyam pa'i rim 
[\[272b.3\]]pa ni/_/de nyid kyi ni nang du bya/_/dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus kyi char/_/sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/_/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/ci rigs par ni yang dag bri/_/ngos bzhi'i rang bzhin dkyil 'khor la/_/yi ge sum cu rtsa drug dag dgod/_/
[\[272b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du/_/yi ge bcu drug yang dag bri/_/yi ge bcu drug rgyal po ni/_/phyag rgya'i tshogs dang 'od bcas pa/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i logs bzhi ru/_/yi ge rnams ni yang dag bri/_/yi ge sum cu sum cu ni/_/phyogs rnams 
[\[272b.5\]]kun du dgod par bya/_/sangs rgyas thugs ka'i dbus su ni/_/yi ge hU~M ni sbyar bar bya/_/gang zhig sbyor ba'i ming can gyi/_/sangs rgyas dbus su dgod par bya/_/rdo rje yi ge rab sbyor byed/_/shes rab can gyis yi ge rnams/_/rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa 
[\[272b.6\]]yis/_/dbus su rdo rje rdo rje bzhi/_/shar du yi ge sum cu bri/_/yi ge sum cu de bzhin lhor/_/sum cu byang gi phyogs cha ru/_/nub tu sum cu sbyar bar bya/_/yi ge bcu drug yang dag sbyor/_/dbus su sangs rgyas bzhi ldan bya/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 
[\[272b.7\]]'byor che/_/rnal 'byor dbang phyug dbang phyug che/_/dpal ldan 'jig rten rnal 'byor ldan/_/dbab pa brtan pa'i tshogs gyur pa/_/smra ba las byung rgyal ba che/_/sangs rgyas rnal 'byor 'jug par bya/_/u ro ti ko ta ma hAr+ya yo d+ha r+ya bir te nA ma ne/_de nas sbyor ba 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]'di yis ni/_/rdo rje 'khor lo gzhug par bya/_/ha ha ho ho gsang chen po/_/rtse gsum ral pa gsum 'dzin pa/_/rgyal chen gzi brjid chen po'i don/_/rdo rje thig gis yongs su bskor/_/slob dpon chen pos blta byas nas/_/yi ge rab 
[\[273a.2\]]tu brjod par bya/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yis/_/rdo rje'i 'khor lo kun du spro/_/a A'i rnal 'byor yang dag gzung /_/i I dbang phyug chen po'i 'od/_/u U rnon po 'chang ba ste/_/e ai sgra dbyangs rab bskul ba/_/o au skyabs byed 
[\[273a.3\]]rtsibs chen po/_/a~M aHshes rab spyan bzang ba/_/rdo rje lcags kyu 'di yis kyang /_/rdo rje 'chang ni bskul bar bya/_/ji ltar 'khor lo ji ltar rigs/_/ci 'os ji ltar rdo rje'i rigs/_/de bzhin 'khor lo yongs su dgod/_/rdo rje slob dpon dka' 
[\[273a.4\]]thub che/_/skal ba chen po gsang ba 'di/_/rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag sbyor/_/rnam 'phrul de ni rab tu bskor/_/'khor lo dbab dang gzhug pa dang /_/cho ga ji bzhin 'jug par bya/_/rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du/_/rgyas par ji skad bstan pa bzhin/_/
[\[273a.5\]]rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang /_/'khor lo dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/_/'khor lo'i gnas ni dbang du 'gyur/_/chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag ldan/_/rdo rje 'gugs dang skal ldan dang /_/ngas byed rin chen gzi brjid dang /_/rgyal mtshan bzhad pa 
[\[273a.6\]]yang dag ldan/_/chos dang rnon po gtso bo mchog_/rgyu dang gtum po drag po che/_/las dang bsrung ba gnod sbyin grub/_/sna tshogs sbyor ba yang dag ldan/_/'khor lo'i rnam par 'phrul pa byung /_/de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/_/rdo rje 'khor lo kun du 
[\[273a.7\]]bri/_/rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis/_/dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug par bya/_/bu dang slob ma min pa la/_/gsang ba'i tshogs chen sbyin mi bya/_/gzhan du skal ba dang ldan pa/_/gzhung 'di khyed kyis ci 'dir byin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]kyi gsang ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po shin tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog tu gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdo rje rtse mo las/_rdo rje rigs kyi de kho na nyid shin tu gsang ba'i rnam par bshad pa ste/_le'u bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par 
[\[273b.2\]]snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pas/_slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab par gyur to/_/rdo rje hU~M mdzad rdo rje mchog_/rdo rje mchog 'dzin rdo rje'i 
[\[273b.3\]]mda'/_/rdo rje khro gnyer rdo rje'i lus/_/rdo rje 'bar ba rgyal mtshan che/_/rdo rje gad rgyangs rdo rje'i bdag_/rdo rje sde ste chos mchog 'dzin/_/rdo rje rgyal mtshan shin tu rno/_/rdo rje 'khor lo bzlas pa che/_/las kyi rdo rje rdo rje che/_/rdo rje gnod sbyin 'jigs chen po/_/
[\[273b.4\]]rdo rje phyag rgya sgra chen po/_/rdo rje khu tshur brtan pa che/_/rdo rje 'bar ba rdo rje che/_/las chen po ste mda' chen po/_/rdo rje legs pa dga' ba che/_/rdo rje rgyan ni 'phrog byed pa/_/rdo rje 'od de rgyal mtshan che/_/rdo rje'i tshems ni rab dga' ba/_/rdo rje pad+ma shin tu gcod/_/
[\[273b.5\]]rdo rje dkyil 'khor rdo rje rig_/rdo rje ljags te sna tshogs che/_/sna tshogs mtshon chen skye dgu mda'/_/go cha chen po rdo rje sku/_/rdo rje mche ba 'jigs byed pa/_/rdo rje bsdams pa rdo rje che/_/rdo rje khro bo gzhu chen po/_/rdo rje lcags kyu mdzod chen po/_/zhags 
[\[273b.6\]]pa chen po dbang chen po/_/rdo rje lcags sgrog 'bebs pa che/_/rdo rje dbab pa 'jigs byed pa/_/yi ge dzaHste yi ge hU~M/_/yi ge hU~M ni dam du 'ching /_/yi ge hoHste yi ge haH/_/rdo rje phyag rgya dregs pa mchog_/rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo che/_/lcags kyu bsdigs med rdo rje 
[\[273b.7\]]khro/_/rdo rje bdud de bdud kyi mchog_/bdud kyi bdud ni rab 'joms pa/_/rdo rje dga' ba zhi ba che/_/rdo rje dka' thub shis mdzad pa/_/rdo rje drag po shin tu gdug_/rdo rje rang dbang rdo rje mdzad/_/rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo che/_/rdo rje sgra ste sgra chen po/_/sangs rgyas hU~M 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]mdzad yi ge hU~M/_yi ge phaT sogs dang mnyam pa/_/yi ge phaT ni 'bar ba'i bka'/_/yi ge swA hA rang bzhin med/_/gtso bo gsod dang slong mdzad pa/_/dri med skrag dang dbugs 'byin mdzad/_/sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khro bo che/_/
[\[274a.2\]]khro bo rdo rje de bzhin gshegs/_/'dod chags las byung de bzhin nyid/_/rdo rje khro bo khyed phyag 'tshal/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/_/nyin re zhing du lan cig ni/_/gang zhig 'don par byed pa de/_/dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/de 
[\[274a.3\]]dag la ni 'jigs pa med/_/phongs dang bran dag nyid mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bstan pa/_/dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/dpa' bo khyod la gsol ba 'debs/_/gdug pa rnams ni gdul ba dang /_/de bzhin sems can don bya'i 
[\[274a.4\]]phyir/_/tshul chen bskyed par mdzad du gsol/_/gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon chen po karma badzra'i zhal snga nas dang /_lo ts+tsha ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims 
[\[274a.5\]]kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//_//bam po bcu gnyis pa//_
